encodingDesc.projectDesc: This is a part of multi-lingual corpus of the bible.

editorialDesc.segmentation: Marked up to the level of chapter and verse.

div.seg: arra n-tlalit n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ yus n-dawd yus n-ibrahim.
ibrahim yuru isḥaq. isḥaq yuru yaɛqub. yaɛqub yuru yahuda d-aytmas.
yahuda yuru fariṣ d-zaraḥ (tga innatsn tamar). fariṣ yuru ḥaṣrun, ḥaṣrun yuru aram,
aram yuru ɛamminadab, ɛamminadab yuru naḥšun, naḥšun yuru salmun.
salmun yuru buɛaz (tga innas raḥab). buɛaz yuru ɛubid (tga innas raɛut). ɛubid yuru yassa,
yassa yuru dawd agllid. dawd yuru suliman (innas n-suliman tkka-ttin tga tamġart n-urriyya).
suliman yuru raḥbɛam, raḥbɛam yuru abiyya, abiyya yuru asa,
asa yuru yahušafaṭ, yahušafaṭ yuru yuram, yuram yuru ɛuzziyya,
ɛuzziyya yuru yutam, yutam yuru aḥaz, aḥaz yuru ḥazqiyya,
ḥazqiyya yuru manassa, manassa yuru amun, amun yuru yušiyya,
yušiyya yuru yakuniyya d-aytmas ġakud lliġ nkrn ayt-babil awin kullu ayt-yudaya s-tmazirt n-babil.
tigira n-ma-tn-iwin s-babil yakuniyya yuru šaltil, šaltil yuru zarubbabil,
zarubbabil yuru abihuda, abihuda yuru alyaqim, alyaqim yuru ɛazur,
ɛazur yuru ṣaduq, ṣaduq yuru ah̬im, ah̬im yuru alyud.
alyud yuru aliɛazr, aliɛazr yuru mattan, mattan yuru yaɛqub.
yaɛqub yuru yusf argaz n-maryam lli-igan innas n-yasuɛ lli-mi-ttinin lmasiḥ.

kkuẓṭ d-mrawt n-tasut a-illan zġ-ibrahim ar dawd. kkuẓṭ d-mrawt n-tasut a-illan zġ-dawd ar akud lliġ iwin ayt-yudaya s-babil. d-kkuẓṭ d-mrawt n-tasut a-illan zġ-lliġ-tn-iwin s-babil ar akud lliġ ilul lmasiḥ.
ġmkad a-tga-tlalit n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ. innas maryam ttyawḍalab i-yusf, ur-ta-stt-yiwi. taf-n ih̬f-ns is-a-trbbu zġ-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus n-rbbi.
imma yusf lli-stt-in-iḍalbn iga wad bdda iran a-irḍu rbbi. iswangm ad-as-ifru s-tntla, ašku ur-iri a-stt-iššḥššm ġ-lgddam n-mddn.

ar-sul-iswingim ġ-mayan s-as-d-iban yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi ġ-twargit yini-as: «wa-yusf yus n-dawd, ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ a-tawit maryam a-tg tamġart-nnk, ašku nttat zġ-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus ayn-s-tffuġ ar-trbbu.
ra-taru yan-warraw, tgt-as ism ‹yasuɛ› ašku ra-ijjnjm mddn-ns zġ-ddnub-nsn.»
kullu mayad ijra baš a-yafu maylli inna sidi rbbi f-ils n-nnabi ġayd izrin inna:
«ha-yat-taɛyyalt ra-tffuġ ar-trbbu, taru yan-warraw. rad-as-ttinin ‹ɛimmanuwwil›.» tga lmɛna-ns ‹rbbi didnnġ›.
lliġ-d-ifaq yusf zġ-iṭs iskr ġmklli-as-inna lmalak n-sidi rbbi. yawi maryam a-tg tamġart-ns
walaynni ur-dids-igin aylliġ turu arraw-an. ig-as ġakudan ism ‹yasuɛ›.
ilul yasuɛ ġ-uwssan n-ugllid hirudus ġ-tmdint n-bitlaḥm ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya. uškan-d kra n-imajusin zġ-ššrq ġ-uwssan-an s-tmdint n-urušalim
ar-sqsan: «maniġ illa ġwalli-d-iluln a-ig agllid n-ayt-yudaya? nẓra itri-ns ġ-ššrq, našk-id ad-as-nsjd.»
lliġ isfld hirudus i-mayd nnan, ṭiyyr-as bahra ntta d-kullu ayt-urušalim.
issmun-d inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ kullutn isqsa-tn: «maniġ ra-ilal lmasiḥ n-rbbi?»
inin-as: «ġ-bitlaḥm ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya, ašku ġmkad a-ityaran f-ufus n-nnabi inna:
‹wa-bitlaḥm ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya, urd kmmin a-iggʷran ġ-tmdinin n-yudaya, ašku zġ-gim a-zġ-ra-d-yašk-unmġur lli-ra-iks mddn-inu n-ayt-yaɛqub.›»
yazn hirudus ġakudan mad-d-itawin imajusin s-dars s-tntla. isqsa-tn: «managu ad-awn-iban itri?»
yazn-tn ilmma s-bitlaḥm yini-asn: «zaydat tsigglm s-warraw-an ġ-kraygatt mani. ġakud nna-ti-tufam tawim-iyi-d lh̬bar baš ad-dduġ ad-as-n-sjdġ ula nkki.»

lliġ sfldn ntni i-mad-asn-inna-ugllid, munn-daġ d-uġaras-nsn. iban-asn-d-daġ itri lli-yadlli-ẓran ġ-ššrq, frḥn bahra s-lfrḥ iggutn. izwur-asn itri aylliġ ilkm iggi n-illiġ illa-uḥšmi, ibidd.
kšmn ntni s-tgmmi, s-ẓran aḥšmi d-innas maryam. ḍrn f-ifaddn-nsn, knun s-wakal ġ-lgddam-ns. rẓmn itlsan-nsn, fkn-as tiwafkiw n-uwrġ d-lbh̬ur d-tujjut l-lmurr.
iml-asn rbbi ġakudan ġ-twargit a-ur-wrrin s-dar hirudus. amẓn ilmma aġaras yaḍni s-tmazirt-nsn.

lliġ ddan ntni iban-d yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi i-yusf ġ-twargit yini-as: «nkr tawit aḥšmi d-innas trwlm s-tmazirt n-miṣr, tqamam-n ġin ard-ak-iniġ a-di-twrrim, ašku hirudus ra-isiggil s-uḥšmi-ad a-t-inġ.»
inkr yusf ġ-iḍ-an yawi aḥšmi d-innas ftun s-miṣr.
qaman ġin aylliġ immut hirudus. ġmkad a-s-yuwfa maylli inna sidi rbbi f-ils n-nnabi ġayd izrin: «zġ-miṣr a-zġ-d-ġriġ i-iwi.»
imma hirudus, lliġ issn is-t-ġḍrn imajusin, nkrn-d gis iriyn. yazn s-bitlaḥm inġ kullu iḥšmin ġ-tsgiw-an zġ-sin isggʷasn d-ma-ikkan ddawatsn, ašku issn zġ-imajusin managu ad-asn-iban itri.
ġakudan a-yuwfa ma-inna nnabi irmiyya ġayd izrin:
«taġuyyit a-mi-n-nsfld ġ-tmdint n-rama, ar-ssġuyyun ar-tnuwwaḥn. ar-talla raḥil f-tarwa-ns, ur-tẓḍar a-tṣbr ašku ur-sul-llin.»
lliġ immut hirudus iban yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi ġ-twargit i-yusf ġ-miṣr yini-as:
«nkr tawit aḥšmi d-innas twrrim s-tmazirt n-ayt-rbbi. ašku ġwilli ranin ad-nġn aḥšmi, hatnin mmutn.»
inkr ilmma yawi aḥšmi d-innas s-tmazirt n-ayt-rbbi.
walaynni lliġ isfld yusf is-iwrri arh̬ilaws iġli s-tgldit n-babas hirudus ġ-tsgiw n-yudaya, yiksaḍ ur-iẓḍar a-iddu s-ġin. iml-as rbbi ġ-twargit is-t-id-iqqan a-izri s-tsgiw n-jalil,
iddu izdġ ġ-tmdint n-naṣira. ġmkad a-s-yuwfa maylli nnan lanbiya: «rad-as-ttinin i-lmasiḥ ‹gu-naṣira›.»
tiġurdin n-mayan a-d-iban yuḥanna amsddam ġ-lh̬la n-yudaya ar-itbrraḥ ar-ittini:
«flat kullu ma-tskarm yʷh̬šn, ašku takmur-d-tgldit n-ignna.»
ġwad a-f-inna nnabi išaɛya ġayd izrin yini: «ha-yan-wawal ar-itbrraḥ ġ-lh̬la ar-ittini ‹jjujadat aġaras n-siditnnġ, tssnmm tiġarasin-ns.›»
ar-ilssa yuḥanna taḍut n-irɛaman ar-yaggs s-ubkkas n-ilm, ar-ištta tamurġi d-tammnt l-lh̬la.
ffuġn-d dars mddn ggutnin zġ-tmdint n-urušalim ula tamazirt n-yudaya kullutt ula kullu tisgiw n-wasif n-urdun.
ar-tqrran s-ddnub-nsn, ar-tn-issddam ġ-wasif n-urdun.

aškin-d dars mddn ggutnin l-lmdhb n-ifarisin d-win iṣadduqin, irin ula ntni ad-ddmn ġ-waman f-ufus-ns. imma ntta lliġ-tn-iẓra, isawl srsn yini-asn: «wa-tarwa n-ifaġrn, mad-awn-innan izd ġmkad a-s-ra-tanfm i-lɛqubit lli-ra-ittut f-ddunit?
skarat afulki baš a-iban is-tflm ma-yʷh̬šnn.
a-ur-ttinim i-ngratun ‹nkkʷni nga tarwa n-ibrahim,› ašku rad-awn-iniġ, rbbi iẓḍar a-d-issnkr tarwa i-ibrahim ula zġ-iẓran-ad.
hay-aglzim ittrs f-uggja n-usġar. kud tasġart nna-ur-yakkan lġllt imimn, ra-stt-ibbi iluḥ-tt-in ġ-lɛafit.
nkki ar-kʷn-ssddamġ ġ-waman baš a-tmlm is-tflm lh̬ʷšant-nnun, walaynni yugʷr-iyi ġwalli ra-d-yašk tigira-nu, ur-sthllaġ ad-asiġ turẓiyin-ns. ra-kʷn-issddm ntta s-rruḥ lqudus d-lɛafit.
yasi tazzrt a-izuzzr, issmun-d irdn-ns ġ-uḥanu, ijdr alim s-lɛafit lli-ur-sar-ih̬sin.»
ġ-uwssan-an a-ġ-d-yuška yasuɛ zġ-tmazirt n-jalil s-wasif n-urdun baš a-iddm f-ufus n-yuḥanna.
ur-iri yuḥanna a-t-issddm. yini-as: «ma-s-d-dari-tuškit a-k-ssddmġ? nkkin a-iḥtajjan ad-ddmġ f-ufus-nnk.»
imma yasuɛ inna-yas: «a-yili ġilad ġmklli nniġ, ašku ġmkad a-s-ra-nssafu kullu ma-irḍan rbbi.» ġakudan iqbl yuḥanna awal-ns
issddm-t ġ-wasif. ġir inkr-d yasuɛ zġ-waman s-rẓmn ignwan, iẓr rruḥ n-rbbi igguz-d zund yan-utbir ittrs-d fllas.
isawl-d yan-wawal zġ-ignwan yini: «ġwad iga iwi iɛzzan. frḥġ srs bahra.»
iddu yasuɛ ġakudan, yawi-t rruḥ lqudus s-lh̬la a-t-itarm iblis.
kkuẓ id-mraw n-wass a-yaẓum ġ-iyḍ ula azal, aylliġ iwrri yaġ-t laẓ bahra.
yašk-id srs ilmma iblis, yini-as: «iġ-tgit yus n-rbbi, ini i-iẓran-ad ad-wrrin gn aġrum.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «han ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi ‹urd aġrum ka-s-a-itddr bnadm, walaynni s-kraygatt awal nna-d-yuškan zġ-dar rbbi.›»
yawi-t ilmma iblis s-tmdint n-urušalim, issbidd-t f-iggi n-ukfaf n-tgmmi n-rbbi
yini-as: «iġ-tgit yus n-rbbi luḥ-n ih̬f-nnk s-iyzdar, ašku ityara ‹ra-d-yazn lmalayka-ns a-k-gabln. ra-k-asin f-ifassn-nsn baš a-ur-ilkm-uḍar-nnk kra n-uẓru.›»
irar-as yasuɛ: «han ityara ‹a-ur-tarmt rbbi sidik.›»
yawi-t ilmma iblis issġli-t s-yan-udrar yattuyn, iml-as kullu tiglday n-ddunit ula lmjd-nsnt,
yini-as: «rad-ak-fkġ kullu mayad iġ-tḍrt f-ifaddn-nnk tsjdt-iyi.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «itti-n zġ-gigi a-šiṭan, ašku ityara ‹rbbi sidik a-mi-ttsjadt, d-nttan waḥdut a-ttɛbadt.›»
ifl-t iblis ġakudan, aškin-d dars lmalayka ar-ti-tɛawann.
lliġ isfld yasuɛ is-ityamaẓ yuḥanna amsddam ġ-lḥbs, iwrri s-tmazirt n-jalil.
lliġ-n-ilkm ur-iqama ġ-naṣira walaynni izri izdġ ġ-tmdint n-kafrnaḥum, tlla ġ-tama n-umda ġ-tsga n-zabulun ula naftali.
ġmkan a-s-yuwfa-wawal n-nnabi išaɛya inna:
«way-akal n-zabulun d-wakal n-naftali lli-iwalan amda ġ-tsga yaḍni n-urdun. wa-tamazirt n-jalil tazdġt n-ibrraniyn.
han ġwin gawrnin ġ-tillas a-iẓran tifawt iggutn. ġwin zdġnin ġ-tmazirt n-umalu l-lmut, ntni a-f-tsfaw tifawt.»
ġakudan a-igra yasuɛ ar-itbrraḥ ar-ittini: «flat kullu ma-tskarm yʷh̬šn, ašku takmur-d-tgldit n-ignna.»
iftu yasuɛ ġ-tama n-umda n-jalil, iẓr sin aytmatn, simɛan lli-mi-ttinin bṭrus d-gʷmas andraws. ingʷmarn n-islman ad-gan, grn-in ššbkt ġ-umda.
isawl srsn yasuɛ yini-asn: «aškad-d munat didi, rarġ-kʷn a-tgm ingʷmarn n-mddn.»
ġakudan fln ššbayk-nsn, munn dids.
izayd iftu yan imikk s-n-iẓra sin aytmatn yaḍni, yaɛqub yus n-zabdi d-gʷmas yuḥanna. llan ġ-tanawt ntni d-babatsn zabdi ar-tɛdaln ššbayk. iġr-asn yasuɛ,
fln-in tanawt ula babatsn ġakudan, munn dids.

izayd yasuɛ ar-itkka tamazirt n-jalil kullutt, ar-isslmad ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit, ar-itbrraḥ s-lh̬bar ifulkin n-tgldit n-ignna, ar-ijjujji mddn zġ-kraygatt tamaḍunt ula kraygatt aṭṭan nna-gisn-illan.
sfldn fllas kullu mddn ġ-tmazirt n-suriyya, awin-as-d kullu ma-ihršn s-mknna tga-tmaḍunt ula aṭṭan, gn-iyt ikušamn nġd imjnan nġd ġwilli issṭar-uslay, ijjujji-tn kullutn.
ḍfurn-t mddn ggutnin, uškan-d zġ-tsgiw n-jalil d-tmazirt n-mrawt-tmdinin d-urušalim d-tmazirt n-yudaya ula zġ-tsga yaḍni n-wasif n-urdun.
lliġ iẓra yasuɛ mddn ggutnin uškan-d s-dars, iġli s-yan-uwrir iskiws, munn-d fllas imḥḍarn-ns.
ibdu ar-tn-isslmad yini:
«imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli ssḥssanin is-ur-gin yat, ašku ntni a-mi-tlla-tgldit n-ignna.
imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli allanin, ašku ntni a-mi-ra-isfiḍ rbbi imṭṭawn-nsn.
imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli tṣbarnin, ašku ntni a-ra-išškšm rbbi s-kullu timih̬ar-ns.
imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli yaġ laẓ ula irifi i-ma-irḍan rbbi, ašku ntni a-ra-išbɛ.
imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli tḥnnunin ġ-wiyyaḍ, ašku ntni a-f-ra-d-iḥnnu rbbi.
imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli dar ul iġusn, ašku ntni a-ra-iẓr rbbi.
imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli skarnin sslamt, ašku ntni a-ra-ig rbbi d-tarwa-ns.
imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli trfufunnin f-ssibt n-ma-irḍan rbbi, ašku ntni a-mi-tlla-tgldit n-ignna.
imbarkin a-tgam iġ-kʷn-rgmn mddn ssrfufnn-kʷn inin fllawn kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn s-tkrkas f-ssibt n-ma-tgam winu.
thnnayat tfrḥm bahra, ašku tggut lbaraka lli-rad-awn-yili ġ-ignna. han ġmkan ad-ssrfufnn ula lanbiya lli-kʷn-d-zwarnin.
«kunni tgam tisnt n-ddunit. walaynni iġ-tlmus tisnt ma-s-ra-stti-tssmarġm? ur-sul-tgi i-yat. ra-stt-in-luḥn mddn ġ-brra akʷln fllas.
kunni tgam tifawt n-ddunit. tamdint nna-illan f-iggi n-uwrir ur-tẓḍar a-tntl.
ur-a-ssrġan mddn lqndil a-t-in-srsn ġ-ddu lɛbrt, walaynni f-iggi n-mani yattuyn a-f-a-t-in-srasn baš ad-isfiwn kullu ayt-tgmmi.
ġmkad a-s-d-iqqan tifawt-nnun a-tisfiw ġ-lgddam n-mddn, baš ad-ẓrn afulki lli-tskarm alġn babatun lli-illan ġ-ignna.
«ad-ur-tġalm is-d-uškiġ ad-ssittiġ ššrɛ n-musa ula arratn l-lanbiya. ur-d-uškiġ a-tn-ssittiġ. uškiġ-d a-tn-kmmlġ.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, kullu mad-qaman ignwan d-wakal ur-ra-yitti kra l-lḥrf nġd kra n-tnqiṭṭ zġ-ššrɛ ard yafu kullu ma-gis-illan.

wanna issunfn kra l-luṣit imẓẓin zġ-luṣiyat-ad n-ššrɛ isslmd i-mddn ad-as-anfn, ra-ig nttan wad kullu imẓẓin ġ-tgldit n-ignna. imma wanna iskarn s-luṣiyat-ad isslmd mddn ad-srsnt-skarn, ra-ig nttan wad imqqurn ġ-tgldit n-ignna.
rad-awn-iniġ, iġ-ur-trḍim rbbi uggʷar n-imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-ifarisin ur-akkʷ-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tkšmm s-tgldit n-ignna.
«tsfldm is-inna musa i-willi zrinin ‹a-ur-tnġt. wanna inġan, ra-fllas-ittut lḥukm.›
imma nkki rad-awn-iniġ, kullu wanna ikurhan gʷmas, illa fllas lḥukm. d-wanna irgmn gʷmas iqqan-t-id a-izri zġ-lmḥkama, d-wanna-yas-innan ‹kiyi wašš a-tgit› isthlla lɛafit n-jhnnama.
iġ-tiwit kra n-twafka s-tgmmi n-rbbi tswangmd-d is-tskrt kra yʷh̬šnn ġ-gʷmak,
fl-n tawafka-nnk ġ-tama n-uẓru n-tġrsi, tddut tṣalḥt d-gʷmak, twrrid-d ilmma tfkt tawafka-nnk i-rbbi.
iġ-ak-iṣrḍ kra n-yan, mšaškad-d dids ġ-uġaras ur-ta-tlkimm lmḥkama, a-ur-k-in-idḥi-umṣraḍ-nnk i-lqaḍi, idḥi-k lqaḍi i-umh̬zni, iluḥ-k-in ġ-lḥbs.
lḥqq a-rad-ak-iniġ, ur-ra-di-tffuġt zġ-ġin ard tfrut taqaritt iggʷran.
«tsfldm is-inna musa ‹a-ur-tznut.›
imma nkki rad-awn-iniġ, wanna issmaqqln ġ-kra n-tmġart išthu-tt, han izna srs ġ-uwl-ns.
iġ-a-k-tssṭar tiṭ-nnk tafasit, ssukf-tt-id tluḥt-stt. yuf a-k-ih̬ṣṣa yan-ugzzum ġ-ddat-nnk ula a-n-kullu-ttyawgar ddat-nnk ġ-jhnnama.
iġ-a-k-issṭar-ufus-nnk afasi, bbi-t tluḥt-t. yuf a-k-ih̬ṣṣa yan-ugzzum ġ-ddat-nnk ula a-kullu-tddu ddat-nnk s-jhnnama.
«inna-daġ musa ‹wanna ifran i-tmġart-ns iqqan-t-id ad-as-ifk tabrat l-lfra.›
imma nkki rad-awn-iniġ, wanna ifran i-tmġart-ns f-kra yaḍni bla zzna, hati irur-tt a-tznu. d-wanna itahln tanna-d-ifran, han zzna ayn iskr.
«tsfldm is-inna musa i-willi zrinin ‹a-ur-tffuġt f-maylli-s-tggullit s-rbbi. illa fllak a-tssafut tagallit-nnk.›
imma nkki rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-ttgallam, la s-ignna ašku iga lɛrš n-rbbi,
ula s-ddunit ašku tga aẓru lli-f-isrs iḍarn-ns, ula s-urušalim ašku tga tamdint n-ugllid imqqurn.
ula tggullit s-ih̬f-nnk ašku ur-tẓḍart a-trart yan-unẓaḍ a-ig umlil nġd iḍili.
illa fllawn a-ig-wawal-nnun ‹iyah› nġd ‹uhu›. aynna tzuydm i-mayan, han iblis a-d-ikka.
«tsfldm is-inna musa ‹tiṭ s-tiṭ, ula ah̬s s-wah̬s.›
imma nkki rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-tmmaġm d-yan gigun iskrn ma-yʷh̬šnn. iġ-k-yut yan f-umadl afasi, gllb-as-n aẓlmaḍ.
iġ-ak-iṣrḍ yan yiri ad-ak-yawi aqššab, fk-as ula aslham.
iġ-k-yumr kra n-yan ad-as-tasit taġawsa-ns yan kilimitr, ddu dids sin.
wanna-zgik-iḍalbn, fk-as. d-wanna-d-yuškan ad-as-trḍlt, a-ur-ti-trart bla yat.
«tsfldm is-inna musa ‹a-tḥnnut ġ-umddakkʷl-nnk, tkrhut anuwwaš-nnk.›
imma nkki rad-awn-iniġ, ḥnnwat ġ-inuwwašn-nnun, tḍalbm rbbi a-irḥm ġwilli-kʷn-ssrfufnnin.
ġmkad a-s-ra-tgm zund babatun lli-illan ġ-ignna, ašku ntta ar-d-issaqlay tafukt-ns f-willi ʷh̬šnnin ula f-willi fulkinin, ar-d-yakka anẓar i-willi skarnin s-wawal-ns ula ġwilli ur-srs-skarnin.
iġ-a-ttḥnnum ġir ġ-willi gigun tḥnnunin, mal-lbaraka a-rad-awn-yili? is-urd ġmkan ad-skarn ayt-nkkas ula ntni?
iġd ġir imddukkʷal-nnun a-da-ttnsallamm, man afulki tskrm uggʷar n-mddn yaḍni? is-urd ġmkan ad-skarn ula ġwilli ur-ssinnin rbbi?
imma kunni, illa fllawn a-tfulkim s-ufulki ikmmln, ġmklli kullu ifulki babatun n-ignna.
«rarat lɛaql a-ur-ttirim a-tskarm ifulkitn-nnun ġ-lgddam n-mddn baš a-kʷn-ẓrn. ašku iġ-a-tskarm ġmkan ur-rad-awn-tili kra l-lbaraka dar babatun lli-illan ġ-ignna.

iġ-tfkit i-kra n-umẓluḍ, a-ur-tutt nnaqus baš a-k-ẓrn mddn. han ġmkan ad-skarn ayt-sin-uwdmawn ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ula ġ-tswak baš a-tn-alġn wiyyaḍ. lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, mayan ka-rad-asn-yili.
imma kiyi ġakud nna-ra-tfkt i-imẓlaḍ, a-ur-yissan-ufus-nnk aẓlmaḍ ma-iskr-ufasi.
akka ġ-tntla, tili-ak lbaraka dar babak lli-itmnadn kullu ma-intln.
«iġ-ra-tẓẓallm a-ur-tgm zund ayt-sin-uwdmawn lli-dar-iɛzza ad-tbddadn ar-tẓallan ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ula ġ-gr-tswak baš a-tn-ẓrn mddn. lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, mayan ka-rad-asn-yili.
imma kiyi ġakud nna-trit a-tẓẓallt, kšm s-tḥanut-nnk tqqnt tiflut tẓẓallt i-babak lli-intln, ra-k-ibark babak lli-iẓrran ma-intln.
ġakud nna-ttẓallam a-ur-tssigatm iwaliwn h̬wanin ġmklli skarn ġwilli tẓallanin i-ilahat yaḍni, ġaln izd s-tuggt n-iwaliwn a-s-rad-asn-sfldn.
a-ur-tgm zund ntni, ašku babatun issn ma-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣan ur-ta-yas-ti-tḍalbm.
«imma kunni tẓallayat ġmkad: ‹wa-babatnnġ lli-illan ġ-ignna, a-yili luqr i-ism-nnk,
tašk-id-tgldit-nnk, yili ma-k-irḍan ġ-ddunit ġmklli illa ġ-ignna.
fk-aġ-d ġassad aġrum i-wass-ad,
tṣamḥt-aġ f-lh̬ʷšant lli-nskr, ġmklli nṣamḥ i-willi ginnġ skrnin ma-yʷh̬šnn.
ssanf-aġ i-ma-rad-aġ-ijllu, tjjnjmt-aġ zġ-iblis.›
«iġ-a-ttṣamaḥm i-mddn f-ddnub lli-gigun-skarn, rad-awn-iṣamḥ babatun n-ignna.
walaynni iġ-ur-a-ttṣamaḥm i-wiyyaḍ f-ddnub lli-gigun-skarn, ur-rad-awn-iṣamḥ babatun f-ddnub-nnun.
«iġ-a-ttaẓumm a-ur-tskarm zund ayt-sin-uwdmawn lli-kkrsnin ignzi-nsn baš ad-ssbayynn i-mddn is-aẓumn. lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, mayan ka-rad-asn-yili.
imma kiyi ġakud nna-ttaẓumt sird udm-nnk tsrft azzar-nnk
a-ur-yissan yan is-taẓumt abla babak lli-intln. ra-k-ibark babak lli-itmnadn kullu ma-intln.
«a-ur-tssmunum ayda ġ-ddunit-ad illiġ ra-ti-tšš-twukka tġwi-t tanigt ġzn-in srs imh̬h̬arn a-t-akʷrn.
walaynni ssmunwat-n ayda ġ-ignna illiġ ur-ra-ti-tšš-twukka ula tġwi-t tanigt ula ġzan srs imh̬h̬arn a-t-akʷrn.
ašku innaġ illa-wayda-nnk a-ġ-ra-yili-uwl-nnk.
«tiṭ n-bnadm a-igan lqndil n-ddat-ns. iġ-tsfaw tiṭ, ra-tili ddat kullutt ġ-tifawt.
iġ-ur-tsfaw tiṭ, ra-tili ddat kullutt ġ-tillas. walaynni iġ-th̬si tifawt lli-gik-illan, mnšk a-s-rad-igatnt tillas-nnk.
«ur-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-iqasa sin id-sidis. imma ra-ikrhu yan yiri wayyaḍ, nġd ra-ituqqar yan iḥgr wayyaḍ. ur-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tgm ismgan n-rbbi d-win-wayda.
«rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-tasim taġuft i-tudrt-nnun f-ma-ra-tššm ula ma-ra-tsum, ula i-ddat-nnun f-ma-rad-as-tlsm. is-ur-tuf tudrt amššu? is-ur-tuf ddat timlsit?
ẓrat igḍaḍ n-ignwan, ur-a-kkrzn ula-da-mggrn ula-da-ssmunun ṣṣabt ġ-iḥuna, walaynni babatun n-ignna ar-asn-yakka amššu lli-ḥtajjan. imma kunni is-ur-dars-tɛzzam uggʷar n-igḍaḍ?
ma-iẓḍarn a-izayd tasaɛt i-tudrt-ns s-taġuft lli-yusi?
mah̬ aylliġ a-ttasim taġuft f-malssa? ẓrat ijddign n-tagant mamnk a-di-tmġayn. ur-a-kkatn tammara ula-da-ẓṭṭan,
walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, suliman s-lhibt n-tgldit-ns ur-jju-ilsi zund yan zġ-ijddign-ad.
ar-isslsa rbbi tuga n-tagant lli-itmġayn ġassad ttyawgar-n azkka ġ-takat. is-ur-ra-kʷn-issls ula kunni s-uggʷar? is-ur-tuminm s-rbbi?
a-ur-tasim taġuft ula-da-ttinim ‹ma-ra-nšš?› ula ‹ma-ra-nsu?› ula ‹ma-ra-nls?›
han ġwilli ur-ssinnin rbbi, tiġawsiwin-an a-s-lhan. imma kunni, babatun n-ignna issn is-tnti-tḥtajjam kullutnt.
lhwat zwar s-tgldit n-rbbi ula s-ma-t-irḍan s-awn-izuyd kullu tiġawsiwin-an yaḍni.
a-ur-ttasim taġuft i-uzkka, ašku azkka iẓḍar i-taġuft-ns. tqadda-tmmara n-ġassad bla-di-tzuydm tin-uzkka.
«a-ur-tinim f-yan is-yʷh̬šn, a-ur-fllawn-yini rbbi is-tʷh̬šnm.
ašku ġaylli ttinim f-wiyyaḍ a-ra-fllawn-ityawnna, ula lɛbrt lli-s-a-ttɛbbarm i-wiyyaḍ a-s-rad-awn-ityawɛbbar.
mah̬ a-n-ttmnadt arftus imẓẓin lli-n-illan ġ-tiṭ n-gʷmak, ur-tt-akkʷ-tiwit ġ-tggjdit lli-illan ġ-tiṭ-nnk?
mamnk a-trit a-tinit i-gʷmak ‹adj-iyi ad-ak-d-ssittiġ arftus-an a-k-illan ġ-tiṭ,› imma kiyi tlla-yak-tggjdit ġ-tiṭ?
wa-bu-sin-uwdmawn, ssitti zwar taggjdit zġ-tiṭ-nnk, baš a-tẓrt mamnk a-di-tssittit arftus zġ-tiṭ n-gʷmak.
«a-ur-takkam i-iḍan ma-igan win rbbi, a-ur-nkrn akʷin-d fllawn. a-ur-ttluḥm ljuhr-nnun ġ-lgddam n-walfan, a-ur-t-aḍḍrn s-iḍarn-nsn.
«ḍalbat rbbi rad-awn-ifk, sigglat dars ra-tafm, ssḍuqqrat-n srs rad-awn-irẓm.
ašku kullu wanna-t-iḍalbn rad-as-ifk, d-wanna dars isiggiln ra-dars-yaf, d-wanna-n-issḍuqqurn rad-as-irẓm.
is-gigun-illa ma-mi-iḍalb yus aġrum ifk-as aẓru?
nġd iḍalb-as aslm ifk-as algmmaḍ?
ẓrat kunni, wah̬h̬a da-tskarm ma-yʷh̬šnn tissanm a-tfkm timih̬ar fulkinin i-tarwa-nnun. uggʷar n-mayan a-ra-yakka babatun n-ignna ma-ifulkin i-willi-ti-tḍalabnin.
skarat d-kullu mddn ġmknna tram a-t-didun-skarn. awal-ad a-issmunn kullu ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ ula lanbiya.
«kšmat ġ-imi inukman. han yusɛa imi yaḍni lli-itawin s-lhalak, irh̬u-uġaras-ns, iggut ma-gis-ikššmn.
walaynni inukma imi lli-itawin s-tudrt, išqu-uġaras-ns, idrus ma-t-itafan.
«rarat lɛaql ašku rad-d-darun-aškin kra n-mddn ar-ttinin is-gan lanbiya walaynni ar-sskirkisn. uššann ad-gan, lsn-d srun timlsit n-uwlli baš a-kʷn-ġwin.
imma ntni zġ-lġllt-nsn a-zġ-ra-tn-ttissanm, ašku ur-a-yakka-uzggʷar aḍil, ula-da-takka-tskra ikuzarn.
tasġart ifulkin ar-tskar lġllt ifulkin. tasġart yʷh̬šnn ar-tskar lġllt yʷh̬šnn.
ur-tẓḍar-tsġart ifulkin a-tfk lġllt yʷh̬šnn, ula tẓḍar-tsġart yʷh̬šnn a-tfk lġllt ifulkin.
walaynni kraygatt tasġart nna-ur-yakkan lġllt ifulkin, ra-stt-ibbi-ufllaḥ iluḥ-tt-in ġ-lɛafit.
ġmkan a-rad-gn ula ntni, zġ-lġllt-nsn a-zġ-ra-tn-ttissanm.
«han urd kullu wanna-yyi-ittinin ‹wa-sidi, wa-sidi› a-ra-ikšm s-tgldit n-ignna. ur-ra-srs-ikšm abla ġwilli skarnin ma-ittiri baba lli-illan ġ-ignna.
iggut ma-rad-iyi-yini ġ-wass l-lḥsab ‹wa-sidi wa-sidi, ha-yaġ s-ism-nnk a-s-nsawl s-iwaliwn n-rbbi. s-ism-nnk a-s-nssufġ ljnun. s-ism-nnk a-s-nskr kigan d-lmɛjizat.›
ġakudan rad-asn-iniġ ‹ur-akkʷ-kʷn-ssinġ. ittiyat-n zġ-gigi kunni lli-iskarn lh̬ʷšant.›
«kullu wanna isfldn i-iwaliwn-ad-inu ar-srsn-iskar, irwas argaz iṭṭafn lɛaql, ibna tigmmi-ns f-isli.
ar-iṣwaḍ-waḍu ar-iṭṭar-unẓar ingi-d-wasif ar-kkatn tigmmi, walaynni ur-tt-ssḍirn ašku izga llsas-ns f-isli.
imma kullu wanna isfldn i-iwaliwn-ad-inu ur-a-srsn-iskar, irwas argaz inufln, ibna tigmmi-ns f-umlal.
iṣuḍ-waḍu iḍr-unẓar ingi-d-wasif utn tigmmi tḍr-d, th̬lu kullutt.»
lliġ ikmml yasuɛ iwaliwn-ad, ar-bahra-tɛjjabn mddn ġ-ulmmud-ns,
ašku ar-srsn-isawal ġmklli dars lḥqq ad-asn-ittini ma-tn-d-iqqann a-t-skarn. ur-igi ntta zund imslmdn-nsn n-ššrɛ.
lliġ-d-igguz yasuɛ zġ-uwrir, ḍfurn-t mddn ggutnin.
yašk-id dars yan-unjdam iḍr-d ġ-lgddam-ns yini-as: «wa-sidi, tẓḍart a-yyi-tssġust iġ-trit.»
iggr-as yasuɛ s-ufus-ns yini-as: «riġ nkki. ġus.» yitti zġ-gis ljdam ġakudan iġus.
izayd yasuɛ yini-as: «ad-ur-tinit yat i-yan, walaynni ddu tmlt ih̬f-nnk i-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi, tfkt-as tiġrsi lli-f-yuṣṣa musa a-tg tugga i-mddn.»
ikšm yasuɛ s-tmdint n-kafrnaḥum. yašk-id dars yal-lqbṭan n-iɛskrin n-rruman, iḍalb-t bahra
yini-as: «wa-sidi, ikušm-uh̬ddam-inu, ign ġ-tgmmi ityawmrrat bahra.»
yini-as yasuɛ: «ra-n-aškġ jjujjiġ-t.»
imma lqbṭan isawl-d yini-as: «wa-sidi, ur-sthllaġ a-tkšmt s-tgmmi-nu, walaynni ini ġir yan-wawal s-ijji-uh̬ddam-inu.
ha-yyi ula nkki ar-skarġ s-wawal n-ma-yyi-yugʷrn, ilin iɛskrin ġ-ddu-ufus-inu. iġ-nniġ i-yan ‹ddu› iddu. iġ-nniġ i-wayyaḍ ‹ašk-id› yašk-id. iġ-nniġ i-uh̬ddam-inu ‹skr tawuri-ad› iskr-tt.»
lliġ isfld yasuɛ i-mayad itɛjjb, yini i-willi dids munnin: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ur-jju-ufiġ kra n-yan yumnn zund ġwad, ula ġ-gr ayt-rbbi.
rad-awn-iniġ, ggutn ibrraniyn lli-ra-d-yašk zġ-ššrq ula lġrb munn-d d-ibrahim d-isḥaq d-yaɛqub f-imnsi imqqurn n-tgldit n-ignna.
imma ġwilli-f-iqṣad rbbi ġayd izrin ad-gn ayt-tgldit-ns, ra-tn-iluḥ ġ-tillas aggugnin. ġin a-ġ-rad-allan ar-tgẓaẓn uh̬san-nsn.»
yini ilmma yasuɛ i-lqbṭan: «zayd s-tgmmi. rad-ak-yili ġmklli tumnt.» ġakudan a-ijji-uh̬ddam-ns.
iftu yasuɛ s-tgmmi n-bṭrus, yaf-n taḍggʷalt n-bṭrus tgn, tuḍn s-tawla.
iggr-as i-ufus, titti zgis tawla, tnkr ar-fllas-ttsh̬h̬ar.
lliġ-di-truḥ-tdggʷat awin-d i-yasuɛ mddn ggutnin lli-ġ-llan ljnun. ar-zgisn-issufuġ ljnun s-yan-wawal, ijjujji kullu willi uḍnnin.
ġmkan a-s-yuwfa-wawal n-nnabi išaɛya inna «nttan a-issittin timuḍan-nnġ, yasi aṭṭan-nnġ.»
iẓr yasuɛ mddn ggutnin munn-d fllas, yini i-imḥḍarn-ns f-ad-skrn ad-dids-ssudun s-tsga yaḍni n-umda,
s-d-dars-yuška yan-umslmd n-ššrɛ yini-as: «way-amslmd, rad-didk-munġ s-innas ra-tddut.»
irar-as yasuɛ yini-as: «ibuġaġ darsn tansiwin-nsn, ula igḍaḍ n-ignwan darsn usudn-nsn, imma yus n-bnadm ur-dars maniġ a-isras agayyu-ns.»
isawl-d ilmma yan yaḍni zġ-gr willi dids itmunun yini-as: «wa-sidi, adj-iyi zwar ad-wrriġ ard-n-mḍlġ baba.»
imma yasuɛ inna-yas: «ašk-id mun didi. fl ġwilli ur-ṭṭafnin tudrt a-n-mḍln winna-yasn-mmutnin.»
ikšm yasuɛ s-tanawt, ssudun dids imḥḍarn-ns.
ġakudan inkr-d-waḍu itjhhdn, attuynt taḍangiwin ar-kkatnt tanawt aylliġ a-ttɛmmar s-waman. imma yasuɛ ign.
ddun imḥḍarn ssfaqn-t inin-as: «jjnjm-aġ a-sidi. ha-yaġ ra-nhlk.»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «mah̬ aylliġ tksuḍm? is-ur-tuminm?» inkr yamr aḍu ula taḍangiwin ad-zgan, s-iwrri-umda ihnna bahra.
iḍr-asn lɛjb ar-ttinin: «ma-iga-urgaz-ad aylliġ a-srs-isflid-waḍu ula amda?»
lliġ ilkm yasuɛ tamazirt n-gadara ġ-tsga yaḍni n-umda, ffuġn-d dars sin irgazn zġ-gr ismḍal. llan gisn ljnun, šqun bahra. ur-iẓḍar yan a-ik aġaras-an.
ġuwwtn s-jjhd inin-as-d: «wa-yus n-rbbi, ma-illan ġ-gratnnġ didk? is-di-tuškit ad-aġ-tssrfufnt ur-ta-d-ilkim-uzmz?»
ttyawksa ġin yat-tuwrut iggutn n-walfan, ur-n-bahra-taggug.
ḍalbn-t ljnun bahra inin-as: «iġ-aġ-tssufġt, taznt-aġ a-nkšm s-walfan-an.»
irar-asn: «zaydat.» ffuġn zġ-irgazn, kšmn s-walfan. tazzl-tuwrut ġakudan s-jjhd zġ-ujarif s-umda, h̬sin-in kullu ġ-waman.
rwln imksawn, wrrin s-tmdint, awin lh̬bar f-kullu mayan ula f-ma-ijran i-imjnan.
aškin-d kullu ayt-tmdint ad-ẓrn yasuɛ. lliġ-t-in-mnaggarn ḍalbn-t bahra a-iffuġ tamazirt-nsn.
ikšm yasuɛ s-tanawt iwrri-d s-tsga-yad n-umda, iruḥ-d tamdint lli-ġ-izdġ.
aškin-d dars kra n-mddn awin-as-d yan-urgaz ikušmn ign f-imjdin-ns. yasuɛ iẓra mamnk ad-bahra-srs-umnn, isawl s-ukušam yini-as: «thnna a-iwi, ittin fllak ddnub-nnk.»
ilin ġin kra n-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, inin d-ih̬f-nsn: «ġwad, awal l-lkufr ayd inna.»
imma yasuɛ issn mad-swangmn, yini-asn: «mah̬ aylliġ tudjam iswingimn ʷh̬šnnin ad-kšmn s-ih̬fawn-nnun?
ma-gisn-irh̬an, ad-iniġ ‹ittin fllak ddnub-nnk› nġd ad-iniġ ‹nkr ar-ttidut›?
imma ġilad rad-awn-mlġ is-dari taẓḍḍart ġ-ddunit ad-ssittiġ ddnub, nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm.» isawl ilmma s-ukušam yini-as: «nkr, tasit imjdin-nnk, tddut s-tgmmi.»
inkr ġakudan iddu s-tgmmi-ns.
lliġ-t-ẓran, ġuwḍn mddn-an kullutn ar-talġn rbbi lli-ifkan taẓḍḍart-ad iggutn i-bnadm.
iftu yasuɛ zġ-ġin, s-iẓra yan bu-nkkas ism-ns matta, iskiws ġ-illiġ a-tamẓn iqaridn n-nkkas. yini-as yasuɛ: «ašk-id mun didi.» inkr ġakudan imun dids.
igawr yasuɛ ġ-tgmmi n-matta, aškin-d id-bu-nkkas ggutnin d-wiyyaḍ ʷh̬šnnin, drun d-yasuɛ d-imḥḍarn-ns.
lliġ-t-ẓran ifarisin, sqsan imḥḍarn-ns: «mah̬ aylliġ a-ištta-umslmd-nnun d-ayt-nkkas d-wiyyaḍ ʷh̬šnnin?»
imma yasuɛ, lliġ isfld i-mad-nnan irar-asn: «urd ġwilli dusnin a-iḥtajjan aṭbib walaynni ġwilli uḍnnin.
zaydat tswangmm ġ-warra n-rbbi lli-innan ‹riġ darun lḥnant, urd tiġrsi.› imma nkki, ur-d-uškiġ a-n-ġrġ i-willi ġalnin is-fulkin, walaynni uškiġ-d a-n-ġrġ i-willi ʷh̬šnnin.»
aškin-d imḥḍarn n-yuḥanna amsddam s-dar yasuɛ inin-as: «ar-ntaẓum nkkʷni d-ifarisin. mah̬ aylliġ ur-a-taẓumn imḥḍarn-nnk?»
yini-asn: «is-ra-ṭiyyr i-ayt-tmġra d-usli didsn? walaynni rad-d-aškin-uwssan lli-ġ-ra-fllasn-yitti-usli. ġakudan a-rad-taẓumn.
ur-illi ma-itggan tadġart n-ttub l-ljdid i-tmlsit taqdimt, ašku ra-tkkis-tdġart l-ljdid zġ-tqdimt, tbbi s-uggʷar.

ur-illi ma-itggan aman n-waḍil iktin l-ljdid ġ-ilmawn iqdimn, ašku rad-stġn ilmawn iqdimn, ffin-waman h̬srn ilmawn. walaynni ar-tggan aman n-waḍil l-ljdid ġ-ilmawn l-ljdid. ġmkan a-s-rad-qaman fulkin s-sin.»
sul a-isawal yasuɛ s-d-yuška yan-umġar, iḍr-d ġ-dar iḍarn-ns yini-as: «tasaɛt-ad tmmut illi imẓẓin. walaynni ašk-id tgt fllas afus-nnk tddr.»
inkr yasuɛ imun dids ntta d-imḥḍarn-ns.
tlla ġin yat-tmġart tuḍn, yili-bdda-gis-usggʷrd n-idammn sin d-mraw n-usggʷas. truḥ-d tiġurdin n-yasuɛ tggr i-tama n-tmlsit-ns,
tini d-ih̬f-ns: «iġ-n-ggrġ ġir i-tmlsit-ns rad-jjiġ.»
igrawl yasuɛ issmaqql gis yini-as: «thnna a-illi, tjjit ġilad ašku tumnt.» ġakudan a-tjji-tmġart.
lliġ ilkm yasuɛ tigmmi n-umġar yaf-n ġwilli kkatnin taɛuwwatt d-mddn ggutnin ar-ssġuyyun.
yini-asn: «ittiyat. han tafruh̬t ur-tmmut. ġir tgn.» imma ntni ar-gis-ḍṣṣan.
lliġ ssufġn mddn-an kullutn, ikšm yasuɛ s-dar-tfruh̬t. yamẓ-as ġ-ufus, tnkr-d.
awin ilmma lh̬bar-ns s-tmazirt-an kullutt.
iftu yasuɛ zġ-ġin, ḍfurn-t sin ibukaḍn ar-tġuwwatn ar-ttinin: «ḥnnu ginnġ a-yus n-dawd.»
lliġ ikšm yasuɛ s-yat-tgmmi ruḥn-t-id ibukaḍn-lli. isqsa-tn: «is-tumnm is-ẓḍarġ ad-skrġ mayad?» inin-as: «numn a-sidi.»
iggr i-walln-nsn yini-asn: «ad-awn-yili ma-s-tumnm.»
wrrin sfawn ġakudan. yuṣṣa-tn ilmma s-lmɛqul yini-asn: «rarat lɛaql, a-ur-tinim i-yan f-mayad.»
imma ntni ddan ar-sawaln f-yasuɛ ġ-tmazirt-an kullutt.
ġir ddan ntni s-d-uškan kra n-mddn yaḍni, awin-as-d yan-urgaz aẓnẓum, yili gis yal-ljnn.
lliġ-zgis-iffuġ ljnn iwrri-uẓnẓum ar-isawal. ar-tɛjjabn mddn kullutn ar-ttinin: «ur-jju-illi zund mayad ġ-dar ayt-rbbi.»
imma ifarisin ar-ttinin: «nttan s-tḥkimt n-ugllid l-ljnun a-s-a-issufuġ ljnun.»
ar-itkka yasuɛ kullu timdinin ula iduran, ar-isslmad ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ar-itbrraḥ s-lh̬bar ifulkin n-tgldit n-ignna, ar-ijjujji mddn zġ-kraygatt tamaḍunt ula kraygatt aṭṭan nna-gisn-illan.
lliġ imnad ġ-mddn-an ggutnin, qaman gis bahra, ašku iẓra tammara d-taġuft lli-ġ-llan zund ulli bla amksa.
yini ilmma i-imḥḍarn-ns: «tggut-tmgra walaynni drusn ih̬ddamn.
ḍalbat bu-tmgra a-yazn ih̬ddamn ad-ssmunn tamgra-ns.»
iġr-d yasuɛ i-imḥḍarn-ns s-sin d-mraw s-dars, ifk-asn taẓḍḍart ad-ssufuġn ljnun ʷh̬šnnin ar-jjujjin kraygatt tamaḍunt ula aṭṭan.
ġmkad ad-gan ismawn n-irqqasn s-sin d-mraw: amzwaru simɛan lli-mi-ttinin bṭrus, ntta d-gʷmas andraws, d-yaɛqub yus n-zabdi, ntta d-gʷmas yuḥanna,
d-filibbus, d-bartulamaws, d-tuma, d-matta lli-sttin-ikkan iga bu-nkkas, d-yaɛqub yus n-ḥalfa, d-taddaws,
d-simɛan awaṭani, ntni d-yahuda ish̬aryuṭ lli-ra-izznz yasuɛ tigira.
ġakudan a-yuzn yasuɛ irqqasn-ns s-sin d-mraw yuṣṣa-tn: «a-ur-tddum s-tmizar yaḍni ula tkšmm s-tmdinin n-samira.
walaynni ddwat dar-uwlli n-tuwrut ijlan lli-igan ayt-rbbi,
ar-ttbrraḥm ġ-uġaras ar-ttinim ‹takmur-d-tgldit n-ignna.›
jjujjiyat imuḍan-nsn, ar-tssnkarm ġwilli mmutnin, ar-tssġusm injdamn, ar-tssufuġm ljnun. akkayat bla-da-ttamẓm yat, ašku tumẓm bla tfkam yat.
a-ur-tawim urġ ula nnuqrt ula anas ġ-ubkkas-nnun.
a-ur-tasim aqʷrab i-uġaras nġd sin iqšban nġd turẓiyin nġd aɛmud, ašku ah̬ddam isthlla amššu-ns.
tamdint nna-tlkmm nġd aduwwar, sigglat gis s-manwa gis isthllan, tgawrm dars ar akud nna-ra-tmuddum zġ-ġin.
tigmmi nna-s-tkšmm iniyat-asn ‹ad-awn-tili sslamt.›
iġ-tt-sthllan ayt-tgmmi-an rad-asn-tili sslamt lli-s-tnnam. iġ-ur-tt-sthllan ur-ra-n-ġin-tqama sslamt-nnun.
walaynni innaġ-kʷn-ur-rin mddn ula sfldn s-wawal-nnun, ffuġat zġ-tgmmi-an ula tamdint-an tssusm agdrur n-iḍarn-nnun.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ra-išqu ġ-wass l-lḥsab f-ayt-tmdint-an uggʷar n-ayt-sadum ula ayt-ɛamura.
«uznġ-kʷn ġilad zund ilqqaġn ġ-gr-uwššann. rarat lɛaql zund algmmaḍ, tzrim s-sslamt zund atbir.
rarat lɛaql-nnun zġ-bnadm, ašku ra-kʷn-in-dḥayn s-lmḥkamat, ssġuršn-kʷn ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit,
jurrn-kʷn s-lgddam l-lḥukkam d-igldan f-ssibt-inu, baš a-flla-takkam tugga i-mddn-an ula i-ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
iġ-kʷn-dḥin s-lmḥkama, ad-ur-tasim taġuft f-ma-ra-tinim ula ma-f-ra-tsawlm, ašku rbbi a-rad-awn-iml ġ-tasaɛt-an ma-ra-tinim.
urd kunni a-ra-isawal walaynni ra-d-zgigun-isawal rruḥ n-rbbi babatun.
ra-yili ma-ra-n-idḥi gʷmas i-lmut, yili ma-ra-n-idḥi yus, nkrn-d tarwa f-ayt-darsn nġn-tn.
ra-kʷn-tkrhun kullu mddn f-ssibt n-ma-tgam winu, walaynni wanna ibiddn izga ar isiggʷra ra-injm.
iġ-kʷn-ssrfufnn ġ-yat-tmdint, rwlat s-tayyaḍ. lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ur-ta-ra-tkmmlm tabrraḥt ġ-tmdinin n-ayt-rbbi ard-d-wrriġ nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm.
«amḥḍar ur-yugʷr amslmd-ns. ah̬ddam ur-yugʷr sidis.
ra-iqnɛu-umḥḍar iġ-irwas amslmd-ns, iqnɛu-uh̬ddam iġ-irwas sidis. walaynni iġ-a-ttinin mddn f-bu-tgmmi ‹bɛl-zabul› (šiṭan), ur-rad-ḥšmn a-t-inin f-ayt-tgmmi-ns.
«a-ur-zgisn-tiksaḍm, ašku kullu ma-irgsn ra-d-iban, d-kullu ma-intln ra-ityawssan.
aynna-yawn-nniġ ġ-griyi didun, iniyat-t i-kullu mddn. aynna mi tsfldm ġ-tntla, brrḥat srs f-iggi n-tgʷmma.
a-ur-tiksaḍm zġ-willi nqqanin ddat, ašku ur-ẓḍarn ad-hlkn rruḥ. walaynni iksaḍat zġ-ġwalli iẓḍarn a-ihlk rruḥ ula ddat ġ-jhnnama.
is-ur-a-nzzan sin-waÿÿawÿn s-yat-tqaritt? walaynni ur-ra-gisn-iḍr yan s-wakal iġ-ur-t-yudji rbbi babatun.
imma kunni, zġ-inẓaḍn n-ih̬f-nnun iḥasb-tn babatun.
a-ur-tiksaḍm, ašku tɛzzam dars uggʷar n-waÿÿawÿn ggutnin.
«wanna ittinin is-iga winu ġ-gr mddn, ula nkki ra-ttiniġ iga winu ġ-dar baba rbbi ġ-ignna.
imma wanna ittinin ur-igi winu ġ-gr mddn, ra-ttiniġ ula nkki ur-igi winu ġ-dar baba rbbi ġ-ignna.
«a-ur-tġalm is-d-uškiġ ad-skrġ lhna ġ-ddunit. urd lhna a-rad-skrġ walaynni tibḍit.
uškiġ-d ad-bḍuġ afruh̬ d-babas, bḍuġ tafruh̬t d-innas, bḍuġ tamġart d-tḍggʷalt-ns.
han ayt-tgmmi-nnun a-ra-ig inuwwašn-nnun.
wanna ittirin babas nġd innas uggʷar-inu ur-isthlla a-ig winu. wanna ittirin iwis nġd illis uggʷar-inu ur-isthlla a-ig winu.
wanna ur-yusin aggjdi-ns imun didi, ur-isthlla a-ig winu.
wanna iġwin ġ-tudrt-ns ra-stt-ijlu. imma wanna ijlan tudrt-ns f-ssibt-inu ra-stt-yaf.
«wanna-kʷn-iqbln, iqbl-iyi. d-wanna-yyi-iqbln, iqbl ġwalli-yyi-d-yuznn.
wanna issbrrkn s-kra n-nnabi f-ssibt n-ma-iga nnabi, lbaraka n-nnabi a-rad-as-yili. d-wanna issbrrkn s-yan irḍan rbbi f-ssibt n-ma-irḍa rbbi, lbaraka n-yan irḍan rbbi a-rad-as-yili.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, wanna ifkan i-yan ġ-imẓẓiyn-ad a-isu f-ssibt n-ma-iga amḥḍar-inu, wah̬h̬a-yas-ifka ġir yal-lkas n-waman smmiḍnin, rad-as-tili lbaraka-ns.»
lliġ ikmml yasuɛ iwaliwn-an lli-s-yuṣṣa imḥḍarn-ns s-sin d-mraw, iddu ar-itbrraḥ ar-isslmad ġ-tmdinin n-tmazirt-an.
imma yuḥanna amsddam illa ġ-lḥbs. lliġ isfld f-ma-iskar lmasiḥ, yazn kra n-imḥḍarn-ns a-t-sqsan:
«izd kiyin a-igan ġwalli ra-d-yašk, nġd a-sul-ntql s-yan yaḍni?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «zaydat tinim i-yuḥanna f-ma-mi-tsfldm ula ma-tẓram.
ha-ibukaḍn ar-ttisfiwn, ikušamn ar-fttun, injdamn ar-tġusn, iḍrḍar ar-sflidn, ġwilli mmutnin ar-d-nkkrn ula imẓlaḍ ar-tn-ilkkm lh̬bar ifulkin.
ambarki a-iga wanna ur-gigi-yufin ma-f-a-yas-ṭiyyar.»
lliġ ftan ntni, isawl yasuɛ f-yuḥanna i-mddn ggutnin lli-d-fllas-munnin. isqsa-tn: «ġakud lliġ a-ttidum s-lh̬la ma-tram a-tẓrm? izd kra n-taẓẓmayt ar-tt-issmussu-waḍu?
ma-s-a-ttidum? izd a-tẓrm kra n-urgaz ilsan ibrdan šwanin? han ġwilli dar ibrdan šwanin, ġ-tgʷmma n-igldan a-ġ-llan.
walaynni ma-s-a-ttidum? is-urd yan-nnabi a-ttirim a-ti-tẓrm? rad-awn-iniġ, iga yan imqqurn ġ-lanbiya.
ašku yuḥanna a-f-ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi ‹hati rad-aznġ arqqas-inu ad-ak-izwur, ijjujad-ak aġaras-nnk.›
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ur-illi ġ-tarwa n-tmġarin yan yugʷrn yuḥanna amsddam. imma wad kullu imẓẓin ġ-tgldit n-ignna, yugʷr yuḥanna.
«zġ-uwssan n-yuḥanna amsddam sul s-ġassad mmaġn mddn ad-kšmn s-tgldit n-ignna, ar-ttirin ayt-imiġ a-stt-ġwin s-jjhd.
kkan-ttin lanbiya ula ššrɛ n-musa ar-kullu-malan awal n-rbbi i-mddn aylliġ-d-yuška yuḥanna.
walaynni iġ-tram a-tamnm awal-nsn, tissanm izd yuḥanna a-igan ‹nnabi iliyya› lli-s-nnan ra-d-yašk.
wanna dar imzgan a-srsn-isflid, illa fllas a-isfld.
«walaynni ma-s-rad-awn-ssrwasġ tasut-ad? trwas tarwa lli-skiwsnin ġ-ssuq ar-n-aqran i-imddukkʷal-nsn ar-ttinin
‹nut-awn taɛuwwatt ur-a-ttḥušm, nasi-awn amarg ur-a-tallam.›
yuška-d yuḥanna ur-a-ištta ula-da-issa, ar-fllas-ttinin ‹illa gis yal-ljnn.›

aškġ-d nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm ar-šttaġ ar-ssaġ, ar-flla-ttinin ‹ġwad iga bu-udis ig askayri, ig amddakkʷl n-ayt-nkkas d-wiyyaḍ ʷh̬šnnin.› walaynni taḥkimt n-rbbi, kullu willi srs skarnin ar-tt-in-tafan tʷġẓan.»
ġakudan ar-itẓi yasuɛ ayt-tmdinin lli-ġ-iskr kigan d-lmɛjizat-ns, ašku ur-rin ad-fln kullu mad-skarn yʷh̬šn.

yini-asn: «taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili ay-ayt-kurazin. taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili ay-ayt-bitṣayda. han lmɛjizat lli-skrġ ġ-darun, mrad is-tnt-skrġ ġ-tmdinin n-ṣur d-ṣayda, ikun lsan lh̬iš ġakudan, gn iġd f-ih̬fawn-nsn, fln kullu mad-skarn yʷh̬šn.
rad-awn-iniġ, ra-fllawn-išqu-wass l-lḥsab uggʷar n-ayt-ṣur d-ayt-ṣayda.
imma kunni ay-ayt-kafrnaḥum, is-tram a-tlkm ignwan? han ra-kʷn-in-iluḥ rbbi ġ-tdrut n-wakal. han lmɛjizat lli-skrġ ġ-darun, mrad is-tnt-skrġ ġ-tmdint n-sadum, ikun tqama sul s-ġassad.
rad-awn-iniġ, ra-fllawn-išqu-wass l-lḥsab uggʷar n-ayt-sadum.»
iẓẓall yasuɛ ġ-tasaɛt-an yini: «wa-baba, sidis n-ignna d-wakal, ulġġ-k ašku tssntlt tiġawsiwin-ad f-ayt-lɛaql d-lfhmt tssmlt-tnt i-ibujadiyn.
ašku ġmkad a-s-trḍit a-baba.»
yini ilmma: «ġ-ddu-ufus-inu a-ġ-iga baba kullu ma-illan. ur-illi ma-issnn yus n-rbbi abla babas, ula illa ma-issnn baba abla nkki lli-igan yus d-willi qṣadġ ad-asn-t-mlġ.
aškad-d sri, a-kullu willi kkatnin tammara asin taẓayt išqan, ssunfuġ-awn.
gat-n fllawn iḥlasn-inu ar-zgigi-ttlmadm, ašku ihnna-uwl-inu iɛmmr s-ṣṣbr, tafm gigi asunfu i-ih̬f-nnun.
hati rh̬an iḥlasn-inu, ifssus-usitti lli-rad-flawn-srsġ.»
yan-wass ġ-uwssan-an, iga ass n-usunfu, ifta yasuɛ ġ-igran ġ-gr imndi. inġ laẓ imḥḍarn-ns, bdun ar-tkkisn tizlfin ar-šttan.
ẓrn-tn kra n-ifarisin inin-as-d: «ẓr imḥḍarn-nnk, ar-skarn ġ-wass n-usunfu ġaylli ur-gis-iḥllan.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «is-ur-tġrim f-dawd ma-iskr lliġ-t-bahra-inġa laẓ, ntta d-willi dids munnin?
ikšm s-tgmmi n-rbbi išš aġrum lli-ityawfkan i-rbbi, ur-iḥlla a-t-išš ntta ula asmun-ns. ġir inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi a-mi-iḥlla.
is-ur-tġrim ġ-ššrɛ n-musa f-mamnk a-th̬damn inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi ġ-wass n-usunfu? walaynni ur-tn-iẓi rbbi f-mayan.
imma ġilad rad-awn-iniġ, illa ġid ma-yugʷrn tigmmi n-rbbi.
ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi ‹riġ darun lḥnant, urd tiġrsi.› mrad is-tssnm lmɛna n-wawal-an, ikun ur-tḥkamm f-ġwid ur-skirnin kra yʷh̬šnn.
imma nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, giġ sidis n-wass n-usunfu.»
iftu yasuɛ ikšm s-tgmmi n-tẓallit.
illa ġin yan-urgaz immut-as-ufus. ilin ula kra n-mddn ran ad-afn ġ-yasuɛ ma-s-a-yas-ṣraḍn. sqsan-t: «is-iḥlla a-tjjujjit ġ-wass n-usunfu?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «is-gigun-illa ma-iṭṭafn alqqaġ iḍr-as-n ġ-ugḍi ġ-wass n-usunfu ifl-t ġin? is-ur-ra-t-id-iġwi yasi-t-id?
walaynni iɛzza bnadm dar rbbi uggʷar n-ulqqaġ. hati iḥlla a-nskar afulki ġ-wass n-usunfu.»
isawl ilmma s-urgaz-lli yini-as: «mdi-d afus-nnk.» imdi-as-t-id s-ijji idus zund wayyaḍ.
ffuġn ifarisin ġakudan, ar-tmšawarn i-ngratsn f-mamnk a-rad-nġn yasuɛ.
issn yasuɛ mad-qṣadn, iftu zġ-ġin. ḍfurn-t mddn ggutnin, ijjujji kullu ma-ġ-llant-tmuḍan,
yini-asn a-ur-fllas-sawaln.
ġmkad a-s-yuwfa ma-inna rbbi ġayd izrin f-imi n-nnabi išaɛya inna:
«hay-ah̬ddam-inu lli-ẓliġ. nttan a-dari-iɛzzan, frḥġ srs bahra. ra-t-ɛmmrġ s-rruḥ-inu, ar-itbrraḥ i-kullu ayt-tmizar s-lḥqq lli-rad-asn-yili.
ur-ra-itjaḥad ula-da-itġuwwat. ur-ra-itall awal-ns ġ-tswak.
taẓẓmayt nna-ibrin, ur-ra-stt-ibbi. ula tiftilt nna-iskarn aggu, ur-ra-stt-issh̬si, ard izzga lḥqq ġ-kraygatt mani.
ġ-ism-ns a-ġ-ra-n-rjun kullu ayt-tmizar.»
uškan-d kra n-mddn ġ-uwssan-an, awin-as-d yan-urgaz ibukḍn, ig aẓnẓum yili gis yal-ljnn. ijjujji-t yasuɛ, iwrri-uẓnẓum ar-isawal yisfiw.
ggutn ġwilli-t-ẓranin, iḍr-asn lɛjb kullutn ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn ar-ttinin: «izd ġwad a-igan yus n-dawd lli-s-a-ntql?»
imma ifarisin, lliġ sfldn f-ma-iskr ar-ttinin: «ġwad, ġir s-tḥkimt n-bɛl-zabul agllid l-ljnun a-s-a-issufuġ ljnun.»
imma yasuɛ issn iswingimn-nsn yini-asn: «tagldit nna-itmmaġn d-ih̬f-ns ra-th̬lu. tamdint nġd tigmmi nna-itmmaġn d-ih̬f-ns ur-tẓḍar a-tqama.
ula šiṭan, iġ-a-issufuġ šiṭan, hati ar-itmmaġ d-ih̬f-ns. mamnk a-ra-tqama-tgldit-ns?
walaynni iġd s-tḥkimt n-bɛl-zabul a-s-a-ssufuġġ ljnun, iniyat-iyi ma-s-a-tn-ssufuġn ayt-darun? ntni a-rad-awn-iml is-tjlam.
walaynni iġd s-rruḥ n-rbbi a-s-a-ssufuġġ ljnun, issanat is-d-darun-tuška-tgldit n-rbbi.
«ma-iẓḍarn a-ikšm s-tgmmi n-yan idusn a-d-yakʷr ayda-ns iġ-ur-zwar-ikrs ġwalli idusn? iġ-t-ikrs, ġakudan a-rad-as-d-yakʷr ayda-ns.
han wanna ur-didi-illin, iga ḍiḍḍ-inu. d-wanna ur-didi-issmunun, ar-izzmzar.
f-mayad a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, kullu ddnub n-bnadm ula kullu tirggam nna-s-rgmn rbbi, iẓḍar ad-asn-iṣamḥ fllasn, walaynni yan irggmn rruḥ lqudus ur-sar-as-fllas-iṣamḥ.
wanna isawln ġ-yus n-bnadm, iẓḍar rbbi ad-as-iṣamḥ. walaynni yan irggmn rruḥ lqudus, ur-rad-as-iṣamḥ, la ġ-ddunit ula ġ-lih̬rt.
«iġ-tfulki lġllt, tissanm is-tfulki-tsġart. iġ-tʷh̬šn lġllt, tissanm is-tʷh̬šn-tsġart. ašku zġ-lġllt-ns a-zġ-a-ttyawssan-tsġart.
wa-tarwa n-ifaġrn, mamnk a-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tsawalm s-ufulki d-kunni tʷh̬šnm? hati aynna-s-iɛmmr-uwl a-s-a-d-isawal imi.
yan ifulkin, ar-d-issufuġ ma-ifulkin zġ-lh̬zin n-ufulki-ns. imma yan yʷh̬šnn, ar-d-issufuġ ma-yʷh̬šnn zġ-lh̬zin l-lh̬ʷšant-ns.
rad-awn-iniġ, rad-rarn mddn lḥsab ġ-wass l-lḥukm f-kraygatt awal ih̬wan lli-s-nnan.
f-iwaliwn-nnun a-f-rad-awn-yili rrḍa. f-iwaliwn-nnun a-f-rad-awn-yili lhalak.»
sawln-d ilmma kra n-imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-ifarisin inin-as: «way-amslmd, nra a-dark-nẓr kra l-lmɛjizt ad-aġ-tg tamatart n-izd rbbi a-k-id-yuznn.»
imma ntta irur-asn: «tasut yʷh̬šnn ifsadn ayad, tḍalb tamatart. ur-rad-as-ttyawfka kra n-tmatart abla tamatart n-nnabi yuna.
ġmklli-n-ikka yuna kraḍ-uwssan d-kraḍ-waḍan ġ-waḥlig n-uslm imqqurn, ġmkan a-rad-iyi-ijru ula nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm. ra-n-kġ kraḍ-uwssan d-kraḍ-waḍan ġ-tdrut n-wakal.
walaynni rad-nkrn ayt-ninwa ġ-wass l-lḥsab ġ-gr mddn n-tasut-ad, aštkkan srsn, ašku fln ntni kullu mad-skarn yʷh̬šn ġakud lliġ sfldn i-tbrraḥt n-yuna. imma ġilad illa ġid ma-yugʷrn yuna.
ra-tnkr-tgllitt l-ljanub ġ-wass l-lḥsab ġ-gr mddn n-tasut-ad, taštkka srsn, ašku tuška-d nttat zġ-ttmi n-ddunit a-tsfld i-tḥkimt n-suliman. imma ġilad illa ġid ma-yugʷrn suliman.
«iġ-iffuġ ljnn zġ-kra n-bnadm, ra-izray ġ-lh̬la ġ-ur-llin-waman, ar-isiggil s-maniġ a-izddġ. iġ-ur-yufi man,
ra-yini d-ih̬f-ns: ‹rad-wrriġ s-tgmmi lli-ġ-ttin-kkiġ.› yašk-id yaf-d tigmmi th̬wa ttyaras tngadda.
iddu ilmma yawi-d dids ssa l-ljnun yaḍni lli-t-yugʷrn ġ-lh̬ʷšant, kšmn kullutn zdġn ġ-urgaz-an ard iwrri isiggʷra-ns yʷh̬šn f-isizwar-ns. ġmkad a-ra-yili i-tasut-ad yʷh̬šnn.»
ar-sul-isawal yasuɛ s-di-tuška innas d-aytmas, biddn-d ġ-brra ḍalbn a-dids-sawln.
yini-as-d yan zġ-gr willi-as-sflidnin: «ha-innak d-aytmak biddn-in ġ-brra, ḍalbn a-didk-sawln.»
imma ntta inna-yasn: «ma-igan inna ula aytma?»
imdi afus-ns s-dar imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «ha-inna d-aytma.
ašku wanna iskarn ma-ira baba rbbi n-ignna, nttan a-igan gʷma, ig ulltma, ig inna.»
ġassan iffuġ yasuɛ zġ-tgmmi, iftu igawr ġ-tama n-umda.
munn-d fllas mddn ggutnin aylliġ-t-id-iqqan a-ikšm s-yat tanawt. iskiws gis, biddn mddn-an kullutn ġ-tama n-waman.
ibdu ar-tn-isslmad s-lmɛni f-kigan d-tġawsiwin. yini-asn: «hay-afllaḥ iffuġ a-n-iluḥ amud.
lliġ-t-iluḥ iḍr-n kra ġ-uġaras aškin-d igḍaḍ grun-t.
iḍr-n kra ġ-gr iẓran ġ-illiġ idrus-wakal, imġi-d ḥayna ašku ur-t-bahra-idil-wakal.
walaynni lliġ-di-tġli tafukt tjdr-t, yiqar ašku ur dars iẓuran.
iḍr-n kra ġ-uzggʷar, iġli d-uzggʷar iššqajji-t.
iḍr-n kra ġ-wakal ifulkin ifk ṣṣabt. ifk yan miyya, ifk yan sḍiṣ id-mraw, ifk yan kraḍ id-mraw.
wanna dar imzgan a-srsn-isflid, illa fllas a-isfld.»
aškin-d dars imḥḍarn-ns sqsan-t: «mah̬ aylliġ a-srsn-tsawalt s-lmɛni?»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «kunni ityawfka-yawn a-tissanm f-tgldit n-rbbi ma-intln, imma ntni ur-asn-ityawfka.
ašku wanna dar illa, rad-as-izayd rbbi, yili-as uggʷar. imma wanna ur-dar-illi, rad-as-ikkis ula maylli dars illan.
mayad a-f-a-srsn-sawalġ s-lmɛni. ašku ar-tmnadn ur-a-ẓrran yat, ar-sflidn ur-a-tsllan i-yat ula-da-tfhamn yat.
illa gisn ġaylli-f-inna rbbi f-imi n-nnabi išaɛya inna: ‹rad-bahra-tsflidm walaynni ur-ra-tfhmm ma-mi-tsfldm. rad-bahra-ttmnadm walaynni ur-ra-tissanm ma-tmnadm.
wrrin mddn-an iqqur ih̬f-nsn, ẓẓayn imzgan-nsn, qqnnt-walln-nsn. ur-rin ad-ẓrnt-walln-nsn ula sfldn imzgan-nsn ula fhmn ġ-ih̬f-nsn. ur-rin ad-d-sri-wrrin a-tn-jjujjiġ.›
imma kunni, timbarkiyin ad-gant-walln-nnun ašku ar-ẓrrant. imbarkin ad-gan imzgan-nnun ašku ar-sflidn.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ggutn lanbiya d-mddn rḍanin rbbi ẓuẓḍn ad-ẓrn mayd tẓrram walaynni ur-t-ẓrin, ẓuẓḍn ad-sfldn i-mayd mi tsflidm walaynni ur-as-sfldn.
«ġmkad a-tga lmɛna n-ufllaḥ.
amud lli-iḍrn ġ-uġaras, iga ntta zund yan isfldn i-wawal n-tgldit n-ignna ur-t-ifhim. yašk-id iblis ikkis-as awal lli-illan ġ-ih̬f-ns.
imma amud lli-iḍrn ġ-gr iẓran, iga ntta zund yan isfldn i-wawal yamẓ-t ḥayna ifrḥ srs,
walaynni ur-ikšim-wawal-an s-uwl-ns. iqama ġir kra n-uwssan ard tili tassast nġd tarfufnt f-ssibt n-wawal s-iknuki.
imma amud lli-iḍrn ġ-uzggʷar, iga ntta zund yan isfldn i-wawal, walaynni idda yasi tiġufiwin n-ddunit ilhu s-wayda. ġayan a-iššqajjin awal aylliġ ur-d-yiwi ṣṣabt.
walaynni amud lli-iḍrn ġ-wakal ifulkin, iga ntta zund yan isfldn i-wawal ifhm-t, ifk ṣṣabt. ra-yili ma-ifkan miyya, yili ma-ifkan sḍiṣ id-mraw, yili ma-ifkan kraḍ id-mraw.»
izayd yasuɛ yut-asn lmɛna-yad yaḍni yini-asn: «tagldit n-ignna tga zund yan-urgaz ifta iluḥ-n amud ifulkin ġ-igr-ns.
lliġ ign ġ-iyḍ yašk-id yan-unuwwaš-ns, iluḥ-n wazkkun ġ-gr irdn, iddu ifl-t.
lliġ-d-mġin irdn ssufġn tizlfin, imġi didsn wazkkun.
aškin-d ih̬ddamn s-dar bab n-igr inin-as: ‹wa-sidi, is-urd amud ifulkin a-tgit ġ-igr-nnk? mani-d-ikka wazkkun-ad?›
yini-asn: ‹kra n-unuwwaš a-iskrn ġayad.› inin-as ih̬ddamn: ‹is-trit a-nddu nsussi nssukf wazkkun-an?›
irar-asn: ‹uhu, a-ur-tssukfm wazkkun a-ur-imil tssukfm dids irdn.
adjat-tn ad-kullu-mqqurn ard truḥ-tmgra. ġakudan rad-iniġ i-išuwwaln: ssmunat-zwar wazkkun tgm-t d-taggʷatin baš a-ijdr, tzaydm ilmma tmgrm irdn tssmunm-tn-d ġ-uḥanu-nu.›»
yut-asn lmɛna-yad yaḍni yini-asn: «tagldit n-ignna tga zund yat taqqayt l-lh̬rdl, yiwi-tt yan-urgaz iẓẓu-tt ġ-wakal-ns.
nttat tmẓẓi f-kullu taqqayin lli-llanin, walaynni iġ-di-tmġi ra-tagʷr išddran kullutn, twrri tg tasġart. ar-di-ttaškin igḍaḍ n-ignwan ar-zddġn ġ-gr-tṣṭṭwin-ns.»
yut-asn-daġ lmɛna-yad yaḍni yini-asn: «tagldit n-ignna tga zund tah̬mirt lli-di-tusi yat-tmġart tg-tt-in ġ-kraṭṭ lɛbrat mqqurnin n-uggurn, tsskti lɛjin kullut.»
kullu mayad, s-lmɛni a-s-t-inna yasuɛ i-mddn ggutnin lli-d-fllas-munnin. ur-a-srsn-isawal abla s-lmɛni.
ġmkad a-s-yuwfa-wawal n-nnabi lli-innan: «s-lmɛni a-s-rad-asn-sawlġ, mlġ-asn ma-intln zġ-isizwar n-ddunit.»
ġakudan ifl yasuɛ mddn-an ikšm s-tgmmi, aškin-d dars imḥḍarn-ns inin-as: «ml-aġ ma-tqṣadt s-lmɛna n-wazkkun ġ-igr.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ġwalli iluḥn amud ifulkin iga-t yus n-bnadm,
igr tga-t ddunit. aqqayn n-wamud ifulkin gan-tn ayt-tgldit n-ignna, imma aqqayn n-wazkkun gan-tn ayt-iblis.
anuwwaš lli-tn-in-iluḥn iga-t iblis. tamgra tga isiggʷra n-ddunit, išuwwaln gan lmalayka.
ġmklli ssmunn wazkkun a-ijdr ġ-lɛafit, ġmkan a-ra-ijru ġ-isiggʷra n-ddunit.
ašku yus n-bnadm ra-yazn lmalayka-ns, ssittin zġ-tgldit-ns kullu ma-issṭarn mddn ula kullu ma-iskarn lh̬ʷšant,
luḥn-tn-in ġ-ufarnu l-lɛafit. ġin a-ġ-rad-allan ar-tgẓaẓn uh̬san-nsn.
imma ġwilli-f-irḍa rbbi, ġakudan a-rad-isfiwn zund tafukt ġ-tgldit n-babatsn. wanna dar imzgan a-srsn-isflid, illa fllas a-isfld.
«tagldit n-ignna tga zund lknz ityawmḍaln ġ-igr, yaf-t-in yan-urgaz iḥḍu-t-daġ. iddu ifrḥ bahra, izznz kullu ma-dars-illan, isġ igr-an.
«tagldit n-ignna tga zund ttajr ar-isiggil s-ljuhr iġʷlan.
lliġ yufa yat taljuhrt iggut-bahra-watig-ns, iddu izznz kullu ma-dars-illan isġ taljuhrt-an.
«tagldit n-ignna tga zund ššbkt, luḥn-tt-in ingʷmarn ġ-umda ssmunn-d gis kraygatt rrhḍ n-islman.
lliġ tɛmmr ššbkt awin-tt-id s-wakal, gawrn ar-ẓlayn ġwilli šwanin ar-tn-tgan ġ-tislla, imma ġwilli ʷh̬šnnin luḥn-tn-in.
ġmkan a-ra-ijru ġ-isiggʷra n-ddunit. rad-ddun lmalayka ẓlin mddn ʷh̬šnnin zġ-gr willi rḍanin rbbi,
luḥn-tn-in ġ-ufarnu l-lɛafit. ġin a-ġ-rad-allan ar-tgẓaẓn uh̬san-nsn.»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «is-tfhmm kullu tiġawsiwin-ad ġila?» inin-as: «nfhm-tnt.»
izayd yini-asn: «kraygatt amslmd lli-ilmdn f-tgldit n-ignna, iga zund bu-tgmmi lli-d-issufuġn zġ-lh̬zin-ns ma-igan l-ljdid ula ma-igan aqdim.»
lliġ ikmml yasuɛ kullu lmɛni-ad, iftu zġ-ġin,
iwrri-d s-tmazirt-ns. ar-isslmad ġ-tgmmi n-tẓallit, ar-gis-tɛjjabn mddn ar-ttinin: «argaz-ad, mani-d-kullu-srs-tkka-tḥkimt-ad ula lmɛjizat-ad iskar?
is-urd yus n-unjjar ayad? is-urd maryam a-igan innas? is-urd yaɛqub d-yusf d-simɛan d-yahuda a-igan aytmas?
is-urd istmas kullutnt ayd-didnnġ-illan ġid? imma kullu mayad, mani-d-srs-ikka?»
ntni bzgn fllas. imma yasuɛ inna-yasn: «nnabi nna-illan ar-ti-tuqqarn mddn, walaynni ur-a-ti-tuqqarn ayt-tmazirt-ns d-ayt-tgmmi-ns.»
ur-ġin-iskir kra l-lmɛjizat ggutnin, ašku ur-rin ad-srs-amnn.
ġ-uwssan-an isfld-ugllid hirudus f-kullu ma-iskar yasuɛ.
yini fllas i-ih̬ddamn-ns: «yuḥanna amsddam ayad, inkr-d zġ-lmut. mayan a-f-gis-llant lquwwat-ad.»
ašku hirudus a-yuznn ad-amẓn yuḥanna krsn-t luḥn-t-in ġ-lḥbs f-ssibt n-hirudiyya tamġart n-gʷmas filibbus.
ašku yuḥanna ikka-ttin ar-ittini i-hirudus: «ur-ak-iḥlla a-tawit tamġart n-gʷmak.»
yiri hirudus a-inġ yuḥanna walaynni iksuḍ zġ-mddn ašku ar-kullu-ttinin izd yuḥanna yan-nnabi a-iga.
walaynni lliġ-d-iruḥ-wass lli-ġ-ilul hirudus, tkšm-n illis n-hirudiyya ar-ttḥuš ġ-lgddam n-hirudus d-willi dids gawrnin, tssfraḥ-t.
isawl s-tfruh̬t iggall-as ard-as-ifk aynna tḍalb.
tffuġ nttat tsqsa-n innas, twrri-d tini-as: «fk-iyi-d ġ-yat-tqṣriyt ih̬f n-yuḥanna amsddam.»
ṭiyyr-as i-ugllid bahra, walaynni f-ssibt n-tgallit lli-s-iggulla ġ-lgddam n-inbgiwn-ns yuṣṣa ad-as-ityawfka.
yazn ad-bbin ih̬f n-yuḥanna ġ-lḥbs.
awin-d ih̬f-ns ġ-yat-tqṣriyt, ifk-t i-tfruh̬t tawi-t-tfruh̬t i-innas.
aškin-d ilmma imḥḍarn n-yuḥanna, awin ddat-ns mḍln-tt-in. ddun inin-t i-yasuɛ.
lliġ isfld yasuɛ f-mayd ijran, iftu issudu ġ-yat tanawt s-yan-udġar ġ-ur-illi yan. sfldn mddn is-idda, ftun f-uḍar zġ-iduran-an ḍfurn-t.
lliġ iffuġ zġ-tanawt iẓr-n kigan d-mddn, qaman gis bahra, ijjujji-asn imuḍan-nsn.
lliġ takmur takʷya n-tafukt aškin-d dars imḥḍarn-ns inin-as: «yaġ-uzal, ur-illi yat ġ-lh̬la-yad. azn mddn ad-ddun s-iduran-an ad-d-sġn mad-šttan.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ur-tn-d-iqqan ad-ddun. fkat-asn kunni mad-šttan.»
inin-as: «ur-darnnġ ġir smmust-tngʷal d-snat-tslmin.»
yini-asn: «awiyat-tnd-d s-dari.»
yuṣṣa mddn-an ggutnin ad-gawrn ġ-tuga. yasi smmust-tngʷal-lli d-tslmin-lli s-snat, yall alln-ns s-ignwan iškr rbbi. ibbi tingʷal ifk-tnt i-imḥḍarn-ns. bḍun-tnt imḥḍarn f-mddn-an ggutnin.
ššn kullu aylliġ šbɛan. ssmunn-d tuffaẓ lli-d-qamanin, ɛmmrn snat d-mrawt n-tasllit.
ġwilli ššanin rad-gn ma-itggan smmus id-walf n-urgaz, ilint ula timġarin d-tarwa mẓẓinin.
yini yasuɛ ilmma i-imḥḍarn-ns ad-kšmn s-tanawt zwurn-t s-tsga yaḍni n-umda. imma ntta iqama ġin a-imsafaḍ d-mddn.
tiġurdin n-ma-imsafaḍ yasuɛ d-mddn-an, iġli s-yan-uwrir waḥdut a-ġin-iẓẓall. ḍrnd-d tillas, sul illa ġin waḥdut.
imma imḥḍarn-ns ġ-tasaɛt-an, taggug-n tanawt-nsn f-wakal. ar-tt-kkatnt taḍangiwin, ar-tt-itrara-waḍu tiġurdin.
ġakudan ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-iyḍ yašk-id darsn yasuɛ iftu f-iggi n-waman.
lliġ-t-ẓran imḥḍarn-ns ifta f-iggi n-waman iksaḍn bahra, gn taġuyyit inin: «kra n-waġʷẓn ayad.»
ġakudan isawl-d yasuɛ yini-asn: «ad-ur-tiksaḍm. thnnayat, nkkin aya.»
yini-as bṭrus: «wa-sidi, iġd kiyi ayan, amr-iyi a-n-dark-ftuġ f-iggi n-waman.»
yini-as-d: «ašk-id.» iffuġ bṭrus zġ-tanawt iftu f-iggi n-waman s-dar yasuɛ.
walaynni iẓra aḍu itjhhd yiksaḍ, s-a-itddm ġ-waman. iġr i-yasuɛ yini-as: «wa-sidi, jjnjm-iyi.»
ġakudan imdi-as-n yasuɛ afus-ns, yamẓ gis yini-as: «is-ur-tumint? mah̬ aylliġ tškkat?»
ġlin ilmma s-tanawt, ibbi-n-waḍu.
sjdn-as ġwilli llanin ġ-tanawt ar-ttinin: «s-ṣṣaḥt kiyi tgit yus n-rbbi.»
lliġ bbin amda lkmn tamazirt n-ganisaraṭ.
akʷzn-t mddn n-ġin, ssufġn lh̬bar s-kullu tisgiw n-tmazirt-an. ar-as-di-tawin kullu ma-ġ-llant-tmuḍan.
ar-zgis-tḍalabn bahra a-yadj imuḍan-nsn ad-as-ggrn, wah̬h̬a ġir i-tama n-tmlsit-ns. kullu mad-as-iggrn ijji.
aškin-d kra n-ifarisin d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ zġ-tmdint n-urušalim s-dar yasuɛ. sqsan-t:
«mah̬ aylliġ a-tffuġn imḥḍarn-nnk zġ-lɛada n-imzwura-nnġ lli-zrinin? ha-ntni ar-šttan bla-da-ssġusn ifassn-nsn s-isirid lli-tn-d-iqqann.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «imma kunni, mah̬ aylliġ a-ttffuġm zġ-luṣit n-rbbi baš a-tskarm s-lɛada-nnun?
han rbbi a-innan ‹awi-tt ġ-babak d-innak.› yini-daġ ‹wanna irgmn babas nġd innas illa fllas a-immt.›
imma kunni, iġ-inna kra n-yan i-babas nġd innas ‹fkiġ i-rbbi maylli tram ad-awn-t-fkġ,›
iġ-inna awal-ad ar-as-ttinim ur-sul-t-ih̬ṣṣa a-stt-itawi ġ-babas. ġmkad a-s-tunfm i-wawal n-rbbi s-lɛada-nnun.
wa-id-bu-sin-uwdmawn, s-lḥqq a-s-fllawn-inna rbbi f-imi n-nnabi išaɛya, inna
‹mddn-ad ar-iyi-talġn s-ils-nsn, imma ul-nsn yaggug-n flla.
bla lfaytt a-yyi-tɛbadn ašku ur-a-sslmadn ġ-ulmmud-nsn abla tinbaḍin n-bnadm.›»
iġr-d yasuɛ i-mddn s-dars yini-asn: «sfldat-iyi a-tissanm.
urd maylli ikššmn zġ-imi n-bnadm a-t-issḥramn. walaynni ġaylli-d-itffuġn zġ-imi-ns, nttan a-t-issḥramn.»
aškin-d dars ilmma imḥḍarn-ns inin-as: «is-ur-tssint is-tti-tssṭiyyrt i-ifarisin s-wawal-ad?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ra-yakuf kud asġar nna-ur-iẓẓi baba rbbi n-ignna.
ġir thnnayat zġ-gisn. ntni gan ibukaḍn ar-zggurun i-ibukaḍn. iġ-izwar-ubukaḍ i-wayyaḍ ra-n-ḍrn s-sin ġ-ugḍi.»
yini-as bṭrus: «ml-aġ ma-tqṣadt s-lmɛna-yad.»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «izd ula kunni ur-ta-tfhimm?
is-ur-tssinm izd kullu ma-ikššmn zġ-imi n-bnadm ar-izray zġ-waḥlig-ns s-lh̬la?
imma ġaylli-d-itffuġn zġ-imi, ul-ns a-d-itkka. nttan a-issḥramn bnadm.
ašku zġ-uwl-ns a-zġ-a-di-tffuġn iswingimn ʷh̬šnnin ula tanaġa d-zzna d-lfsad d-tmh̬h̬art d-tugga n-tkrkas d-trggam.
ġwid a-issḥramn bnadm. imma yan iššan ur-isird ifassn-ns, ur-ra-t-issḥrm mayan.»
inkr yasuɛ iffuġ zġ-tmazirt n-ayt-rbbi iftu s-tsga n-ṣur d-ṣayda.
tašk-id dars yat-tmġart ullt-tmazirt-an n-kanɛan, ar-as-di-taqra ar-ttini: «ḥnnu zġ-gigi a-yus n-dawd. ha-illi illa gis yal-ljnn, tmrrt bahra.»
imma yasuɛ ifssa, ur-as-inni yat. munn-d ilmma imḥḍarn-ns inin-as: «ssmsr-tt a-sidi, ašku sul-aġ-tḍfar ar-tssġuyyu.»
isawl srs yasuɛ yini-as: «ġir ulli n-tuwrut ijlan lli-igan ayt-rbbi a-f-di-tyazanġ.»
imma nttat tuška-d tḍr-d ġ-lgddam-ns tini-as: «wa-sidi, ɛawn-iyi.»
yini-as: «ur-išwi a-namẓ aġrum n-tarwa, nluḥ-t-in i-iyḍan.»
tini-as: «wa-sidi, ula iḍan ar-šttan ibruziyn lli-ṭṭarnin zġ-lmida n-siditsn.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «wa-tamġart, tumnt bahra. ad-am-yili ġmklli trit.» tjji illis ġakudan.
iftu yasuɛ zġ-ġin izri zġ-tama n-umda n-jalil, iġli s-yan-uwrir igawr gis.
munn-d fllas mddn ggutnin, awin-as-d ikušamn d-ibiḍarn d-ibukaḍn d-iẓnẓam d-wiyyaḍ ggutnin, srsn-tn-d ġ-dar iḍarn-ns ijjujji-tn.
ar-kullu-tɛjjabn mddn-an lliġ ẓran iẓnẓam ar-sawaln, d-ikušamn ar-tdusn, d-ibiḍarn ar-fttun, d-ibukaḍn ar-ttisfiwn. ar-kullu-talġn rbbi n-ayt-yudaya.

iġr-d yasuɛ ilmma i-imḥḍarn-ns s-dars, yini-asn: «ha-mddn-ad qaman gigi bahra, ašku kraḍ-uwssan ayd didi llan, ur-darsn mad-šttan. ur-riġ a-tn-aznġ d-ntni inġa-tn laẓ a-ur-tġašan ġ-uġaras.»
inin-as imḥḍarn-ns: «ġir lh̬la ayad. maniġ ra-naf aġrum ma-s-a-nššbaɛ kullu mddn-ad ggutnin?»
isqsa-tn yasuɛ: «mnnawt-tngʷal ad-darun?» inin-as: «ssa n-tngʷal d-kra n-tslmin mẓẓinin.»
yuṣṣa mddn ad-skiwsn s-wakal
yasi ssa n-tngʷal d-tslmin, iškr rbbi ibbi-tnt ifk i-imḥḍarn-ns, bḍun-tnt f-mddn.
ššn kullu mddn-an aylliġ šbɛan. ssmunn-d tuffaẓ lli-d-qamanin, ɛmmrn ssa n-tryalin.
ġwilli ššanin, kkuẓ id-walf n-urgaz ad-gan, ilint ula timġarin d-tarwa mẓẓinin.
inkr yasuɛ ilmma, imsafaḍ d-mddn. ikšm s-tanawt issudu ġ-umda s-tsgiw n-magadan.
aškin-d kra n-ifarisin d-kra n-mddn l-lmdhb n-iṣadduqin, irin ad-armn yasuɛ. ḍalbn zġ-gis a-iskr kra l-lmɛjizt ad-asn-tg tamatart n-izd rbbi a-t-id-yuznn.
imma ntta isawl yini-asn: «ha-kunni ġ-tdggʷat ar-ttinim ‹ra-iṣfu lḥal azkka ašku ẓggʷaġn ignwan.›
ula zikk ṣbaḥ ar-ttinim ‹ra-yili-unẓar ġassad ašku ẓggʷaġn imdla ġ-ignwan.› kunni tssnm lmɛni n-ignwan, walaynni ur-akkʷ-tssinm lmɛna n-kullu mayd darun ijran ġ-uwssan-ad.
tasut yʷh̬šnn ifsadn ayad, tḍalb tamatart. ur-rad-as-ttyawfka kra n-tmatart abla tamatart n-nnabi yuna.» ifl-tn ilmma iddu.
lliġ lkmn tasga yaḍni n-umda ktin-d imḥḍarn ur-didsn-iwin aġrum.
yini-asn yasuɛ: «awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun, trarm lɛaql zġ-th̬mirt n-ifarisin d-iṣadduqin.»
imma ntni ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn ar-ttinin: «ur-d-niwi aġrum, mayan a-f-inna awal-ad.»
issn yasuɛ ma-ttinin, yini-asn: «mah̬ aylliġ a-tssmqsam ġmkad f-uġrum ur-darun-illi? is-ur-tuminm?
is-ur-ta-tfhimm? is-ur-di-tswangmm smmust-tngʷal lli-bbiġ i-smmus id-walf, ula mnšk n-tasllit a-tusim n-tuffaẓ?
nġd ssa n-tngʷal lli-bbiġ i-kkuẓ id-walf, ula mnšk n-tryalt a-tusim n-tuffaẓ?
mah̬ ur-tssinm is-urd aġrum a-f-a-sawalġ lliġ-awn-nniġ ‹rarat lɛaql-nnun zġ-th̬mirt n-ifarisin d-iṣadduqin›?»
fhmn imḥḍarn ġakudan is-urd tah̬mirt n-uġrum a-f-asn-inna a-zgis-traran lɛaql walaynni almmud n-ifarisin d-iṣadduqin.
izayd yasuɛ iddu s-tsgiw n-qayṣriyya filibbi. isqsa imḥḍarn-ns: «ma-ttinin mddn f-yus n-bnadm? mad-giġ nkki?»
sawln imḥḍarn inin-as: «kra ar-ittini tgit yuḥanna amsddam. kra ar-ittini tgit nnabi iliyya. kra ar-ittini tgit irmiyya nġd kra n-yan zġ-lanbiya n-zman.»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «imma kunni, ma-flla-ttinim? mad-giġ nkki?»
isawl simɛan bṭrus yini-as: «tgit lmasiḥ yus n-rbbi lli-iddrn.»
yini-as yasuɛ: «ambarki a-tgit a-simɛan yus n-yuna, ašku urd bnadm ad-ak-imlan mayad, walaynni imla-yak-t baba rbbi lli-illan ġ-ignna.
rad-ak-iniġ, kiyi tgit ‹bṭrus›, tgt aẓru lli-f-rad-bnuġ amnaggar-inu, d-ur-sar-t-nrint lquwwat l-lmut.
rad-ak-fkġ tisura n-tgldit n-ignna. aynna tkrst ġ-ddunit ityawkras ġ-ignna, d-aynna tfsit ġ-ddunit ityawfsay ġ-ignna.»
yuṣṣa imḥḍarn-ns ilmma yini-asn s-lmɛqul: «a-ur-tinim i-yan izd nkkin a-igan lmasiḥ lli-s-a-tqln.»

zġ-ġassan a-ibda yasuɛ ar-imala i-imḥḍarn-ns ma-rad-as-ijru, yini-asn: «iqqan-iyi-d ad-dduġ s-tmdint n-urušalim, rfufnġ bahra f-ufus n-imġarn n-tmazirt d-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ. ra-yyi-nġn, walaynni wis kraḍ-uwssan ra-d-nkrġ zġ-lmut.»
yawi-t ilmma bṭrus a-t-iẓi f-wawal-ad yini-as: «ad-ak-yili lh̬ir a-sidi, ula ijra-yak ġayan.»
igrawl-d gis yasuɛ yini-as: «itti-n zġ-gigi a-šiṭan. tabayḍḍrt ad-iyi-tgit. ašku ur-a-tskart s-ma-ira rbbi, walaynni s-ma-ira bnadm ka-s-a-tskart.»
izayd yasuɛ isawl s-imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «wanna iran a-didi-yili, iqqan-t-id a-ittu ih̬f-ns, yasi aggjdi-ns, imun didi.
wanna iran a-ijjnjm tudrt-ns ra-stt-ijlu. imma wanna ijlan tudrt-ns f-ssibt-inu, ra-stt-yaf.
ma-ra-yili i-bnadm iġ-iwrri iṭṭaf ddunit kullutt ih̬sr ih̬f-ns? ma-ra-ifk bnadm baš a-ijjnjm ih̬f-ns?
imma nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm rad-d-aškġ s-lmjd n-baba rbbi d-lmalayka-nu, baš ad-rarġ i-kraygatt yan f-ma-iskr.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, illa ġ-ġwid biddnin ġid ma-ur-ra-immt ard iẓr yus n-bnadm yuška-d ġ-tgldit-ns.»
zrin sḍiṣ-uwssan, iddu yasuɛ yawi dids bṭrus d-yaɛqub d-gʷmas yuḥanna, ġlin waḥdutn s-yan-uwrir yattuyn.
tbddl ssift n-yasuɛ ġ-lgddam-nsn, ar-issmrqiqiy-uwdm-ns zund tafukt, wrrint-tmlsa-ns mllulnt bahra zund tifawt n-wass.
ġakudan ẓran nnabi musa ula nnabi iliyya ar-sawaln d-yasuɛ.
inkr bṭrus yini-as: «wa-siditnnġ, ifulki a-nili ġid. is-trit ad-awn-nskr kraḍ iḥšaš, yan-nnk d-yan n-musa d-yan n-iliyya?»
sul a-isawal s-d-fllasn-tgguz yat-tmdlut issmrġan tdl-tn. isawl-d yan-wawal zġ-tmdlut yini: «ġwad iga iwi iɛzzan. nttan a-s-bahra-frḥġ. sflidat srs.»
lliġ sllan imḥḍarn i-mayan ḍrn s-wakal f-uwdmawn-nsn, ggʷdn bahra.
imma yasuɛ ifta-d s-darsn isrs fllasn afus-ns yini-asn: «nkrat. ad-ur-tiksaḍm.»
lliġ ssmaqqln ur-ẓrin yan, abla yasuɛ waḥdut.
lliġ-d-ftan ġ-ugsar n-uwrir, yuṣṣa-tn yasuɛ: «ad-ur-tinim i-yan f-ma-tẓram ard-d-inkr yus n-bnadm zġ-lmut.»
sqsan-t imḥḍarn-ns: «mah̬ aylliġ a-ttinin imslmdn n-ššrɛ iqqan-d nnabi iliyya a-d-yašk izwur-d ġwalli igan lmasiḥ?»
yini-asn: «s-ṣṣaḥt iliyya a-d-izwarn a-ijjujad kraygatt kra.
walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, yuška-d-yad iliyya, ur-t-ukʷzn mddn. skrn srs kullu ġaylli ran. ġmkan a-s-rad-rfufnġ ula nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm f-ufus-nsn.»
ssnn imḥḍarn ġakudan izd yuḥanna amsddam a-f-a-yasn-isawal.
lliġ wrrin s-dar mddn yaḍni, yašk-id yan-urgaz iḍr-d ġ-lgddam n-yasuɛ yini-as:
«wa-sidi, ḥnnu ġ-iwi. han illa-gis-uslay ar-bahra-itrfufun. mnnawt-twal a-n-iṭṭar ġ-lɛafit ula ġ-waman.
iwiġ-t-id i-imḥḍarn-nnk walaynni ur-ẓḍarn ntni a-t-jjujjin.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «wa-tasut-ad ijlan, ur-akkʷ-trit a-tamnt. mnšk a-ra-sul-didun-qamaġ? mnšk a-rad-didun-ṣbrġ? awiyat-t-id s-dari.»
yamr ljnn, iffuġ zġ-gis s-ijji-ufruh̬ ḥayna.
aškin-d imḥḍarn s-dar yasuɛ waḥdutn sqsan-t: «mah̬ aylliġ ur-nẓḍar nkkʷni a-t-nssufġ?»

yini-asn: «ašku idrus liman-nnun. lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, iġ-gigun-illa liman unšk n-taqqayt imẓẓin l-lh̬rdl, ra-tinim i-uwrir-ad ‹itti zġ-ġid s-ġin› ra-iskr s-mad-as-tnnam. ur-ra-yili kra mi ur-tẓḍarm.
walaynni wan ljnn-an, ur-ra-itffuġ abla iġ-taẓumm ar-ttḍalabm rbbi.»
munn-daġ imḥḍarn d-yasuɛ ġ-tmazirt n-jalil, isawl srsn yini-asn: «nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm ra-yyi-n-dḥin s-gr ifassn n-mddn
nġn-iyi, nkrġ-d ilmma ġ-wis kraḍ-uwssan.» imma ntni ṭiyyr-asn bahra f-ma-inna.
ddun ilmma s-tmdint n-kafrnaḥum. aškin-d ġwilli tamẓnin ššrd n-tgmmi n-rbbi, lkmn-d bṭrus inin-as: «is-ur-a-yakka-umslmd-nnun ššrd n-tgmmi n-rbbi?»

yini-asn: «ar-t-yakka.» lliġ-d-iruḥ bṭrus tigmmi isawl srs yasuɛ, izwur-as ġ-wawal isqsa-t: «manwi tġalt a-simɛan, ar-zgisn-tamẓn igldan n-ddunit ššrd ula ḍabiyt? izd zġ-tarwa-nsn nġd zġ-wiyyaḍ?»
yini-as bṭrus: «zġ-wiyyaḍ.» izayd yasuɛ yini-as: «ula ġmkan ur-illi f-tarwa n-tgldit.
walaynni a-stt-ur-nssṭiyyar i-mddn-an. zayd s-umda, tluḥt-n yat tukṭṭ ġ-waman. taslmt tamzwarut nna-di-tumẓt, trẓmt imi-ns ra-n-taft yan-uqarid. awi-t tfrut srs mad-aġ-ḍfarn nkki ula kiyi.»
aškin-d imḥḍarn s-dar yasuɛ ġ-tasaɛt-an sqsan-t: «ma-ra-ig anmġur ġ-tgldit n-ignna?»
iġr-d yasuɛ i-yan-warraw imẓẓin s-dars, yawi-t-id s-wammas-nsn
yini-asn: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, iġ-ur-tbddilm twrrim tgm zund tarwa mẓẓinin, ur-sar-tkšimm s-tgldit n-ignna.
wanna iẓẓimẓin ih̬f-ns zund arraw-ad, nttan a-imqqurn ġ-tgldit n-ignna.
d-wanna iqbln yan-warraw imẓẓin zund ġwad s-ism-inu, hati iqbl-iyi.
«walaynni wanna issḍrn yan zġ-imẓẓiyn-ad lli-sri-umnnin, yuf-as mrad is-as-ityaggal-uẓru n-uzrg imqqurn ġ-umggrḍ-ns ih̬si-n ġ-tdrut n-umda.
taguḍi a-ra-yili i-ddunit f-ssibt n-kullu ma-gis-issṭarn bnadm. iqqan-d-nnit a-yili ma-issṭarn mddn, walaynni taguḍi a-ra-yili i-willi-tn-ssḍrnin.
iġ-a-k-issṭar-ufus-nnk nġd aḍar-nnk, bbi-t tluḥt-t-in. yuf-ak a-tkšmt s-tudrt tgit abiḍar nġd bla n-yan-ufus, ula a-dark-ilin sin ifassn d-sin iḍarn ttyawgart-n ġ-lɛafit lli-ur-sar-ih̬sin.
iġ-a-k-tssṭar tiṭ-nnk ssukf-tt-id tluḥt-stt-in. yuf-ak a-tkšmt s-tudrt tgit abukaḍ, ula a-dark-ilint snat-walln ttyawgart-n ġ-lɛafit n-jhnnama.
awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun a-ur-tḥgrm yan ġ-imẓẓiyn-ad. ašku rad-awn-iniġ, lmalayka-nsn ar-n-bdda-tmunun d-baba rbbi lli-illan ġ-ignna.
«uškiġ-d nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm baš ad-jjnjamġ ġwilli jlanin.
ma-ra-tinim? ma-ra-iskr yan dar miyya n-ih̬f n-uwlli iġ-as-tjla yat gisnt? is-ur-ra-ifl tẓa n-id-mraw d-tẓa (99) frdnt ġ-iwrar, iddu ar-isiggil s-talli ijlan?
rad-awn-iniġ, ġakud nna-stt-yufa ra-srs-ifrḥ uggʷar n-tẓa n-id-mraw d-tẓa lli-ur-jlinin.
ġmkad a-ira babatun lli-illan ġ-ignna a-ur-ityawhlak yan ġ-imẓẓiyn-ad.
«iġ-gik-iskr gʷmak kra yʷh̬šnn, ddu s-dars tinit-as ma-iskr ġ-grak dids waḥdukn. iġ-srk-isfld, hati trurd-d gʷmak.
walaynni iġ-yagʷi a-srk-isfld, ddu dars tis snat-twal, tawit didk yan nġd sin mddn yaḍni ġmklli ityaran baš ‹a-tzga-tġawsa nna-illan s-tugga n-sin nġd kraḍ inagan.›
iġ-yagʷi a-srsn-isfld ula ntni, ini-t i-umnaggar n-aytmatn. iġ-yagʷi a-isfld s-umnaggar, ig-iyt dark zund yan ur-akkʷ-yuminn nġd zund yan itamẓn nkkas.
«lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, aynna tkrsm ġ-ddunit ityawkras ġ-ignna, d-aynna tfsim ġ-ddunit ityawfsay ġ-ignna.
rad-awn-iniġ kra yaḍni, iġ-d-mšaškan sin gigun ġ-ddunit f-kra ḍalbn i-baba rbbi n-ignna, rad-asn-yili.
ašku innaġ-d-munn sin nġd kraḍ s-ism-inu, rad-iliġ nkki ġ-wammas-nsn.»
yašk-id bṭrus isqsa-t: «wa-sidi, iġ-a-bahra-gigi-iskar gʷma kra yʷh̬šnn, mnnawt-twal a-yyi-d-iqqann ad-as-ṣamḥġ? izd ar ssa n-twal?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «urd ssa n-twal a-s-rad-ak-iniġ walaynni ssa n-id-mraw f-ssa n-twal.
ašku tagldit n-ignna tga zund yan-ugllid ira a-inḥasab d-ih̬ddamn-ns.
lliġ ibda ar-didsn-itnḥasab awin-as-d yan iḍfar-as-ugllid mraw id-walf n-uqarid n-uwrġ.
lliġ ur-dars-illi ma-s-a-yas-itrara ġunškan, yamr-ugllid a-inz ntta d-tmġart-ns d-tarwa-ns ula kullu mad-dars-illan, a-zgis-yamẓ ġunšk lli-as-iḍfar.
ġakudan iḍr-uh̬ddam-lli ġ-lgddam n-ugllid iḍalb-t bahra yini-as ‹wa-sidi, ṣbr didi, rad-ak-t-id-rarġ kullut.›
iḥnnu-gis-ugllid yut f-lḥsab-ns irẓm-as.
imma ah̬ddam-an, iffuġ imnaggar yan-uh̬ddam yaḍni, d-nttan iḍfar i-uh̬ddam-an yaḍni miyya n-tqaritt. yamẓ-t zġ-uqrjuḍ yini-as ‹rar-iyi-d mad-ak-ḍfarġ.›
iḍr-d-uh̬ddam-an yaḍni ġ-lgddam-ns iḍalb-t bahra yini-as ‹ṣbr didi, rad-ak-t-id-rarġ.›
imma ntta yagʷi ad-as-iṣamḥ, iddu iluḥ-t-in ġ-lḥbs ar-d-ifru kullu mad-as-iḍfar.
imma ih̬ddamn yaḍni, lliġ ẓran ma-iskr ṭiyyr-asn bahra, ddun s-dar-ugllid inin-as f-kullu ma-ijran.
iġr-d-ugllid i-uh̬ddam-lli s-dars yini-as ‹way-ah̬ddam yʷh̬šnn. utġ f-lḥsab-nnk kullut ašku tḍalbt-iyi bahra.
is-ur-fllak-illi ula kiyi a-tḥnnut zġ-gʷmak ġmklli zgik ḥnnaġ nkki?›
ibzg-fllas-ugllid idḥi-t-in a-irfufn ġ-lḥbs ar-d-ifru kullu mad-as-iḍfar.
ġmkan a-ra-iskr baba rbbi n-ignna i-kullu wanna gigun ur-iṣamḥn i-gʷmas s-nnit n-uwl-ns.»
lliġ ikmml yasuɛ ma-ittini i-mddn-an, iffuġ jalil iddu s-tmazirt n-yudaya s-tsga yaḍni n-wasif n-urdun.
ḍfurn-t mddn ggutnin ar-ġin-ijjujji imuḍan.
aškin-d kra n-ifarisin irin a-t-armn, inin-as: «is-iḥlla a-ifru-urgaz i-tmġart-ns f-ssibt nna-dars-illan?»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «is-ur-tġrim f-rbbi mamnk a-ih̬lq bnadm ġ-isizwar? iskr awtm d-tawtmt,
yini fllasn ‹mayad a-f-ra-ifl-urgaz babas d-innas imun d-tmġart-ns. hatnin sin rad-wrrin gn yat ddat.›
ur-sul-gin sin walaynni yat ddat ad-gan. f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, aynna issmun rbbi, a-t-ur-ibḍu bnadm.»
sqsan-t ilmma inin-as: «iġ-iga ġmkad, mah̬ aylliġ yuṣṣa musa f-tbrat l-lfra, a-stt-yara-urgaz ifru i-tmġart-ns?»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «yudj-kʷn musa a-tfrum i-tmġart-nnun ašku qqurn-uwlawn-nnun, walaynni ur-igi ġmkan ġ-isizwar.
rad-awn-iniġ, wanna ifran i-tmġart-ns f-kra yaḍni bla zzna itahl tayyaḍ, hatin izna.»
inin-as imḥḍarn: «iġ-iga ġmkad ġ-gr-urgaz d-tmġart-ns, yuf-as a-ur-akkʷ-itahl.»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «awal-ad, ur-ra-t-irin abla ġwilli mi ifka rbbi a-t-irin.
llan lasbab lli-ur-ra-yadj mddn ad-tahln. kra gisn ilul ġmkan. kra skrn-as mddn ġmkan. kra yagʷi a-itahl ašku ira a-ilhu d-ih̬f-ns ġir s-tgldit n-ignna. wanna iẓḍarn a-iqbl awal-ad, iqbl-t.»
aškin-d kra n-mddn ġ-tasaɛt-an awin-d tarwa mẓẓinin, irin yasuɛ a-n-fllasn-isrs ifassn-ns ibark-tn. nkrn imḥḍarn-ns rarn-tn inin-asn: «a-tn-d-ur-tawim.»
imma yasuɛ inna-yasn: «adjat tarwa mẓẓinin a-d-dari-aškin. a-tn-ur-tḥṣarm, ašku zund ġwid a-mi-tlla-tgldit n-ignna.»
isrs fllasn ifassn-ns. ifl-tn ġakudan iddu s-mani yaḍni.
yašk-id yan-uɛyyal s-dar yasuɛ yini-as: «way-amslmd, man afulki a-rad-skrġ baš ad-ṭṭafġ tudrt l-lih̬rt?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «mah̬ a-yyi-tsqsat f-ufulki? yan waḥdut a-igan afulki. iġ-trit a-tkšmt s-tudrt, skar s-luṣiyat-ns.»
isqsa-t-uɛyyal: «mal-luṣiyat?» yini-as yasuɛ: «‹a-ur-tnġt. a-ur-tznut. a-ur-takʷrt, a-ur-tfkt tugga n-tkrkas.›
‹awi-tt ġ-babak d-innak.› ‹tirit adjar-nnk zund ih̬f-nnk.›»
isawl-uɛyyal yini-as: «mayad ar-t-skarġ kullut. ma-yyi-sul-ih̬ṣṣan?»
yini-as yasuɛ: «iġ-trit a-tgt wad ikmmln, zayd tzznzt kullu mad-dark-illan, tfkt-t i-imẓlaḍ yili-ak-wayda ġ-ignna. taškid-d ilmma tmunt didi.»
lliġ isfld-uɛyyal i-mayad, iddu ṭiyyr-as ašku iggut-wayda-ns.
isawl yasuɛ s-imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, rad-bahra-išqu i-yan dar iggut-wayda a-ikšm s-tgldit n-ignna.
iniġ-awn, ra-irh̬u f-urɛam a-ikšm zġ-tiṭ n-tasmi ula ikšm yan dar ayda iggutn s-tgldit n-rbbi.»
lliġ sfldn imḥḍarn i-mayad, ggʷdn bahra, ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «iġ-iga ġmkad ma-ra-yiẓḍar a-injm?»
issmaqql gisn yasuɛ yini-asn: «ġ-dar bnadm ur-iẓḍar a-yili. imma rbbi, ur-illi kra mi ur-iẓḍar a-t-iskr ntta.»
isawl bṭrus yini-as: «ha-nkkʷni nfl-n kullu ma-darnnġ-illan, našk-id nmun didk. ma-rad-aġ-yili nkkʷni?»

yini-asn yasuɛ: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ġakud lliġ rad-gawrġ nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm f-lɛrš l-lmjd-inu ġ-ddunit l-ljdid, ra-tgawrm ula kunni lli-didi-itmunun f-sin d-mraw l-lɛrš ar-ttḥkamm f-kullu ayt-rbbi.
kullu wanna-n-ifln tigmmi-ns nġd aytmas nġd istmas nġd babas nġd innas nġd tarwa-ns nġd igran-ns f-ssibt-inu, rad-as-yili ma-yugʷrn mayan f-miyya n-twal, iṭṭaf tudrt idumn.
walaynni kigan d-imzwura a-ra-iggʷru, d-kigan d-imggura a-ra-izwur.»
«tagldit n-ignna tga zund yan-urgaz bab n-igr, iffuġ zikk ṣbaḥ a-d-ikru ih̬ddamn i-igr-ns n-waḍil.
imšaška-d d-ih̬ddamn ad-asn-ifk yan-uqarid i-wass, yazn-tn ilmma s-igr-ns.
iffuġ-daġ ġ-tasaɛt tis tẓa, iẓr wiyyaḍ biddn ġ-tasuqt ur-a-skarn yat.
yini-asn: ‹aškad-d th̬dmm ula kunni ġ-igr n-waḍil, rad-awn-fkġ tiġrad nna-yawn-igan.› ddun ula ntni s-igr.
iffuġ-daġ ġ-tasaɛt tis snat d-mrawt, ula ġ-tis kraṭṭ n-tdggʷat, iskr-daġ ġmkan.
ma-d-yad-truḥ tasaɛt tis smmust n-tdggʷat iddu-daġ s-tasuqt, iẓr kra n-mddn sul biddn ġin. yini-asn: ‹mah̬ aylliġ tbiddm ġid ass kullut ur-a-tskarm yat?›
inin-as: ‹ur-aġ-yiwi yan.› yini-asn: ‹wah̬h̬a, aškad-d ula kunni th̬dmm ġ-igr-inu n-waḍil.›
lliġ-n-tḍr tafukt isawl bab n-igr s-ungabal-ns yini-as: ‹ġr-d i-ih̬ddamn tfkt-asn tiġrad-nsn, tbdut zġ-willi ggʷranin ġ-twuri ard tlkmt ġwilli zwarnin.›
ġakudan uškan-d dars imggura lli-ur-kšimnin ar tis smmust n-tdggʷat, ifk i-kraygatt yan gisn yan-uqarid.
aškin-d ilmma ġwilli zwarnin, ġaln is-rad-asn-ifk uggʷar, walaynni ifka-yasn yan-uqarid i-yan zund wiyyaḍ.
bdun ar-tngmugn f-bab n-igr
inin-as: ‹ġwid ggʷranin ur-h̬dimn ġir yat tasaɛt, walaynni tfkit-asn ġunšk lli-aġ-tfkit nkkʷni lli-iklan ar-nkkat tammara ass kullut ġ-tafukt-ad iḥrran.›
irar-asn bab n-igr, yini i-yan gisn: ‹wa-gʷma, ur-ak-ukʷiġ f-yat. is-urd yan-uqarid a-f-d-didi-tmšaškat?
amẓ ma-igan winnk tddut. ašku riġ ad-fkġ i-ġwad iggʷran zund kiyi.
is-ur-izri ad-skarġ mad-riġ s-ma-igan winu? is-tusit tanuwwašt f-ssibt n-mad-skrġ afulki?›»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «ġmkad a-s-rad-zwurn imggura, ggʷrun imzwura.»
imun yasuɛ d-uġaras n-tmdint n-urušalim. yawi sin d-mraw n-umḥḍar-ns waḥdutn, isawl srsn ġ-uġaras yini-asn:
«sfldat, ra-nddu s-urušalim. imma nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, ra-yyi-dḥin s-gr ifassn n-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ. rad-flla-ḥkamn s-lmut,
fkn-iyi i-ibrraniyn a-gigi-tṭnaẓn ssġuršn-iyi agʷln-iyi f-uggjdi ard mmtġ. walaynni ġ-wis kraḍ-uwssan rad-d-nkrġ zġ-lmut.»
tašk-id innas n-tarwa n-zabdi s-dar yasuɛ, nttat d-tarwa-ns s-sin. tknu s-wakal ġ-lgddam-ns tḍalb-t ad-as-ifk kra.
irar-as: «ma-trit ad-am-t-fkġ?» tini-as: «fk i-sin tarwa-yad-inu ad-skiwsn yan f-ufasiy-nnk d-yan f-uẓlmaḍ-nnk ġakud lliġ ra-tkšmt s-tgldit-nnk.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ur-tssinm mayd tḍalbm. is-tẓḍarm a-tsum lkas n-urfufn lli-rad-suġ nkki?» inin-as: «nẓḍar-as.»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «s-ṣṣaḥt, lkas lli-rad-suġ nkki ra-ti-tsum kunni, walaynni askiws f-ufasiy-inu ula f-uẓlmaḍ-inu ur-igi winu baš a-t-fkġ abla i-willi-mi-t-iskr baba rbbi.»
lliġ sfldn mraw yaḍni i-mayd nnan sin aytmatn-an, bzgn fllasn.
imma yasuɛ iġra-yasn-d kullutn yini-asn: «tssnm igldan n-ddunit-ad ar-tḥkamn f-ayt-tmizar-nsn, tissanm inmġurn-nsn ar-tamrn mddn ad-skarn s-iwaliwn-nsn.
imma kunni a-ur-yili ġmkan ġ-gratun. wanna iran a-gigun-yimġur, illa fllas a-ig ah̬ddam-nnun.
d-wanna gigun iran a-izwur, illa fllas a-ig ismg i-wiyyaḍ.
ula nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, ur-d-uškiġ ad-flla-th̬damn mddn. uškiġ-d ad-th̬damġ, fkġ tudrt-inu ad-fukkuġ ma-iggutn.»
zrin ilmma zġ-tmdint n-ariḥa, ḍfurn-t mddn ggutn.
ilin ġin sin ibukaḍn gawrn ġ-tama n-uġaras. lliġ sfldn izd yasuɛ ayd izrin, ar-tġuwwatn ar-ttinin: «wa-yus n-dawd, ḥnnu ginnġ.»
akʷin gisn mddn inin-asn ad-fssan. imma ntni zuydn ar-tġuwwatn s-uggʷar ar-ttinin: «wa-sidi, ḥnnu ginnġ a-yus n-dawd.»
ibidd yasuɛ iġr-asn-d s-dars yini-asn: «ma-tram ad-awn-t-skrġ?»
inin-as: «wa-sidi, a-nisfiw.»
qaman ġ-yasuɛ bahra. iggr i-walln-nsn, isfiwn ġakudan. nkrn ḍfurn-t ġ-uġaras.
akmurn-in s-tmdint n-urušalim. lliġ lkmn awrir n-zzitun ġ-tsga n-bitfaji, yazn yasuɛ sin zġ-imḥḍarn-ns
yini-asn: «zaydat s-uduwwar-an l-lgddam-nnun. ra-n-tafm yat-tġiyyult tqqn nttat d-usnus-ns. fsiyat-asn tawim-tn-d s-dari.
iġ-kʷn-isqsa kra n-yan, tinim-as ‹ira-tn siditnnġ,› ra-kʷn-yadj a-tn-di-tawim.»
ijra kullu mayad baš a-yafu ma-inna rbbi f-ils n-nnabi ġayd izrin inna:
«iniyat i-tmdint n-ayt-rbbi, hay-agllid-nnm yuška-d srm. yudr i-ih̬f-ns, ini f-uġiyyul ula f-usnus n-tġiyyult.»
ddun imḥḍarn skrn ġmklli-s-asn-inna yasuɛ.
awin-d taġiyyult d-usnus, grn-in fllasn islhamn-nsn, ini fllasn yasuɛ.
munn-d mddn ggutnin, ar-sswan islhamn-nsn ġ-uġaras. kra gisn ar-d-itbbi tiṣṭṭwin zġ-isġarn, ar-tnt-sswan ġ-uġaras.

frḥn bahra ġwilli zwarnin i-yasuɛ ġ-uġaras ula ġwilli-as-ggʷranin, ar-talln awal-nsn ar-ttinin: «huṣanna i-yus n-dawd. ambarki a-iga ġwad-d-yuškan s-ism n-sidi rbbi. huṣanna ġ-ignna yattuyn.»
lliġ-n-ilkm yasuɛ urušalim, tqrbl-tmdint kullutt. ar-ssmqsan mddn i-ngratsn: «ma-iga ġwad?»
sawln-d kullu willi dids munnin ar-ttinin: «ġwad iga nnabi yasuɛ gu-naṣira ġ-jalil.»
ikšm yasuɛ s-tgmmi n-rbbi, inkr ar-zgis-iṭṭay ġwilli gis zznzanin ar-gis-saġn. igllb lmyadi n-willi tṣrrafnin iqaridn, igllb lkʷrasa n-willi zznzanin itbirn.
yini-asn: «han ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi ‹tigmmi-nu rad-as-ttinim tigmmi n-tẓallit.› imma kunni, hati trurm-tt tga ifri n-imh̬h̬arn.»
aškin-d dars ibukaḍn d-ikušamn ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ijjujji-tn.
imma inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, ṭiyyr-asn bahra lliġ ẓran lmɛjizat lli-iskr, ẓrn tarwa mẓẓinin ar-talln awal-nsn ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi ar-ttinin: «huṣanna i-yus n-dawd.»
sawln ilmma s-yasuɛ inin-as: «is-ur-tsfldt i-mayd ttinin mddn-ad?» irar-asn yasuɛ: «sfldġ-asn. imma kunni is-ur-tġrim arra n-rbbi lli-innan ‹tfkit i-iḥšmay d-wazzann a-ki-talġn s-nniyt d-lḥqq›?»
ifl-tn ġakudan iffuġ tamdint, iddu s-uduwwar n-bitɛanya ins ġin.
zikk ṣbaḥ iwrri-d yasuɛ s-tmdint, yaġ-t laẓ.
iẓr-n yat tazart ġ-tama n-uġaras, iftu srs walaynni ur-n-gis-yufi ġir ifrawn. yini-as: «zayd a-ur-sar-gim-tili lġllt.» tiqar tazart ġakudan.
lliġ ẓran imḥḍarn-ns mayan, iḍr-asn lɛjb inin: «mamnk a-s-tqqur tazart-ad ḥayna?»

isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, iġ-tumnm bla tškkam ra-tskrm zund mad-skrġ i-tazart-ad, rad-nnit-tskarm uggʷar n-mayad. iġ-tnnam i-uwrir-ad ‹itti zġ-ġid tḍrt-n ġ-umda› rad-as-yili mad-as-tnnam.
ġakud nna-ttẓallam rad-awn-yili kullu ma-tḍalbm iġ-nnit-tumnm.»
ikšm-daġ yasuɛ s-tgmmi n-rbbi ar-gis-isslmad. aškin-d inmġurn d-imġarn n-tmazirt-an sqsan-t: «ma-k-id-yuznn a-tskart kullu ġayad? awal n-mi ayd-s-a-ti-tskart?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ula nkki ra-kʷn-sqsaġ yan-usqsi. rarat-iyi-d iniġ-awn ma-yyi-d-yuznn ad-skarġ mayad.
yuḥanna, ma-t-id-yuznn a-issddam mddn? izd rbbi nġd bnadm?» bdun ntni ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn ar-ttinin: «iġ-nenna ‹rbbi a-t-id-yuznn› rad-aġ-yini ‹mah̬ aylliġ ur-tuminm mad-awn-inna?›
walaynni iġ-nenna ‹bnadm a-t-id-yuznn› ra-niksaḍ zġ-mddn-an ggutnin, ašku ar-kullu-ttinin izd yuḥanna yan-nnabi a-iga.»
sawln ilmma inin-as: «ur-nssin ma-t-id-yuznn.» irar-asn yasuɛ: «ula nkki ur-rad-awn-iniġ ma-yyi-d-yuznn ad-skarġ kullu mayad.»
izayd yini-asn: «ma-ra-tinim? ha-yan-urgaz, dars sin tarwa. iftu dar-umzwaru yini-as: ‹zayd a-iwi, th̬dmt ġassad ġ-igr n-waḍil.›
imma ntta irur-as: ‹ur-riġ.› ik imikk tʷgraẓ-t f-wawal-an iddu ih̬dm.
iftu-urgaz ilmma dar wis sin tarwa-ns, yini-as ġmklli inna i-umzwaru. irar-as yus-lli wis sin: ‹ha-yyi ddiġ a-sidi,› walaynni ur-iddi.»
isqsa-tn yasuɛ: «manwa ġ-sin-ad a-iskrn ma-ira babas?» inin-as: «amzwaru.» irar-asn yasuɛ: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ar-kʷn-zggurunt-tmgganin d-ayt-nkkas s-tgldit n-rbbi.
yuška-d darun yuḥanna iml-awn aġaras n-ufulki, ur-ti-tuminm. imma ayt-nkkas d-tmgganin, ntni umnn yuḥanna. tẓrm-tn ar-ti-tamnn, sul ur-trim a-ti-tamnm kunni twrrim-d s-uġaras.»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «sfldat i-yat lmɛna yaḍni. ha-yan-urgaz iẓẓa aḍil ġ-igr-ns, isslulli-as ifrig iġza agʷḍi i-lmɛṣṣrt ibnu yal-lbrj, ifl-t i-ih̬ʷmmaṣn iftu imuddu.
lliġ-d-iruḥ-uzmz l-lġllt, yazn kra n-ih̬ddamn-ns s-dar ih̬ʷmmaṣn ad-as-d-awin ma-t-id-yuškan ġ-lġllt.
walaynni ih̬ʷmmaṣn ġwin ih̬ddamn-an, ssġuršn yan gisn, nġn yan, utn yan s-iẓran.
yazn-asn ilmma kra n-ih̬ddamn yaḍni uggʷar n-willi zwarnin, skrn-asn ula ntni ġmklli skrn i-imzwura.
ġ-isiggʷra yazn-asn yus, yini d-ih̬f-ns ‹rad-uqqrn iwi.›
walaynni ih̬ʷmmaṣn-an, lliġ ẓran yus mšawarn i-ngratsn inin ‹ġwad a-ra-iwrt igr. aškad-d a-t-nnġ ig lwrt winnġ.›
ġwin-t luḥn-t-in s-brra n-igr nġn-t.»
isqsa-tn yasuɛ: «ma-ra-iskr bab n-igr i-ih̬ʷmmaṣn-an ġakud nna-d-iwrri.»
inin-as: «ra-ihlk mddn-an ʷh̬šnnin s-yat lmut yʷh̬šnn, ifk igr i-ih̬ʷmmaṣn yaḍni lli-rad-as-yakka lġllt ġ-uzmz-ns.»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «is-ur-tġrim ma-ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi? ‹aẓru lli-n-luḥn ibnnayn, nttan a-iwrrin iga ih̬f n-uġẓu. mayad, sidi rbbi a-t-iskrn. nẓra-t ar-gis-ntɛjjab.›
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, ra-kʷn-issufġ rbbi zġ-tgldit-ns, ifk-tt i-mddn yaḍni lli-ra-yakka lġllt-ns.
imma aẓru-ad, wanna fllas iḍrn ra-irẓ, d-wanna-f-iḍr ra-t-ilbj d-wakal.»
lliġ sfldn inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-ifarisin i-lmɛni-ad, issann izd fllasn a-f-isawl yasuɛ.
irin a-t-amẓn walaynni ksuḍn zġ-mddn, ašku ar-kullu-ttinin izd yan-nnabi a-iga.
isawl-daġ yasuɛ s-lmɛni yini-asn:
«tagldit n-ignna tga zund yan-ugllid iskr tamġra i-yus.
yazn ih̬ddamn-ns ad-d-ġrn i-willi tyawɛraḍnin, imma ntni ur-rin ad-d-aškin s-tmġra.
yazn ilmma kra n-ih̬ddamn yaḍni yuṣṣa-tn ad-inin i-willi tyawɛraḍnin ‹ha-tirmt tujad, ġrsġ i-imugayn ula i-igayzn ḍninin. yujad kullu, aškad-d s-tmġra.›
imma ntni rẓmn i-ih̬f-nsn ur-d-uškin, iddu kra s-igran-ns, iddu kra s-twuri-ns,
nkrn wiyyaḍ amẓn ih̬ddamn-an ssrfufnn-tn nġn-tn.
ṭiyyr-as i-ugllid bahra, yazn imh̬zniyn-ns hlkn imnġan-an, jdrn tamdint-nsn.
yini ilmma i-ih̬ddamn-ns ‹tamġra tujad, walaynni ur-tt-sthllan ġwilli mi ɛrḍġ.
zaydat ġilad s-iswak, tɛrḍm i-kullu wanna-n-tufam, tawim-tn-d s-tmġra.›
ġakudan ffuġn ih̬ddamn s-tswak ssmunn-d kullu ma-n-ufan, gn-iyt wid ʷh̬šnnin ula wid šwanin, aylliġ tɛmmr-tgmmi n-tmġra s-inbgiwn.
ikka ma-ikka, ikšm-ugllid a-issmaqql ayt-tmġra, s-n-iẓra yan-urgaz ġ-gratsn ur-ilsi timlsit n-tmġra.
isqsa-t-ugllid: ‹wa-gu-darnnġ, mamnk a-di-tkšmt s-ġid bla timlsit n-tmġra?› imma ntta ġir ifssa.
yini-ugllid i-ih̬ddamn-ns ‹krfat-t zġ-ifassn ula iḍarn, tluḥm-t-in ġ-tillas aggugnin. ġin a-ġ-rad-allan ar-tgẓaẓn uh̬san-nsn.›
han iggut ma-mi-iɛrḍ rbbi, yidrus ma-iẓli ad-gn wins.»
ddun ilmma ifarisin ar-tmšawarn i-ngratsn f-mamnk a-rad-ssmuttln yasuɛ f-wawal-ns.

aznn-d dars kra n-mddn-nsn d-kra n-imddukkʷal n-ugllid hirudus inin-as: «way-amslmd, nssn izd lḥqq ayd ttinit, ar-tsslmadt aġaras n-rbbi ġmklli iga. ur-a-tskart f-mad-swingimn mddn, ašku ur-a-ttmnadt udmawn n-mddn.
imma ġilad ma-ra-tinit? is-iḥlla a-nakka ḍabiyt i-qayṣr nġd uhu?»
imma yasuɛ issn tanuwwašt lli-gisn-illan, yini-asn: «wa-id-bu-sin-uwdmawn, mah̬ a-yyi-ttarmm?
mlat-iyi-d yan-uqarid n-ḍabiyt.» fkn-as-d yan-uqarid.
yini-asn: «win-mit a-iga-uwdm-ad d-ism-ad gis illan?»
inin-as: «win qayṣr.» irar-asn yasuɛ: «fkat i-qayṣr ma-igan win qayṣr, tfkm i-rbbi ma-igan win rbbi.»
lliġ sfldn i-mayad ar-gis-tɛjjabn, ddun fln-t.
aškin-d dars ġassan kra n-iṣadduqin. ntni ġ-lmdhb-nsn ar-ttinin «ur-illi ma-ra-d-inkr zġ-lmut.» sqsan-t:
«way-amslmd, inna musa ‹iġ-immut kra n-yan ifl-d tamġart-ns bla tarwa, illa f-gʷmas n-urgaz-an a-stt-itahl a-dids-iskr tarwa f-ism n-gʷmas lli-immutn.›
llan darnnġ ssa n-aytmatn. yiwi-umzwaru tamġart immt bla tarwa, ifl tamġart-ns i-gʷmas.
immt wis sin bla tarwa ula ntta d-wis kraḍ, aylliġ-tt-iwin kullutn s-ssa ur-d-filn tarwa.
ġ-isiggʷra tmmt-tmġart.
ini-aġ ġilad, ġ-tnkra lli-ġ-rad-nkrn kullutn, tamġart n-manwa ġ-ssa-yad a-ra-tg? hatti tkka-ttin tga tamġart-nsn kullutn.»
