aylliġ-tt-iwin kullutn s-ssa ur-d-filn tarwa. ġ-isiggʷra tmmt-tmġart ula nttat.
ini-aġ, ġ-tnkra lli-ġ-rad-nkrn kullutn, tamġart n-manwa gisn a-ra-tg? hatti tkka-ttin tga tamġart-nsn s-ssa.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «is-urd ġayad a-f-tjlam? ašku ur-tssinm arratn n-rbbi ula tssnm taẓḍḍart n-rbbi.
ġakud lliġ rad-nkrn ġwilli mmutnin ur-ra-tahaln ula-da-tahalnt, walaynni zund lmalayka n-ignna a-rad-gn.
imma tankra n-willi mmutnin, is-ur-fllas-tġrim ġ-warra n-musa, lliġ illa ġ-tama n-tzggʷart? rbbi isawl srs yini-as ‹nkki giġ rbbi n-ibrahim gġ rbbi n-isḥaq gġ rbbi n-yaɛqub.›
awal-an imla-yaġ is-ddrn ntni ġ-lgddam n-rbbi, wah̬h̬a mmutn. han kunni tjlam bahra.»
yašk-id yan-umslmd n-ššrɛ isfld-asn ar-tmjaḥadn. lliġ iẓra mamnk a-tn-irur yasuɛ s-lmɛqul, isqsa-t: «mal-luṣit a-kullu-ihiyyan ġ-luṣiyat n-rbbi?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «luṣit ihiyyan a-stt-igan ‹sfldat, ay-ayt-rbbi. rbbi siditnnġ, nttan waḥdut a-igan rbbi.
a-ttirit rbbi sidik zġ-ttmi n-ih̬f-nnk d-ttmi n-uwl-nnk d-ttmi l-lɛaql-nnk d-ttmi n-tẓḍḍart-nnk.›
tis snat a-stt-igan ‹a-ttirit adjar-nnk zund ih̬f-nnk.› ur-tlli kra l-luṣit yugʷrn snat-ad.»
yini-as-umslmd n-ššrɛ: «ifulki ay-amslmd. s-lḥqq a-s-tnnit rbbi iga waḥdut, ur-illi abla ntta.
iġ-t-ira yan zġ-ttmi n-ih̬f-ns d-ttmi l-lfhmt-ns d-ttmi n-tẓḍḍart-ns, yiri adjar-ns zund ih̬f-ns, mayad yuf kullu tiġrsiw lli-jddrn mddn ula tiwafkiw lli-akkan i-rbbi.»
lliġ iẓra yasuɛ izd s-lmɛqul a-s-d-isawl yini-as: «ur-n-taggugt kiyi f-tgldit n-rbbi.» ġakudan ur-sul-izɛm yan a-t-isqsa.
ar-isslmad yasuɛ ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, isqsa mddn: «mah̬ aylliġ a-ttinin imslmdn n-ššrɛ ‹ra-ig lmasiḥ yan zġ-tasut n-ugllid dawd›?
imma dawd, lliġ-t-iguwwd rruḥ lqudus a-isawl f-lmasiḥ inna ‹ha-sidi rbbi inna i-sidi, skiws f-ufasiy-inu ard gġ inuwwašn-nnk ġ-ddu iḍarn-nnk.›
ha-dawd s-ih̬f-ns ibdr ġwalli igan lmasiḥ, ig-t d-sidis. mamnk a-ra-ig ġir yan zġ-tasut-ns?» ar-as-sflidn mddn ggutnin, frḥn s-kullu mad-asn-inna.
ar-tn-isslmad yini-asn: «rarat lɛaql-nnun zġ-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, ašku iɛzza darsn ad-fttun s-tmlsa ġzzifnin šwanin, iɛzzu darsn a-fllasn-tsllamn mddn ġ-laswaq,
iɛzzu darsn ad-zggurun s-lgddam ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ula ġ-uskiws n-imnsiwn.
ar-šttan tigʷmma n-thjjalin, ar-ssiġzzifn tiẓulla-nsn baš ad-ssbayynn ih̬fawn-nsn is-fulkin. ntni ra-fllasn-ittut lḥukm n-rbbi s-uggʷar.»
igawr yasuɛ ġ-umnid n-ṣṣnduq ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ar-itmnad ġ-mddn ar-n-srasn iqaridn ġ-ṣṣnduq. kigan d-id-bu-wayda ar-n-srasn ma-iggutn.
tašk-id yat-thjjalt tga tamẓluṭṭ, tsrs-n snat-tqaridin idrus-watig-nsnt.
iġr yasuɛ i-imḥḍarn-ns s-dars yini-asn: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, tahjjalt-ad tamẓluṭṭ, hatti tsrs-n ġ-ṣṣnduq uggʷar n-ġwid kullutn,
ašku ntni fkan zġ-maylli darsn iggutn, imma nttat, wah̬h̬a tḥtajja, tsrs-n kullu ma-dars-illan, tfk lmɛišt-ns kullutt.»
lliġ-d-iffuġ yasuɛ zġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, yini-as yan zġ-imḥḍarn-ns: «ẓr ay-amslmd, matta ġmkad mqqurn iẓran-ad. matta ġmkad dusn fulkin iġurban-ad.»
imma yasuɛ inna-yas: «is-a-ttmnadt ġ-iġurban-ad mqqurnin? rad-kullu-tyawgarn s-wakal. ur-ra-gisn-iqama-uẓru f-uẓru.»
lliġ iskiws yasuɛ ġ-uwrir n-zzitun ġ-umnid n-tgmmi n-rbbi, isqsa-t bṭrus d-yaɛqub d-yuḥanna d-andraws ntni waḥdutn,
inin-as: «managu a-ra-yili ġayd-s-tnnit? ma-ra-ig tamatart n-is-d-yakmur a-ijru kullu ġayad?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun a-kʷn-ur-ijlu yan.
ašku ggutn ġwilli ra-d-yašk asin-d ism-inu, kud yan ar-ittini izd nttan a-igan lmasiḥ. ntni rad-jllun mddn ggutnin.
iġ-tsfldm f-imaġn ula lh̬barat n-imaġn ad-ur-tġuwḍm, ašku iqqan-d a-yili ġayan, walaynni ur-ta-d-iruḥ isiggʷra.
ra-di-tnkr-tqbilt s-tqbilt tnkr-d-tgldit s-tgldit, ilint zznzalat ġ-kra n-tmizar yili-uġni. walaynni ġayad iga ġir azbbar amzwaru n-tlalit.
«awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun. ra-kʷn-dḥayn s-lmḥkamat, ssġuršn-kʷn ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit. ra-tbddadm f-ssibt-inu ġ-lgddam l-lḥukkam d-igldan ad-asn-takkam tugga flla.
iqqan-d a-truḥ-tbrraḥt l-lh̬bar ifulkin kullu timizar n-ddunit ur-ta-d-ilkim isiggʷra.
iġ-kʷn-umẓn dḥin-kʷn-in, ad-ur-tasim taġuft f-ma-ra-tinim. iniyat awal nna-yawn-imla rbbi ġ-tasaɛt-an, ašku urd kunni a-isawaln walaynni rruḥ lqudus n-rbbi.
ra-yili ma-ra-n-idḥi gʷmas i-lmut, yili ma-ra-n-idḥi yus, nkrn-d tarwa f-ayt-darsn nġn-tn.
ra-kʷn-tkrhun kullu mddn f-ssibt n-ma-tgam winu. imma wanna ibiddn izga ar isiggʷra ra-injm.
«ra-tẓrm tajlh̬it lli-ifnnun tnkr ġ-illiġ ur-dars lḥqq a-gis-tili. wanna yaqran, illa fllas a-yissan lmɛna. ġakudan winna llanin ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya iqqan-tn-d ad-rwln s-idrarn.
wanna illan f-iggi n-tgmmi iqqan-t-id ad-ur-ikšm a-d-yasi kra.
wanna-n-illan ġ-igran iqqan-t-id a-ur-iwrri tiġurdin a-d-yawi timlsit-ns.
rad-bahra-šqun-uwssan-an f-tilli gisn rbbunin ula tilli gisn ssngaynin.
ḍalbat i-rbbi ad-ur-ijru ġayan ġ-tgrst
ašku ġ-uwssan-an ra-tili-tnukmut, ur-jju-tlli zund nttat zġ-isizwar ġ-ih̬lq rbbi ddunit sul s-ġilad, ula rad-daġ-tili zund nttat.
mrad is-ur-issidrus siditun ussan-an ur-ra-injm yan. walaynni f-ssibt n-willi iẓli ad-gn wins, hati issidrus ussan-an f-ssibt-nsn.
«ġakudan iġ-awn-inna kra n-yan ‹ha-lmasiḥ illa ġid› nġd ‹hatin illa ġin› a-t-ur-tamnm.
ašku rad-d-nkrn kra n-mddn, kud yan ar-ittini f-ih̬f-ns izd lmasiḥ a-iga nġd kra n-nnabi, walaynni ar-sskirkisn. rad-skarn timitar d-lmɛjizat iġ-ufan ad-jllun ula ġwilli ganin win rbbi.
imma kunni, awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun. nniġ-awn kullu ġayad ur-ta-ijri.
«ġ-uwssan-an ġ-tġurdin n-tnukmut-an, ra-tllas tafukt, ur-ra-ifaw-wayyur.
rad-ṭṭarn itran zġ-ignwan, ar-tyattaynt tifawin n-ignwan.
ġakudan a-ra-yyi-ẓrn, nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, ftiġ-d ġ-imdla s-lquwwa d-lmjd iggutn.
ġakudan rad-aznġ lmalayka ad-ssmunn ġwilli ganin winu zġ-kraygatt tasga, zġ-ttmi n-wakal ar ttmi n-ignwan.
«hati tazart a-zġ-ra-tissanm lmɛna. iġ-lggʷiġnt-tṣṭṭwin-ns tssufġ-d tifrawin-ns, tissanm is-d-yakmur ṣṣif.
ġmkan a-ra-yili. iġ-tẓram timitar-ad s-awn-nniġ ar-jrrunt, tissanm is-d-yakmur, hatin ġ-imi.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ur-ra-tzri-tasut-ad ard kullu ijru mayad.
rad-ittin ignwan d-wakal walaynni ur-sar-ittin iwaliwn-inu.
«walaynni ass-an ula tasaɛt-an ur-tn-issin yan, la lmalayka n-ignna ula yus n-bnadm. ġir baba lli-illan ġ-ignna, nttan waḥdut a-issnn.
rarat lɛaql-nnun tḍufm ašku ur-tssinm managu a-ra-d-iruḥ-uzmz-an.
zund yan-urgaz imudda ifl tigmmi i-ih̬ddamn-ns a-stt-gabln, ifk i-kraygatt yan tawuri-ns. yuṣṣa angabal n-imi a-iḍuf.
ḍufat ula kunni, ašku ur-tssinm managu a-ra-d-yašk bu-tgmmi, izd ġ-tdggʷat nġd ammas n-iyḍ nġd awddan amzwaru n-ufullus nġd tawaġla n-tafukt.
ḍufat a-ur-d-yašk ġ-kra n-tasaɛt lli-ur-tġalm yaf-kʷn-d tgnm.
mayd-awn-nniġ, ra-t-iniġ i-kullu mddn: ḍufat.»
sin-uwssan a-iqaman i-lɛid n-usurf d-uwssan n-urh̬ṣiṣ. ar-siggiln inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ mamnk a-rad-amẓn yasuɛ s-lḥilt a-t-nġn.
walaynni nnan i-ngratsn: «urd ġ-uwssan l-lɛid baš a-ur-duyn mddn.»

illa yasuɛ ġ-uduwwar n-bitɛanya, iskiws ar-ištta ġ-tgmmi n-simɛan lli-sttin-ikkan iga anjdam. tkšm-d dars yat-tmġart tusi-d yat-tbuqqalt n-uẓru tili-gis-tujjut n-nardin iṣfan, iggut-bahra-watig-ns. trẓ imi n-tbuqqalt tffi-tt-id f-ih̬f n-yasuɛ.
imma ġwilli llanin ġin, kra gisn ibzg fllas inin i-ngratsn: «mah̬ a-tjla tujjut-ad?
mrad is-tnza ra-di-tawi uggʷar n-kraḍ id-miyya n-nnuqrt, nfk-tn i-imẓlaḍ.» bdun ar-fllas-ssngmugn.
imma yasuɛ inna-yasn: «adjat-stt. mah̬ aylliġ dids tšqam? hatti tskr gigi afulki.
imẓlaḍ rad-bdda-didun-ilin. ġakud nna-tram ra-tafm ma-s-a-gisn-tskarm lh̬ir. imma nkki ur-rad-bdda-didun-iliġ.
hatti tskr maylli mi tufa. nttat tzwar tẓġur ddat-inu i-umḍḍal.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, innaġ a-tbrraḥn mddn s-lh̬bar-ad ifulkin ġ-kullu ddunit, ra-ttinin f-mayd tskr h̬tad, ar-tt-id-srs-kttin.»
ġakudan inkr yahuda ish̬aryuṭ lli-igan yan zġ-sin d-mraw n-umḥḍar, iddu s-dar inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi baš ad-asn-izznz yasuɛ.
lliġ sfldn i-mad-asn-inna, frḥn inin-as ad-as-fkn iqaridn. iwrri ar-iswingim mamnk a-ra-tn-iɛawn ad-amẓn yasuɛ.
ilkm-d-wass amzwaru n-uwssan n-urh̬ṣiṣ lli-ġ-a-qqrsn mddn i-ilqqaġn. sqsan-t imḥḍarn-ns: «mani trit a-srs-nddu ad-ak-n-gis-njjujad imnsi l-lɛid n-usurf?»
yazn sin zġ-imḥḍarn-ns ġakudan, yini-asn: «zaydat s-tmdint. ra-tmnaggarm yan-urgaz yusi-d agdur n-waman.
ḍfurat-t s-tgmmi nna-s-ikšm, tinim i-bu-tgmmi-an ‹hati inna-yak-d-umslmd, maniġ illa-uḥanu lli-ġ-rad-ššġ imnsi n-usurf nkki d-imḥḍarn-inu?›
rad-awn-iml yan-uḥanu n-uflla imqqurn iswan ingaddan. ġin a-ġ-rad-aġ-tjjujadm.»
ffuġn imḥḍarn, ddun s-tmdint afn-in ġmklli-asn-inna. jjujadn imnsi n-usurf.
truḥ-d-tdggʷat, ilkm yasuɛ tigmmi ntta d-imḥḍarn-ns s-sin d-mraw.
lliġ skiwsn ar-šttan yini-asn: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ra-yyi-izznz yan ġ-gratun, kunni lli-didi-šttanin.»
ṭiyyr-asn bahra, bdun ar-t-sqsan kullutn, kud yan ar-ittini: «yak, urd nkki?»
yini-asn: «iga yan zġ-sin d-mraw lli-didi-dranin ġ-uruku-ad.
ha-yus n-bnadm ra-immt ġmklli fllas ityaran, walaynni taguḍi a-ra-yili i-urgaz lli-izznzan yus n-bnadm. yuf-as i-urgaz-an mrad is-ur-akkʷ-ilul.»
lliġ a-šttan yasi yasuɛ tangult, iškr rbbi ibbi-tt, ifk-asn-tt yini-asn: «amẓat. h̬tad tga ddat-inu.»
yasi lkas, iškr rbbi ifk-asn-t. sun zġ-gis kullutn.
yini-asn: «ġwid gan idammn-inu lli-ra-iffi f-ssibt n-mddn ggutnin baš ad-gn lɛhd l-ljdid ġ-gratun d-rbbi.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ur-sul-rad-suġ zġ-lġllt n-waḍil ar ass lli-ġ-ra-t-suġ zġ-ljdid ġ-tgldit n-rbbi.»
asin ilmma yan-umarg zġ-imurign n-rbbi, ffuġn s-uwrir n-zzitun.
yini-asn yasuɛ: «ha-kunni ra-yyi-kullu-tflm, ašku ityara ‹rad-utġ amksa, mzrnt-uwlli.›
walaynni tigira n-ma-d-nkrġ zġ-lmut ra-kʷn-zwurġ s-tmazirt n-jalil.»
isawl bṭrus yini-as: «wah̬h̬a-k-kullu-fln ur-sar-k-filġ nkki.»
imma yasuɛ irur-as: «lḥqq a-rad-ak-iniġ, ġ-iḍ-ad ur-ra-iġr-ufullus snat-twal ard tinit kraṭṭ-twal ur-iyi-tssint.»
imma ntta inna-yas s-jjhd: «wah̬h̬a rad-didk-mmtġ ur-rad-iniġ ur-k-ssinġ.» ġmkad ad-nnan kullutn.
aškin-d s-yan-udġar lli-mi-ttinin ‹gatsimani›. yini yasuɛ i-imḥḍarn-ns: «gawrat ġid, rad-ẓẓallġ.»
yawi dids bṭrus d-yaɛqub d-yuḥanna. iġuwḍ yasuɛ ġ-tasaɛt-an, mmaġn iswingimn bahra ġ-uwl-ns.
yini-asn: «tẓẓay flla taġuft-ad ar lmut. gawrat ġid tawzm.»
izayd iftu yan imikk iḍr s-wakal iẓẓall yini: «ssitti flla tasaɛt-ad n-urfufn iġ-tẓḍar a-titti.»
iẓẓall-daġ yini: «abba wa-baba, ur-illi kra mi ur-tẓḍart a-ti-tskrt. kkis flla lkas-ad n-urfufn, walaynni a-yili ma-trit, urd mad-riġ nkki.»
iwrri yasuɛ yaf-tn-in ṭṭasn. isawl s-bṭrus yini-as: «wa-simɛan, is-teṭṭast? is-ur-tẓḍart a-tawzt yat tasaɛt?
awzat tḍalbm rbbi a-kʷn-issanf i-kullu ma-ra-kʷn-ijllu. hati ul n-bnadm ar-ittiri a-iskar afulki, imma ddat-ns tḍɛf.»
iddu-daġ a-iẓẓall yini ġmklli inna tawala tamzwarut.
iwrri yaf-tn-in ṭṭasn, inra-tn iṭs. ur-ssinn ma-rad-as-inin.
iwrri tis kraṭṭ-twal yini-asn: «ṭṭasat ġila tsunfum. yuwda ġunškad, tlkm-d tasaɛt. inza yus n-bnadm s-gr ifassn n-mddn ʷh̬šnnin.
nkrat a-nddu. ha-walli-yyi-izznzan yuška-d.»
sul a-isawal s-d-iruḥ yahuda lli-igan yan zġ-sin d-mraw n-umḥḍar. munn-d dids kigan d-mddn asin-d lkmami d-iɛmad. uznn-tn-d inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-imġarn n-tmazirt-an.
ġwalli izznzan yasuɛ imla-yasn-yad tamatart-ad, yini-asn: «wanna ssudnġ, ġwan a-t-igan. amẓat-t tawim-t tḍufm-t.»
yašk-id yahuda iftu s-dar yasuɛ yini-as: «way-amslmd», issudn-t.
grn-in fllas ifassn amẓn-t.
inkr ilmma yan zġ-willi llanin d-yasuɛ ildi-d lkummit, yut ah̬ddam n-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi ibbi-as amẓẓuġ.
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ma-s-di-tffuġm s-lkmami d-iɛmad a-yyi-tġwim zund iġ-giġ amh̬h̬ar?
lliġ-n-bdda didun kraygatt ass ar-sslmadġ ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ur-iyi-tumẓm ġ-uwssan-an. walaynni ijra ġmkad baš a-yafu ma-ityaran ġ-warratn n-rbbi.»
ġakudan rwln kullu imḥḍarn, fln yasuɛ.
iḍfur-t-sul yan-uɛyyal ur-ilsi ġir aḥayk.
ġwin-t mddn-an, imma ntta ifl aḥayk irwl ur-ilsi yat.
awin yasuɛ s-dar-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi, munn-d inmġurn kullutn d-imġarn n-tmazirt d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ.
imma bṭrus iḍfar-t zġ-tuggugt, ikšm s-wammas n-tgmmi n-unmġur, iskiws d-imh̬zniyn ġ-dar lɛafit ar-didsn-irqqa.
imma inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn l-lmḥkama kullutn ar-siggiln s-tugga f-yasuɛ baš a-t-nġn, walaynni ur-ufin yat.
kigan d-mddn ar-fllas-akkan tugga n-tkrkas, walaynni ur-ngaddant tugga-nsn.
inkr kra gisn ar-sskirkisn inin:
«nkkʷni nsfld-as inna ‹nkki rad-h̬luġ tigmmi-ad n-rbbi ityawskarn s-ifassn n-bnadm, bnuġ ġ-kraḍ-uwssan yat yaḍni ur-ityawskarn s-ifassn n-bnadm.›»
ula ġmkad-daġ, ur-ngaddant tugga-nsn.
ibidd-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi ġ-wammas-nsn, isqsa yasuɛ: «is-ur-ra-d-fllasn-trart s-yat? mayd-fllak-ttinin ġwid ġ-tugga-nsn?»
imma yasuɛ ġir ifssa, ur-inni yat. isqsa-t-daġ-unmġur: «izd kiyi a-igan lmasiḥ yus n-umbarki?»
yini-as yasuɛ: «nkki a-t-igan. ra-tẓrm yus n-bnadm iskiws f-ufasi n-rbbi itjhhdn, iftu-d ġ-imdla n-ignwan.»
lliġ-as-isfld-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi, ibbi timlsa-ns yini-asn: «ma-sul-nra inagan-ad?
kunni tsfldm i-wawal-ns l-lkufr. ma-fllas-tnnam?» ḥkamn fllas kullutn inin: «iqqan-t-id a-immt.»
inkr kra gisn ar-fllas-ssufusn ar-as-daln udm ar-t-kkatn s-ibariqn ar-as-ttinin: «wa-nnabi, ml-aġ manwa-k-yutn.» amẓn-t imh̬zniyn ar-t-kkatn.
imma bṭrus illa-sul ġ-iyzdar ġ-wammas n-tgmmi. tašk-id yat-th̬ddamt n-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi
tẓr bṭrus ar-irqqa, tssmaqql gis tini-as: «ula kiyi tllit d-yasuɛ gu-naṣira.»
irar-as nttan: «ur-ssinġ, ur-fhimġ ma-s-tnnit.» iffuġ s-uġgʷmmi. iġr-ufullus ġakudan.
tẓr-t-daġ-th̬ddamt-lli, tini fllas i-willi biddnin ġin: «ġwad iga yan zġ-gisn.»
irar-daġ bṭrus: «uhu.» yan imikk s-as-nnan ġwilli biddnin ġin: «s-ṣṣaḥt tgit kiyi zġ-gisn ašku gu-jalil a-tgit.»
inkr bṭrus ar-itgalla ar-ittini s-jjhd: «nkki ur-ssinġ argaz-ad f-a-tsawalm.»
iġr-ufullus ġakudan tis snat-twal. ikti-d bṭrus maylli-s-as-inna yasuɛ «ur-ra-iġr-ufullus snat-twal ard tinit kraṭṭ-twal ur-iyi-tssint.» iswangm-d awal-an ar-yalla.

lliġ ifaw zzman munn-d inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn n-tmazirt d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, ntni d-imġarn l-lmḥkama kullutn, mšawarn f-ma-rad-skrn. krfn yasuɛ awin-t dḥin-t-in i-bilaṭus lḥakm n-rruman.
isqsa-t bilaṭus: «is-tgit agllid n-ayt-yudaya?» irar-as yasuɛ: «kiyi a-t-innan.»
nkrn inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi ar-srs-taštkkan s-kigan d-tġawsiwin.
yini-as bilaṭus: «is-ur-ra-di-trart s-yat? ẓr mnnawt-tġawsiwin ayd-fllak-ttinin.»
imma yasuɛ ur-inni yat aylliġ itɛjjb bilaṭus.
ikka-ttin lḥakm ġ-kraygatt lɛid n-usurf ar-asn-gis-irẓẓm i-yan-uḥbbas nna-ran.
illa yan ġ-lḥbs ġ-uwssan-an, ism-ns barabbas. ityamaẓ ntta d-wiyyaḍ lliġ ssnkrn uduy f-ssulṭa n-rruman, nġn kra n-mddn.
munn-d mddn ggutnin ar-tḍalabn bilaṭus ad-asn-iskr ġmklli-bdda-iskar ġ-lɛid.
isqsa-tn bilaṭus: «is-tram ad-awn-rẓmġ i-ugllid n-ayt-yudaya?»
ašku bilaṭus issn inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi is-ḥsadn yasuɛ, ġayan ka-f-t-id-dḥin.
walaynni inmġurn sshiyysn mddn ġ-tasaɛt-an baš a-t-ḍalbn ad-asn-d-irẓm i-barabbas.
yini-asn bilaṭus: «ma-tram a-t-skrġ i-ġwad mi ttinim agllid n-ayt-yudaya?»
rarn-as ar-ssġuyyun: «agʷl-t f-uggjdi.»
isqsa-tn bilaṭus: «mah̬? ma-iskr yʷh̬šnn?» imma ntni ar-ssġuyyun s-uggʷar ar-ttinin: «agʷl-t f-uggjdi a-immt.»
bilaṭus ira a-irḍu mddn, irẓm-asn i-barabbas, imma yasuɛ, issġurš-t issufġ-t a-immt f-uggjdi.
awin-t iɛskrin s-ṭuẓẓunt n-tgmmi imqqurn lli-mi-ttinin lqṣr, ssmunn-d kullu lɛskr lli-illan ġin.
sslsn-as yan-uslham iẓggʷaġn, skrn yan-ttaj zġ-uzggʷar gn-as-t f-ih̬f.
ar-fllas-tsllamn ar-ttinin: «sslam fllak ay-agllid n-ayt-yudaya.»
ar-t-kkatn f-ih̬f s-yat-tġanimt ar-fllas-ssufusn ar-ṭṭarn f-ifaddn-nsn ġ-lgddam-ns.
lliġ gis šbɛan taḍṣa, kkisn-as aslham aẓggʷaġ sslsn-as timlsit-ns, ssufġn-t a-t-nġn f-uggjdi.
amẓn yan-urgaz imun-d d-uġaras, bḥra-d-yuška zġ-brra, inin-as a-yasi aggjdi n-yasuɛ. iga ism-ns simɛan gu-kurini, ig babas n-alaksandrus d-rufus.
awin-d yasuɛ s-udġar lli-mi-ttinin ‹gulguta›. tga lmɛna-ns ‹adġar n-tʷh̬šašt n-ih̬f.›
irin ad-as-fkn aman n-waḍil iktin lli-ġ-illa-usafar l-lmurr, imma ntta ur-t-iswi.
qqnn-t ġ-uggjdi alln-t. bḍun timlsa-ns i-ngratsn grn-d fllasnt asġar, kraygatt yan d-ma-ra-yawi.
tga tasaɛt tis tẓa n-ṣṣbaḥ lliġ-t-ugʷln f-uggjdi.
skrn yat talluḥt a-tml aṣraḍ lli-s-as-ṣrḍn, ityara gis «agllid n-ayt-yudaya.»
awin-d sin imh̬h̬arn agʷln-tn f-iggjda yan f-ufasi n-yasuɛ d-yan f-uẓlmaḍ-ns.
ġmkan a-yuwfa ma-ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi lli-innan «ra-t-gn d-yan zġ-willi ffuġnin zġ-wawal n-rbbi.»
ar-t-rggmn mddn lli-zraynin ar-ssmussun ih̬fawn-nsn ar-as-ttinin: «wa-kiyi lli-ra-ih̬lu tigmmi n-rbbi tbnut-stt ġ-kraḍ-uwssan,
jjnjm ih̬f-nnk tgguzd-d zġ-uggjdi.»
ġmkad-daġ a-s-a-gis-tṭnaẓn inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi i-ngratsn ntni d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ ar-ttinin: «hati ijjnjm wiyyaḍ walaynni ur-iẓḍar a-ijjnjm ih̬f-ns.
iniyat-as a-d-igguz lmasiḥ-ad agllid n-ayt-rbbi zġ-uggjdi baš a-t-nẓr namn srs.» ula ġwilli dids tyaggalnin f-iggjda ar-t-rggmn ula ntni.
lliġ tlkm tasaɛt tis snat d-mrawt ḍrnd-d tillas f-tmazirt-an kullutt ar tasaɛt tis kraṭṭ n-tdggʷat.
tasaɛt tis kraṭṭ yut yasuɛ s-yat-tġuyyit itjhhdn yini: «aluy, aluy, lama šabaqtani?» tga lmɛna-ns «wa-rbbi-nu, wa-rbbi-nu, mah̬ a-yyi-tflt?»
kra zġ-willi biddnin ġin, lliġ-as-sfldn inin: «hati ar-yaqra i-nnabi iliyya.»
yazzl yan iɛmmr-d yan-ušrwiḍ s-waman l-lh̬ll ig-t ġ-yat-tġanimt imdi-t-in i-yasuɛ a-isu, yini-asn: «zgayat, a-nẓr is-ra-d-yašk iliyya a-t-id-izzugz.»
imma yasuɛ yut s-yat-tġuyyit itjhhdn issufġ rruḥ-ns.
ġakudan yut-ušrrig lh̬amiya n-tḥanut tamẓlayt ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, tbḍu f-sin zġ-uflla ar izdar.
imma lqbṭan n-iɛskrin lli-ibiddn ġ-tama n-yasuɛ, lliġ iẓra mamnk a-yut s-tġuyyit issufġ rruḥ-ns, yini: «s-ṣṣaḥt iga-urgaz-ad yus n-rbbi.»
llant ġin kra n-tmġarin biddnt ġ-tuggugt ar-tmnadnt kullu ma-ijran. tlla gisnt maryam ullt-magdala, d-maryam innas n-aytmatn yaɛqub imẓẓin d-yusf, ntnti d-saluma.
kkant-sttin ar-tmununt d-yasuɛ ar-ti-tɛawannt lliġ illa ġ-jalil. ilint ġin tiyyaḍ ggutnin lli-d-dids-uškanin s-urušalim.

ġassan ar-tujadn mddn i-lɛid, ig ass lli-iqaman i-wass n-usunfu. lliġ-di-truḥ-tdggʷat yašk-id yusf gu-rama. iga ntta yan zġ-imġarn l-lmḥkama, ar-ti-tuqqarn mddn. ula ntta ar-itrju tagldit n-rbbi a-di-tašk. izɛm ikšm s-dar bilaṭus iḍalb zġ-gis ddat n-yasuɛ.
itɛjjb bilaṭus lliġ isfld is-yad-immut. iġr i-lqbṭan n-iɛskrin isqsa-t: «mnšk ayd-s-immut?»
lliġ-as-t-inna lqbṭan ifk ilmma ddat i-yusf.
isġ-d yusf lkttan išwan, izzugz-d ddat n-yasuɛ zġ-uggjdi issmuttl-tt, isrs-tt-in ġ-yan-umḍḍal, iga ifri ityawġza ġ-ujarif. issknuki-d yan-ifir iqqn srs imi n-umḍḍal.
ar-n-gis-ttmnad maryam ullt-magdala d-maryam innas n-yusf, ẓrnt illiġ-n-tettrs ddat n-yasuɛ.
lliġ izri-wass n-usunfu, tnkr maryam ullt-magdala d-maryam innas n-yaɛqub ntnti d-saluma, sġnt isafarn n-tujjut baš ad-ddunt ad-ẓġurnt ddat n-yasuɛ.
zikk ṣbaḥ n-wass l-lḥdd, bḥra-di-tġli tafukt, ftunt s-umḍḍal.
ar-ttinint i-ngratsnt: «ma-rad-aġ-issknuki ifir zġ-imi n-ifri?» ašku imqqur bahra.
allnt alln-nsnt s-n-ẓrant ifir yitti zġ-imi.
kšmnt s-umḍḍal afnt-n yan-uɛyyal iskiws f-ufasi, ilsa aslham imlluln. lliġ-t-ẓrant ggʷdnt bahra.
imma ntta isawl yini-asnt: «ad-ur-tiksaḍmt. ar-tsiggilmt yasuɛ gu-naṣira lli-immutn f-uggjdi. ur-sul-illi ġid, hati inkr-n. ẓramt, ha-illiġ-t-id-srsn.
imma ġilad, ddwamt tsslkmmt awal-ad i-imḥḍarn-ns ntni d-bṭrus, tinimt-asn: ‹yasuɛ ra-kʷn-izwur s-tmazirt n-jalil. ġin a-ġ-ra-ti-tẓrm ġmklli-s-awn-inna.›»
ffuġnd-d-tmġarin zġ-umḍḍal ar-srsnti-tkkat tawda ar-trgigiynt. rwlnt ur-nnint yat i-yan ašku ksuḍnt bahra.
lliġ-d-inkr yasuɛ zikk ṣbaḥ n-wass l-lḥdd, iban-d zwar i-maryam ullt-magdala lli-zġ-issufġ ssa l-ljnun,
tddu tini-t i-imḥḍarn-ns. ntni taġ-tn-tguḍi bahra ar-allan.
tini-asn: «iwrri iddr, ẓriġ-t nkki.» imma ntni ur-tt-uminn.
tiġurdin n-mayan iban-d yasuɛ s-mamnk yaḍni i-sin zġ-gisn lliġ ftan ġ-uġaras s-iduran ġ-brra n-tmdint.
wrrin-d inin-t i-wiyyaḍ, walaynni ur-tn-uminn ula ntni.
ġ-isiggʷra iban-d yasuɛ i-yan d-mraw n-umḥḍar lliġ skiwsn ar-šttan. iẓi-tn ašku qqurn ih̬fawn-nsn ur-uminn, ula sfldn s-willi-t-ẓranin lliġ-d-inkr zġ-lmut.
yini-asn ġakudan: «ffuġat ar-ttidum s-ddunit kullutt, ar-ttbrraḥm s-lh̬bar-ad ifulkin i-kullu mddn.
wanna yumnn iddm ġ-waman, hati ra-injm. wanna ur-yuminn, ra-fllas-yili lḥukm n-rbbi.
ra-ifk rbbi timitar-ad i-willi umnnin, rad-ssufuġn ljnun s-ism-inu, rad-sawaln s-iwaliwn l-ljdid.
iġ-usin ilgmmaḍn ula iġ-swan kra inqqan ur-ra-tn-iḍrru. rad-srasn ifassn-nsn f-imuḍan jjin.»
siditnnġ yasuɛ, tiġurdin n-ma-srsn-isawl, ityalal s-ignna iskiws f-ufasi n-rbbi.
imma ntni ffuġn ar-tbrraḥn ġ-kraygatt mani, ar-tn-itɛawan siditnnġ ar-izzga iwaliwn-nsn s-tmitar lli-iskar f-ufus-nsn.
ggutn ġwilli granin a-taran f-tġawsiwin lli-darnnġ-jranin
ġmklli-aġ-nnan ġwilli-tnt-ẓranin zġ-isizwar, gn fllasnt inagan awin-aġ-d lh̬bar-nsnt.
mayan a-f-nniġ ra-ifulki ad-ak-ssngaddaġ yan-warra izgan, a-sidi iɛzzan tawfilus, ašku sigglġ bahra ġ-tġawsiwin-ad ġmklli gant zġ-isizwar,
baš a-tissant lḥqq kullut f-maylli mi tsfldt.
ġ-uwssan n-hirudus agllid n-tmazirt n-yudaya, illa yan-unmġur zġ-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi, ism-ns zakariyya. iga ntta zġ-rrbɛt n-abiyya, iṭṭaf tamġart zġ-tasut n-harun, ism-ns aliṣabaṭ.
ntni fulkin s-sin, irḍu fllasn sidi rbbi. ar-bdda-skarn s-iwaliwn n-rbbi ula luṣiyat-ns, ur-a-zgisnti-tffuġn s-yat.
walaynni ur-jju-darsn kra n-warraw, ašku ur-tẓḍar aliṣabaṭ a-trbbu, d-ntni s-sin uwssrn.
yan-wass iskr zakariyya tawuri-ns n-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi ašku tlkm-d-twala n-rrbɛt-ns.
grn-d inmġurn asġar ġmklli bdda skarn, baš ad-bḍun tawuri i-ngratsn. yašk-id-usġar ġ-zakariyya a-ikšm s-tḥanut tamẓlayt a-n-gis-ibh̬h̬r ġ-lgddam n-rbbi.
ikšm srs ġ-tasaɛt l-lbh̬ur, munn-d mddn ggutnin ġ-brra ar-tẓallan.
iban-as ġakudan yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi, ibidd ġ-tsga tafasit l-lmida lli-f-a-tbh̬h̬arn.
lliġ-t-iẓra zakariyya iġuwḍ yiksaḍ.
isawl lmalak yini-as: «wa-zakariyya, ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ. isfld rbbi i-maylli-as-ttḍalabt. rad-ak-taru-tmġart-nnk aliṣabaṭ yan-wazzan, tgt-as ism ‹yuḥanna›.
rad-ak-yili lfrḥ ula taḍṣa, frḥn mddn ggutnin s-tlalit-ns.
ašku ra-ig wad ihiyyan ġ-iẓri n-sidi rbbi. ur-ra-issa ma-iktin ula ma-issmllilin. ra-iɛmmr s-rruḥ lqudus ġ-waḥlig n-innas,
irar-d kigan d-mddn n-ayt-rbbi ad-d-wrrin s-uġaras n-rbbi-nsn.

ra-izwur siditnnġ s-tḥkimt itjhhdn zund nnabi iliyya, irar-d ulawn n-mddn a-tḥnnun ġ-tarwa-nsn, irar-d ġwilli ffuġnin zġ-wawal n-rbbi ad-d-wrrin s-uġaras n-willi-f-irḍa, ijjujad i-siditnnġ yat tasut a-tg tins.»
yini zakariyya i-lmalak: «mamnk a-s-rad-issanġ is-ra-yili mayad? hati afqqir ayd-giġ, ula tamġart-inu tuwssr.»
yini-as lmalak: «nkki giġ jibrayyil, ar-tbddadġ ġ-lgddam n-rbbi. yuzn-iyi-d a-srk-sawlġ awiġ-ak-d lh̬bar-ad ifulkin.
walaynni ra-tgt aẓnẓum, ur-ra-tsawlt ar ass nna-ġ-ijra mayd-ak-nniġ, ašku ur-tumint awal-inu lli-ra-yafu ġ-uzmz-ns.»
ar-tqln mddn s-zakariyya, ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn: «mah̬ aylliġ-n-imaṭl ġ-tḥanut tamẓlayt?»
lliġ-d-iffuġ ur-iẓḍar a-srsn-isawl, issann is-iẓra kra issbayyn-as-t-id rbbi ġ-tḥanut tamẓlayt. iml-asn zakariyya s-ifassn-ns f-mad-as-ijran, ašku ur-iẓḍar a-isawl.
izayd ilmma ikmml ussan n-twuri-ns, iwrri s-tgmmi-ns.
zrin kra n-uwssan s-a-trbbu-tmġart-ns aliṣabaṭ. tqama ġ-tgmmi-ns smmus-iyrn.
ar-ttini: «hati ġilad ibark gigi sidi rbbi, isfiḍ lɛar-inu ġ-gr mddn.»
zrin ilmma sḍiṣ-iyrn, yazn rbbi lmalak jibrayyil s-yat-tmdint ġ-tmazirt n-jalil ism-ns naṣira,
s-yat-tɛyyalt iḍalb-tt-in yan-urgaz ism-ns yusf zġ-tasut n-ugllid dawd. ig ism n-tɛyyalt maryam.
ibidd srs lmalak yini-as: «sslam fllam, a-tambarkit. sidi rbbi illa didm.»
tġuwḍ maryam f-wawal-ns, tsqsa ih̬f-ns mah̬ aylliġ srs isawl ġmkan.
imma lmalak isawl-daġ yini-as: «wa-maryam, ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ, ašku rbbi irḍa fllam.
hati ra-trbbut, tarut yan-wazzan, tgt-as ism ‹yasuɛ›.
ra-ig wad bahra ihiyyan. rad-as-ttinin ‹yus n-umattuy›. rad-as-ifk sidi rbbi lɛrš n-jddis dawd,
ig agllid f-tarwa n-yaɛqub kullu mayd-d-iftan. tagldit-ns ur-ra-sar-ttmmu.»
tini-as maryam i-lmalak: «mamnk a-ra-yili mayad? ur-jju-ssinġ kra n-urgaz.»
yini-as lmalak: «ra-d-fllam-igguz rruḥ lqudus, tdl-km-tḥkimt n-rbbi amattuy. mayan a-f-ra-ttinin i-wazzan amẓlay lli-ra-tarut ‹yus n-rbbi›.
han aliṣabaṭ lli-igan zġ-ayt-darm, ula nttat ar-trbbu s-yan-wazzan ġ-tuwssrt-ns. han h̬talli-f-a-ttinin mddn ur-tẓḍar a-trbbu, wis sḍiṣ-iyrn ayd-dars-illan.
ašku ur-illi kra mi ur-iẓḍar rbbi a-t-iskr.»
tsawl maryam tini: «ha-yyi giġ tah̬ddamt n-sidi rbbi. ad-iyi-yili mayd-iyi-tnnit.» ifl-tt lmalak ġakudan.
ur-tmaṭil maryam, tnkr ġ-uwssan-an tddu s-yat-tmdint ġ-iwrar n-yudaya,
tlkm-n tigmmi n-zakariyya tġr s-aliṣabaṭ.
lliġ tsfld aliṣabaṭ i-wawal n-maryam immass-wazzan ġ-waḥlig-ns, tɛmmr s-rruḥ lqudus,
tall awal-ns tini: «tambarkit a-tgit ġ-tmġarin. ambarki a-iga-warraw n-waḥlig-nnm.
mad-giġ nkki aylliġ-d-dari-tuška innas n-sidi?
ġir sfldġ i-wawal-nnm s-immussa-wazzan s-lfrḥ ġ-waḥlig-inu.
tambarkit a-tgit ašku tumnt is-rad-am-issafu sidi rbbi awal lli-s-am-inna.»
tsawl maryam tini: «yulġ-uwl-inu sidi rbbi,
tfrḥ rruḥ-inu s-rbbi anjjam-inu,
ašku iẓra-d lḥalt n-th̬ddamt-ns imẓẓin. hati zġ-ġilad kraygatt tasut rad-iyi-ttini ‹tambarkit›,
ašku rbbi itjhhdn iskr gigi tiġawsiwin mqqurnin. illa luqr i-ism-ns,
tili rrḥmt-ns f-kullu willi-t-uqqrnin zġ-kraygatt tasut n-tasutin.
hati imdi-d afus-ns itjhhdn, izzmzr udmawn mqqurnin f-iswingimn l-lɛaql-nsn.
iluḥ-n igldan zġ-lɛrš-nsn, yall-d ayt-iyzdar s-uflla.
iššbaɛ s-tmih̬ar ġwilli inġa laẓ, irar ayt-wayda bla yat.
irḥm-aġ s-rrḥmt-ns idumn, ibidd d-ayt-yaɛqub lli-igan ih̬ddamn-ns.
issafu awal lli-s-inna i-imzwura-nnġ, ur-jju-ittu ibrahim ula tarwa-ns.»
tgawr maryam ġ-dar aliṣabaṭ ma-itggan kraḍ-iyrn, twrri s-tgmmi-ns.
imma aliṣabaṭ, ġakud lliġ-tt-ilkm-uzmz taru yan-wazzan.
frḥn-dids-wadjarn-ns ula ayt-dars lliġ sfldn f-mamnk ad-bahra-gis-ibark rbbi.
aškin-d ilmma ġ-wis tam-uwssan ad-ẓẓalln i-wazzan. irin ad-as-gn ism ‹zakariyya› ašku iga ism n-babas.
tsawl-d innas tini: «uhu, rad-as-ng ism ‹yuḥanna›.»
inin-as: «walaynni ur-illi yan ġ-ayt-darm iṭṭafn ism-ad.»
sillfn i-babas a-t-sqsan man ism ira ad-as-ig.
isillf-asn zakariyya baš ad-as-d-awin yat talluḥt, yara gis: «ism-ns yuḥanna.» tɛjjbn kullutn.
s-ifsi ils n-zakariyya ġakudan, ar-isawal ar-italġ rbbi.
ggʷdn ġwilli zdġnin ġin, awin lh̬bar f-kullu mayd ijran ġ-tmazirt-an n-iwrar n-yudaya kullutt.
ġwilli fllas sfldnin ar-bahra-swingimn ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «ma-ra-ig-wazzan-ad?» ašku illa-dids-ufus n-rbbi.
iɛmmr zakariyya babas s-rruḥ lqudus, isawl s-mad-as-imla rbbi yini:
«ad-bahra-nalġ sidi rbbi n-ayt-darnnġ, ašku yakmur-d s-mddn-ns ad-aġ-ifukku.
issmġi-d ġ-gr tasutin n-uh̬ddam-ns dawd yan igan anjjam itjhhdn,
ġmklli inna f-imi l-lanbiya-ns imẓlayn ġayd izrin,
baš ad-aġ-ijjnjm zġ-inuwwašn-nnġ ula kullu willi-aġ-kurhanin.
hati irḥm-aġ ġmklli inna i-imzwura-nnġ, issafu lɛhd-ns ihiyyan,
ġmklli inna i-babatnnġ ibrahim s-wawal izgan.
rad-aġ-ifukku zġ-gr ifassn n-inuwwašn-nnġ, baš a-ntɛbad bla nksuḍ yat,
ar-nskar ma-ifulkin ula ma-t-irḍan kullu ussan n-tudrt-nnġ.
imma kiyi a-iwi, rad-ak-ttinin ‹nnabi n-rbbi amattuy›. ra-tzwurt siditnnġ ad-as-tjjujadt aġaras.
ra-tmalat i-mddn-ns mamnk a-s-ra-tn-ijjnjm, iṣamḥ-asn f-kullu mad-skrn yʷh̬šn.
ašku irḥm-aġ rbbi-nnġ, iḥnnu ginnġ. hati zund tafukt a-ra-t-id-fllannġ-issġli,
yisfiw f-willi zdġnin ġ-tillas d-umalu l-lmut, isslkm iḍarn-nnġ s-uġaras n-sslamt.»
izayd-uḥšmi yuḥanna ar-itimġur ar-itdus ġ-rruḥ-ns. iqama ġ-lh̬la ar ass lli-ġ-igra ġ-twuri-ns ġ-wammas n-ayt-rbbi.
ġ-uwssan-an a-ġ-d-iffuġ yal-lqanun zġ-dar-ugllid imqqurn qayṣr uġusṭus, yamr kullu mddn ġ-kraygatt mani ad-ḥasbn ism-nsn.
tawala tamzwarut ayan ġ-ḥasbn mddn, ijra ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-iḥkam kirinyus tamazirt n-suriyya.
ar-tmuddun mddn kraygatt yan s-tmazirt-ns a-n-gis-iḥasb ism-ns.
inkr yusf iffuġ tamdint n-naṣira ġ-jalil imuddu s-tmdint n-dawd lli-mi-ttinin bitlaḥm ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya, ašku iga ntta zġ-tasut n-dawd ula tarwa-ns.
iddu a-n-iḥasb ih̬f-ns ntta d-maryam lli-n-iḍalb a-tg tamġart-ns, d-nttat ar-trbbu.
ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-llan ġin tlkm-d luqt n-tlalit.
taru arraw-ns amzwaru, tssmuttl-t ġ-uḥzzam tsrs-t-in ġ-yan-usds, ašku ur-ufin kra n-tḥanut ih̬wan ġ-lfndq.
ilin kra n-imksawn ġ-tmazirt-an gabln ulli-nsn ġ-lh̬la ġ-iyḍ.
iban-asn-d yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi, yisfiw fllasn lmjd n-sidi rbbi, iksaḍn bahra.
isawl lmalak yini-asn: «ad-ur-tiksaḍm. hati iwiġ-awn-d lh̬bar ifulkin f-lfrḥ iggutn lli-ra-yili i-kullu-mddn.
ašku ġassad ġ-tmdint n-dawd ilul-awn-d-unjjam lli igan lmasiḥ siditnnġ.
ġmkad a-rad-awn-ig tamatart: ra-n-tafm yan-wazzan imuttl ġ-uḥzzam ittrs-n ġ-usds.»
bann-d ilmma ikabarn l-lmalayka ggutnin d-lmalak, ar-talġn rbbi ar-ttinin:
«a-yili lmjd i-rbbi ġ-tattuyt, tili sslamt i-willi-f-irḍa ġ-ddunit.»
lliġ wrrin lmalayka s-ignwan inin imksawn i-ngratsn: «nkrat a-nddu s-bitlaḥm a-nẓr mayd-f-aġ-inna sidi rbbi.»
ddun ġakudan s-tizzla, afn-in maryam d-yusf, ẓrn azzan ġ-usds.
lliġ-t-ẓran sawln-asn imksawn f-maylli-asn-inna lmalak f-wazzan-an,
ar-tɛjjabn kullu willi sfldnin i-iwaliwn-nsn.
imma maryam ar-ttḥḍu tiġawsiwin-an ġ-uwl-ns ar-gisnti-tswingim.
wrrin ilmma imksawn, ar-tškarn rbbi ar-ti-talġn f-kullu ma-mi-sfldn ula mad-ẓran. illa kullu mayan ġmklli-s-asn-inna lmalak.
zrin ssa-uwssan s-d-iruḥ-wass lli-ġ-rad-ẓẓalln i-wazzan. gn-as ġakudan ism ‹yasuɛ›, iga ism lli-s-inna lmalak ur-ta-da-trbbu maryam.
lliġ kmmln ussan n-usġus-nsn skrn ġmklli illan ġ-ššrɛ n-musa, awin azzan s-tmdint n-urušalim a-t-in-srsn ġ-lgddam n-rbbi.
ašku ityara ġ-ššrɛ n-rbbi: «a-tẓlim kraygatt awtm ih̬fddi a-ig win sidi rbbi.»
fkn ilmma tiġrsi i-rbbi ġmklli-s-inna ššrɛ: «sin imalliwn nġd sin itbirn mẓẓinin.»
yili yan-urgaz ġ-urušalim ism-ns simɛan, ifulki bahra iɛzzu-dars-uġaras n-rbbi, yili fllas rruḥ lqudus. ar-bdda-itrju ass lli-ġ-ra-ijjnjm rbbi mddn-ns.
imla-yas rruḥ lqudus is-ur-ra-immt ard iẓr lmasiḥ n-sidi rbbi.
simɛan, yiwi-t rruḥ lqudus ikšm s-tgmmi n-rbbi. aškin-d ayt-dars n-yasuɛ ġ-tasaɛt-an, awin-d azzan ad-kmmln f-ssibt-ns ma-illan ġ-ššrɛ.
yasi-t simɛan ġ-gr ifassn-ns, yalġ rbbi yini:
«ġmkad a-sidi rbbi tssuwfit-iyi-d awal. adj ah̬ddam-nnk a-n-ffuġġ ddunit ġilad s-sslamt,
ašku ẓrant-walln-inu anjjam
lli-di-tuznt f-kullu mddn.
ra-ig tifawt i-ayt-tmizar aggugnin, yawi-d lmjd-nnk i-ayt-rbbi.»
itɛjjb yusf d-innas n-wazzan f-mayd-fllas-inna simɛan.

izayd simɛan iḍalb rbbi a-tn-ibark, isawl ilmma s-maryam innas n-wazzan, yini-as: «azzan-ad, iga-t rbbi d-wad-s-rad-ḍrn kigan d-mddn n-ayt-rbbi, nkrn kigan f-ssibt-ns. ig-t d-yat-tmatart lli-rad-agʷin mddn ggutnin,
d-ġmkan a-s-rad-ssbayynn tinbaḍin n-uwlawn-nsn. ula kmmi, rad-am-tbbi taġuft ul-nnm zund taẓẓit.»
tili ġin yat-thjjalt ar-tsawal s-mad-as-d-imala rbbi. iga ism-ns ḥanna illis n-fanwil zġ-tqbilt n-ašir. tmqqur bahra, tzzri d-urgaz-ns ssa n-isggʷasn zġ-lliġ-tt-ila,
tili dars tam id-mraw d-kkuẓ (84) n-usggʷas. ur-a-ttffuġ tigmmi n-rbbi, ar-gis-ttɛbad rbbi ar-ttaẓum ar-ti-ttḍalab ġ-iyḍ ula azal.
tašk-id ġ-tasaɛt-an talġ rbbi, tsawl f-wazzan-an i-kullu willi trjunin ass lli-ġ-ra-ifukku rbbi ayt-urušalim.
lliġ ikmml yusf d-maryam maylli fllasn illan ġ-ššrɛ n-sidi rbbi, wrrin s-tmdint-nsn n-naṣira ġ-tmazirt n-jalil.
ar-itimġur-wazzan ar-itdus. tigat-gis-tḥkimt, tili fllas lbaraka n-rbbi.
asggʷas ar asggʷas ar-ttidun ayt-dars n-yasuɛ s-tmdint n-urušalim ġ-lɛid n-usurf.
lliġ irgl sin d-mraw n-usggʷas ddun ġmklli bdda.
ġakud lliġ kmmln-uwssan l-lɛid amẓn aġaras s-tmazirt-nsn. ur-ssinn ayt-dars is-n-iqama-uḥšmi yasuɛ ġ-urušalim,
ġaln is-didsn-imun ġ-ukabar. zzrin ass kullut ġ-uġaras, bdun ilmma ar-srs-siggiln ġ-gr ayt-darsn d-imddukkʷal-nsn.
lliġ-t-ur-ufin wrrin s-urušalim a-srs-siggiln.
ar wis kraḍ-uwssan a-t-in-ufan ġ-gr imslmdn n-ššrɛ ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ar-asn-isflid ar-tn-isqsa.
ġwilli-as-sflidnin ar-kullu-tɛjjabn ġ-lfhmt-ns ula taḥkimt lli-s-a-itrara awal.
lliġ-t-ẓran ayt-dars iḍr-asn lɛjb, tini-as innas: «mah̬ a-iwi aylliġ-aġ-tskrt ġmkad? ha-nkki d-babak nusi fllak taġuft bahra, ar-srk-nsiggil.»
imma ntta inna-yasn: «mah̬ aylliġ a-sri-tsiggilm? is-ur-tssinm is-d-iqqan ad-iliġ ġ-tgmmi n-baba?»
imma ntni ur-fhimn awal lli-s-asn-inna.
imun didsn ġakudan, wrrin s-naṣira, ar-iskar s-iwaliwn-nsn. imma innas tḥḍa kullu tiġawsiwin-an ġ-uwl-ns.
ar-itzayad yasuɛ ġ-tiddi ula taḥkimt, irḍu srs rbbi ula mddn.

ġ-usggʷas wis smmus d-mraw n-ugllid imqqurn qayṣr ṭibaryus, iga bilaṭus gu-bunṭus lḥakm f-yudaya, ig hirudus agllid n-jalil, ig gʷmas filibbus agllid n-iṭuraya d-trah̬unitis, ig lisanyas agllid n-abilini.
ġ-uwssan-an lliġ iga ḥannan d-qayafa inmġurn hiyyanin n-tgmmi n-rbbi, yašk-id-wawal n-rbbi s-yuḥanna yus n-zakariyya ġ-lh̬la.
ar-itkka tisgiw n-wasif n-urdun ar-itbrraḥ ar-ittini: «flat kullu ma-tskarm yʷh̬šn, tddmm ġ-waman, baš ad-awn-iṣamḥ rbbi f-ddnub-nnun.»
ġmkan a-s-yuwfa ma-ityaran ġ-warra n-nnabi išaɛya inna: «ha-yan-wawal ar-itbrraḥ ġ-lh̬la ar-ittini ‹jjujadat aġaras n-siditnnġ, tssnmm tiġarasin-ns.
ra-tngadda kraygatt talat, astwan idrarn ula iwrar. ra-inm-uġaras nna-ilullin, trh̬u-tġarast nna-išqan.
rad-ẓrn kullu mddn anjjam lli-ra-d-yazn rbbi.›»
aškin-d mddn ggutnin s-dar yuḥanna, irin a-tn-issddm ġ-waman. imma ntta inna-yasn: «wa-tarwa n-ifaġrn, mad-awn-innan izd ġmkad a-s-ra-tanfm i-lɛqubit lli-ra-ittut f-ddunit?
skarat afulki baš a-iban is-tflm ma-yʷh̬šnn. a-ur-ttinim i-ngratun ‹nkkʷni nga tarwa n-ibrahim,› ašku rad-awn-iniġ, rbbi iẓḍar a-d-issnkr tarwa i-ibrahim ula zġ-iẓran-ad.
hay-aglzim ittrs f-uggja n-usġar. kud tasġart nna-ur-yakkan lġllt imimn, ra-stt-ibbi iluḥ-tt-in ġ-lɛafit.»
sqsan-t mddn: «ini-aġ mad-aġ-d-iqqann a-t-nskr?»
irar-asn: «wanna iṭṭafn sin iqšban, ifk yan i-wanna ur-dar-illi. wanna dar ma-ištta, ibḍu-t d-wiyyaḍ.»
aškin-d dars ilmma kra zġ-willi tamẓnin iqaridn n-nkkas, irin a-tn-issddm, sqsan-t: «way-amslmd, mad-aġ-d-iqqann a-t-nskr nkkʷni?»
irar-asn: «a-ur-ttamẓm zġ-dar mddn uggʷar n-ma-kʷn-d-yuškan.»
aškin-d ilmma kra n-iɛskrin sqsan-t: «imma nkkʷni, mad-aġ-d-iqqann a-t-nskar?» irar-asn: «a-ur-ttɛddam f-yan ula tssḍrm lbaḍl f-yan. zaydat tqnɛum s-tġrad-nnun.»
ar-bahra-swingimn mddn ġ-yuḥanna, ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn: «izd ġwad a-igan lmasiḥ lli-ra-d-yazn rbbi?»
isawl yuḥanna yini-asn: «ha-yyi ar-kʷn-ssddamġ ġ-waman walaynni ra-d-yašk yan yugʷr-iyi, ur-sthllaġ ad-rẓmġ ifalan n-turẓiyin-ns. ra-kʷn-issddm nttan s-rruḥ lqudus d-lɛafit,
yasi tazzrt a-izuzzr, issmun-d irdn-ns ġ-uḥanu, ijdr alim s-lɛafit ur-sar-ih̬sin.»
izayd yuḥanna s-iwaliwn ggutnin ar-itbrraḥ i-mddn f-lh̬bar ifulkin ar-asn-ittini ad-d-wrrin s-uġaras n-rbbi.
iẓi yuḥanna d-ugllid hirudus f-ssibt n-hirudiyya lli-yiwi hirudus wah̬h̬a tga tamġart n-gʷmas. isawl srs yuḥanna f-mnnawt lh̬ʷšanat yaḍni ar-tnt-iskar.
imma hirudus izuyd i-kullu ġayan, iluḥ-n yuḥanna ġ-lḥbs.
tiġurdin n-ma-issddm yuḥanna kullu mddn-an, issddm yasuɛ ula ntta. ibidd yasuɛ ar-itẓalla, s-rẓmn ignwan
igguz-d fllas rruḥ lqudus ġ-ssift n-yan-utbir, isawl-d yan-wawal zġ-ignwan yini: «kiyi tgit iwi iɛzzan. frḥġ srk bahra.»
lliġ igra yasuɛ ġ-twuri-ns yili dars ma-itggan kraḍ id-mraw n-usggʷas. ar-as-ttinin yus n-yusf yus n-ɛali
yus n-mattat yus n-lawi yus n-malki yus n-yannay yus n-yusf
yus n-mattitya yus n-ɛamus yus n-naḥum yus n-ḥasli yus n-naggay
yus n-maḥat yus n-mattitya yus n-šimɛi yus n-yusih̬ yus n-yuda
yus n-yuḥanna yus n-risa yus n-zrubbabl yus n-šaltyal yus n-nir
yus n-malki yus n-addi yus n-quṣm yus n-almmudam yus n-ɛir
yus n-yašuɛ yus n-aliɛazr yus n-yurim yus n-mattat yus n-lawi
yus n-šimɛun yus n-yahuda yus n-yusf yus n-yunam yus n-alyaqim
yus n-malya yus n-manna yus n-mattata yus n-natan yus n-dawd
yus n-išay yus n-ɛubid yus n-buɛaz yus n-šalaḥ yus n-naḥšun
yus n-ɛminadab yus n-admin yus n-arni yus n-ḥaṣrun yus n-fariṣ yus n-yahuda
yus n-yaɛqub yus n-isḥaq yus n-ibrahim yus n-taraḥ yus n-naḥur
yus n-sarug yus n-raɛu yus n-falag yus n-ɛabr yus n-šalaḥ
yus n-qinan yus n-arfakšad yus n-šam yus n-nuḥ yus n-lamak
yus n-matušalaḥ yus n-ah̬nuh̬ yus n-yarad yus n-mahalalil yus n-qinan
yus n-anus yus n-šit yus n-adam yus n-rbbi.
iffuġ yasuɛ zġ-tsgiw n-urdun, iɛmmr s-rruḥ lqudus.
ar-t-itguwwad rruḥ kkuẓ id-mraw n-wass ġ-lh̬la, ar-t-itarm iblis. ur-a-ištta yat ġ-uwssan-an aylliġ iwrri yaġ-t laẓ bahra.
isawl srs iblis ġakudan, yini-as: «iġ-tgit yus n-rbbi, ini i-uẓru-ad a-iwrri ig aġrum.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «han ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi ‹urd aġrum ka-s-a-itddr bnadm.›»
yawi-t ilmma iblis issġli-t s-mani yattuyn, iml-as ġ-yan-usmaqql kullu tiglday n-ddunit,
yini-as: «rad-ak-fkġ a-tḥkamt kullu mayad, yili-ak lmjd-ns kullut, ašku nkki a-mi-ityawfka a-t-fkġ i-wanna riġ.
iġ-iyi-tsjdt, kullu mayad ra-ig winnk.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «han ityara ‹rbbi sidik a-mi-ttsjadt, d-nttan waḥdut a-ttɛbadt.›»
yawi-t ilmma iblis s-tmdint n-urušalim, issbidd-t f-iggi n-ukfaf n-tgmmi n-rbbi, yini-as: «iġ-tgit yus n-rbbi, luḥ-n ih̬f-nnk zġ-ġid s-iyzdar,
ašku ityara ‹ra-d-yazn lmalayka-ns a-k-gabln.›
ityara-daġ ‹ra-k-asin f-ifassn-nsn baš a-ur-ilkm-uḍar-nnk kra n-uẓru.›»
irar-as yasuɛ: «han ityara ‹a-ur-tarmt rbbi sidik.›»
lliġ-t-yurm iblis s-kullu ġayan, ifl-t ar azmz yaḍni.
iwrri yasuɛ s-tmazirt n-jalil, iɛmmr s-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rruḥ lqudus. ar-fllas-sawaln mddn ġ-kullu-tsgiw n-tmazirt-an.
ar-tn-isslmad ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit, ar-ti-talġn kullu mddn.
yašk-id yasuɛ s-tmdint n-naṣira, ġ-illiġ-ttin-ikka ġ-mẓẓiy-ns. ikšm s-tgmmi n-tẓallit ġ-wass n-usunfu ġmklli bdda iskar. inkr a-iġr f-mddn,
fkn-as arra n-nnabi išaɛya. irẓm arra yaf-n gis agzzum lli-ġ-ityara:

«illa flla rruḥ n-sidi rbbi. iẓli-yyi ad-d-awiġ lh̬bar ifulkin i-imẓlaḍ, iniġ i-willi tyamaẓnin ‹rbbi rad-awn-ifsi,› iniġ i-ibukaḍn ‹rbbi ra-kʷn-irar a-tisfiwm.› yazn-iyi-d ad-fukkuġ ġwilli-f-iḍr lbaḍl,
mlġ-awn is-d-ilkm-uzmz lli-ġ-ra-ijjnjm sidi rbbi ġwilli ganin wins.»
issmun arra, irar-t-id i-umɛawn iskiws. ar-gis-tmnadn kullu willi llanin ġ-tgmmi n-tẓallit.
yini-asn: «arra-yad n-rbbi, ġassad ad-darun-yuwfa.»
ar-tɛjjabn mddn kullutn ġ-iwaliwn šwanin lli-s-a-isawal, ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «ifulki-urgaz-ad.» ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn: «is-urd yus n-yusf ayad?»
izayd yasuɛ yini-asn: «is-ur-rad-iyi-tinim lmɛna-yad ‹way-aṭbib, jjujji ih̬f-nnk›? is-ur-rad-iyi-tinim ‹maylli-f-nsfld tskrt-t ġ-kafrnaḥum, skr-t ula ġid ġ-tmazirt-nnk›?
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ur-illi kra n-nnabi qbln ayt-tmazirt-ns.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ggutnt-thjjalin ġ-dar ayt-rbbi ġ-uwssan n-nnabi iliyya lliġ ur-iḍr-unẓar kraḍ isggʷasn d-sḍiṣ-iyrn, yili-uġni išqan ġ-tmazirt kullutt.
imma iliyya, ur-t-id-yuzn rbbi s-yat gisnt, walaynni yuzn-t s-dar yat-thjjalt tlla-n ġ-ṣarfa ġ-tmazirt n-ṣayda.
ggutn injdamn ġ-dar ayt-rbbi ġ-uwssan n-nnabi ališaɛ, walaynni ur-ijjujji kra n-yan gisn. ġir nuɛman gu-suriyya a-ijjin.»
lliġ sfldn mddn ġ-tgmmi n-tẓallit i-iwaliwn-ad bzgn f-yasuɛ bahra.
nkrn ssufġn-t s-brra n-tmdint-nsn, ssġlin-t s-iggi n-uwrir lli-f-tlla-tmdint, irin a-t-in-luḥn zġ-ujarif.
walaynni izri yasuɛ zġ-gratsn iftu.
yašk-id yasuɛ s-kafrnaḥum, tga yat-tmdint ġ-jalil. ar-ikššm s-tgmmi n-tẓallit ġ-uwssan n-usunfu ar-isslmad.
ar-tɛjjabn mddn kullutn ġ-ulmmud-ns ašku ar-srsn-isawal ġmklli dars lḥqq ad-asn-ittini ma-tn-d-iqqann.
illa ġ-tgmmi-an n-tẓallit yan-urgaz lli-ġ-illa yal-ljnn yʷh̬šnn bahra. yut s-yat-tġuyyit yini-as:
«wa-yasuɛ gu-naṣira, ma-illan ġ-gratnnġ didk? is-di-tuškit ad-aġ-thlkt? ssnġ ma-tgit kiyi. amẓlay n-rbbi a-tgit.»
isawl yasuɛ yamr ljnn yini-as: «fssa, tffuġt zġ-gis.» iluḥ-t ljnn s-wakal ġ-wammas-nsn iffuġ zġ-gis, ur-t-issrfufn s-yat.
mddn-an iḍr-asn lɛjb ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «matta awal-ad? hati s-tḥkimt d-tẓḍḍart iggutn a-s-a-itamr ljnun ʷh̬šnnin ar-tffuġn.»
ar-bahra-sawaln mddn f-yasuɛ, awin lh̬bar-ns s-kraygatt mani ġ-tmazirt-an kullutt.
iffuġ yasuɛ zġ-tgmmi n-tẓallit izayd ikšm s-tgmmi n-simɛan. yaf-n ġin taḍggʷalt n-simɛan tuḍn s-tawla išqan, ḍalbn-t fllas.
yakmur-d s-tama-ns yamr tawla a-titti. titti-zgis-tawla, tnkr ġakudan ar-fllasn-ttsh̬h̬ar.
lliġ-n-tḍr tafukt aškin-d mddn ggutnin s-dar yasuɛ, ar-di-tawin ġwilli uḍnnin s-tmuḍan ggutnin. ar-n-isras ifassn-ns f-kraygatt yan gisn ar-tn-ijjujji.
ar-tffuġn ljnun zġ-mddn ggutnin ar-ssġuyyun ar-ttinin: «kiyi tgit yus n-rbbi.» imma ntta yumr ljnun ad-fssan. ur-tn-yudji a-fllas-sawaln, ašku ssnn izd lmasiḥ n-rbbi a-iga.
lliġ-di-tġli tafukt iffuġ yasuɛ zġ-tmdint, iddu s-yan-mani ġ-ur-illi yan. walaynni ar-srs-siggiln mddn, ḍfurn-t ur-akkʷ-rin a-tn-ifl.
imma ntta inna-yasn: «iqqan-iyi-d ad-dduġ ar-tawiġ lh̬bar ifulkin f-tgldit n-rbbi i-tmdinin yaḍni, ašku mayad a-f-iyi-d-yuzn rbbi.»
izayd ar-itbrraḥ ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ġ-tmazirt n-ayt-yudaya kullutt.
yan-wass ibidd yasuɛ ġ-tama n-umda n-ganisaraṭ, ar-t-ssnukmun mddn ggutnin ar-ttirin ad-dars-sfldn i-wawal n-rbbi.
iẓr snat-tanawin ttrsnt f-wakal ġ-tama n-umda, fln-tnt ingʷmarn n-islman, ar-siridn ššbayk-nsn.
ikšm yasuɛ s-yat ġ-tanawin, tg tin simɛan, iḍalb-t a-stt-in-išškšm imikk s-waman. igawr ġ-tanawt ar-isslmad mddn.
lliġ ikmml awal-ns yini i-simɛan: «zayd-n s-ugʷns ar tadrut tgrm-n ššbayk-nnun a-di-tgmmrm islman.»
isawl simɛan yini-as: «iḍ kullut ar-nkkat tammara a-sidi, ur-numẓ yat. walaynni lliġ-ti-tnnit kiyi ra-n-grġ ššbayk.»
grn-tnt-in ġakudan, s-tnt-in-ufan ɛmmrnt s-islman ggutnin aylliġ rad-bbint.
sillfn-in i-imddukkʷal-nsn ġ-tanawt yaḍni ad-d-aškin ad-asn-ɛawnn. lliġ-tn-d-ruḥn ar-didsn-ssmunun islman aylliġ ɛmmrnt snat tanawin-lli, ftunt ad-ddmnt.
imma simɛan bṭrus, lliġ iẓra mayd ijran iḍr-n f-ifaddn n-yasuɛ yini-as: «wa-sidi, ngara didi. argaz yʷh̬šnn ad-giġ.»
ašku iḍr-as lɛjb ġ-tuggt n-islman lli-d-umẓn.
ar-tɛjjabn imddukkʷal-ns yaɛqub d-yuḥanna tarwa n-zabdi ula ntni. imma yasuɛ isawl s-simɛan yini-as: «ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ. ġilad s-uflla mddn a-ra-ttgmmart.»
ssufġn tanawin-nsn s-wakal, fln kullu ma-darsn-illan, munn d-yasuɛ.
yan-wass illa yasuɛ ġ-yat-tmdint, yašk-id dars yan-unjdam yuḍn bahra. lliġ iẓra yasuɛ iḍr ġ-dar iḍarn-ns iḍalb-t bahra yini: «wa-sidi, tẓḍart a-yyi-tssġust iġ-trit.»
iggr-as yasuɛ s-ufus-ns yini-as: «riġ nkki. ġus.» ġakudan yitti zġ-gis ljdam iġus.
yuṣṣa-t yasuɛ yini-as: «a-ur-tinit i-yan f-mayad, walaynni ddu tmlt ih̬f-nnk i-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi, tfkt-as f-usġus-nnk tiġrsi lli-f-yuṣṣa musa, a-tg tugga i-mddn.»
walaynni ar-fllas-sawaln mddn s-uggʷar, awin lh̬bar s-kraygatt mani. ar-di-ttaškin s-kigan baš ad-sfldn i-iwaliwn-ns jjin dars zġ-tmuḍan-nsn.
imma ntta ar-tn-ifal iddu s-mani ih̬wan a-n-gis-iẓẓall.

yan-wass yasuɛ ar-isslmad mddn. gawrn ġ-gratsn kra n-mddn l-lmdhb n-ifarisin d-kra n-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, uškan-d zġ-kullu timdinin n-jalil ula zġ-yudaya d-tmdint n-urušalim. yasuɛ tlla-gis-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi a-ijjujji imuḍan.
aškin-d kra n-mddn asin-d yan-urgaz ikušmn ign f-imjdin-ns. irin a-t-in-srsn ġ-lgddam n-yasuɛ,
walaynni ur-ufin mamnk a-t-šškšamn ašku tɛmmr-tgmmi s-mddn ggutnin. ssġlin-t ilmma s-ukfaf f-iggi n-tgmmi, zzugzn imjdin lli-f-ign zġ-gr lyajur s-wammas n-mddn ġ-lgddam n-yasuɛ.
iẓr yasuɛ mamnk a-bahra-srs-umnn, isawl s-ukušam yini-as: «way-argaz, ittin fllak ddnub-nnk.»
bdun imslmdn-lli n-ššrɛ d-ifarisin ar-swingimn d-ih̬fawn-nsn: «ma-iga ġwad ar-isawal s-lkufr? ma-iẓḍarn a-issitti ddnub abla rbbi waḥdut?»
imma yasuɛ issn ma-ġ-a-swingimn, yini-asn: «mah̬ aylliġ a-tswingimm d-ih̬fawn-nnun ġmkad?
ma-gisn-irh̬an, ad-iniġ ‹ittin fllak ddnub-nnk› nġd ad-iniġ ‹nkr ar-ttidut›?
imma ġilad rad-awn-mlġ is-dari taẓḍḍart ġ-ddunit ad-ssittiġ ddnub, nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm.» isawl ilmma s-ukušam yini-as: «nniġ-ak, nkr, tasit imjdin-nnk, tddut s-tgmmi-nnk.»
inkr ġakudan ġ-lgddam-nsn yasi maylli-f-ign iddu s-tgmmi-ns ar-italġ rbbi.
ġuwḍn mddn-an kullutn iḍr-asn lɛjb, ar-talġn rbbi ar-ttinin: «tiġawsiwin hiyyanin a-nẓra ġassad.»
tiġurdin n-mayan iffuġ yasuɛ iẓr yan bu-nkkas ism-ns lawi, igawr ġ-tgmmi lli-ġ-a-tamẓn iqaridn n-nkkas. yini-as yasuɛ: «ašk-id, mun didi.»
inkr lawi ifl kullu ma-dars-illan imun dids.
iskr-as lawi yan-imnsi imqqurn ġ-tgmmi-ns. gawrn didsn id-bu-nkkas ggutnin d-inbgiwn yaḍni.
imma ifarisin d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ zġ-lmdhb-nsn ar-ssngmugn f-imḥḍarn n-yasuɛ inin-asn: «mah̬ aylliġ a-tšttam ar-tssam d-willi tamẓnin nkkas ula mddn-an ʷh̬šnnin?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «urd ġwilli dusnin a-iḥtajjan aṭbib walaynni ġwilli uḍnnin.
ur-d-uškiġ a-n-ġrġ i-willi ġalnin is-fulkin, walaynni uškiġ-d a-n-ġrġ i-willi ʷh̬šnnin, ad-fln lh̬ʷšant-nsn.»
sqsan-t: «mah̬ aylliġ a-bahra-taẓumn ar-tẓallan imḥḍarn n-yuḥanna ula imḥḍarn n-ifarisin, imma imḥḍarn-nnk kiyi ar-šttan ar-ssan?»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «is-tẓḍarm a-tinim i-ayt-tmġra ad-aẓumn d-usli didsn?
walaynni rad-d-aškin-uwssan lli-ġ-ra-fllasn-yitti-usli. ġ-uwssan-an a-ġ-rad-taẓumn.»

izayd yasuɛ yut-asn lmɛna-yad yini-asn: «ur-illi ma-itbbin tadġart zġ-tmlsit l-ljdid ig-tt i-tmlsit taqdimt. iġ-iskr ġmkan ra-ihlk timlsit l-ljdid, ur-ra-di-tmšaška-tdġart l-ljdid d-tmlsit taqdimt.
ur-illi ma-itggan aman n-waḍil iktin l-ljdid ġ-ilmawn iqdimn. iġ-iskr ġmkan rad-stġn-waman l-ljdid ilmawn iqdimn ffin-waman ġ-wakal h̬srn ilmawn.
walaynni iqqan-d a-bdda-tggan aman l-ljdid ġ-ilmawn l-ljdid.
wanna iswan aman n-waḍil iqdimn ur-ra-yiri win ljdid, ašku ar-ittini ‹aqdim a-ifulkin.›»
yan-wass n-usunfu ifta yasuɛ ġ-igran ġ-gr imndi. ar-tkkisn imḥḍarn-ns tizlfin ar-tnt-jjmjurun ġ-gr ifassn-nsn ar-tnt-šttan.
sawln srsn kra n-ifarisin inin-asn: «mah̬ aylliġ a-tskarm ġ-wass n-usunfu ġaylli ur-gis-iḥllan?»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «is-ur-tġrim f-dawd ma-iskr ġakud lliġ-t-inġa laẓ bahra, ntta d-willi dids munnin?
ikšm s-tgmmi n-rbbi, yasi aġrum lli-ityawfkan i-rbbi. ur-iḥlla i-umššu abla i-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi. išš-t dawd ifk-t i-usmun-ns.»
izayd yasuɛ yini-asn: «imma nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, giġ sidis n-wass n-usunfu.»
yan-wass n-usunfu yaḍni ikšm yasuɛ s-tgmmi n-tẓallit ar-isslmad. illa ġin yan-urgaz immut-as-ufus afasi.
ilin kra n-imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-ifarisin ran ad-afn ġ-yasuɛ ma-s-a-yas-ṣraḍn. gabln-t ad-ẓrn is-ra-t-ijjujji ġ-wass n-usunfu.
imma yasuɛ issn iswingimn-nsn, isawl s-urgaz lli-mi-immut-ufus yini-as: «ašk-id s-wammas.» inkr-d ibidd ġ-wammas-nsn.
izayd yasuɛ isqsa mddn-an: «iniyat-iyi, ma-iḥllan ġ-wass n-usunfu? a-nskar ma-ifulkin nġd a-nskar ma-yʷh̬šnn? izd a-njjnjm yan nġd a-t-nhlk?»
igrawl gisn kullutn, isawl ilmma s-urgaz-lli yini-as: «mdi-d afus-nnk.» imdi-as-t-id s-ijji idus-ufus-ns.
imma ntni nkrn-d gisn iriyn, bdun ar-tmšawarn i-ngratsn f-ma-rad-skrn i-yasuɛ.
yan-wass ġ-uwssan-an iġli yasuɛ s-yan-uwrir a-iẓẓall. izzri iḍ kullut ar-itẓalla ar-itḍalab rbbi.
lliġ-d-iġli-wass iġr-d i-imḥḍarn-ns s-dars. isti zġ-gisn sin d-mraw, ig-tn d-irqqasn-ns.
isti simɛan ifk-as ism l-ljdid ‹bṭrus›, isti andraws gʷmas n-simɛan. isti yaɛqub d-yuḥanna d-filibbus d-bartulamaws
d-matta d-tuma d-yaɛqub yus n-ḥalfa d-simɛan lli-mi-ttinin ‹awaṭani›
d-yahuda yus n-yaɛqub, ntni d-yahuda ish̬aryuṭ lli-ra-izznz yasuɛ tigira.

lliġ-d-igguz yasuɛ d-irqqasn-ns, ibidd ġ-yan-udġar yastwan. munn-d fllas kigan d-imḥḍarn-ns d-mddn yaḍni ggutnin. uškan-d zġ-tsgiw n-yudaya ula urušalim ula zġ-tmdinin n-ṣur d-ṣayda lli-llanin ġ-tama n-umda imqqurn.
irin ad-sflidn i-iwaliwn-ns jjin zġ-tmuḍan-nsn. ġakudan ar-ijjujji ula ġwilli ssrfufunn ljnun ʷh̬šnnin.
ar-di-takmurn mddn kullutn ad-as-ggrn, ašku ar-zgis-ttffuġ lbaraka. ar-tn-ijjujji kullutn.
issmaqql yasuɛ ġ-imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «imbarkin a-tgam a-willi ḥtajjanin, ašku kunni a-mi-tlla-tgldit n-rbbi.
imbarkin a-tgam a-willi yaġ laẓ ġilad, ašku kunni a-ra-išbɛ. imbarkin a-tgam a-willi allanin ġilad, ašku kunni a-ra-iḍṣṣa.
imbarkin a-tgam iġ-kʷn-kurhan mddn ssufġn-kʷn rgmn-kʷn ar-fllawn-ttinin ‹kunni tʷh̬šnm› f-ssibt n-ma-tgam win yus n-bnadm.
thnnayat iġ-a-skarn ġmkan, tfrḥm bahra, ašku tggut lbaraka lli-rad-awn-yili ġ-ignna. han ġmkan ad-skrn imzwura-nsn i-lanbiya lli-zrinin.
«walaynni taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili, a-willi dar iggut-wayda, ašku tkmml taġamt l-lh̬ir-nnun.
taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili, a-willi šbɛanin ġilad, ašku ra-kʷn-yaġ laẓ. taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili, a-willi ḍṣṣanin ġilad, ašku ra-kʷn-tigʷraẓ ar-tallam.
taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili iġ-a-kʷn-talġn kullu mddn. han ġmkan ad-skrn imzwura-nsn i-ayt-tkrkas lli-ittinin izd lanbiya ad-gan.
«wa-kunni-ad sri isflidn, rad-awn-iniġ, ḥnnwat ġ-inuwwašn-nnun. skrat afulki ġ-willi-kʷn-kurhanin.
ḍalbat rbbi a-ibark ġwilli-kʷn-rgmnin, tḍalbm-t a-irḥm ġwilli-kʷn-ssrfufnnin.
iġ-k-yut yan f-umadl, mdi-as-n wayyaḍ. iġ-ak-yiwi yan aslham-nnk, adj-t a-yawi ula aqššab.
kullu wanna zgik iḍalbn, fk-as. d-wanna yiwin ma-igan winnk, a-t-ur-tḍalbt a-t-id-irar.
skarat d-mddn ġmklli tram a-t-didun-skarn.
iġ-a-ttḥnnum ġ-willi gigun tḥnnunin, man afulki tskrm? ašku ġwilli ʷh̬šnnin ar-tḥnnun ula ntni ġ-willi gisn tḥnnunin.
iġ-a-tskarm lh̬ir ġ-willi gigun skarnin lh̬ir, man afulki tskrm? ašku ġwilli ʷh̬šnnin ula ntni ar-skarn ġmkan.
«iġ-a-trṭṭlm i-willi-s-tssnm is-rad-awn-tn-d-rarn tigira, man afulki tskrm? ašku ġwilli ʷh̬šnnin ar-rṭṭln ula ntni i-wiyyaḍ ʷh̬šnnin a-d-darsn-tamẓn ġunšk lli-asn-rḍln.

walaynni ḥnnwat ġ-inuwwašn-nnun, ar-asn-tskarm lh̬ir. rṭṭlat bla-da-tswingimm a-tamẓm arṭṭal-nnun tigira. ġmkad a-s-ra-tgm tarwa n-rbbi amattuy, tili-awn lbaraka iggutn. ašku ntta ar-itfulki d-willi-t-ur-tškarnin d-willi skarnin ma-yʷh̬šnn.
tḥnnwat ġ-wiyyaḍ ġmklli itḥnnu rbbi babatun.
a-ur-tinim f-yan is-yʷh̬šn, a-ur-fllawn-yini rbbi is-tʷh̬šnm. a-ur-tḥkamm f-yan, a-ur-fllawn-iḥkam rbbi. ṣamḥat i-wiyyaḍ f-ad-awn-iṣamḥ rbbi.
akkayat i-wiyyaḍ f-a-yawn-yakka rbbi s-lɛbrt imqqurn iɛmmrn immussan ttyadar, ra-n-tffi ġ-ušlliq-nnun. ašku s-lɛbrt lli-s-a-ttɛbbarm a-s-rad-awn-ityawɛbbar.»
izayd yasuɛ yut-asn lmɛna-yad isqsa-tn: «is-iẓḍar-ubukaḍ a-izwur i-ubukaḍ? is-ur-ra-n-ḍrn s-sin ġ-ugḍi?
amḥḍar ur-yugʷr amslmd-ns, walaynni kraygatt amḥḍar iġ-ikmml almmud-ns ra-ig zund amslmd-ns.
mah̬ a-n-ttmnadt arftus imẓẓin ġ-tiṭ n-gʷmak ur-tt-akkʷ-tiwit ġ-tggjdit lli-illan ġ-tiṭ-nnk?

mamnk a-trit a-tinit i-gʷmak ‹adj-iyi a-gʷma, ad-ak-d-ssittiġ arftus-an a-k-illan ġ-tiṭ,› imma kiyi ur-akkʷ-tẓrit taggjdit lli-illan ġ-tiṭ-nnk? wa-bu-sin-uwdmawn, ssitti-zwar taggjdit zġ-tiṭ-nnk baš a-tẓrt mamnk a-tssittit arftus zġ-tiṭ n-gʷmak.
«tasġart ifulkin ur-a-takka lġllt yʷh̬šnn. tasġart yʷh̬šnn ur-a-takka lġllt ifulkin.
kraygatt tasġart, zġ-lġllt-ns a-zġ-a-ttyawssan. ur-a-ntkkis ikuzarn zġ-uzggʷar, ula-da-ntkkis aḍil zġ-ušddir.

yan ifulkin, ar-d-issufuġ ma-ifulkin zġ-lh̬zin n-ufulki lli-issmun ġ-uwl-ns. yan yʷh̬šnn, ar-d-issufuġ ma-yʷh̬šnn zġ-lh̬zin l-lh̬ʷšant lli-issmun ġ-uwl-ns. ašku aynna-s-iɛmmr-uwl a-s-a-isawal imi.
«mah̬ aylliġ a-yyi-ttinim ‹wa-sidi wa-sidi› walaynni ur-a-tskarm s-wawal-inu?
kullu wanna-d-dari-yuškan isfld i-iwaliwn-ad-inu ar-srsn-iskar, rad-awn-mlġ ma-irwas.
irwas argaz lli-ibnan tigmmi, iġza bahra izzugz llsas f-isli. lliġ-d-ingi-wasif yut tigmmi ur-tt-issmussi ašku idus llsas-ns.
imma wanna isfldn i-iwaliwn-ad-inu ur-a-srsn-iskar, irwas argaz lli-ibnan tigmmi-ns f-wakal ur-iġza llsas. lliġ-d-ingi-wasif yut tigmmi tḍr-d, th̬lu kullutt.»
lliġ ikmml yasuɛ kullu ma-ira a-yini i-mddn-an, iddu s-tmdint n-kafrnaḥum.
illa ġin yal-lqbṭan n-iɛskrin n-rruman, yili dars yan-uh̬ddam-ns yuḍn bahra iftu a-immt. ah̬ddam-an iɛzza dars bahra.
lliġ isfld lqbṭan f-yasuɛ yazn-d kra n-imġarn n-ayt-yudaya s-dars a-zgis-ḍalbn a-n-dars-yašk a-ijjujji ah̬ddam-ns.
ntni ruḥn-d yasuɛ ḍalbn-t bahra inin-as: «isthlla ad-as-tskrt lh̬ir-ad,
ašku ar-itḥubbu ayt-tmazirt-nnġ ibnu-aġ tigmmi n-tẓallit.»
imun didsn yasuɛ. lliġ-n-akmurn s-tgmmi yazn-d lqbṭan kra n-imddukkʷal-ns s-yasuɛ yini-as: «wa-sidi, ad-ur-tssiḥlt ih̬f-nnk. ur-sthllaġ a-di-tkšmt s-tgmmi-nu.
mayan a-f-ur-n-dark-uškiġ ašku ḥšmġ, walaynni ġir ini yan-wawal s-ijji-uh̬ddam-inu.
ha-yyi ula nkki ar-skarġ s-wawal n-ma-yyi-yugʷrn, ilin iɛskrin ġ-ddu-ufus-inu. iġ-nniġ i-yan: ‹ddu› iddu, iġ-nniġ i-wayyaḍ ‹ašk-id› yašk-id, iġ-nniġ i-uh̬ddam-inu ‹skr tawuri-ad› iskr-tt.»
lliġ isfld yasuɛ i-mayad itɛjjb. igrawl ġ-mddn-an ggutnin lli-d-dids-munnin yini-asn: «rad-awn-iniġ, ur-jju-ufiġ kra n-yan yumnn zund ġwad, ula ġ-gr ayt-rbbi.»
ddun ġwilli-d-yuzn lqbṭan wrrin s-tgmmi-ns, afn-in ah̬ddam-ns ijji.
tiġurdin n-mayan iddu yasuɛ s-yat-tmdint lli-mi-ttinin nayn, munn dids imḥḍarn-ns d-wiyyaḍ ggutnin.
lliġ-n-ilkm imi n-tmdint, ha-kra n-mddn usin-d yan-uɛyyal immut. iga yus n-yat-thjjalt, d-nttat ur-dars abla nttan. ilin dids kigan d-ayt-tmdint-an.
lliġ-tt-iẓra siditnnġ tqama gis bahra, yini-as: «ad-ur-tallat.»
iruḥ-n nnɛaš iggr-as, s-biddn ġwilli-t-usinin, yini: «way-aɛyyal, nniġ-ak, nkr.»
inkr-d ġwalli immutn, ibdu ar-isawal. yawi-t yasuɛ ifk-t i-innas.
ġuwḍn mddn-an kullutn ar-talġn rbbi ar-ttinin: «yuška-yaġ-d yan-nnabi imqqurn. yakmur-d rbbi a-iɛawn mddn-ns.»
ar-bahra-sawaln f-yasuɛ awin lh̬bar-ns s-tmazirt n-yudaya kullutt ula s-tmizar lli-as-lullinin.
ddun imḥḍarn n-yuḥanna amsddam inin i-yuḥanna f-kullu tiġawsiwin-ad. iġr ilmma i-sin zġ-gisn s-dars,
yazn-tn s-dar siditnnġ, yuṣṣa-tn a-t-sqsan «izd kiyi a-igan ġwalli ra-d-yašk, nġd a-sul-ntql s-yan yaḍni?»
aškin-d s-dar yasuɛ inin-as: «yuzn-aġ-d yuḥanna amsddam inna-yak ‹izd kiyi a-igan ġwalli ra-d-yašk, nġd a-sul-ntql s-yan yaḍni?›»
ġ-tasaɛt-an ar-ijjujji yasuɛ kigan d-mddn ġ-llant-tmuḍan d-waṭṭan d-ljnun ʷh̬šnnin, ar-itrara ibukaḍn ggutnin ad-isfiwn.

isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «zaydat tinim i-yuḥanna f-ma-tẓram ula ma-mi-tsfldm. ha-ibukaḍn ar-ttisfiwn, ikušamn ar-fttun, injdamn ar-tġusn, iḍrḍar ar-sflidn, ġwilli mmutnin ar-d-nkkrn, imẓlaḍ ar-tn-ilkkm lh̬bar ifulkin.
ambarki a-iga wanna ur-gigi-yufin ma-f-a-yas-ṭiyyar.»
lliġ ddan ġwilli-d-yuzn yuḥanna, isawl yasuɛ f-yuḥanna i-mddn ggutnin lli-d-fllas-munnin, isqsa-tn: «ġakud lliġ a-ttidum s-lh̬la ma-tram a-tẓrm? izd kra n-taẓẓmayt ar-tt-issmussu-waḍu?
walaynni ma-s-a-ttidum a-ti-tẓrm? izd kra n-urgaz ilsan ibrdan šwanin? han ġwilli dar ibrdan šwanin d-tġawsiwin ġʷlanin, ġ-tgʷmma n-igldan a-ġ-llan.
iniyat-iyi, ma-s-a-ttidum a-ti-tẓrm? is-urd yan-nnabi? rad-awn-iniġ, iga yan imqqurn ġ-lanbiya.
ašku yuḥanna a-f-ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi ‹rad-aznġ arqqas-inu ad-ak-izwur ijjujad-ak aġaras-nnk.›
rad-awn-iniġ, ur-illi ġ-tarwa n-tmġarin yan yugʷrn yuḥanna. imma wad kullu imẓẓin ġ-tgldit n-rbbi, yugʷr yuḥanna.»
lliġ sfldn mddn-an ggutnin d-id-bu-nkkas i-mayad, inin i-ngratsn: «rbbi ar-bdda-iskar afulki.» ašku f-ufus n-yuḥanna a-f-ddmn ġ-waman.
walaynni ifarisin d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ ffuġn zġ-ma-gisn-iqṣad rbbi, agʷin ad-ddmn f-ufus-ns.
yini-asn ilmma yasuɛ: «ma-s-rad-awn-ssrwasġ mddn n-tasut-ad? mad-rwasn?
rwasn tarwa lli-skiwsnin ġ-ssuq, ar-n-yaqra kra s-kra ar-ttinin ‹nut-awn taɛuwwatt ur-a-ttḥušm. nasi-awn amarg ur-a-tallam.›
yuška-d yuḥanna amsddam ur-a-ištta aġrum ula-da-issa aman n-waḍil iktin, ar-fllas-ttinim: ‹illa gis yal-ljnn.›
aškġ-d nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm ar-šttaġ ar-ssaġ, ar-flla-ttinim: ‹ġwad iga bu-udis ig askayri, ig amddakkʷl n-ayt-nkkas d-wiyyaḍ ʷh̬šnnin.›
walaynni taḥkimt n-rbbi, kullu willi srs skarnin ar-tt-in-tafan tʷġẓan.»
yan-ufarisi iḍalb yasuɛ a-dids-išš imkli. ikšm s-tgmmi n-ufarisi igawr a-išš.
tašk-id ġakudan yat-tmġart ullt-tmdint-an, tga tad iskarn ma-yʷh̬šnn. tsfld f-yasuɛ is-illa ġ-tgmmi n-ufarisi, tasi-d yat-tbuqqalt n-uẓru lli-ġ-tlla tujjut išwan.
tbidd ġ-tġurdin n-yasuɛ ġ-dar iḍarn-ns ar-talla. ar-d-ṭṭarn imṭṭawn-ns f-iwurzan n-yasuɛ, ar-as-tsfaḍ iwurzan s-wazzar-ns ar-tn-tsudun ar-tn-tẓġġur s-tujjut.
imma afarisi, lliġ iẓra mayad yini d-ih̬f-ns: «mrad is-iga-urgaz-ad nnabi, ra-yissan ma-tga h̬tad-as-itggrn, yissan iskkirn-ns, ašku hatti gar tamġart a-tga.»
isawl yasuɛ s-ufarisi yini-as: «wa-simɛan, rad-ak-iniġ kra.» irar-as: «ini-yyi ay-amslmd.»
yini-as yasuɛ: «ha-yan iḍfar i-sin mddn, yan iḍfar-as smmus id-miyya n-nnuqrt, wayyaḍ iḍfar-as ġir smmus id-mraw.
ntni lliġ ur-darsn ma-s-a-yas-traran, iṣamḥ-asn s-sin. manwa-s-tnnit ra-dars-iɛzzu-urgaz-an bahra?»
yini-as simɛan: «irwas-iyi izd ġwan mi iṣamḥ ġ-uggʷar.» yini-as yasuɛ: «tʷġẓant.»

igrawl ilmma ġ-tmġart-lli, yini i-simɛan: «is-tẓrit tamġart-ad? ha-yyi uškiġ-d s-tgmmi-nnk, ur-iyi-tfkit aman ma-s-a-siridġ iwurzan-inu, imma nttat hatti tsird iwurzan-inu s-imṭṭawn-ns, tsfiḍ-tn s-wazzar-ns.
kiyi ur-didi-tnsallamt s-yan-usudn, imma nttat zġ-ma-d-kšmġ ad-ukan-tsudun iwurzan-inu.
kiyi ur-iyi-tẓġurt ih̬f-inu s-zzit. imma nttat, hatti ar-tẓġġur iwurzan-inu s-tujjut išwan.
rad-ak-iniġ, s-kigan ad-dars-iɛzza ma-igan win rbbi, ašku ggutn ddnub-ns lli-f-as-iṣamḥ. imma yan mi iṣamḥ f-ma-idrusn, ġir imikk a-s-rad-dars-iɛzzu.»
yini ilmma i-tmġart: «ittin fllam ddnub-nnm.»
lliġ-as-sfldn ġwilli dids dranin, bdun ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «ma-iga ġwad aylliġ a-issitti ddnub?»
imma yasuɛ inna i-tmġart: «ha-kmmi tnjmt ašku tumnt. zayd s-sslamt.»
tiġurdin n-mayan iddu yasuɛ ar-itkka timdinin ula iduran ar-itbrraḥ s-lh̬bar ifulkin f-tgldit n-rbbi. ar-dids-tmunun imḥḍarn-ns s-sin d-mraw,
ntni d-kra n-tmġarin lli-ijjujji yasuɛ zġ-tmuḍan-nsnt issufġ zġ-gisnt ljnun ʷh̬šnnin. tlla maryam lli-mi-ttinin ullt-magdala, issufġ zġ-gis ssa ljnun.
tili yuwanna tamġart n-h̬uzi lli-igan amġar ġ-tgmmi n-ugllid hirudus. tili susanna d-tiyyaḍ ggutnin, ar-tɛawannt yasuɛ d-imḥḍarn-ns zġ-ma-igan winsnt.
aškin-d mddn s-dar yasuɛ zġ-tmdinin kullutnt n-tmazirt-an. lliġ-d-fllas-munn s-kigan yut-asn lmɛna-yad yini-asn:
«hay-afllaḥ iffuġ a-n-iluḥ amud. lliġ-t-iluḥ iḍr-n kra ġ-uġaras, akʷln fllas mddn, grun-t igḍaḍ.
iḍr-n kra f-isli. lliġ-d-imġi yiqar ašku ur-dars aman.
iḍr-n kra ġ-uzggʷar, iġli d-uzggʷar iššqajji-t.
iḍr-n kra ġ-wakal ifulkin imġi-d ifk ṣṣabt, ifk f-miyya n-twal.» izayd yasuɛ yall awal-ns yini-asn: «wanna dar imzgan a-srsn-isflid, illa fllas a-isfld.»
sqsan-t imḥḍarn-ns f-lmɛna-yad.

yini-asn yasuɛ: «kunni ityawfka-yawn a-tissanm f-tgldit n-rbbi ma-intln f-wiyyaḍ. imma ntni, ġir s-lmɛni a-s-rad-asn-ityawnna. ġmklli ityaran, ‹rad-tmnadn walaynni ur-rad-ẓrn yat. rad-sflidn walaynni ur-rad-fhmn yat.›
«ġmkad a-tga lmɛna-yad. amud iga awal n-rbbi.
ġwalli iḍrn ġ-uġaras iga zund mddn lli-sfldnin i-wawal yašk-id iblis ikkis awal zġ-ih̬f-nsn baš a-ur-amnn njmn.
imma ġwalli iḍrn ġ-isli iga zund mddn lli-sfldnin i-wawal frḥn srs walaynni ur-ikšim-wawal-an s-uwl-nsn. amnn ġir kra n-uwssan ard tili tassast s-knukin.
imma ġwalli iḍrn ġ-uzggʷar iga zund mddn lli-sfldnin i-wawal, ddun ilmma asin tiġufiwin n-ddunit-ad lhun s-wayda ršqn s-tġawsiwin yaḍni. ġayan a-iššqajjin awal aylliġ ur-d-yiwi ṣṣabt.
walaynni ġwalli iḍrn ġ-wakal ifulkin iga zund mddn lli-sfldnin i-wawal n-rbbi amẓn-t s-nniyt n-uwl-nsn iġusn, ar-srs-skarn bla-da-trmayn, fkn ṣṣabt-nsn.
«ur-illi ma-issrġan lqndil idl-t s-tkint nġd a-t-in-ig ġ-ddu tisi. walaynni f-iggi n-mani yattuyn a-f-ra-t-in-isrs, baš a-tban tifawt i-kullu wanna-d-ikšmn.
kullu ma-intln, ra-t-ẓrn mddn tigira. kullu ma-idln, ra-t-zzudfn ssbayynn-t-id.
awiyat-stt ġ-mayd mi tsflidm, ašku wanna dar illa, rad-as-izayd rbbi. imma wanna ur-dar-illi, rad-as-ikkis ula maylli-s-iġal is-dars-illa.»
tašk-id innas n-yasuɛ d-aytmas, ur-ufin maniġ a-t-in-lkkmn ašku ggutn mddn lli-fllas-munnin.
yini-as-d yan: «ha-innak d-aytmak biddn-in ġ-brra. ran a-k-ẓrn.»
imma ntta inna-yasn: «inna d-aytma gan-tn ġwid sflidnin i-wawal n-rbbi ar-srs-skarn.»
yan-wass ikšm yasuɛ s-yat-tanawt ntta d-imḥḍarn-ns, yini-asn: «a-nddu s-tsga-yan yaḍni n-umda.» ffuġn ftun f-waman.
lliġ a-ttidun ign yasuɛ. inkr-d-waḍu ġ-tasaɛt-an iduy-umda aylliġ a-ttɛmmar tanawt s-waman, tftu a-tddm.
ddun imḥḍarn ssfaqn-t inin-as: «wa-sidi, wa-sidi, ha-yaġ ra-nhlk.» inkr yasuɛ yamr aḍu ula taḍangiwin, s-zgan kullu, iwrri-umda ihnna bahra.
yini ilmma i-imḥḍarn-ns: «is-ur-tuminm?» imma ntni ġuwḍn ar-bahra-tɛjjabn ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «ma-iga ġwad aylliġ a-itamr aḍu d-umda, ar-skarn s-wawal-ns?»
lkmn tamazirt n-garasa, taggug f-tmazirt n-jalil ġ-tsga yaḍni n-umda.
iffuġ yasuɛ zġ-tanawt s-t-id-imnaggar yan-urgaz gu-tmdint-an, llan gis ljnun. kigan a-ur-ilssa yat. ur-a-ittiri tigmmi, ar-izddġ ġir ġ-gr ismḍal.
lliġ iẓra yasuɛ yut s-yat-tġuyyit iḍr ġ-dar iḍarn-ns iġuwwt yini-as: «wa-yasuɛ yus n-rbbi amattuy, ma-illan ġ-griyi didk? ḍalbġ-ak, ḍalbġ-ak a-ur-iyi-tssrfufnt.»
ašku yasuɛ yumr ljnn a-zgis-iffuġ. argaz-an, mnnawt-twal a-t-yumẓ ljnn. ar-ti-tgabaln mddn ar-t-kkrfn zġ-ifassn ula iḍarn s-ssnasl ula lgyud, walaynni ar-itbbi ssnasl, ar-t-idḥay ljnn s-lh̬la.
isqsa-t yasuɛ ġakudan: «ma-iga ism-nnk?» yini-as: «iga ism-inu ‹mnnaw›.» ašku ggutn ljnun lli-gis-llanin.
ḍalbn-t ljnun bahra a-tn-ur-iṭṭay s-tdrut n-wakal.
ttyawksa ġ-uwrir-an yat-tuwrut iggutn n-walfan. ḍalbn-t ljnun bahra a-tn-yadj ad-kšmn s-walfan, yadj-tn.
ffuġn zġ-urgaz kšmn s-walfan, tazzl-tuwrut s-jjhd zġ-ujarif s-umda, h̬sin-in kullutn.
lliġ ẓran imksawn ma-ijran rwln awin lh̬bar i-mddn ġ-tmdint ula igran.
ffuġn-d mddn ad-ẓrn ma-illan, aškin-d s-dar yasuɛ afn-d argaz lli-zġ-ffuġn ljnun iskiws ġ-dar iḍarn n-yasuɛ ils timlsit-ns yili s-ih̬f-ns. d-ntni ksuḍn.
imma ġwilli ẓranin ma-ijran nnan-asn f-mamnk a-ijji-umjnun.
nkrn mddn-an n-ayt-garasa ġakudan, ḍalbn zġ-yasuɛ a-iffuġ tamazirt-nsn ašku ksuḍn bahra. ikšm yasuɛ s-tanawt a-iwrri.
imma ġwalli-zġ-ffuġn ljnun iḍalb yasuɛ bahra a-t-yadj a-dids-imun. imma yasuɛ yuzn-t yini-as:
«wrri s-tgmmi tinit-asn f-mad-ak-iskr rbbi.» iddu-urgaz-an ar-itlulli ġ-tmdint kullutt ar-isawal f-mad-as-iskr yasuɛ.
iwrri-d yasuɛ s-tsga-yad n-umda. frḥn mddn lliġ-t-ẓran ašku ar-kullu-srs-tqln.
yašk-id yan-urgaz ism-ns yayrus, iga yan zġ-imġarn n-tgmmi n-tẓallit. iḍr-d ġ-dar iḍarn n-yasuɛ iḍalb-t bahra a-dids-imun s-tgmmi-ns
ašku ar-as-ttmtat illis, ur-dars abla nttat. tg illis n-sin d-mraw n-usggʷas. iftu yasuɛ imun dids, walaynni ar-t-bahra-ssnukmun mddn zġ-kraygatt tasga.
tili ġ-gratsn yat-tmġart tuḍn, illa-bdda-gis-usggʷrd n-idammn sin d-mraw n-usggʷas. tfka kullu ma-dars-illan i-iṭbibn, walaynni ur-iẓḍar yan a-stt-ijjujji.
tzri zġ-gr mddn aylliġ truḥ tiġurdin n-yasuɛ. tggr i-tama n-tmlsit-ns, s-bbin idammn tjji.
yini-asn yasuɛ: «mad-iyi-d-iggrn?» ar-kullu-ttinin: «urd nkki, urd nkki.» yini-as bṭrus: «hati a-sidi, ggutn mddn-ad ar-k-id-ssnukmun ar-k-dḥayn bahra.»
imma yasuɛ inna: «iggr-iyi-d kra n-yan, ašku ssḥssaġ is-zgigi-tffuġ kra l-lbaraka.»
lliġ tssn-tmġart-lli is-ur-tẓḍar a-tssntal mayd-as-ijran, tašk-id tḍr ġ-dar iḍarn n-yasuɛ ar-ttrgigiy s-tawda. tini-as ġ-lgddam n-mddn-an kullutn ma-f-as-tggr ula mamnk a-s-tjji ḥayna.
yini-as yasuɛ: «way-illi, tjjit ġilad ašku tumnt. zayd s-sslamt.»
sul a-dids-isawal yasuɛ s-d-yuška yan zġ-tgmmi n-umġar yayrus, yini-as: «han illik tmmut. a-ur-sul-tssiḥlt amslmd.»
isfld yasuɛ i-ma-inna, isawl s-yayrus yini-as: «ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ. ġir amn, ra-tjji.»
lliġ ilkm yasuɛ tigmmi n-yayrus ur-yudji yan a-dids-ikšm abla bṭrus d-yuḥanna d-yaɛqub ntni d-babas n-tfruh̬t d-innas.
kullu willi llanin ġin ar-allan ar-ssġuyyun. imma yasuɛ inna-yasn: «ad-ur-tallam. han ur-tmmut. ġir tgn.»
ar-gis-ḍṣṣan ašku ssnn is-tmmut.
imma yasuɛ yumẓ-as ġ-ufus iġr-as yini: «wa-tafruh̬t, nkr-d.»
twrri-tt-id rruḥ-ns tbidd f-iḍarn-ns. yini-asn: «fkat-as ma-tštta.»
tɛjjbn ayt-dars bahra, imma yasuɛ yuṣṣa-tn ad-ur-inin i-yan f-ma-ijran.
iġr-d yasuɛ i-imḥḍarn-ns s-sin d-mraw s-dars, ifk-asn taḥkimt d-tẓḍḍart ad-ssufuġn kullu ljnun ar-jjujjin timuḍan.
yazn-tn a-ttidun ar-tbrraḥn f-tgldit n-rbbi ar-jjujjin mddn.
yini-asn: «a-ur-tasim yat i-uġaras. a-ur-tawim aɛmud nġd aqʷrab nġd aġrum nġd iqaridn nġd sin iqšban.
tigmmi nna-s-tkšmm, gawrat gis ar akud nna-ra-tmuddum zġ-tmdint-an.
tamdint nna-kʷn-ur-irin, ffuġat zġ-gis tssusm agdrur n-iḍarn-nnun, ad-asn-ig tamatart ma-ġ-a-swingimn.»
ġakudan ad-ftan imḥḍarn ar-tkkan iduran ar-tbrraḥn s-lh̬bar ifulkin ar-jjujjin mddn ġ-kraygatt mani.
isfld-ugllid hirudus f-kullu ma-iskar yasuɛ, iduhdu ašku ar-ttinin kra n-mddn: «yuḥanna amsddam ayad, inkr-d zġ-lmut.»
ar-ttinin wiyyaḍ: «iban-d-daġ nnabi iliyya.» ar-ttinin wiyyaḍ: «iwrri-d kra n-yan zġ-lanbiya n-zman.»
imma hirudus inna: «yuḥanna bbiġ-as ih̬f, walaynni ma-iga ġwad f-sfldġ i-tġawsiwin-ad?» yiri bahra a-iẓr yasuɛ.
lliġ-d-wrrin irqqasn s-dar yasuɛ inin-as f-kullu mad-skrn. yawi-tn waḥdutn ddun s-tsga n-yat-tmdint lli-mi-ttinin bitṣayda.
sfldn mddn ggutnin f-manis idda ḍfurn-t. ifrḥ srsn yasuɛ ar-asn-isawal f-tgldit n-rbbi, ijjujji ġwilli uḍnnin.
lliġ idda-wass aškin-d dars imḥḍarn-ns s-sin d-mraw inin-as: «azn mddn ad-ddun s-iduran d-igran-ad akmurnin ad-afn mad-šttan ula maniġ a-nssan, ašku ur-illi yat ġ-lh̬la-yad.»
imma yasuɛ irur-asn: «fkat-asn kunni mad-šttan.» inin-as: «ur-darnnġ ġir smmust-tngʷal d-snat-tslmin. is-zginnġ-trit a-nddu a-d-nsġ amššu i-mddn-ad kullutn?»
ašku illa ġin ma-itggan smmus id-walf n-urgaz. isawl-daġ yasuɛ yini i-imḥḍarn-ns: «ssgawrat mddn, tgm-tn d-tġamatin. ad-ilin smmus id-mraw ġ-kraygatt taġamt.»
skrn ma-s-asn-inna ssgawrn-tn kullutn.
yasi yasuɛ smmust-tngʷal-lli d-tslmin-lli s-snat, yall alln-ns s-ignwan iškr rbbi ibbi-tnt, ifk i-imḥḍarn-ns a-n-srasn i-mddn.
ššn kullutn aylliġ šbɛan. ssmunn-d tuffaẓ lli-d-qamanin, ɛmmrn snat d-mrawt n-tasllit.
yan-wass ar-itẓalla yasuɛ waḥdut, aškin-d dars imḥḍarn-ns. isqsa-tn: «ma-flla-ttinin mddn, mad-giġ nkki?»
inin-as: «kra gisn ar-ittini tgit yuḥanna amsddam. kra ar-ittini tgit nnabi iliyya. kra ar-ittini tgit kra n-yan zġ-lanbiya n-zman inkr-d iwrri-d.»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «imma kunni, ma-flla-ttinim? mad-giġ nkki?» isawl-d bṭrus yini-as: «tgit lmasiḥ n-rbbi.»
yuṣṣa-tn s-lmɛqul ad-ur-inin mayad i-yan.

yini-asn: «ha-nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm iqqan-iyi-d ad-bahra-rfufnġ. ra-yyi-n-luḥn imġarn n-tmazirt d-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ. ra-yyi-nġn, walaynni wis kraḍ-uwssan ra-d-nkrġ zġ-lmut.»
yini-asn kullutn: «wanna iran ad-didi-yili, iqqan-t-id a-ittu ih̬f-ns ar-itasi aggjdi-ns kraygatt ass ar-didi-itmunu.
ašku wanna iran a-ijjnjm tudrt-ns ra-stt-ijlu, imma wanna ijlan tudrt-ns f-ssibt-inu ra-stt-ijjnjm.
ma-ra-yili i-bnadm iġ-iwrri iṭṭaf ddunit kullutt ijlu ih̬f-ns ih̬sr-t?
wanna ittinin ġ-gr mddn ur-iyi-issin ula issn awal-inu, rad-iniġ ur-t-ssinġ ula nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, ġakud lliġ rad-d-aškġ s-lmjd-inu ula lmjd n-baba rbbi ula win lmalayka-ns n-ignna.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, illa ġ-ġwid biddnin ġid ma-ur-ra-immt ard iẓr tagldit n-rbbi tuška-d.»
izri ma-itggan tam-uwssan tigira n-mayan, iftu yasuɛ iġli s-yan-uwrir a-iẓẓall, yawi dids bṭrus d-yuḥanna d-yaɛqub.
lliġ a-itẓalla tbddl ssift n-uwdm-ns, wrrint-tmlsa-ns mllulnt bahra aylliġ a-ssmrqiqiynt.
biddn-d dids sin irgazn ar-dids-sawaln, gan nnabi musa ula nnabi iliyya.
bann-d s-tifawt l-lmjd, ar-sawaln d-yasuɛ f-mamnk a-ra-iffuġ ddunit ikmml ma-gis-iqṣad rbbi ġ-urušalim.
imma bṭrus d-willi dids llanin, yiwi-tn-iyṭṣ. lliġ-d-faqn ẓrn lmjd n-yasuɛ ntta d-sin irgazn lli-dids-biddnin.
iftu musa d-iliyya ad-fln yasuɛ s-isawl bṭrus yini-as: «wa-sidi, ifulki a-nili ġid. ad-awn-nskr kraḍ iḥšaš, yan-nnk d-yan n-musa d-yan n-iliyya?» ntta ur-issin ma-ittini.
sul a-isawal s-d-fllasn-tgguz yat-tmdlut tdl-tn. iksaḍn imḥḍarn lliġ-d-fllasn-iḍr-umalu.
ġakudan isawl-d yan-wawal zġ-tmdlut yini-asn: «ġwad iga iwi amẓlay. sflidat srs.»
ġir ifssa-wawal-an s-ẓran yasuɛ iqama waḥdut. ġ-uwssan-an ur-sawln imḥḍarn f-mad-ẓran ula nnan-t i-yan.
ndid azkka gguzn-d zġ-uwrir, mnaggarn-t-in mddn ggutnin.
inkr yan-urgaz ġ-gratsn iġr-d i-yasuɛ yini-as: «way-amslmd, ašk-id ad-iyi-tẓrt iwi. ur-dari abla nttan,
yili gis yal-ljnn. akud nna-t-iġwi ljnn ar-bahra-issġuyyu, ar-srs-ikkat ar-t-ibrri ard-as-d-ik-ukškuš imi, ur-sul-a-ittiri ad-as-irẓm.
ḍalbġ bahra zġ-imḥḍarn-nnk a-t-zgis-ssufġn, walaynni ur-ẓḍarn.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn kullutn: «wa-tasut-ad ijlan, ur-akkʷ-trit a-tamnt. mnšk a-ra-sul-didun-qamaġ? mnšk a-rad-didun-ṣbrġ? awi-d yuk s-dari.»
iftu-d-ufruh̬ s-dar yasuɛ s-srs-yut ljnn akal issmḥakka-t. isawl-daġ yasuɛ yamr ljnn a-zgis-iffuġ, ijjujji-t irar-t i-babas.
tɛjjbn mddn-an kullutn ar-ttinin: «mnšk ayd-s-tggut-tẓḍḍart n-rbbi.» sul a-tɛjjabn mddn ġ-kullu mayd iskr yasuɛ, s-isawl s-imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn:
«sfldat i-ma-rad-awn-iniġ. ha-nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, ra-yyi-n-dḥin s-gr ifassn n-mddn.»
walaynni imḥḍarn ur-ssinn ma-ira ad-asn-iml s-wawal-ad. tntl fllasn lmɛna-ns aylliġ ur-t-fhimn, iksaḍn ur-ẓḍarn a-t-fllas-sqsan.
bdun imḥḍarn ar-tmjaḥadn i-ngratsn f-manwa gisn a-ra-ig anmġur.
yasuɛ issn mamnk ad-swingimn, yawi-d yan-warraw imẓẓin issbidd-t ġ-tama-ns
yini-asn: «wanna iqbln arraw-ad imẓẓin s-ism-inu, hati iqbl-iyi. d-wanna-yyi-iqbln, iqbl ġwalli-yyi-d-yuznn. ašku wanna kullu gigun imẓẓin, nttan a-igan wad imqqurn.»
yini-as yuḥanna: «wa-sidi, nẓra yan-urgaz ar-issufuġ ljnun s-ism-nnk. ur-t-nudji ašku ur-a-didnnġ-itmunu.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «a-t-ur-tḥṣarm, ašku wanna-kʷn-ur-itḍaḍḍan, hatin iga zġ-gigun.»
lliġ-d-yakmur-uzmz lli-ġ-ra-ityattay yasuɛ s-ignna, iġwi ġ-ih̬f-ns iskr f-urušalim.
yazn kra n-irqqasn a-t-zwurn s-tmazirt n-samira, baš ad-kšmn s-yan-uduwwar ad-as-gis-jjujadn maniġ a-inssa.
walaynni ayt-tmazirt-an ur-t-rin ašku ssnn izd urušalim a-f-iskr.
imma imḥḍarn-ns yaɛqub d-yuḥanna, lliġ ẓran ġayan inin-as: «wa-sidi, is-trit a-nġr s-ignwan a-d-fllasn-tgguz lɛafit thlk-tn?»
igrawl gisn yasuɛ issfssa-tn.
ftun ilmma s-yan-uduwwar yaḍni.
lliġ a-ttidun ġ-uġaras yini-as yan-urgaz: «rad-didk-munġ s-innas ra-tddut.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «ibuġaġ darsn tansiwin-nsn, ula igḍaḍ n-ignwan darsn usudn-nsn, imma yus n-bnadm ur-dars maniġ a-isras agayyu-ns.»
yini yasuɛ i-yan yaḍni: «ašk-id, mun didi.» imma ntta inna-yas: «a-sidi, adj-iyi zwar ad-wrriġ ard-n-mḍlġ baba.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «fl ġwilli ur-ṭṭafnin tudrt a-n-mḍln winna-yasn-mmutnin. zayd kiyi, ar-ttawit lh̬bar i-mddn f-tgldit n-rbbi.»
yašk-id yan yaḍni yini-as: «rad-didk-munġ a-sidi, walaynni adj-iyi zwar a-n-msafaḍġ d-ayt-tgmmi.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «wanna yumẓn ġ-uwallu issmaqql-n tiġurdin ur-akkʷ-igi i-tgldit n-rbbi.»
tiġurdin n-mayan isti siditnnġ ssa n-id-mraw d-sin (72) n-umḥḍar yaḍni, yazn-tn sin s-sin a-t-zwurn s-kraygatt tamdint ula kraygatt mani lli-zġ-ra-izri ntta.
yini-asn: «tggut-tmgra walaynni drusn ih̬ddamn. ḍalbat bu-tmgra a-yazn ih̬ddamn ad-ssmunn tamgra-ns.
zaydat, uznġ-kʷn ġilad zund ilqqaġn ġ-gr-uwššann.
a-ur-tasim awmmis ula aqʷrab ula turẓiyin. a-ur-tbiddm ar-tnsallamm d-yan ġ-uġaras.
tigmmi nna-s-tkšmm, tinim-asn: ‹ad-awn-tili sslamt.›
iġ-gis-illa yan ittirin sslamt, rad-as-tili sslamt lli-s-tnnam. iġ-ur-illi, ur-ra-gis-tqama sslamt-nnun.
qamat ġ-tgmmi nna-s-tkšmm ar-tšttam ar-tssam aynna-yawn-d-fkan, ašku ah̬ddam isthlla tiġrad-ns. a-ur-ttidum zġ-tgmmi s-tgmmi.
tamdint nna-kʷn-iran iġ-n-srs-tkšmm, šttayat aynna-yawn-d-srsn imzdġn-ns
ar-tjjujjim imuḍan-nsn ar-asn-ttinim: ‹ha-tagldit n-rbbi takmur-awn-d.›
walaynni tamdint nna-ur-kʷn-irin iġ-n-srs-tkšmm, zriyat ġ-tswak-ns ar-ttinim:
‹ula agdrur n-tmdint-nnun lli-usin iḍarn-nnġ, ar-t-nssusus. walaynni swangmat tissanm is-di-takmur-tgldit n-rbbi.›
rad-awn-iniġ, ra-išqu-wass l-lḥsab f-ayt-tmdint-an uggʷar n-ayt-sadum.

«taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili ay-ayt-kurazin. taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili ay-ayt-bitṣayda. han lmɛjizat lli-skrġ ġ-darun, mrad is-tnt-skrġ ġ-tmdinin n-ṣur d-ṣayda ikun knan imzdġn-nsnt s-wakal ġakudan, lsn lh̬iš gn iġd f-ih̬fawn-nsn, fln kullu mad-skarn yʷh̬šn.
ra-fllawn-išqu-wass l-lḥsab uggʷar n-ayt-ṣur d-ayt-ṣayda.
imma kunni ay-ayt-kafrnaḥum, is-tram a-tlkmm ignwan? han ra-kʷn-in-iluḥ rbbi ġ-tdrut n-wakal.»
yini ilmma yasuɛ i-imḥḍarn-ns: «wanna isflidn s-wawal-nnun, isfld sri. wanna-kʷn-ur-irin, ur-iyi-iri ula nkki. d-wanna-yyi-ur-irin, ur-iri ġwalli-yyi-d-yuznn.»
wrrin-d ssa n-id-mraw d-sin n-umḥḍar, frḥn bahra ar-ttinin: «wa-sidi, ula ljnun ar-tn-ntamr s-ism-nnk ar-skarn s-wawal-nnġ.»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «ẓriġ šiṭan iḍr-d zġ-ignwan zund usmann.
hati fkiġ-awn taẓḍḍart a-takʷlm f-ilgmmaḍn d-iġrdmiwn, tnrum kullu taḥkimt n-unuwwaš, ur-ra-kʷn-isshrš yat.
walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-tfrḥm f-ssibt l-ljnun ar-skarn s-wawal-nnun, walaynni frḥat f-ssibt n-ma-tyaran ismawn-nnun ġ-ignna.»

ifrḥ yasuɛ bahra ġ-tasaɛt-an s-lfrḥ n-rruḥ lqudus, iẓẓall yini: «wa-baba, sidis n-ignna d-wakal, ulġġ-k ašku tssntlt tiġawsiwin-ad f-ayt-lɛaql d-lfhmt, tssmlt-tnt i-ibujadiyn. ašku ġmkad a-s-trḍit a-baba.»
yini ilmma i-mddn-an: «ġ-ddu-ufus-inu a-ġ-iga baba kullu ma-illan. ur-illi ma-issnn yus n-rbbi abla babas, ula illa ma-issnn baba abla nkki lli-igan yus d-willi qṣadġ ad-asn-t-mlġ.»
igrawl-d yasuɛ s-dar imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn waḥdutn: «timbarkiyin ad-gant-walln-ad ẓranin mayd tẓram kunni.
rad-awn-iniġ, ggutn lanbiya d-igldan ẓuẓḍn ad-ẓrn mayd tẓrram walaynni ur-t-ẓrin, ẓuẓḍn ad-sfldn i-mayd mi tsflidm walaynni ur-as-sfldn.»
yašk-id yan-umslmd n-ššrɛ yiri a-yarm yasuɛ ġ-wawal-ns, yini-as: «way-amslmd, ma-rad-skrġ baš ad-ṭṭafġ tudrt l-lih̬rt?»
irar-as yasuɛ: «ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ? ma-gis-tġrit?»
yini-as: «‹a-ttirit rbbi sidik zġ-ttmi n-ih̬f-nnk d-ttmi n-uwl-nnk d-ttmi n-tẓḍḍart-nnk d-ttmi l-lɛaql-nnk,› ‹tirit adjar-nnk zund ih̬f-nnk.›»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «tʷġẓant. skar mayad tddrt.»
walaynni amslmd-lli n-ššrɛ ira a-issbayyn ih̬f-ns, isqsa-t: «ma-igan adjar-inu?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «ha-yan-urgaz imudda ar-ittidu ġ-uġaras zġ-urušalim s-tmdint n-ariḥa. amẓn-t imh̬h̬arn kkisn-as kullu ma-dars-illan, ssyaggasn-t fln-t-in ġ-gr lmut d-tudrt.
ha-yan zġ-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi ikka-d aġaras-an. lliġ-t-in-iẓra yanf-as imun d-tsga yaḍni.
ha-yan yaḍni zġ-ih̬ddamn n-tgmmi n-rbbi, imun-d d-uġaras, iddu aylliġ-n-srs-yuggʷa, izri ula ntta zġ-tsga yaḍni.
walaynni ha-yan-ubrrani gu-samira imudda ula ntta, iruḥ-d argaz-an. lliġ-t-iẓra iqama gis bahra.
iddu s-dars ig zzit d-waman n-waḍil iktin i-tiggas-ns yass-as-tnt. issni-t f-lbhimt isslkm-t s-yal-lfndq igabl-t gis.
ndid azkka ildi-d sin iqaridn n-nnuqrt ifk-tn i-bu-lfndq yini-as: ‹thalla gis. iġ-fllas-tssh̬srt uggʷar n-mayd-ak-fkiġ, rad-ak-t-zaydġ ġakud nna-d-wrriġ ġ-uġaras-ad.›»
isqsa-t yasuɛ: «manwa tnnit ġ-kraḍ-ad a-iwrrin iga adjar i-walli iḍrn ġ-ifassn n-imh̬h̬arn?»
yini-as: «ġwalli gis iḥnnan.» yini-as yasuɛ: «zayd ula kiyi ar-tskart zund mayan.»
munn-daġ d-uġaras aylliġ lkmn yan-uduwwar lli-ġ-tzdġ yat-tmġart ism-ns marta. tšškšm yasuɛ s-tgmmi-ns.
tili-dars-uwlltmas ism-ns maryam, tskiws nttat ġ-dar iḍarn n-siditnnġ ar-tsflid i-ma-ittini.
imma marta tlha bahra s-asi-srs, tašk-id s-yasuɛ tini-as: «wa-sidi, is-ur-tnnit yat i-uwlltma-yad f-twuri-ad ġ-iyi-n-tfl waḥduyyi? ini-as a-tnkr a-yyi-tɛawn.»
isawl srs siditnnġ yini-as: «marta, marta, ha-kmmi tuḥlt bahra, thuwwlt ih̬f-nnm s-kigan d-tġawsiwin.
ġir yat-tġawsa a-d-iqqann. hatti maryam th̬tar taġamt lli-ifulkin. ur-illi ma-rad-as-tt-ikkis.»
yan-wass illa yasuɛ ġ-yan mani ar-itẓalla. lliġ ikmml, iḍalb-t yan zġ-imḥḍarn-ns yini-as: «wa-siditnnġ, sslmd-aġ mamnk a-ntẓalla, ġmklli isslmd yuḥanna amsddam imḥḍarn-ns.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «iġ-ra-tẓẓallm tinim ‹wa-babatnnġ, a-yili luqr i-ism-nnk, tašk-id-tgldit-nnk.
akka-yaġ-d kraygatt ass aġrum n-wass,
tṣamḥt-aġ f-ddnub lli-nskr, ġmklli ntṣamaḥ i-kullu wanna ginnġ iskrn lh̬ʷšant. tssanft-aġ i-ma-rad-aġ-ijllu.›»
izayd yini-asn: «ma-ra-ijru iġ-idda yan gigun s-tgmmi n-umddakkʷl-ns ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-iyḍ yini-as ‹wa-gʷma, rḍl-iyi kraṭṭ-tngʷal
ašku yuška-d dari yan-unbgi imudda-d. ur-dari mad-as-d-srasġ a-t-išš.›?
rad-ak-d-irar-umddakkʷl-nnk zġ-ugʷns n-tgmmi yini-ak-d: ‹a-yyi-ur-tnfut. qqnġ-n tiflut, gnġ d-tarwa-nu ġ-tisi, ur-ẓḍarġ a-n-nkrġ ad-ak-fkġ kra.›
walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, wah̬h̬a ur-inkir ad-ak-d-ifk f-ssibt n-ma-tgit amddakkʷl-ns, ra-d-inkr ifk-ak-d aynna-f-tlkmt f-ssibt n-ma-tzuydt ar-ttḍalabt bla-da-ttḥšamt.
rad-awn-iniġ, ḍalbat rbbi rad-awn-ifk, sigglat dars ra-tafm, ssḍuqqrat-n srs rad-awn-irẓm.
ašku kullu wanna-t-iḍalbn rad-as-ifk, d-wanna dars isiggiln ra-dars-yaf, d-wanna-n-issḍuqqurn rad-as-irẓm.
is-illa yan ġ-willi gigun ṭṭafnin tarwa mẓẓinin, iḍalb-as yus aslm ifk-as algmmaḍ?
nġd iḍalb-as taglayt ifk-as iġrdm?
ẓrat kunni, wah̬h̬a da-tskarm ma-yʷh̬šnn, tissanm a-tfkm timih̬ar fulkinin i-tarwa-nnun. uggʷar n-mayan a-ra-yakka babatun n-ignna rruḥ lqudus i-willi-ti-tḍalabnin.»
yan-wass yaḍni issufġ yasuɛ ljnn zġ-yan-urgaz aẓnẓum. lliġ-t-iffuġ iwrri-uẓnẓum ar-isawal. ar-kullu-tɛjjabn mddn,
walaynni kra gisn ar-ittini: «nttan s-tḥkimt n-bɛl-zabul agllid l-ljnun a-s-a-issufuġ ljnun.»
irin wiyyaḍ ad-armn yasuɛ, ḍalbn-t ad-asn-iml kra l-lmɛjizt ad-asn-tg tamatart n-izd rbbi a-t-id-yuznn.
imma yasuɛ issn iswingimn-nsn yini-asn: «tagldit nna-itmmaġn d-ih̬f-ns ra-th̬lu, d-tgmmi nna-itmmaġn d-ih̬f-ns ra-tḍr.
ula šiṭan iġ-immaġ d-ih̬f-ns mamnk a-ra-tqama-tgldit-ns? ha-kunni ar-ttinim izd s-tḥkimt n-bɛl-zabul a-s-a-ssufuġġ ljnun.
walaynni iġd s-bɛl-zabul a-s-a-tn-ssufuġġ, iniyat-iyi ma-s-a-tn-ssufuġn ayt-darun? ntni a-rad-awn-iml is-tjlam.
walaynni iġd s-tḥkimt n-rbbi a-s-a-ssufuġġ ljnun, issanat is-d-darun-tuška-tgldit n-rbbi.
«iġ-illa yan idusn iḍuf tigmmi-ns yasi imqlad-ns, ur-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-iruḥ ayda-ns.
walaynni iġ-t-id-yuška ma-fllas-idusn ra-t-inru ikkis-as imqlad-ns lli-f-iskr ibḍu tiġawsiwin-ns.
han wanna ur-didi-illin, iga ḍiḍḍ-inu. d-wanna ur-didi-issmunun, ar-izzmzar.
«iġ-iffuġ ljnn zġ-kra n-bnadm, ra-izray ġ-lh̬la ġ-ur-llin-waman, ar-isiggil s-maniġ a-izddġ. iġ-ur-yufi man, ra-yini d-ih̬f-ns: ‹rad-wrriġ s-tgmmi lli-ġ-ttin-kkiġ.›
yašk-id yaf-d tigmmi ttyaras tngadda.
iddu ilmma yawi-d ssa l-ljnun yaḍni lli-t-yugʷrn ġ-lh̬ʷšant, kšmn kullutn zdġn ġ-urgaz-an ard iwrri isiggʷra-ns yʷh̬šn f-isizwar-ns.»
ar-sul-isawal yasuɛ s-as-di-tġra yat-tmġart zġ-gr mddn-an tini-as: «ambarki a-iga-waḥlig lli-k-yurun ula tibbatin lli-k-ssnginin.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «uggʷar n-imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli sflidnin i-wawal n-rbbi ar-srs-skarn.»
munn-d mddn ggutnin f-yasuɛ, isawl-daġ yini-asn: «ha-tasut-ad, tasut yʷh̬šnn a-tga. ar-ttḍalab yat-tmatart, walaynni ur-rad-as-ttyawfka kra n-tmatart abla tamatart n-nnabi yuna.
ġmklli iga yuna yat-tmatart i-ayt-ninwa, ġmkan a-s-rad-gġ yat-tmatart i-tasut-ad, nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm.
hati ra-di-tnkr-tgllitt l-ljanub ġ-wass l-lḥsab ġ-gr mddn n-tasut-ad, taštkka srsn, ašku tuška-d nttat zġ-ttmi n-ddunit a-tsfld i-tḥkimt n-suliman. imma ġilad illa ġid ma-yugʷrn suliman.
rad-nkrn ayt-ninwa ula ntni ġ-wass l-lḥsab ġ-gr mddn n-tasut-ad, aštkkan srsn, ašku fln ntni ddnub-nsn ġakud lliġ sfldn i-tbrraḥt n-yuna. imma ġilad illa ġid ma-yugʷrn yuna.
«ur-illi ma-issrġan lqndil isrs-t-in ġ-ugḍi nġd ġ-ddu lɛbrt. walaynni f-iggi n-mani yattuyn a-f-ra-t-isrs, baš a-tban tifawt i-kullu wanna-d-ikšmn.
tiṭ-nnk a-igan lqndil n-ddat-nnk. iġ-tsfaw tiṭ, ra-tili ddat kullutt ġ-tifawt. iġ-ur-tsfaw tiṭ, ra-tili ddat kullutt ġ-tillas.
awi-tt ġ-ih̬f-nnk ad-ur-th̬si tifawt lli-gik-illan.
iġ-kullu-tfaw ddat-nnk bla-gis-illa kra n-mani illasn, rad-kullu-tfawt zund iġ-gik-irġa yal-lqndil.»
lliġ ikmml yasuɛ iwaliwn-ad, iḍalb-t yan-ufarisi a-dids-išš imkli. ikšm yasuɛ s-dars iskiws a-išš.
imma afarisi-an itɛjjb ašku ur-zwar-isird baš a-išš ġmklli siridn ayt-yudaya.
isawl srs siditnnġ yini-as: «wa-kunni n-ifarisin ar-tssġusm lkas d-tmkilt zġ-brra, imma agʷns iɛmmr s-tmh̬h̬art d-lh̬ʷšant.
wa-inafaln, rbbi lli-iskrn brra, is-urd nttan a-iskrn agʷns?
walaynni fkat i-imẓlaḍ ma-illan ġ-irukutn-nnun, s-awn-iġus kraygatt kra.
