«wa-ifarisin, taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili. ar-takkam i-rbbi yat zġ-kraygatt mrawt l-liqamt d-uzukkʷni d-kullu isafarn yaḍni, walaynni ar-tettum lḥqq ula lḥnant n-rbbi. ha-tiġawsiwin-ad a-fllawn-illan a-srsnti-tskarm bla tflm tiyyaḍ.
wa-ifarisin, taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili, ašku iɛzza darun a-tzggurum s-lgddam ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit. iɛzzu darun a-fllawn-tsllamn mddn ġ-laswaq.
taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili bahra, ašku tgam zund imḍḍaln lli-mi-ur-ibidd ifir. ar-fllasn-ttidun mddn, ašku ur-ssinn mad-gan.
isawl yan zġ-imslmdn n-ššrɛ yini-as: «way-amslmd, trgmt-aġ ula nkkʷni s-wawal-ad.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili ula kunni a-imslmdn n-ššrɛ. ar-n-tsrasm f-mddn taẓayt lli-mi-ur-ẓḍarn, walaynni ur-trim a-n-tgm ula yan-uḍaḍ ad-asn-tɛawnm.
taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili, ašku ar-tbnnum imḍḍaln šwanin i-lanbiya lli-mmutnin f-ufus n-imzwura-nnun.
ġmkad a-s-a-tzzgam iskkirn n-imzwura-nnun, ar-takkam tugga f-mad-skrn. ntni nġan lanbiya d-kunni ar-tbnnum imḍḍaln-nsn.
d-ġayan a-f-tnna-tḥkimt n-rbbi: ‹rad-asn-aznġ lanbiya d-irqqasn, nġn gisn kra ssrfufnn kra.›
imma tasut-ad ra-d-fllas-tettut lɛqubit f-ssibt n-idammn l-lanbiya kullutn lli-ffinin zġ-isizwar n-ddunit sul s-ġilad,
zġ-idammn n-habil ar idammn n-zakariyya lli-nġan ġ-gr-udġar n-tġrsi d-tḥanut tamẓlayt n-rbbi. rad-awn-iniġ, f-tasut-ad a-f-ra-d-kullu-tettut lɛqubit-an.
taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili a-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, ašku tkkism i-mddn tasarut n-twassna. ur-di-tkšimm kunni, ula tudjam ġwilli ranin ad-d-kšmn.»
lliġ iffuġ yasuɛ zġ-tgmmi-an ar-t-bahra-tẓin imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-ifarisin. ar-t-sqsan f-mnnawt-tġawsiwin,
gabln-t mdin-as a-t-ġwin f-wawal-ns.
munn-d kigan d-id-walf n-mddn ġ-tasaɛt-an, aylliġ a-takʷln f-ingratsn. igr yasuɛ ar-isawal s-imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «rarat lɛaql-nnun zġ-th̬mirt n-ifarisin, ašku ntni sin-uwdmawn ad-skarn.
kullu ma-irgsn ra-d-ibayyn, d-kullu ma-intln ra-ityawssan.
aynna tnnam ġ-gratun rad-as-sfldn kullu mddn. aynna-f-tsawlm ġ-tntla ġ-ugʷns n-tḥanut rad-srs-tbrraḥn f-iggi n-tgʷmma.
wa-imddukkʷal-inu rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-tiksaḍm ġwilli nqqanin ddat walaynni tiġurdin n-mayan ur-sul-ẓḍarn ad-skrn yat.
rad-awn-mlġ manwa tiksaḍm. iksaḍat ġwalli iẓḍarn a-inġ iluḥ-n sul ġ-jhnnama. rad-awn-iniġ, nttan a-tiksaḍm.
is-ur-a-nzzan smmus-waÿÿawÿn s-snat-tqaridin? walaynni rbbi ur-a-gisn-itettu yan.
imma kunni zġ-inẓaḍn n-ih̬f-nnun iḥasb-tn rbbi. a-ur-tiksaḍm, ašku tɛzzam dars uggʷar n-waÿÿawÿn ggutnin.
«rad-awn-iniġ, wanna ittinin is-iga winu ġ-gr mddn, ula nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm ra-ttiniġ iga winu ġ-dar lmalayka n-rbbi.
imma wanna ittinin ur-igi winu ġ-gr mddn, ra-ttiniġ ula nkki ur-igi winu ġ-dar lmalayka n-rbbi.
wanna isawln ġ-yus n-bnadm, iẓḍar rbbi ad-as-iṣamḥ. walaynni yan irggmn rruḥ lqudus, ur-rad-as-fllas-iṣamḥ rbbi.
iġ-kʷn-in-ssbiddn ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit a-fllawn-ḥkamn, nġd ġ-lgddam n-inmġurn ula lḥukkam, ad-ur-tasim taġuft f-ma-ra-tinim ula f-ma-s-rad-asn-trarm,
ašku rruḥ lqudus a-rad-awn-iml ġ-tasaɛt-an maylli-kʷn-d-iqqann ad-asn-ti-tinim.»
isawl-d yan-urgaz zġ-gr mddn-an yini-as: «way-amslmd, sawl s-gʷma tinit-as a-didi-ibḍu lwrt.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «way-argaz, ma-yyi-igan d-lqaḍi fllawn baš ad-awn-aṭṭuġ ayda-nnun?»
izayd yini-asn: «rarat lɛaql a-ur-ttirim kra iggutn i-ih̬f-nnun, ašku tudrt n-bnadm ur-tlli s-tuggt n-wayda.»
yut-asn lmɛna-yad yini-asn: «ha-yan-urgaz iggut-dars-wayda, yasi ṣṣabt iggutn zġ-wakal-ns.
iswangm d-ih̬f-ns ar-ittini: ‹ma-rad-skrġ? ur-dari maniġ a-ssmunuġ kullu ṣṣabt-ad.›
yini: ‹ġmkad a-rad-skrġ, rad-h̬luġ iḥuna n-imndi, bnuġ ma-tn-yugʷrn, ssmunġ-n gisn imndi d-lh̬ir-inu kullut,
iniġ ilmma d-ih̬f-inu: iggut lh̬ir ma-s-a-zrayġ kigan d-isggʷasn. rad-sunfuġ ar-šttaġ ar-ssaġ ar-tfraḥġ.›
walaynni argaz-an, inna-yas rbbi: ‹way-anafal, ġ-iḍ-ad a-ra-k-kkisġ zġ-tudrt. win mi a-ra-ig kullu mayad-di-tssmunt?›»
izayd yasuɛ yini-asn: «ġmkan a-iga kullu wanna issmunun i-ih̬f-ns bla-yas-illa yat ġ-dar rbbi.»
isawl yasuɛ s-imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «mayad a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-tasim taġuft i-tudrt-nnun f-ma-ra-tššm, ula i-ddat-nnun f-ma-rad-as-tlsm.
ašku tudrt tuf amššu, ula ddat tuf timlsit.
ẓrat ihaqqayn, ur-a-kkrzn ula-da-mggrn, ur-darsn iḥuna nġd lbruj ma-ġ-a-ssmunun, walaynni ar-asn-yakka rbbi amššu lli-ḥtajjan. imma kunni, uggʷar n-igḍaḍ a-tɛzzam dar rbbi.
ma-iẓḍarn a-izayd yat tasaɛt i-tudrt-ns s-taġuft lli-yusi?
iġ-ur-tẓḍarm a-tskrm mayd idrusn ma-f-a-ttasim taġuft f-tġawsiwin-an yaḍni?
ẓrat ijddign n-tagant, mamnk a-di-tmġayn. ur-a-tllmn ula-da-ẓṭṭan walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, suliman s-lhibt n-tgldit-ns ur-jju-ilsi zund yan zġ-ijddign-ad.
iġ-a-isslsa rbbi tuga lli-itmġayn ġassad ġ-tagant ttyawgar-n azkka ġ-takat, is-ur-ra-kʷn-issls ula kunni s-uggʷar? is-ur-tuminm s-rbbi?
a-ur-tlhum s-ma-tšttam ula ma-tssam, ula-da-tssiḥilm ih̬f-nnun s-yat.
ẓrat ayt-ddunit-ad kullutn, tiġawsiwin-ad a-s-a-tlhun. ula kunni, babatun issn is-tnti-tḥtajjam.
walaynni lhwat zwar s-tgldit n-rbbi s-awn-izuyd kullu tiġawsiwin-an yaḍni.
«a-ur-tiksaṭṭ a-tawrut imẓẓin. ifrḥ rbbi babatun ad-awn-ifk tagldit-ns.
zznzat ma-teṭṭafm tbḍum-t i-imẓlaḍ. skarat i-ih̬f-nnun iqrban lli-ur-ra-imdu, yili-awn-wayda ġ-ignna illiġ ur-ra-zgis-ityattay yat, ula iruḥ-t-umh̬h̬ar, ula tšša-t-twukka.
ašku innaġ illa-wayda-nnun a-ġ-ra-yili-uwl-nnun.
«bkisat tssrġm tifawin-nnun
a-bdda-tujadm, zund ih̬ddamn lli-tqlnin s-siditsn ard-d-iwrri zġ-dar-tmġra, irin ad-as-rẓmn imi ġakud nna-d-issḍuqqr.
mnšk a-s-ra-ifulki i-ih̬ddamn-an iġ-d-yuška siditsn yaf-tn-d ḍufn. rad-awn-iniġ, ra-ibkis ntta yini-asn ad-skiwsn yawi-asn-d mad-šttan.
mnšk a-s-ra-ifulki iġ-tn-d-yufa ujadn, wah̬h̬a-d-yuška ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-iyḍ nġd zikk zikk ṣbaḥ.
walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, mrad is-issn bu-tgmmi managu a-ra-d-yašk-umh̬h̬ar, ur-ra-t-yadj a-inqb tigmmi-ns.
ula kunni illa fllawn a-bdda-tujadm, ašku rad-d-aškġ nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm ġ-kra n-tasaɛt lli-ur-tġalm.»
isqsa-t bṭrus yini-as: «wa-sidi, izd fllannġ a-f-tutt lmɛna-yad nġd kullu mddn?»
isawl siditnnġ yini: «manwa igan ah̬ddam ifulkin bab l-lɛaql? nttan a-mi-ra-ifl sidis tigmmi-ns baš a-yaṭṭu f-ih̬ddamn yaḍni ad-šttan, kraygatt yan ġ-tasaɛt-ns.
ambarki a-iga-uh̬ddam nna-mi-d-iwrri sidis yaf-t-id ar-iskar mayan.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, rad-as-ifl sidis ayda-ns kullut ġ-ddu-ufus-ns.
walaynni iġ-idda-uh̬ddam-an yini d-ih̬f-ns: ‹imaṭl-n sidi› ar-ikkat ih̬ddamn d-th̬ddamin ar-ištta ar-issa ar-issnuful ih̬f-ns s-tissi,
han ra-d-iwrri sidis ġ-yan-wass lli-f-ur-iskir ula yat tasaɛt lli-ur-iġal. ġakudan ra-t-ibri sidis ig-t-in d-inuwwašn n-rbbi.
ah̬ddam nna-issnn ma-zgis-ira sidis walaynni ur-t-inawl ula iskr-t, ra-t-issġurš sidis bahra.

imma ah̬ddam nna-iskrn ma-f-t-id-iqqan-ukuray bla issn ma-zgis-ira sidis, ra-t-issġurš ġir imikk. ašku wanna mi ifka sidis ma-iggutn, ra-zgis-iḍalb ma-iggutn, d-wanna mi ifka uggʷar ra-zgis-iḍalb uggʷar.
«uškiġ-d nkki ad-luḥġ lɛafit ġ-ddunit. amar yufan a-tznd ġilad.
rad-sul-ddmġ s-yan-udum išqan. mnšk a-s-flla-iẓẓay ard ikmml.
is-tġalm is-d-uškiġ ad-skrġ lhna ġ-ddunit? uhu, rad-awn-iniġ urd lhna walaynni tibḍit.
ġilad s-uflla iġ-llan smmus ġ-yat-tgmmi rad-bḍun kraḍ d-sin ula sin d-kraḍ.
ra-ibḍu-urgaz d-yus, ibḍu-ufruh̬ d-babas. ra-tbḍu-tmġart d-illis, tbḍu-tfruh̬t d-innas. ra-tbḍu-tḍggʷalt d-tmġart n-yus, tbḍu-tslit d-innas n-urgaz-ns.»
ġakudan isawl-daġ yasuɛ s-mddn-an ggutnin yini-asn: «ġakud nna-tẓram amdlu iġli-d zġ-lġrb ar-ttinim: ‹ra-yili-unẓar,› s-nnit-illa.
ġakud nna-tẓram aḍu ikka-d ljanub ar-ttinim: ‹ra-irġ lḥal,› s-nnit-irġa.
wa-id-bu-sin-uwdmawn, kunni tssnm lmɛni n-ikalln d-ignwan. mah̬ ur-tẓḍarm a-tissanm lmɛna n-kullu mayad darun ijrrun ġ-uwssan-ad?
mah̬ aylliġ ur-a-tswingimm d-ih̬f-nnun ġ-ma-kʷn-d-iqqann a-tskarm?
iġ-ak-iṣrḍ kra n-yan s-lmḥkama, g-n tiqqi-nnk a-d-dids-tmšaškat ġ-uġaras, a-k-ur-izukr s-dar lqaḍi, idḥi-k lqaḍi i-umh̬zni, iluḥ-k-in-umh̬zni ġ-lḥbs.
rad-ak-iniġ, ur-ra-tffuġt zġ-ġin ard tfrut taqaritt iggʷran.»
sawln kra n-mddn s-yasuɛ ġakudan inin-as f-kra n-ayt-jalil, inġa-tn lḥakm bilaṭus f-iggi n-tġrsiw lli-n-ssakmurn i-rbbi.
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ma-tġalm f-mddn-an n-ayt-jalil? izd ntni a-iskrn ddnub uggʷar n-wiyyaḍ ġ-jalil aylliġ rfufnn ġmkan?
uhu, walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, iġ-ur-tfilm ma-tskarm yʷh̬šn rad-kullu-thlkm zund ntni.
ma-tġalm f-mddn lli-f-iḍr lbrj ġ-silwam, inġ-tn kullu s-tam d-mraw? izd ntni a-yʷh̬šnn uggʷar n-kullu wiyyaḍ ġ-urušalim?
uhu, walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, iġ-ur-tfilm ma-tskarm yʷh̬šnn, rad-kullu-thlkm zund ntni.»
yut-asn lmɛna-yad yini-asn: «ha-yan-urgaz, tlla dars yat tazart ttyawẓẓa ġ-igr n-waḍil. ar-ittidu ar-gis-isiggil ikuzarn, ur-a-n-gis-itafa yat.
yini i-uh̬ddam-ns: ‹ẓr, kraḍ isggʷasn ayad siggilġ ikuzarn ġ-tazart-ad, ur-jju-gis-ufiġ yat. zayd ġilad bbi-tt a-ur-ġir-tamẓ akal.›
isawl-uh̬ddam yini-as: ‹adj-tt a-sidi ġir ġasggʷasad, a-stt-nqšġ gġ-as amazir.
iġ-turu ġasggʷasad-d-yuškan, išwa. iġ-ur-turu, tbbit-stt ilmma.›»
illa yasuɛ ġ-yat-tgmmi n-tẓallit ġ-wass n-usunfu ar-isslmad.
tili ġin yat-tmġart, ikrf-tt yal-ljnn tam d-mraw n-usggʷas. tga tuknit, ur-tẓḍar a-tssnm tiddi-ns.
lliġ-tt-iẓra yasuɛ iġr-as yini-as: «wa-tamġart, ha-kmmi tfsit zġ-uskrf-nnm.»
isrs-n fllas ifassn-ns s-tnm ġ-tiddi-ns ḥayna, ar-ttalġ rbbi.

walaynni anmġur n-tgmmi n-tẓallit ṭiyyr-as bahra f-yasuɛ ašku ijjujji ġ-wass n-usunfu, inkr yini i-mddn-an: «sḍiṣ-uwssan a-illan a-gisn-tth̬damm. aškad-d ġ-uwssan-an iġ-tram a-tjjim, walaynni urd ġ-wass n-usunfu.»
imma siditnnġ irur-as: «wa-id-bu-sin-uwdmawn, manwa gigun ur-ifssin i-tmugayt-ns nġd aġiyyul-ns kraygatt ass n-usunfu ar-t-itawi zġ-rrwa s-maniġ a-issa?
ha-tamġart-ad tga illis n-ibrahim, ikrf-tt šiṭan tam d-mraw n-usggʷas ayad. is-ur-trim ad-as-fsiġ ġ-wass n-usunfu?»
lliġ-as-sfldn ġwilli-t-ẓinin, ḥšmn bahra zġ-wawal-ns, frḥn mddn kullutn s-kullu lɛjayb lli-iskar.
yini-asn yasuɛ: «mamnk a-tga-tgldit n-rbbi? ma-s-rad-awn-tt-ssrwasġ?
trwas yat taqqayt imẓẓin l-lh̬rdl, yiwi-tt yan-urgaz iẓẓu-tt ġ-igr-ns. tmġi-d timġur twrri tga tasġart aylliġ a-di-ttaškin igḍaḍ n-ignwan ar-zddġn ġ-gr ifrawn-ns.»
izayd yini-asn: «ma-s-rad-awn-ssrwasġ tagldit n-rbbi?
trwas tah̬mirt lli-di-tusi yat-tmġart tg-tt-in ġ-kraṭṭ lɛbrat mqqurnin n-uggurn, tsskti lɛjin kullut.»
imun yasuɛ d-uġaras n-urušalim, ar-itkka timdinin ula iduran ar-gisn-isslmad mddn.
isqsa-t yan yini-as: «izd a-sidi ġir kra idrusn a-ra-injm?» isawl yasuɛ yini-asn:
«gat-n tiqqi-nnun a-tkšmm ġ-imi inukman. ašku rad-awn-iniġ, iggut ma-ra-isiggil a-n-kšmn walaynni ur-rad-iẓḍarn.
ašku ġakud nna-ġ-inkr bu-tgmmi iqqn imi, ra-tbiddm ġ-brra ar-n-srs-tssḍuqqurm ar-ttinim: ‹rẓm-aġ a-sidi.› imma ntta rad-awn-yini: ‹ur-ssinġ mani-di-tkkam kunni.›
rad-as-ttinim: ‹ha-nkkʷni nšša dik nsu dik, tsslmdt ġ-tmdint-nnġ.›
imma ntta rad-awn-yini: ‹ur-ssinġ mani-di-tkkam. ittiyat-n zġ-gigi kunni lli-iskarn lh̬ʷšant.›
mnšk a-s-ra-tallam ar-ttgẓaẓm uh̬san-nnun ġakud nna-tẓram ibrahim d-isḥaq d-yaɛqub d-lanbiya kullutn ġ-tgldit n-rbbi, imma kunni iluḥ-kʷn-in s-brra.
rad-d-aškin ibrraniyn zġ-ššrq ula lġrb ula ššamal ula ljanub, munn-d f-imnsi imqqurn ġ-tgldit n-rbbi.
s-ṣṣaḥt llan kra n-imggura lli-ra-izwur, ula kra n-imzwura lli-ra-iggʷru.»
aškin-d kra n-ifarisin ġ-tasaɛt-an, inin-as: «han agllid hirudus ira a-k-inġ. yuf a-n-tittit zġ-ġid tftut s-kra n-mani yaḍni.»
imma yasuɛ irur-asn: «zaydat tinim i-uwššn-an: ‹ha-yyi ar-ssufuġġ ljnun ar-jjujjiġ mddn ġassad d-uzkka ar wis kraḍ-uwssan rad-kmmlġ.
walaynni iqqan-iyi-d ad-munġ d-uġaras-inu ġassad d-uzkka d-naf-uzkka, ašku ur-iẓḍar yan igan nnabi a-immt abla ġ-urušalim.›

wa-urušalim, wa-urušalim, wa-talli inqqan lanbiya n-rbbi ar-tkkatt s-iẓran ġwilli-d-srm-yuzn. mnnawt-twal ad-riġ ad-d-ssmunġ tarwa-nnm ġmklli-di-tssmunu-tfullust ikiyyawn ġ-ddu ifrawn-ns, imma kunni ur-trim.
han tigmmi n-rbbi ġ-wammas-nnun ra-th̬lu. rad-awn-iniġ, ur-ra-yyi-tẓrm-daġ ard tinim: ‹ambarki a-iga ġwad-d-yuškan s-ism n-sidi rbbi.›»
yan-wass n-usunfu idda yasuɛ a-išš ġ-tgmmi n-yan zġ-inmġurn n-ifarisin. gabln-t ad-ẓrn ma-ra-iskr.
yašk-id dars yan-urgaz yuḍn bzgn-as iḍarn d-ifassn.
isawl yasuɛ i-imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-ifarisin isqsa-tn: «ma-ittini ššrɛ n-musa? is-iḥlla a-njjujji ġ-wass n-usunfu nġd uhu?»
imma ntni fssan. inkr yasuɛ yawi-d argaz-lli ijjujji-t yadj-t a-iddu.
yini-asn: «ma-ra-tskrm iġ-awn-in-iḍr iwitun nġd tamugayt-nnun ġ-wanu ġ-wass n-usunfu? is-ur-ra-tazzlm a-ti-di-tldim?»
ur-ẓḍarn ad-as-d-rarn s-yat f-wawal-ad.
iẓr yasuɛ inbgiwn-an ar-zzggurun ih̬f-nsn s-uskiws l-lgddam. yut-asn lmɛna-yad yini-asn:
«iġ-ak-iɛrḍ kra n-yan s-tmġra a-ur-tamẓt askiws l-lgddam, a-ur-n-ikšm kra n-yan-k-yugʷrn
yašk-id ġwalli-awn-iɛrḍn yini-ak: ‹nkr a-iskiws-urgaz-ad.› ġakudan ra-tḥšmt d-ih̬f-nnk twrrit s-tġurdin n-kullu mddn-an.
walaynni ġakud nna-yak-iɛrḍ kra n-yan, skiws ġ-tġurdin. iġ-d-yuška bu-tgmmi yini-ak ‹ašk-id a-gʷma s-lgddam,› ra-k-kullu-uqqrn inbgiwn.
ašku wanna issimġurn ih̬f-ns ra-t-iẓẓimẓay rbbi, imma wanna iẓẓimẓayn ih̬f-ns ra-t-issimġur.»

yini yasuɛ ilmma i-walli-as-iɛrḍn: «iġ-trit a-tskrt kra n-imkli nġd kra n-imnsi ad-ur-tɛrḍt i-imddukkʷal-nnk nġd aytmak nġd ayt-dark nġd adjarn-nnk lli-dar lh̬ir. ašku ula ntni rad-ak-ɛrḍn tigira, tamẓt zġ-darsn mad-asn-tfkit.
walaynni iġ-trit a-tskrt kra n-imnsi imqqurn, ɛrḍ i-imẓlaḍ d-ikušamn d-ibiḍarn d-ibukaḍn.
ra-k-ibark rbbi ašku ntni ur-darsn ma-s-a-yak-traran lh̬ir. rbbi a-rad-ak-t-irar ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-nkrn ġwilli-f-irḍa.»
isawl-d yan zġ-inbgiwn-lli lliġ isfld i-mayd inna yasuɛ, yini-as: «ambarki a-iga wanna ra-išš imnsi ġ-tgldit n-rbbi.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «ha-yan-urgaz iskr imnsi imqqurn, iɛrḍ i-kigan d-mddn.
lliġ-di-tlkm tasaɛt n-imnsi, yazn ah̬ddam-ns a-n-yini i-willi tyawɛraḍnin: ‹aškad-d, ha-kullu yujad.›
walaynni ar-ssɛdarn ntni kullutn. yini-as-umzwaru: ‹a-uddi, sġiġ yan-igr, iqqan-iyi-d ad-dduġ a-t-ẓrġ. ḍalbġ-ak ad-iyi-tṣamḥt.›
yini wayyaḍ: ‹a-uddi, sġiġ smmust-tiygiw n-izgarn. rad-dduġ ġilad a-tnt-in-armġ. ḍalbġ-ak ad-iyi-tṣamḥt.›
yini wayyaḍ yaḍni: ‹a-uddi, bḥra-d-iwiġ tamġart, ur-ẓḍarġ a-n-aškġ.›
iwrri-d-uh̬ddam yini iwaliwn-ad i-sidis. ṭiyyr-as i-bu-tgmmi bahra, yini ġakudan i-uh̬ddam-ns: ‹ffuġ tazzlt ġ-iswak ula tiswak n-tmdint, tawid-d imẓlaḍ d-ikušamn d-ibukaḍn d-ibiḍarn.›
yan imikk iwrri-d-uh̬ddam yini-as: ‹skrġ ma-tnnit a-sidi, walaynni sul iqama mani ih̬wan ġ-uḥanu n-imnsi.›
yini bu-tgmmi i-uh̬ddam-ns: ‹ffuġ-daġ s-iġarasn d-tġarasin, tamrt mddn ad-d-kšmn ard tɛmmr-tgmmi-nu.
ašku rad-awn-iniġ, ġwilli mi ɛrḍġ ġ-isizwar, ur-illi yan zġ-gisn ra-imḍi imnsi-nu.›»
munn-d mddn ggutnin f-yasuɛ ġ-uġaras, igrawl gisn yini-asn:
«wanna-d-sri-yuškan, ur-iẓḍar a-ig amḥḍar-inu iġ-ur-a-yyi-ittiri uggʷar n-babas d-innas d-tmġart-ns d-tarwa-ns d-aytmas d-istmas, d-ih̬f-ns ula ntta.
wanna ur-yusin aggjdi-ns imun didi, ur-iẓḍar a-ig amḥḍar-inu.
ma-ra-iskr wanna gigun iran a-ibnu yal-lbrj? is-ur-ra-iskiws iskr lḥsab-ns a-iẓr is-dars iqaridn ma-s-a-t-itkmmal?
a-ur-izzugz llsas yaf-n is-ur-iẓḍar a-t-ikmml. ġakudan ra-gis-ḍṣṣan kullu winna-t-ẓranin
ar-ttinin: ‹ġwad igra a-ibnu walaynni ur-iẓḍar a-ikmml.›
ma-ra-iskr-ugllid nna-iran a-iffuġ a-immaġ d-ugllid yaḍni? is-ur-ra-iskiws a-imšawar d-imddukkʷal-ns a-iẓr is-iẓḍar a-inru s-mraw id-walf ġwalli-t-id-imnaggarn s-sin id-mraw-walf?
iġ-as-ur-iẓḍar, rad-as-yazn arqqas sul-n-yaggug baš a-d-dids-imšaška tili sslamt i-ngratsn.
ġmkad a-s-awn-nniġ, wanna gigun ur-ifiln kullu ma-dars-illan, ur-ra-yiẓḍar a-ig amḥḍar-inu.
«tfulki tisnt walaynni iġ-tlmus tisnt ma-s-ra-stti-tssmarġm?
ur-sul-tgi i-wakal ula tga i-ugudi n-umazir. ra-stt-awin mddn luḥn-tt-in s-brra. wanna dar imzgan a-srsn-isflid, illa fllas a-isfld.»
yan-wass munn-d kigan d-id-bu-nkkas d-mddn ʷh̬šnnin, irin ad-sflidn i-yasuɛ.
ar-tngmugn ifarisin d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ ar-ttinin: «han argaz-an ar-ištta d-willi ʷh̬šnnin ar-srsn-itfraḥ.»
isawl yasuɛ yut-asn lmɛna-yad isqsa-tn:
«ma-ra-iskr yan gigun iṭṭafn miyya n-ih̬f n-uwlli iġ-as-tjla yat gisnt? ra-ifl tẓa n-id-mraw d-tẓa (99) frdnt ġ-lh̬la, iddu ar-isiggil s-talli ijlan ard-stt-yaf.
ġakud nna-stt-yufa ra-stt-id-yasi f-tġʷraḍ-ns ifrḥ bahra,
iruḥ-d tigmmi iġr-d i-imddukkʷal-ns d-wadjarn-ns yini-asn: ‹aškad-d tfrḥm didi, ha-yyi ufiġ tahrwit lli-yyi-ijlan.›
ġmkad a-s-rad-awn-iniġ, rad-frḥn ayt-ignwan s-yan-n-ifln kullu ma-iskar yʷh̬šn iwrri-d s-uġaras n-rbbi uggʷar n-tẓa n-id-mraw d-tẓa lli-ġalnin is-šwan ur-tn-ih̬ṣṣa ad-fln ddnub-nsn.
«ma-ra-tskr-tmġart nna-iṭṭafn mraw n-uqarid n-nnuqrt iġ-as-ijla yan gisn? ra-tssrġ lqndil tars kullu tigmmi ar-srs-tsiggil ard-ti-taf.
ġakud nna-ti-tufa ra-di-tġr i-tmddukkʷalin-ns d-tadjarin-ns tini-asnt: ‹aškamd-d tfrḥmt didi, ha-yyi ufiġ aqarid lli-yyi-ijlan.›
ġmkad a-s-rad-awn-iniġ, ar-tfraḥn lmalayka n-rbbi s-yan-n-ifln kullu ma-iskar yʷh̬šn iwrri-d s-uġaras n-rbbi.»
izayd yasuɛ yini-asn: «ha-yan-urgaz dars sin tarwa.
yašk-id ġwalli imẓẓin iḍalb-t yini-as: ‹wa-baba, ad-iyi-tfkt ġilad ma-yyi-d-yuškan ġ-lwrt.› inkr babas ibḍu-asn ayda-ns.
zrin kra n-uwssan, issmun yus-lli imẓẓin kullu ma-iṭṭaf, imuddu s-yat-tmazirt yaggugn. ar-iskar ġin s-ššhwat-ns aylliġ išša kullu maylli dars illan,
ur-sul-dars-iqama yat. iwrri yili-uġni išqan ġ-tmazirt-an, ilkm bahra f-ma-ištta.
iddu a-ih̬dm ġ-dar yan ġ-imzdġn n-tmazirt-an, yazn-t s-igran a-ikssa alfan.
iwrri iẓuẓḍ a-iɛmmr aḥlig-ns s-tkiḍa lli-šttan-walfan, walaynni ur-as-fkin yat.
ġ-isiggʷra iswangm d-ih̬f-ns yini: ‹ih̬ddamn n-baba kullutn ar-asn-d-bdda-itšaḍ-uġrum, imma nkki ha-yyi ar-tmtatġ s-laẓ.
rad-dduġ ġilad wrriġ s-dar baba iniġ-as: wa-baba, ffuġġ bahra zġ-maylli ira rbbi ula ma-trit kiyi.
ur-sul-sthllaġ ad-gġ yuk. skr gigi zund yan zġ-ih̬ddamn-nnk.›
inkr ġakudan iftu s-dar babas. sul-n-yaggug s-t-in-yukʷz babas, iḥnnu gis yazzl s-dars yamẓ-t-id ġ-gr ifassn-ns ar-t-issudun.
imma yus inna-yas: ‹wa-baba, ha-nkki ffuġġ bahra zġ-maylli ira rbbi ula ma-trit kiyi. ur-sul-sthllaġ ad-gġ yuk.›
walaynni babas iġra-d i-ih̬ddamn-ns yini-asn: ‹azzlat tawim-d aslham lli-ihiyyan tsslsm-as-t, tgm-as talh̬atmt ġ-uḍaḍ-ns d-idukan ġ-iḍarn-ns,
tawim-d igiz iḍnin tġrsm-as a-nšš nfrḥ.
ašku iwi lli-immutn hati iddr, ġwalli ijlan hati nufa-t.› zaydn frḥn bahra i-ngratsn.
imma yus lli-imqqurn illa-n ġ-igran ġ-tasaɛt-an. lliġ-d-yuška yakmur-d s-tgmmi isfld i-uḥwaš d-tġurit,
iġr-d i-yan-uh̬ddam isqsa-t: ‹mayd illan?›
yini-as: ‹yuška-d gʷmak. iġrs babak i-igiz iḍnin ašku iwrri-d dars yus ur-t-yaġ yat.›
ġakudan ibzg ṭiyyr-as bahra ur-akkʷ-iri a-ikšm s-tgmmi. iffuġ-d babas iḍalb-t bahra,
imma ntta irur-as: ‹hati mnnaw isggʷasn ayd dark kkatġ tammara, ar-bdda-skarġ s-wawal-nnk, walaynni ur-jju-yyi-tfkit wah̬h̬a ġir tikrut a-srs-frḥġ nkki d-imddukkʷal-inu.
imma ġilad ha-yuk lli-n-iššan kullu lh̬ir-nnk d-tmgganin, tġrst-as i-igiz iḍnin.›
isawl babas yini-as: ‹wa-iwi, kiyi tllit-bdda didi. kullu mad-dari-illan iga winnk.
ifulki a-nfrḥ ar-nštta ašku gʷmak lli-immutn hati iddr, ġwalli ijlan hati nufa-t.›»
isawl-daġ yasuɛ s-imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «ha-yan-urgaz iṭṭafn ayda iggutn, ifl-t ġ-ufus n-uh̬ddam-ns a-t-igabl. isfld bu-wayda f-uh̬ddam-an is-a-yas-izzmzar ayda-ns.
iġr-as s-dars yini-as: ‹ma-iga ġayd mi fllak sflidġ? ašk-id ġilad, nḥasab didi s-ma-tskrt s-wayda-nu, ašku ur-sul-riġ a-dari-th̬dmt.›
iswangm-uh̬ddam, yini d-ih̬f-ns: ‹ma-rad-skrġ? ra-yyi-issufġ sidi. ur-dusġ baš ad-qqazġ akal, d-ur-rḍiġ a-tḍalabġ mddn.
ssnġ ma-rad-skrġ baš a-yyi-n-šškšamn mddn s-darsn iġ-iyi-issufġ zġ-twuri.›
yazn ilmma s-kullu willi mi iḍfar sidis kra, isawl srsn yan s-yan. isqsa amzwaru: ‹mnšk ad-ak-iḍfar sidi?›
yini-as: ‹miyya n-waṭṭaru n-zzit.› yini-as: ‹ha-lḥsab-nnk, skiws ġil ġil tarat gis smmus id-mraw n-waṭṭaru.›
isqsa wayyaḍ: ‹mnšk ad-ak-iḍfar?› yini-as: ‹miyya n-utllis n-irdn.› yini-as: ‹ha-lḥsab-nnk, ara gis tam id-mraw n-utllis.›
ġakudan yulġ bu-wayda ah̬ddam-ns-lli yʷh̬šnn, ašku iswangm bahra ġ-mayd iskr. ašku ar-swingimn ayt-ddunit-ad ġ-tġawsiwin-nsn uggʷar n-ayt-tifawt.
rad-awn-iniġ, skarat-awn imddukkʷal s-wayda n-ddunit-ad, a-kʷn-in-šškšmn s-tgʷmma l-lih̬rt ġakud nna-itmma-wayda.
«yan iskarn lḥqq s-tġawsiwin mẓẓinin ra-t-iskr ula s-tġawsiwin mqqurnin. yan itffuġn zġ-lḥqq s-tġawsiwin mẓẓinin ra-zgis-iffuġ ula s-tġawsiwin mqqurnin.
iġ-ur-tskirm s-nniyt s-wayda n-ddunit-ad ma-ra-ifl ġ-ufus-nnun maylli ihiyyan s-uggʷar?
iġ-ur-tskirm s-nniyt s-ma-igan win wiyyaḍ ma-rad-awn-ifk ma-igan winnun?
«ur-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-iqasa sin id-sidis. imma ra-ikrhu yan yiri wayyaḍ, nġd ra-ituqqar yan iḥgr wayyaḍ. ur-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tgm ismgan n-rbbi d-win-wayda.»
lliġ sfldn ifarisin i-kullu mayd inna yasuɛ ar-gis-tṭnaẓn, ašku ntni ɛzzan darsn iqaridn.
imma ntta irur-asn: «ha-kunni ar-tmalam ih̬fawn-nnun ġ-lgddam n-mddn baš a-fllawn-ttinin tfulkim, walaynni rbbi issn ma-illan ġ-uwlawn-nnun. ašku ġaylli iɛzzan dar mddn, tajlh̬it a-iga dar rbbi.
«ikka-ttin ššrɛ n-musa ula lanbiya ar-malan i-mddn ma-ira rbbi aylliġ-d-yuška yuḥanna amsddam. imma ġilad ġ-a-tbrraḥġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin n-tgldit n-rbbi, mmaġn kullu mddn a-srs-kšmn.
walaynni ra-irh̬u ad-ittin ignwan d-wakal ula titti yat-tnqiṭṭ zġ-ššrɛ.
wanna ifran i-tmġart-ns itahl yat yaḍni, hati izna. d-wanna itahln tanna ifran, ula nttan zzna ayan iskr.
«ha-yan-urgaz iṭṭafn ayda iggutn, ar-ilssa aslham aẓggʷaġ d-tmlsa šwanin, ar-ištta ar-issa ifrḥ d-ih̬f-ns kraygatt ass.
yili-daġ yan-umẓluḍ ism-ns liɛazr, ar-d-ittrus ġ-imi n-tgmmi n-urgaz-an. yuḍn s-iḥbba ggutnin,
iẓuẓḍ a-išš aynna-d-iṭṭarn zġ-lmida n-bu-wayda. ula iḍan ar-srs-ttidun ar-tllḥn iḥbba-ns.
immt-ilmma-umẓluḍ-lli, asin-t lmalayka s-tama n-ibrahim. immt bu-wayda ityawmḍal,
irfufn bahra ġ-udġar n-willi mmutnin. yall alln-ns iẓr-n ibrahim ġ-tuggugt iẓr-n liɛazr ġ-tama-ns,
iġr-as: ‹wa-baba ibrahim, ḥnnu gigi. ha-yyi ġ-lɛafit-ad ar-bahra-trfufunġ. azn liɛazr a-d-issayk aḍaḍ-ns aman, issilwiġ ils-inu.›
irar-as ibrahim: ‹kti-d a-iwi is-tumẓt timih̬ar-nnk ġ-ddunit, yamẓ liɛazr tarfufnt. imma ġilad ifrḥ liɛazr ġid, trfufnt kiyi.
rad-ak-iniġ, tlla yat talat idran ġ-gratnnġ didun. ttyawskar i-ġmkad, a-n-ur-bbin ġwid ranin a-n-bbin zġ-darnnġ s-darun, ula iẓḍar yan a-d-ibbi zġ-darun s-darnnġ.›
yini-as bu-wayda: ‹wa-baba ibrahim, walaynni ḍalbġ zġ-gik a-taznt liɛazr s-tgmmi n-baba,
ašku llan sul ġin smmus aytma, ad-asn-yini a-ur-skarn zund nkki, a-ur-d-kšmn ula ntni s-udġar-ad n-urfufn iggutn.›
irar-as ibrahim: ‹aytmak, llan-darsn-warratn n-musa ula win lanbiya. illa fllasn ad-sflidn i-ma-ttinin ntni.›
yini-as bu-wayda: ‹uhu a-baba ibrahim, walaynni iġ-n-darsn-yuška kra n-yan zġ-gr ġwilli mmutnin rad-fln ddnub-nsn wrrin s-uġaras n-rbbi.›
irar-as ibrahim: ‹iġ-ur-a-sflidn i-musa ula lanbiya ur-rad-wrrin, wah̬h̬a-d-akkʷ-inkr kra n-yan zġ-lmut.›»
isawl yasuɛ s-imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «iqqan-d ad-ilint tabayḍḍrin ma-issṭarn mddn, walaynni taguḍi a-ra-yili i-wanna-tnt-in-israsn.
yuf-as iġ-as-ityaggal-uẓru n-uzrg ġ-umggrḍ-ns ityawgar-n ġ-umda, ula issḍr yan zġ-imẓẓiyn-ad.
awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun. iġ-iskr gʷmak kra yʷh̬šnn, sawl srs baš a-ur-t-sul-iskr. iġ-tʷgraẓ gʷmak ifl lh̬ʷšant-an, ṣamḥ-as.
iġ-a-yak-iskar lh̬ʷšant ssa n-twal ġ-yan-wass ar-d-ittaški ssa n-twal ar-ak-ittini: ‹tʷgraẓ-iyi f-mad-skrġ, ur-sul-ra-t-skrġ,› illa fllak ad-as-ttṣamaḥt.»
inin-as irqqasn-ns: «ɛawn-aġ a-nzayd namn s-uggʷar.»
irar-asn siditnnġ: «mrad is-gigun-illa liman unšk n-taqqayt imẓẓin l-lh̬rdl, ra-tinim i-tsġart-ad n-imršiq ‹akuf ttyawẓẓat-n ġ-umda› ra-tskr s-mad-as-tnnam.
«ma-ra-tskrt iġ-dark-illa yan-uh̬ddam ar-ikkrz nġd ar-ikssa ulli? iġ-d-iwrri zġ-igran is-rad-as-tinit: ‹ha-imnsi-nnk, gawr tsunfut ar-tšttat›?
uhu, rad-as-tinit: ‹skr-iyi imnsi-nu, tbkist ar-flla-ttsh̬h̬art, ard ššġ suġ nkki ġakudan a-ra-tššt ula kiyi tsut.›
ur-ra-talġm ah̬ddam-an f-mayd iskr, ašku ur-iskir abla tawuri lli-f-t-yuṣṣa sidis.
ula kunni, ġakud lliġ tskrm kullu ma-f-kʷn-yuṣṣa siditun iqqan-kʷn-d a-tinim: ‹ih̬ddamn ka-nga zund wiyyaḍ. ur-nskir abla maylli fllannġ illan.›»
izayd yasuɛ ġ-uġaras n-urušalim, izri ġ-gr-tmizar n-samira d-jalil,
ilkm yan-uduwwar. mnaggarn-t-id mraw injdamn. biddn-in ġ-tuggugt,
alln awal-nsn ar-ttinin: «wa-yasuɛ, wa-sidi, ḥnnu ginnġ.»
lliġ-tn-iẓra yasuɛ yini-asn: «ddwat tmlm ih̬fawn-nnun i-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi.» ġakudan, lliġ ftan ġusn.
yan gisn, lliġ iẓra ih̬f-ns ijji, iwrri-d yall awal-ns ar-italġ rbbi,
iḍr f-uwdm-ns ġ-dar iḍarn n-yasuɛ ar-t-itškar. iga ntta gu-samira.
isawl yasuɛ yini: «is-urd mraw a-iġusn? manza tẓa yaḍni?
is-ur-illi ma-d-iwrrin a-iškr rbbi abla abrrani-ad?»
yini-as ilmma: «nkr, mun d-uġaras-nnk. ha-kiyi tumnt, mayan a-f-tġust.»
aškin-d kra n-ifarisin sqsan yasuɛ: «managu a-ra-di-tašk-tgldit n-rbbi?» yini-asn: «tagldit n-rbbi, ur-ra-di-tban i-iẓri n-mddn a-stt-ssmaqqln.
ur-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-yini ‹hatti› nġd ‹hattin› ašku tagldit n-rbbi, ammas-nnun a-ġ-tlla.»
yini ilmma i-imḥḍarn-ns: «ra-d-yašk-uzmz lli-ġ-ra-tẓuẓḍm bahra a-tẓrm yan-wass ġ-uwssan n-yus n-bnadm, ur-ra-ti-tẓrm.
rad-nkrn mddn inin-awn ‹hatin› nġd ‹hati›. walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-darsn-tddum ula tḍfurm-tn.
ašku ġmklli kkatn-uwsmann zġ-yat-tsga n-ignwan isfiwn-in i-tsga yaḍni, ġmkan a-rad-d-aškġ nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm ġ-wass-inu.
walaynni iqqan-iyi-d zwar a-bahra-rfufnġ, luḥn-iyi-n mddn n-tasut-ad.
zund ġaylli illan ġ-uwssan n-nuḥ a-ra-yili ġ-uwssan-an ġ-ra-d-yašk yus n-bnadm.
ar-šttan mddn ar-ssan ar-ttahaln ar-ttahalnt ar ass lli-ġ-ikšm nuḥ s-wanaw ġlin-d-srsn-waman ggutnin tyawhlakn kullutn.
rad-daġ-yili ġmklli illan ġ-uwssan n-luṭ. ar-šttan ar-ssan ar-saġn ar-zznzan ar-tẓẓun ar-bnnun,
walaynni ġ-wass lli-ġ-iffuġ luṭ tamdint n-sadum tḍr-d lɛafit d-lkbrit zġ-ignwan tyawhlakn kullutn.
ġmkan a-ra-d-daġ-yili ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-iban yus n-bnadm.
«imma ġassan, rad-awn-fllas-iniġ: wanna illan ġ-iggi n-tgmmi, iqqan-t-id a-ur-igguz a-d-yasi tiġawsiwin-ns zġ-tgmmi. ula wanna-n-illan ġ-igran, a-ur-iwrri a-d-yawi kra.
swangmad-d ma-ijran i-tmġart n-luṭ.
wanna isiggiln a-ijjnjm tudrt-ns ra-stt-ijlu. d-wanna ijlan tudrt-ns ra-stt-ijjnjm.
rad-awn-iniġ, ġ-iḍ-an rad-ilin sin mddn ġ-tisi, ra-yitti yan iqama yan.
rad-ilint snat-tmġarin ar-ẓẓaḍnt, ra-titti yat tqama yat.»
sqsan-t imḥḍarn-ns: «wa-sidi, maniġ a-ra-yili mayad?» yini-asn: «innaġ illa miḍrus a-ġ-a-n-tmunun igadrn.»
isawl yasuɛ s-imḥḍarn-ns, yiri ad-asn-iml is-tn-d-iqqan a-bdda-tẓallan bla-da-trmayn. yut-asn lmɛna-yad,
yini-asn: «ha-yal-lqaḍi ġ-yat-tmdint, ur-iksuḍ rbbi ula-da-stt-itawi ġ-mddn.
tili yat-thjjalt ġ-tmdint-an ar-bdda-tssmummʷi ġ-dar lqaḍi ar-as-ttini: ‹fukku-yyi zġ-unuwwaš-inu.›

mnnaw-uwssan ur-iri lqaḍi ad-as-isfld, imil yini d-ih̬f-ns: ‹tahjjalt-ad ar-bdda-yyi-tssiḥil. wah̬h̬a ur-ksuḍġ rbbi ula-da-stti-tawiġ ġ-mddn ra-stt-fukkuġ, a-ur-sul-di-ttaški ad-iyi-trẓ ih̬f.›»
yini-asn siditnnġ: «ġmkad a-s-inna lqaḍi-an yʷh̬šnn,
imma rbbi is-ur-ra-ifukku mddn-ns lli-as-aqranin ġ-iyḍ ula azal? is-ra-imaṭl ad-asn-ifk maylli zġ-gis ḍalbn?
rad-awn-iniġ, ra-tn-ifukku ḥayna. walaynni ġassan ġ-rad-d-wrriġ s-ddunit-ad nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, is-rad-d-afġ ma-sul-yumnn?»
izayd yasuɛ isawl s-kra n-mddn lli-iɛjb ih̬f-nsn, ġaln is-fulkin ar-tḥgarn wiyyaḍ. yut-asn lmɛna-yad yini-asn:
«ha-sin mddn kšmn s-tgmmi n-rbbi ad-ẓẓalln. yan iga afarisi, ig wayyaḍ bu-nkkas.
ibidd-ufarisi waḥdut, iẓẓall d-ih̬f-ns yini: ‹wa-rbbi, ar-k-tškarġ ašku ur-giġ zund mddn yaḍni. ntni ar-takʷrn ar-tġʷššan ar-tfsadn. ar-k-tškarġ ašku ur-akkʷ-giġ zund bu-nkkas-ad.
ha-yyi ar-taẓumġ kraygatt kraḍ-uwssan, ar-akkaġ tis mrawt n-kullu ma-dari-illan.›
imma bu-nkkas, ibidd-n ġ-tġurdin. ur-iẓḍar a-yall alln-ns s-iggi. ar-ikkat f-idmarn-ns ar-ittini: ‹wa-rbbi ṣamḥ-iyi, iggut mad-skrġ yʷh̬šn.›
rad-awn-iniġ, lliġ wrrin s-tgʷmma-nsn, bu-nkkas-an a-f-irḍa rbbi, urd afarisi. ašku wanna issimġurn ih̬f-ns ra-t-iẓẓimẓay rbbi, imma wanna iẓẓimẓayn ih̬f-ns ra-t-issimġur.»
ar-di-ttaškin mddn ar-di-tawin tarwa mẓẓinin i-yasuɛ, irin a-n-fllasn-isrs ifassn-ns ibark-tn. lliġ ẓran imḥḍarn-ns mayd skarn, rarn-tn inin-asn: «a-tn-d-ur-tawim.»
imma yasuɛ iġra-d i-tarwa s-dars yini: «adjat tarwa mẓẓinin a-d-dari-aškin. a-tn-ur-tḥṣarm, ašku zund ġwid a-mi-tlla-tgldit n-rbbi.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, wanna ur-irin a-ikšm s-tgldit n-rbbi zund arraw imẓẓin ur-ra-srs-ikšm.»
yašk-id yan-unmġur n-tmazirt-an, isqsa yasuɛ yini-as: «way-amslmd ifulkin, ma-rad-skrġ baš ad-ṭṭafġ tudrt l-lih̬rt?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «mah̬ aylliġ-iyi-tgit d-wad ifulkin? ur-illi yan ifulkin abla rbbi waḥdut.
kiyi tssnt luṣiyat, ‹a-ur-tznut, a-ur-tnġt, a-ur-takʷrt, a-ur-tfkt tugga n-tkrkas. awi-tt ġ-babak d-innak.›»
yini-as-unmġur: «mayad kullut ar-t-skarġ zġ-lliġ mẓẓiġ sul s-ġilad.»
lliġ isfld yasuɛ i-mayad yini-as: «yat-tġawsa ad-ak-iqaman. zayd tzznzt kullu mad-dark-illan tfkt-t i-imẓlaḍ, yili-ak-wayda ġ-ignna. taškid-d ilmma tmunt didi.»
imma ntta lliġ isfld i-wawal-ad tʷgraẓ-t bahra ašku iggut-dars-wayda.
yasuɛ iẓra is-ti-tʷgraẓ, yini-asn: «mnšk a-s-išqa f-willi dar iggut-wayda ad-kšmn s-tgldit n-rbbi.
ra-irh̬u f-urɛam a-ikšm zġ-tiṭ n-tasmi ula ikšm yan dar ayda iggutn s-tgldit n-rbbi.»
inin-as ġwilli-as-sfldnin: «iġ-iga ġmkad, ma-ra-yiẓḍar a-injm?»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «aynna mi ur-iẓḍar bnadm, iẓḍar-as rbbi.»
isawl bṭrus yini-as: «ha-nkkʷni nfl-n tigʷmma-nnġ našk-id nmun didk.»
yini-asn yasuɛ: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, wanna-n-ifln tigmmi-ns nġd tamġart-ns nġd aytmas nġd babas nġd innas nġd tarwa-ns f-ssibt n-tgldit n-rbbi,
rad-as-yili mad-bahra-yugʷrn mayad ġ-ddunit-ad, tili-as ġ-lih̬rt tudrt idumn.»
yawi yasuɛ sin d-mraw n-umḥḍar-ns waḥdutn, yini-asn: «ẓrat, ra-nddu s-urušalim, ijru ġin kullu mad-uran lanbiya f-yus n-bnadm.
ra-yyi-dḥin s-gr ifassn n-ibrraniyn, ṭnẓn gigi rgmn-iyi ssufsn flla.
ra-yyi-ssġuršn nġn-iyi, nkrġ-d ilmma zġ-lmut ġ-wis kraḍ-uwssan.»
imma imḥḍarn-ns ur-fhimn tiġawsiwin-ad. ur-ssinn ma-ira ad-asn-yini, tntl fllasn lmɛna.
yakmur-d yasuɛ s-tmdint n-ariḥa. illa ġin yan-ubukaḍ igawr ġ-tama n-uġaras ar-itḍalab.
isfld i-mddn ggutnin ar-zrayn ġ-uġaras isqsa-tn f-ma-illan.
inin-as: «yasuɛ gu-naṣira ayd izrin.»
yall awal-ns ġakudan iġr-as yini: «wa-yasuɛ yus n-dawd, ḥnnu gigi.»
grawln mddn lli-biddnin ġ-lgddam-ns, akʷin gis inin-as a-ifssa. imma ntta izuyd ar-itġuwwat ar-ittini: «wa-yus n-dawd, ḥnnu gigi.»
ibidd yasuɛ yini i-mddn-an a-t-id-awin s-dars. lliġ-t-id-iruḥ-ubukaḍ isqsa-t yasuɛ:
«ma-trit ad-ak-t-skrġ?» yini-as: «a-sidi, ad-isfiwġ.»
yini-as yasuɛ: «isfiw ġilad, ha-kiyi tjjit ašku tumnt.»
yisfiw ġakudan iḍfur yasuɛ ġ-uġaras ar-italġ rbbi. mddn-an kullutn, lliġ-t-ẓran alġn rbbi bahra.
izayd yasuɛ ikšm s-tmdint n-ariḥa, iftu ġ-wammas-ns.
yili ġin yan-unmġur n-willi tamẓnin iqaridn n-nkkas, ig ism-ns zakka, iggut-dars-wayda.
ira bahra a-iẓr yasuɛ walaynni ggutn mddn ġin, ur-iẓḍar a-t-in-iẓr ašku igzzul.
ar-itazzal izwur mddn, iġli s-yat-tsġart n-imršiq a-iẓr yasuɛ, ašku ġin a-zġ-ra-izri.
lliġ-t-in-ilkm yasuɛ yall alln-ns yini-as: «wa-zakka, gguz-d ġil ġil, ašku ġ-tgmmi-nnk a-ġ-rad-gawrġ ġassad.»
igguz-d zakka ḥayna, ifrḥ bahra išškšm yasuɛ s-dars.
lliġ-t-ẓran mddn-an ggutnin, ar-kullu-tngmugn i-ngratsn ar-ttinin: «hati ikšm a-ig anbgi ġ-dar bu-ddnub-ad.»
imma zakka inkr ibidd f-iḍarn-ns yini i-siditnnġ: «ġilad a-sidi, rad-fkġ mnaṣṣ n-wayda-nu i-imẓlaḍ. iġ-ššiġ kra n-yan s-lġʷšš rad-as-t-rarġ f-kkuẓṭ-twal.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «ġassad ilkm-d-ujnjm n-rbbi tigmmi-ad, ašku yumn ġwad ula ntta ġmklli yumn babatnnġ ibrahim.
uškiġ-d nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm ad-sigglġ s-willi jlanin jjnjmġ-tn.»
izayd yasuɛ isawl s-mddn lli-as-sflidnin, yut-asn lmɛna-yad ašku yakmur s-tmdint n-urušalim. ġaln ntni izd ġ-uwssan-an a-ġ-ra-di-tban-tgldit n-rbbi.
yini-asn: «ha-yan-urgaz iga yus n-tgmmi imqqurn, iskr f-a-imuddu s-yat-tmazirt yaggugn, baš ad-as-fkn lḥqq a-iḥkam tamazirt-ns iwrri-d ig fllas agllid.
lliġ ur-ta-iddi iġra-d i-mraw ih̬ddamn-ns s-dars, ifk i-kraygatt yan gisn yan-uqarid n-uwrġ, yini-asn: ‹zaydat ar-tsaġm ar-tzznzam ard-d-wrriġ.›
imma argaz-an, ar-ti-tkrhun ayt-tmazirt-ns, aznn irqqasn s-tmazirt-lli yaggugn ar-ttinin: ‹ur-nri argaz-ad a-fllannġ-iḥkam.›
izri ma-izrin s-as-ityawfka a-ig agllid, iwrri ilmma s-tmazirt-ns. iġr-d i-ih̬ddamn lli-mi-ifka iqaridn a-dars-kšmn ad-as-inin mnšk ad-d-srsn-rurn.
ikšm-umzwaru yini-as: ‹aqarid-nnk a-sidi, rurġ-d srs mraw iqaridn yaḍni nnigas.›
yini-as-ugllid: ‹išwa. ah̬ddam ifulkin a-tgit. tskrt s-lmɛqul s-mayd idrusn. ra-k-gġ ġilad d-lḥakm f-mrawt-tmdinin.›
ikšm wis sin yini-as: ‹aqarid-nnk a-sidi, rurġ-d srs smmus iqaridn yaḍni nnigas.›
yini-as-ugllid: ‹ra-k-gġ d-lḥakm f-smmust-tmdinin.›
ikšm wayyaḍ yini-as: ‹hay-aqarid-nnk a-sidi. ḥḍiġ-t ġ-yat-tummʷist.
ksuḍġ zġ-gik ašku ssnġ izd argaz išqan a-tgit, ar-di-ttasit ma-ur-n-tsrst ar-di-tmggrt ma-ur-tkrzt.›
yini-as sidis: ‹way-ah̬ddam yʷh̬šnn, s-wawal-ad tnnit a-s-rad-fllak-ḥkamġ. tssnt izd argaz išqan ad-giġ, ar-di-tasiġ ma-ur-n-srsġ ar-d-mggrġ ma-ur-krzġ.
mah̬ aylliġ ur-n-tgit aqarid-inu ġ-lbank, akud nna-d-wrriġ amẓġ-t-id ntta d-ma-d-irur ikka nnigas?›
yini-ugllid i-willi n-tama-ns: ‹kkisat-as aqarid-an tfkm-t i-walli dar mraw iqaridn.›
inin-as: ‹ha-ntta mraw ad-dars-illan, a-sidi.›
irar-asn: ‹rad-awn-iniġ, wanna dar illa, rad-as-ityawfka uggʷar. imma wanna ur-dar-illi, rad-as-ityawkkas ula ma-dars-illan.
imma inuwwašn-an-inu lli-ur-rinin ad-gġ agllid-nsn, awiyat-tn-d tnġm-tn ġ-lgddam-inu.›»
lliġ ikmml yasuɛ iwaliwn-ad, izayd ġ-uġaras n-urušalim izwur-asn.
lliġ ilkm awrir n-zzitun ġ-tsga n-bitfaji d-bitɛanya, yazn sin zġ-imḥḍarn-ns
yini-asn: «zaydat s-uduwwar-an l-lgddam-nnun. kšmat srs, ra-n-tafm yan-usnus iqqnn ur-jju-fllas-ini yan. fsiyat-as tawim-t-id s-ġid.
iġ-kʷn-isqsa kra n-yan mah̬ ad-as-tfssim, tinim-as: ‹ira-t siditnnġ.›»
ddun irqqasn-lli afn-in kullu maylli-s-asn-inna yasuɛ.
lliġ fssin i-usnus, inin-asn id-bab-ns: «mah̬ a-tfssim i-usnus-ad?»
inin-asn: «ira-t siditnnġ.»
awin-d asnus i-yasuɛ. grn-in fllas islhamn-nsn, ssnin yasuɛ.
issudu ġ-uġaras, aškin-d mddn ar-sswan islhamn-nsn ġ-wakal ġ-lgddam-ns.
lliġ ilkm agsar n-uwrir n-zzitun, yakmur-n s-tmdint, frḥn kullu imḥḍarn-an ggutnin, ar-talln awal-nsn ar-talġn rbbi f-kullu tiġawsiwin lli-ẓran mqqurnt
ar-ttinin: «ambarki a-iga-ugllid-ad-d-yuškan s-ism n-sidi rbbi. sslamt ġ-ignna d-lmjd ġ-tattuyt.»
sawln srs kra n-ifarisin zġ-gr mddn-an inin-as: «way-amslmd, ini i-imḥḍarn-nnk ad-fssan.»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «rad-awn-iniġ, iġ-fssan ġwid, rad-utn iẓran-ad taġurit.»
lliġ-n-yakmur yasuɛ s-tama n-urušalim issmaqql-n gis ar-yalla,
yini-as: «mrad is-tssnt aġaras n-sslamt ġassad, walaynni intl fllam.
rad-d-aškin-uwssan ġ-ra-km-d-lkmn inuwwašn-nnm, sutln-am ašbar rgln fllam, ḥṣarn-km zġ-kraygatt tasga.
ra-km-h̬lun d-tarwa-nnm gim, ur-ra-gim-fln aẓru f-wayyaḍ, ašku ur-trit a-tissant izd ġ-uzmz-ad a-ġ-iskr rbbi f-a-km-ijjnjm.»
ikšm yasuɛ s-tgmmi n-rbbi, inkr ar-zgis-iṭṭay ġwilli gis zznzanin,
yini-asn: «han ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi ‹tigmmi-nu ra-tg tigmmi n-tẓallit› imma kunni, hati trurm-tt tga ifri n-imh̬h̬arn.»
kraygatt ass ar-isslmad ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi. imma inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-imġarn n-tmazirt-an ar-siggiln mamnk a-s-ra-t-hlkn.
walaynni ur-ufin mamnk, ašku mddn kullutn ar-bahra-ttirin ad-sflidn i-iwaliwn-ns.
yan-wass illa yasuɛ ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi ar-isslmad mddn ar-asn-itbrraḥ s-lh̬bar ifulkin. aškin-d inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-imġarn. lkmn-d yasuɛ
sqsan-t: «ini-aġ, ma-k-id-yuznn a-tskart kullu ġayad? awal n-mi ayd-s-a-ti-tskart?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ula nkki ra-kʷn-sqsaġ yan-usqsi. iniyat-iyi,
yuḥanna amsddam, ma-t-id-yuznn a-issddam mddn? izd rbbi nġd bnadm?»
bdun ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn ar-ttinin: «ma-rad-as-nini? ašku iġ-nenna ‹rbbi a-t-id-yuznn› rad-aġ-yini ‹mah̬ aylliġ ur-tuminm mad-awn-inna?›
walaynni iġ-nenna ‹bnadm a-t-id-yuznn› rad-aġ-kkatn kullu mddn-ad s-iẓran, ašku ar-ttinin ntni izd s-ṣṣaḥt yuḥanna yan-nnabi a-iga.»
sawln ilmma inin-as: «ur-nssin ma-t-id-yuznn.»
irar-asn yasuɛ: «ula nkki ur-rad-awn-iniġ ma-yyi-d-yuznn ad-skarġ kullu mayad.»
isawl yasuɛ s-mddn, yut-asn lmɛna-yad yini-asn: «ha-yan-urgaz iẓẓa aḍil ġ-igr-ns. ifl-t i-ih̬ʷmmaṣn, iftu imuddu s-tmazirt yaḍni igawr-n ġin.
lliġ-d-iruḥ-uzmz yazn yan-uh̬ddam-ns s-dar ih̬ʷmmaṣn, ad-as-d-fkn ma-t-id-yuškan ġ-lġllt n-igr-ns. walaynni ih̬ʷmmaṣn ġwin ah̬ddam-an, ssġuršn-t rarn-t bla yat.
yazn ah̬ddam yaḍni. ula ntta, ssġuršn-t ih̬ʷmmaṣn ssrfufnn-t rarn-t bla yat.
yazn wis kraḍ. ula ntta, ssyaggasn-t luḥn-t-in s-brra.
iswangm bab n-igr d-ih̬f-ns yini: ‹ma-rad-skrġ ġilad? rad-aznġ iwi iɛzzan. ntta, ra-t-uqqrn.›
imma ih̬ʷmmaṣn-lli, lliġ-t-ẓran mšawarn i-ngratsn inin: ‹ġwad a-ra-iwrt igr. aškad-d a-t-nnġ ig lwrt winnġ.›
nkrn luḥn-t-in s-brra n-igr nġn-t.» isqsa-tn yasuɛ: «ma-rad-asn-iskr bab n-igr-an n-waḍil?
ra-d-yašk ihlk ih̬ʷmmaṣn-an ifk igr i-wiyyaḍ.» lliġ sfldn mddn i-ġayan inin: «ad-aġ-injja rbbi.»
issmaqql gisn yasuɛ yini-asn: «ma-iga mayd ityaran ġ-warratn n-rbbi? ‹aẓru lli-n-luḥn ibnnayn, nttan a-iwrrin iga ih̬f n-uġẓu.›
imma aẓru-ad, kullu wanna fllas iḍrn ra-irẓ, d-wanna-f-iḍr ra-t-ilbj d-wakal.»
irin imslmdn n-ššrɛ d-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi ad-amẓn yasuɛ, ašku ssnn izd ntni a-f-yut lmɛna-yad, walaynni ksuḍn zġ-mddn.
sul-t-gabln, aznn-d kra n-irgazn ad-skarn zund iġ-a-ttirin aġaras n-rbbi, walaynni ran ġir ad-amẓn yasuɛ f-wawal-ns baš a-t-in-dḥin i-lḥakm n-rruman a-fllas-iḥkam.
aškin-d inin-as: «way-amslmd, nssn izd lḥqq ayd ttinit ar-ti-tsslmadt. ur-a-ttmnadt udmawn n-mddn walaynni ar-tsslmadt aġaras n-rbbi ġmklli iga.
ini-aġ, is-iḥlla a-nakka ḍabiyt i-qayṣr nġd uhu?»
imma yasuɛ issn mad-nuwwan ġ-lḥilt-nsn, yini-asn:
«mlat-iyi-d yan-uqarid. iniyat-iyi, win mit a-iga-uwdm-ad d-ism-ad gis illan?» inin-as: «win qayṣr.»
irar-asn: «fkat i-qayṣr ma-igan win qayṣr, tfkm i-rbbi ma-igan win rbbi.»
iḍr-asn lɛjb f-mayd-s-asn-irur. fssan kullu, ur-ẓḍarn a-t-amẓn f-wawal-ns ġ-lgddam n-kullu mddn-an.
aškin-d dars kra n-iṣadduqin. ntni ġ-lmdhb-nsn ar-ttinin «ur-illi ma-ra-d-inkr zġ-lmut.»
sqsan-t: «way-amslmd, yura-yaġ musa inna ‹iġ-immut kra n-yan ifl-d tamġart-ns bla tarwa, illa f-gʷmas n-urgaz-an a-itahl tamġart-an a-dids-iskr tarwa f-ism n-gʷmas lli-immutn.›
ha-ssa n-aytmatn. yiwi-umzwaru tamġart, immt ur-d-ifil tarwa.
yawi-tt wis sin,
ntta ula wis kraḍ, aylliġ-tt-iwin s-ssa, mmtn kullutn ur-d-filn tarwa.
ġ-isiggʷra tmmt-tmġart ula nttat.
ini-aġ, ġ-tnkra lli-ġ-rad-nkrn kullutn, tamġart n-manwa gisn a-ra-tg? hatti tkka-ttin tga tamġart-nsn s-ssa.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «ayt-ddunit-ad ar-tahaln ar-tahalnt,
imma ġwilli f-irḍa rbbi ad-nkrn zġ-lmut ddrn ġ-lih̬rt, ntni ur-ra-tahaln ula-da-tahalnt.
hatni zund lmalayka a-rad-gn ašku ur-sul-rad-mmtn. gn tarwa n-rbbi ašku luln s-tudrt l-lih̬rt.
imma tankra n-willi mmutnin, yura fllas ula musa ġ-warra n-tzggʷart lli-ijddrn, yini f-sidi rbbi is-iga rbbi n-ibrahim ig rbbi n-isḥaq ig rbbi n-yaɛqub.
awal-an imla-yaġ is-ddrn ntni wah̬h̬a mmutn, ašku sul ddrn kullutn ġ-lgddam n-rbbi.»
inin-as kra n-imslmdn n-ššrɛ: «yʷġẓan mayd tnnit ay-amslmd.»
ašku ur-sul-zɛmn a-t-sqsan.
izayd yasuɛ yini-asn: «mah̬ aylliġ a-ttinin mddn ‹ra-ig lmasiḥ yan zġ-tasut n-ugllid dawd›?
hati dawd ula ntta isawl f-lmasiḥ ġ-warra n-imurign inna: ‹ha-sidi rbbi inna i-sidi, skiws f-ufasiy-inu
ard gġ inuwwašn-nnk ġ-ddu iḍarn-nnk.›
ha-dawd s-ih̬f-ns ibdr ġwalli igan lmasiḥ ig-t d-sidis. mamnk a-ra-ig ġir yan zġ-tasut-ns?»
isawl yasuɛ s-imḥḍarn-ns ġ-lgddam n-mddn-an kullutn yini-asn:

«rarat lɛaql-nnun zġ-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, ašku iɛzza darsn ad-fttun s-tmlsa ġzzifnin šwanin, iɛzzu darsn ad-fllasn-tsllamn mddn ġ-laswaq, iɛzzu darsn ad-zggurun s-lgddam ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ula ġ-uskiws n-imnsiwn.
ar-šttan tigʷmma n-thjjalin, ar-ssiġzzifn tiẓulla-nsn baš ad-ssbayynn ih̬fawn-nsn is-fulkin. ntni ra-fllasn-ittut lḥukm n-rbbi s-uggʷar.»
ar-itmnad yasuɛ ġ-id-bu-wayda ar-n-srasn tiwafkiw-nsn ġ-ṣṣnduq ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi.
iẓr-n yat-thjjalt tga tamẓluṭṭ, tašk-id tsrs-n snat-tqaridin ġ-ṣṣnduq idrus-watig-nsnt.
yini i-imḥḍarn-ns: «lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, tahjjalt-ad tamẓluṭṭ, hatti tfka uggʷar n-ġwid kullutn,
ašku ntni fkan zġ-maylli darsn iggutn, imma nttat, wah̬h̬a tḥtajja, tfka lmɛišt-ns kullutt.»
sawln imḥḍarn i-ngratsn f-tgmmi n-rbbi, ar-tɛjjabn ġ-ufulki n-iẓran lli-s-tġli ula tiwafkiw lli-gis-akkan mddn i-rbbi. imma yasuɛ inna-yasn:
«kullu mayd ttmnadm, rad-d-aškin-uwssan ġ-rad-kullu-ityawgar s-wakal. ur-ra-gis-iqama-uẓru f-uẓru.»
sqsan-t: «way-amslmd, managu a-ra-yili ġayan? ma-ra-ig tamatart n-is-d-yakmur a-ijru?»

yini-asn yasuɛ: «awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun a-kʷn-ur-ijlu yan, ašku ggutn ġwilli ra-d-yašk asin ism-inu, kud yan ar-ittini izd nttan a-igan lmasiḥ ar-ittini: ‹hati truḥ-d tasaɛt.› walaynni a-tn-ur-tḍfurm.
iġ-tsfldm f-imaġn ula uduyn ad-ur-tġuwḍm, ašku iqqan-d a-yili ġayan, walaynni ur-ta-d-iruḥ isiggʷra.»
izayd yini-asn: «ra-tnkr-tqbilt s-tqbilt, tnkr-tgldit s-tgldit,
ilint zznzalat šqanin, yili-uġni d-waṭṭan ġ-kigan d-tmizar. rad-d-bannt-tmitar tjhhdnin ġ-ignwan ard bahra ġuwḍn mddn.
imma kunni, ur-ta-ijri ġayan a-ra-kʷn-tamẓn ar-kʷn-ssrfufunn ar-kʷn-in-dḥayn s-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ula lḥbs. ra-kʷn-in-ssbiddadn ġ-lgddam n-igldan d-lḥukkam f-ssibt n-ma-tgam winu.
tasaɛt-an a-ihiyyann ad-asn-gis-tfkm tugga-nnun flla.
walaynni nbḍat ġ-ih̬f-nnun ur-ta-d-iruḥ-uzmz-an a-ur-tswingimm ġ-mamnk a-s-rad-asn-trarm awal.
ašku rad-awn-d-fkġ iwaliwn d-tḥkimt baš a-ur-yiẓḍar yan zġ-inuwwašn-nnun a-kʷn-issfssa ula a-kʷn-inru ġ-ma-ttinim.
imma kunni ra-kʷn-in-dḥayn ayt-darun d-aytmatun d-ayt-tqbilt-nnun ula imddukkʷal-nnun. rad-nġn kra gigun.
ra-kʷn-tkrhun kullu mddn f-ssibt n-ma-tgam winu.
walaynni ur-ra-ityawhlak kra n-unẓaḍ zġ-ih̬f-nnun.
biddat tzgam, ġmkad a-s-ra-tnjmm.
«iġ-tẓram tamdint n-urušalim sutlnt-as lḥrkat n-iɛskrin, tissanm is-d-yakmur-wass ġ-ra-th̬lu.
imma ġassan, winna llanin ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya, iqqan-tn-d ad-rwln s-idrarn. d-winna llanin ġ-tmdint, iqqan-tn-d a-stt-ffuġn. d-winna llanin ġ-lh̬la, iqqan-tn-d a-n-ur-kšmn s-tmdint.
ašku rad-gn-uwssan-an ussan l-lɛqubit, a-gisn-ijru kullu ma-fllasn-ityaran ġ-warratn n-rbbi.
mnšk a-s-rad-šqun-uwssan-an f-tilli gisn rbbunin ula tilli gisn ssngaynin. ašku ra-tigat tassast ġ-tmazirt-ad, yili lġaḍab n-rbbi f-mddn-ad.
ra-immt kra ġ-imiġ, krfn wiyyaḍ awin-tn s-tmizar aggugnin. rad-akʷln ibrraniyn f-urušalim ard ikmml-uzmz-nsn.
«rad-ilint-tmitar ġ-tafukt d-wayyur d-itran, tili taġuft iggutn ġ-kigan d-tmizar n-ddunit, ġuwḍn mddn ġ-ijjij n-umda ula taḍangiwin-ns.
rad-iksaḍn bahra tġašan s-taġuft n-ma-ra-izri f-ddunit, ašku ra-tyattaynt tifawin n-ignwan.
ġakudan a-ra-yyi-ẓrn, nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, ftiġ-d ġ-yat-tmdlut s-lquwwa d-lmjd iggutn.
ġakud nna-tẓram tiġawsiwin-ad ar-jrrunt, nkrat tallm ih̬fawn-nnun, ašku takmur-d tasaɛt lli-ġ-ra-tnjmm.»
izayd yasuɛ yut-asn lmɛna-yad yini-asn: «ẓrat tazart ula isġarn kullutn.
iġ-a-d-ssufuġn ifrawn-nsn, tissanm is-d-yakmur ṣṣif.
ġmkan a-ra-yili. iġ-tẓram timitar-ad-s-awn-nniġ ar-jrrunt, tissanm is-di-takmur-tgldit n-rbbi.
lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ, ur-ra-tzri tasut-ad ard kullu ijru mayad.
rad-ittin ignwan d-wakal walaynni ur-sar-ittin iwaliwn-inu.
«awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun a-ur-tlhum s-umššu ula tissi ula tiġufiwin n-tudrt-ad, a-ur-imil iruḥ-kʷn-d-wass-an iġwi-kʷn zund agḍiḍ lli-tġwi-tẓqqurt.
ašku ra-izri-wass-an f-kullu imzdġn n-ddunit.
rarat lɛaql tḍufm-bdda ar-ttḍalabm rbbi a-kʷn-issdus a-tnjmm zġ-kullu ġaylli ra-ijru, tbiddm ġ-lgddam n-yus n-bnadm tzgam.»
ass f-wass ar-isslmad yasuɛ ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ar-itffuġ ġ-iyḍ a-inssa ġ-uwrir n-zzitun.
zikk ṣbaḥ n-kraygatt ass ar-di-ttaškin mddn ggutnin s-tgmmi n-rbbi, ar-d-dars-tmunun ad-as-sfldn.
yakmur-d lɛid n-urh̬ṣiṣ lli-mi-ttinin-daġ lɛid n-usurf.
inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ ar-siggiln s-mamnk a-rad-nġn yasuɛ, walaynni ksuḍn zġ-mddn.
ġakudan a-ikšm šiṭan s-yahuda lli-mi-ttinin ish̬aryuṭ, iga yan zġ-sin d-mraw n-umḥḍar.
iddu yahuda s-dar inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-win imh̬zniyn, imšawar didsn f-mamnk a-rad-asn-izznz yasuɛ.
frḥn ntni inin-as rad-as-fkn iqaridn.
imšaška-d didsn, iwrri ar-iswingim mamnk a-ra-tn-iɛawn ad-amẓn yasuɛ ġ-kra n-tasaɛt ġ-ur-llin mddn.
ilkm-d-wass n-urh̬ṣiṣ lli-ġ a-qqrsn mddn i-ilqqaġn l-lɛid n-usurf.
inkr yasuɛ yazn bṭrus d-yuḥanna yini-asn: «zaydat tjjujadm-aġ imnsi l-lɛid n-usurf a-t-nšš i-ngratnnġ.»
inin-as: «mani trit a-t-in-gis-njjujad?»
yini-asn: «ẓrat, ra-n-tkšmm s-tmdint, tmnaggarm yan-urgaz yusi-d agdur n-waman. ḍfurat-t s-tgmmi nna-s-ikšm,
tinim i-bu-tgmmi-an ‹hati inna-yak-d-umslmd, maniġ illa-uḥanu lli-ġ-rad-ššġ imnsi n-usurf nkki d-imḥḍarn-inu?›
rad-awn-iml bu-tgmmi-an yan-uḥanu n-uflla imqqurn iswan. ġin a-ġ-ra-tjjujadm.»
ddun ntni afn-in ġmklli-asn-inna, jjujadn imnsi n-usurf.
lliġ-di-tlkm tasaɛt n-imnsi, iskiws yasuɛ a-išš d-irqqasn-ns,
yini-asn: «mnšk a-s-riġ ad-didun-ššġ imnsi-ad n-usurf ur-ta-mmutġ.
ašku rad-awn-iniġ, ur-sul-ra-t-ššġ ard yafu ġ-tgldit n-rbbi.»
yasi lkas iškr rbbi, yini i-imḥḍarn-ns: «amẓat lkas-ad, tsum zġ-gis kullukn.
rad-awn-iniġ, ur-sul-rad-ssuġ zġ-lġllt n-waḍil ard-di-tašk-tgldit n-rbbi.»
yasi tangult, iškr rbbi ibbi-tt ifk-asn-tt yini-asn: «h̬tad tga ddat-inu, ttyawfka f-ssibt-nnun. skarat mayad a-yyi-d-srs-tswingimm.»
yasi ula lkas ġmkad ġ-isiggʷra n-imnsi, yini-asn: «lkas-ad iga lɛhd l-ljdid ġ-gratun d-rbbi s-idammn-inu lli-ra-iffi f-ssibt-nnun.
walaynni hay-afus n-walli-yyi-n-izznzan ittrs didi ġ-lmida-yad.
ra-immt yus n-bnadm ġmklli iqṣad rbbi, walaynni taguḍi a-ra-yili i-urgaz lli-t-izznzan.»
bdun ntni ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn f-manwa gisn a-ra-iskr ġayan.
ar-tẓin imḥḍarn i-ngratsn f-manwa gisn a-ra-ig anmġur.
isawl srsn yasuɛ yini-asn: «ha-igldan n-ddunit ar-tḥkamn f-ayt-tmizar-nsn, ula inmġurn-nsn ar-ttirin mddn ad-fllasn-ttinin ‹id-bu-ljudit›.
imma kunni, a-ur-yili ġmkan ġ-gratun, ašku ġwalli gigun imqqurn illa fllas a-ig zund ġwalli imẓẓin, ig-umzwaru zund ah̬ddam.
ma-imqqurn? izd ġwalli igawrn ar-ištta nġd ġwalli-as-d-israsn amššu? is-urd ġwalli igawrn ar-ištta? walaynni lliġ nkki ġ-gratun zund ah̬ddam.
«kunni a-didi-ibiddn kullu ussan-ad n-trfufnt-inu.
ġmklli-yyi-ifka baba rbbi tagldit, rad-awn-fkġ ula kunni
a-tšttam ar-tssam ġ-dar lmida-nu ġ-tgldit-inu, tgawrm f-lɛruš ar-ttḥkamm f-kullu ayt-rbbi.»
isawl yasuɛ s-bṭrus yini-as: «simɛan, simɛan, han šiṭan iḍalb a-kʷn-izuzzr ġmklli izuzzur-ufllaḥ ibḍu alim d-irdn.
walaynni ḍalbġ rbbi fllak a-ur-immt liman-nnk. ġakud lliġ twrrit, ssdus aytmak.»
yini-as bṭrus: «wa-sidi, ha-yyi ujadġ ad-didk-dduġ s-lḥbs mmtġ didk.»
imma yasuɛ irur-as: «wa-bṭrus, rad-ak-iniġ, ġ-iḍ-ad ur-ra-iġr-ufullus ard tinit kraṭṭ-twal ur-iyi-tssint.»
isqsa yasuɛ imḥḍarn-ns yini-asn: «ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-kʷn-uznġ bla aqʷrab ula awmmis ula turẓiyin is-tlkmm f-kra ġ-uwssan-an?» inin-as: «uhu, ur-nlkim f-yat.»
yini-asn: «imma ġilad, wanna dar aqʷrab ula awmmis illa fllas a-tn-dids-yawi. wanna ur-dar lkummit illa fllas a-izznz aslham-ns isġ-tt-id.
ašku rad-awn-iniġ, iqqan-d a-ijru maylli flla ityawnnan ġayd izrin ityara: ‹gan-t d-yan zġ-willi ffuġnin zġ-ššrɛ n-rbbi.› hati ra-yafu kullu ma-flla-ityaran.»
inin-as imḥḍarn-ns: «ẓr a-sidi, ha-snat lkmami.» imma ntta irur-asn: «yuwda.»
iffuġ yasuɛ zġ-tmdint iddu s-uwrir n-zzitun ġmklli-bdda-ittidu s-ġin. munn dids imḥḍarn-ns.
lliġ lkmn adġar-an yini-asn: «ẓẓallat tḍalbm rbbi a-kʷn-issanf i-kullu ma-ra-kʷn-ijllu.»
ifl-tn iftu yaggug-n fllasn ma-itggan kkuẓ id-mraw n-uẓmmuẓl, iḍr f-ifaddn-ns ar-itẓalla,
yini: «wa-baba ḍalbġ-ak iġ-trit, kkis flla lkas-ad n-urfufn. walaynni a-yili ma-trit, urd mad-riġ nkki.»
ġakudan igguz-d dars yal-lmalak zġ-ignna issdus-t.
iġuwḍ yasuɛ bahra, ar-itẓalla s-uggʷar aylliġ a-zgis-itaddum lɛrg f-wakal zund timqqa n-idammn.
lliġ ikmml taẓallit inkr iwrri s-dar imḥḍarn-ns, yaf-tn-in ṭṭasn. nhatafn s-taġuft lli-usin.
yini-asn: «mah̬ a-teṭṭasm? nkrat tḍalbm rbbi a-kʷn-issanf i-kullu ma-ra-kʷn-ijllu.»
sul a-isawal s-d-ruḥn mddn ggutnin, izwur-asn-d yahuda lli-igan yan zġ-sin d-mraw n-umḥḍar. iftu s-dar yasuɛ a-t-issudn,
imma yasuɛ inna-yas: «wa-yahuda, izd s-usudn a-s-trit a-tzznzt yus n-bnadm?»
lliġ ẓran imḥḍarn-ns ma-ra-ijru inin-as: «wa-sidi, is-trit a-tn-nṭṭay s-lkmami-ad?»
inkr yan zġ-imḥḍarn yut ah̬ddam n-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi ibbi-as amẓẓuġ afasi.
imma yasuɛ inna-yasn: «zgayat.» iggr-n i-umẓẓuġ n-uh̬ddam ijjujji-t.
isawl yasuɛ s-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-win imh̬zniyn d-imġarn n-tmazirt lli-d-uškanin a-t-amẓn, yini-asn: «ma-s-di-tffuġm s-lkmami d-iɛmad zund iġ-giġ amh̬h̬ar?
lliġ-n-bdda didun kraygatt ass ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ur-iyi-tumẓm ġ-uwssan-an, walaynni tasaɛt-nnun ayad a-gis-tḥkam lquwwa n-tillas.»
ġwin yasuɛ awin-t s-tgmmi n-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi, iḍfur-t bṭrus zġ-tuggugt.
ssrġan mddn lɛafit ġ-wammas n-tgmmi, gawrn ġ-tama-ns. iddu bṭrus iskiws ġ-gratsn.
tẓr-t yat-th̬ddamt ġ-tifawt l-lɛafit, tssmaqql gis tini i-mddn-an: «ula ġwad illa d-yasuɛ.»
irar-as bṭrus: «wa-tamġart, ur-t-ssinġ nkki.»
yan imikk s-t-iẓra yan yaḍni yini-as: «ula kiyi tgit yan zġ-gisn.» irar-as-daġ bṭrus: «way-argaz, urd nkki.»
tzri yat tasaɛt s-isawl yan yaḍni s-jjhd yini-asn: «s-ṣṣaḥt, ġwad illa dids ula ntta, ašku gu-jalil a-iga.»
irar-d-daġ bṭrus: «way-argaz, han ur-ssinġ mayd ttinit.» ġakudan sul a-isawal s-iġra-ufullus.
igrawl siditnnġ issmaqql ġ-bṭrus. iswangm-d bṭrus awal lli-s-as-inna siditnnġ: «ġ-iḍ-ad ur-ra-iġr-ufullus ard tinit kraṭṭ-twal ur-iyi-tssint.»
iffuġ bṭrus ar-yalla bahra.
nkrn imh̬zniyn lli-ḍufnin yasuɛ, ar-gis-ḍṣṣan ar-t-kkatn.
dln-as alln-ns s-yan-ušddad ar-as-ttinin: «wa-nnabi, ml-aġ manwa-k-yutn.»
ar-t-rggmn s-kigan d-iwaliwn ʷh̬šnnin.
lliġ-d-iġli-wass munn-d imġarn l-lmḥkama, gan inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ. awin yasuɛ s-lgddam-nsn
sqsan-t: «ini-aġ, izd kiyin a-igan lmasiḥ n-rbbi?» isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «iġ-awn-t-nniġ, ur-ra-yyi-tamnm.
iġ-kʷn-fllas-sqsaġ ur-ra-di-trarm awal.
walaynni yan imikk ra-n-iskiws yus n-bnadm f-ufasi n-rbbi itjhhdn.»
sqsan-t kullutn: «is-tnnit kiyi yus n-rbbi a-tgit?» irar-asn: «ġmklli-s-tnnam ad-giġ.»
nkrn ġakudan ar-ttinin: «ma-s-sul-nra tugga n-wiyyaḍ? nsfld kullu i-ġayd inna.»
nkrn imġarn l-lmḥkama kullutn, awin yasuɛ s-dar bilaṭus lḥakm n-rruman.
ar-srs-taštkkan ar-ttinin: «nufa-n argaz-ad ar-ijllu ayt-tmazirt-nnġ, ar-asn-ittini a-ur-akkan ḍabiyt i-qayṣr, ar-ittini is-iga lmasiḥ n-rbbi ig agllid.»
isqsa-t bilaṭus: «is-tgit agllid n-ayt-yudaya?» irar-as yasuɛ: «kiyi a-t-innan.»
isawl bilaṭus s-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-mddn-an kullutn yini-asn: «ur-ufiġ kra l-lɛib ġ-urgaz-ad.»
rarn-as ntni s-jjhd: «ar-itkka kullu tamazirt n-yudaya, zġ-jalil ar ġid, ar-issduy mddn s-ulmmud-ns.»
lliġ isfld bilaṭus i-mayad yini-asn: «izd gu-jalil a-iga-urgaz-ad?»
inin-as «zġ-ġin a-zġ-d-yuška.» yazn-t ilmma bilaṭus s-dar hirudus lli-iḥkamn tasga-yan, ašku illa ula ntta ġ-urušalim ġ-uwssan-an l-lɛid.
ifrḥ hirudus bahra lliġ iẓra yasuɛ, ašku kigan a-itql yiri a-t-iẓr. isfld fllas bahra, yiri a-iẓr kra l-lmɛjizt f-ufus-ns.
isqsa-t hirudus f-ma-iggutn, imma yasuɛ ur-as-inni yat.
biddn ġin inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, ar-bahra-taštkkan s-yasuɛ.
inkr ilmma hirudus ntta d-iɛskrin-ns ar-gis-tṭnaẓn ar-gis-ḍṣṣan. sslsn-as yan-uslham iġʷlan rarn-t-daġ s-dar bilaṭus.
ġassan a-d-imšaška hirudus d-bilaṭus wah̬h̬a-sttin-tkka taẓit i-ngratsn.
iġr bilaṭus i-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi s-dars, ntni d-imġarn d-mddn yaḍni kullutn.

yini-asn: «argaz-ad, tiwim-t-id s-dari, tinim fllas ‹ar-ijllu mddn kullutn.› ha-yyi ġilad sqsaġ-t bahra ġ-lgddam-nnun f-ma-iskr, walaynni ur-ufiġ ġ-urgaz-ad kra l-lɛib zġ-ġaylli s-a-srs-ttaštkkam.
ula hirudus irur-t-id s-dari ašku ur-n-gis-yufi yat. ur-iskir kra ma-f-a-itmtat.
ra-t-ssġuršġ ġilad rẓmġ-as.»
kraygatt asggʷas iqqan-d lḥakm ad-asn-irẓm i-yan-uḥbbas nna-ran ġ-lɛid n-usurf.
nkrn mddn ġakudan ar-kullu-ssġuyyun ar-ttinin: «ssitti-n fllannġ argaz-ad, trẓmt-aġ-d i-barabbas.»
illa barabbas ġ-lḥbs, ityamaẓ ašku issduy tamdint-an inġ kra n-mddn.
isawl-daġ bilaṭus s-mddn-an ašku ira a-irẓm i-yasuɛ,
imma ntni rurn-as ar-ssġuyyun: «agʷl-t f-uggjdi. agʷl-t f-uggjdi a-immt.»
izayd bilaṭus tis kraṭṭ-twal yini-asn: «mal-lɛib iskr? ur-gis-ufiġ kra l-lɛib f-t-id-iqqan a-immt. ra-t-ssġuršġ ukan, rẓmġ-as.»
imma ntni ar-bahra-ssġuyyun s-jjhd ar-tḍalabn bilaṭus a-issufġ yasuɛ a-immt f-uggjdi. ar isiggʷra nran-t s-iwaliwn-nsn.
inkr bilaṭus yut lḥukm f-yasuɛ ġmklli tḍalabn.
irẓm i-walli ran mddn, a-t-igan d-walli ityamaẓn ġ-lḥbs f-ssibt n-uduy d-tnaġa. issufġ-asn yasuɛ a-srs-skrn ġmklli ran.
nkrn iɛskrin awin yasuɛ. mnaggarn yan-urgaz gu-kurini ism-ns simɛan, bḥra-d-yuška zġ-brra. amẓn-t, srsn fllas aggjdi a-t-yasi ġ-tġurdin n-yasuɛ.
ḍfurn-t kigan d-mddn, ilint gisn kra n-tmġarin ar-allant ar-ssġuyyunt.
igrawl-d gisnt yasuɛ yini-asnt: «wa-ist-urušalim, ad-ur-flla-tallamt. allamt f-ih̬fawn-nnunt d-tarwa-nnunt.
ašku rad-d-aškin-uwssan ġ-rad-inin mddn ‹timbarkiyin ad-gant h̬tinna ur-tarunin. imbarkin ad-gan iḥlgan nna-ur-usinin. timbarkiyin ad-gant tibbatin nna-ur-ssngaynin.›
ġakudan a-rad-inin mddn i-idrarn ‹ḍrad-d fllannġ,› inin i-iwrar ‹ḥḍwat-aġ.›
iġ-a-skarn ġunškad d-ukššuḍ izgzaw, ma-ra-yili ġakud nna-ġ-iqqur?»
awin iɛskrin sin irgazn yaḍni gan imh̬h̬arn, a-tn-nġn d-yasuɛ.
lliġ lkmn adġar lli-mi-ttinin ‹tah̬ʷšašt n-ih̬f› qqnn yasuɛ ġ-uggjdi alln-t. qqnn imh̬h̬arn ġ-iggjda yaḍni, yan f-ufasiy-ns d-yan f-uẓlmaḍ-ns.
iẓẓall yasuɛ yini: «wa-baba rbbi, ṣamḥ-asn. ur-akkʷ-ssinn mayd skarn.» grn-d iɛskrin asġar f-tmlsa-ns a-tnt-bḍun.
biddn mddn ar-tmnadn kullu ma-ijran, imma imġarn n-tmazirt ar-gis-tṭnaẓn ar-ttinin: «hati ijjnjm wiyyaḍ, iniyat-as a-ijjnjm ula ih̬f-ns iġ-iga ntta lmasiḥ amẓlay n-rbbi.»
ruḥn-t-in iɛskrin ula ntni ar-gis-ḍṣṣan, mdin-as-n aman l-lh̬ll a-tn-isu,
ar-as-ttinin: «jjnjm ih̬f-nnk iġ-tgit agllid n-ayt-yudaya.»
tlla ġin yat talluḥt ġ-nnig ih̬f-ns, ityara gis «ġwad iga agllid n-ayt-yudaya.»
ar-t-irggm ula yan zġ-imh̬h̬arn lli-dids-tyaggalnin yini-as: «is-urd lmasiḥ n-rbbi a-tgit? jjnjm ih̬f-nnk tjjnjmt-aġ didk.»
issfssa-t-umh̬h̬ar yaḍni yini-as: «is-ur-tksuṭṭ rbbi? ittut fllak lḥukm-ad zund nttan,
d-nkkʷni nsthlla ġayad f-ssibt n-ma-nskr. imma nttan, ur-iskir kra yʷh̬šnn.»
izayd yini: «wa-yasuɛ, swangm-iyi-d ġakud nna-tkšmt s-tgldit-nnk.»
yini-as yasuɛ: «lḥqq a-rad-ak-iniġ, ra-didi-tilit ġassad ġ-talɛrṣt l-lmjd.»
lliġ tlkm tasaɛt tis snat d-mrawt ḍrnd-d tillas f-tmazirt-an kullutt, ur-sul-tsfaw tafukt ar tasaɛt tis kraṭṭ n-tdggʷat. yut-ušrrig lh̬amiya n-tḥanut tamẓlayt ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, tbḍu f-sin.
yall yasuɛ awal-ns yini: «wa-baba, ġ-gr ifassn-nnk a-ġ-fkiġ rruḥ-inu.» ġir inna awal-ad s-issufġ rruḥ-ns.
lqbṭan n-iɛskrin, lliġ iẓra mayd ijran itɛjjb ġ-lmjd n-rbbi yini: «s-ṣṣaḥt, argaz ifulkin ayad.»
kullu willi munnin ġin a-gis-ssmuqquln, lliġ ẓran mayad wrrin s-tgʷmma-nsn ṭiyyr-asn bahra, ar-kkatn ġ-idmarn-nsn.
biddn imddukkʷal n-yasuɛ ġ-tuggugt, ntni d-tmġarin lli-d-dids-munnin zġ-tmazirt n-jalil, ar-tmnadn kullu ma-ijran.

yili ġin yan-urgaz ism-ns yusf, iga gu-rama ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya. ig argaz ifulkin, ar-bahra-ittiri a-irḍu rbbi, ar-itrju tagldit n-rbbi a-di-tašk. ig ntta yan zġ-imġarn l-lmḥkama, walaynni ur-irḍi s-ġaylli nnan f-yasuɛ ula ġaylli srs skrn.
ikšm s-dar bilaṭus iḍalb zġ-gis ddat n-yasuɛ.
izzugz-d ddat zġ-uggjdi issmuttl-tt ġ-lkttan išwan, isrs-tt-in ġ-yan-umḍḍal igan ifri ityawġza ġ-ujarif, ur-jju-n-gis-ittrs yan.
ġassan ar-tujadn mddn i-lɛid, ig ass lli-iqaman i-wass n-usunfu.
nkrnt-tmġarin lli-d-munnin d-yasuɛ zġ-jalil ḍfurnt yusf, ẓrnt amḍḍal ula mamnk a-n-gis-tettrs ddat n-yasuɛ.
wrrind-d ilmma jjujadnt tujjutin d-isafarn. sunfunt ass n-ssbt ġmklli ittini ššrɛ n-rbbi.
zikk ṣbaḥ n-wass l-lḥdd ddunt-tmġarin s-umḍḍal, awint didsnt tujjutin lli-jjujadnt.
walaynni lliġ-n-akmurnt s-umḍḍal ẓrnt ifir iknuki-d zġ-imi n-ifri.
kšmnt srs, walaynni ur-n-gis-ufint ddat n-siditnnġ yasuɛ.
duhdunt bahra biddnt ġin, s-asnd-d-bann sin irgazn ar-ssmrqiqiynt-tmlsa-nsn.
iksaḍnt-tmġarin bahra knunt ar akal. sawln srsnt irgazn inin-asnt: «mah̬ a-tsiggilmt ġwalli iddrn ġ-gr-willi mmutnin? ur-sul-illi ġid. hati inkr-n zġ-lmut.
swangmamd-d awal lli-s-awn-inna lliġ sul illa ġ-jalil,
inna-yawn: ‹iqqan-iyi-d, nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm, a-n-tyawdḥayġ s-gr ifassn n-mddn ʷh̬šnnin, nġn-iyi f-uggjdi, nkrġ-d ilmma zġ-lmut ġ-wis kraḍ-uwssan.›»
ktind-d-tmġarin awal-an.
wrrind-d zġ-umḍḍal, inint kullu mayad i-irqqasn s-yan d-mraw d-wiyyaḍ kullutn.
tlla maryam ullt-magdala d-yuwanna d-maryam innas n-yaɛqub, ntnti d-tmġarin yaḍni, inint i-irqqasn f-mayd ijran.
imma ntni ġaln izd kra n-twargit ifssusn ayd-f-asn-nnant, ur-tnt-uminn.
imma bṭrus inkr ġakudan yazzl s-umḍḍal. iknu-n ar-n-srs-itaggʷa, ur-n-iẓri abla išddadn l-lkttan. iwrri-d s-tgmmi ar-bahra-iswingim ġ-mayd ijran.
ġassan-nnit ad-ftan sin zġ-gisn ġ-uġaras lli-itawin s-uduwwar n-ɛimwas, yaggug f-urušalim s-ma-itggan yan d-mraw kilimitr.
ar-sawaln i-ngratsn f-kullu mayd ijran.
sul a-sawaln ar-ssmqsan s-d-yuška yasuɛ imun didsn.
wah̬h̬a-t-ẓran ur-t-ukʷzn.
yini-asn: «mayd f-a-tsawalm i-ngratun ġ-uġaras?» biddn ntni, ssh̬uzzin.
irar-as yan gisn ism-ns klyubas yini-as: «izd ġir kiyi waḥduk ġ-gr willi ɛmmrnin urušalim a-ur-isfldn f-mayd gis ijran ussan-ad?»
yini-as: «ma-ijran?» inin-as: «ġaylli ijran i-yasuɛ gu-naṣira. iga yan-nnabi imqqurn s-iskkirn-ns ula s-iwaliwn-ns. ifrḥ srs rbbi ula mddn kullutn.
walaynni inmġurn-nnġ n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn l-lmḥkama, dḥin-t-in a-ityawḥkam s-lmut. hati nġan-t ġilad f-uggjdi.
imma nkkʷni nkka-ttin nrja-n gis bahra, ašku nġal izd nttan a-ra-ijjnjm ayt-rbbi. hati kraḍ-uwssan ayd-s-ijra ġayad.
walaynni kra n-istmatnnġ iwind-d kra l-lh̬bar, ar-gis-ntɛjjab bahra. ddant zikk ṣbaḥ s-umḍḍal-ns
walaynni ur-n-ufint ddat-ns. wrrind-d inint-aġ is-ẓrant kra l-lmalayka bann-asnd-d inin-asnt is-iwrri iddr.
ddun ilmma kra n-imddukkʷal-nnġ s-umḍḍal, afn-in ġmklli nnant-tmġarin, walaynni ur-ẓrin yasuɛ.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-asn: «wa-kunni, is-ur-tfhimm? is-qqurn ih̬fawn-nnun aylliġ ur-tuminm kullu mad-nnan lanbiya?
is-ur-d-iqqan lmasiḥ a-irfufn ġmkan ikšm s-lmjd-ns?»
isawl-asn ilmma f-iwaliwn n-musa ula win lanbiya kullutn, iml-asn ma-fllas-ityaran ġ-kullu arratn n-rbbi.
lliġ-n-akmurn s-uduwwar lli-ran ntni, iskr yasuɛ zund iġ-ira a-izayd f-uġaras-ns.
imma ntni ḍalbn-t bahra inin-as: «qama didnnġ ašku idda-wass, tinušši aya.» ikšm didsn s-tgmmi a-darsn-ins.
lliġ didsn iskiws ġ-imnsi yamẓ aġrum, iškr rbbi fllas, ibbi-t ifk-asn-t.
ġakudan ad-ssnn izd yasuɛ a-iga, s-asn-t-laḥ ur-sul-a-ti-tmnadn.
inin ntni i-ngratsn: «mnšk a-s-rġan-uwlawn-nnġ lliġ srnnġ isawl ġ-uġaras issfhm-aġ ma-illan ġ-warratn n-rbbi.»
nkrn ġakudan wrrin s-urušalim. afn-in irqqasn s-yan d-mraw munn d-aytmatn yaḍni
ar-kullu-ttinin: «s-lḥqq inkr-d siditnnġ zġ-lmut. iban-d i-simɛan.»
sawln ula ntni ġakudan inin-asn f-mad-asn-ijran ġ-uġaras ula mamnk ad-ssnn yasuɛ lliġ-asn-ibbi aġrum.
sul a-sawaln s-d-ibidd yasuɛ ġ-gratsn, yini-asn: «ad-awn-tili sslamt.»
ggʷdn iksaḍn, ġaln izd kra n-rruḥ ayd-asn-d-ibann.
yini-asn: «mah̬ aylliġ tġuwḍm, ikšm šškk ġ-uwlawn-nnun?
ẓrat ifassn-inu d-iḍarn-inu, tissanm izd nttan ad-giġ. ggrat-iyi-d tẓrm, ašku ur-iẓḍar kra n-rruḥ a-iṭṭaf tifiyi d-ih̬san ġmklli tmnadm ṭṭafġ-tn nkki.»
lliġ inna mayad imdi-asn-d ifassn-ns d-iḍarn-ns.
imma ntni ur-akkʷ-zɛmn a-t-amnn ašku iḍr-asn lɛjb s-lfrḥ iggutn. yini-asn yasuɛ: «is-darun kra n-umššu?»
fkn-as yan-ugzzum n-uslm inwan,
yasi-t išš-t ġ-lgddam-nsn.
isawl-daġ yasuɛ yini-asn: «ġmkad a-s-yuwfa maylli-awn-nniġ ġ-uwssan-an ġ-sul-didun-lliġ. nniġ-awn, iqqan-d a-ijru kullu ma-flla-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ n-musa ula arratn l-lanbiya ula imurign n-rbbi.»
izayd irẓm lɛaql-nsn ad-fhmn arratn n-rbbi,
yini-asn: «ġmkad a-ityaran, iqqan-d lmasiḥ n-rbbi a-irfufn inkr-d zġ-lmut ġ-wis kraḍ-uwssan,
tffuġ-tbrraḥt s-ism-ns zġ-urušalim ard tlkm kullu timizar n-ddunit, sfldn kullu mddn f-mamnk a-s-ẓḍarn ad-fln ddnub-nsn iṣamḥ-asn rbbi.
kunni tgam inagan f-tġawsiwin-ad.
imma ġilad rad-awn-d-aznġ maylli-f-inna baba rbbi rad-awn-t-ifk. qamat ġ-tmdint ard fllawn tgguz-tḥkimt itjhhdn zġ-tattuyt.»
izwar-asn ġakudan, ftun aylliġ lkmn tama n-bitɛanya, yall ifassn-ns ibark-tn.
sul a-tn-itbarak s-fllasn-ityalal s-ignwan.
ḍrn s-wakal sjdn-as. wrrin-d ilmma s-urušalim s-lfrḥ iggutn.
ar-tqaman ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi ar-talġn rbbi.
illa-wawal ġ-isizwar n-kullu ma-illan. rbbi a-dar-illa-wawal-an, ig-wawal-an rbbi.
illa dar rbbi ġ-isizwar,
srs a-s-ih̬lq kullu ma-illan. ur-illi kra ih̬lq-t rbbi abla ityawh̬laq srs.
awal-an a-ġ-tlla tudrt, tg-tudrt-an tifawt i-mddn.
ar-ttisfiw tifawt ġ-tillas, imma tillas ur-as-sugirnt yat.
ikka-ttin yan-urgaz, yuzn-t-id rbbi, iga ism-ns yuḥanna.
yuška-d a-ig inigi, ifk tugga f-tifawt baš ad-amnn kullu mddn f-imi-ns.
urd nttan a-igan tifawt, walaynni yuška-d a-yakka tugga f-tifawt.
ašku s-ddunit a-s-ra-d-yašk ġwalli igan tifawt l-lḥqq lli-ittisfiwn f-kullu mddn.
yuška-d s-ddunit, d-srs a-s-ttyawh̬laq ddunit, walaynni ur-t-ukʷzn ayt-ddunit.
yuška-d dar wins, walaynni ur-t-rin mddn-ns.
imma kullu winna-t-ranin amnn srs, ifka-yasn lḥqq ad-gn tarwa n-rbbi.
ntni, urd s-tlalit n-waḥlig a-s-luln nġd s-tayri n-ddat nġd s-tayri n-urgaz, walaynni rbbi a-tn-igan d-tarwa-ns.
awal-an iwrri iga bnadm, izdġ ġ-gratnnġ, nẓr lmjd-ns. iga lmjd n-walli igan yan dar babas, tigat gis lbaraka d-lḥqq.
yuḥanna ifka fllas tugga, yall awal-ns yini: «ġwad a-igan ġwalli-s-awn-nniġ ‹ra-d-yašk tigira-nu yan yugʷr-iyi ašku illa ur-ta-lliġ.›»
nkkʷni kullwaġ, llant-aġ lbarakat ggutnin zġ-tuggt l-lbaraka lli-gis-illan.
f-ufus n-musa a-f-d-ityawfka ššrɛ, imma f-ufus n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ a-f-di-tuška lbaraka d-lḥqq.
rbbi, ur-jju-t-iẓri yan, walaynni ġwalli igan yus yili-bdda d-babas, nttan ad-aġ-imlan mamnk a-iga.
ġmkad ad-gant tugga n-yuḥanna ġakud lliġ-d-srs-uznn ayt-yudaya kra n-inmġurn d-ih̬ddamn n-tgmmi n-rbbi zġ-urušalim. sqsan yuḥanna inin-as-d: «ma-tgit kiyi?»
isawl iml-asn lḥqq, ur-as-yunf s-yat. yini-asn: «urd nkki a-igan lmasiḥ n-rbbi.»
sqsan-t-daġ: «izd nnabi iliyya a-tgit?» yini-asn: «urd iliyya ad-giġ.» sqsan-t: «is-tgit nnabi imqqurn lli-ra-d-yašk?» yini-asn: «uhu.»
ḍalbn-as ilmma: «ini-aġ ma-tgit. ml-aġ ma-ra-nini i-willi-aġ-d-uznnin. ma-ttinit f-ih̬f-nnk?»
isawl yuḥanna yini-asn: «giġ ġwalli itbrraḥn ġ-lh̬la ar-ittini ‹ssnmat aġaras n-siditnnġ›,» ġmklli-s-inna nnabi išaɛya.
llan kra n-mddn zġ-lmdhb n-ifarisin ġ-gr-willi-d-uznn ayt-yudaya.
sqsan yuḥanna: «mah̬ aylliġ a-tssddamt mddn ġ-waman lliġ ur-tgit lmasiḥ nġd iliyya nġd nnabi lli-imqqurn?»
isawl-d yuḥanna yini-asn: «nkki ar-kʷn-ssddamġ ġ-waman walaynni illa yan ġ-gratun ur-ti-tukʷzm,
ig ġwalli ra-d-yašk tigira-nu. ur-sthllaġ nkki ad-rẓmġ ifalan n-turẓiyin-ns.»
ijra kullu mayad ġ-bitɛanya ġ-tsga yaḍni n-wasif n-urdun. ġin a-ġ-a-issddam yuḥanna mddn ġ-waman.
ndid azkka iẓr-n yuḥanna yasuɛ ifta-d s-dars, yini fllas: «han alqqaġ n-rbbi lli-ra-issitti ddnub n-ddunit.
ġwad a-igan ġwalli-f-awn-nniġ ‹rad-yašk tigira-nu yan yugʷr-iyi ašku illa ur-ta-lliġ.›
ula nkki kkiġ-ttin ur-t-ukʷzġ, walaynni f-ssibt-ns a-f-a-ssddamġ mddn ġ-waman baš a-ityawssan dar ayt-rbbi.»
izayd yuḥanna ifk tugga-ns yini: «ẓriġ rruḥ n-rbbi igguz-d zġ-ignwan zund yan-utbir ittrs-d fllas.
ar ġakudan ur-t-ukʷzġ, walaynni rbbi lli-yyi-d-yuznn ad-ssddamġ mddn ġ-waman, nttan ad-iyi-innan ‹ra-tẓrt rruḥ igguz-d ittrs-d f-yan-urgaz. nttan a-ra-issddam mddn s-rruḥ lqudus.›
ha-yyi ẓriġ-t ġilad, fkġ-awn tugga-nu, ġwad a-igan yus n-rbbi.»
ndid azkka illa ġin yuḥanna ibidd d-sin zġ-imḥḍarn-ns.
iẓr-n yasuɛ ifta-d. isawl yuḥanna yini: «han alqqaġ n-rbbi.»
lliġ sfldn sin imḥḍarn-lli i-ma-inna, ddun ḍfurn yasuɛ.
igrawl-d yasuɛ iẓr-tn ḍfarn-t yini-asn-d: «ma-tsiggilm?» inin-as: «maniġ tzdġt, a-rabbi?» (awal-ad, tga lmɛna-ns ‹ay-amslmd›.)
yini-asn-d: «aškad-d a-tẓrm.» munn dids ẓrn illiġ izdġ, gawrn dids ġassan ašku tlkm-d tasaɛt tis kkuẓṭ n-tdggʷat.
andraws gʷmas n-simɛan bṭrus, nttan a-igan yan ġ-sin imḥḍarn lli-sfldnin i-wawal n-yuḥanna ḍfurn yasuɛ.
iddu ġakudan yaf-n gʷmas simɛan yini-as: «ha-yaġ nmnaggar ġwalli igan lmasiḥ n-rbbi.» (awal-ad ‹lmasiḥ›, tga lmɛna-ns ‹amẓlay›.)
yawi-t-id ilmma s-dar yasuɛ. issmaqql gis yasuɛ, yini-as: «kiyi tgit simɛan yus n-yuna, walaynni rad-ak-nttini kafa.» ism-ad, tga lmɛna-ns ‹aẓru› zund lmɛna n-bṭrus.
ndid azkka iskr yasuɛ f-a-iddu s-tmazirt n-jalil. imnaggar filibbus yini-as: «ašk-id, mun didi.»
iga filibbus gu-bitṣayda lli-igan tamdint n-andraws d-bṭrus.
iddu filibbus yaf-n natanayl yini-as: «ha-yaġ nmnaggar ġwalli-f-yura musa ġ-ššrɛ ula lanbiya ġ-warratn-nsn. iga yasuɛ gu-naṣira yus n-yusf.»
irar-as-d natanayl: «is-iẓḍar a-d-yašk kra ifulkin zġ-naṣira?» yini-as filibbus: «ašk-id a-tẓrt.»
yasuɛ iẓra-n natanayl ifta-d s-dars, yini fllas: «ġwad a-igan s-ṣṣaḥt zġ-ayt-rbbi, iṣfu-uwl-ns.»
yini-as-d natanayl: «ma-s-iyi-tssnt?» irar-as yasuɛ: «lliġ ur-ta-yak-iġri filibbus, ẓriġ-k-in ġ-ddu tazart.»
isawl-d natanayl yini-as: «way-amslmd, kiyi a-igan yus n-rbbi, tgt agllid n-ayt-rbbi.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «is-sri-tumnt lliġ-ak-nniġ ‹ẓriġ-k-in ġ-ddu tazart›? ra-sul-tẓrt uggʷar n-mayad.»
izayd yasuɛ yini-as: «lḥqq ayad, lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ. ra-tẓrm ignwan rẓmn, tẓrm lmalayka n-rbbi ar-aqlayn ar-di-tgguzn f-yus n-bnadm.»
zrin sin-uwssan s-tlla yat-tmġra ġ-tmdint n-qana ġ-tmazirt n-jalil, tili ġin innas n-yasuɛ.
ityawɛraḍ ula yasuɛ d-imḥḍarn-ns s-tmġra.
lliġ-asn-tmman-waman n-waḍil iktin, tini-as innas i-yasuɛ: «ur-sul darsn aman n-waḍil.»
yini-as yasuɛ: «mad-dari-trit, a-tamġart? han ur-ta-di-tlkim tasaɛt-inu.»
imma innas tzuyd tini i-ih̬ddamn: «skrat aynna-s-awn-inna.»
llant ġin sḍiṣṭ-th̬abatin mqqurnin n-uẓru, ar-gisnti-tggan aman lli-s-a-tġusn ayt-yudaya s-isird-nsn. kraygatt yat ra-ttasi ma-itggan miyya n-litru.
isawl yasuɛ s-ih̬ddamn yini-asn: «ɛmmrat tih̬abatin s-waman.» ɛmmrn-tnt ar imi.
izayd yini-asn: «asiyat ġilad, tawim i-bu-tmġra.» ddun awin-as aman.
lliġ imḍi bu-tmġra aman lli-iwrrin gn aman n-waḍil, ur-issin mani-d-kkan. ġir ih̬ddamn lli-tn-d-uggʷmnin a-issnn. iġr i-usli
yini-as: «ar-bdda-di-tawin mddn aman n-waḍil iḥlan ġ-isizwar n-tmġra, ard sun inbgiwn yan kra fkn-asn-d wiyyaḍ yaḍni. imma kiyi tssuggʷrit-n aman n-waḍil iḥlan ar ġilad.»
h̬tad a-igan lmɛjizt tamzwarut, iskr-tt yasuɛ ġ-qana n-jalil, issbayyn-d lmjd-ns, amnn srs imḥḍarn-ns.
iftu yasuɛ ġakudan s-tmdint n-kafrnaḥum, ntta d-innas d-aytmas d-imḥḍarn-ns. gawrn ġin kra n-uwssan.
yakmur-d lɛid n-usurf ġ-dar ayt-yudaya, iftu yasuɛ s-tmdint n-urušalim.
ikšm s-tgmmi n-rbbi yaf-n mddn ar-gis-zznzan izgarn d-uwlli d-itbirn, iẓr wiyyaḍ skiwsn ġ-dar lmyadi-nsn ar-tṣrrafn iqaridn.
yasi izakarn iftl-tn, iṭṭay srsn mddn-an kullutn zġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ntni d-uwlli d-izgarn, igllb lmyadi n-iṣrrarfin ffin iqaridn-nsn f-wakal.
yini i-willi zznzanin itbirn: «ssufġat ġayad zġ-ġid. a-ur-trarm tigmmi n-baba a-tg ssuq.»
ktin-d imḥḍarn-ns ma-ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi, «tayri f-tgmmi-nnk a-ijddrn ul-inu.»
nkrn imġarn n-ayt-yudaya inin-as: «ml-aġ kra l-lmɛjizt ad-aġ-tg tamatart n-is-dark lḥqq a-tskart ġayad.»
irar-asn yasuɛ yini: «h̬lwat tigmmi-ad n-rbbi, bnuġ-tt ġ-kraḍ-uwssan.»
inin-as-d: «kkuẓ id-mraw d-sḍiṣ (46) n-usggʷas ayd bnnun tigmmi-ad. mamnk a-trit kiyi a-stti-tbnut ġ-kraḍ-uwssan?»
imma yasuɛ, hati isawl f-ddat-ns a-igan tigmmi n-rbbi.
lliġ-d-inkr zġ-lmut ktin-d imḥḍarn-ns maylli-s-asn-inna, amnn arra n-rbbi d-wawal-ad s-inna yasuɛ.
lliġ illa yasuɛ ġ-urušalim ġ-uwssan l-lɛid n-usurf, amnn srs mddn ggutnin lliġ ẓran lmɛjizat lli-iskr.
imma yasuɛ ur-gisn-yumin ntni, ašku issn kullu mddn mamnk ad-gan.
ur-iḥtajja mad-as-yakkan tugga f-bnadm, ašku issn ma-illan ġ-bnadm.
illa yan-urgaz zġ-lmdhb n-ifarisin, iga ism-ns niqudimus, ig yan zġ-imġarn n-ayt-yudaya.
yuška-d s-dar yasuɛ ġ-iyḍ yini-as-d: «way-amslmd, nssn izd rbbi a-k-id-yuznn a-tsslmadt, ašku ur-iẓḍar yan a-iskar lmɛjizat lli-tskart iġ-ur-dids-illi rbbi.»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «lḥqq ayad, lḥqq a-rad-ak-iniġ. yan ur-iluln zġ-ljdid ur-ra-yiẓḍar a-iẓr tagldit n-rbbi.»
yini-as-d niqudimus: «mamnk a-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-d-ilal d-nttan imqqur? is-ra-iwrri s-waḥlig n-innas a-d-ilal tis snat-twal?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «lḥqq ayd-ak-ttiniġ, yan ur-iluln s-waman d-rruḥ ur-iẓḍar a-ikšm s-tgldit n-rbbi.
aynna iluln zġ-ddat, win ddat a-iga. aynna iluln zġ-rruḥ, win rruḥ a-iga.
«ad-ur-tɛjjbt ġ-wawal-ad-ak-nniġ ‹iqqan-kʷn-d a-tlalm zġ-ljdid.›
ar-iṣwaḍ-waḍu s-inna ira, ar-tsflidt i-tijjijt-ns, walaynni ur-tssint mani-d-ikka ula manis ifta. ġmkad a-iga rruḥ lqudus dar kullu wanna zġ-gis iluln.»
yini-as-d niqudimus: «mamnk a-iẓḍar a-yili mayad?»
yini-as yasuɛ: «kiyi tgit amslmd n-ayt-rbbi, sul ur-tssint tiġawsiwin-ad?
lḥqq ayd-ak-ttiniġ, ar-nsawal f-ma-nssn ar-nakka tugga f-ma-nẓra, imma kunni ur-trim a-tamnm tugga-nnġ.
ar-awn-ttiniġ f-tġawsiwin n-ddunit-ad, ur-iyi-tuminm. mamnk a-ra-yyi-tamnm iġ-awn-nniġ f-tġawsiwin n-ignna?
«ur-iġli yan s-ignna abla yus n-bnadm lli-d-igguzn zġ-ignna.
ġmklli yull musa algmmaḍ n-wanas f-iggi n-uggjdi ġ-lh̬la, ġmkan a-yyi-d-iqqan ad-tyalalġ ula nkki lli-igan yus n-bnadm,
baš a-tili tudrt idumn i-kullu wanna sri yumnn.»
ašku ġunškad a-s-iḥnna rbbi f-ddunit aylliġ-d-ifka ġwalli igan yus, a-d-ikkis i-lhalak kullu wanna srs yumnn, išškšm-tn s-tudrt idumn.
ašku rbbi ur-d-yuzn yus s-ddunit baš a-iḥkam f-ddunit, walaynni yuzn-t-id baš a-tnjm ddunit f-ufus-ns.
wanna sri yumnn, ur-ra-fllas-ittut lḥukm. imma wanna ur-irin a-yamn, lḥukm a-fllas-illan ašku ur-yumin s-wad igan yus n-rbbi.
ġayad a-f-ittut lḥukm, ašku tkšm-d tifawt s-ddunit irin mddn tillas uggʷar n-tifawt, myarn ad-skarn lh̬ʷšant.
kullu wanna iskarn ma-yʷh̬šnn, ar-itkrhu tifawt. ur-a-ittiri a-d-iffuġ s-tifawt a-ur-d-bayynn iskkirn-ns.
imma wanna iskarn s-lḥqq, ar-d-itffuġ s-tifawt baš ad-d-bayynn iskkirn-ns izd s-wawal n-rbbi a-s-a-iskar.
tiġurdin n-mayan iddu yasuɛ d-imḥḍarn-ns s-tmazirt n-yudaya, iqama ġin ar-issddam mddn ġ-waman.
ula yuḥanna ġ-uwssan-an ar-issddam mddn, yili ġ-tsga n-ɛinnun ašku ġin a-ġ-ggutn-waman, ur-bahra-yaggug zġ-salim. ar-di-ttaškin mddn s-dar yuḥanna, ddmn ġ-waman f-ufus-ns.
ġakudan ur-ta-ityamaẓ yuḥanna ġ-lḥbs.
yan-wass ar-sawaln imḥḍarn n-yuḥanna d-yan-urgaz iga gu-yudaya, ar-tmjaḥadn f-usġus n-ayt-yudaya.
aškin-d s-yuḥanna inin-as: «way-amslmd, ġwalli-k-imnaggarn ġ-tsga yaḍni n-urdun tfkt fllas tugga-nnk, hati ar-issddam ula ntta, ar-dars-ttidun mddn kullutn.»
isawl yuḥanna yini-asn: «ur-iẓḍar yan a-iṭṭaf kra iġ-ur-as-t-ifki rbbi.
kunni tsfldm-iyi lliġ nniġ ‹urd nkkin a-igan lmasiḥ walaynni yuzn-iyi-d rbbi ad-zwurġ i-lmasiḥ.›
taslit tin-usli a-tga, imma amddakkʷl n-usli ibidd ġ-tama n-usli ar-isflid i-wawal-ns ifrḥ srs. yuwfa gigi lfrḥ-ad ġila.
iqqan-d a-yaqlay ntta, ar-tgguzġ nkki.»
ġwalli-d-yuškan zġ-uflla, nttan a-yugʷrn kullu ma-illan. wanna igan zġ-ddunit, gu-ddunit a-iga, ar-isawal ġir f-tġawsiwin n-ddunit. imma ġwalli igan zġ-ignna, yugʷr kullu ma-illan.
ar-yakka tugga f-ma-iẓra ula ma-mi-isfld, walaynni ur-illi ma-yumnn tugga-ns.
imma wanna yumnn tugga-ns, hati imla izd rbbi a-dar lḥqq.
ġwalli-d-yuzn rbbi, ar-bdda-isawal s-iwaliwn n-rbbi, ašku iɛmmr-t kullu s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ-ns.
rbbi, iɛzza dars yus, ig kullu ma-illan ġ-ddu-ufus-ns.
wanna yumnn s-yus n-rbbi, ra-iddr tudrt idumn. imma wanna ur-isflidn s-yus ur-ra-iṭṭaf tudrt walaynni ra-fllas-iqama lġaḍab n-rbbi.
sfldn ifarisin is-a-iskar yasuɛ imḥḍarn uggʷar n-yuḥanna, ar-tn-issddam ġ-waman.
urd f-ufus n-yasuɛ a-f-a-tddamn walaynni f-ufus n-imḥḍarn-ns,
walaynni lliġ isfld yasuɛ f-mayd ttinin iffuġ tamazirt n-yudaya yamẓ aġaras n-jalil.
iqqan-t-id a-izri zġ-tmazirt n-samira.
ilkm-d yat-tmdint ġ-samira ar-as-ttinin suh̬ar. tlla ġ-tsga n-igr lli-ifka yaɛqub i-yus yusf.
illa-ġin-wanu n-yaɛqub. igawr yasuɛ ġ-tama n-wanu ašku irmi ġ-uġaras, ig lḥal ṭuẓẓunt n-wass.
tašk-id yat-tmġart ullt-samira a-n-taggʷm. isawl srs yasuɛ yini-as: «fk-iyi ad-suġ.»
ur-dids-llin imḥḍarn-ns ġ-tasaɛt-an, ašku ddan s-tmdint ad-d-sġn mad-šttan.
tini-as-d-tmġart: «mah̬ a-yyi-tḍalbt a-tsut? kiyi tgit gu-yudaya, nkki giġ ullt-samira.» ašku ayt-yudaya ur-a-ssan zġ-irukutn n-ayt-samira.
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «mrad is-tssnt tawafka n-rbbi ula ma-iga ġwad-am-innan ‹fk-iyi ad-suġ,› ikun tḍalbt-iyi fkġ-am aman n-tudrt.»
trar-as-d-tmġart: «wa-sidi, han anu idra, ur-dark ddlu. maniġ ra-taft aman-lli n-tudrt?
is-tugʷrt babatnnġ yaɛqub lli-aġ-ifkan anu-ad, isu zġ-gis ntta d-tarwa-ns d-lksibt-ns?»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «kullu wanna iswan zġ-waman-ad rad-daġ-irufu,
imma wanna iswan zġ-waman lli-rad-as-fkġ nkki, ur-sar-irufi. ašku aman lli-rad-as-fkġ ra-zgis-ngin zund yat talɛint n-tudrt idumn.»
tini-as-d-tmġart ġakudan: «wa-sidi, fk-iyi aman-ad, a-yyi-ur-sul-yaġ irifi ula-da-d-sul-ttaškiġ a-n-aggʷmġ.»
yini-as yasuɛ: «zayd ġr-d i-urgaz-nnm twrrid-d.» imma nttat trur-as-d:
«ur-dari argaz.» yini-as yasuɛ: «tʷġẓant lliġ tnnit ur-darm argaz,
ašku tkkit-sttin ttahalt smmus irgazn. imma ġwalli-da-tllit ġ-uwssan-ad ur-km-itahil. lḥqq ayd-s-tnnit.»
tini-as-d-tmġart: «wa-sidi, ssnġ ġilad izd kra n-nnabi a-tgit.
ha-imzwura-nnġ nkkʷni ar-tɛbadn rbbi ġ-iggi n-udrar-ad, imma kunni ar-ttinim ‹urušalim a-ġ-d-iqqan mddn ad-tɛbadn.›»
isawl yasuɛ yini-as: «amn-iyi a-tamġart. rad-d-aškin-uwssan ġ-ra-ttɛbadm rbbi babatnnġ urd ġir ġ-udrar-ad nġd ġ-urušalim.
kunni ar-ttɛbadm ġwalli ur-tssinm. nkkʷni nssn ma-ntɛbad, ašku dar ayt-yudaya a-d-ikka-ujnjm n-rbbi.
walaynni rad-d-aškin kra n-uwssan, hatni-nnit lkmn-d, lli-ġ-rad-ilin kra n-mddn ar-tɛbadn rbbi babatnnġ ġmklli ira, s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus ula lḥqq. zund ġwid a-ira babatnnġ a-ti-tɛbadn.
rbbi iga rruḥ. winna ranin a-ti-tɛbadn iqqan-tn-d a-ti-tɛbadn s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ ula lḥqq.»
tini-as-d-tmġart: «ssnġ is-ra-d-yašk lmasiḥ (a-t-igan d-umẓlay n-rbbi). ġakud nna-d-yuška rad-aġ-d-iml kullu tiġawsiwin-ad.»
yini-as yasuɛ: «nkki-ad didm isawaln a-t-igan.»
ġakudan ad-d-wrrin imḥḍarn n-yasuɛ. tɛjjbn lliġ-t-in-ufan ar-isawal d-yat-tmġart, walaynni ur-as-nnin «ma-dars-trit?» ula «mah̬ aylliġ a-dids-tsawalt?»
tnkr-tmġart tfl agdur-ns tftu s-tmdint, ar-ttini i-mddn n-ġin:
«aškad-d a-tẓrm yan-urgaz isawl-iyi f-kullu mad-skrġ. ḥaqqan izd ġwad a-igan lmasiḥ n-rbbi.»
ffuġn-d mddn zġ-tmdint ftun-d s-dar yasuɛ.
ur-ta-d-ruḥn mddn-an, sawln-d imḥḍarn s-yasuɛ inin-as: «hak a-tššt ay-amslmd.»
imma ntta inna-yasn: «illa dari ma-yyi-iššbaɛn, ur-ti-tssinm kunni.»
sqsan imḥḍarn i-ngratsn: «is-illa mad-as-d-yiwin ma-ištta?»
imma yasuɛ inna-yasn: «ha-yyi ar-tšbaɛġ iġ-a-skarġ ma-ira ġwalli-yyi-d-yuznn, ssafuġ tawuri-ns.
is-ur-a-ttinim ‹kkuẓ-iyrn a-sul-iqaman i-tmgra›? walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, allat alln-nnun a-tẓrm igran mlluln, lkmn f-tmgra.
ġilad ġwalli imgrn ar-itamẓ tiġrad-ns, ar-issmunu ṣṣabt n-tudrt idumn, baš a-ifrḥ ġwalli ikrzn ula ġwalli imgrn i-ngratsn.
yʷġẓan-wawal lli-s-a-ttinin mddn ‹ikrz-t yan, imgr-t wayyaḍ.›
ha-yyi uznġ-kʷn a-tmggrm ġaylli-f-ur-tutm tammara. wiyyaḍ utn tammara, imma kunni ar-di-ttawim ġaylli-f-tt-utn.»
iggut ma-yumnn s-yasuɛ ġ-tmdint-an n-samira lliġ sfldn i-tugga lli-fllas-tfka-tmġart-lli, tini-asn «isawl-iyi f-kullu mad-skrġ.»
lliġ-t-id-ruḥn ḍalbn-t ad-darsn-igawr. iqama ġin dar ayt-samira sin-uwssan.
ar-ttigatn s-uggʷar ġwilli srs umnnin lliġ-as-sfldn ar-isawal.
inin i-tmġart-an: «urd ġir f-ssibt n-wawal-nnm a-f-numn ġilad walaynni nsfld-as ula nkkʷni, nissan izd s-ṣṣaḥt ġwad a-igan anjjam n-ddunit.»
lliġ zrin sin-uwssan iftu yasuɛ, yamẓ aġaras s-tmazirt n-jalil.
ntta s-ih̬f-ns a-ifkan tugga-yad inna: «ur-illi kra n-nnabi, uqqrn-t ayt-tmazirt-ns.»
lliġ ilkm jalil frḥn srs ayt-jalil, ašku ddan ula ntni s-urušalim a-n-zzrin lɛid, ẓrn kullu maylli iskr ġin ġ-uwssan-an.
iwrri yasuɛ s-tmdint n-qana ġ-jalil ġ-illiġ irur aman ad-gn aman n-waḍil iktin. illa ġin yan-unmġur n-tmazirt, yuḍn-as yus ġ-tmdint n-kafrnaḥum.
lliġ isfld is-d-yuška yasuɛ zġ-yudaya s-jalil, iddu s-dars iḍalb-t a-d-yašk a-ijjujji yus ašku ar-itmtat.
isawl yasuɛ ġakudan yini: «iġ-ur-tẓrim lmɛjizat d-lquwwat ur-akkʷ-a-ttirim a-tamnm.»
yini-as-d-unmġur: «ašk-id a-sidi ur-ta-immut iwi.»
irar-as yasuɛ: «zayd, ra-iddr yuk.» iftu-urgaz yamn mad-as-inna yasuɛ.
nttan sul ifta ġ-uġaras mnaggarn-t-id ih̬ddamn-ns inin-as: «ha-yuk iddr.»
isqsa-tn: «man tasaɛt a-ijji?» inin-as: «titti zġ-gis tawla iḍgam ġ-tasaɛt izwarn ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-wass.»
issn izd tasaɛt-an a-ġ-as-inna yasuɛ «ra-iddr yuk,» yamn srs ntta ula kullu ayt-tgmmi-ns.
h̬tad a-igan tis snat lmɛjizat iskr-tt yasuɛ lliġ-d-yuška zġ-yudaya s-jalil.
tiġurdin n-mayan yili yal-lɛid dar ayt-yudaya, iddu yasuɛ s-tmdint n-urušalim.
illa yan-ifrḍ ġ-urušalim ġ-tama n-imi n-uwlli, ar-as-ttinin ‹ifrḍ n-bitzata› s-wawal n-ayt-yudaya. sutln-as smmus ilḥnin.
ar-gisn-ggann imuḍan ggutnin, ibukaḍn d-ibiḍarn d-ikušamn.
illa ġin yan-urgaz yuḍn kraḍ id-mraw d-tam (38) n-usggʷas.
lliġ-t-iẓra yasuɛ yissan izd kigan d-isggʷasn a-ġin-ign, yini-as: «is-trit a-tjjit?»
isawl-d-umaḍun yini-as: «wa-sidi, ur-dari ma-yyi-išškšamn s-ifrḍ akud nna-gis-mmussan-waman. ġakud nna-n-akmurġ s-iyi-izwar kra n-yan yaḍni igguz s-waman.»
izayd yasuɛ yini-as: «nkr, asi imjdin-nnk tddut.»
ijji-urgaz-lli ġakudan, yasi imjdin-ns ar-ifttu. d-ġassan iga ass n-usunfu.
sawln imġarn n-ayt-yudaya s-urgaz lli-ijjin inin-as: «ass n-usunfu ayad. iḥrm a-tasit imjdin.»
irar-asn: «ġwalli-yyi-ijjujjin inna-yyi ‹asi imjdin-nnk tddut.›»
sqsan-t: «ma-iga-urgaz lli-ak-innan ‹asi imjdin-nnk tddut›?»
imma ntta ur-issin ma-iga, ašku yasuɛ imatti-n zġ-gr mddn ggutnin lli-llanin ġin.
ġir imikk s-n-dids-imnaggar yasuɛ ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi yini-as: «ha-kiyi tjjit. a-ur-sul-tskart ddnub a-ur-imil yili-ak kra yugʷrn ġayan.»
iddu-urgaz lli-ijjin s-dar imġarn n-ayt-yudaya yini-asn: «yasuɛ a-yyi-ijjujjin.»
ġakudan ad-usin tanuwwašt f-yasuɛ, ašku iskr mayan ġ-wass n-usunfu.
imma yasuɛ irur-asn inna: «ha-rbbi baba ih̬dm-bdda, iqqan-iyi-d ad-th̬damġ ula nkki.»
lliġ sfldn i-wawal-ad irin s-uggʷar a-t-nġn, urd ġir f-ssibt n-is-iffuġ zġ-lɛada n-wass n-usunfu walaynni f-ssibt n-ma-iga rbbi d-babas, issngadda ih̬f-ns d-rbbi.

izayd yasuɛ ġakudan yini-asn: «lḥqq ayad, lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ. nkki lli-igan yus n-rbbi ur-ẓḍarġ ad-skrġ yat zġ-ih̬f-inu abla maylli-s-ẓriġ baba ar-t-iskar. ašku aynna iskar ntta, ad-skarġ ula nkki.
ašku rbbi baba, ɛzzaġ dars, ar-iyi-imala kullu ma-iskar. rad-iyi-sul-imala kra n-iskkirn ugʷrn ġwid, rad-bahra-gisn-ttɛjjabm kunni.
ġmklli-d-issnkar baba ġwilli mmutnin ar-tn-issddr, ġmkan a-s-rad-ssddrġ wanna riġ ula nkki.
ur-a-itḥkam baba f-yan walaynni ifka-yyi ad-tḥkamġ f-kullu mddn,
baš a-yyi-kullu-tuqqarn ġmklli tuqqarn baba. yan ur-iyi-yuqqrn, ur-yuqqr baba lli-yyi-d-yuznn.
«lḥqq ayad, lḥqq a-rad-awn-iniġ. wanna isfldn s-wawal-inu yamn ġwalli-yyi-d-yuznn, ra-iddr tudrt idumn. ur-ra-fllas-ittut lḥukm, ašku izri zġ-lmut s-tudrt.
lḥqq ayd-awn-ttiniġ, rad-d-aškin kra n-uwssan, hatni-nnit lkmn-d, lli-ġ-rad-sfldn ġwilli mmutnin i-wawal n-yus n-rbbi. d-kullu wanna isfldn i-wawal-an ra-iddr.
