ar-gisn-itmnad-ukušam, iġal is-rad-as-fkn kra.
yini-as bṭrus: «ur-dari nnuqrt ula urġ, walaynni mayd dari illan, rad-ak-t-fkġ. s-ism n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ gu-naṣira, nkr tftut.»
yamẓ-as bṭrus ġ-ufus afasi issnkr-t-id. ġakudan wrrin dusn iḍarn-ns d-iġšfan-ns,
yakʷi ibidd f-iḍarn-ns iftu. ikšm didsn s-tgmmi n-rbbi ar-ifttu ar-itakʷi ar-italġ rbbi.
ẓrn-t mddn lli-llanin ġin ar-ifttu ar-italġ rbbi.
akʷzn-t issann is-iga anḍalab lli-itgawarn ġ-dar imi ifulkin. iḍr-asn lɛjb kullutn, gammin ad-fhmn mad-as-ijran.
ẓrn-t sul yumẓ ġ-bṭrus d-yuḥanna, azzln kullu s-illiġ llan ġ-ulḥni lli-mi-ttinin ‹alḥni n-suliman› ar-bahra-tɛjjabn.

lliġ-tn-iẓra bṭrus yini-asn: «wa-irgazn ayt-rbbi, mah̬ aylliġ a-ttɛjjabm ġ-mayad? mah̬ a-ginnġ-tssmuqqulm? is-tġalm izd s-tḥkimt-nnġ ula s-ufulki-nnġ a-s-njjujji argaz-ad aylliġ a-ifttu f-iḍarn-ns?
rad-awn-iniġ, rbbi n-ibrahim d-isḥaq d-yaɛqub, rbbi n-imzwura-nnġ issbayyn-d lmjd n-uh̬ddam-ns yasuɛ ġassad. tdḥim-t-in kunni i-lmut, trgmm-t ġ-lgddam n-bilaṭus wah̬h̬a ira nttan ad-as-irẓm.
tluḥm-n s-umẓlay n-rbbi lli-iɛmmrn s-ufulki-ns, tḍalbm ad-awn-d-irẓm i-yan inqqan. tnġam ġwalli yakkan tudrt,
imma rbbi issnkr-t-id zġ-lmut. nga nkkʷni inagan f-mayan, nẓra-t.
hati s-ism n-yasuɛ a-s-iwrri ijji ġwad tẓram tissanm-t. ašku f-ssibt n-ma-numn s-yasuɛ a-f-idus ġ-lgddam-nnun kullukn.
«imma ġilad ay-aytma, ssnġ ġaylli tskrm kunni d-inmġurn-nnun, tskrm-t ašku ur-tssinm ma-iga.
walaynni ġmkan a-s-issuwfa rbbi maylli inna f-imi l-lanbiya kullutn, imla-yasn mamnk a-d-iqqan lmasiḥ a-irfufn.
mayad a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, flat kullu ma-tskarm yʷh̬šn, twrrim-d s-rbbi a-fllawn-issitti ddnub-nnun,
ifk-awn ussan l-lbaraka zġ-dars, yazn-awn-d-daġ yasuɛ lli-iẓli a-ig lmasiḥ-nnun.
ašku iqqan-t-id a-iqama ġ-ignna ard-d-iruḥ-uzmz lli-ġ-ra-iskr rbbi kraygatt kra zġ-ljdid, ġmklli inna f-imi n-imẓlayn-ns lanbiya n-zman.
ašku inna musa: ‹rbbi siditun rad-awn-d-ifk yan zġ-aytmatun a-ig nnabi zund nkki. sflidat s-kullu mad-awn-ittini.
wanna ur-isfldn s-wawal n-nnabi-an, ssittiyat-t-in zġ-ayt-rbbi a-itthlk.›
«hati ussan-ad a-f-sawln kullu lanbiya lli-dar awal n-rbbi zġ-ṣamwil ula kullu willi-as-ggʷranin.
ašku kunni a-ra-iṭṭaf maylli-f-nnan lanbiya, twrtm lɛhd lli-iskr rbbi d-imzwura-nnġ. ġmklli inna i-ibrahim: ‹s-tarwa-nnk a-s-rad-barkġ kullu mddn n-ddunit.›
ġmkad a-s-iẓli rbbi ah̬ddam-ns yasuɛ, yazn-t-id s-darun baš a-tzwurm kunni ibark-kʷn, isswrri-d kud yan gigun zġ-iġarasn ʷh̬šnnin lli-ġ-a-ttidum.»
sul a-isawal bṭrus d-yuḥanna i-mddn-an, s-d-uškan inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi, imun-d didsn lqbṭan n-imh̬zniyn n-tgmmi n-rbbi ula kra n-iṣadduqin.
ṭiyyr-asn bahra f-irqqasn, ašku ar-tbrraḥn i-mddn ar-asn-ttinin is-ẓḍarn ad-d-nkrn zġ-lmut f-ssibt n-ma-d-inkr yasuɛ.
aškin-d amẓn-tn gn-tn-in ġ-lḥbs a-n-ġin-qaman ar ṣṣbaḥ ašku yaġ-uzal.
imma ġwilli sflidnin i-wawal n-rbbi, iggut gisn ma-yumnn ġ-tasaɛt-an. ar-ttigatn imumnn aylliġ illa ma-itggan smmus id-walf (5000) n-yan.
ndid azkka munn-d imġarn l-lmḥkama ġ-urušalim, ntni d-imġarn n-tmazirt d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ.
yili-didsn-unmġur ihiyyan n-tgmmi n-rbbi ism-ns ḥannan, yili qayafa d-yuḥanna d-iskandr d-wiyyaḍ n-ayt-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi.
awin-d irqqasn ssbiddn-tn ġ-lgddam-nsn sqsan-tn: «man taḥkimt a-s-tskrm ġayad? s-ism n-mi a-s-ti-tskrm?»
iɛmmr bṭrus s-rruḥ lqudus yini-asn: «wa-imġarn l-lmḥkama d-imġarn n-tmazirt,
iġ-aġ-tsqsam ġassad f-ufulki lli-ityawskarn i-yan-ukušam ula f-mamnk a-s-ijji,

iqqan-kʷn-d a-tissanm mayad kunni ula kullu ayt-rbbi. ibidd-urgaz-ad ġ-lgddam-nnun ijji idus s-tḥkimt lli-illan s-ism n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ gu-naṣira, a-t-igan d-walli tnġam kunni f-uggjdi, issnkr-t-id rbbi zġ-lmut.
nttan a-f-ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi: ‹aẓru lli-n-tluḥm kunni a-ibnnayn, nttan a-iwrrin iga ih̬f n-uġẓu.›
ur-iẓḍar yan a-injm zġ-lhalak abla srs nttan, ašku ur-illi ġ-ddu ignwan kra n-ism yaḍni ifka-t rbbi ma-s-a-itnjam bnadm.»
lliġ ẓran mamnk a-izɛm bṭrus d-yuḥanna iḍr-asn lɛjb, ašku ssnn is-gan ġir zund mddn yaḍni ur-bahra-ġrin. fhmn ġakudan is-ttin-kkan ar-tmunun d-yasuɛ.
walaynni ur-darsn ma-ttinin ašku ẓran argaz lli-ijjin, ibidd didsn.
ssufġn-tn ilmma zġ-uḥanu l-lmḥkama, ssmqsan i-ngratsn:
«ma-ra-nskr i-mddn-ad? hati kullu imzdġn n-urušalim ssnn is-ttyawskar yat lmɛjizt imqqurn f-ufus-nsn. ur-nẓḍar a-nini ur-tlli.
walaynni ih̬ṣṣa a-ur-izayd ġayad ġ-dar mddn s-uggʷar. ra-tn-nssiwd baš a-ur-sul-sawaln i-yan s-ism n-yasuɛ.»
ġrn-asn ilmma s-darsn inin-asn: «a-ur-sul-tsawalm ula-da-tsslmadm s-ism n-yasuɛ.»
irar-asn bṭrus d-yuḥanna: «iniyat kunni ma-ifulkin ġ-dar rbbi, izd a-nskar s-wawal-nnun nġd s-wawal n-rbbi?
ašku ur-nẓḍar a-nfssa f-ma-nẓra ula ma-mi-nsfld.»
zaydn imġarn ar-tn-thddidn, rẓmn-asn ilmma ašku ur-ufin ma-s-a-fllasn-tḥkamn, d-mddn kullutn ar-talġn rbbi f-ma-ijran.
argaz lli-ijjin s-lmɛjizt-ad, illa dars uggʷar n-kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas.
lliġ-asn-rẓmn iwrri bṭrus d-yuḥanna s-dar mddn-nsn, sawln-asn f-kullu mad-asn-nnan inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn n-tmazirt.
lliġ-asn-sfldn imumnn, mšaškan-d kullutn alln awal-nsn s-rbbi inin: «wa-sidi rbbi itjhhdn, tskrt ignwan d-wakal d-imdwan ula kullu ma-gisn-illan.
tsawlt f-imi n-uh̬ddam-nnk babatnnġ dawd s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus lliġ inna: ‹mah̬ aylliġ hajnt-tmizar n-ddunit? mah̬ aylliġ-d-mšaškan mddn ad-skarn f-ma-mi-ur-ẓḍarn?
uškan-d igldan, munn-d d-inmġurn n-ddunit, baš ad-mmaġn d-sidi rbbi ula lmasiḥ-ns.›
ġmkan a-s-d-imun hirudus d-bilaṭus gu-bunṭus, ntni d-ibrraniyn d-ayt-rbbi ġ-tmdint-ad, baš ad-d-mšaškan f-uh̬ddam-nnk amẓlay yasuɛ lli-tgit d-lmasiḥ.
skrn kullu ma-tqṣadt zġ-isizwar s-tḥkimt-nnk itjhhdn.
imma ġilad a-siditnnġ, ẓr mamnk a-ttirin ad-aġ-ssiwidn, tɛawnt-aġ nkkʷni n-ih̬ddamn-nnk a-nsawal s-wawal-nnk s-zzɛamt.
mdi-d afus-nnk a-tjjujjit, ar-tskart lmɛjizat d-tmitar tjhhdnin s-ism n-uh̬ddam-nnk amẓlay yasuɛ.»
lliġ kmmln taẓallit-ad, tmmass-tgmmi lli-ġ-llan, ɛmmrn kullutn s-rruḥ lqudus ar-sawaln s-zzɛamt s-wawal n-rbbi.
kullu imumnn, yan ad-gan ġ-mad-swingimn ula ma-s-a-ssḥssun. ur-illi ma-ittinin tiġawsiwin-ns ġir tins ad-gant, walaynni kud yan ar-yaṭṭu aynna dars illan d-wiyyaḍ.
s-tḥkimt iggutn a-s-akkan irqqasn tugga-nsn f-tnkra n-siditnnġ yasuɛ, ɛmmrn kullutn s-lbaraka n-rbbi.
ur-illi yan ġ-umnaggar n-imumnn iḥtajja. ašku ġwilli ṭṭafnin igran nġd tigʷmma ar-tn-zznzan, ar-di-tawin ma-gisn-tamẓn
ar-t-srasn ġ-lgddam n-irqqasn. ar-t-aṭṭun ntni f-willi gisn ḥtajjanin, kud yan d-unšk lli-f-ilkm.
ġmkan a-iskr yusf lli-mi-ttinin barnaba. lknit-ad, fkan-as-tt irqqasn, tga lmɛna-ns ‹wad izzɛamn›. iga ntta zġ-tqbilt n-lawi, ig gu-qubrus.
izznza yan-igr-ns, yawi-d iqaridn lli-gis-yumẓ isrs-tn ġ-lgddam n-irqqasn.
illa yan-urgaz ism-ns ḥananiyya, ntta d-tmġart-ns saffira. izznza yan-igr,
iḥḍu i-ih̬f-ns kra zġ-maylli gis yumẓ, isrs ma-iqaman ġ-lgddam n-irqqasn. d-tmġart-ns, illa kullu mayan ġ-ugayyu-ns.
inkr bṭrus yini-as: «wa-ḥananiyya, mah̬ aylliġ tudjit šiṭan a-ikšm s-uwl-nnk baš a-tsskarkst f-rruḥ lqudus tḥḍut kra zġ-maylli tumẓt ġ-igr-nnk?

lliġ ur-ta-inzi winnk a-iga, imma lliġ inza hati maylli gis tumẓt illa sul ġ-ufus-nnk a-srs-tskrt aynna trit. mah̬ aylliġ tqṣadt ġayad ġ-uwl-nnk? hati urd bnadm a-f-tsskarkst, walaynni tsskarkst f-rbbi.»
ġir isfld ḥananiyya i-mayad s-iḍr s-wakal immt. ġuwḍn kullu willi sfldnin i-ma-ijran.
nkrn ilmma iɛyyaln, lsn-as lkfn asin-t mḍln-t-in.
zrint kraṭṭ tasaɛin s-di-tkšm-tmġart-ns, ur-tssin ma-ijran.
isqsa-tt bṭrus: «ini-yyi, izd ġunškad a-tumẓm ġ-igr-nnun?» tini-as: «ġunškan a-illan.»
izayd bṭrus yini-as: «mah̬ aylliġ tswangmm a-stti-tzzrim f-rruḥ n-rbbi? hatnin ġ-imi, ġwilli-n-mḍlnin argaz-nnm. ra-km-asin ula kmmi.»
ġakudan a-tḍr s-wakal ġ-lgddam-ns tmmt. kšmn-d iɛyyaln afn-tt-id tmmut, asin-tt mḍln-tt-in ġ-tama n-urgaz-ns.
ġuwḍn kullu ayt-umnaggar bahra, ntni ula kullu wiyyaḍ lli-sfldnin f-ma-ijran.
iskr rbbi lmɛjizat d-tmitar ggutnin f-ifassn n-irqqasn ġ-dar ayt-tmdint-an. ar-n-tmunun imumnn kullutn ġ-udġar lli-mi-ttinin ‹alḥni n-suliman›.
wah̬h̬a da-tn-talġn kullu mddn, ur-izɛm yan ur-igin amumn a-didsn-imun.
walaynni ar-ttigatn ayt-umnaggar, irgazn ula timġarin lli-umnnin s-siditnnġ.
lliġ ẓran ayt-tmdint kullu mayad, ar-d-ssufuġn imuḍan-nsn s-tswak, ar-tn-srasn f-ibrdan-nsn ula imjdan-nsn, ar-trjun a-izri bṭrus iḍr-d-umalu-ns f-kra gisn.
iggut ma-d-ittaškin zġ-iduran n-tsgiw n-urušalim, ar-di-tawin imuḍan d-imjnan, ar-kullu-tjjin.
imma anmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imddukkʷal-ns kullutn l-lmdhb n-iṣadduqin, ṭiyyr-asn bahra ašku frḥn mddn s-irqqasn uggʷar-nsn ntni.
amẓn-tn ġakudan gn-tn-in ġ-lḥbs ġ-gr willi ffuġnin lqanun.
walaynni ġ-iḍ-an yuška-d yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi, irẓm tiflwin l-lḥbs issufġ-d irqqasn yini-asn:
«zaydat tbiddm ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, tsawlm i-mddn f-kullu ma-igan win-uġaras n-tudrt-ad l-ljdid.»

lliġ-d-iġli-wass, skrn irqqasn s-wawal-ns, kšmn s-tgmmi n-rbbi ar-sslmadn mddn. lliġ inkr-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imddukkʷal-ns, ssmunn-d imġarn l-lmḥkama n-ayt-rbbi kullutn, aznn s-lḥbs ad-d-awin irqqasn s-darsn.
walaynni lliġ kšmn imh̬zniyn s-lḥbs ur-tn-in-ufin, wrrin s-lmḥkama inin-asn:
«nufa-n lḥbs iqqn, rglnt-tflwin-ns, biddn ingabaln kullutn ġ-tama n-imawn, walaynni lliġ-tn-nrẓm ur-n-nufi yan ġ-ugʷns.»
lliġ sfldn inmġurn d-lqbṭan n-imh̬zniyn n-tgmmi n-rbbi i-mad-nnan, gammin ad-fhmn ma-ijran. ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «ma-ra-d-iggʷru i-ġayad?»
ġakudan ikšm darsn yan-urgaz yini-asn: «han ġwilli-n-tgam ġ-lḥbs, biddn ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi ar-sslmadn mddn.»
iffuġ lqbṭan d-imh̬zniyn-ns ġakudan, awin-d irqqasn s-darsn, walaynni ur-tn-ssrfufnn ašku ksuḍn zġ-ayt-tmdint a-gisn-brrmn s-iẓran.
šškšmn-tn ssbiddn-tn-in ġ-lgddam n-ayt-lmḥkama. inkr-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi ġakudan yini-asn:
«is-ur-kʷn-numr a-ur-tsslmadm s-ism-an? imma kunni mayd tskrm ġilad? hati tɛmmrm urušalim s-ulmmud-nnun, tirim ad-aġ-tqlldm s-idammn n-urgaz-an.»
isawl bṭrus ula irqqasn inin: «iqqan-aġ-d a-nskar s-wawal n-rbbi uggʷar n-wawal n-bnadm.
ašku rbbi n-imzwura-nnġ issnkr-d yasuɛ lli-tnġam f-uggjdi.
issattuy-t s-ufasiy-ns baš a-ig agllid d-unjjam i-ayt-rbbi, iskr-asn aġaras ma-s-a-di-twrrin zġ-kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn, issitti fllasn ddnub-nsn.
kullu mayad, ar-fllas-nakka tugga-nnġ nkkʷni ula rruḥ lqudus lli-d-yuzn rbbi i-willi skarnin s-wawal-ns.»
lliġ sfldn ayt-lmḥkama i-mayad, nkrn-d gisn iriyn bahra, irin ad-nġn irqqasn.
walaynni inkr yan gisn ġ-wammas l-lmḥkama, ism-ns gamalyal. iga zġ-lmdhb n-ifarisin, ig amslmd n-ššrɛ, ar-ti-tuqqarn mddn kullutn. yini-asn ad-ssufġn irqqasn yan imikk.
isawl ilmma d-ayt-lmḥkama yini-asn: «wa-irgazn ayt-rbbi, swangmat bahra ur-ta-tskirm kra i-mddn-ad.

a-ur-tettum tudas lli-d-yuškan isggʷasn-ad zrinin, inna is-iga kra ihiyyan. imun dids ma-itggan kkuẓ id-miyya (400) n-urgaz. walaynni ityawnġa, akutn kullu willi dids llanin, ur-iqama yat ġ-ma-inawl.
tigira-ns yuška-d yahuda gu-jalil ġ-uzmz lli-ġ-ḥasbn kullu ayt-tmazirt, yawi dids mddn ggutnin. ula nttan ityawnġa, akutn ġwilli dids munnin.
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, ad-ur-tẓim d-mddn-ad. adjat-tn ad-ddun. ašku mayd nawln ula mayd skarn, iġ-iga win bnadm ra-iḍr.
walaynni iġ-iga win rbbi, ur-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tn-tnrum. han a-ur-n-tafm ih̬fawn-nnun ġ-isiggʷra is-a-ttẓim d-rbbi.» skrn ilmma s-mad-asn-inna gamalyal,
ġrn-d i-irqqasn ssġuršn-tn, amrn-tn a-ur-daġ-sawaln s-ism n-yasuɛ, rẓmn-asn.
ffuġn irqqasn zġ-lmḥkama, frḥn bahra ašku iga-tn rbbi d-wid-f-irḍa aylliġ rfufnn f-ism n-yasuɛ.
zaydn ilmma ass f-wass ar-sslmadn ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi ula ġ-tgʷmma n-mddn, ar-tbrraḥn s-lh̬bar ifulkin n-yasuɛ, ar-ttinin izd nttan a-igan lmasiḥ n-rbbi.

ar-ttigatn imḥḍarn ġ-uwssan-an. imma ġwilli sawalnin s-wawal n-ibrraniyn ar-tngmugn f-willi sawalnin s-wawal n-ayt-yudaya ar-ttinin: «ur-a-tamẓnt-thjjalin-nnġ taġamt lli-tnd-d-yuškan ġ-lmɛawnt n-kraygatt ass.»
nkrn irqqasn s-sin d-mraw, ġrn-d i-imḥḍarn kullutn s-darsn inin-asn: «ur-ra-ifulki a-nfl tawuri n-wawal n-rbbi baš a-naṭṭu f-lmyadi.
ġir zaydat ay-aytma, tstim zġ-gigun ssa n-mddn nna-s-tssnm is-ɛmmrn s-rruḥ lqudus ula taḥkimt. ra-nfl tawuri-ad ġ-ufus-nsn,
nlhu nkkʷni s-tẓallit d-ulmmud n-wawal n-rbbi.»

iɛjb-tn kullutn mayd nnan irqqasn. stin ilmma stifanus (iga nttan argaz iɛmmrn s-liman ula rruḥ lqudus). stin ula filibbus d-bruh̬urus d-nikanur d-timun d-barminas d-niqulaws (iga nttan abrrani gu-anṭakiyya yumẓ aġaras n-ayt-rbbi).
awin-tn-d s-dar irqqasn. ẓẓalln ntni ḍalbn rbbi, srsn fllasn ifassn-nsn a-tn-ẓlin i-twuri-an.
iggut ma-isflidn s-wawal n-rbbi ġ-uwssan-an, ar-bahra-ttigatn imḥḍarn ġ-urušalim. kigan d-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi a-yumẓn aġaras l-lmasiḥ ula ntni.
iɛmmr stifanus s-lbaraka n-rbbi d-tḥkimt itjhhdn, ar-iskar lmɛjizat d-tmitar mqqurnin ġ-dar ayt-tmdint.

walaynni nkrn srs kra n-mddn zġ-tgmmi n-tẓallit lli-mi-ttinin ‹tigmmi n-ismgan lli-tyawrẓamnin›, gn ayt-yudaya zġ-tmdinin n-kurini d-iskandariyya d-wiyyaḍ zġ-tmizar n-kilikiyya d-asiyya, ar-tmjaḥadn d-stifanus.
imma nttan ar-didsn-isawal s-tḥkimt iggutn ġmklli-as-imala rruḥ lqudus, aylliġ ur-ẓḍarn a-t-nrun s-iwaliwn.
ġakudan skrn d-kra n-irgazn ġ-tntla ad-d-aškin inin «nsfld-as ar-irggm ġ-ššrɛ n-musa ula rbbi.»
sshiyysn ayt-tmdint d-imġarn n-tmazirt d-imslmdn n-ššrɛ, aylliġ umẓn stifanus awin-t s-lmḥkama.
šškšmn kra n-mddn a-fllas-akkan tugga n-tkrkas ar-ttinin: «ġwad ar-bdda-irggm ġ-tgmmi tamẓlayt n-rbbi ula ššrɛ n-musa.
nsfld-as ibdr ġwalli mi ttinin yasuɛ gu-naṣira, yini fllas ra-ih̬lu tigmmi n-rbbi issngara-yaġ d-iġarasn lli-aġ-d-ifl musa.»
imma stifanus, ar-gis-ssmuqquln kullu willi gawrnin ġ-uḥanu l-lmḥkama, ẓrn udm-ns irwas udm l-lmalak.
isawl-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi s-stifanus isqsa-t: «is-yʷġẓan ġayd fllak ttinin mddn-ad?»
isawl stifanus yini-asn kullutn: «way-aytma d-id-h̬ali, sfldat-iyi. iban-d rbbi l-lmjd i-babatnnġ ibrahim ġ-tmazirt n-masubuṭamya, ur-ta-iddi a-izdġ ġ-tmdint n-ḥaran.
yini-as: ‹fl ayt-dark d-tmazirt-nnk, tddut s-tmazirt lli-rad-ak-mlġ.›
iffuġ ilmma tamazirt-ns n-ayt-kaldan iddu izdġ ġ-ḥaran. lliġ immut babas, yawi-t-id rbbi s-tmazirt-ad lli-ġ-tzdġm ġilad.

walaynni ur-as-gis-ifki kra n-udġar a-ig wins ġ-uwssan-an. kra n-uwzun imẓẓin ur-as-t-ifki. walaynni inna-yas rbbi: ‹rad-ak-tt-fkġ ġ-mayd-d-iftan, a-tg tinnk kiyi d-tarwa-nnk.› ġmkan ad-as-inna wah̬h̬a ur-ta-dars-ilul kra n-warraw.
isawl-daġ rbbi yini-as: ‹tarwa-nnk rad-gn iġribn ġ-yat-tmazirt yaggugn. kkuẓ id-miyya n-usggʷas a-rad-gn ismgan ar-trfufunn ġin.
walaynni rad-utġ lḥukm f-tmazirt lli-tn-irurn ad-gn ismgan. tigira n-uwssan-an rad-ffuġn zġ-ġin, aškin-d ar-iyi-tɛbadn ġ-tmazirt-ad.›

ifk ilmma rbbi i-ibrahim tamatart l-lɛhd lli-iskr ġ-gras dids, tga taẓallit n-iḥšmay-ns. ġakudan iẓẓulla ibrahim i-yus isḥaq ġ-wis tam-uwssan. iẓẓall isḥaq i-yus yaɛqub, iẓẓall yaɛqub i-tarwa-ns s-sin d-mraw, a-tn-igan d-id-babatnnġ nkkʷni n-ayt-rbbi.
«walaynni id-babatnnġ usin tanuwwašt f-gʷmatsn yusf, zznzn-t a-ig ismg ġ-tmazirt n-miṣr. imma nttan, illa dids rbbi
ifukku-t zġ-kullu tassasin-ns. lliġ ibidd yusf ġ-lgddam n-firɛawn agllid n-miṣr, ifk-as rbbi taḥkimt iggutn, aylliġ fllas irḍa-ugllid, ifl ġ-ddu-ufus-ns tamazirt n-miṣr ula kullu tigmmi-ns.
walaynni ġ-uwssan-an illa-uġni ġ-miṣr kullutt ula ġ-tmazirt-ad n-kanɛan, ar-bahra-taḍnn mddn. ur-ẓḍarn id-babatnnġ ad-afn mad-šttan.
isfld yaɛqub is-illa imndi ġ-miṣr, yazn id-babatnnġ ad-ddun s-ġin tawala tamzwarut.
ddun ilmma tis snat-twal s-asn-imla yusf izd gʷmatsn a-iga, iwrri firɛawn issn ayt-dars n-yusf.
yazn yusf s-babas yaɛqub d-mddn-ns kullutn, iḍalb-tn a-d-dars-aškin. ssa n-id-mraw d-smmus (75) n-yan ad-gan.
iddu yaɛqub s-miṣr, immt ġin nttan d-id-babatnnġ.
awin-tn-d ilmma s-tmdint n-šakim, mḍln-tn ġ-umḍḍal lli-sttin ikka ibrahim isġa-t s-nnuqrt dar ayt-ḥamur.
«zrin isggʷasn, ar-ttigatn mddn-nnġ ġ-miṣr bahra. yakmur-d-uzmz lli-ġ-ra-issafu rbbi awal lli-s-inna i-ibrahim.
inkr yan-ugllid yaḍni iḥkam miṣr, ur-issin yusf.
ar-tt-izzray f-imzwura-nnġ ar-didsn-itšqu. yamr-tn ad-ssufuġn tarwa nna-yasn-lulnin, fln-tn-in ad-mmtn ġ-lh̬la.
ġ-uwssan-an a-ilul musa, iga aḥšmi bahra išwan. rbban-t ayt-dars kraḍ-iyrn ġ-tgmmi,
ssufġn-t ilmma fln-t-in. walaynni tufa-t illis n-firɛawn, tasi-t tg-t d-yus trbba-t.
ar-yaqra musa kullu tawassna n-ayt-miṣr, iwrri ig argaz itjhhdn ġ-iwaliwn-ns d-iskkirn-ns.
«lliġ irgl kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas, iḍr-d ġ-ih̬f-ns a-iddu iẓr aytmas, a-tn-igan d-ayt-rbbi.
iẓr yan gisn, ar-t-issrfufun yan gu-miṣr. iftu musa a-t-iɛawn irar i-gu-miṣr f-ma-iskr. yut-t ġakudan inġ-t.
yini musa d-ih̬f-ns: ‹rad-issann aytma-yad is-ira rbbi a-tn-ifukku f-ufus-inu,› walaynni ur-a-swingimn ntni ġmkan.
ndid azkka s-iẓra musa sin irgazn n-ayt-rbbi mmaġn i-ngratsn, iftu darsn yiri a-tn-issngadda. yini-asn: ‹wa-irgazn ẓrat, hati aytmatn a-tgam. mah̬ aylliġ tmmaġm i-ngratun?›
walaynni ġwalli issrfufnn wayyaḍ infr musa yini-as: ‹ma-k-igan d-umġar ula lḥakm fllannġ?
is-trit a-yyi-tnġt ġmklli tnġit gu-miṣr iḍgam?›
lliġ isfld musa i-mayad irwl, iffuġ miṣr iddu igawr ġ-tmazirt n-madyan. laln-in dars sin tarwa ġin.
«zrin kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas, iban-as-d ilmma yal-lmalak s-tmziwlt l-lɛafit ġ-yat-tzggʷart tlla ġ-lh̬la ġ-tsga n-udrar n-sina.
musa, iḍr-as lɛjb ġ-ma-itmnad, yakmur-n srs a-stt-issmaqql. ġakudan a-isfld i-wawal n-sidi rbbi yini-as-d:
‹nkki a-igan rbbi n-imzwura-nnk, rbbi n-ibrahim d-isḥaq d-yaɛqub.› yiksaḍ musa ar-itrgigiy bahra, ur-iẓḍar a-yall alln-ns.
isawl-daġ sidi rbbi yini-as: ‹kkis turẓiyin-nnk. han ġin ġ-tbiddt iga akal ityawẓlayn i-rbbi-nnk.
hati ẓriġ mnšk ad-trfufunn mddn-inu ġ-miṣr, sfldġ i-ismummʷin-nsn, gguzġ-d a-tn-fukkuġ. imma ġilad nkr, ra-k-aznġ s-miṣr.›
«musa, nttan a-n-luḥn ayt-rbbi inin-as: ‹ma-k-igan d-umġar ula lḥakm fllannġ?› imma rbbi yuzn-t-id ad-asn-ig amġar d-unjjam lliġ-as-d-iban lmalak ġ-tzggʷart.
ġakudan issufġ-tn-d zġ-ġin, iskr lmɛjizat d-tmitar tjhhdnin ġ-miṣr ula ġ-dar-umda aẓggʷaġ ula kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas ġ-lh̬la.
musa, nttan a-innan i-ayt-rbbi: ‹rad-awn-ifk rbbi yan zġ-aytmatun a-ig nnabi zund nkki.›
«illa musa ġ-umnaggar n-ayt-rbbi ġ-lh̬la, yili d-imzwura-nnġ, yili d-lmalak lli-srs-isawln ġ-udrar n-sina. nttan a-mi-d-imla rbbi iwaliwn ddrnin ad-aġ-tn-d-isslkm nkkʷni.
walaynni agʷin imzwura-nnġ ad-srs-sfldn. nfrn-t irin ad-wrrin s-miṣr.
inin i-harun: ‹skr-aġ kra n-ilahat ma-yaġ-izggurun, ašku musa lli-aġ-d-issufġn zġ-miṣr, ur-nssin mad-as-ijran.›
skrn ya-laṣnam zund igiz ġ-uwssan-an, ar-n-srasn tiġrsiw ġ-lgddam-ns, skrn lfišta frḥn s-ġaylli ssngaddan s-ifassn-nsn.
iwrri fllasn rbbi ġakudan, ifl-tn ad-tɛbadn itran n-ignwan, ġmklli inna ġ-warra l-lanbiya isqsa-tn: ‹way-ayt-rbbi, izd nkki a-mi-n-tssakmurm tiġrsiw d-twafkiw kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas ġ-lh̬la?
han ah̬iyyam n-muluh̬ a-tusim, d-itri n-ilah rafan. ar-ttɛbadm laṣnam lli-tskrm. f-ġayan a-f-ra-kʷn-ssittiġ s-tuggugt n-babil.›
«ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-llan imzwura-nnġ ġ-lh̬la ar-didsn-tawin ah̬iyyam lli-ġ-llant-tmitar n-is-didsn-illa rbbi. ityawskar-uh̬iyyam-an ġmklli-s-inna rbbi i-musa zund maylli-as-imla.
fln-d ilmma ah̬iyyam-an dar willi-asn-ggʷranin, asin-t-id ntni lliġ-d-kšmn d-yašuɛ s-tmizar n-mddn lli-issufġ rbbi ġ-lgddam-nsn. iqama darnnġ ar ussan n-ugllid dawd.
nttan, irḍa fllas rbbi. iḍalb-t dawd a-t-yadj a-iskr yat-tgmmi a-gis-izdġ rbbi lli-d-issbayynn ih̬f-ns i-babatnnġ yaɛqub.
walaynni suliman ad-as-sul-ibnan tigmmi-an.
imma rbbi amattuy ur-a-izddġ ġ-tgʷmma tyawskarnin s-ifassn n-bnadm. ġmklli-s-inna f-imi n-nnabi:
‹ignna iga lɛrš-inu, ig-wakal aẓru lli-f-a-n-srasġ iḍarn-inu. ġmkad a-inna sidi rbbi: man tigmmi a-rad-iyi-tbnum? man taḥanut a-ġ-rad-sunfuġ?
is-urd nkki a-iskrn kullu mayd illan?›»
izayd stifanus yini-asn: «matta ġmkad qqurn ih̬fawn-nnun, zund iġ-ur-tssinm rbbi ula tsfldm i-wawal-ns. tagʷim-bdda ma-ira rruḥ lqudus zund imzwura-nnun.
is-illa kra n-nnabi ur-irfufnn f-ifassn n-imzwura-nnun? ntni nġan ula ġwilli-d-iwinin lh̬bar n-is-ra-d-yašk yan iɛmmrn s-ufulki n-rbbi. imma ġilad ġ-d-yuška, tzznzam-t tnġm-t
kunni lli-mi-ifka rbbi ššrɛ f-ufus l-lmalayka, walaynni ur-jju-srs-tskirm.»
lliġ sfldn ayt-lmḥkama i-mayad, nkrn-d gisn iriyn bahra, ar-tgẓaẓn uh̬san-nsn.
imma stifanus iɛmmr s-rruḥ lqudus, ar-n-issmuqqul ġ-ignwan iẓr-n lmjd n-rbbi, iẓr-n yasuɛ ibidd f-ufasi n-rbbi.
yini: «hati ẓriġ-n ignwan rẓmn, ẓrġ yus n-bnadm ibidd f-ufasi n-rbbi.»
qqnn imzgan-nsn ar-tġuwwatn s-jjhd, azzln srs kullutn.
dḥin-t s-brra n-tmdint ar-t-kkatn s-iẓran. kkisn inagan islhamn-nsn, srsn-tn-in ġ-dar iḍarn n-yan-uɛyyal ism-ns šawl.
zaydn ar-sul-kkatn ġ-stifanus s-iẓran. imma stifanus iġra i-siditnnġ yini: «wa-sidi yasuɛ, qbl rruḥ-inu.»
iḍr f-ifaddn-ns s-wakal, yut s-yat-tġuyyit yini: «wa-sidi, a-ur-fllasn-tḥasbt lh̬ʷšant-ad.» ġir inna awal-ad immt. imma šawl ifrḥ lliġ nġan stifanus.
zġ-wass-an a-tzray-trfufnt išqan f-umnaggar n-aytmatn ġ-urušalim, akutn kullu ġ-tsgiw n-yudaya ula samira. ġir irqqasn a-iqaman.
imma stifanus, mḍln-t kra n-mddn lli-tuqqarnin rbbi, taġ-tn-tguḍi-ns bahra.
imma šawl iga-n tiqqi-ns a-ihlk amnaggar kullut. ar-ikššm s-tgʷmma yat s-yat, ar-d-izukur irgazn ula timġarin ar-tn-in-itluḥ ġ-lḥbs.
imma ġwilli akutnin, ar-tkkan kraygatt mani ar-tbrraḥn s-wawal n-rbbi.
iddu filibbus s-yat-tmdint ġ-samira, ar-itbrraḥ f-lmasiḥ.
ggutn mddn n-ġin, lliġ sfldn i-ma-ittini filibbus ẓrn timitar tjhhdnin lli-iskar, awin-tt kullu ġ-wawal-ns.
mddn ggutnin, ffuġn zgisn ljnun ʷh̬šnnin s-tġuyya tjhhdnin, jjin kigan d-ikušamn d-ibiḍarn.
frḥn ayt-tmdint-an bahra.
yili yan-urgaz ġ-tmdint-an ism-ns simɛun, ar-iskar ssiḥr ar-gis-tɛjjabn ayt-samira. ar-asn-ittini izd wad imqqurn a-iga.
ar-tt-gis-tawin mddn kullutn, udmawn mqqurnin ula wiyyaḍ, ar-ttinin: «argaz-ad tlla-gis-tḥkimt n-rbbi lli-mi ism-ns ‹amqqur›.»
ar-srs-sflidn ašku kigan ad-zzrin ar-tɛjjabn ġ-ssiḥr lli-iskar.
walaynni lliġ sfldn i-ma-inna filibbus f-lh̬bar ifulkin n-tgldit n-rbbi ula f-ism n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, amnn awal-ns. issddm-tn ġ-waman, irgazn ula timġarin.
yamn simɛun ula nttan, issddm-t filibbus ġ-waman. izayd ar-itmunu d-filibbus, ar-itɛjjab ġ-lquwwat d-tmitar mqqurnin lli-dars-iẓrra.
sfldn irqqasn ġ-urušalim f-ayt-samira is-qbln awal n-rbbi, aznn bṭrus d-yuḥanna s-darsn.
lliġ-n-lkmn, ẓẓalln ḍalbn zġ-rbbi a-d-ifk rruḥ lqudus i-willi umnnin.
ašku ġakudan ur-ta-d-fllasn-igguz rruḥ lqudus. ġir ddmn ntni ġ-waman s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ.
srsn fllasn irqqasn ifassn-nsn s-tn-ikšm rruḥ lqudus.
ġir iẓra simɛun is-d-yuška rruḥ lqudus lliġ fllasn srsn irqqasn ifassn-nsn, yawi-d iqaridn
yini-asn: «fkat-iyi ula nkki taẓḍḍart-ad, baš a-ikšm rruḥ lqudus s-wanna-f-srsġ ifassn-inu.»
irar-as bṭrus: «a-tthlkt kiyi ula nnuqrt-nnk, ašku tġalt izd s-iqaridn a-s-tlla-twafka n-rbbi.
ur-dark taġamt ġ-twuri-ad ula ra-gis-tkšmt, ašku ur-iġus-uwl-nnk ġ-iẓri n-rbbi.
fl lh̬ʷšant-an tnawlt, tḍalbt rbbi ad-ak-iṣamḥ f-ġayn tnuwwat ġ-uwl-nnk.
ašku ẓriġ is-tɛmmrt s-wasmmum, tyassast s-iskraf n-ddnub.»
yini-asn simɛun: «ḍalbat rbbi f-ssibt-inu, a-ur-iyi-yili kra ġ-ġayd flla tnnam.»
izayd bṭrus d-yuḥanna fkn tugga-nsn sawln i-mddn-an s-wawal n-siditnnġ. wrrin ilmma s-urušalim. lliġ ftan ġ-uġaras ar-tbrraḥn s-lh̬bar ifulkin ġ-iduran ggutnin n-samira.
imma filibbus, inna-yas-d yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi: «nkr tddut s-tsga l-ljanub s-uġaras lli-itawin zġ-urušalim s-tmdint n-ġazza.» aġaras-an illa ġ-lh̬la.

inkr filibbus iddu. imnaggar yan-urgaz, iga gu-ḥabaš ig lwazir n-ṣṣnduq ġ-dar kandaka tagllitt n-ḥabaš. yuška-d ġ-uwssan-an s-urušalim a-gis-itɛbad rbbi, yamẓ aġaras-an ilmma baš a-iwrri s-tmazirt-ns.
ġassan issuda ġ-lkurriṣa-ns ar-yaqra ġ-warra n-nnabi išaɛya.
ġakudan filibbus, inna-yas rruḥ lqudus: «ftu-n dar bu-lkurriṣa-yan, tmunt dids.»
yazzl filibbus s-dars, isfld-as ar-yaqra ġ-warra n-nnabi išaɛya. isqsa-t filibbus: «is-tssnt lmɛna n-mayd taqrat?»
yini-as lwazir: «mamnk a-s-rad-issanġ lmɛna-ns iġ-ur-dari mad-iyi-stt-imalan?» iḍalb-t ilmma a-iġli issudu dids ġ-lkurriṣa.
agzzum lli-yaqra ġ-warra n-rbbi iga ġmkad: «zund izimmr lli-ldin ad-as-ġrsn, nġd zund alqqaġ lli-ifssan ġ-gr ifassn n-willi ra-t-ilass, ur-irẓim imi-ns.
rgmn-t ssḍrn fllas lbaḍl. ma-ra-yaddr tarwa-ns? ašku bbin-t zġ-tudrt n-ddunit-ad.»
isawl-daġ lwazir isqsa filibbus: «ini-yyi, ma-f-isawl nnabi lliġ inna mayad? izd f-ih̬f-ns nġd kra n-yan yaḍni?»
ibdu filibbus ġakudan zġ-warra-yan, ar-as-imala lh̬bar ifulkin f-yasuɛ.
zaydn ssudun ġ-uġaras aylliġ lkmn yan-udġar gis aman, yini lwazir i-filibbus: «hay-aman. is-illa ma-rad-iyi-ikkis a-yyi-tssddmt?»
yini-as filibbus: «ur-illi ma-rad-ak-t-ikkis iġ-tumnt s-nniyt n-uwl-nnk.» yini-as: «ha-yyi umnġ is-iga yasuɛ lmasiḥ yus n-rbbi.»
yini lwazir i-uh̬ddam-ns a-issbidd lkurriṣa, igguz s-waman ntta d-filibbus, issddm-t.
imma filibbus, ġir ġlin-d zġ-waman s-t-issitti rruḥ n-siditnnġ, ur-sul-t-iẓri lwazir. izayd ntta f-uġaras-ns s-lfrḥ iggutn.
imma filibbus yufa-n ih̬f-ns ġ-tmdint n-ašdud, izayd ar-itkka kullu timdinin ar-gisnt-itbrraḥ s-lh̬bar ifulkin aylliġ iruḥ qayṣriyya.
imma šawl ar-sul-iskar ma-s-a-issiwid imḥḍarn n-siditnnġ ar-tn-itnuwwa s-lmut. iddu s-dar-unmġur ihiyyan n-tgmmi n-rbbi,
iḍalb zġ-gis tibratin i-imġarn n-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ġ-tmdint n-dimašq, baš a-iġwi wanna-n-yufa zġ-ayt-uġaras l-lmasiḥ gn-iyt irgazn nġd timġarin, yawi-tn s-urušalim.
issudu šawl aylliġ-n-yakmur s-dimašq, s-d-fllas-tsfaw yat tifawt itjhhdn zġ-ignwan.
iḍr s-wakal isfld i-yan-wawal inna-yas: «šawl, šawl, mah̬ a-yyi-tssrfufunt?»
yini: «wa-sidi, ma-tgit kiyi?» yini-as: «nkkin a-igan yasuɛ lli-tssrfufunt.
imma ġilad nkr tkšmt s-tmdint. rad-ak-ityawnna ma-k-id-iqqann a-ti-tskart.»
duhdun ġwilli dids ssudanin, biddn ġin fssan. sllan ntni i-wawal-an walaynni ur-ẓrin yan.
inkr šawl zġ-wakal walaynni lliġ irẓm alln-ns ur-isfaw yat. amẓn-as afus awin-t s-dimašq.
ikka kraḍ-uwssan ur-isfaw, ur-a-ištta ula-da-issa.
illa yan-umḥḍar l-lmasiḥ ġ-dimašq ism-ns ḥananiyya, iban-as-d siditnnġ ġ-twargit yini-as: «wa-ḥananiyya.» yini: «ha-nkki a-sidi.»
yini-as siditnnġ: «nkr tddut s-tgmmi n-yahuda ġ-tsukt lli-mi-ttinin ‹tasukt inmn›, tsqsat ġ-yan-urgaz gu-ṭarsus ism-ns šawl. ašku ar-itẓalla,
iẓr ġ-twargit yan-urgaz ism-ns ḥananiyya yuška-d dars, isrs fllas ifassn-ns baš a-yisfiw.»
isawl ḥananiyya yini: «wa-sidi, sfldġ i-kullu ma-ttinin mddn f-urgaz-an ula kullu ma-iskar yʷh̬šn i-imẓlayn-nnk ġ-urušalim.
hati ġilad yuška-d s-ġid, yawi-d dids tibratin zġ-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi baš a-yamẓ kullu ġwid aqranin s-ism-nnk.»
yini-as siditnnġ: «ddu s-dars, ašku argaz-an stiġ-t a-ig aruku lli-ra-yasi ism-inu dar ayt-tmizar aggugnin d-igldan ula dar ayt-rbbi.
rad-as-mlġ mnšk n-trfufnt a-t-id-iqqann a-srs-irfufn f-ism-inu.»

iddu ḥananiyya ikšm s-tgmmi lli-ġ-illa šawl, isrs fllas ifassn-ns yini-as: «wa-gʷma šawl, yuzn-iyi-d siditnnġ, a-t-igan d-yasuɛ lli-ak-d-ibann ġ-uġaras ġakud lliġ-di-tssudit. yazn-iyi-d s-dark baš a-tisfiwt tɛmmrt s-rruḥ lqudus.»
ġir inna mayad s-d-iḍr kra zġ-walln n-šawl irwas i-ikrḍn n-islman, iwrri isfaw. inkr ġakudan, issddm-t ḥananiyya ġ-waman.
išš ilmma s-iwrri idus. igawr šawl d-imḥḍarn l-lmasiḥ ġ-dimašq kra n-uwssan.
ibdu ar-itbrraḥ ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ar-ittini: «yasuɛ iga yus n-rbbi.»
ar-tɛjjabn kullu willi-as-sflidnin ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «is-urd ġwad a-ithlakn ġwilli aqranin s-ism-ad ġ-urušalim? is-ur-d-yuški s-ġid baš a-tn-yamẓ yawi-tn s-dar inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi?»
imma šawl ar-itzayad ar-isawal s-tḥkimt itjhhdn ar-imala is-iga yasuɛ ġwalli-d-yuzn rbbi a-ig lmasiḥ, aylliġ ur-ufin ayt-yudaya lli-zdġnin ġ-dimašq mamnk a-fllas-traran awal.
zrin-uwssan ggutnin s-fllas-mšawarn kra n-ayt-yudaya, irin a-t-nġn.
gabln imawn n-tmdint ġ-iyḍ ula azal baš a-t-hlkn. imma šawl isfld i-ġaylli fllas nuwwan.
awin-t imḥḍarn-ns ġ-iyḍ s-yan-warryaḥ illa ġ-uġʷrab, zzugzn-t ġ-yan-uryal s-brra n-tmdint.
iddu šawl s-urušalim, yiri a-iẓr imḥḍarn n-siditnnġ. imma ntni ksuḍn zġ-gis kullutn, ašku ur-t-uminn is-iwrri iga amḥḍar l-lmasiḥ.
yašk-id barnaba yawi šawl s-dar irqqasn, yini-asn f-mamnk ad-as-d-iban siditnnġ ġ-uġaras isawl srs, ula mamnk a-izɛm šawl ar-isawal s-ism n-yasuɛ ġ-dimašq.
iqama didsn šawl, ar-itkka kullu tamdint n-urušalim ar-isawal s-ism n-siditnnġ s-zzɛamt.
ar-issmqsa ar-itmjaḥad d-ayt-yudaya lli-d-kkanin timizar yaḍni, imma ntni skrn f-a-t-nġn.
lliġ sfldn aytmatn f-maylli nuwwan, awin-t s-lmrsa n-qayṣriyya, azn-t ilmma s-tmdint-ns n-ṭarsus.
ġ-uwssan-an ihnna lḥal dar kullu ayt-umnaggar ġ-tmizar n-yudaya ula jalil ula samira. ar-ttigatn ar-tdusn, ar-tn-izzɛam rruḥ lqudus. ar-skarn kullu f-ad-rḍun siditnnġ.
ġ-uwssan-an ar-itkka bṭrus kraygatt mani, yašk-id s-dar imẓlayn n-rbbi ġ-uduwwar n-ludda.
yaf-n ġin yan-urgaz ikušmn, ism-ns ɛinyas. tam isggʷasn ur-iẓḍar a-inkr zġ-tisi-ns.
yini-as bṭrus: «wa-ɛinyas, hati ijjujji-k yasuɛ lmasiḥ. nkr tssmunt asddul-nnk.» inkr ġakudan, ibidd f-iḍarn-ns.
ẓrn-t kullu ayt-ludda ula ġwilli zdġnin ġ-uzaġar n-sarun, wrrin amnn ula ntni s-siditnnġ.
tlla yat-tmḥḍart l-lmasiḥ ġ-tmdint n-yaffa, ism-ns ṭabita. tga lmɛna n-ism-ns ‹taẓnkṭṭ›. nttat ar-bdda-tskar afulki ġ-mddn ar-ttɛawan imẓlaḍ.
tuḍn ġ-uwssan-an tmmt. sirdnt-stt srsnt-stt-in ġ-yan-uḥanu n-uflla.
tamdint n-yaffa ur-bahra-taggug f-uduwwar n-ludda. lliġ sfldn imḥḍarn is-illa bṭrus ġ-ludda, aznn sin irgazn s-dars ḍalbn-t: «ašk-id ġil ġil.»
inkr bṭrus imun didsn. lliġ iruḥ tigmmi ssġlin-t s-uḥanu. aškind-d-thjjalin kullutnt lullint i-bṭrus ar-allant ar-as-malant iqšban d-islhamn lli-tskr ṭabita lliġ sul didsnti tlla.
imma bṭrus issufġ-tnt kullutnt zġ-uḥanu, yutš f-ifaddn-ns iẓẓall iḍalb rbbi. igrawl ilmma ġ-talli immutn yini-as: «wa-ṭabita, nkr,» s-di-trẓm alln-ns tẓr bṭrus, tnkr ġ-tisi-ns.
imdi-as-n bṭrus afus-ns issbidd-stt f-iḍarn-ns. iġr s-imẓlayn n-rbbi d-thjjalin, ifk-asn-tt-id tddr.
ar-sflidn kullu ayt-yaffa f-ma-ijran, aylliġ iggut ma-iwrrin yumn s-siditnnġ.
igawr bṭrus ġ-yaffa yan-mnnaw-uwssan ġ-dar yan-udbbaġ ism-ns simɛan.
illa yan-urgaz ġ-tmdint n-qayṣriyya ism-ns kurnilyus, iga lqbṭan zġ-rrbɛt n-iɛskrin n-rruman lli-mi-ttinin ‹rrbɛt n-iṭalya›.
ar-itɛbad rbbi yiri bdda a-t-irḍu, nttan ula kullu ayt-tgmmi-ns. ar-yakka ma-iggutn i-imẓlaḍ n-ayt-yudaya, ar-bdda-itẓalla ar-itḍalab rbbi.
yan-wass ġ-tasaɛt tis kraṭṭ n-tdggʷat iban-as-d yal-lmalak n-rbbi, yuška-d dars yini-as: «wa-kurnilyus.»
issmaqql gis kurnilyus yiksaḍ bahra yini: «mad-dari-trit a-sidi?» izayd lmalak yini-as: «hati iqbl rbbi tiẓulla-nnk ula maylli takkat i-imẓlaḍ, irḍu fllak.
nkr ġilad taznt kra n-irgazn s-tmdint n-yaffa ad-d-awin yan-urgaz lli-mi ism-ns simɛan bṭrus.
hatin igguz ġ-tgmmi n-yan-udbbaġ ism-ns simɛan ġ-tama n-umda.»
lliġ-t-ifl lmalak iġr kurnilyus i-sin imqasan n-tgmmi-ns ula yan-uɛskri-ns lli-itɛbadn rbbi.
yini-asn f-kullu ma-ijran yazn-tn ilmma s-yaffa.
ndid azkka sul llan ġ-uġaras akmurn-in s-yaffa, iġli bṭrus s-ukfaf n-tgmmi a-iẓẓall. tga tasaɛt tis snat d-mrawt ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-wass
s-t-yaġ laẓ yiri ma-ištta. sul h̬dmn ġ-tirmt s-a-s-d-issbayyn rbbi kra zund tawargit.
iẓr ignwan rẓmn, igguz-d fllas kra irwas i-lizar imqqurn ityamaẓ zġ-kkuẓṭ-tġmrin, ittrs-d s-wakal.
ilin gis kigan d-luḥuš d-ibnkaln d-igḍaḍ n-tagant.
isawl-d yan-wawal yini: «nkr a-bṭrus, tġrst tššt.»
irar-as bṭrus: «ḥaša a-sidi. ur-jju-ššiġ ma-f-inna ššrɛ n-musa iḥrm nġd irka.»
isawl-d-daġ-wawal-an yini-as: «a-ur-tgt ma-issḥlla rbbi d-ma-iḥrmn.»
ijru ġmkan kraṭṭ-twal, ityalal ilmma lizar s-ignwan.
sul a-iswingim bṭrus ġ-ma-tga lmɛna n-twargit-an s-d-ruḥn irgazn lli-d-yuzn kurnilyus. ar-sqsan ġ-tgmmi n-simɛan aylliġ-n-biddn ġ-imi-ns.
ġrn i-ayt-tgmmi sqsan-tn: «is-darun yan-urgaz ism-ns simɛan bṭrus?»
nttan sul a-iswingim ġ-lmɛna n-twargit s-as-inna rruḥ lqudus: «ha-kraḍ irgazn ar-srk-siggiln.
nkr ġilad tgguzt, tmunt didsn bla tškkat, ašku nkki a-tn-d-yuznn.»
igguz bṭrus ġakudan yini-asn: «hati nkki a-s-a-tsiggilm. mad-dari-tram?»
inin-as: «yuzn-aġ-d lqbṭan kurnilyus. iga argaz ifulkin, ar-itɛbad rbbi ar-ti-tuqqarn kullu ayt-yudaya. iban-as-d yal-lmalak n-rbbi, yini-as ad-ak-d-iġr s-tgmmi-ns baš a-isfld i-ma-rad-as-tinit.»
išškšm-tn bṭrus ġakudan s-tgmmi, ig-tn d-inbgiwn-ns. ndid azkka imun didsn, nttan ula kra n-aytmatn yaḍni zġ-tmdint n-yaffa.
ndid azkka iruḥ tamdint n-qayṣriyya. ar-srs-itql kurnilyus, nttan d-ayt-dars d-imddukkʷal-ns, ašku issmun-tn-d kullutn ġ-tgmmi-ns.
ilkm bṭrus tigmmi s-t-id-imnaggar kurnilyus iknu s-wakal ġ-dar iḍarn-ns.
issnkr-t-id bṭrus yini-as: «nkr, nkki bnadm kad-giġ.»
izayd ar-dids-isawal, ikšm ilmma s-tgmmi yaf-n mddn ggutnin a-ġin-imunn.
yini-asn bṭrus: «tssnm ššrɛ n-musa is-ur-yudji yan igan zġ-ayt-yudaya a-ikšm s-dar ibrraniyn ula imun didsn. walaynni imla-yyi rbbi a-ur-gġ yan d-ma-iḥrmn ula ma-irkan.
f-mayan a-f-d-uškiġ lliġ-n-sri-tuznm, ur-sul-mšawarġ d-ih̬f-inu. imma ġilad riġ ad-iyi-tmlm ma-f-iyi-di-tġram.»
isawl kurnilyus yini-as: «kraḍ-uwssan ayad, zund tasaɛt-ad igan tis kraṭṭ n-tdggʷat, ar-tẓallaġ ar-tḍalabġ rbbi ġ-tgmmi-nu, s-ẓriġ yan-urgaz ibidd ġ-lgddam-inu s-tmlsa ssmrġanin.
yini-yyi: ‹wa-kurnilyus, isfld rbbi i-tẓulla-nnk, ur-ittu maylli takkat i-imẓlaḍ.
azn ġilad s-yaffa tsqsat ġ-yan-urgaz lli-mi ism-ns simɛan, ar-as-ttinin bṭrus. igguz ġ-tgmmi n-yan-udbbaġ ism-ns simɛan ġ-tama n-umda.›
aznġ-n srk ġakudan. hati tskrt gigi ma-ifulkin lliġ-d-tuškit. imma ġilad ha-nkkʷni kullwaġ ġ-lgddam n-rbbi, nra a-nsfld i-kullu ma-f-k-yuṣṣa siditnnġ ad-aġ-ti-tmlt.»
isawl bṭrus yini: «ssnġ ġilad izd s-ṣṣaḥt ur-a-iskar rbbi s-uwdmawn.
ašku ar-itqbal kullu wanna-t-ituqqarn ar-iskar ma-t-irḍan, kra tga-tmazirt-ns.
ġmkad a-iga-wawal lli-d-yuzn rbbi i-mddn-ns n-ayt-yaɛqub, iml-asn-d lh̬bar ifulkin n-sslamt ġ-gras didsn f-uwdm n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ lli-igan sidis n-kullu ma-illan.
tsfldm f-ma-ijran ġ-kullu tamazirt n-yudaya, ibdu zġ-jalil tigira n-ma-itbrraḥ yuḥanna ar-issddam mddn ġ-waman.
tissanm f-yasuɛ gu-naṣira is-t-iɛmmr rbbi s-rruḥ lqudus d-tḥkimt itjhhdn, ar-itkka kraygatt mani ar-iskar afulki ar-ijjujji kullu willi tyawkrrafnin s-iskraf n-iblis, ašku illa dids rbbi.
nkkʷni nga fllas inagan, nẓra kullu ma-iskar ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya ula ġ-urušalim. nġn-t ilmma f-uggjdi,
walaynni ġ-wis kraḍ-uwssan issnkr-t-id rbbi zġ-lmut issbayyn-t-id.
ur-d-iban i-kullu mddn walaynni ġir i-willi isti rbbi ad-gn inagan, a-tn-igan d-nkkʷni lli-dids-iššan nsu dids tigira n-ma-d-inkr zġ-lmut.
yuṣṣa-yaġ a-ntbrraḥ ar-nakka tugga-nnġ n-izd nttan a-iẓli rbbi a-yut lḥukm f-willi ddrnin ula ġwilli mmutnin.
nttan a-f-sawln lanbiya kullutn ar-akkan tugga-nsn ar-ttinin: s-ism-ns a-s-ra-issitti rbbi ddnub f-kullu wanna srs yumnn.»
sul a-isawal bṭrus s-d-igguz rruḥ lqudus f-kullu willi-as-sflidnin.
ar-tɛjjabn imumnn n-ayt-yudaya lli-d-munnin d-bṭrus lliġ ẓran mamnk a-ifka rbbi lbaraka n-rruḥ lqudus i-ibrraniyn ula ntni.
ašku sfldn-asn ar-sawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn ar-talġn rbbi. yini ilmma bṭrus:
«is-illa ma-rad-aġ-ikkis a-nssddm mddn-ad ġ-waman? ašku ula ntni, ifka-yasn rbbi rruḥ lqudus ġmklli-aġ-t-ifka nkkʷni.»
yuṣṣa-tn ad-ddmn ġ-waman s-ism n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ. ḍalbn-t ilmma a-didsn-igawr kra n-uwssan.
sfldn irqqasn d-aytmatn ġ-kullu tamazirt n-yudaya f-ibrraniyn is-umẓn ula ntni awal n-rbbi.
lliġ iwrri bṭrus s-urušalim, nkrn srs ġwilli ttirinin ad-ẓẓalln mddn i-ddat-nsn inin-as:
«mah̬ aylliġ tgguzt ġ-dar ġwilli ur-ẓẓullinin, ar-didsn-tšttat?»
isawl bṭrus iml-asn kullu ma-ijran zġ-isizwar yini-asn:

«lliġ nkki ġ-tmdint n-yaffa ar-tẓallaġ ar-tḍalabġ rbbi, s-iyi-d-issbayyn kra zund tawargit. ẓrġ kra igguz-d flla, irwas i-lizar imqqurn ityamaẓ zġ-kkuẓṭ-tġmrin. igguz-d zġ-ignwan ittrs-d ġ-lgddam-inu.
ssmaqqlġ gis lmh̬luqat, gan luḥuš d-ibnkaln d-igḍaḍ n-tagant,
s-sfldġ i-yan-wawal inna-yyi: ‹nkr a-bṭrus, tġrst tššt.›
rarġ-as: ‹ḥaša a-sidi. ur-jju-mḍiġ kra-f-inna ššrɛ n-musa iḥrm nġd irka.›
isawl-d-daġ-wawal-an zġ-ignwan yini-yyi: ‹a-ur-tgt ma-issḥlla rbbi d-ma-iḥrmn.›
ijru mayad kraṭṭ-twal, ityalal ilmma lizar s-ignwan.
tasaɛt-an a-ġ-n-ruḥn kraḍ irgazn tigmmi lli-ġ-gguzġ, tyazann-in sri zġ-qayṣriyya.
yini-yyi rruḥ lqudus ad-didsn-munġ bla škkaġ. munn ilmma didnnġ sḍiṣ aytmatn-ad. nkšm s-tgmmi n-kurnilyus.
yini-aġ nttan f-mamnk a-iẓra yal-lmalak ibidd ġ-tgmmi-ns yini-as: ‹azn s-yaffa, tsqsat ġ-yan-urgaz lli-mi ism-ns simɛan, ar-as-ttinin bṭrus.
rad-ak-d-yawi awal ma-s-a-ttnjamt kiyi ula kullu ayt-tgmmi-nnk.›
«bduġ ar-asn-sawalġ, s-d-fllasn-igguz rruḥ lqudus ġmklli-d-fllannġ-igguz nkkʷni ġ-isizwar.
ktiġ-d awal n-siditnnġ lli-s-aġ-inna: ‹ikka-ttin yuḥanna ar-issddam mddn ġ-waman, imma kunni ra-tddmm s-rruḥ lqudus.›
ibayyn is-asn-d-ifka rbbi maylli-aġ-d-ifka nkkʷni lliġ numn s-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ. mad-giġ nkki aylliġ rad-ḍaḍḍġ rbbi?»
lliġ sfldn mddn-an i-ma-inna bṭrus ur-sul-darsn ma-ttinin. alġn rbbi inin: «hati ifka rbbi i-ibrraniyn ula ntni ad-d-wrrin zġ-kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn, kšmn-d s-tudrt-ad idumn.»

ar-tmuddun ġwilli akutnin f-ssibt n-trfufnt tigira l-lmut n-stifanus, ar-ttidun ġ-uwssan-an ar tamazirt n-finiqiyya d-igzir n-qubrus d-tmdint n-anṭakiyya, ar-sslkamn awal n-rbbi ġir i-willi ganin ayt-yudaya.
walaynni kra gisn, gan n-ayt-qubrus d-ayt-kurini, lliġ ruḥn anṭakiyya bdun ar-sawaln s-ibrraniyn ula ntni, ar-asn-ttinin f-lh̬bar ifulkin n-siditnnġ yasuɛ.
iɛawn-tn siditnnġ aylliġ umnn mddn ggutnin amẓn aġaras n-siditnnġ.
sfldn aytmatn n-umnaggar ġ-urušalim f-mayad, aznn ilmma barnaba s-anṭakiyya.
lliġ-n-ilkm, iẓr mamnk a-tn-ibark rbbi, ifrḥ izzɛam-tn kullutn ad-amẓn ġ-siditnnġ s-uwl izgan.
iga barnaba argaz ifulkin, iɛmmr s-rruḥ lqudus ula liman. igatn ġwilli umẓnin aġaras n-siditnnġ ġ-uwssan-an.
iddu barnaba ġakudan s-tmdint n-ṭarsus a-isiggl s-šawl.
lliġ-t-yufa, yawi-t dids s-anṭakiyya. qaman ġin asggʷas ar-tmunun d-umnaggar n-aytmatn ar-sslmadn mddn ggutnin. ġ-tmdint n-anṭakiyya a-ġ-bdan mddn ar-ttinin i-imḥḍarn ‹imasiḥin›.
ġ-uwssan-an a-ġ-d-uškan kra n-mddn zġ-urušalim s-anṭakiyya, ar-ttinin iwaliwn nna-yasn-imala rbbi.
inkr yan gisn ism-ns agabus, iguwwd-t rruḥ lqudus yini-asn: «yan kra ra-yili-uġni išqan ġ-ddunit kullutt.» (ijra-nnit ġmkan ġ-uwssan n-ugllid kludyus.)
mšaškan-d imḥḍarn f-ad-aznn kra l-lmɛawnt i-aytmatn ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya, ifk kud yan gisn ġunšk lli-mi-iẓḍar.
skrn ġmkan, azn-tt i-imġarn ġ-urušalim f-ufus n-barnaba d-šawl.
ġ-uwssan-an a-yumẓ-ugllid hirudus kra zġ-aytmatn n-umnaggar, yiri a-tn-issrfufn.
yamẓ yaɛqub gʷmas n-yuḥanna inġ-t s-taẓẓit.
lliġ iẓra mamnk ad-frḥn ayt-yudaya s-ġayan, izayd yamẓ bṭrus ula nttan ġ-uwssan l-lɛid n-urh̬ṣiṣ.
ig-t-in ġ-lḥbs, ar-ti-tgabaln kkuẓṭ rrbayɛ n-iɛskrin, ilin kkuẓ ġ-kraygatt rrbɛt. yiri hirudus a-fllas-yut lḥukm ġ-lgddam n-kullu mddn tigira l-lɛid n-usurf.
iqama bṭrus ġ-lḥbs, imma ayt-umnaggar ar-tẓallan ar-bahra-fllas-tḍalabn rbbi.
iḍ lli-izwarn ass lli-ġ-ra-t-in-issḥaḍr hirudus ġ-lgddam n-mddn, iṭṭas bṭrus ġ-gr sin iɛskrin, iqqn s-snat ssnasl. ilin ingabaln yaḍni ġwin tiḍaf ġ-imi l-lḥbs,
s-ibidd yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi ġ-tḥanut lli-ġ-illa bṭrus. tssmrġa s-tifawt itjhhdn. issmass-t lmalak zġ-tġruṭṭ-ns issfaq-t-id yini-as: «nkr ġil ġil,» s-ḍrnt ssnasl zġ-ifassn-ns.
yini-as lmalak: «bkis tqqnt turẓiyin-nnk.» inkr bṭrus iskr mayan. yini-as lmalak: «ssmun aslham-nnk tḍfurt-iyi.»
iḍfur-t bṭrus iffuġ zġ-tḥanut. ur-issin kullu mayn iskar lmalak izd ṣṣaḥt a-iga. iġal izd ġir kra n-twargit ayan.
zrin f-ingabaln zwarnin, zrin f-wis sin, lkmn tiflut n-uwzzal lli-iqaman ad-ffuġn s-tmdint. trẓm-tflut i-ih̬f-ns, ffuġn. zrin-in tasukt-an, s-fllas-yitti lmalak ifl-t ġin.
ġakudan a-ifhm bṭrus mad-as-ijran yini: «ssnġ ġilad izd s-ṣṣaḥt yuzn-d sidi rbbi lmalak-ns a-yyi-d-ifukku zġ-ufus n-hirudus ula zġ-kullu mad-ran mddn-an n-ayt-yudaya a-t-flla-zzrin.»
lliġ ifaq bṭrus i-mad-as-ijran, iftu s-tgmmi n-maryam innas n-yuḥanna lli-mi-ttinin marqus. llan ġin mddn ggutnin munn-d kullu ar-tẓallan ar-tḍalabn rbbi.
issḍuqqr bṭrus ġ-imi n-brra. tašk-id yat-th̬ddamt ism-ns ruda, baš a-tẓr ma-issḍuqqrn.
ġir tukʷz awal n-bṭrus tfrḥ bahra aylliġ tettu imi is-iqqn, twrri s-tizzla s-ugʷns tini-asn: «hati bṭrus ayd ibiddn ġ-imi.»
rarn-as-d: «is-tffuġt ih̬f-nnm?» tini-asn-daġ: «bṭrus a-iga.» rarn-as: «uhu, ḥaqqan lmalak-ns kayan.»
sul iqama bṭrus ġ-imi ar-issḍuqqur. rẓmn-as afn-t-in bṭrus a-iga, iḍr-asn lɛjb.
yall afus-ns a-tn-issfssa, yini-asn ilmma f-mamnk a-t-id-issufġ siditnnġ zġ-lḥbs. yuṣṣa-tn: «iniyat kullu mayad i-yaɛqub d-aytmatn.» ifl-tn ġakudan, iddu s-mani yaḍni.
lliġ ifaw lḥal, duhdun ingabaln l-lḥbs bahra, ar-ssmqsan i-ngratsn: «ma-iga ġayad? mani ikka bṭrus?»
yazn hirudus ma-srs-isiggiln, walaynni ur-t-ufin. isqsa ingabaln bahra, issufġ-tn ilmma a-tn-nġn. iffuġ hirudus tamazirt n-yudaya iddu s-qayṣriyya igawr ġin.

ġ-uwssan-an iẓi hirudus d-imzdġn n-ṣur d-ṣayda. aškin-d ayt-tmdinin-an s-yan-wawal, irin ad-dids-sawln, ašku iqqan-tn-d ad-awin mad-šttan zġ-tmazirt n-ugllid. mšaškan-d zwar d-lwazir ism-ns blastus, baš ad-ḍalbn zġ-hirudus sslamt.
lliġ ilkm-wass lli-ġ-ra-tn-iẓr, ilsa hirudus aslham n-tgldit-ns, iskiws ġ-lkursi l-lḥukm isawl i-mddn-an.
alln ntni awal-nsn inin: «awal n-yan-ilah ayad, urd awal n-bnadm.»
ġakudan a-t-id-yut yal-lmalak n-sidi rbbi s-twukka ar-t-tštta ġ-ugʷns-ns aylliġ immut, ašku yumẓ lmjd lli-igan win rbbi.
ar-bahra-itzayad-wawal n-rbbi ġ-uwssan-an, iggut ma-srs-isflidn.
imma barnaba d-šawl, lliġ sslkmn lamant-nsn s-urušalim, wrrin s-anṭakiyya. awin didsn yuḥanna lli-mi-ttinin marqus.

llan kra n-mddn ġ-umnaggar n-aytmatn ġ-anṭakiyya, ar-ttinin iwaliwn nna-yasn-imala rbbi ar-sslmadn. illa barnaba d-simɛan lli-mi-ttinin ‹asggan›, yili lukyus gu-kurini d-manayn lli-imqqurn d-ugllid hirudus ġ-yat-tgmmi, yili šawl.
yan-wass aẓumn ar-tɛbadn siditnnġ, s-asn-inna rruḥ lqudus: «fkat-iyi-d barnaba d-šawl ad-qasan kra n-twuri, ġriġ-asn srs.»
zaydn ilmma ġ-uẓum d-tẓallit, srsn fllasn ifassn-nsn safḍn-tn.
ddun ntni ġmklli-asn-imla rruḥ lqudus s-lmrsa n-salukiyya, ssudun ġ-umda s-igzir n-qubrus.
kšmn s-tmdint n-salamis ar-tbrraḥn s-wawal n-rbbi ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit n-ayt-yudaya. iwin didsn yuḥanna lli-mi-ttinin marqus, ar-tn-itɛawan ġ-twuri.
ar-tkkan igzir kullut aylliġ lkmn tamdint n-bafus, afn-in gis yan-usḥḥar gu-yudaya ism-ns baryašuɛ, ar-ittini is-iga nnabi walaynni ar-isskirkis.
nttan ar-itgawar dar lḥakm n-igzir ism-ns sarjyus-bulus. iga lḥakm-an bab l-lɛaql. yazn s-barnaba d-šawl iḍalb-tn ad-d-aškin s-dars, ašku ira a-zgisn-isfld i-wawal n-rbbi.
imma asḥḥar-an, ism-ns alimas s-wawal n-ayt-yunan, inkr srsn yiri a-iḥṣar lḥakm a-ur-yamẓ aġaras l-lmasiḥ.
ġakudan šawl lli-mi-nttini bulus iɛmmr s-rruḥ lqudus, imnad ġ-usḥḥar
yini-as: «wa-yus n-iblis, tgit amḍaḍḍ i-kullu ma-ira rbbi. tɛmmrt s-tkrkas d-tillay ʷh̬šnnin. ar-bdda-tsslullit iġarasn ʷġẓannin n-siditnnġ.
hati illa-fllak-ufus n-siditnnġ. ra-tbukḍt ur-ra-tisfiwt ar azmz yaḍni.» ġakudan a-fllas-iḍr-umdlu d-tillas, ar-itlli s-mad-as-itamẓn afus.
imma lḥakm, lliġ iẓra mayd ijran, itɛjjb bahra. yamn s-mad-as-sslmdn f-siditnnġ.
iffuġ bulus d-usmun-ns zġ-bafus, ssudun ġ-umda s-tmdint n-barga ġ-tmazirt n-bamfiliyya. ibḍu didsn yuḥanna lli-mi-ttinin marqus, iwrri s-urušalim.
zaydn ntni zġ-barga s-tmdint n-anṭakiyya n-bisidiyya. kšmn s-tgmmi n-tẓallit ġ-wass n-usunfu, skiwsn gis.
imġarn n-tgmmi n-tẓallit, tigira n-mad-ġran zġ-ššrɛ n-musa d-warratn l-lanbiya, ġrn-asn: «way-aytmatnnġ, nkrad-d tsawlm iġ-darun kra n-iwaliwn ma-s-a-tssdusm mddn-nnġ.»
inkr bulus yall afus-ns yini-asn: «way-ayt-rbbi d-ibrraniyn lli-tɛbadnin rbbi, sfldat-iyi.
rbbi n-ayt-darnnġ iẓli imzwura-nnġ, issigat-tn bahra ġ-isggʷasn lli-ġ-llan ġ-tmazirt n-miṣr. issufġ-tn-d ilmma zġ-ġin s-ufus-ns itjhhdn.
ibidd didsn kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas ġ-lh̬la.
ihlk ssa n-tglday ġ-tmazirt n-kanɛan, ifk-asn tamazirt-an a-stt-wrtn.
ġmkan a-s-izri ma-itggan kkuẓ id-miyya d-smmus id-mraw (450) n-usggʷas. ifk-asn ilmma imġarn tjhhdnin a-fllasn-tḥkamn ar ussan n-nnabi ṣamwil.
ḍalbn-t ġakudan a-zgisn-iẓli yan ad-asn-ig agllid, iml-asn rbbi šawl yus n-qiš zġ-tqbilt n-bnyamin. izayd nttan ar-fllasn-itḥkam kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas.
issitti-t ilmma rbbi, ig dawd d-ugllid-nsn. nttan a-f-ifka rbbi tugga-ns inna: ‹ufiġ-n ġ-dawd yus n-yassa ma-n-yakmurn s-uwl-inu. ra-iskar kullu mad-riġ.›
imma ġilad, zġ-tasut n-dawd a-zġ-d-ifka rbbi yan yaḍni a-ig anjjam i-ayt-rbbi ġmklli-s-inna ġayd izrin, a-t-igan d-yasuɛ.
lliġ ur-ta-igri yasuɛ ġ-twuri-ns, ikka-ttin yuḥanna amsddam ar-itbrraḥ ar-ittini i-kullu ayt-rbbi ad-fln mad-skarn yʷh̬šn ar-tn-issddam ġ-waman.

lliġ-d-yakmur-uzmz a-ikmml yuḥanna tawuri-ns, isqsa mddn-an: ‹ma-ttinim giġ-t nkki? hati urd nkkin a-igan ġwalli-s-a-ttqlm, walaynni ra-d-yašk tigira-nu. ur-sthllaġ nkki ad-rẓmġ ifalan n-turẓiyin-ns.›
«way-aytma zġ-tasut n-ibrahim d-ibrraniyn lli-tɛbadnin rbbi, nkkʷni kullwaġ a-mi-d-yuzn rbbi awal f-mamnk a-rad-aġ-ijjnjm.
imma imzdġn n-urušalim d-inmġurn-nsn ur-ssinn izd yasuɛ a-igan anjjam lli-s-a-tqln. ur-fhimn iwaliwn l-lanbiya lli-aqran kraygatt ass n-usunfu, walaynni ssuwfan iwaliwn-an lliġ fllas ḥkamn.
wah̬h̬a ur-gis-ufin ma-f-a-t-nqqan, ḍalbn zġ-bilaṭus a-t-inġ.
ġakud lliġ skrn ntni kullu maylli fllas ityaran zġ-isizwar, zzugzn-t zġ-uggjdi, srsn-t-in ġ-umḍḍal.
«imma rbbi hati issnkr-t-id zġ-lmut,
ar-d-itban kigan d-uwssan i-willi dids munnin zġ-jalil s-urušalim. gn ntni inagan, ar-akkan tugga i-ayt-rbbi f-mad-ẓran.
ula nkkʷni nuška-d nawi-awn-d lh̬bar-ad ifulkin, ašku maylli inna rbbi i-imzwura-nnġ f-ma-ra-iskr,
hati iskr-t ġilad ġ-darnnġ nkkʷni lli-igan tarwa-nsn. ašku issnkr-d yasuɛ zġ-lmut ġmklli ityaran ġ-wis sin imurign, inna rbbi: ‹kiyi tgit iwi. babak ad-giġ ġassad.›
ityara ula f-mamnk a-ra-t-id-issnkr zġ-lmut a-ur-sar-trkm ddat-ns, yini: ‹hati ra-kʷn-barkġ s-lbarakat ṣfanin zganin lli-f-nniġ i-dawd.›
yini-daġ ġ-warra yaḍni: ‹ur-ra-tadjt amẓlay-nnk a-irkm ġ-umḍḍal.›
nssn dawd ġ-uwssan-ns is-iskr ma-ira rbbi, immt ilmma ityawmḍal ġ-gr imzwura-ns, trkm ddat-ns.
imma ġwad-d-issnkr rbbi, ur-t-yudji a-irkm.

«way-aytma, nra a-tissanm lh̬bar-ad ifulkin. ašku f-ssibt n-ġwad-d-inkrn a-s-yujad rbbi a-fllawn-issitti ddnub-nnun. kullu wanna srs yumnn, ra-t-issġus zġ-kullu ġaylli mi ur-iẓḍar ššrɛ n-musa a-t-zgis-issġus.
imma ġilad, rarat lɛaql-nnun ad-awn-ur-ijru ġmklli nnan lanbiya:
‹ẓrat a-iṭnnaẓn, ar-ttɛjjabm tthlkm. ašku rad-skrġ kra ihiyyan ġ-uwssan-nnun. iġ-illa mad-awn-fllas-innan, ur-ra-ti-tamnm.›»
iffuġ ilmma bulus d-barnaba zġ-tgmmi n-tẓallit. ḍalbn-tn mddn a-n-wrrin imal ass-an n-usunfu ad-asn-sawln s-uggʷar f-tġawsiwin-ad.
lliġ kullu ffuġn, iggut gisn ma-imunn d-bulus d-barnaba zġ-ayt-yudaya d-ibrraniyn lli-umẓnin aġaras n-ayt-rbbi. isawl srsn bulus d-barnaba, zzɛamn-tn ad-zgan ġ-lbaraka n-rbbi.
imal ass-an n-usunfu munn-d ayt-tmdint kullutn, irin ad-sfldn i-wawal n-rbbi.
imma ayt-yudaya lli-zdġnin ġin, lliġ ẓran mddn-an ggutnin, asin tanuwwašt f-irqqasn, ẓin d-bulus f-wawal-ns rgmn-t.

irar-asn ilmma bulus d-barnaba s-zzɛamt inin-asn: «niwi-awn-d awal n-rbbi ġmklli-aġ-d-iqqann baš a-tzwurm kunni. imma ġilad ur-ti-trim, tgm ih̬fawn-nnun d-willi ur-isthllan ad-kšmn s-tudrt idumn. ra-kʷn-nfl ġilad nawi-tt ġ-ibrraniyn,
ašku ġmkad a-s-aġ-yuṣṣa sidi rbbi. inna: ‹giġ-k d-tifawt i-ayt-tmizar aggugnin, a-tjjnjmt mddn ar ttmi n-wakal.›»
lliġ sfldn ibrraniyn i-mayad, frḥn bahra alġn awal n-sidi rbbi. wrrin amnn s-yasuɛ kullu willi iẓli rbbi ad-kšmn s-tudrt idumn.
sfldn mddn i-lh̬bar n-siditnnġ ġ-kullu tamazirt-an.
imma ayt-yudaya sshiyysn timġarin tibrraniyin ist-tgʷmma mqqurnin lli-tɛbadnin rbbi d-uwdmawn mqqurnin n-tmdint-an, aylliġ nkrn mddn ggutnin ar-ssrfufunn bulus d-barnaba ssmsrn-tn zġ-tmazirt-an.
issus fllasn bulus d-barnaba agdrur n-iḍarn-nsn ad-asn-ig tamatart, ftun s-tmdint n-iquniyya.
imma imḥḍarn lli-fln ġ-anṭakiyya, ɛmmrn ntni s-lfrḥ ula s-rruḥ lqudus.
ikšm bulus d-barnaba s-tgmmi n-tẓallit n-ayt-yudaya ġ-iquniyya ġmklli skarn ġ-tmdinin yaḍni, sawln i-mddn aylliġ iwrri iggut ma-yumnn s-yasuɛ, gan zġ-ayt-yudaya ula ibrraniyn.
imma ayt-yudaya lli-ur-rinin ad-amnn, nkrn ar-sshiyyasn ibrraniyn baš ad-asin tanuwwašt f-aytmatn.

iqama ġin bulus d-barnaba kigan d-uwssan, ar-sawaln f-siditnnġ s-zzɛamt. ifk-asn siditnnġ taḥkimt ad-skarn lmɛjizat d-tmitar tjhhdnin ġ-lgddam n-mddn-an, baš ad-issann izd lḥqq a-iga-wawal l-lbaraka lli-s-a-tbrraḥn.
ayt-tmdint-an bḍan f-sin. kra ibidd d-ayt-yudaya, kra ibidd d-irqqasn.
mšawarn ilmma kra n-mddn zġ-ibrraniyn d-ayt-yudaya d-imġarn-nsn, skrn f-ad-ssrfufnn bulus d-barnaba, irin a-tn-kkatn s-iẓran nġn-tn.
imma ntni sfldn f-ġaylli fllasn nuwwan, rwln s-tmdinin n-listra d-darba ġ-tmazirt n-likuniyya ula s-tsgiw yaḍni n-tmazirt-an,
ar-ġin-tbrraḥn s-lh̬bar ifulkin.
illa yan-urgaz ġ-listra, kušmn-as iḍarn zġ-lliġ ilul, ur-jju-ifti.
iskiws ar-isflid i-maylli ittini bulus i-mddn. issmaqql gis bulus, iẓr-t yumn aylliġ iẓḍar a-ijji.
yini-as s-wawal itjhhdn: «nkr-d, tbiddt f-iḍarn-nnk,» s-yukʷi ibidd f-iḍarn-ns iftu.
lliġ ẓran mddn ma-iskr bulus, alln awal-nsn inin s-wawal n-ayt-likuniyya: «hati gguzn-d ilahat-nnġ s-darnnġ, wrrin s-ssift n-bnadm.»
ġaln is-iga barnaba ‹zafs›, ig bulus ‹harmas› ašku nttan a-isawaln s-uggʷar.

tlla-tgmmi n-‹zafs› ġ-brra n-tmdint. yašk-id-unmġur n-willi tɛbadnin ilah-an, yawi-d izgarn s-imi n-tmdint, agʷln-asn taggʷatin n-ijddign. yiri nttan ula kullu wiyyaḍ a-n-srsn tiġrsiw ġ-lgddam n-barnaba d-bulus ar-tn-tɛbadn.
lliġ sfldn irqqasn i-mayan, bbin timlsa-nsn azzln s-wammas-nsn inin-asn s-jjhd:

«mayd ra-tnawlm? hati bnadm ka-nga zund kunni. nuška-d nawi-awn-d lh̬bar ifulkin baš a-tflm tiġawsiwin-ad h̬wanin lli-tskarm, twrrim tissanm rbbi lli-iddrn. nttan a-iskrn ignwan d-wakal d-imdwan ula kullu ma-gisn-illan.
kullu mayd izrin yudja mddn ġ-kraygatt tamazirt ad-zaydn ġ-uġaras nna-ran.
walaynni ur-kʷn-ifil bla tamatart n-is-illa nttan, ašku imla-yawn-d mnšk a-bahra-ifulki. ar-awn-d-yakka anẓar zġ-ignwan ula tamgra ġ-uzmz-ns. ar-iššbaɛ adis-nnun s-umššu iɛmmr ul-nnun s-lfrḥ.»
ġmkad a-inna barnaba d-bulus, walaynni bḥra ur-ḥṣarn mddn-an kullutn ad-ur-ġrsn ġ-lgddam-nsn.
aškin-d ilmma kra n-ayt-yudaya zġ-anṭakiyya n-bisidiyya d-iquniyya. sshiyysn mddn-an ggutnin, aylliġ nkrn ar-kkatn bulus s-iẓran. zukrn-t s-brra n-tmdint, ġaln is-immut.
munn-d ilmma imḥḍarn lullin-as, s-inkr bulus iwrri s-tmdint. ndid azkka iffuġ nttan d-barnaba ddun s-tmdint n-darba.
ar-itbrraḥ bulus d-barnaba s-lh̬bar ifulkin ġ-darba, aylliġ iggut ma-iwrrin gan imḥḍarn i-lmasiḥ. wrrin ilmma ntni s-tmdinin n-listra d-iquniyya d-anṭakiyya n-bisidiyya,
ar-ssdusn ulawn n-imḥḍarn ar-tn-zzɛamn ad-zgan ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ, ar-asn-ttinin: «s-trfufnt iggutn a-s-d-iqqan a-nkšm s-tgldit n-rbbi.»
isti bulus d-barnaba ġ-kraygatt amnaggar mad-asn-itggan imġarn. ar-tẓallan ar-taẓumn ar-tn-faln ġ-ufus n-siditnnġ lli-s-umnn.
zrin zġ-tmazirt n-bisidiyya s-tmazirt n-bamfiliyya.
ar-tbrraḥn s-wawal n-rbbi ġ-tmdint n-barga, zaydn ilmma s-lmrsa n-attaliyya.
amẓn anaw ssudun ġ-umda aylliġ ruḥn anṭakiyya. tamdint-an a-zġ-tn-safḍn aytmatn ġ-isizwar lliġ-tn-fkan ġ-ufus n-rbbi a-ibark ġ-twuri-nsn. ġmkan a-s-kmmln tawuri-an.
lliġ kšmn s-anṭakiyya, ssmunn-d ayt-umnaggar. inin-asn f-kullu ma-srsn-iskr rbbi, ula mamnk a-irẓm imi i-ayt-tmizar yaḍni ad-amẓn aġaras l-lmasiḥ.
qaman d-imḥḍarn n-ġin kra n-iyrn.
aškin-d kra n-mddn zġ-tmazirt n-yudaya s-anṭakiyya, bdun ar-sslmadn aytmatn ar-ttinin: «iġ-ur-tẓẓullim i-ddat-nnun ġmklli ittini ššrɛ n-musa, ur-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tnjmm.»
iẓi didsn bulus d-barnaba f-wawal-ad ar-didsn-tmjaḥadn, aylliġ skrn aytmatn n-umnaggar f-ad-aznn bulus d-barnaba d-kra ġ-wiyyaḍ s-urušalim, baš ad-sqsan irqqasn d-imġarn f-tġawsa-yad.
safḍn-tn ġakudan, zrin ġ-tmizar n-finiqiyya d-samira, awin lh̬bar i-ayt-tmizar-an f-mamnk ad-umẓn ibrraniyn aġaras l-lmasiḥ. frḥn aytmatn kullutn lliġ sfldn i-lh̬bar-ad.
lliġ ruḥn urušalim ssmrḥban srsn ayt-umnaggar d-irqqasn d-imġarn. yini-asn bulus d-barnaba f-kullu ma-srsn-iskr rbbi.
walaynni nkrn kra n-imumnn l-lmdhb n-ifarisin inin-asn: «iqqan-kʷn-d a-tuṣṣam ibrraniyn ad-ẓẓalln i-ddat-nsn ar-skarn s-ššrɛ n-musa.»
mnaggarn ilmma irqqasn d-imġarn baš ad-mšawarn f-tġawsa-yad.
yigat-wawal aylliġ inkr bṭrus yini-asn: «way-aytma, tssnm ġ-uwssan zwarnin isti-yyi rbbi zġ-gigun baš ad-sfldn ibrraniyn f-imi-nu i-lh̬bar ifulkin amnn srs.
rbbi issnn ma-illan ġ-uwl n-kullu mddn, iml-aġ ġakudan is-irḍa f-ibrraniyn, ašku ula ntni ifka-yasn rruḥ lqudus ġmklli-aġ-t-ifka nkkʷni.
ur-tn-ibḍi didnnġ, ašku issġus ulawn-nsn ula ntni lliġ umnn s-yasuɛ.
imma ġilad, mah̬ aylliġ tram a-tẓim d-rbbi, tgm taẓayt f-imḥḍarn-an lli-mi-ur-nẓḍar a-stt-nasi nkkʷni ula imzwura-nnġ?
uhu, numn izd lḥnant n-siditnnġ yasuɛ a-s-nnjm, d-ġmkad a-s-rad-njmn ula ntni.»
fssan aytmatn-an kullutn, sfldn ilmma i-mad-asn-ittini barnaba d-bulus f-lmɛjizat d-tmitar tjhhdnin lli-iskr rbbi f-ufus-nsn ġ-gr ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
lliġ kmmln awal-nsn, inkr yaɛqub yini-asn: «way-aytma sfldat-iyi.
inna-yaġ simɛan f-mamnk ad-aġ-imla rbbi ġ-isizwar is-ira a-iẓli zġ-gr ibrraniyn kra n-mddn ad-gn wins.
ġmkad ad-nnan ula lanbiya ġ-warratn n-rbbi inna:
‹tigira n-mayan rad-d-wrriġ, bnuġ tigmmi ih̬ʷlan n-dawd, bnuġ iġurban-ns lli-ḍrnin. ra-stt-id-ssnkrġ
baš ad-wrrin kullu ayt-tmizar yaḍni ar-siggiln s-sidi rbbi, ula kullu ibrraniyn lli-mi-ġriġ ad-gn winu.
ġmkad a-s-inna sidi rbbi lli-iskarn kullu mayad, ityawssan dars zġ-isizwar.›»
izayd yaɛqub yini-asn: «f-mayad a-f-rad-iniġ nkki: ra-yaf a-ur-ntšqu d-ayt-tmizar yaḍni lli-umẓnin aġaras n-rbbi,
walaynni ad-asn-nazn yat-tbrat nini-asn ad-tanfn i-irkan l-laṣnam ula lfsad, ula-da-šttan tifiyi n-ma-iqajjin ula idammn.
ašku myarn mddn ġ-kraygatt tamdint a-fllasn-aqran ššrɛ n-musa ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit, ar-tn-tuṣṣan a-srs-skarn, kraygatt ass n-usunfu zġ-tasut n-tasutin sul s-ġilad.»

mšaškan-d ilmma irqqasn d-imġarn d-ayt-umnaggar kullutn, skrn f-ad-stin kra n-mddn-nsn ad-munn d-bulus d-barnaba s-anṭakiyya. stin yahuda lli-mi-ttinin barsaba, nttan d-sila. ntni, ar-tn-tuqqarn aytmatn kullutn.
aznn didsn yat-tbrat, tyaran gis iwaliwn-ad: «zġ-aytmatun irqqasn ula imġarn, i-aytmatnnġ n-tmizar yaḍni ġ-anṭakiyya d-suriyya d-kilikiyya. ad-awn-tili sslamt.
nsfld f-kra n-mddn uškan-in zġ-darnnġ inin-awn kra-s-awn-t-ssṭiyyrn aylliġ tusim taġuft f-iwaliwn-nsn. walaynni urd nkkʷni a-tn-in-yuznn.
mayan a-f-d-nmnaggar ġilad, nmšaška-d kullwaġ a-nsti kra n-mddn nazn-tn-in s-darun, a-n-munn d-aytmatnnġ ɛzzanin barnaba d-bulus
lli-fkanin ih̬fawn-nsn f-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ġmkad a-f-n-nuzn yahuda d-sila ad-awn-inin f-kullu mayd-awn-in-nura.
ašku imla-yaġ-d rruḥ lqudus ula ih̬f-nnġ, a-ur-fllawn-ng kra n-taẓayt abla tiġawsiwin-ad hiyyanin:
a-ur-tšttam ma-ityawġrasn i-laṣnam ula idammn ula tifiyi n-ma-iqajjin, taggugm zġ-lfsad. afulki a-rad-awn-yili, iġ-a-ttanfm i-tġawsiwin-ad. a-kʷn-iɛawn rbbi.»
safḍn-tn ilmma s-anṭakiyya. lliġ-n-lkmn tamdint-an, ssmunn-d ayt-umnaggar kullutn fkn-asn tabrat.
lliġ-tt-ġran ntni, frḥn s-iwaliwn n-irqqasn lli-s-tn-zzɛamn.
isawl ilmma yahuda d-sila s-aytmatn-an, ar-tn-zzɛamn ar-tn-ssdusn, ašku gan ula ntni zġ-willi ittinin iwaliwn nna-yasn-imala rbbi.
tigira n-ma-darsn-gawrn kra n-uwssan, safḍn-tn aytmatn s-sslamt, wrrin s-dar ġwilli-tn-uznnin.
imma bulus d-barnaba qaman ġ-anṭakiyya, ar-sslmadn ar-tbrraḥn s-wawal n-siditnnġ ntni d-wiyyaḍ ggutnin.
yan-wass isawl bulus s-barnaba yini-as: «a-nwrri s-dar aytmatn ġ-tmdinin kullutnt lli-ġ-nbrrḥ s-wawal n-siditnnġ, a-nẓr mamnk ad-gan.»
ira barnaba ad-didsn-awin yuḥanna lli-mi-ttinin marqus.
imma bulus inna-yas: «ur-išwi a-didnnġ-nawi ġwalli-aġ-n-ifln tawala-lli ġ-tmazirt n-bamfiliyya, ur-didnnġ-ikmmil tawuri.»
ur-ẓḍarn ad-d-mšaškan f-tġawsa-yad, bḍun ifl yan yan. barnaba yiwi dids marqus, issudu ġ-umda s-igzir n-qubrus.
imma bulus isti sila a-ig asmun-ns. fkn-tn ilmma aytmatn ġ-ufus n-siditnnġ a-gisn-ibark, ffuġn zġ-ġin.
ar-tkkan tamazirt n-suriyya ula kilikiyya ar-ssdusn imnaggarn n-aytmatn.
ar-itmuddu bulus aylliġ izri zġ-tmdint n-darba iruḥ tamdint n-listra. yili ġin yan-umḥḍar l-lmasiḥ ism-ns timutaws, ig yus n-yat-tmumnt ullt-yudaya imma babas iga gu-yunan.
aytmatn ġ-listra ula ġ-iquniyya ar-kullu-ttinin f-timutaws is-iga amumn ifulkin.
yiri bulus a-t-dids-yawi. iẓẓall-as ġakudan i-ddat-ns, ašku ayt-yudaya ġ-tmdint-an ssnn is-iga babas abrrani.
ddun ilmma ar-tkkan timdinin, ar-tawin lh̬bar i-aytmatn f-maylli-f-d-mšaškan irqqasn d-imġarn ġ-urušalim, ar-tn-tuṣṣan ad-skarn s-iwaliwn-an.
ġmkad a-s-a-tdusn imnaggarn n-aytmatn ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ, ar-ttigatn ass f-wass.
ur-tn-yudji rruḥ lqudus ad-tbrraḥn s-wawal n-rbbi ġ-tmazirt n-asiyya. zaydn ġakudan ar-tkkan tamazirt n-frijiyya ula galaṭiyya.
lliġ lkmn tama n-misiyya irin ad-kšmn s-tmazirt n-bitiniyya, walaynni ur-tn-yudji rruḥ n-yasuɛ.
zrin ġakudan f-misiyya, ddun s-lmrsa n-truwwas.
ġ-iḍ-an a-iwarga bulus yan-urgaz gu-makiduniyya ibidd iḍalb-t bahra yini-as: «ašk-id s-makiduniyya tɛawnt-aġ.»
lliġ iẓra bulus tawargit-an, nskr f-a-nddu ġakudan s-tmazirt n-makiduniyya, ašku nssn is-aġ-n-iġra rbbi ġmkan ad-asn-nawi lh̬bar ifulkin.
namẓ anaw nbbi zġ-truwwas s-igzir n-samutraki. ndid azkka nlkm lmrsa n-nyabulis.
namẓ ġin aġaras s-filibbi. tga nttat tamdint imqqurn ġ-tsga-yan n-makiduniyya, bnan-tt rruman. ngawr ġin kra n-uwssan.
ġ-wass n-usunfu nffuġ s-brra n-tmdint nddu s-tama n-wasif, ašku nenna d-ih̬f-nnġ ra-yili ġin kra n-mani ġ-a-tmunun ayt-yudaya ar-gis-tẓallan. nskiws ar-nsawal d-tmġarin lli-n-munnin ġin.
tili gisnt yat-tmġart ism-ns lidiyya, tga ullt-tayatira ar-tzznza ttub aẓggʷaġ. tga zġ-tilli tɛbadnin rbbi. ih̬dm siditnnġ ġ-uwl-ns ġ-tasaɛt-an aylliġ tumn s-kullu maylli inna bulus.
nssddm-tt ilmma ġ-waman nttat d-ayt-tgmmi-ns. tḍalb zġ-ginnġ: «iġ-iyi-tgam d-tad yumnn s-siditnnġ, aškad-d tgguzm ġ-tgmmi-nu.» tamẓ ginnġ.

yan-wass nffuġ niri adġar n-tẓallit, s-nmnaggar yat-tfruh̬t tga tismgt. illa gis yal-ljnn lli-dar taḥkimt ad-as-imala ma-ra-ijru. id-bab-ns ar-fllas-tamẓn iqaridn ggutnin zġ-mddn lli-ranin ad-issann ma-rad-asn-yili.
imma nttat, tḍfar bulus d-usmun-ns ar-ttġuwwat ar-fllannġ-ttini: «mddn-ad gan ih̬ddamn n-rbbi amattuy. ar-awn-tbrraḥn f-mamnk a-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tnjmm.»
ar-bdda-tskar ġmkan kigan d-uwssan. ar yan-wass ṭiyyr-as i-bulus bahra, igrawl gis yamr ljnn: «s-ism n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ffuġ zġ-gis.» iffuġ ljnn ġakudan.
lliġ ẓran id-bab n-tsmgt is-ur-sul-ra-fllas-tamẓn yat, ġwin bulus d-sila zukrn-tn s-ssuq s-dar ġwilli tḥkamnin.
dḥin-tn-in s-lgddam n-imġarn l-lmḥkama n-rruman inin: «ġwid gan ayt-yudaya, ssmrwin tamdint-nnġ bahra.
ar-tbrraḥn f-kra n-tnbaḍin, ur-fllannġ-iḥlla a-tnt-nqbl ula-da-srsnt-nskar nkkʷni n-ayt-ruma.»
bzgn fllasn ġwilli-asn-sutlnin. nkrn imġarn l-lmḥkama uṣṣan imh̬zniyn ad-fllasn-bbin timlsa ssġuršn-tn.
lliġ-tn-utn bahra, grn-tn-in ġ-lḥbs, uṣṣan angabal l-lḥbs a-issdus i-imi.
lliġ isfld-ungabal i-luṣit-ad, ig-tn-in ġ-tḥanut n-wallaġ, iqqn iḍarn-nsn ġ-gr-tfrsa ẓẓaynin.
ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-iḍ-an ar-itẓalla bulus d-sila ar-ttirirn ar-talġn rbbi. ar-asn-sflidn iḥbbasn yaḍni.
s-immussa-wakal s-jjhd, ndudin iġurban zġ-llsas, rẓmn imawn l-lḥbs kullutn, fsint ssnasl f-kraygatt yan.
ittfaq-d-ungabal, iẓr imawn l-lḥbs rẓmn, iġal is-rwln iḥbbasn. ildi-d taẓẓit a-inġ ih̬f-ns.
iġr-as bulus s-jjhd yini-as: «ad-ur-thlkt ih̬f-nnk. hati nlla kullwaġ.»
iġr-ungabal i-mad-as-d-itawin tifawt, yazzl s-darsn iḍr-n f-ifaddn-ns ġ-lgddam n-bulus d-sila, ar-srs-tkkat tawda.
yawi-tn ilmma s-brra l-lḥbs yini-asn: «wa-id-sidi, ma-yyi-d-iqqann a-t-skrġ baš ad-njmġ?»
inin-as: «amn s-siditnnġ yasuɛ tnjmt kiyi d-ayt-tgmmi-nnk.»
sawln srs s-wawal n-siditnnġ nttan d-ayt-tgmmi-ns kullutn.
yawi-tn ġ-tasaɛt-an ġ-iyḍ, isird-asn tiggas-nsn. ssddmn-t ilmma ġ-waman, ntta d-ayt-tgmmi-ns kullutn.
išškšm-tn s-tgmmi isrs-asn-in mad-šttan, ifrḥ bahra ntta d-kullu ayt-tgmmi-ns ašku wrrin umnn s-rbbi.
zikk ṣbaḥ nkrn imġarn l-lmḥkama n-rruman, aznn kra n-imh̬zniyn s-lḥbs inin: «rẓmat i-irgazn-an.»
yašk-id-ungabal s-dar bulus yini-as: «ha-imġarn uznn-d awal ad-awn-rẓmn. ffuġat ġilad, tddum s-sslamt.»

imma bulus isawl s-imh̬zniyn yini-asn: «ha-ntni ssġuršn-aġ ġ-lgddam n-kullu mddn wah̬h̬a ur-ginnġ-ufin kra iffuġn lqanun. dḥin-aġ-d s-lḥbs, d-nkkʷni nga zġ-willi ṭṭafnin taġamt ġ-ayt-ruma. is-ran ad-aġ-ssufġn ġilad s-tntla? nkkʷni ur-ra-nffuġ. ih̬ṣṣa imġarn-an ad-d-aškin ssufġn-aġ-n.»
ddun imh̬zniyn inin i-imġarn f-mad-nnan. iksaḍn ntni lliġ sfldn f-bulus d-sila is-darsn lḥqq n-ayt-ruma.
aškin-d ḍalbn zġ-gisn ad-asn-ṣamḥn, awin-tn ilmma s-brra ḍalbn-tn ad-ffuġn tamdint.
ġmkan a-s-ffuġn zġ-lḥbs, ddun ilmma s-tgmmi n-lidiyya. mnaggarn gis d-aytmatn ar-tn-zzɛamn, amẓn ilmma aġaras.
zrin zġ-tmdint n-amfibulis ula abuluniyya, lkmn tamdint n-tasaluniki. tili ġin yat-tgmmi n-tẓallit n-ayt-yudaya.
ikšm srs bulus ġmklli iskar ġ-tmdinin yaḍni. kraḍ-uwssan n-usunfu ar-ġin-isawal d-mddn, ar-asn-imala ma-ityaran ġ-warratn n-rbbi
ar-asn-ittini: «iqqan-d ġwalli igan lmasiḥ a-irfufn bahra, inkr-d ilmma zġ-lmut.» ar-asn-ittini: «yasuɛ lli-f-a-yawn-tbrraḥġ, nttan a-igan lmasiḥ lli-s-a-ttqlm.»
amnn kra n-ayt-yudaya s-maylli-asn-ittini, ntni ula yan-mnnaw zġ-ibrraniyn lli-tɛbadnin rbbi, d-kra n-tmġarin ist-tgʷmma mqqurnin ġ-tmdint-an, wrrin kullu biddn d-bulus d-sila.

imma wiyyaḍ ġ-ayt-yudaya usin fllasn tanuwwašt. awin-d kra n-irgazn ʷh̬šnnin zġ-ssuq, ġrn i-mddn ggutnin ad-didsn-munn, ssduyn-d tamdint kullutt. azzln s-tgmmi n-yasun, ar-siggiln s-bulus d-sila baš a-tn-ssufġn s-wammas n-mddn.
lliġ ur-tn-ufin, zukrn yasun d-kra n-aytmatn yaḍni s-dar imġarn n-tmdint, ar-tġuwwatn ar-ttinin: «ġwilli ssgrawlnin ddunit kullutt, hatni uškan-d ula s-ġid,
išškšm-tn yasun s-tgmmi-ns. ffuġn ntni zġ-lqanun n-qayṣr, ar-ttinin illa yan-ugllid yaḍni ism-ns yasuɛ.»
lliġ sfldn mddn d-imġarn-nsn i-mayad, mrwin bahra.
ḍalbn ilmma fllasn ḍḍmant zġ-yasun d-aytmatn yaḍni, rẓmn-asn.
lliġ-d-ḍrnt tillas, nkrn aytmatn safḍn bulus d-sila s-biriyya. lliġ lkmn tamdint-an, kšmn s-tgmmi n-tẓallit n-ayt-yudaya.

mddn-an n-biriyya, ur-qqurn ih̬fawn-nsn zund ayt-tasaluniki. ar-ttirin ad-sflidn i-wawal n-siditnnġ ar-tt-gis-tawin bahra, ar-siggiln ġ-warratn n-rbbi ass f-wass, baš ad-ẓrn is-yʷġẓan maylli-asn-ittini bulus.
yigat ma-iwrrin yumn zġ-ayt-yudaya ula kra n-tmġarin tibrraniyin ist-tgʷmma mqqurnin d-irgazn ibrraniyn ggutnin.
imma ayt-yudaya ġ-tasaluniki sfldn f-mamnk a-itbrraḥ bulus s-wawal n-rbbi ġ-biriyya. ddun sshiyysn mddn ssduyn ula tamdint-an.
nkrn aytmatn ġakudan, safḍn bulus s-tama n-umda. imma sila d-timutaws qaman ġ-biriyya.
iddu bulus, awin-t imddukkʷal-ns ar tamdint n-atina, fln-t-in ġin wrrin s-biriyya. yuṣṣa-tn bulus ad-inin i-sila d-timutaws a-n-dars-aškin ad-ur-maṭln.
lliġ a-srsn-itql bulus ġ-atina, iẓr tamdint-an tɛmmr s-laṣnam ar-tn-tɛbadn mddn. ṭiyyr-as bahra.
ikšm s-tgmmi n-tẓallit ar-isawal d-ayt-yudaya d-ibrraniyn lli-tɛbadnin rbbi. ar-isawal ula ġ-ssuq ass f-wass d-winna gis llanin.

imnaggar kra n-imslmdn l-lfalsafa, gan ‹ibikuriyn› ula ‹rwaqiyn›. kra gisn inna fllas: «ġwad ijrubbujn, ma-ira a-yini?» inin wiyyaḍ: «irwas is-a-isawal f-kra n-ilahat ar-tn-tɛbadn mddn ġ-tmizar yaḍni.» ġaln ntni is-a-isawal f-sin ilahat ašku ar-yaddr ‹yasuɛ› ula ‹tankra›.
awin-t ilmma s-usgawr n-imġarn n-tmdint-an, iga asgawr lli-mi-ttinin ‹aryus-bagus›. inin i-bulus: «is-trit ad-aġ-tmlt ma-iɛna-ulmmud-ad l-ljdid lli-s-a-ttbrraḥt?
ašku ar-tsawalt f-kra n-tġawsiwin ur-jju-nsfld i-zund ntnti. nra a-nissan ma-tga lmɛna-nsnt.»
ġmkad ad-gan ayt-atina ula kullu willi zdġnin ġ-tmdint-an, ur-a-sslhawn ih̬f-nsn abla ad-sflidn ar-sawaln f-aynna igan taġawsa l-ljdid.
ibidd bulus ġ-wammas n-usgawr yini-asn: «way-ayt-atina, ẓriġ-kʷn ar-bahra-ttuqqarm ilahat mknna gan.

lliġ a-tfjjijġ ġ-tmdint-nnun ar-tmnadġ idġarn lli-ġ-a-ttɛbadm. afġ-n yan ġ-iẓran lli-dar ttẓallam, tyaran gis iwaliwn-ad ‹ilah ur-ityawssann›. han ġwalli ttɛbadm bla-ti-tssnm, nttan a-f-rad-awn-sawlġ.
ašku rbbi lli-iskrn ddunit ula kullu ma-gis-illan, nttan a-igan sidis n-ignna ula win-wakal. ur-a-izddġ ġ-tgʷmma tyawskarnin s-ifassn n-bnadm.
ur-t-ih̬ṣṣa kra nskr nkkʷni, ašku ur-iḥtajja yat. nttan a-yakkan i-kullu mddn tudrt d-unfus ula kraygatt kra.
iskr zġ-tarwa n-yan-urgaz kullu tasutin n-bnadm ad-zdġn ġ-tmizar n-ddunit kullutt. iḥudda-yasn isggʷasn n-tudrt, igli-asn iwtta n-imzdġn-nsn.
iskr-asn ġmkan baš ad-siggiln s-rbbi a-ur-imil mnaggarn dids issann-t. walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, han ntta ur-n-yaggug f-yan ginnġ
ašku ‹nttan a-ġ-nddr nftu nili.› ġmklli nnan kra n-ayt-umarg-nnun: ‹ula nkkʷni nga tarwa-ns.›
«lliġ nga nkkʷni tarwa n-rbbi, illa fllannġ a-ur-nġal is-iga nttan zund kra ityawskarn zġ-uwrġ nġd nnuqrt nġd aẓru s-ifassn ula lɛaql n-bnadm.
ġayd izrin iṣbr rbbi d-willi ur-ssinnin mayan. imma ġilad yumr kullu mddn ġ-kraygatt mani ad-fln kullu mad-skarn yʷh̬šn.
ašku iqṣad yan-wass lli-ġ-ra-yut lḥukm s-lḥqq f-kullu ddunit f-ufus n-yan-urgaz lli-iẓli, iml srs tamatart i-kullu mddn lliġ-t-id-issnkr zġ-lmut.»
lliġ sfldn i-mayd inna bulus f-yan-d-inkrn zġ-lmut, kra gisn ar-iḍṣṣa. imma wiyyaḍ nnan: «ar tawala yaḍni tsawlt-aġ f-tġawsa-yad.»
iffuġ ilmma bulus zġ-darsn.
kra gisn yumn s-ma-s-asn-inna, munn dids. illa gisn yan zġ-imġarn n-usgawr-an ism-ns dyunisyus. tili yat-tmġart ism-ns damaris, ilin kra n-mddn yaḍni.
tigira n-mayan iffuġ bulus zġ-atina iddu s-tmdint n-kurintus.

imnaggar ġin yan-urgaz gu-yudaya ism-ns akila, ig laṣl-ns zġ-tmazirt n-buntus. ikka-d tamazirt n-iṭalya ġ-uwssan-an, ntta d-tmġart-ns briskilla, ašku qayṣr kludyus yumr kullu ayt-yudaya ad-ffuġn tamdint n-ruma. iddu darsn bulus s-tgmmi,
igawr darsn ar-didsn-ith̬dam, ašku yat a-tga-twuri-nsn ntni d-bulus, ar-gnnun ih̬iyyamn.
kraygatt ass n-usunfu ar-ittidu bulus s-tgmmi n-tẓallit, ar-isawal d-ayt-yudaya d-ibrraniyn, ig-n tiqqi-ns a-tn-irar ad-amnn zund ntta.
lliġ-d-ilkm sila d-timutaws zġ-tmazirt n-makiduniyya, afn-in bulus ilha s-tbrraḥt n-wawal n-rbbi, ar-isawal s-ayt-yudaya s-lmɛqul yini-asn: «yasuɛ a-igan lmasiḥ lli-s-a-ttqlm.»
walaynni ẓin dids ayt-yudaya rgmn-t aylliġ fllasn issus timlsa-ns yini-asn: «ddnub-nnun f-ih̬f-nnun. nkki brraġ gigun. hati zġ-ġilad rad-dduġ s-ibrraniyn.»
iffuġ zġ-darsn, ikšm s-tgmmi n-yan-ubrrani ism-ns tityus-yusṭus. iga yan zġ-willi tɛbadnin rbbi, tili-tgmmi-ns ġ-tama n-tgmmi n-tẓallit.

imma krisbus amġar n-tgmmi n-tẓallit, ntta d-ayt-tgmmi-ns kullutn, wrrin umnn s-siditnnġ. ggutn wiyyaḍ ġ-tmdint-an n-kurintus wrrin umnn lliġ sfldn i-mad-asn-ittini bulus. ssddmn-tn ilmma aytmatn ġ-waman.
yan-iyḍ isawl-d siditnnġ s-bulus ġ-twargit yini-as: «ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ. zayd ar-tsawalt d-mddn a-ur-tfssat.
hati lliġ didk, ur-illi ma-ra-k-ilkm s-gar, ašku ggutn mddn-inu ġ-tmdint-ad.»
iqama bulus ġin asggʷas d-mnaṣṣ, ar-asn-isslmad awal n-rbbi.
walaynni ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-iga galyun lḥakm ġ-tmazirt-an n-ah̬aya, nkrn ayt-yudaya kullutn ġwin bulus awin-t s-lmḥkama
inin fllas: «argaz-ad ar-itrara mddn ad-ffuġn zġ-ššrɛ n-musa ar-tɛbadn rbbi s-mamnk yaḍni.»
yiri bulus a-fllasn-irar awal, s-inkr galyun ġakudan yini i-ayt-yudaya: «mrad is-tga-tġawsa-yad tin kra iffuġn lqanun nġd kra l-lbaḍl yʷh̬šnn, rad-awn-sfldġ.
walaynni ur-tgi h̬tad ġir taġawsa n-iwaliwn d-ismawn ula ššrɛ-nnun. zaydat tssnfaṣalm-t kunni i-ngratun. ur-rad-tḥkamġ nkki f-wan tiġawsiwin-ad.»
issmsr-tn zġ-lmḥkama.
ffuġn kullu, ġwin sustanis amġar n-tgmmi n-tẓallit, ar-t-kkatn ġ-tama l-lmḥkama. imma lḥakm galyun ur-tt-akkʷ-gisn-yiwi.

iqama bulus ġ-dar aytmatn ġ-kurintus yan mnnaw-uwssan. lliġ-didsn-imsafaḍ, iddu s-lmrsa n-kanh̬ariyya. ġin a-ġ-issmakkrd agayyu-ns, ig mayan tamatart n-kra-s-iqawl i-rbbi. yamẓ ilmma anaw issudu ġ-umda s-tmazirt n-suriyya, yawi dids akila d-briskilla.
ruḥn tamdint n-afsus, ifl-tn. ikšm nttan s-tgmmi n-tẓallit ar-isawal d-ayt-yudaya.
ḍalbn zġ-gis a-didsn-iqama, walaynni ur-iri a-imaṭl ġin.
imsafaḍ didsn yini-asn: «iġ-ira rbbi rad-d-wrriġ s-darun.» iffuġ afsus issudu ġ-umda,
aylliġ ilkm lmrsa n-qayṣriyya. yamẓ aġaras s-urušalim, insallam d-aytmatn n-umnaggar n-ġin, ikmml ilmma s-anṭakiyya.
iqama gis kra n-uwssan, imuddu ilmma ar-itkka tamazirt n-galaṭiyya ula frijiyya ar-issdus imḥḍarn kullutn.
ġ-uwssan-an a-ġ-d-yuška yan gu-yudaya ism-ns abullus s-afsus. iga laṣl-ns zġ-tmdint n-iskandariyya. ig wad bahra issnn mamnk a-isawal, yissan arratn n-rbbi bahra.
isfld f-ulmmud n-uġaras n-siditnnġ, ar-isawal s-mddn s-zzɛamt iggutn. ar-tn-isslmad f-iskkirn n-yasuɛ d-iwaliwn-ns ġmklli gan, walaynni ur-issin f-udum abla ġwalli-s-a-issddam yuḥanna.
yan-wass ar-isawal s-zzɛamt ġ-tgmmi n-tẓallit, tsfld-as briskilla d-akila. awin-t s-tgmmi, mln-as uggʷar f-uġaras n-rbbi baš a-t-yissan ġmklli iga.

yiri ilmma a-ibbi amda s-tmazirt n-ah̬aya. zzɛamn-t aytmatn a-iskr ġmkan, aran yat-tbrat i-imḥḍarn ġ-ah̬aya, ḍalbn-tn a-t-in-šškšmn s-gratsn. lliġ iruḥ nttan ah̬aya, ar-bahra-itɛawan ġwilli ibark rbbi umnn s-lmasiḥ.
ašku ar-isawal s-ayt-yudaya ġ-lgddam n-kullu mddn, aylliġ ur-ẓḍarn ntni a-fllas-rarn awal. ar-asn-imala zġ-warratn n-rbbi izd yasuɛ a-igan lmasiḥ lli-s-a-tqln.
ġakud lliġ illa abullus ġ-kurintus, izri bulus zġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-tmazirt-an, ilkm tamdint n-afsus. yaf-n ġin kra n-imḥḍarn,
isqsa-tn: «is-awn-d-ityawfka rruḥ lqudus lliġ tumnm?» inin-as: «ur-jju-nsfld is-illa kra n-rruḥ lqudus.»
isqsa-tn ilmma: «ma-iga-udum lli-s-tddmm?» inin-as: «udum lli-s-a-issddam yuḥanna.»
yini-asn bulus: «ikka-ttin yuḥanna ar-issddam ġwilli ranin ad-fln ddnub-nsn wrrin s-rbbi, walaynni isawl-asn f-walli ra-d-yašk tigira-ns, a-t-igan d-yasuɛ. yuṣṣa-tn ad-srs-amnn.»
lliġ sfldn imḥḍarn-an i-mayd-asn-inna bulus, issddm-tn ġ-waman s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ.
isrs fllasn ifassn-ns, s-d-fllasn-igguz rruḥ lqudus, ar-sawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn ar-tbrraḥn s-mad-asn-imala rbbi.
ma-itggan sin d-mraw n-urgaz ad-gan.
kraḍ-iyrn a-ikššm bulus s-tgmmi n-tẓallit ar-isawal d-mddn s-zzɛamt, ig-n tiqqi-ns ad-asn-iml is-yʷġẓan maylli-asn-ittini f-tgldit n-rbbi.

walaynni kra gisn wrrin ssiqarn ih̬f-nsn, ur-rin ad-amnn. ar-rggmn ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ ġ-lgddam n-kullu wiyyaḍ. ġakudan a-iffuġ bulus zġ-darsn, yawi dids imḥḍarn, iwrri s-lmdrst n-tirannus ar-ġin-isawal d-mddn ass f-wass.
ġmkan a-izzri sin isggʷasn, aylliġ sfldn kullu imzdġn n-asiyya i-wawal n-siditnnġ, ayt-yudaya ula ibrraniyn.
ar-iskar rbbi lmɛjizat f-ufus n-bulus, ur-jju-ẓrin mddn zund ntnti.
ar-ttawin išrwiḍn ula tibannkiw zġ-ufus-ns i-imuḍan-nsn, ar-tjjin ar-zgisn-tffuġn ljnun ʷh̬šnnin.
ilin ġin kra n-ayt-yudaya ar-tlullin ar-ssufuġn ljnun. ġaln is-ẓḍarn ad-ssufuġn ljnun s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ, ar-tn-tamrn: «ffuġat s-ism n-yasuɛ lli-s-a-itbrraḥ bulus.»
ġmkan ad-skarn ssa n-aytmatn, tarwa n-yan-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi ism-ns skawa.
walaynni irur-asn ljnn-an: «yasuɛ ssnġ-t, ula bulus ssnġ ma-iga, walaynni ma-tgam kunni?»
yakʷi-n-fllasn-umjnun ar-gisn-ikkat inru-tn kullutn. rwln zġ-tgmmi, tyaggasn bbint-tmlsa-nsn.
sfldn kullu imzdġn n-afsus f-ma-ijran, ayt-yudaya ula ibrraniyn. wrrin iksaḍn kullutn, uqqrn ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ bahra.
imma ġwilli umnnin, iggut gisn ma-d-yuškan ar-tqrran s-iskkirn ʷh̬šnnin lli-sttin-kkan ar-tn-skarn.
kigan d-isḥḥarn a-d-issmunn arratn-nsn jdrn-tn ġ-lgddam n-mddn. lliġ ḥasbn atig n-warratn-an, afn-in smmus id-mraw n-id-walf (50.000) n-uqarid n-nnuqrt.
ġmkan a-s-a-itzayad-wawal n-siditnnġ s-jjhd, iwrri ityawssan ġ-kraygatt mani.
tigira n-mayan iswangm bulus, iml-as rruḥ lqudus is-t-id-iqqan a-izri zġ-makiduniyya d-ah̬aya s-urušalim. inna: «tigira n-mad-kkiġ ġin, iqqan-iyi-d ad-ẓrġ ula tamdint n-ruma.»
yazn ilmma sin imɛawann-ns timutaws d-arastus a-t-zwurn s-makiduniyya, imma ntta sul-n-iqama yan kra ġ-asiyya.
walaynni ġ-uwssan-an tnkr lfrtunt iggutn f-ssibt n-uġaras l-lmasiḥ.
illa ġin yan-usiyyah̬ ism-ns dimitryus ar-itɛdal tigʷmma mẓẓinin zġ-nnuqrt zund tigmmi lli-ġ-a-tɛbadn ilaha ‹arṭamis›. ar-tamẓn isiyyah̬n ma-iggutn f-twuri-an.
issmun-tn-d kullu dimitryus yini-asn: «wa-irgazn, tssnm is-a-ntamẓ lh̬ir f-twuri-ad-nnġ.
walaynni tsfldm i-ġwan mi ttinin bulus tẓrm ġaylli iskar, ar-ittini ilahat lli-skrn ifassn n-bnadm urd ilahat ad-gan. hati irur mddn ggutnin ijlu-tn ġid ġ-afsus ula ġ-kullu tamazirt n-asiyya.
urd ġir tawuri-nnġ a-ra-ih̬sr, walaynni rad-wrrin mddn ar-rggmn ula ġ-tgmmi n-ilaha imqqurn arṭamis, inin is-ur-tgi yat h̬talli kullu tɛbadn mddn ġ-asiyya ula ddunit kullutt.»
lliġ sfldn i-iwaliwn-ad nkrn-d gisn iriyn ar-ssġuyyun ar-ttinin: «tamqqurt a-tga arṭamis n-ayt-afsus.»
duyn bahra, aylliġ tqrbl-tmdint kullutt. nkrn mddn ggutnin ġwin sin ayt-makiduniyya zġ-usmun n-bulus, ismawn-nsn gayus d-aristarh̬us, zukrn-tn s-usays lli-ġ-a-tmunun ayt-tmdint-an.
bulus ira a-iftu s-wammas n-mddn-an a-srsn-isawl, walaynni ur-t-udjin aytmatn.
kra n-imddukkʷal n-bulus, gan udmawn mqqurnin n-tmazirt-an, aznn-as mad-as-ittinin: «a-ur-tssbayynt ih̬f-nnk ġ-usays n-tmdint.»
mrwin mddn ar-ssġuyyun, kud yan d-ma-ittini. iggut gisn ma-ur-issinn ma-f-n-munn.
inkr kra gisn ġakudan inin izd yan-urgaz iskandr ad-dar awal, dḥin-t-in ayt-yudaya s-lgddam n-mddn a-srsn-isawl. yall afus-ns a-tn-issfssa yiri ad-asn-iml is-urd ayt-yudaya a-issnkrn uduy.
walaynni lliġ ẓran izd gu-yudaya a-iga, nkrn-daġ ar-ssġuyyun ar-ttinin: «tamqqurt a-tga arṭamis n-ayt-afsus.» zaydn snat tasaɛin ad-ssġuyyun s-wawal-an.
qaman ġmkan aylliġ inkr-uktatbi l-lmḥkama. issfssa-tn yini-asn: «way-ayt-afsus. is-illa ma-ur-issinn tamdint n-afsus a-igabln tigmmi n-arṭamis tamqqurt d-uẓru n-ṣṣurt-ns lli-d-iḍrn zġ-ignna?
kullu ddunit tssn tiġawsiwin-ad. ur-iẓḍar yan ad-asnt-yanf. imma ġilad illa fllawn a-tfssam, a-ur-tskrm kra f-a-kʷn-ttigʷraẓ.
ha-kunni tiwim-d irgazn-ad s-ġid wah̬h̬a ur-ukirn tigʷmma lli-ġ-a-ntɛbad ula-da-rggmn ġ-ilaha-nnġ.
iġ-ira dimitryus ula imddukkʷal-ns ad-ṣrḍn i-kra n-yan, illa fllasn ad-ddun s-lmḥkama. ašku skrn imġarn l-lmḥkama ussan a-gisn-sflidn i-mddn. ra-tiẓḍarm a-n-darsn-tmṣaraḍm,
nġd iġ-tram kra yaḍni, ih̬ṣṣa-kʷn a-ti-tssnfaṣalm i-ngratun ġ-dar imġarn n-tmdint.

walaynni ġayd darnnġ ijran ġassad, illa gis ma-f-a-ntiksaḍ, a-ur-srnnġ-aštkkan lḥukkam n-rruman, inin izd ntni a-f-inkr-uduy-ad. ur-darnnġ ma-nttini f-imrwayn-ad, ašku ur-nẓḍar a-nini ma-f-d-munn mddn-ad ggutnin.»
lliġ inna mayad, issmsr-tn s-tgʷmma-nsn.
lliġ thnna-tmdint, yazn bulus ma-d-issmunun imḥḍarn, isawl srsn izzɛam-tn. imsafaḍ didsn, yamẓ aġaras s-tmazirt n-makiduniyya.
ar-itkka tisgiw-an ar-isawal s-mddn ar-tn-izzɛam, aylliġ ilkm tamazirt n-yunan.

iqama ġin kraḍ-iyrn. walaynni lliġ iskr f-a-ibbi amda a-iwrri s-tmazirt n-suriyya, isfld f-kra n-ayt-yudaya is-d-fllas-mšaškan a-t-hlkn. yini ilmma d-ih̬f-ns: «yuf ad-wrriġ d-uġaras-inu zriġ zġ-makiduniyya.»
munn dids kra n-aytmatn. illa subatrus yus n-birus zġ-biriyya, yili aristarh̬us d-sakundus zġ-tasaluniki, yili gayus zġ-darba ntta d-timutaws, yili tih̬ikus d-trufimus zġ-asiyya.
ddun ntni zwurn-aġ s-tmdint n-truwwas ar-srnnġ-tqln.
imma nkkʷni, lliġ izri lɛid n-urh̬ṣiṣ namẓ anaw zġ-filibbi, nssudu smmus-uwssan aylliġ-n-didsn-nmnaggar ġ-truwwas. nqama ġin ssa n-uwssan.
ġ-wass l-lḥdd nmnaggar-d kullwaġ a-nbbi aġrum. isawl-aġ bulus, yiri a-yamẓ aġaras ndid azkka. izayd ar-isawal ar ṭuẓẓunt n-iyḍ.
igatnt tifawin ġ-uḥanu n-uflla lli-ġ-nmnaggar.
yili ġin yan-uɛyyal ism-ns aftih̬us, iskiws ġ-yan-warryaḥ ar-itnuddum. izayd bulus f-wawal-ns aylliġ issayk iṭs f-uɛyyal-an, iḍr zġ-snat-tduliw s-wakal. asin-t afn-t-in immut.
imma bulus igguz iknu-n fllas yamẓ gis, yini-asn: «ad-ur-tasim taġuft, hati iddr.»
iwrri-d ilmma bulus s-uflla, ibbi aġrum išš didnnġ. izayd ar-isawal aylliġ-di-tġli tafukt. ġakudan a-iffuġ imun d-uġaras.
imma aɛyyal iddr, awin-t s-tgmmi-ns wrrin fjjijn bahra.
nfl bulus namẓ anaw nssudu s-lmrsa n-assus, ašku iskr didnnġ a-n-dids-nmnaggar ġin, yiri nttan a-n-yašk f-uḍar-ns.
lliġ-aġ-n-ilkm ġ-assus nawi-t didnnġ ġ-wanaw, nssudu ġ-umda s-lmrsa n-mitilini.
ndid azkka nzayd nssudu s-tama n-igzir n-h̬iyyus. ndid azkka nbbi s-igzir n-samus. ndid azkka nlkm lmrsa n-militus.
yiri bulus a-yanf i-afsus a-ur-n-imaṭl ġ-tmazirt n-asiyya, ašku ira bahra a-yili ġ-urušalim ġ-lɛid n-win smmus id-mraw iġ-iẓḍar a-n-gis-yili.
lliġ illa bulus ġ-militus yazn s-imġarn n-umnaggar ġ-afsus, iḍalb-asn ad-d-dars-aškin.
lliġ-d-uškan yini-asn: «tssnm kullu mad-skarġ zġ-wass amzwaru lli-ġ-d-darun-kšmġ s-tmazirt n-asiyya.
ar-th̬damġ i-siditnnġ s-ṣṣbr iggutn d-imṭṭawn ula ġ-trfufnt lli-yyi-mddin ayt-yudaya.
tssnm is-a-yawn-malaġ kullu ma-ra-kʷn-infɛa, ur-ḥṣarġ ih̬f-inu. ar-awn-t-sslmadġ ġ-lgddam n-mddn ula ġ-tgʷmma-nnun.
ar-bdda-ttiniġ s-lmɛqul i-ayt-yudaya ula ibrraniyn ad-fln kullu mad-skarn yʷh̬šn, wrrin s-rbbi amnn s-siditnnġ yasuɛ.
«imma ġilad idḥi-yyi rruḥ lqudus ad-dduġ s-urušalim. ur-ssinġ ma-rad-iyi-ijru ġin.
yat-tġawsa kad-ssnġ: ġ-kraygatt tamdint ar-iyi-ittini rruḥ lqudus s-lmɛqul izd ġin a-ġ-a-sri-tqln iskraf ula tarfufnt.
imma nkki ur-a-tḥasabġ tudrt-inu is-tga kra. ur-riġ abla a-tazzalġ ard ruḥġ ttmi n-uġaras-inu, kmmlġ tawuri lli-yyi-ifka siditnnġ yasuɛ, sslkmġ lh̬bar ifulkin f-lbaraka n-rbbi.
«imma kunni kullukn lli-dar-tlulliġ ar-awn-tbrraḥġ f-tgldit n-rbbi, ssnġ is-ur-sar-ra-tẓrm udm-inu.
walaynni rad-awn-iniġ ġassad: iġ-illa ma-gigun-itthlkn, urd nkki a-f-llan idammn-ns.
ašku ur-ḥṣarġ ih̬f-inu walaynni mliġ-awn f-kullu ma-gigun-ira rbbi.
awiyat-stt ġilad ġ-ih̬f-nnun, tawim-tt ula ġ-tuwrut kullutt lli-f-kʷn-irur rruḥ lqudus ad-as-tgm ingabaln, tksm amnaggar n-rbbi lli-isġa s-idammn-ns.
ssnġ ussan lli-ġ-ra-kʷn-flġ nkki, ra-n-kšmn-uwššann šqanin s-gratun, rad-ssyaggasn tawrut.
rad-nkrn ula kra n-mddn ġ-gratun, ar-ssgriwiln lḥqq baš a-n-lddin imḥḍarn a-tn-tabɛan.
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, rarat lɛaql-nnun ar-di-tswingimm mamnk a-didun-skarġ kraḍ isggʷasn ġ-iyḍ ula azal ar-bdda-tnṣaḥġ kraygatt yan gigun ar imṭṭawn.
«imma ġilad ra-kʷn-flġ ġ-ufus n-rbbi, flġ darun awal l-lbaraka-ns lli-iẓḍarn a-kʷn-issdus išškšm-kʷn s-tmih̬ar ggutnin lli-ra-yili i-kullu willi iẓli ad-gn wins.
ur-jjud nkki a-n-iḍmɛn nnuqrt nġd urġ nġd timlsa n-kra n-yan gigun.
tssnm izd s-ifassn-inu a-s-a-di-traraġ mad-ḥtajjaġ nkki ula asmun-inu.

kullu mad-skarġ, ar-awn-srs-malaġ is-fllannġ-illa a-ntnhataf ġmkad baš a-nɛawn winna ḍɛfnin, ar-nswingim ġ-wawal n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lliġ inna ‹ambarki a-iga ġwalli yakkan, uggʷar n-walli itamẓn.›»
ġir ikmml bulus awal-ad, iḍr ntta didsn f-ifaddn-nsn, iẓẓall iḍalb rbbi.
ḥbbln-t-id ar-gis-ssudunn ar-allan kullutn.
ṭiyyr-asn bahra ašku inna-yasn ur-sul-ra-t-ẓrn. munn dids ilmma ar anaw.
ġmkan a-tn-nfl, nssudu zġ-ġin nbbi amda s-igzir n-kus. ndid azkka nlkm igzir n-rudus, nzayd s-igzir n-batara.
naf-n ġin yan-wanaw ira a-ibbi s-tmazirt n-finiqiyya, nġli srs nssudu gis.
ar-ntmnad igzir n-qubrus f-uẓlmaḍ-nnġ, nzayd aylliġ nlkm tamazirt n-suriyya. ngguz ġ-tmdint n-ṣur, ašku ġin ad-ran id-bab n-wanaw ad-srsn sslaɛt-nsn.
naf-n ġin kra n-imḥḍarn, ngguz ġ-darsn ssa n-uwssan. inin i-bulus maylli-asn-imla rruḥ lqudus a-ur-iddu s-urušalim.
