walaynni lliġ kmmln-uwssan-an, nffuġ zġ-darsn a-nzayd f-umuddu-nnġ. munn-d didnnġ ntni kullutn ula timġarin-nsn d-tarwa-nsn s-brra n-tmdint. nutš f-ifaddn-nnġ ġ-tama n-umda nẓẓall nḍalb rbbi.
nmsafaḍ didsn, nġli-daġ s-wanaw, wrrin ntni s-tgʷmma-nsn.
nssudu ġ-umda zġ-ṣur s-tmdint n-butulimays. nnsallam ula ġin d-aytmatn, nzzri didsn ġassan.
ndid azkka nzayd aylliġ nlkm tamdint n-qayṣriyya. ngguz ġin ġ-tgmmi n-filibbus abrraḥ l-lh̬bar ifulkin. ig nttan yan zġ-ssa n-irgazn lli-stin aytmatn ġ-urušalim.
ilint dars kkuẓṭ istis ur-tahilnt, ar-ttinint iwaliwn nna-yasnt-imala rbbi.
ngawr dars kra n-uwssan. ġakudan a-d-yuška yan-urgaz zġ-tmazirt n-yudaya ism-ns agabus, ig wad ittinin iwaliwn nna-yas-imala rbbi.

iruḥ-aġ-d, yasi tagʷst n-bulus, ikrs srs ih̬f-ns ġ-iḍarn ula ifassn yini-aġ: «sfldat i-mayd inna rruḥ lqudus, ‹ġmkad a-rad-krsn ayt-yudaya bu-tagʷst-ad ġ-urušalim, fkn-t ġ-ifassn n-ibrraniyn.›»
lliġ nsfld i-ma-inna, nnkr nkkʷni d-aytmatn n-ġin nḍalb zġ-bulus bahra a-ur-iddu s-urušalim.
irar-aġ-d nttan yini: «ma-f-a-tallam ar-tssyaggasm ul-inu? ha-nkki ujadġ urd ġir ad-tyawkrrafġ walaynni ard mmtġ ġ-urušalim f-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ.»
bulus ur-sul-iri a-srnnġ-isfld, nfssa ġakudan nini: «a-yili ma-ira siditnnġ.»
nqama ġin kra n-uwssan, nssmun ilmma tiġawsiwin-nnġ nmun-daġ d-uġaras s-urušalim.
munn-d didnnġ kra n-imḥḍarn n-ayt-qayṣriyya, awin-aġ-d s-tgmmi n-walli ra-dar-ngguz, ism-ns mnasun. iga ntta gu-qubrus ig yan zġ-imzwura lli-umẓnin aġaras n-siditnnġ.
lliġ nlkm urušalim, frḥn srnnġ aytmatn šškšmn-aġ s-darsn.
ndid azkka nmun d-bulus a-nẓr yaɛqub, ilin ġin imġarn kullutn.
insallam bulus didsn, ar-asn-imala kullu ma-iskr rbbi f-ufus-ns ġ-dar ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
lliġ sfldn i-ma-inna ar-kullu-talġn rbbi. inin ilmma i-bulus: «wa-gʷmatnnġ, tẓrit kigan d-wafḍan n-ayt-yudaya a-d-iwrrin amnn s-siditnnġ, ar-kullu-ttirin ššrɛ n-musa bahra.
ntni sfldn fllak is-a-tsslmadt ayt-yudaya lli-zdġnin ġ-tmizar yaḍni a-ur-sul-skarn s-ššrɛ ula-da-tẓallan i-iḥšmay-nsn ula-da-tamẓn sul ġ-lɛadat n-imzwura-nnġ.
ma-ra-nskr ġilad? ašku rad-issann is-di-tuškit s-ġid.
skr mayd rad-ak-nini. llan darnnġ kkuẓ irgazn qawln i-rbbi s-wawal izgan.
awi-tn tssġust ih̬f-nnk didsn, tfkt fllasn ma-tn-ih̬ṣṣan i-usmakkrd n-iguyya-nsn. ġmkad a-s-rad-ẓrn mddn kullutn ur-igi yat ġaylli mi fllak sfldn. rad-issann is-a-tskart s-ššrɛ n-musa.
imma ibrraniyn lli-umnnin s-lmasiḥ, nuzn-asn yat-tbrat, nini-asn f-maylli-f-d-nmšaška. nuṣṣa-tn a-ur-šttan ma-ityawġrasn i-laṣnam ula idammn ula tifiyi n-ma-iqajjin, aggugn zġ-lfsad.»

ndid azkka yawi bulus irgazn-lli, ikmml didsn asġus ġmklli iga dar ayt-yudaya. ikšm ilmma s-tgmmi n-rbbi yini i-inmġurn f-man ass a-rad-kmmln ussan n-usġus-nsn baš a-n-ssakmurn tiġrsiw i-rbbi f-kraygatt yan gisn.
ur-iqama walu ad-kmmln ssa n-uwssan, s-illa bulus ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ẓrn-t kra n-ayt-yudaya lli-d-kkanin tamazirt n-asiyya. sshiyysn mddn kullutn, ġwin ġ-bulus

ar-tġuwwatn ar-ttinin: «way-ayt-rbbi, aškad-d tbiddm didnnġ. argaz-ad iga wad itkkan kraygatt mani, ar-isslmad kullu mddn ad-rggmn ġ-ayt-darnnġ ula ššrɛ-nnġ ula tigmmi-ad n-rbbi. hati ġilad išškšm-d kra n-ibrraniyn s-tgmmi n-rbbi, issḥrm adġar amẓlay.»
nnan ntni ġmkan ašku ẓran trufimus gu-afsus imun d-bulus ġ-tmdint, ġaln is-t-id-dids-yiwi s-tgmmi n-rbbi.
tzayd tqrbl-tmdint kullutt. azzln-d mddn ggutnin, amẓn bulus zukrn-t-id zġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, qqnn-d fllas iflwan
irin a-t-nġn. ġakudan a-isfld-unmġur n-iɛskrin n-rruman i-lh̬bar n-is-kullu-tduy urušalim.
yawi-d kra n-iɛskrin d-lqbṭanat-nsn azzln-d s-darsn. lliġ ẓran mddn anmġur-an d-iɛskrin-ns rẓmn zġ-bulus ur-sul-a-t-kkatn.
iruḥ-tn-in-unmġur, yamẓ ġ-bulus, yamr iɛskrin a-t-krsn s-snat ssnasl. isqsa mddn ilmma: «ma-iga-urgaz-ad? ma-iskr?»
bdun-daġ ar-tġuwwatn kud kra d-ma-ittini, aylliġ ur-iẓḍar a-yissan ma-f-inkr uduy-an. yamr ilmma ad-awin bulus s-lqṣr.
ssruḥn-t iɛskrin s-tama n-iskfal, walaynni ar-tn-bahra-ssnukmun mddn aylliġ-tn-d-iqqan ad-asin bulus.
ẓẓun gis mddn kullutn ar-ssġuyyun ar-ttinin: «nġat-t, nġat-t.»
lliġ-n-lkmn imi l-lqṣr isawl bulus s-unmġur n-iɛskrin yini-as: «is-rad-iyi-tṣamḥt ad-ak-iniġ kra?» irar-as-unmġur: «mah̬, tssnt a-tsawlt s-wawal n-ayt-yunan?
is-urd gu-miṣr a-tgit lli-issduyn mddn f-ssulṭa n-rruman, yawi dids kkuẓ id-walf n-yan s-lh̬la, d-kullutn usin didsn uzzal?»
yini-as bulus: «gu-yudaya ad-giġ zġ-ṭarsus ġ-tmazirt n-kilikiyya. ṭṭafġ taġamt n-ayt-tmdint-an, d-nttat urd tamdint imẓẓin a-tga. adj-iyi ad-sawlġ d-mddn-ad.»
yadj-t-ilmma-unmġur. ibidd bulus ġ-iggi n-iskfal yall afus-ns a-tn-issfssa. lliġ fssan kullutn, isawl srsn s-wawal n-ayt-yudaya.
yini-asn: «way-aytma d-id-h̬ali, sfldat-iyi. rad-awn-mlġ mad-giġ ula mad-skrġ is-ur-yʷh̬šin.»
fssan s-uggʷar lliġ-as-sfldn ar-isawal s-wawal-nsn n-ayt-yudaya. izayd yini-asn:

«giġ nkki gu-yudaya, lulġ ġ-ṭarsus ġ-tmazirt n-kilikiyya, mqqurġ ġ-tmdint-ad n-urušalim. kkiġ-ttin ar-aqraġ ġ-ddu-ufus n-gamalyal, ar-tlmadġ kullu ma-illan ġ-ššrɛ n-imzwura-nnġ. iriġ bahra ad-rḍuġ rbbi zund kunni kullukn lli-llanin ġid ġassad,
aylliġ wrriġ ar-ssrfufunġ ayt-uġaras-ad ar lmut, ar-tamẓġ irgazn ula timġarin ar-tn-in-dḥayġ ġ-lḥbs.

sqsat anmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn n-tmazirt, rad-awn-inin izd ṣṣaḥt ayad. ašku umẓġ ġ-darsn tibratin i-imddukkʷal-nsn ġ-dimašq, baš ad-amẓġ wanna ġin illan zġ-ayt-uġaras-ad, krsġ-tn s-ssnasl awiġ-tn-d s-urušalim a-fllasn-nut lḥukm.
«ha-yan-wass ssudiġ akmurġ-n s-dimašq. ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-wass tsfaw-d flla yat tifawt itjhhdn zġ-ignwan.
ḍrġ s-wakal s-sfldġ i-wawal inna-yyi-d: ‹šawl, šawl, mah̬ a-yyi-tssrfufunt?›
iniġ: ‹wa-sidi, ma-tgit kiyi?› irar-iyi-d: ‹nkki a-igan yasuɛ gu-naṣira lli-tssrfufunt.›
ġwilli didi llanin ẓran tifawt walaynni ur-fhimn awal lli-d-sri-isawln.
iniġ ilmma: ‹wa-sidi, ma-rad-skrġ?› yini-yyi-d siditnnġ: ‹nkr tddut s-dimašq. ġin a-ġ-rad-ak-ityawnna kullu maylli-gik-iqṣad rbbi a-ti-tskrt.›
sul bukḍġ nkki f-ssibt n-tifawt-an itjhhdn, amẓn-iyi afus ġwilli didi llanin, awin-iyi s-dimašq.
«yašk-in dari yan-urgaz ism-ns ḥananiyya, ig yan bahra ittirin a-irḍu rbbi, ar-iskar s-kullu ma-illan ġ-ššrɛ, ar-ti-tuqqarn kullu ayt-yudaya lli-zdġnin ġin.
ibidd ġ-tama-nu yini-yyi: ‹wa-gʷma šawl isfiw,› s-sfawġ ġakudan ar-ti-tmnadġ.
yini-yyi: ‹isti-k rbbi n-imzwura-nnġ a-tissant ma-iqṣad, tẓrt ġwalli iɛmmrn s-ufulki lli-s-irḍa, tsfldt i-wawal zġ-imi-ns.
ra-tgt inigi-ns ġ-dar kullu mddn, tsawlt-asn f-ma-tẓrit ula ma-mi-tsfldt.
imma ġilad mah̬ aylliġ sul tgawrt? nkr a-k-ssddmġ ġ-waman, tġrt s-ism n-siditnnġ a-k-issġus zġ-ddnub-nnk.›
«lliġ-d-wrriġ s-urušalim, ar-tẓallaġ yan-wass ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi s-iyi-d-iban siditnnġ ġ-twargit
yini-yyi: ‹zayd ġil ġil tffuġt zġ-urušalim, ašku ur-rad-sfldn s-tugga-nnk flla.›
iniġ: ‹wa-sidi, ssnn ntni mamnk a-sttin-kkiġ ar-kššmġ kullu tigʷmma n-tẓallit ar-tamẓġ ġwilli srk umnnin ar-tn-kkatġ.
ula ġassan ġ-nġan inigi-nnk stifanus biddġ nkki ġin, frḥġ s-lmut-ns gablġ timlsa i-willi-t-nġanin.›
isawl-daġ yini-yyi: ‹zayd tddut, ašku ra-k-aznġ s-tmizar aggugnin.›»
ar-kullu-sflidn mddn-an i-bulus, aylliġ inna awal-ad nkrn-daġ ar-ssġuyyun s-jjhd ar-ttinin: «wan ġwad kkisat-t zġ-ddunit. ur-as-igi a-sul-iqama.»
ar-ssġuyyun bahra ar-ssususn islhamn-nsn ar-talln agdrur s-nnigatsn.
yamr-ilmma-unmġur iɛskrin ad-šškšmn bulus s-lqṣr, yuṣṣa-tn a-t-ssġuršn ard-asn-iml mah̬ aylliġ a-fllas-ssġuyyun mddn ġmkan s-jjhd.
walaynni lliġ-t-krsn a-t-ssġuršn, isawl bulus s-lqbṭan lli-ibiddn ġin yini-as: «is-illa ġayad ġ-lqanun a-tssġuršm yan iṭṭafn taġamt ġ-ayt-ruma d-nttan ur-ta-fllas-utn lḥukm f-kra iskr-t?»
lliġ isfld lqbṭan i-mayad, iwrri s-dar-unmġur n-iɛskrin yini-as: «mayd ra-tskrt? argaz-ad iga yan dar lḥqq n-ayt-ruma.»
yašk-id-unmġur s-dar bulus isqsa-t: «izd dark taġamt ġ-ayt-ruma?» yini-as bulus: «tlla dari.»
izayd-unmġur yini-as: «nkki s-iqaridn ggutnin a-s-umẓġ taġamt ġ-ayt-ruma.» irar-as bulus: «imma nkki, lulġ s-taġamt-inu, ašku ayt-dari ṭṭafn taġamt yadlli.»
lliġ sfldn iɛskrin i-mayad ittin zġ-gis, yiksaḍ-unmġur lliġ issn f-bulus is-dars lḥqq n-ayt-ruma d-nttan ikrs-t s-ssnasl.

ndid azkka ira-unmġur n-iɛskrin a-yissan lḥqq n-ma-s-a-taštkkan ayt-yudaya s-bulus. issmun-d inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn l-lmḥkama kullutn. irẓm-d ilmma i-bulus yawi-t-id issbidd-t ġ-lgddam-nsn.
issmaqql bulus ġ-ayt-lmḥkama yini-asn: «way-aytma, ha-yyi kullu mad-kkiġ sul s-ġassad ar-skarġ f-ad-trḍuġ rbbi s-uwl iġusn.»
inkr ġakudan ḥananiyya lli-igan anmġur ihiyyan n-tgmmi n-rbbi, yamr ġwilli biddnin ġ-tama n-bulus a-t-utn f-imi-ns.
irar-as bulus: «ra-k-id-yut rbbi, ay-aġʷrab ijiyyrn. hati tskiwst ġid a-flla-tḥkamt s-ššrɛ, walaynni tffuġt zġ-ššrɛ lliġ-tn-tumrt a-yyi-utn.»
inin-as ġwilli biddnin ġ-tama-ns: «izd trgmt anmġur ihiyyan n-rbbi?»
irar-asn bulus: «way-aytma, ur-ssinġ ġwad izd anmġur ihiyyan a-iga. ašku ityara ġ-wawal n-rbbi: ‹a-ur-trgmt yan igan anmġur n-ayt-tmazirt-nnk.›»

issn bulus izd kra gisn iga zġ-lmdhb n-iṣadduqin d-kra iga zġ-lmdhb n-ifarisin. yall awal-ns ġ-lmḥkama yini-asn: «way-aytma, nkki afarisi ad-giġ, gġ yus n-ifarisin. biddġ ġ-ddu lḥukm ġassad f-ssibt n-rrja lli-ġ-n-rjiġ, ašku umnġ is-rad-nkrn ġwilli mmutnin.»
ġir inna awal-ad s-nkrn ifarisin d-iṣadduqin ar-tẓin i-ngratsn, bḍun ayt-lmḥkama f-sin.
ašku iṣadduqin ar-ttinin ur-rad-nkrn mddn zġ-lmut, ar-ttinin ur-llin kra l-lmalayka nġd kra l-larwaḥ. imma ifarisin ar-ttinin kullu ġwid llan.

zaydn kullu ar-tġuwwatn aylliġ nkrn kra n-imslmdn n-ššrɛ l-lmdhb n-ifarisin, bzgn bahra f-wiyyaḍ inin-asn: «ur-akkʷ-nufi kra yʷh̬šnn ġ-urgaz-ad. ur-išqi a-srs-isawl kra n-rruḥ nġd kra l-lmalak.»
zaydn ġmkan aylliġ gis ruḥn timiġt. ar-kullu-lddin ġ-bulus, aylliġ iksuḍ-unmġur n-iɛskrin a-t-gn d-igzman. yamr iɛskrin ad-gguzn ad-asn-t-id-kkisn s-ifaddn awin-t s-lqṣr.
ġ-iḍ-an a-ibidd siditnnġ f-bulus yini-as: «zɛm d-ih̬f-nnk. ġmklli flla tfkit tugga-nnk ġ-urušalim, ġmkan a-k-id-iqqann a-tnt-flla-tfkt ula ġ-ruma.»
ndid azkka ġ-ṣṣbaḥ mšawarn kra n-ayt-yudaya i-ngratsn, ggalln ur-šttan ula swan ard nġn bulus.
uggʷar n-kkuẓ id-mraw a-iggullan f-ġayan.
aškin-d s-dar inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn n-tmazirt inin-asn: «ha-nkkʷni nmšaška-d nggall tagallit imqqurn is-ur-ra-nšš ard nnġ bulus.
nra gigun kunni ula ayt-lmḥkama a-taznm ġilad s-unmġur n-iɛskrin, tḍalbm-t a-d-yawi bulus s-lgddam-nnun, tinim-as is-tram a-ti-tsqsam uggʷar f-ma-iskr. ha-nkkʷni nujad a-t-nnġ ur-ta-d-ilkim.»
walaynni ġaylli-f-d-mšaškan, isfld fllas yus n-uwlltmas n-bulus. iddu s-lqṣr ikšm s-dar bulus yini-as-t.
iġr bulus ġakudan i-yan zġ-lqbṭanat n-iɛskrin yini-as: «awi aɛyyal-ad i-unmġur-nnun, ašku ira ad-as-yini kra.»
yawi-t lqbṭan išškšm-t s-dar-unmġur yini-as: «iġra-yyi-uḥbbas bulus iḍalb-iyi ad-ak-d-awiġ aɛyyal-ad, ašku ira ad-ak-yini kra.»
yamẓ-unmġur ġ-ufus n-uɛyyal, yawi-t waḥdut isqsa-t: «ma-rad-iyi-tinit?»
yini-as: «mšaškan-d inmġurn n-ayt-yudaya a-zgik-ḍalbn ad-asn-in-tawit bulus azkka s-lmḥkama. rad-ak-inin ran a-t-sqsan uggʷar f-ma-iskr.
walaynni a-tn-ur-tamnt ašku llan uggʷar n-kkuẓ id-mraw n-urgaz, rgsn ar-srs-tqln. ggalln ur-šttan ula swan ard-t-nġn. ujadn ġilad, ar-ġir-tqln s-wawal-nnk.»
yini-as-unmġur i-uɛyyal: «ad-ur-tinit i-yan is-iyi-di-tiwit lh̬bar-ad.» yadj-t ilmma iddu.

iġr-unmġur n-iɛskrin i-sin zġ-lqbṭanat-ns yuṣṣa-tn yini-asn: «ssmunad-d sin id-miyya (200) n-uɛskri d-ssa n-id-mraw (70) n-umnnay d-sin id-miyya (200) n-willi ṭṭafnin aḥriš, ad-ujadn ad-ddun s-qayṣriyya ġ-iḍ-ad ġ-tasaɛt tis tẓa.
tzaydm kra n-wagmarn ma-ġ-a-issudu bulus, baš a-ti-tsslkmm ġ-laman i-lḥakm filiks.»
yara ilmma yat-tbrat yini:
«zġ-kludyus-lisyas, i-sidi lḥakm iɛzzan filiks, ad-ak-tili sslamt.
argaz-ad, ġwin-t ayt-yudaya, irin ntni a-t-nġn. afġ-t-in is-iga yan iṭṭafn taġamt ġ-ayt-ruma, nlkm-n nkki d-iɛskrin-inu nkkis-asn-t-id.
ssḥaḍrġ-asn-t-in ġ-lmḥkama-nsn baš ad-issanġ ma-s-a-srs-taštkkan.
afġ-t-in is-ur-iskir ma-f-a-itmtat nġd ma-f-a-ittili ġ-lḥbs. ur-a-srs-taštkkan abla s-kra igan win ššrɛ-nsn.
walaynni lliġ-iyi-d-ilkm lh̬bar n-izd kra gisn mšawarn fllas a-t-nġn, aznġ-ak-t-in. iniġ i-willi srs taštkkanin ad-as-ṣrḍn s-lgddam-nnk.»
skrn ilmma iɛskrin ġmklli-tn-yuṣṣa-unmġur-nsn, awin bulus ġ-iyḍ aylliġ lkmn tamdint n-antibatris.
ndid azkka wrrin ntni s-lqṣr, fln imnnayn a-t-awin zġ-ġin.
lliġ ruḥn qayṣriyya, fkn tabrat i-lḥakm, šškšmn bulus s-dars.
lliġ iġra lḥakm tabrat, isqsa bulus gu-man tamazirt a-iga.
lliġ issn is-iga gu-kilikiyya yini-as: «rad-ak-sfldġ ġakud nna-d-uškan ġwilli-ak-ṣrḍnin.» yuṣṣa-tn ilmma a-t-gabln ġ-lqṣr n-hirudus.

zrin smmus-uwssan, s-d-yuška ḥananiyya lli-igan anmġur ihiyyan n-tgmmi n-rbbi s-qayṣriyya, ntta d-kra n-imġarn n-tmazirt. awin-d didsn yal-lmuḥami ism-ns tartullus. kšmn s-dar filiks inin-as f-ġaylli-f-ṣrḍn i-bulus.

išškšm-n bulus ġakudan s-darsn, ibdu tartullus ar-srs-itaštkka yini: «wa-lḥakm iɛzzan sidi filiks, mnnaw isggʷasn ayad thnna-tmazirt-nnġ f-ufus-nnk. tgrit ġ-kullu ma-ih̬ṣṣan baš ad-aġ-yigat lh̬ir.
nfrḥ s-kullu mad-aġ-tskart, ar-k-ntškar ġ-kraygatt mani d-kraygatt luqt.
imma ġilad ur-riġ a-k-ssmaṭlġ. ra-k-nḍalb ad-aġ-tskrt afulki-ad, tsfldt i-kra n-iwaliwn drusnin f-maylli darnnġ ijran.
ašku nufa-n argaz-ad iga bu-irwwayn, ar-issnkar uduy ġ-gr ayt-yudaya ġ-ddunit kullutt. iga zġ-inmġurn n-willi mi ttinin ‹ayt-naṣira›.
ġmkan a-iskar aylliġ ira a-issḥrm tigmmi n-rbbi, namẓ-t nkkʷni ġakudan.
iġ-ti-tsqsat ra-tissant kullu ġaylli-s-a-srs-ntaštkka.»
nkrn ilmma wiyyaḍ zġ-ayt-yudaya inin: «s-ṣṣaḥt ġmkan a-illan.»
inɛt-n lḥakm i-bulus s-ufus baš a-isawl. yini: «wa-sidi, ssnġ izd isggʷasn ggutnin ayd tḥkamt ġ-tmazirt-ad. mayad a-f-frḥġ s-uggʷar ad-rarġ awal f-mddn-ad ġ-lgddam-nnk.
iġ-tn-tsqsat ra-tissant izd ġir sin d-mraw n-wass ayd-n-kšmġ s-urušalim a-gis-tɛbadġ rbbi.
imma ntni, hatni ur-iyi-n-ufin ar-tmjaḥadġ d-kra n-yan ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, ula ufan-iyi-n ar-sshiyyasġ mddn la ġ-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ula ġ-tmdint.
ġaylli-s-a-sri-taštkkan, ur-ẓḍarn a-t-zzgan.
walaynni yat-tġawsa rad-ak-tt-iniġ: aġaras lli-s-a-ttinin ġwid ijla, nttan a-ġ-a-tɛbadġ rbbi n-imzwura-nnġ. ha-yyi umnġ s-kullu ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ n-musa ula arratn l-lanbiya.
giġ rrja-nu ġ-rbbi ġmklli-n-gis-rjan ntni, amnġ is-rad-nkrn kullu mddn zġ-lmut, ma-ifulkin ula ma-yʷh̬šnn.
mayan a-f-a-n-tggaġ tiqqi-nu baš a-bdda-iġus-uwl-inu zġ-kullu ma-igan lɛib ġ-iẓri n-rbbi ula win bnadm.
«zrin yan-mnnaw n-isggʷasn ur-ddiġ s-urušalim, aylliġ-n-iwiġ kra l-lmɛawnt i-imẓlaḍ n-ayt-tmazirt-inu ssakmurġ-n tiwafkiw i-rbbi.
ġmkan ad-skrġ s-iyi-n-ufan ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, d-nkki ġusġ s-isird n-ayt-yudaya. ur-a-sawalġ s-mddn ula-da-tẓiġ d-yan.
walaynni llan ġin kra n-ayt-yudaya zġ-tmazirt n-asiyya. ntni iġ-darsn kra flla, illa fllasn ula ntni ad-d-aškin ṣrḍn-iyi ġ-lgddam-nnk.
nġd adj ġwid ad-flla-inin is-gigi-ufan kra l-lɛib ġakud lliġ biddġ ġ-lmḥkama-nsn.
ur-skirġ yat, abla awal-ad ad-nniġ s-jjhd lliġ biddġ ġ-lgddam-nsn, nniġ-asn: ‹ha-yyi biddġ ġ-ddu lḥukm-nnun ġassad f-ssibt n-mad-umnġ s-tnkra n-willi mmutnin.›»
imma lḥakm filiks issn ma-iggutn f-uġaras l-lmasiḥ, yini-asn: «ġassad yuwda ġunškad, ard-d-yašk-unmġur lisyas rad-daġ-ġrġ s-tġawsa-yad-nnun.»
izayd yuṣṣa lqbṭan a-igabl bulus, yini-as a-t-ur-ikrs, yadj imddukkʷal-ns ad-as-di-tawin aynna-t-ih̬ṣṣan.
zrin kra n-uwssan, s-d-yuška filiks d-drusila tamġart-ns. tga nttat ullt-yudaya. yazn ġakudan ad-d-awin bulus. isfld-as ar-isawal f-ma-ra-yili i-yan yumnn s-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.

walaynni lliġ izuyd bulus ar-isawal f-ufulki lli-s-irḍa rbbi, ula mamnk a-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-iḥkam ġ-ih̬f-ns, ula lɛqubit lli-ra-ittut f-ddunit, yiksaḍ filiks yini-as: «ddu ġilad, ra-n-srk-aznġ akud nna-yyi-tṭlq luqt.»
iġal is-rad-as-ifk bulus iqaridn. kigan d-twal ar-srs-itazn ar-dids-isawal.
ġmkan aylliġ zrin sin isggʷasn, iddu filiks tigira. yašk-id yal-lḥakm yaḍni, ig ism-ns burkyus-fastus. imma filiks ira a-irḍu ayt-yudaya, ifl bulus ġ-lḥbs.
iqama fastus kraḍ-uwssan ġ-qayṣriyya s-iffuġ iddu s-urušalim.
ddun dars inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn n-ayt-yudaya, aštkkan-daġ s-bulus.
ḍalbn fastus a-gisn-iskr lh̬ir-ad yawi-asn-d bulus s-urušalim, ašku ntni skrn f-ad-as-mdin ġ-uġaras nġn-t ur-ta-ilkim.
imma fastus irur-asn: «han bulus illa ġ-lḥbs ġ-qayṣriyya. yan imikk rad-wrriġ nkki s-ġin.
aznat didi kra n-imġarn-nnun ad-as-n-ṣrḍn ġin iġ-iskr kra yʷh̬šnn.»
iqama fastus ġ-urušalim ma-itggan tẓa n-uwssan, iddu ilmma s-qayṣriyya. ndid azkka iskiws ġ-lmḥkama yamr iɛskrin ad-d-awin bulus.
ikšm-d bulus sutln-as ayt-yudaya lli-d-uškanin zġ-urušalim, ar-srs-taštkkan s-tġawsiwin mqqurnin walaynni ur-ẓḍarn a-tnt-zzgan.
isawl bulus f-ih̬f-ns yini-asn: «ur-skirġ kra l-lɛib la ġ-ššrɛ n-ayt-yudaya ula ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi ula ġ-qayṣr.»
walaynni fastus ira a-irḍu ayt-yudaya, isqsa bulus: «is-trit a-tddut s-urušalim a-tbiddt ġ-lgddam-inu ġin trart awal f-iṣraḍ-nsn?»
isawl bulus yini-as: «ha-yyi biddġ ġid ġ-lmḥkama n-qayṣr ġ-illiġ-iyi-d-iqqan ad-biddġ. imma ayt-yudaya, ur-gisn-skirġ kra l-lɛib. kiyi tssnt mayad bahra.

mrad is-ffuġġ lqanun skrġ kra-f-a-tmtatġ, ur-rad-iriġ ad-anfġ i-lmut. walaynni iġ-ur-illi ġ-iṣraḍ-nsn abla tikrkas, ur-iẓḍar yan a-yyi-idḥi i-mddn-an. ha-yyi ġilad usiġ aṣraḍ-inu s-gr ifassn n-qayṣr.»
išawr fastus d-imɛawann-ns, yini ilmma i-bulus: «tssġlit aṣraḍ-nnk s-dar qayṣr. hati s-dar qayṣr a-s-ra-tddut.»
zrin kra n-uwssan s-d-yuška-ugllid agribbas d-uwlltmas barniki s-qayṣriyya. irin ad-ssmrḥban s-fastus ġ-tmazirt-nsn.
gawrn dars kra n-uwssan aylliġ isawl fastus d-ugllid f-tġawsa n-bulus yini-as: «illa ġid yan-urgaz, ifl-t-id filiks ġ-lḥbs.
lliġ ddiġ s-urušalim, ṣrḍn-as inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi d-imġarn n-ayt-yudaya, ḍalbn-iyi a-fllas-utġ lḥukm,
walaynni rurġ-asn: ‹nkkʷni n-ayt-ruma ur-a-nskar ġmkan. ur-a-ntḥkam f-yan s-lmut iġ-ur-zwar-ibidd ġ-lgddam n-willi-as-ṣrḍnin, isawl f-ih̬f-ns f-ġaylli s-a-srs-taštkkan.›
walaynni lliġ-d-didi-munn s-ġid ur-ssmaṭlġ taġawsa-yan. skiwsġ ndid azkka ġ-lmḥkama, amrġ ad-d-ssḥaḍrn argaz-an.
walaynni lliġ-d-nkrn imṣraḍn-ns, ur-srs-aštkkan s-kra n-iskkirn ʷh̬šnnin ġmklli ġalġ nkki.
ur-illi yat ġ-gratsn abla kra n-imjaḥadn f-mamnk ad-tɛbadn ilah-nsn, ula f-yan immut ism-ns yasuɛ ar-fllas-ittini bulus is-iddr.
ur-ssinġ ġakudan mamnk ad-ssnfaṣalġ tiġawsiwin-ad. sqsaġ bulus is-ira a-iddu s-urušalim a-n-fllas-ḥkamġ ġin,
walaynni inna-yyi ira a-iqama ġid ard iḥkam qayṣr f-tġawsa-ns. amrġ ġakudan a-iqama ġ-lḥbs ard-t-aznġ s-dar qayṣr.»
isawl ilmma agribbas yini-as i-fastus: «ula nkki riġ ad-sfldġ i-urgaz-ad.» yini-as fastus: «ar ṣṣbaḥ rad-as-tsfldt.»
ndid azkka yašk-id agribbas d-barniki s-lhibt iggutn, kšmn s-uḥanu imqqurn l-lmḥkama, ntni d-inmġurn n-iɛskrin d-imġarn n-tmdint. inkr fastus yamr ad-d-šškšmn bulus.

yini ilmma fastus: «way-agllid agribbas ula kullu willi didnnġ llanin ġassad, ġwad a-igan argaz lli-mi-d-ṣrḍn kullu ayt-yudaya s-dâri ġ-urušalim ula ġid, ar-srs-tġuwwatn ar-ttinin iqqan-t-id a-immt.
ur-gis-ufiġ nkki kra-f-isthlla lmut, walaynni lliġ issġli taġawsa-ns s-gr ifassn n-qayṣr skrġ f-a-t-aznġ s-dars.
imma nkki ur-dari kra izgan ma-s-a-fllas-taraġ i-qayṣr. hati ssḥaḍrġ-awn-t-id ġilad, ssbiddġ-t-id ġ-lgddam-nnk ay-agllid agribbas, baš a-gis-nsiggl naf ma-s-a-fllas-taraġ.
ašku irwas-iyi is-ur-išwi a-nazn yan-uḥbbas i-qayṣr iġ-ur-fllas-nmli maylli-f-a-yas-ṣraḍn mddn.»
isawl agribbas s-bulus yini-as: «ra-k-adjġ a-tsawlt ġilad f-ih̬f-nnk.» yall bulus afus-ns a-irar awal yini:
«way-agllid agribbas, nniġ nkki asaɛdi ad-giġ ġassad, ašku ġ-lgddam-nnk a-ġ-biddġ baš ad-rarġ awal f-kullu ma-s-a-sri-taštkkan mddn-ad n-ayt-yudaya.
ašku kiyi tssnt lɛadat n-ayt-yudaya ula iswingimn lli-f-a-tmjaḥadn i-ngratsn. f-mayan a-f-ra-k-ḍalbġ a-didi-tṣbrt, tsfldt i-ma-rad-ak-iniġ.
ašku kullu ayt-yudaya ssnn mamnk ad-giġ zġ-lliġ mẓẓiġ ġ-tmazirt-inu ula tigira n-mayan ġ-urušalim.
kigan d-isggʷasn ayd-iyi-ssnn. ẓḍarn ad-ak-flla-fkn tugga iġ-ran ntni, inin-ak is-giġ wad iskarn s-tnbaḍin n-ifarisin lli-igan lmdhb kullu inukman ġ-ddin-nnġ.
imma ġilad biddġ ġid a-flla-tḥkamt f-ssibt n-rrja lli-dari-illan, ašku umnġ awal lli-inna rbbi i-imzwura-nnġ.
awal-an a-ġ-a-n-kullu-trjunt-tqbilin-nnġ s-snat d-mrawt, lliġ a-tɛbadn rbbi ġilad s-nniyt-nsn ġ-iyḍ ula azal. way-agllid iɛzzan, hati f-rrja-yad a-s-a-sri-taštkkan ayt-yudaya.
imma kunni, mah̬ aylliġ ur-trim a-tamnm is-iẓḍar rbbi a-d-issnkr ġwilli mmutnin?
«kkiġ-ttin ula nkki ar-ttiniġ illa flla a-n-gġ tiqqi-nu ad-tḍaḍḍaġ kullu ma-igan win ism n-yasuɛ gu-naṣira.
ġmkan ad-skarġ ġ-urušalim. ḍalbġ zġ-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi ad-iyi-fkn awal a-n-tqqnġ i-ma-iggutn ġ-imẓlayn n-rbbi ġ-lḥbs. ġakud nna-fllasn-ḥkamn s-lmut, ar-ttiniġ nttat ad-asn-igan.
kigan d-twal ad-kššmġ s-tgʷmma n-tẓallit ar-tn-ssrfufunġ baš a-tn-rarġ ad-rggmn ġ-uġaras-ad. ar-iyi-srsn-tasin iriyn bahra aylliġ a-srsn-tmudduġ ula s-tmdinin aggugnin baš a-tn-ssrfufnġ.
«ġayan a-f-umẓġ aġaras s-dimašq s-wawal n-inmġurn n-tgmmi n-rbbi ula luṣit-nsn.
way-agllid iɛzzan, ssudiġ ġ-uġaras-an ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-wass s-iyi-di-tban yat tifawt zġ-ignwan tjhhd uggʷar n-tafukt, tsfaw flla nkki ula ġwilli-d-munġ.
nḍr kullwaġ s-wakal, s-sfldġ i-yan inna-yyi-d s-wawal n-ayt-yudaya: ‹šawl šawl, mah̬ a-yyi-tssrfufunt? han ar-tssyaggast ih̬f-nnk lliġ a-tssfuqust f-ukuray.›
iniġ: ‹wa-sidi, ma-tgit kiyi?› isawl-d siditnnġ yini-yyi: ‹nkki a-igan yasuɛ lli-tssrfufunt.
nkr tbiddt f-iḍarn-nnk, ašku mayad a-f-ak-d-banġ, baš a-k-gġ d-uh̬ddam-inu ar-takkat tugga f-mamnk a-yyi-tẓrit ġassad ula f-ma-rad-ak-mlġ tigira.
ra-ki-tfukkuġ zġ-ifassn n-ayt-yudaya ula ayt-tmizar aggugnin.

ra-k-aznġ a-trẓmt alln-nsn, trart-tn-d zġ-tillas s-tifawt, ula zġ-lquwwa n-šiṭan s-rbbi, baš a-fllasn-ittin ddnub-nsn, wrrin ṭṭafn taġamt ġ-gr ġwilli ẓliġ ad-gn winu f-ssibt n-mad-sri-umnn.›
«ġakudan ay-agllid agribbas, ur-unfġ i-maylli-yyi-d-issbayyn rbbi.

ffuġġ ar-tbrraḥġ ġ-dimašq, dduġ ilmma ar-tbrraḥġ ġ-urušalim ula ġ-kullu tamazirt n-yudaya ula timizar n-ibrraniyn. ar-asn-ttiniġ is-tn-ih̬ṣṣa ad-fln kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn wrrin s-rbbi, ar-skarn afulki baš a-iban is-fln ma-yʷh̬šnn.
f-ssibt n-tbrraḥt-ad a-f-iyi-umẓn kra n-ayt-yudaya ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, irin a-yyi-nġn.

walaynni ar-bdda-yyi-itɛawan rbbi sul s-ġassad. mayan a-f-biddġ ġid ar-akkaġ tugga-nu i-kullu mddn, i-ma-imqqurn ula i-ma-imẓẓin. ur-a-sawalġ abla f-maylli-f-nnan lanbiya ra-yili, ntni ula musa.
nnan is-rad-bahra-irfufn lmasiḥ, ig amzwaru i-willi ra-d-inkr zġ-lmut, baš a-issbayyn tifawt i-ayt-yudaya ula ayt-tmizar aggugnin.»
sul a-isawal bulus f-ih̬f-ns s-as-inna fastus s-jjhd: «wa-bulus, hatin tffuġt ih̬f-nnk. han tiġri iggutn a-k-issnufln.»
irar-as bulus: «ur-nuflġ, a-sidi fastus. kullu mayd-awn-ttiniġ, lḥqq d-lmɛqul a-iga.
tiġawsiwin-ad, issn-tnt-ugllid agribbas, ẓḍarġ ad-as-fllasnt-sawlġ s-zzɛamt. ssnġ is-ur-fllas-intil mayad, ašku urd ġ-kra n-tuġẓut illasn a-ġ-ijra.
way-agllid agribbas, is-tumnt iwaliwn l-lanbiya? ssnġ is-tn-tumnt.»
isawl ilmma agribbas s-bulus yini-as: «is-trit a-yyi-trart ad-gġ amasiḥi ġ-yat tasaɛt igzzuln?»
yini-as bulus: «zund iġ-tgzzul zund iġ-tġzzif, ḍalbġ i-rbbi a-tgt zund mad-giġ, kiyi ula kullu ġwid sri sflidnin ġassad, walaynni bla ssnasl-ad.»
inkr-ugllid ġakudan, nttan d-lḥakm ula barniki ula wiyyaḍ lli-dids-skiwsnin,
ffuġn zġ-lmḥkama ar-ttinin i-ngratsn: «argaz-ad ur-iskir kra-f-a-itmtat ula kra-f-a-ittili ġ-lḥbs.»
isawl agribbas s-fastus yini-as: «argaz-ad, tẓḍarm ad-as-trẓmm mrad is-ur-issġli taġawsa-ns s-gr ifassn n-qayṣr.»
skrn ġakudan f-ad-aġ-aznn ġ-umda s-tmazirt n-iṭalya. fkn bulus d-kra n-iḥbbasn yaḍni ġ-ufus n-yal-lqbṭan n-iɛskrin ism-ns yulyus, iga zġ-‹rrbɛt n-qayṣr›.
nġli s-yan-wanaw ikka-d tamdint n-adramita, yiri lmrsat lli-llanin ġ-tsgiw n-asiyya. imun didnnġ aristarh̬us, iga gu-makiduniyya zġ-tmdint n-tasaluniki. nffuġ nssudu ġ-umda.
ndid azkka nlkm lmrsa n-ṣayda. yulyus iskr lh̬ir ġ-bulus, yadj-t a-iddu s-dar imddukkʷal-ns ġ-tmdint-an baš ad-as-fkn ma-t-ih̬ṣṣan.
nzayd ilmma nffuġ ġ-umda, nzri zġ-tsga intln n-igzir n-qubrus ašku iḍaḍḍ-aġ-waḍu.
nbbi amda ġ-tama n-kilikiyya d-bamfiliyya aylliġ nlkm lmrsa n-mira ġ-tmazirt n-likiyya.
yaf ġin lqbṭan yan-wanaw yaḍni, ikka-d iskandariyya yiri tamazirt n-iṭalya, issġli-aġ srs.
kigan d-uwssan ur-a-ntzayad ġir s-imikk, aylliġ bḥra ur-nlkim tama l-lmrsa n-knidus. ur-aġ-yudji-waḍu a-nkmml s-tsga-yan. nk ilmma tasga intln n-igzir n-krit, nzri zġ-tama n-ujarif n-salmuni.
nzayd s-tkrrayt, nḥada akal aylliġ nlkm yan-mani lli-mi-ttinin ‹id-untal šwanin›, yakmur s-tmdint n-lasayya.
nssn ġ-uzmz-an is-ra-išqu lḥal iġ-nzuyd ġ-umuddu-nnġ, ašku nmaṭl bahra, izri fllannġ lɛid n-uẓum. ġakudan a-inkr bulus isawl s-mddn s-lmɛqul yini-asn:
«wa-irgazn, iban is-ra-išqu-umuddu-nnġ bahra ġilad. iggut ginnġ ma-ra-itthlk, urd ġir sslaɛt ula anaw walaynni ula tudrt-nnġ nkkʷni.»
imma lqbṭan n-iɛskrin ur-srs-isfld. iskr s-ma-inna rrays n-wanaw d-bab-ns. tmẓẓi lmrsa lli-ġ-nlla, ur-tšwi a-gis-nqama ġ-uzmz n-tgrst.
imšaška-d ma-iggutn ġ-ayt-wanaw a-nssudu zġ-ġin, narm is-nẓḍar a-nruḥ finiks a-n-gis-nzzri tagrst. tga finiks yat lmrsa ġ-igzir n-krit, iḥkam-tt-uġrbi zġ-ufasi ula aẓlmaḍ.
iṣuḍ-d imikk n-uzuzwu zġ-ljanub, irwas-asn is-iwrri lḥal iga ġmklli ran. ssukfn ilmma aggus a-nssudu. nzayd nḥada akal n-krit, ur-dids-nmgallay yat.
imil inkr-d-waḍu lli-mi-ttinin ‹aẓlmaḍ i-usġlay› ar-d-iṣwaḍ s-jjhd zġ-tsga n-igzir.
ar-ikkat anaw aylliġ ur-sul-nẓḍar a-nzayd s-tsga-yan, nadj anaw a-t-idḥay-waḍu.
lliġ nzri ġ-untal n-tgzirt n-kuda, mmaġn ibaḥriyn ad-qqnn tanawt lli-izukur-wanaw.
alln-tt-id s-iggi n-wanaw, sslullin ilmma izakarn i-wallaġ n-wanaw baš a-t-ssdusn. ksuḍn a-yut iwrar n-umlal lli-llanin ġ-ddu-waman ġ-tama n-sirtis. adrn i-lqluɛ, adjn anaw a-t-idḥay-waḍu.
walaynni izuyd-waḍu d-umda s-uggʷar aylliġ nkrn ibaḥriyn ġ-wis sin-uwssan ar-n-tluḥn sslaɛt ġ-umda.
wis kraḍ-uwssan asin ula imassn n-wanaw luḥn-tn-in ġ-umda.
mnnaw-uwssan ur-a-yaġ-ttban tafukt ula itran, ar-sul-iṣwaḍ-waḍu s-jjhd aylliġ nenna ur-nẓḍar a-nnjm.
ntni ur-sul-a-šttan yat ġ-uwssan-an, inkr bulus ibidd ġ-wammas-nsn yini: «wa-irgazn, mrad is-sri-tsfldm, ikun ur-d-nffuġ krit ula trfufnm ġmkad ula tssh̬srm kullu mayad.
imma ġilad rad-awn-iniġ, thnnayat. hati ur-ra-immt yan gigun. ġir anaw a-ra-itthlk.
ašku ġ-iḍ-ad ibidd-d sri yal-lmalak n-rbbi lli-mi-giġ wins ar-ti-tɛbadġ,
yini-yyi: ‹wa-bulus, ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ. hati iqqan-k-id a-tbiddt ġ-lgddam n-qayṣr. ifka-yak rbbi a-ur-immt yan zġ-ġwilli didk muddanin.›
thnnayat ġilad a-irgazn, ašku umnġ rbbi is-ra-yili ġmklli-s-iyi-d-inna.
walaynni iqqan-d a-n-nḍr ġ-kra n-igzir.»
wis kkuẓ d-mraw n-wass, sul ukan a-yaġ-idḥay-waḍu ġ-wammas n-umda n-adriyya. ġ-ṭuẓẓunt n-iḍ-an irwas i-ibaḥriyn is-nakmur s-kra n-wakal.
irin ad-issann tadrut n-umda ġin. grn-in izikr, yili ġ-ih̬f-ns kra n-uwzzal, afn-in gis kkuẓ id-mraw n-mitru. imikk grn-t-in-daġ, afn-in gis kraḍ id-mraw n-mitru.
ksuḍn a-yut-wanaw kra n-ujarif, luḥn-in kkuẓ iggusn zġ-tġurdin-ns, ar-n-trjun a-di-takmur-twaġla n-tafukt.
skrn ilmma ibaḥriyn f-ad-rwln zġ-wanaw. zzugzn tanawt s-waman zund iġ-ran a-n-luḥn kra n-iggusn zġ-lgddam n-wanaw.
walaynni isawl bulus s-lqbṭan d-iɛskrin yini-asn: «iġ-ur-didun-qaman ibaḥriyn ġ-wanaw ur-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tnjmm.»
nkrn iɛskrin ġakudan, bbin izakarn n-tanawt, adjn-tt-in ġ-umda.
lliġ-d-yakmur a-ifaw-wass isawl srsn bulus kullutn iḍalb-tn ad-ššn yini-asn: «hati kkuẓ d-mraw n-wass ayad tusim taġuft bahra ur-tššim yat.
ḍalbġ-kʷn ġilad a-tamẓm imikk n-umššu. ih̬ṣṣa-kʷn a-tssdusm ih̬fawn-nnun, ašku ur-akkʷ-ra-itthlk yan-unẓaḍ n-iguyya-nnun.»
lliġ-asn-inna mayad, yasi aġrum, iškr rbbi ġ-lgddam-nsn ibbi-t ar-ištta.
zɛmn ula ntni ġakudan, bdun ar-šttan.
nga nkkʷni sin id-miyya d-ssa n-id-mraw d-sḍiṣ (276) ġ-wanaw.
lliġ šbɛan kullutn, luḥn-in irdn lli-qamanin baš ad-ssifsusn f-wanaw.
lliġ-d-iġli-wass ur-ssinn ibaḥriyn man akal ad-lkmn, walaynni ẓran yat-tdġart yastwan n-umlal ġ-gr ijarifn. swangmn a-srs-awin anaw iġ-ẓḍarn.
bbin izakarn n-iggusn fln-tn ġ-umda, rẓmn i-izakarn n-tflwin lli-s-a-tguwwadn anaw. alln lqlɛ imẓẓin ġ-lgddam n-wanaw baš a-t-idḥi-waḍu s-lgddam. nakmur s-wakal,
walaynni izri-wanaw f-yan-mani ġ-ur-drin-waman. yut amlal itġz zġ-lgddam-ns, ur-iẓḍar a-sul-immass. ar-tt-kkatnt taḍangiwin aylliġ a-ifssi zġ-tġurdin-ns.
mšawarn iɛskrin i-ngratsn, irin ad-nġn iḥbbasn a-ur-gisn-iɛum kra n-yan ard ilkm akal irwl.
imma lqbṭan ira a-iḥṣar f-bulus ġ-laman, ur-tn-yudji ad-skrn ġmkan. yamr-tn wanna issnn a-iɛum a-n-iḍr ġ-waman izwur s-wakal.
yini i-wiyyaḍ kud yan a-iġwi ġ-kra n-ifrš n-wanaw nġd kra n-ukššuḍ. ġmkan a-s-kullu-nruḥ akal s-laman.
lliġ nnjm zġ-umda, naf-n igzir-an iga ġwalli mi ttinin maliṭa.
aškin-d imzdġn-ns skrn ginnġ afulki, ssrġn lɛafit ssmrḥban srnnġ kullwaġ ašku illa-unẓar d-usmmiḍ.
bulus issmun-d yat taggʷat n-ikššuḍn, yiri a-tn-in-isrs f-iggi l-lɛafit. iffuġ-d zgisn yan-ulgmmaḍ f-ssibt n-trġi, ilbi ġ-ufus n-bulus.
ayt-igzir, lliġ ẓran algmmaḍ yugʷl ġ-ufus n-bulus inin i-ngratsn: «argaz-ad, irwas is-inġa kra n-ruḥ. hati, wah̬h̬a injm zġ-umda ur-t-ifil lḥqq a-isul.»
walaynni bulus issus-n algmmaḍ ġ-lɛafit, ur-t-yaġ yat.
ar-tqln mddn-an ad-ẓrn is-ra-yuff bulus nġd a-iḍr s-wakal immt. walaynni lliġ qln yan kra ẓrn ur-as-ijri yat, wrrin ar-ttinin: «kra n-ilah ayad.»
ilin kra n-igran ġ-tsga lli-ġ-nlla, gan win lḥakm n-igzir-an ism-ns bublyus. išškšm-aġ s-tgmmi-ns ig-aġ d-inbgiwn-ns kraḍ-uwssan.
yili dars babas tssgn-t tawla, iḍr-gis-udis bahra. ikšm bulus s-tḥanut lli-ġ-illa, iẓẓall iḍalb rbbi isrs-n fllas ifassn-ns, ijjujji-t.
lliġ sfldn mddn i-mayad ar-d-dars-ttaškin kullu winna uḍnnin ġ-igzir-an, jjin.
ar-aġ-tuqqarn mddn-an s-twafkiw ggutnin, ar ass lli-ġ-ra-nffuġ zġ-darsn, awin-aġ-d kullu ma-rad-aġ-ih̬ṣṣa i-umuddu-nnġ.
ġmkan a-darsn-ngawr kraḍ-iyrn, nkšm ilmma s-yan-wanaw, ityawssan darsn s-yat lɛlama n-‹sin ilahat ikniwn›. ikka-d iskandariyya, iqama ula ntta ġ-igzir ġ-uzmz-an n-tgrst.
nssudu gis aylliġ nlkm tamdint n-sirakusa, nqama ġin kraḍ-uwssan.
nzayd ilmma zġ-ġin s-lmrsa n-rigyun. ndid azkka iṣuḍ-d-waḍu išwan zġ-ljanub. ndid azkka nlkm lmrsa n-buṭyuli.
naf-n ġin kra n-aytmatn, ḍalbn-aġ ad-darsn-ngguz ssa n-uwssan. ġmkan a-s-nakmur s-ruma.
lliġ sfldn aytmatn ġ-ruma is-n-nuška, ffuġn-d ar ‹ssuq n-abbyus› ula aduwwar n-‹kraḍ lfnadq› baš ad-aġ-d-mnaggarn. lliġ-tn-iẓra bulus, iškr rbbi izɛm.
lliġ-n-nkšm s-tmdint n-ruma, lqbṭan yudja bulus a-izdġ waḥdut, ig fllas yan-uɛskri igabl-t.

zrin kraḍ-uwssan yazn bulus s-imġarn n-ayt-yudaya, iḍalb zġ-gisn ad-d-dars-aškin. lliġ-d-munn ntni yini-asn: «way-aytma, ur-jjud nkkin a-irgmn ġ-ayt-tmazirt-nnġ ula lɛadat n-imzwura-nnġ, walaynni umẓn-iyi kra n-ayt-yudaya ġ-urušalim dḥin-iyi s-gr ifassn l-lḥukkam n-rruman.
lliġ-iyi-sqsan rruman f-mad-skrġ, ur-gigi-ufin kra-s-a-flla-tḥkamn s-lmut, irin ad-iyi-rẓmn.
walaynni mddn-an n-ayt-yudaya ur-qbiln mayan, aylliġ-iyi-ih̬ṣṣa ad-ssġliġ taġawsa-nu s-dar qayṣr wah̬h̬a ur-dari kra-s-a-taštkkaġ s-ayt-tmazirt-inu.
mayan a-f-ḍalbġ a-kʷn-ẓrġ sawlġ didun. ašku tyawkrrafġ ġilad s-ssnasl f-ssibt n-rrja lli-ġ-n-rjan ayt-rbbi.»
inin-as ġakudan: «ur-aġ-d-fllak-lkimnt kra n-tbratin zġ-yudaya, ula nnan fllak aytmatn lli-d-uškanin zġ-ġin kra l-lh̬bar nġd awal yʷh̬šnn.
walaynni nra ad-aġ-tmlt iswingimn-nnk, ašku nsfld is-a-ttinin mddn ġ-kraygatt mani ur-išwi-uġaras-an.»

izzga didsn ass yaḍni baš ad-d-dars-daġ-munn. lliġ ilkm-wass-an, iggut ma-d-yuškan s-illiġ izdġ bulus. ar-asn-isawal s-lmɛqul zġ-zikk ṣbaḥ ar iḍ f-mamnk a-tga-tgldit n-rbbi. ar-fllasn-yaqra zġ-ššrɛ n-musa d-warratn l-lanbiya baš ad-asn-iml is-yʷġẓan ma-ittini f-yasuɛ.
iwrri kra gisn yumn awal-ns, imma wiyyaḍ agʷin ad-amnn.
ur-d-mšaškan i-ngratsn, ffuġn ilmma zġ-dars lliġ-asn-inna awal-ad: «s-lḥqq a-s-isawl rruḥ lqudus lliġ inna i-imzwura-nnun f-imi n-nnabi išaɛya:
‹ddu s-mddn-an tinit-asn, rad-bahra-tsflidm walaynni ur-ra-tfhmm ma-mi-tsfldm. rad-bahra-ttmnadm walaynni ur-ra-tissanm ma-tmnadm.
wrrin mddn-an iqqur ih̬f-nsn, ẓẓayn imzgan-nsn, qqnnt-walln-nsn. ur-rint ad-ẓrnt-walln-nsn ula sfldn imzgan-nsn ula fhmn ġ-iguyya-nsn. ur-rin ad-d-sri-wrrin a-tn-jjujjiġ.›
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, ajnjm-ad ifka-t rbbi ġilad i-ayt-tmizar yaḍni. ntni a-ra-srs-isfld.»
iqama bulus ġin sin isggʷasn, izdġ ġ-tgmmi lli-ikʷra, ar-issmrḥba s-kullu wanna-n-dars-yuškan.
ar-asn-isawal s-zzɛamt f-tgldit n-rbbi, ar-tn-isslmad f-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ur-t-iḥṣar yan.
zġ-bulus ah̬ddam l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ. iġra-yyi-d iẓli-yyi ad-gġ arqqas-ns ar-tbrraḥġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin n-rbbi.
lh̬bar-ad iga ġwalli-f-uran lanbiya ġayd izrin ġ-warratn n-rbbi, imla-yasn mamnk a-ra-yili.
iga lh̬bar f-yus siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ. nttan zġ-tsga n-ddat iga zġ-tasut n-dawd. imma zġ-tsga n-rruḥ iban gis is-iga yus n-rbbi amẓlay s-tḥkimt itjhhdn lliġ-d-inkr zġ-lmut.
f-uwdm-ns a-f-aġ-ibark rbbi ifk-aġ tarqqast-ad s-ism-ns, baš ad-amnn mddn ġ-kraygatt tamazirt skrn s-wawal-ns.
ula kunni tgam zġ-willi mi iġra rbbi ad-gn win yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
i-kullu willi-ġ-iḥnna rbbi ġ-tmdint n-ruma lli-mi-iġra ad-gn imẓlayn-ns. ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
awal izwarn iga-t: ar-tškarġ rbbi-nu fllawn kullukn f-uwdm n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ašku ar-sflidn mddn ġ-kullu ddunit f-mamnk a-srs-tumnm.
rbbi lli-mi-th̬damġ s-nniyt n-uwl-inu s-tbrraḥt l-lh̬bar ifulkin n-yus, nttan a-issnn mamnk a-bdda-gigun-swingimġ ġakud nna-tẓallaġ,
ar-ti-tḍalabġ ad-iyi-issnm aġaras iġ-ira, baš a-n-darun-aškġ ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn.
ašku riġ bahra a-kʷn-ẓrġ ad-awn-in-awiġ kra l-lbaraka n-rruḥ lqudus ma-kʷn-issdusn ġ-liman.
riġ-nnit a-nzzɛam i-ngratnnġ nkki didun ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ.
riġ a-tissanm ay-aytma, mnnawt-twal ad-skrġ f-a-n-darun-aškġ walaynni ar-iyi-itḥṣar kra. riġ ad-iyi-tili lġllt ġ-darun ġmklli-yyi-tlla ġ-tmizar n-tsgiw yaḍni.
ašku illa flla ad-tɛawanġ kullu mddn, ayt-tmdint ula ayt-udrar, ġwilli ġranin ula ġwilli ur-ġrinin.
mayad a-f-riġ bahra ad-tbrraḥġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin ġ-darun ula kunni lli-zdġnin ġ-ruma.
ur-a-tḥšamġ s-lh̬bar-ad ifulkin, ašku iga taḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi lli-s-a-ijjnjam kullu wanna yumnn, ayt-yudaya imzwura ula ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
ar-aġ-imala lh̬bar-ad mamnk a-s-a-iskar rbbi sslamt ġ-gras d-willi umnnin, ar-tt-iskar f-ssibt l-liman-nsn ġmklli ityaran, inna rbbi: «wanna yumnn, nttan a-f-rad-rḍuġ fkġ-as tudrt.»
ašku iban-d ġilad lġaḍab n-rbbi. igguz-d zġ-ignna f-mddn ʷh̬šnnin lli-srs-rurnin tiġurdin-nsn, ar-ssrgasn lḥqq s-lh̬ʷšant-nsn.
lġaḍab-ns a-fllasn-illan ašku ssnn f-rbbi ma-fllas-ssnn kullu mddn, rbbi-nnit ad-asn-t-imlan.

ašku zġ-lliġ ih̬lq ddunit, iban mamnk a-iga ġwalli ur-iẓri yan, iban is-dars taḥkimt itjhhdn n-walli bdda illan, iban is-iga rbbi itjhhdn. ssnn ntni mamnk a-iga ašku ẓran ma-iskr, ur-darsn ma-ttinin.
walaynni wah̬h̬a ssnn mddn mamnk a-iga rbbi, ur-t-uqqirn ġmklli-tn-d-iqqann ula-da-ti-tškarn. jlan ntni s-iswingimn-nsn h̬wanin, iwrri illas lɛaql-nsn aylliġ ur-fhimn yat.
ar-ttinin: «nkkʷni a-iṭṭafn lɛaql,» walaynni inafaln ad-gan.
unfn i-rbbi l-lmjd lli-bdda-illan, ar-tɛbadn tiġawsiwin lli-skarn s-ifassn-nsn ar-tnt-ssrwasn s-bnadm lli-itmtatn d-igḍaḍ d-luḥuš d-ibnkaln.
f-ġayan a-f-tn-ifl rbbi, yadj-tn zaydn ġ-ššhwat-nsn, ar-tfsadn ar-skarn i-ngratsn ma-iššḥššamn,
agʷin lḥqq n-rbbi amẓn ġ-tkrkas. ar-tɛbadn ar-ssmqasan lmh̬luqat, urd ġwalli-tnt-ih̬lqn. nttan a-isthllan a-t-ntalġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.
ġayan a-f-tn-ifl rbbi, yadj-tn ad-skarn s-ššhwat-nsn lli-bahra-ššḥššamnin. ula timġarin-nsn wrrint ar-ṭṭarnt i-ngratsnt, ur-sul-a-ttirint irgazn.
ġmkan ad-gan ula irgazn, ar-ṭṭarn d-irgazn, ur-sul-a-ttirin timġarin. ar-jddrn s-ššhwat i-ngratsn, ar-tfsadn irgazn d-irgazn aylliġ umẓn i-ih̬f-nsn lɛqubit lli-asn-igan f-ddnub-nsn.
agʷin mddn-an a-stt-awin ġ-rbbi. ġayan a-f-tn-ifl ad-zaydn s-iswingimn-nsn rkanin d-iskkirn-nsn hršnin.
ɛmmrn s-kullu ma-igan lh̬ʷšant d-tšiṭant d-ṭṭmaɛ d-lɛar. ar-tnuwwašn ġ-kullu ma-tn-yufn, ujadn-bdda ad-nqqan. ar-tmmaġn ar-tknadn ar-tẓin. ar-bahra-sawaln ġ-wiyyaḍ,
ar-rggmn mddn ar-tkrhun rbbi. ur-a-tuqqarn yan, ar-ssfurrugn ar-ssimġurn ih̬f-nsn ar-bdda-siggiln tillay l-ljdid. agʷin ad-sflidn s-ayt-darsn.
iqqur-uwl-nsn bahra, ur-a-tqaman ġ-wawal-nsn. ar-tšqun d-kullu mddn, ur-a-tḥnnun ġ-yan.
ntni ssnn awal n-rbbi lli-s-inna lmut a-d-iqqann wanna iskarn tiġawsiwin-ad, walaynni ar-tnt-sul-skarn ar-nnit-tfraḥn s-wiyyaḍ nna-tnt-skarnin.
imma kiyi a-bnadm, ur-dark ma-ttinit. ašku iġ-a-tḥkamt f-mddn yaḍni, hatin tḥkamt ula f-ih̬f-nnk, ašku kiyi lli-itḥkamn, ar-tskart zund ntni.
nssn izd s-lḥqq a-s-a-ikkat rbbi lḥukm f-willi skarnin tiġawsiwin-an.
imma kiyi a-bnadm, is-tġalt is-ra-tnjmt zġ-lḥukm n-rbbi? ar-tḥkamt f-willi skarnin ġmkan, walaynni ar-tskart ġmkan ula kiyi.
is-a-ttinit d-ih̬f-nnk «rbbi ur-ra-flla-iḥkam ašku tggut dars lḥnant d-umhal d-ṣṣbr»? walaynni is-ur-tssint rbbi ar-sul-gik-itḥnnu ašku ira gik a-tflt kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn twrrit s-uġaras-ns?
imma kiyi iqqur-uwl-nnk ur-trit a-di-twrrit. hati ar-tssigatt f-ih̬f-nnk lɛqubit lli-ra-fllak-iḍr ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-yut rbbi lḥukm s-lḥqq iml mnšk a-bahra-ikurha lh̬ʷšant.
ašku rbbi ra-irar i-kraygatt yan f-ma-iskr.
llan kra n-mddn ar-bdda-skarn afulki ar-n-trjun ġ-dar rbbi a-tn-issattuy ar-tn-issimġur ifk-asn tudrt idumn. ntni rad-asn-ifk rbbi tudrt l-lih̬rt.
imma wiyyaḍ ar-tmmaġn ġir f-ih̬f-nsn, ar-skarn s-kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn, agʷin ad-skarn s-lḥqq. ntni ra-fllasn-yut rbbi lɛqubit s-lġaḍab itjhhdn.
kullu bnadm nna-iskarn ma-yʷh̬šnn, rad-as-tili-tmmara d-tguḍi. ra-tili zwar i-ayt-yudaya tili ula i-ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
imma kullu wanna iskarn afulki, ra-t-issattuy rbbi issimġur-t ifk-as sslamt. ra-stt-ifk zwar i-ayt-yudaya ifk-tt ula i-ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
ašku rbbi ur-a-iskar s-uwdmawn.
winna skarnin ddnub walaynni ur-ssinn ššrɛ n-rbbi, rad-kullu-tyawhlakn bla ššrɛ. imma winna ssnnin ššrɛ ar-sul-skarn ddnub, ššrɛ a-ra-fllasn-iḥkam.
ašku rbbi ur-a-itrḍu f-willi ġir sflidnin i-ššrɛ, walaynni f-willi skarnin s-ššrɛ.
han mddn n-tmizar yaḍni ur-ssinn ššrɛ, walaynni ġakud nna-yasn-inna-ugayyu-nsn ad-skarn ġmklli ittini ššrɛ, ar-malan is-ssnn ma-tn-d-iqqann a-t-skarn, wah̬h̬a ur-ssinn ššrɛ.
ar-malan is-ttyara lmɛna n-ššrɛ ġ-uwlawn-nsn, ar-ssḥssun s-tugga lli-llanin ġ-iguyya-nsn. ar-gisn-tmmaġn iswingimn-nsn ard issann mayd skarn izd lh̬ʷšant nġd afulki.
ra-gisn-iban kullu mayad ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-iḥkam rbbi s-ism l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ f-kullu ma-intln ġ-uwl n-bnadm. ġmkad a-ittini lh̬bar ifulkin lli-s-a-tbrraḥġ.
imma kiyi ma-ra-tskrt, kiyi lli-ittinin f-ih̬f-nnk gu-yudaya a-tgit? ar-tbnnut f-ššrɛ, ar-ttinit tgit win rbbi.
ar-ttinit tssnt ma-ira rbbi, tissant ma-ra-ifulki ašku imla-yak-t ššrɛ.
kiyi tgit ih̬f-nnk d-umzwar i-ibukaḍn ula tifawt i-willi llanin ġ-tillas.
iɛzzu dark a-tmlt aġaras i-imjlan ar-tsslmadt ibujadiyn. tġalt is-teṭṭaft kullu tawassna d-lḥqq f-ssibt n-ma-tssnt ššrɛ.
imma kiyi lli-isslmadn wiyyaḍ, is-ur-ra-tsslmadt ih̬f-nnk? tmyart ad-asn-ttinit «a-ur-takʷrm» walaynni is-urd kiyi ayd itakʷrn?
tmyart a-ttinit «a-ur-tznum» walaynni is-urd kiyi ayd itznun? ar-bahra-ttẓit f-laṣnam, walaynni is-urd kiyi a-itawin ma-ittilin ġ-tgʷmma l-laṣnam?
ar-ttinit f-ih̬f-nnk is-tuft mddn yaḍni ašku tssnt ššrɛ n-rbbi, walaynni is-urd kiyi a-itknadn rbbi tffuġt zġ-ššrɛ-ns?
ġmklli ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi: «ayt-tmizar yaḍni ar-rggmn ġ-ism n-rbbi f-ssibt-nnun kunni.»
rad-ak-išwu iġ-tgit zġ-willi tẓallanin i-ddat-nsn, iġ-a-tskart s-ššrɛ. walaynni iġ-ur-a-tskart s-ššrɛ, han taẓallit n-ddat-nnk ur-tgi yat.
imma wanna ur-iẓẓullin i-ddat, iġ-a-iskar s-ššrɛ ra-fllas-irḍu rbbi ula ntta zund iġ-iẓẓulla i-ddat.

ġmkad a-s-kʷn-ufn ayt-tmizar yaḍni ašku ntni ar-skarn s-ššrɛ wah̬h̬a ur-darsn taẓallit n-ddat, imma kunni n-ayt-yudaya tffuġm zġ-ššrɛ wah̬h̬a tẓẓullam i-ddat ilin-warratn n-ššrɛ ġ-gr ifassn-nnun.
ma-igan gu-yudaya bab n-tẓallit s-lḥqq? ur-t-igi ġwalli issġusn ddat-ns s-tẓallit lli-itbann i-mddn.

a-igan gu-yudaya s-lḥqq d-walli issġusn ul-ns. issġus-t s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus urd s-warratn n-ššrɛ, ibddl zġ-ugʷns-ns urd brra-ns. wanna iskarn ġmkad, urd bnadm a-ra-t-yalġ walaynni rbbi a-ra-t-yalġ.
imma ġilad, ma-ra-nini f-ayt-yudaya? is-ur-darsn timih̬ar n-rbbi uggʷar n-mddn yaḍni? imma taẓallit n-ddat, is-ur-gis-tlli kra l-lfaytt?
rad-awn-iniġ, ntni ad-dar timih̬ar s-kigan. tamah̬irt tamzwarut: ntni a-mi-ifka rbbi iwaliwn-ns.
walaynni lliġ ur-zgan kra n-ayt-yudaya ġ-iwaliwn n-rbbi, is-iffuġ nttan zġ-iwaliwn-an?
uhu, ur-a-itffuġ rbbi zġ-wawal-ns. ar-bdda-iskar s-lḥqq wah̬h̬a da-kullu-skarn mddn s-tkrkas. ġmklli ityaran: «ra-iban is-yʷġẓan-wawal-nnk, ẓrn imṣraḍn-nnk izd kiyi a-dar lḥqq.»
walaynni iġ-a-itban lḥqq n-rbbi s-uggʷar f-ssibt l-lh̬ʷšant lli-nskar nkkʷni, izd ra-nini «rbbi ur-iġwi lḥqq lliġ fllannġ iġḍb.» ha-yyi sawlġ zund mddn n-ddunit-ad,
walaynni ur-ra-nini ġmkan. ašku rbbi, mrad is-ur-dars lḥqq ur-ra-yiẓḍar a-iḥkam f-ddunit.
iġ-nffuġ zġ-lḥqq, nml izd rbbi a-dar lḥqq. walaynni iġ-nssbayyn timuġra n-rbbi s-ġmkan, mah̬ aylliġ sul ira a-fllannġ-iḥkam ig-aġ d-willi ʷh̬šnnin?

iġ-iga ġmkan is-ur-ra-yaf a-nini: «nkrat a-nskar lh̬ʷšant baš a-iban-ufulki n-rbbi s-uggʷar»? llan-nnit kra n-mddn ar-ginnġ-rggmn, ġaln izd ġmkan a-s-a-nttini. imma ntni ra-fllasn-ittut lḥukm lli-asn-igan.
imma nkkʷni n-ayt-yudaya, is-nuf mddn yaḍni? uhu ur-tn-nuf, ašku illa lḥukm n-rbbi f-kullu mddn ġmklli-yad nniġ, yili f-ayt-yudaya yili-daġ f-ayt-tmizar yaḍni, ašku ar-kullu-skarn ddnub.
ġmklli ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi: «ur-illi yan ifulkin,
ur-illi yan ifhmn, ur-illi yan isiggiln rbbi.
ffuġn aġaras kullutn, jlan. ur-illi yan iskarn afulki, ur-akkʷ-illi yan.
ar-rẓẓmn aqrjuḍ-nsn zund amḍḍal ih̬wan. tikrkas ka-tasin s-ils. ssmm zund ilgmmaḍn a-itkkan infurn-nsn.
imi-nsn ar-d-issufuġ nnɛlat d-trggam.
ar-bdda-tujadn ad-ssyaggasn wiyyaḍ.
ar-tawin tammara d-tguḍi kullu mani tkkan.
aġaras n-sslamt ur-jju-t-ssinn.
ur-akkʷ-a-tuqqarn rbbi.»
kullu ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ, nssn is-ityara f-ssibt n-willi dar ššrɛ, baš a-iqqn imi i-kraygatt yan, tili ddunit kullutt ġ-ddu lḥukm n-rbbi.
ašku ur-iẓḍar yan a-iskr sslamt ġ-gras d-rbbi s-iskkirn n-ššrɛ. walaynni ššrɛ ad-aġ-imalan ma-igan ddnub.
imma ġilad imla-yaġ rbbi aġaras lli-s-iskr sslamt ġ-gras d-mddn. urd ššrɛ a-s-tt-iskr, walaynni ar-nnit-imala ššrɛ ula lanbiya izd lḥqq a-iga.
ašku rbbi ar-iskar sslamt ġ-gras d-willi umnnin s-yasuɛ lmasiḥ. ar-tt-yakka i-kullu wanna yumnn, ašku bnadm yan a-iga.
kullu mddn skrn ddnub, aggugn f-lmjd n-rbbi.
walaynni s-rrḥmt-ns a-s-asn-ifka lbaraka-yad, iskr sslamt ġ-gras didsn f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
yuzn-d lmasiḥ a-immt ifru mddn s-idammn-ns baš a-iṣamḥ i-winna srs umnnin. ġmkad a-s-imla rbbi izd s-lḥqq a-s-a-bdda-iskar. ġayd izrin iṣbr bahra, ur-a-itḥkam f-ddnub n-mddn.
imma ġilad imla mamnk a-izzga lḥqq, ifk sslamt i-wanna yumnn s-yasuɛ.
is-sul-nẓḍar a-ntškar ih̬f-nnġ? uhu, ur-akkʷ-nẓḍar a-nškr ih̬f-nnġ, ašku ur-a-fllannġ-itrḍu rbbi f-ssibt n-kra nskar walaynni f-ssibt n-ma-numn.
nlmd is-iskr rbbi sslamt ġ-gras d-mddn f-ssibt l-liman-nsn, urd f-ssibt n-iskkirn n-ššrɛ.
ra-kʷn-sqsaġ ġilad: izd rbbi win ayt-yudaya ka-iga? is-ur-igi win ayt-tmizar yaḍni ula ntni? s-ṣṣaḥt, iga rbbi n-ayt-tmizar yaḍni,
ašku ur-illi abla nttan. ra-iskr sslamt ġ-gras d-ayt-yudaya f-ssibt n-mad-umnn, iskr sslamt ġ-gras d-ayt-tmizar yaḍni f-ssibt n-mad-umnn ula ntni.
walaynni iġ-a-ntamn ġmkad is-ra-niri a-n-nluḥ ššrɛ? uhu, ur-akkʷ-ra-n-nluḥ ššrɛ, walaynni ar-t-sul-nzzga.
ma-ra-nini f-ibrahim lli-igan babatnnġ zġ-tsga n-ddat? mad-as-illan?
mrad izd f-ssibt n-kra iskar ibrahim a-f-fllas-irḍa rbbi, ra-dars-yili ma-s-a-itškar ih̬f-ns. walaynni ur-iẓḍar yan a-iškr ih̬f-ns ġ-lgddam n-rbbi.
ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi: «ibrahim yumn rbbi, mayan a-f-t-iga rbbi d-wad-f-irḍa.»
wanna ith̬damn ar-itamẓ tiġrad-ns, urd tikki ad-gant, walaynni f-twuri lli-iskr a-f-a-tnt-itamẓ.
imma wanna yumnn s-walli yakkan sslamt i-mddn ʷh̬šnnin, ra-t-ig rbbi d-wad-f-irḍa f-ssibt n-ma-yumn, urd f-ssibt n-kra iskar.
ula dawd imla izd ambarki a-iga wanna-f-irḍa rbbi bla iskr yat,
yini: «imbarkin ad-gan winna mi iṣamḥ rbbi f-ddnub-nsn, issitti fllasn ġaylli-tn-iššḥššamn.
ambarki a-iga wanna mi ur-iḥasb rbbi lmɛṣiyat-ns.»

ma-ra-nini f-lbaraka-yad f-isawl dawd? is-tlla ġir i-willi ẓẓullanin i-ddat-nsn? uhu, tlla ula i-willi ur-ẓẓullinin i-ddat. ašku nġra ma-ityaran f-ibrahim, nġr izd f-ssibt n-ma-yumn a-f-t-iga rbbi d-wad-f-irḍa.
imma rrḍa-yad, managu ad-as-t-ifka rbbi? izd ġakud lliġ ur-ta-iẓẓulli ibrahim i-ddat-ns, nġd ġ-tġurdin n-mad-as-iẓẓulla? ifka-yas-t rbbi lliġ ur-ta-iẓẓulli.

tga-yas-tẓallit-an tamatart ma-s-a-d-iktti rrḍa lli-as-ifka rbbi f-ssibt n-ma-yumn lliġ ur-ta-iẓẓulli i-ddat-ns. ġmkad a-s-iwrri iga ibrahim babatsn n-kullu willi umnnin rbbi, a-tn-igan d-willi-f-irḍa rbbi wah̬h̬a ur-ẓẓullin i-ddat.
imma ibrahim iga babatsn ula n-willi ẓẓullanin i-ddat, urd ġir f-ssibt n-tẓallit walaynni f-ssibt n-mad-umnn rbbi ula ntni ġmklli yumn ibrahim lliġ ur-ta-iẓẓulli i-ddat-ns.
awal izgan a-s-inna rbbi i-ibrahim ula tarwa-ns, yini-as: «ra-twrtm kullu ddunit.» urd f-ssibt n-ššrɛ a-f-as-inna awal-an, walaynni f-ssibt n-ma-yumn ibrahim irḍu fllas rbbi.
mrad izd ayt-ššrɛ a-ra-iwrt ddunit ur-ra-yili yat i-willi umnnin ula-ra-izga-wawal-an n-rbbi.
imma ššrɛ ra-d-yawi lɛqubit n-rbbi f-willi ssnnin ššrɛ. walaynni ġwilli-t-ur-ssinnin, ntni ur-zgis-ffuġn.

imma ġwilli umnnin, ntni a-ra-yamẓ kullu mayad. ntni a-mi-ra-issafu rbbi awal-ns, baš a-yakka lbaraka-ns i-kullu winna ganin tarwa n-ibrahim, urd ġir i-willi skarnin s-ššrɛ, walaynni ra-stt-yakka i-willi umnnin ġmklli yumn ibrahim. ašku ibrahim iwrri iga babatnnġ kullwaġ,
ġmklli ityaran: «giġ-k d-babatsn n-ayt-tmizar ggutnin.» ġmkad a-s-iga ibrahim babatnnġ dar rbbi lli-s-yumn, a-t-igan d-walli issddrn ġwilli mmutnin, ar-itamr ma-ur-illin a-yili s-illa.
imma ibrahim, wah̬h̬a ur-ta-yas-illi yat ġ-maylli itrju, izuyd ar-sul-itrju s-liman iggutn aylliġ-nnit iwrri iga «babatsn n-ayt-tmizar ggutnin.» inna-yas rbbi: «ġunškad a-rad-gn tarwa-nnk.»
ntta ur-iškka ġ-mad-as-inna rbbi, wah̬h̬a issn is-dars-illa ma-itggan miyya n-usggʷas, tuwssr ddat-ns bahra ula tẓḍar-tmġart-ns sara a-trbbu.
yumn rbbi bla-akkʷ iškka ġ-wawal lli-s-as-inna. izayd idus ġ-liman-ns ar-italġ rbbi,
yissan bahra is-iẓḍar rbbi a-ikmml maylli-s-as-inna s-wawal izgan.
mayad a-f-t-iga rbbi d-wad-f-irḍa, ašku yumn.
walaynni lliġ ityara «iga-t d-wad-f-irḍa,» urd ġir f-ssibt n-ibrahim a-f-ityara-wawal-an.
ityara f-ssibt-nnġ ula nkkʷni. ašku rbbi rad-aġ-ig d-wid f-irḍa ula nkkʷni, f-ssibt n-ma-numn srs nttan lli-d-issnkrn siditnnġ yasuɛ zġ-lmut.
idḥi-t a-immt f-ssibt n-ddnub-nnġ, issnkr-t-id a-iskr sslamt ġ-gratnnġ dids.
imma ġilad tlla-yaġ sslamt ġ-gratnnġ d-rbbi f-uwdm n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ašku iga-yaġ d-wid-f-irḍa f-ssibt n-ma-srs-numn.
f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ a-f-aġ-tlla lbaraka-yad lliġ srs numn. ar-bahra-ntfraḥ s-rrja-yad-aġ-ifka, ašku nssn is-rad-aġ-išškšm s-lmjd n-rbbi.
walaynni urd ġir mayan a-s-a-ntfraḥ. ar-ntfraḥ ula s-trfufnt nna-darnnġ-illan, ašku nssn izd s-trfufnt a-s-ra-ginnġ-itzayad ṣṣbr.
ula s-ṣṣbr a-s-ra-ntnru tassast nna-illan. ula s-tnri a-s-ra-darnnġ-yili rrja.
ula rrja ur-rad-aġ-iẓẓigʷraẓ, ašku rbbi iɛmmr ulawn-nnġ s-lḥnant-ns s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus lli-aġ-ifka.
ġakud lli-iqṣad rbbi, lliġ sul nḍɛf, immut lmasiḥ ad-aġ-ijjnjm nkkʷni lli-n-irurn tiġurdin-nnġ s-rbbi.
is-ur-ra-išqu a-immt kra n-yan f-yan iskarn lḥqq? iẓḍar a-yili ma-ra-izɛm ard immt f-yan ifulkin,
walaynni rbbi imla-yaġ mnšk a-s-ginnġ-iḥnna, ašku immut fllannġ lmasiḥ lliġ sul a-ntsala ddnub.
imma ġilad ġ-iskr sslamt ġ-gratnnġ d-rbbi s-lmut-ns, nssn bahra is-rad-aġ-ijjnjm lmasiḥ zġ-lġaḍab n-rbbi.
ašku lliġ sul nga wid tẓinin d-rbbi, iskr sslamt ġ-gratnnġ dids s-lmut n-yus. imma ġilad ġ-tlla sslamt ġ-gratnnġ dids, nssn s-uggʷar is-rad-aġ-ijjnjm s-tudrt-ns.
walaynni urd ġir mayan a-darnnġ-illan. nkkʷni s-lfrḥ iggutn a-s-a-ntfraḥ s-rbbi, ašku ifka-yaġ sslamt ġilad ġ-gratnnġ dids f-ssibt n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
f-ssibt n-babatnnġ adam a-s-d-kšmn ddnub s-ddunit, awin-d lmut. mayan a-f-a-tmtatn kullu mddn, ašku kullu skrn ddnub.
kkan-ttin ddnub ġ-ddunit ur-ta-ityawfka ššrɛ. ur-a-itḥasab rbbi ddnub-an lliġ ur-illi ššrɛ,

walaynni ar-kullu-tmtatn mddn-an. ar-tn-ttnru lmut zġ-uwssan n-adam d-sul ġ-uwssan n-musa, ar-ttnru ula ġwilli ur-ffuġnin zġ-kra n-wawal n-rbbi ġmklli iffuġ adam s-lmɛṣit lli-iskr nttan. irwas adam i-yasuɛ lli-d-yuškan tigira-ns.

walaynni urd yan ad-gan, ašku tawafka n-rbbi ur-tgi zund lmɛṣit n-adam. ggutn ġwilli mmutnin f-ssibt l-lmɛṣit n-urgaz-an, walaynni uggʷar a-tga lbaraka n-rbbi ula tawafka lli-s-ibark mddn ggutnin f-uwdm n-urgaz yaḍni a-t-igan d-yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
tawafka-yad ur-tgi zund lmɛṣit-an. ašku lliġ iɛaṣa adam yat-twal, yut rbbi fllas lḥukm s-lɛqubit išqan. imma ġilad ġ-bahra-ɛaṣan mddn ggutnin, ifka-yaġ tawafka-yad n-sslamt ġ-gratnnġ dids.

tkka-ttin lmut ar-ttnru f-ssibt l-lmɛṣit n-adam, walaynni uggʷar n-mayan a-ra-nnru s-tudrt lli-aġ-illan f-ssibt n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, nkkʷni lli-mi-ifka rbbi lbaraka iggutn d-twafka n-sslamt ġ-gratnnġ dids.
ġakud lliġ iɛaṣa adam, a-tlla lɛqubit i-kullu mddn. ġakud lliġ iskr yasuɛ ma-irḍan rbbi, a-tlla sslamt d-tudrt i-kullu mddn.
ġakud lliġ iffuġ adam zġ-wawal n-rbbi, a-irur mddn ggutnin ffuġn zġ-wawal-ns. ġakud lliġ iskr yasuɛ s-wawal n-rbbi, a-irur mddn ggutnin irḍu fllasn rbbi.
ifk ilmma rbbi ššrɛ baš ad-igatn lmɛṣiyat. walaynni ġunšk lli-ttigatn ddnub uggʷar-an a-tga lḥnant n-rbbi.
hati lquwwa n-ddnub ar-di-ttawi lmut, imma lquwwa l-lḥnant n-rbbi ar-di-ttawi sslamt d-tudrt idumn f-uwdm n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ siditnnġ.
ma-ra-nini f-mayad? is-a-nzayd ġ-ddnub baš a-ttigat lḥnant n-rbbi?
uhu, urd ġmkan a-ra-nskar. ašku nkkʷni nmmut i-ddnub. mamnk a-ra-niri a-sul-gisn-nzayd?
is-ur-tssinm? lliġ nddm ġ-waman baš a-ng win lmasiḥ yasuɛ, nkšm s-lmut l-lmasiḥ s-udum-an.
ntyawmḍal dids s-udum lli-irwasn i-lmut baš a-nddr s-tudrt l-ljdid, ġmklli-d-inkr nttan zġ-lmut s-tḥkimt n-rbbi babas.
ašku lliġ nwrri nga zund lmasiḥ ġ-lmut-ns, ra-ng zund nttan ula ġ-tudrt-ns l-ljdid.
nssn mayd-aġ-ijran. immut zġ-ginnġ bnadm aqdim lli-sttin-nkka nga-t. immut d-lmasiḥ f-uggjdi baš a-titti lquwwa n-ddnub zġ-uwl-nnġ a-ur-sul-ng ismgan i-ddnub.
ašku wanna immutn, hati ityawfsay zġ-iskraf n-ddnub.
lliġ nmmut d-lmasiḥ, namn is-ra-dids-nddr,
ašku nssn is-ur-ra-immt lmasiḥ tis snat-twal ġilad ġ-d-inkr zġ-lmut. ur-sar-tẓḍar lmut a-ti-tnru.
ġakud lliġ immut lmasiḥ immt yat-twal i-kullu ma-igan ddnub. imma ġilad ġ-iddr, hati iddr i-rbbi.
ġmkad a-kʷn-d-iqqan ula kunni a-tgm ih̬f-nnun d-willi mmutnin i-ddnub tddrm i-rbbi f-ssibt n-ma-tgam win lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
a-ur-tadjm ddnub ad-tḥkamn ġ-ddat-nnun lli-ra-immt, ula-da-kʷn-traran a-tskarm s-lh̬ʷšant lli-ittiri-uwl n-bnadm.
a-ur-takkam igzman n-ddat-nnun zund irukutn l-lh̬ʷšant ad-skarn ddnub. walaynni fkat ih̬fawn-nnun i-rbbi zund ġwilli nkrnin zġ-lmut s-tudrt l-ljdid, tfkm igzman-nnun i-rbbi zund irukutn n-ufulki.
ur-ra-kʷn-nrun ddnub ašku ur-tgim ġwilli-f-illa ššrɛ, walaynni tgam ġwilli-f-tlla lḥnant n-rbbi.
ma-ra-nini f-mayad? is-ra-nzayd ar-nskar ddnub f-ssibt n-ma-nga ġwilli-f-tlla lḥnant n-rbbi urd ššrɛ? uhu, urd ġmkan a-ra-nskar,

ašku tssnm mayad: iġ-tfkam ih̬f-nnun i-kra n-yan a-tskarm ma-ira, twrrim tgam ismgan i-walli mi tskarm s-wawal-ns. iġ-a-tskarm ddnub rad-awn-tili lmut, walaynni iġ-a-tskarm ma-ira rbbi rad-awn-yili-ufulki lli-s-irḍa.
imma ġilad illa fllannġ a-bahra-ntalġ rbbi, ašku kunni lli-sttin-ikkan tgam ismgan n-ddnub, hati twrrim ar-tskarm s-nniyt n-uwl-nnun s-tnbaḍin n-ulmmud lli-mi-tsfldm.
ifsi-awn rbbi zġ-iskraf n-ddnub aylliġ twrrim tgam ismgan n-rbbi ar-tskarm s-ma-t-irḍan.

hati ar-didun-sawalġ ġilad s-iwaliwn rh̬anin ašku tḍɛfm, išqa fllawn a-tfhmm. tkkam-ttin tfkam ih̬fawn-nnun ismgan i-lɛib d-lh̬ʷšant baš a-ttzayadm ar-tskarm kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn. imma ġilad iqqan-kʷn-d a-tfkm ih̬fawn-nnun a-tskarm afulki lli-s-irḍa rbbi ttyawẓlaym a-tgm wins.
lliġ ttin tkkam tgam ismgan i-ddnub, ar-sul-tskarm ġmklli ttirim bla-da-ttlhum s-ma-irḍan rbbi.
walaynni ġayan tskarm lli-f-kʷn-tʷgraẓ ġilad, mal-lfaytt zgis tumẓm? iskkirn-an ur-a-di-tawin abla lmut.
walaynni rbbi ifsi-awn zġ-iskraf n-ddnub. twrrim tgm ismgan n-rbbi, ttyawẓlaym a-tgm wins tili-awn lfaytt n-tudrt idumn.
ašku tiġrad n-ddnub lmut a-stt-igan, walaynni tikki n-rbbi tga tudrt idumn f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ siditnnġ.
way-aytma, rad-bahra-tfhmm ma-rad-awn-iniġ ašku kunni tssnm ššrɛ. tissanm is-ur-a-itḥkam ššrɛ abla f-willi ddrnin.
ġmkad a-ra-yili-urgaz tamġart-ns kullu ma-ikka iddr, walaynni iġ-immut-urgaz tfsi-tmġart zġ-iskraf l-lɛqd lli-stt-dids-ikrfn.
iġ-tdda nttat tzdġ d-kra n-urgaz yaḍni sul iddr-urgaz-ns, rad-as-ttinin ‹tamggant›. walaynni iġ-immut-urgaz-ns, tfsi-tmġart zġ-lɛqd-lli n-ššrɛ. ur-ra-tg tamggant iġ-tt-itahl yan yaḍni.
ġmkad a-tgam ula kunni ay-aytma. tmmutm s-lmut l-lmasiḥ i-ma-igan win ššrɛ, iṭṭaf-kʷn yan yaḍni, a-t-igan d-walli-d-inkrn zġ-lmut baš a-nskar lġllt ifulkin i-rbbi.
ġayd izrin nkka-ttin ar-ntlhu s-ma-ittiri bnadm i-ih̬f-ns, ar-aġ-itrara ššrɛ a-nswingim s-uggʷar ġ-lh̬ʷšant lli-ittiri-uwl-nnġ, aylliġ a-nskar lġllt yʷh̬šnn lli-d-itawin lmut.
imma ġilad ntyawfsay zġ-ššrɛ nmmt i-ġaylli-aġ-ikrfn, baš a-ng ih̬ddamn n-rbbi urd s-tnbaḍin tiqdimin n-ššrɛ lli-ityaran walaynni s-tnbaḍin l-ljdid n-rruḥ lqudus.

imma ššrɛ, ma-ra-fllas-nini? is-yʷh̬šn? uhu, urd ġmkan a-ra-nini, ašku ššrɛ a-yyi-imlan ddnub. mrad is-urd ššrɛ a-innan «a-ur-ttirit ma-igan win wiyyaḍ» ikun ur-rad-issanġ is-bahra-yʷh̬šn ad-iriġ ma-igan win wiyyaḍ.
walaynni lliġ sfldġ i-luṣit-an mġin-d gigi ddnub, rarn-iyi a-ttiriġ kullu kra igan win wiyyaḍ. walaynni innaġ ur-illi ššrɛ ur-ẓḍarn ddnub ad-d-mġin.
ula nkki kkiġ-ttin ddrġ lliġ ur-ta-ssinġ ššrɛ, walaynni ġakud lliġ sfldġ i-luṣit bdun ddnub ar-gigi-tmġayn aylliġ-iyi-ssruḥn i-lmut.
luṣit lli-imlan i-mddn aġaras n-tudrt, nttat a-yyi-d-yiwin lmut.
ašku lliġ sfldġ i-luṣit-an mġin-d gigi ddnub, jlun-iyi nġn-iyi.
mayad a-f-awn-ttiniġ: ššrɛ iga win rbbi, ula luṣit tga tin rbbi. lḥqq ad-gan fulkin bahra.

walaynni izd maylli ifulkin a-yyi-d-yiwin lmut? uhu urd ġmkan a-iga, ašku ddnub a-yyi-d-yiwin lmut. kšmn ddnub ġ-maylli ifulkin baš ad-issanġ ddnub mamnk ad-gan. mayad a-f-ifka rbbi luṣit-ns: baš a-nẓr mnšk a-bahra-ʷh̬šnn ddnub.
nssn ššrɛ is-iga win rbbi, imma nkki giġ bnadm iḍɛfn, gġ ismg i-ddnub.
ur-a-tfhamġ mad-skarġ. ur-a-skarġ afulki lli-riġ, walaynni lh̬ʷšant lli-kurhiġ kad-skarġ.
akud nna-skarġ ma-ur-riġ ar-malaġ is-ssnġ ššrɛ ifulki.
ar-malaġ-daġ is-urd nkki a-iskarn ġayan walaynni lquwwa n-ddnub lli-gigi-illan, nttat a-t-iskarn.
ssnġ is-ur-illi kra ifulkin ġ-ddat-ad-inu. wah̬h̬a da-ttiriġ ad-skarġ afulki ur-a-tiẓḍarġ.
ur-a-skarġ afulki lli-riġ, walaynni lh̬ʷšant lli-ur-riġ, nttat ad-skarġ.
iġ-a-skarġ ġaylli ur-riġ, urd nkki a-t-iskarn walaynni lquwwa n-ddnub lli-gigi-illan, nttat a-t-iskarn.
hati ġmkad a-bdda-giġ: akud nna-riġ ad-skrġ afulki ar-n-tafaġ ih̬f-inu ur-ẓḍarġ ġir i-lh̬ʷšant.
ġ-uwl-inu ar-tfraḥġ s-tnbaḍin n-rbbi,
walaynni ġ-ugʷns-inu ar-n-tafaġ kra n-tnbaḍin yaḍni ar-tmmaġnt d-tnbaḍin l-lɛaql-inu. ar-iyi-kkrfnt-tnbaḍin n-ddnub lli-llanin ġ-ugʷns-inu.
taguḍi ad-iyi-illan. ma-ra-yyi-ijjnjm zġ-ddat-ad lli-yyi-itawin s-lmut?

walaynni rad-bahra-talġġ rbbi, ašku f-uwdm n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ siditnnġ a-f-rad-njmġ. walaynni ġmkad ad-sul-giġ nkki: ar-ttiriġ tinbaḍin n-rbbi s-lɛaql-inu, walaynni ddat-inu ar-sul-tskar s-tnbaḍin n-ddnub.
imma ġilad ur-sul-tlli lɛqubit i-wanna igan win lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ašku tinbaḍin n-rruḥ lli-d-yiwin tudrt i-willi ganin win lmasiḥ yasuɛ, ntnti a-yyi-ifsin zġ-tnbaḍin n-ddnub d-lmut.

ur-iẓḍar ššrɛ a-ifsi i-bnadm, ašku bnadm iḍɛf ur-iẓḍar a-iskar s-ššrɛ. walaynni rbbi ad-aġ-ifsin, yazn-d yus a-iṭṭaf ddat n-bnadm zund tin willi skarnin ddnub. yut ilmma rbbi lḥukm f-ddat n-yus baš a-issitti ddnub f-bnadm.
iskr rbbi mayan baš a-issafu lḥqq n-ššrɛ lli-fllannġ-illan nkkʷni lli-iskarn ġilad s-ma-ira rruḥ lqudus urd ma-tra ddat n-bnadm.
ġwilli-stt-itawin ġ-ddat ar-tlhun ih̬f-nsn s-ma-tra ddat. imma ġwilli-stt-itawin ġ-rruḥ lqudus ar-tlhun s-ma-ira rruḥ lqudus.
wanna itlhun ih̬f-ns s-ma-tra ddat rad-as-tili lmut. wanna itlhun s-ma-ira rruḥ lqudus rad-as-tili tudrt d-sslamt.
yan itlhun s-ddat, hati ar-itmmaġ d-rbbi, ašku ur-a-iskar s-tnbaḍin n-rbbi, ur-akkʷ-iẓḍar a-srsnt-iskar.
ġwilli skarnin s-ma-tra ddat n-bnadm ur-ẓḍarn ad-rḍun rbbi.
imma kunni, iġ-gigun illa rruḥ n-rbbi, ur-ra-tskarm s-ma-tra ddat, walaynni ra-tskarm s-ma-ira rruḥ. wanna-ġ-ur-illi rruḥ l-lmasiḥ, ur-akkʷ-igi win lmasiḥ.
imma kunni, lliġ gigun illa lmasiḥ, hati tddrm s-tudrt n-rruḥ. ašku tlla sslamt ġ-gratun d-rbbi wah̬h̬a ra-tmmt ddat-nnun f-ssibt n-ddnub.
lliġ gigun illa rruḥ n-walli-d-issnkrn yasuɛ zġ-lmut, ra-issddr ddat-nnun lli-f-tlla lmut. ašku ġwalli-d-issnkrn lmasiḥ zġ-lmut ra-kʷn-issddr ula kunni s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ-ns lli-gigun-illan.
ġmkad ay-aytma, illa fllannġ a-nskar s-ma-ira rruḥ n-rbbi urd ma-tra ddat-nnġ.
iġ-a-tskarm s-ma-tra ddat, rad-awn-tili lmut. walaynni iġ-a-tnqqam iskkirn n-ddat s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ, rad-awn-tili tudrt.
kullu winna sflidnin s-rruḥ n-rbbi, gan tarwa n-rbbi.
ašku rruḥ lli-awn-ifka rbbi ur-kʷn-irur a-tgm ismgan twrrim-daġ tiksaḍm, walaynni irur-kʷn a-tgm tarwa n-rbbi aylliġ a-srs-naqra: «abba, wa-baba.»
hati imšaška-d rruḥ n-rbbi d-rruḥ-nnġ ar-aġ-malan izd tarwa n-rbbi a-nga.
lliġ nga tarwa-ns, nissan is-ra-nṭṭaf lwrt lli-ra-yili i-mddn n-rbbi, ra-nkšm ġ-lwrt l-lmasiḥ. iġ-dids-nmun ġ-urfufn, ra-dids-nili ġ-lmjd.
ssnġ nkki tarfufnt n-uwssan-ad ur-tswi yat ġ-lgddam l-lmjd lli-rad-aġ-ifk rbbi ġ-mayd-d-yuškan.
ašku kullu ma-ih̬lq rbbi ġ-ddunit-ad ar-itql yiri bahra ass-an ġ-rad-d-bann tarwa n-rbbi.
ašku rbbi irur ddunit a-ttẓuẓḍ ma-mi-ur-tẓḍar. urd ddunit a-iran a-tg ġmkan walaynni rbbi ad-as-t-iskrn. walaynni ifka-yas sul rrja,
rad-as-ifsi zġ-iskraf l-lhalak baš a-n-tkšm ula nttat ġ-lmjd n-tarwa n-rbbi.
nssn izd kullu ma-illan ġ-ddunit ar-inddr s-ungaẓ zund tamġart lli-ra-yaru.
walaynni urd ġir ddunit a-inddrn. ula nkkʷni lli-dar lġllat timnza n-rruḥ lqudus, ar-nnddr ġ-ugʷns-nnġ ġilad ġ-a-ntql s-wass lli-ġ-rad-aġ-ig rbbi d-tarwa-ns ifukku ddat-nnġ zġ-lhalak.
ašku nkkʷni s-rrja-yad a-s-nnjm. mrad is-nẓra maylli-n-ntrju ur-ra-darnnġ-yili rrja walaynni iẓri, ašku ur-iẓḍar yan a-n-itrju ġ-ma-iẓrra yili dars.
walaynni lliġ a-ntrju ġ-maylli ur-ta-nẓri, hati ar-srs-ntql nzga ġ-rrja ard-aġ-yili.
ġmkad-nnit ad-aġ-itɛawan rruḥ lqudus ġilad ġ-sul-nḍɛf. ur-nssin ma-s-ra-ntẓalla i-rbbi ġmklli-aġ-d-iqqann, walaynni rruḥ lqudus ar-t-fllannġ-itḍalab s-unfusn tjhhdnin lli-ugʷrnin iwaliwn.
imma rbbi lli-iẓrran ma-illan ġ-uwlawn-nnġ, issn ma-iqṣad rruḥ. ašku rruḥ ar-itḍalab f-imẓlayn n-rbbi ġmklli ittiri rbbi.
imma ġwilli ittirin rbbi iġra-yasn-d ġmklli iqṣad, nssn is-a-yasn-iskar afulki ġ-kullu mad-asn-ijrrun.
ašku ġwilli issn rbbi zġ-isizwar, iẓli-tn ad-gn zund yus. ġmkad a-s-iwrri yus iga nttan amzwaru ġ-aytmatn ggutnin.
imma ġwilli iẓli, iġra-yasn-d. d-willi mi-d-iġra, ifka-yasn sslamt ġ-gras didsn. d-willi mi ifka sslamt, išškšm-tn s-lmjd-ns.
imma ġilad ma-ra-nini f-kullu mayad? lliġ didnnġ ibidd rbbi ma-rad-aġ-inru?
imma rbbi, lliġ ur-n-iḥḍi yus ġ-dars walaynni idḥi-t-id f-ssibt-nnġ kullwaġ, is-ur-ra-yiri ad-aġ-dids-ifk kraygatt kra?
ma-iẓḍarn a-yaštkka s-imẓlayn n-rbbi? han rbbi a-fllannġ-irḍan.
ma-iẓḍarn a-yini nʷh̬šn? han lmasiḥ yasuɛ a-fllannġ-immutn, inkr-d-nnit zġ-lmut yili f-ufasi n-rbbi, ar-t-fllannġ-itḍalab.
ma-rad-aġ-issngara d-lḥnant l-lmasiḥ? izd tammara nġd tanukmut nġd tarfufnt nġd laẓ nġd lhif nġd ššrr nġd taẓẓit?
ġmklli ityaran: «ass kullut ar-ttirin ad-aġ-nġn f-ssibt-nnk. gan-aġ d-uwlli ġ-tukʷi-tġrsi.»
walaynni kullu ġayan, nnra-t bahra s-ism n-walli ginnġ iḥnnan.
ašku ssnġ mayad bahra: ur-illi kra iẓḍarn ad-aġ-issngara d-lḥnant-ns, urd lmut nġd tudrt nġd lmalayka nġd larwaḥ, urd ma-illan nġd ma-ra-yili,
urd ssulṭat nġd lquwwat n-tattuyt nġd tin-tdrut. kullu ma-ih̬lq rbbi, ur-gis-illi kra iẓḍarn ad-aġ-issngara d-lḥnant n-rbbi lli-s-ginnġ-iḥnna f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ siditnnġ.
lḥqq ayd-awn-ttiniġ s-ism l-lmasiḥ, ur-a-sskirkisġ. ssnġ mayad ġ-uwl-inu lli-ġ-a-itḥkam rruḥ lqudus:
ṭiyyr-iyi bahra ar-iyi-bdda-ttaġ-tguḍi
f-ayt-tmazirt-inu lli-ganin aytma zġ-tsga n-ddat. mrad is-ẓḍarġ a-tn-jjnjmġ nkki, rad-dḥiġ ih̬f-inu ar lhalak ngaraġ ula d-lmasiḥ baš a-tn-jjnjmġ.
ntni a-igan ayt-rbbi, ig-tn d-tarwa-ns, ifk-asn lmjd-ns d-id-lɛhd-ns d-ššrɛ-ns. iml-asn aġaras ma-s-a-ti-tɛbadn, yini-asn f-kullu ma-rad-asn-iskr ifulki.
zġ-gisn a-zġ-gan id-babatnnġ imzwura ula lmasiḥ zġ-tsga n-ddat. nttan a-yattuyn f-kullu ma-illan, ig rbbi lli-isthllan a-t-ntalġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan. amin.
walaynni ur-rad-iniġ is-ḍrn bla lfaytt iwaliwn-an lli-ifka rbbi i-ayt-dars ġayd izrin. ašku mddn-an n-ayt-rbbi ur-gin kullutn win rbbi.
ula tarwa n-ibrahim, ur-gin kullutn ayt-ibrahim. ašku inna rbbi: «zġ-tarwa n-yuk isḥaq a-zġ-ra-tili tasut-nnk.»
ġmkad a-s-imla manwi gisn a-ra-ig tarwa n-rbbi: urd ġwilli lulnin ġmklli tlaln kullu mddn, walaynni ġwilli lulnin s-wawal n-rbbi.
ašku rbbi ifka awal-ad izgan i-ibrahim inna-yas: «rad-d-wrriġ imal ġ-uzmz-ad, yili i-sara yan-warraw.»
walaynni illa kra yaḍni. tffuġ innatnnġ rifqa ar-trbbu s-ikniwn zġ-urgaz-ns isḥaq babatnnġ.

lliġ ur-ta-d-luln-warraḍn-an isawl rbbi s-rifqa, ur-ta-skirn kra yʷh̬šnn ula kra išwan. yini-as fllasn: «amzwaru ra-ig ah̬ddam i-wis sin.» ġmkad a-tn-ibḍa rbbi ašku iqṣad mayan, urd f-ssibt n-kra skrn ntni.
ġmklli ityaran inna rbbi: «riġ yaɛqub, imma ɛisu ur-t-riġ.»
ma-ra-nini f-mayad? is-a-iskar rbbi s-uwdmawn? urd ġmkan a-ra-nini.
ašku inna rbbi i-musa: «rad-rḥmġ wanna riġ a-t-rḥmġ, ḥnnuġ f-wanna riġ a-fllas-ḥnnuġ.»
mayad ur-n-iqama ġ-ma-ira bnadm nġd ma-iskar bnadm walaynni iqama-n ġ-rrḥmt n-rbbi.
ityara-daġ inna rbbi i-firɛawn: «mayad a-f-k-giġ d-ugllid, baš a-gik-ssbayynġ taḥkimt-inu itjhhdn, ad-sfldn mddn ġ-kullu ddunit f-ism-inu.»
ġmkan a-s-nssn is-a-itrḥam rbbi wanna ira a-t-irḥm, ar-issiqar ih̬f i-wanna mi ira a-t-issiqar.
walaynni ra-d-isawl kra n-yan yini-yyi-d: «lliġ iga rbbi ġmkad, mah̬ aylliġ a-yaġ-sul-itlamma? ur-iẓḍar yan a-iskr abla ġaylli fllas iqṣad rbbi.»
imma kiyi a-bnadm, ma-tgit aylliġ trit a-trart awal i-rbbi? is-ra-tini-tmkilt i-ufh̬h̬ar «mah̬ aylliġ-iyi-tskrt ġmkad?»
afh̬h̬ar, illa dars lḥqq a-iskr s-idqqi mknna ira. iẓḍar a-iskr snat-tmkilin zġ-yan-uṭṭib, tili yat i-tmġriwin tili tayyaḍ i-kraygatt ass.
ġmkad a-iskr rbbi. ira a-issbayyn i-mddn lġaḍab-ns ula taḥkimt-ns itjhhdn, walaynni ira sul a-iṣbr d-tmkilin lli-f-illa lġaḍab wah̬h̬a ur-gint ġir i-lhalak.
iṣbr ašku ira a-issbayyn timih̬ar l-lmjd-ns i-willi irḥm lli-f-iskr ad-kšmn ġ-lmjd.
a-tn-igan d-nkkʷni lli-mi-iġra zġ-gr ayt-yudaya ula-daġ zġ-gr ayt-tmizar yaḍni. ġmklli inna rbbi ġ-warra n-nnabi hušaɛ:
«ġwilli ur-ginin mddn-inu, rad-asn-iniġ ‹mddn-inu›. ġwilli ganin iġribn, rad-asn-iniġ ‹ayt-dari›.
ġ-illiġ nniġ ‹ur-tgim mddn-inu,› ġin a-ġ-rad-iniġ ‹tgam tarwa n-rbbi lli-illan.›»
ula išaɛya ikka-ttin yull awal-ns yini f-mddn n-ayt-rbbi: «wah̬h̬a ggutn ayt-rbbi zund amlal n-tama n-umda, idrus ma-ra-gisn-injm.
ašku rbbi ur-ra-imaṭl. s-jjhd a-s-ra-yut lḥukm f-kullu ddunit.»
yini-daġ išaɛya: «sidi rbbi itjhhdn, mrad is-ur-aġ-ifl kra ġ-tarwa-nnġ, ikun nh̬wa zund tamdint n-sadum ula tamdint n-ɛamura.»
ma-ra-nini f-mayad? rbbi irḍa f-ayt-tmizar yaḍni. wah̬h̬a ur-a-tnawaln ma-t-irḍan, irḍa fllasn f-ssibt n-mad-umnn.
imma ayt-rbbi lli-tnawalnin ad-trḍun rbbi s-iskkirn n-ššrɛ, ur-fllasn-irḍi.
mah̬? ašku s-iskkirn-nsn a-s-a-ttirin ad-trḍun rbbi, urd s-liman. ġmkad a-s-utn aẓru n-tbayḍḍrt.
ġmklli ityaran: «hati ra-n-zzugzġ ġ-gr mddn-inu yan-uẓru imqqurn. rad-asn-ig tabayḍḍrt, ig ifir lli-ra-tn-issknuki. imma wanna fllas ittkln ur-sar-ti-tʷgraẓ.»
way-aytma, mnšk a-bahra-ttiriġ ad-njmn ayt-tmazirt-inu. ar-bahra-tḍalabġ rbbi fllasn.
ẓḍarġ a-fllasn-fkġ tugga n-is-a-bahra-ttirin rbbi, walaynni ur-ssinn rbbi ġmklli iga.
ur-fhimn aġaras lli-s-a-itrḍu rbbi f-mddn, walaynni ar-ttirin ad-rḍun rbbi s-mamnk yaḍni, aylliġ ur-akkʷ-umẓn aġaras lli-ira ntta.
ašku lmasiḥ ikmml ššrɛ, baš a-iskr sslamt ġ-gr rbbi d-kullu wanna srs yumnn.
yura musa f-willi ranin ad-trḍun rbbi s-ššrɛ inna: «wanna iskarn ma-illan ġ-ššrɛ ra-iddr f-ssibt n-ššrɛ.»
walaynni inna i-wanna-f-irḍa rbbi f-ssibt n-ma-yumn: «ad-ur-ttinit d-ih̬f-nnk ‹ma-ra-iġli s-ignna a-iḍalb lmasiḥ a-d-igguz?›
ula-da-ttinit ‹ma-ra-igguz s-tdrut n-wakal a-iḍalb lmasiḥ a-d-iġli zġ-gr willi mmutnin?›»
ašku inna-daġ: «hay-awal n-rbbi ilkm-k-id, yili ġ-imi-nnk yili ġ-uwl-nnk.» awal-an a-t-igan d-ġwad-s-a-ntbrraḥ f-mamnk a-itrḍu rbbi f-winna umnnin.
ašku iġ-tnnit ġ-lgddam n-mddn «yasuɛ a-igan sidi» tamnt is-t-id-issnkr rbbi zġ-lmut, hati ra-tnjmt.
ašku s-uwl a-s-a-ntamn nṭṭaf sslamt d-rbbi. s-infurn a-s-a-t-nttini ġ-lgddam n-mddn nnjm.
ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi: «wanna fllas ittkln ur-sar-ti-tʷgraẓ.»
rbbi ur-a-iẓẓmẓlay ayt-yudaya zġ-ayt-tmizar yaḍni, walaynni iga siditsn kullutn. ar-yakka timih̬ar-ns i-kullu winna gis zawgnin,
ašku ityara: «wanna izawgn ġ-ism n-siditnnġ, ra-injm.»
walaynni mamnk a-rad-zawgn ġ-ism-ns iġ-ur-srs-uminn? mamnk a-rad-amnn iġ-ur-fllas-sfldn? mamnk a-rad-sfldn iġ-ur-illi mad-asn-in-yiwin lh̬bar?
mamnk a-ra-n-awin lh̬bar iġ-ur-illi ma-tn-yuznn? ġmklli ityaran: «mnšk a-s-ifulki a-nẓr ġwid-d-iwinin lh̬bar išwan.»
walaynni ur-a-ttirin kullutn ad-sflidn s-lh̬bar ifulkin. inna-daġ išaɛya: «wa-sidi rbbi, ma-iran a-yamn awal lli-asn-d-niwi?»
walaynni ġwilli sflidnin, ntni a-ra-yamn. ġwilli mi-n-ntawi lh̬bar l-lmasiḥ, ntni a-ra-isfld.
imma ayt-rbbi is-ur-sfldn f-lh̬bar-ad ġayd izrin? nssn is-fllas-sfldn, ašku ityara: «timitar-nsn kkant kraygatt mani, truḥ-twaġra-nsn ttmi n-wakal.»

walaynni mddn-an n-ayt-rbbi, is-ur-ẓḍarn ad-fhmn maylli mi sfldn? musa ad-aġ-imlan is-t-fhmn, ašku f-imi-ns a-f-inna rbbi: «ra-kʷn-rarġ a-ttirim ma-illan ġ-dar iġribn. rad-awn-tt-ssṭiyyrġ s-willi mi ttinim ‹ur-ssinn yat.›»
ula išaɛya izɛm inna: «ufan-iyi ġwilli ur-sri-siggilnin, ssbayynġ ih̬f-inu i-willi ur-gigi-sqsanin.»
walaynni izuyd rbbi inna f-ayt-dars: «ha-yyi ass kullu mdiġ-n ifassn-inu i-mddn lli-sri-rurnin tiġurdin-nsn, agʷin ad-sflidn s-wawal-inu.»
imma ġilad, ma-rad-iniġ? is-n-iluḥ rbbi mddn-ns? uhu, ur-tn-in-iluḥ. ula nkki giġ ġ-ayt-rbbi, gġ zġ-tasut n-ibrahim zġ-tqbilt n-bnyamin.
rbbi ur-n-iluḥ mddn-ns lli-issn zġ-isizwar. is-ur-tssinm ma-ityaran f-nnabi iliyya ġ-warra n-rbbi? ar-issmummʷi iliyya f-rbbi f-lh̬ʷšant lli-skarn ayt-rbbi yini-as:
«wa-sidi rbbi, hatnin nġan lanbiya-nnk, h̬lun ikrkar lli-f-a-yak-n-nsras tiġrsiw. ġir nkki a-iqaman, irin a-yyi-nġn.»
imma ntta, ma-s-as-inna rbbi ġakudan? inna-yas: «sul ḥḍiġ i-ih̬f-inu ssa n-id-walf n-urgaz lli-ur-iknin ġ-lgddam n-bɛl.»
ġmkan ad-darnnġ-illan ula nkkʷni ġ-uwssan-ad. iqama sul ma-idrusn, iẓli-tn rbbi s-rrḥmt-ns.
f-ssibt n-rrḥmt-ns a-f-tn-iẓli, urd f-ssibt n-iskkirn-nsn. mrad is-tn-iẓli f-ssibt n-kra skrn ur-ra-yili mayad s-rrḥmt.
ġakudan ur-ifki i-ayt-rbbi maylli ttirin, walaynni ifka-t i-willi zġ-gisn iẓli. wrrin wiyyaḍ iqqur ih̬f-nsn
ġmklli fllasn ityaran: «sul s-ġassad ar-isshruṣṣi rbbi ul-nsn, irar alln-nsn ur-sul-a-ttisfiwnt, irar imzgan-nsn ur-sul-a-sflidn.»
ula agllid dawd iḍalb rbbi fllasn yini: «ad-asn-tg tamunt n-imnsiwn-nsn taẓqqurt ula tasraft ma-ġ-a-n-ṭṭarn. ad-knukin, tḍr fllasn lɛqubit lli-asn-igan.
ad-llasnt-walln-nsn a-ur-isfiwn, ar-bdda-knnun ġ-ddu taẓayt n-tmmariw.»
walaynni is-rad-iniġ: ḍrn ur-sul-ẓḍarn ad-nkrn? ur-rad-iniġ ġmkan. ašku lliġ ḍrn ayt-yudaya wrrin njmn ayt-tmizar yaḍni, baš ad-wrrin ayt-yudaya ar-ttirin ma-illan dar ayt-tmizar yaḍni.

hati taḍuri n-ayt-yudaya a-d-yiwin timih̬ar n-rbbi i-ddunit kullutt. ula f-ssibt n-uffuġ-nsn zġ-tmih̬ar n-rbbi a-ra-srsnt-kšmn ayt-tmizar yaḍni. walaynni mnšk a-s-ra-tigat-tmah̬irt n-rbbi s-uggʷar iġ-wrrin kšmn-daġ kullu mddn n-ayt-yudaya.
rad-awn-iniġ ġilad i-kunni n-ayt-tmizar yaḍni: ar-bdda-malaġ i-ayt-dari is-bahra-thiyya-trqqast-ad dari illan ġ-gr ayt-tmizar yaḍni,
a-ur-imil rarġ-d kra ġ-ayt-yudaya ad-irin ad-amẓn mad-darun-illan, baš ad-njmn ula ntni.
lliġ-tn-issufġ rbbi išškšm-d mddn zġ-kullu ddunit, walaynni ma-ra-yili iġ-tn-d-išškšm-daġ ula ntni tigira? ra-tili tudrt l-ljdid i-willi mmutnin.
iġ-ttyawfka tummit l-lɛjin tamzwarut i-rbbi, ra-ig lɛjin kullut win rbbi. iġ-iga-uggja win rbbi, rad-gnt-tṣṭṭwin tin rbbi.
imma ġilad ibbi rbbi kra n-tṣṭṭwin zġ-tazitunt, ilqqm-as gis yat-tṣṭṭa n-tzmmurt. ġmkad a-s-tkšmt ula kiyi lli-igan zġ-tzmmurt ġ-tudrt iṣḥan n-tazitunt.
walaynni a-ur-tḥgrt tiṣṭṭwin lli-bbinin. iġ-tnti-tḥgrt illa fllak a-di-tktit mayad: urd kiyi a-yusin aggja, walaynni aggja a-k-yusin.
imma kiyi ra-tinit «rbbi ibbi tiṣṭṭwin zġ-tazitunt baš a-yyi-n-gis-ilqqm.»
tʷġẓant, ibbi-tnt ašku ur-rint ad-amnnt, tilit gis ašku tumnt, walaynni ad-ur-tškrt ih̬f-nnk f-mayad. illa fllak a-trart lɛaql.
ašku lliġ ur-iṣamḥ rbbi i-ayt-yudaya lli-ganin tiṣṭṭwin-ns, is-rad-ak-iṣamḥ kiyi iġ-ur-tzgat ġ-liman?
ẓr mamnk a-bahra-itḥnnu rbbi ula mamnk a-bahra-itšqu. išqa d-willi ḍrnin, ra-gik-itḥnnu iġ-tzgat ġ-lḥnant-ns. walaynni iġ-ur-a-ttzgat ra-k-ibbi ula kiyi.
imma wiyyaḍ, ula ntni iġ-d-wrrin amnn ra-tn-ilqqm i-tazitunt, ašku rbbi a-iẓḍarn ad-as-tn-in-daġ-ilqqm.
iskr rbbi ma-ur-skarn mddn lliġ-k-id-ibbi zġ-tzmmurt ilqqm-k-id i-tazitunt. walaynni ra-irh̬u s-uggʷar a-d-gis-ilqqm tiṣṭṭwin lli-zgis-bbinin, ašku tin tazitunt ad-gant.
way-aytma, riġ ad-awn-mlġ yat-tġawsa intln baš a-ur-tġalm izd kunni a-issnn kullu ma-illan. iqqur ih̬f n-kra ġ-ayt-rbbi ard-d-ikmml ma-ra-d-ikšm zġ-ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
ġmkad a-s-rad-njmn kullu willi ganin ayt-rbbi. ġmklli ityaran, inna rbbi: «ra-d-yašk-unjjam zġ-urušalim, ikkis lh̬ʷšant i-tarwa n-yaɛqub.
rad-asn-fkġ lɛhd-ad ġakud nna-fllasn-ssittiġ ddnub-nsn.»
imma ntni iga-tn rbbi d-inuwwašn-ns f-ssibt-nnun ašku agʷin ad-sflidn s-lh̬bar ifulkin. walaynni iga-tn sul d-imddukkʷal-ns f-ssibt n-imzwura-nsn lli-iẓli ġayd izrin.
ašku rbbi ur-ra-ikkis maylli ifka ula ra-n-iluḥ ġwilli-yad iẓli.
imma kunni ay-ayt-tmizar yaḍni, tkkam-ttin tffuġm zġ-wawal n-rbbi, walaynni tlla-yawn rrḥmt-ns ġilad ašku ffuġn ntni zġ-wawal-ns.
f-ssibt n-uffuġ-nsn a-f-awn-tlla rrḥmt n-rbbi, tili-asn ula ntni rrḥmt-ns didun.
ašku rbbi yudja kullu mddn a-n-tyawkrrafn s-uffuġ zġ-wawal-ns, baš ad-asn-kullu-ifk rrḥmt-ns tigira.
matta ġunškad s-ggutnt-tmih̬ar n-rbbi, tigat-tḥkimt-ns ula tawassna-ns. ma-iẓḍarn a-yissan ma-iqṣad rbbi, ula ma-iẓḍarn a-ifhm ma-inawl?
«ma-issnn iswingimn n-sidi rbbi? ma-ra-t-inṣḥ?
mad-as-ifkan aylliġ-t-id-iqqan a-d-irar tawafka?»
ašku kullu ma-illan yuška-d zġ-rbbi, yili ġ-ufus-ns, ig wins. nttan a-bahra-ntalġ ġilad ula kullu mayd iftan, amin.
mayad a-f-ra-kʷn-ḍalbġ ay-aytma, f-ssibt n-rrḥmt n-rbbi lli-iggutn, ad-as-tfkm ih̬f-nnun zund tiġrsi iddrn iẓlin lli-s-ra-irḍu, ašku ġmkan a-s-kʷn-d-iqqan a-ti-ttɛbadm.
a-ur-tskarm zund mddn n-ddunit-ad, walaynni adjat rbbi a-kʷn-irar a-tgm ljdid, ibddl kullu tinbaḍin l-lɛaql-nnun. ġmkan a-s-ra-tissanm ma-gigun-ittiri rbbi ifulki irḍu srs yuf kullu kra illan.
rbbi ad-iyi-ifkan lbaraka-yad aylliġ ẓḍarġ ad-iniġ i-kraygatt yan gigun: a-ur-tġalt d-ih̬f-nnk is-tgit uggʷar n-ma-tgit walaynni swingim s-lmɛqul, kraygatt yan d-unšk nna-yas-ifka rbbi liman.
ašku ddat n-bnadm, ggutn gis igzman, kraygatt agzzum ar-iskar ma-t-id-iqqann.
ula nkkʷni nggut. zund ddat a-nga, ašku kullwaġ nga win lmasiḥ, ng zund igzman n-ddat-ns.
ibark-aġ rbbi ibḍu-aġ mnnawt-twafkiw. imma nkkʷni, illa fllannġ a-nskar s-mad-aġ-ifka. yan mi ifka rbbi a-isawal s-iwaliwn lli-as-imala, illa fllas a-isawal s-unšk lli-gis-illa liman.
yan mi ifka a-ith̬dam i-wiyyaḍ, illa fllas a-ith̬dam. yan mi ifka a-isslmad, illa fllas a-isslmad.

yan mi ifka a-itnṣaḥ, illa fllas a-itnṣaḥ. yan mi ifka a-yakka, illa fllas a-yakka s-lh̬aṭr. yan mi ifka a-imala aġaras i-wiyyaḍ, illa fllas a-t-imala s-lmɛqul. yan mi ifka a-itɛawan, illa fllas a-itɛawan s-lfrḥ.
tḥnnwat ġ-ingratun s-nniyt iṣfan, ar-ttkrhum aynna yʷh̬šnn, ar-ttamẓm ġ-aynna ifulkin.
tḥubbwat i-ngratun ġmklli tmḥubbun aytmatn, ar-ittiri kraygatt yan a-yuqqr wayyaḍ uggʷar n-ih̬f-ns.
h̬dmat i-siditnnġ s-zzɛamt n-rruḥ itjhhdn bla-da-ttrmaym.
frḥat ġ-rrja, tṣbrm ġ-trfufnt, tzaydm ġ-tẓulla.
akkayat i-imẓlayn nna-iḥtajjan ar-tssmrḥbam s-willi tmuddunin.
ḍalbat rbbi a-ibark winna-kʷn-ssrfufnnin. a-ur-ti-ttḍalabm a-tn-ih̬zu walaynni a-tn-ibark.
frḥat d-wanna ifrḥn, ar-tallam d-wanna yallan.
tmšaškad-d-bdda i-ngratun. a-ur-tswingimm ġ-ma-ikkan nnigatun walaynni tmunwat d-ma-ikkan ddawatun. a-ur-tgm ih̬f-nnun d-wid ssnnin kullu ma-illan.
iġ-illa mad-awn-iskrn ma-yʷh̬šnn ad-as-t-ur-trarm s-lh̬ʷšant, walaynni tawiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun a-tskarm ma-f-rad-akkan kullu mddn tugga n-is-ifulki.
gat-n tiqqi-nnun a-tskarm kullu ma-mi-tẓḍarm a-bdda-tili sslamt ġ-gratun d-kullu mddn.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, a-ur-trarm i-yan f-ma-iskr yʷh̬šnn, walaynni adjat rbbi a-fllas-iḥkam. ašku ityara: «ġmkad a-s-inna sidi rbbi, nkki a-ra-irar i-mddn f-mad-skrn, fkġ-asn mad-asn-igan.»
imma kiyi, skr ġmklli ityaran: «iġ-tẓrit anuwwaš-nnk inġa-t laẓ, tfkt-as a-išš, nġ-t-inġa irifi, tfkt-as a-isu. ġmkad a-s-rad-as-tssgudit tirgišin f-ih̬f-ns.»
a-ur-tadjm lh̬ʷšant a-kʷn-tnru, walaynni tnrwat lh̬ʷšant s-ufulki.
illa f-kraygatt yan a-iskar s-wawal n-willi tḥkamnin tamazirt. ašku ur-illi yan itḥkamn bla-t-iẓli rbbi i-twuri-an. ula ġwilli ḥkamnin ġilad, rbbi a-tn-iẓlin.
yan iḍaḍḍn lḥukkam, hati iḍaḍḍ maylli ira rbbi, d-wanna iḍaḍḍn ra-fllas-ittut lḥukm.
ašku lḥukkam ur-a-ssiksaḍn ġwilli skarnin afulki walaynni ġwilli skarnin lh̬ʷšant. is-trit a-ur-tiksaṭṭ zġ-walli itḥkamn? rad-ak-iniġ, skar afulki s-fllak-irḍa,

ašku iga ah̬ddam n-rbbi f-a-gik-iskar lh̬ir. walaynni iġ-a-tskart ma-yʷh̬šnn, illa dark ma-f-a-ttiksaṭṭ, ašku lḥakm dars lḥqq a-yut lḥukm, ig ah̬ddam n-rbbi f-a-issḍr lɛqubit f-willi skarnin ma-yʷh̬šnn.
mayan a-f-fllawn-illa a-tskarm s-wawal l-lḥukkam, urd ġir baš a-tanfm i-lġaḍab n-rbbi, walaynni f-ssibt n-ma-ttirim ġ-uwl-nnun a-bdda-tskarm ma-yʷġẓann.
f-mayad a-f-a-takkam ḍḍariba i-lḥukkam, ašku gan ih̬ddamn n-rbbi ar-tti-tawin ġ-mayan.
akkayat-asn mad-awn-ḍfarn, ḍabiyt i-ayt-ḍabiyt, nkkas i-ayt-nkkas. akkayat-daġ luqr i-willi mi illa luqr, ula ššukr i-willi mi illa ššukr.
ad-ur-tasim tamrwast i-yan. ġir yat-tmrwast a-kʷn-d-iqqann: a-ttḥnnum i-ngratun. wanna iḥnnan ġ-wiyyaḍ, han ikmml kullu ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ.
ašku luṣiyat «a-ur-tznut» «a-ur-tnġt» «a-ur-takʷrt» «a-ur-tirit ma-igan win wiyyaḍ,» nẓḍar a-tnt-nssmun ntnti d-tiyyaḍ nna-llanin s-yan-wawal, a-t-igan: «a-ttirit adjar-nnk zund ih̬f-nnk.»
wanna ittirin adjar-ns, ur-ra-yiẓḍar ad-as-iskr ma-yʷh̬šnn. mayad a-f-awn-nniġ, wanna iḥnnan ġ-wiyyaḍ, ikmml kullu ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ.
awiyat-stt ġ-mayad ašku tssnm matta azmz-ad ġ-nlla, tlkm-d tasaɛt a-tnkrm zġ-iyṭṣ. ašku yakmur-d-wass n-ujnjm-nnġ ġilad, uggʷar n-ma-d-yakmur ġakud lliġ ngra ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ.
ifta-yiḍ, ɛlayn a-d-iġli-wass. illa fllannġ a-n-nluḥ iskkirn n-tillas nls imqlad n-tifawt.
yili fllannġ a-nskar ġmklli-d-iqqann ayt-uzal. a-ur-ttmunum f-tillay ʷh̬šnnin ula-da-tssnufulm ih̬fawn-nnun s-tissi. a-ur-ttšthum ula-da-ttfsadm. a-ur-ttmmaġm ula-da-ttnuwwašm.
lsat afulki n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ bla-da-ttlhum s-ddat ula ma-ittiri bnadm i-ih̬f-ns.
qblat ġ-ingratun wanna ur-idusn ġ-liman, walaynni a-ur-dids-ttmjaḥadm f-iswingimn-ns.
ra-yili kra n-yan yumn is-iḥlla a-ištta kraygatt kra, yili yan yaḍni ur-idus ġ-liman ur-iri a-ištta abla lh̬ḍrt.
imma ġwalli išttan kraygatt kra, illa fllas a-ur-iḥgr ġwalli itkkisn kra zġ-umššu, yili f-walli itkkisn a-ur-iḥkam f-walli išttan kraygatt kra, ašku rbbi a-t-iqbln.
ma-tgit kiyi aylliġ trit a-tḥkamt f-uh̬ddam n-wayyaḍ? sidis a-ra-fllas-irḍu nġd nttan a-ra-t-irgm. s-ṣṣaḥt ra-fllas-irḍu, ašku sidis iẓḍar a-t-ig d-wad-f-irḍa.
ra-yini kra n-yan: «ġassad yuf ussan yaḍni,» yini wayyaḍ: «ussan kullutn yan ad-gan.» walaynni iqqan-d kraygatt yan a-yissan mamnk a-itnbaḍ ġ-ih̬f-ns.

wanna iẓlayn ass, ar-t-iẓlay baš a-ituqqar siditnnġ. wanna išttan ar-ištta baš a-ituqqar siditnnġ, ar-itškar rbbi f-ma-ištta. wanna itkkisn kra zġ-umššu ar-t-itkkis baš a-ituqqar siditnnġ, ar-itškar rbbi ula ntta.
kullwaġ, iġ-nddr ula iġ-nmmut, urd ih̬f-nnġ a-ntrḍu.
iġ-nddr ra-nrḍu siditnnġ, iġ-nmmut ra-nrḍu siditnnġ. ašku iġ-nddr ula iġ-nmmut, win siditnnġ a-nga.
mayad a-f-immut lmasiḥ inkr-d zġ-lmut, baš a-ig siditsn n-willi mmutnin ula siditsn n-willi ddrnin.
imma kiyi, mah̬ aylliġ a-ttḥkamt f-gʷmak? mah̬ aylliġ a-ttḥgart gʷmak? ġ-lgddam n-rbbi a-ġ-ra-nbidd kullwaġ. nttan a-ra-fllannġ-iḥkam,
ġmklli ityaran: «inna sidi rbbi ‹izga-wawal-ad zund tudrt-inu. ġ-lgddam-inu a-ġ-ra-d-iknu kraygatt afud, iqrra kraygatt ils i-rbbi.›»
kraygatt yan ginnġ ra-irar lḥsab f-ih̬f-ns i-rbbi.
mayad a-f-d-iqqan a-ur-sul-ntḥkam f-ingratnnġ, walaynni a-ntnbaḍ ġ-ih̬f-nnġ a-ur-sar-nsrs kra n-tbayḍḍrt ġ-lgddam n-gʷmatnnġ ula kra ra-t-issḍr.
ssnġ mayad bahra ašku imla-yaġ-t siditnnġ yasuɛ: ur-illi kra n-umššu iḥrmn. walaynni yan iġaln is-iḥrm, rad-as-ityawḥram.
iġ-tssnt is-ra-ityaggas gʷmak s-ma-tšttat kiyi, urd lḥnant ayn-s-a-dids-tskart. a-ur-tadjt amššu-nnk a-ihlk ġwalli f-immut lmasiḥ.
a-ur-tadjm mddn ad-rggmn ġ-maylli darun ifulkin.
ašku tagldit n-rbbi ur-tgi amššu nġd tissi, walaynni afulki d-sslamt d-lfrḥ a-tga, s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus.
wanna ith̬damn i-lmasiḥ ġmkad, ra-fllas-irḍu rbbi ar-ti-talġn mddn.
imma ġilad illa fllannġ a-bdda-nttiri ma-d-itawin sslamt ula mad-aġ-issdusn i-ngratnnġ.
a-ur-thlkt tawuri n-rbbi f-ssibt n-umššu. iḥlla-kullu-umššu, walaynni yan iššan kra issṭarn wayyaḍ, han lh̬ʷšant ayn iskr.
ra-yaf a-ur-tššt tifiyi nġd a-tsut tissi iktin nġd a-tskrt kra yaḍni iġ-iẓḍar gʷmak a-iḍr f-ssibt n-ma-tskart.
tinbaḍin nna-dark-llanin, ḥḍu-tnt ġ-uwl-nnk ġ-grak d-rbbi. ambarki a-iga wanna ur-dar ma-s-a-itškku ġ-ih̬f-ns ġakud nna-iskar ma-ira.
imma wanna iškkan ġ-ma-ištta, illa fllas lḥukm ašku ur-a-iskar s-tnbaḍin l-liman-ns. wanna ur-iskarn s-liman, ddnub ad-as-iga.
nkkʷni lli-idusn ġ-liman, illa fllannġ a-ntɛawan ġwilli ḍɛfnin ġ-aynna fllasn iẓẓayn. a-ur-nttiri ġir a-nrḍu ih̬f-nnġ.
hati illa f-kraygatt yan a-itrḍu gʷmas ar-gis-iskar lh̬ir ar-t-issdus ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ.
ašku lmasiḥ ula ntta ur-ttin-ikki ar-itrḍu ih̬f-ns. ijra-yas ġmklli ityaran: «flla a-f-a-d-ṭṭarnt-trggam n-willi gik rggmnin.»
kullu ma-ityaran ġ-uwssan lli-zrinin, ityara baš a-nlmd nkkʷni, nṣbr nzɛm nzga ġ-rrja f-ssibt n-maylli naqra ġ-warratn-an.
