ḍalbġ rbbi lli-yakkan ṣṣbr d-zzɛamt, ad-awn-ifk a-bdda-di-ttmšaškam i-ngratun ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ,
baš a-kullu-ttmunum s-yan-wawal a-ttalġm rbbi babas n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
mayad a-f-awn-nniġ a-ttqbalm i-ngratun ġmklli-kʷn-iqbl lmasiḥ, baš a-gigun-ibayyn lmjd n-rbbi.
ašku lmasiḥ iwrri iga ah̬ddam i-ayt-yudaya baš a-iml is-iqama rbbi ġ-lḥqq, issafu iwaliwn zganin lli-s-inna i-lajdud-nsn.
iskr ġmkad baš ad-ẓrn ayt-tmizar yaḍni rrḥmt n-rbbi alġn-t ula ntni. ġmklli ityaran: «mayad a-f-ra-ki-tškarġ ġ-gr ayt-tmizar aggugnin, alġġ ism-nnk s-imurign l-lfrḥ.»
ityara-daġ: «way-ayt-tmizar aggugnin, frḥat d-mddn n-rbbi.»
ityara-daġ: «sbbḥat i-rbbi a-bnadm kullukn, talġm-t a-kullu imzdġn n-ddunit.»
inna-daġ išaɛya: «ra-d-yašk yan zġ-tasut n-yassa. ra-t-issattuy rbbi a-iḥkam ġ-ayt-tmizar aggugnin. nttan a-ġ-ra-n-kullu-trjun.»
ḍalbġ rbbi lli-yakkan rrja, a-kʷn-iɛmmr s-lfrḥ d-sslamt iggutn ġilad ġ-srs-tumnm, baš a-bahra-gigun-ittigat rrja-yad s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus.
way-aytma, ssnġ nkki is-tɛmmrm s-ufulki ula tawassna, tiẓḍarm a-ttnṣaḥm i-ngratun.
walaynni s-zzɛamt ayd-s-awn-in-uriġ f-tġawsiwin-ad. zɛmġ ad-awn-tnt-id-ssktiġ ašku rbbi ad-iyi-ifkan lbaraka-yad,

ig-iyi d-uh̬ddam l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġ-gr ayt-tmizar aggugnin. ar-th̬damġ zund yan-unmġur n-tgmmi n-rbbi, ar-ssakmurġ mddn n-ayt-tmizar i-rbbi s-tbrraḥt l-lh̬bar ifulkin, baš a-fllasn-irḍu rbbi iẓli-tn i-ih̬f-ns s-usġus n-rruḥ lqudus.
illa dari ma-s-a-tfraḥġ s-ism l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġ-twuri-ad lli-s-a-th̬damġ i-rbbi,

ašku ur-rad-zɛmġ ad-sawlġ f-yat abla ma-iskr lmasiḥ f-ufus-inu. ašku s-iwaliwn d-iskkirn d-lquwwat d-tmitar tjhhdnin ula s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus a-s-irur ayt-tmizar ad-amẓn aġaras n-rbbi. ġmkad a-s-sslkmġ lh̬bar-ns i-kullu timizar zġ-tsga n-urušalim ar tasga n-illirikun.
hati yat-tġawsa kad-riġ: ad-tbrraḥġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin ġ-innaġ ur-jju-sfldn f-lmasiḥ, ašku ur-riġ ad-bnnuġ f-llsas n-kra n-yan yaḍni.
ġmklli ityaran: «ġwilli ur-iruḥ lh̬bar-ns a-ra-t-iẓr. ġwilli ur-fllas-sfldnin a-ra-t-yissan.»
mayan a-yyi-itkkisn aylliġ ur-a-n-ttaškiġ s-darun.
kigan d-isggʷasn ayd ttiriġ a-n-darun-aškġ. walaynni ġilad ġ-kmmlġ tawuri-nu ġ-tsgiw-ad
ar-bahra-trjuġ a-kʷn-in-sliġ ġakud nna-ġ-rad-mudduġ s-ṣbanya, baš ad-frḥġ ġ-gratun, tɛawnm-iyi ilmma ad-kmmlġ f-umuddu-nu.
imma ġilad rad-dduġ zwar s-urušalim ad-ɛawnġ imẓlayn n-rbbi ġin.
ašku aytmatn ġ-makiduniyya d-ah̬aya, ibayyn-asn is-ifulki ad-aznn kra l-lmɛawnt i-willi ẓlḍnin ġ-imẓlayn n-rbbi ġ-urušalim.
ibayyn-asn is-ifulki ad-skrn mayad, ašku illa fllasn ntni n-ayt-tmizar yaḍni ad-rarn lh̬ir i-ayt-yudaya. iqqan-tn-d a-tn-tɛawann s-lbarakat n-ddat, ašku umẓn zġ-darsn lbarakat n-rruḥ.
iġ-asn-in-sslkmġ lamant-ad kmmlġ tawuri-ad, ra-kʷn-sliġ zriġ s-ṣbanya.
ssnġ ġakud nna-n-darun-uškiġ ra-n-didi-awiġ kullu lbaraka l-lmasiḥ.
ra-kʷn-ḍalbġ ay-aytma, s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ula s-lḥnant n-rruḥ lqudus, a-tbkism tmɛawanm didi s-tẓallit i-rbbi f-ssibt-inu.
ḍalbat rbbi a-yyi-ijjnjm zġ-willi ur-umnnin ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya. tḍalbm-t ula f-imẓlayn-ns ġ-urušalim ad-rḍun s-maylli-s-riġ a-tn-srs-ɛawnġ,
baš a-n-darun-aškġ s-lfrḥ iggutn ġmklli ira rbbi, sunfuġ ġ-gratun.
ḍalbġ rbbi lli-bdda-yakkan sslamt a-didun-yili kullukn. amin
riġ a-kʷn-uṣṣaġ f-uwlltmatnnġ iɛzzan fibi lli-igan tamɛawnt i-umnaggar ġ-kanh̬ariyya.
ssmrḥbat srs s-ism n-siditnnġ ġmklli-s-d-iqqan imẓlayn n-rbbi. ɛawnat-stt s-aynna-n-darun-tḥtajja, ašku nttat tɛawn mddn ggutnin tɛawn-iyi ula nkki.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-briskilla d-akila lli-didi-h̬dmnin ġ-twuri l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ntni kkan-ttin ujadn ad-fkn ih̬f-nsn ar lmut f-ssibt-inu. ar-tn-tškarġ bahra, urd ġir nkki walaynni ar-tn-tškarn kullu imnaggarn n-ayt-tmizar aggugnin.
ar-n-daġ-tsllamġ f-umnaggar lli-darsn-itmunun ġ-tgmmi-nsn. ar-n-tsllamġ ula f-umddakkʷl-inu iɛzzan abinitus. iga nttan amzwaru lli-yumnn s-lmasiḥ ġ-tmazirt n-asiyya.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-maryam lli-bahra-ith̬damn ġ-gratun.
ar-n-tsllamġ ula f-andrunikus d-yunyas lli-ganin zġ-ayt-dari. kkan-ttin didi ġ-lḥbs. tyawssann ntni ġ-irqqasn, umẓn aġaras l-lmasiḥ ur-ta-t-umẓġ nkki.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-ambliyatus lli-igan amddakkʷl-inu iɛzzan ġ-siditnnġ.
ar-n-tsllamġ ula f-urbanus lli-didnnġ-ith̬damn ġ-twuri l-lmasiḥ, ntta d-umddakkʷl-inu iɛzzan stah̬is.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-aballis lli-ityaramn izga ġ-lmasiḥ. ar-n-tsllamġ ula f-ayt-tgmmi n-aristubulus.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-hirudyun lli-igan zġ-ayt-dari. ar-n-tsllamġ ula f-willi ganin win siditnnġ zġ-ayt-tgmmi n-narkissus.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-th̬ddamin n-siditnnġ trifina d-trifusa. ar-n-tsllamġ ula f-uwlltmatnnġ iɛzzan barsis lli-bahra-ith̬damn i-siditnnġ.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-rufus lli-ityawẓlayn i-twuri n-siditnnġ. ar-n-tsllamġ ula f-innas lli-zgigi-iskarn zund yus.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-asinkritus d-fligun d-harmis d-batrubas d-harmas ntni d-aytmatn lli-didsn-llanin.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-filulugus d-yulya d-niryus d-uwlltmas, ntni d-ulumbas d-kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi lli-didsn-llanin.
nsallamat i-ngratun s-unsallam n-tagʷmat. ar-n-fllawn-tsllamn kullu imnaggarn l-lmasiḥ.
ḍalbġ-kʷn ay-aytma, a-stti-ttawim ġ-willi aṭṭunin aytmatn ar-asn-tggan ifikš ma-tn-issṭarn, ar-tffuġn zġ-ulmmud lli-tlmdm ġayd izrin. iniġ-awn, anfat-asn
ašku ġwilli skarnin ġmkad urd siditnnġ a-mi-th̬damn walaynni adis-nsn. s-iwaliwn šwanin mimnin a-s-a-jllun lɛaql n-wanna igan lġšim.
imma kunni, frḥġ f-ssibt-nnun ašku sfldn kullu mddn f-mamnk a-tumẓm ġ-lmasiḥ. walaynni riġ a-twrrim tissanm kullu ma-ifulkin, tanfm i-kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn.
imma rbbi lli-bdda-yakkan sslamt, yan imikk ra-irar šiṭan a-ig albbij ġ-ddu iḍarn-nnun. ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ.
ar-n-fllawn-itsllam timutaws lli-didi-ith̬damn, ntta d-lukyus d-yasun d-susibatrus lli-ganin zġ-ayt-dari.
ula nkki tartyus lli-yuran tabrat-ad s-ufus-inu, ar-n-fllawn-tsllamġ s-ism n-siditnnġ.
ar-n-fllawn-itsllam gayus lli-dar gguzġ ussan-ad. tigmmi-ns a-ġ-a-tmunun kullu aytmatn n-umnaggar. ar-n-fllawn-itsllam arastus lli-igan bu-ṣnduq n-tmdint-ad, ntta ula gʷmatnnġ kwartus.
imma ġilad, a-nalġ rbbi lli-iẓḍarn a-kʷn-izzga ġ-liman-nnun ġmklli-awn-nniġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin lli-s-a-tbrraḥġ f-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.

ašku maylli intln kullu ġayd izrin, issbayyn-t-id rbbi ġilad, iml-aġ-t ġ-warratn l-lanbiya, baš ad-wrrin amnn mddn ġ-kullu timizar n-ddunit ar-skarn s-wawal-ns, ġmklli yuṣṣa rbbi lli-bdda-illan.
rbbi lli-dar kullu taḥkimt, nttan a-bahra-ntalġ f-yasuɛ lmasiḥ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan. amin.
zġ-bulus arqqas l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġmklli ira rbbi lli-yyi-iẓlin i-twuri-ad, d-zġ-gʷmatnnġ sustanis.

i-ayt-umnaggar n-rbbi ġ-tmdint n-kurintus, a-tn-igan d-willi iẓli rbbi f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ad-gn imẓlayn-ns, zund kullu wiyyaḍ ġ-kraygatt mani lli-zawgnin ġ-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ig siditsn ig siditnnġ ula nkkʷni.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ar-bdda-fllawn-tškarġ rbbi-nu f-ssibt l-lbaraka lli-s-kʷn-ibark f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ,
ašku ifka-yawn kullu timih̬ar l-lmasiḥ aylliġ darun tggut-twassna d-iwaliwn šwanin.
rbbi izzga gigun tugga lli-awn-in-niwi f-lmasiḥ.
ur-awn-laḥ yat ġ-twafkiw n-rruḥ ġilad ġ-a-ttqlm s-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ard-d-iwrri ibayyn.
nttan a-ra-kʷn-issdus ar isiggʷra f-a-ur-gigun-yili kra l-lɛib ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-iwrri siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
rbbi iqama-bdda ġ-wawal-ns. nttan ad-awn-d-iġran a-tkšmm ġ-tamunt n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ siditnnġ.
way-aytma, ra-kʷn-ḍalbġ ġilad s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, a-d-kullu-tmšaškam bla-da-taṭṭum i-ngratun. illa fllawn a-tgm yan ġ-iswingimn-nnun d-tnbaḍin-nnun.
walaynni ay-aytma, inna-yyi kra zġ-ayt-tgmmi n-h̬luwwi is-a-ttẓim i-ngratun.
tssnm ma-f-a-sawalġ. kra gigun ar-ittini: «giġ win bulus.» kra gigun ar-ittini: «giġ win abullus.» kra gigun ar-ittini: «giġ win bṭrus.» kra gigun ar-ittini: «giġ win lmasiḥ.»
walaynni ra-kʷn-sqsaġ, is-ibḍa lmasiḥ? izd bulus a-fllawn-immutn f-uggjdi? izd s-ism n-bulus a-s-tddmm ġ-waman?
ha-yyi škrġ i-rbbi ašku ur-ssddimġ yan gigun abla krisbus d-gayus,
f-a-ur-yini kra n-yan izd s-ism n-bulus a-s-iddm.
ssnġ is-ssddmġ ayt-tgmmi n-stifanas ula ntni, imma wiyyaḍ ur-ssinġ is-ssddmġ kra yaḍni.
ašku lmasiḥ ur-iyi-yuzn ad-ssddmġ mddn, hati yuzn-iyi ad-asn-tbrraḥġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin. urd iwaliwn l-lɛaql a-s-a-tbrraḥġ, f-a-ur-rarġ lmut l-lmasiḥ f-uggjdi bla lfaytt.
ašku lh̬bar n-uggjdi iga zund anufl dar willi tyawhlaknin, walaynni taḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi a-darnnġ-iga nkkʷni lli-injmn.
ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi: «rad-h̬luġ lɛaql n-ayt-lɛaql, ssḍrġ lfhmt n-ayt-lfhmt.»
ma-iga bab l-lɛaql? ma-iga bab n-tġri? ma-iga bab n-iwaliwn n-ddunit-ad? ha-rbbi irur lɛaql n-ddunit-ad iga anufl.
ašku rbbi s-tḥkimt-ns a-s-iqṣad ġ-mddn n-ddunit-ad a-ur-iẓḍarn ad-wrrin issann rbbi s-lɛaql-nsn, walaynni irḍa a-ijjnjm winna umnnin s-tbrraḥt-nnġ lli-f-a-ttinin «tga anufl.»
ayt-yudaya ar-zginnġ-tḍalabn lmɛjizat. ayt-tmizar yaḍni ar-zginnġ-ttirin iwaliwn l-lɛaql.
imma nkkʷni ar-asn-ntbrraḥ f-lmasiḥ lli-immutn f-uggjdi. awal-ad iga tabayḍḍrt i-ayt-yudaya, ig anufl dar ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
walaynni lh̬bar-ad f-lmasiḥ iga taẓḍḍart n-rbbi ula taḥkimt n-rbbi ġ-dar-willi mi iġra, gn-iyt ayt-yudaya nġd ayt-tmizar yaḍni.
ašku mayd mi ttinin ‹anufl› n-rbbi, yugʷr lɛaql n-bnadm, ula mayd mi ttinin ‹ḍḍɛf› n-rbbi, yugʷr tadwast n-bnadm.

way-aytma, swangmad-d ma-sttin-tkkam tgam-t lliġ-awn-d-iġra rbbi. idrus gigun ma-iṭṭafn taḥkimt ġmklli ġaln mddn n-ddunit-ad. idrus gigun ma-n-illan s-wawal. idrus gigun ma-igan yus n-tgmmi imqqurn.
walaynni rbbi isti maylli igan anufl dar ayt-ddunit-ad, baš a-iššḥššm ġwilli ittinin is-darsn lɛaql. isti ma-iḍɛfn dar ayt-ddunit-ad baš a-iššḥššm ġwilli dusnin.
rbbi isti maylli ḥgrn luḥn-t-in ayt-ddunit-ad, isti maylli darsn ur-igin yat, baš a-issḍr mad-darsn-igan kra ihiyyan.
ġmkad a-iqṣad rbbi baš a-ur-yaf bnadm ma-f-a-italġ ih̬f-ns ġ-lgddam n-rbbi.
nttan ad-awn-ifkan a-tgm win lmasiḥ. ifk-aġ taḥkimt l-lmasiḥ, ifk-aġ afulki l-lmasiḥ, iẓli-aġ s-uẓlay l-lmasiḥ, ifukku-aġ f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ.
mayad a-f-ityara: «wanna iran a-yalġ, yalġ siditnnġ.»
ġakud lliġ-n-darun-uškiġ ay-aytma, urd s-iwaliwn ġzzifnin ula s-lɛaql n-bnadm a-s-a-yawn-tbrraḥġ f-lḥqq lli-aġ-d-issbayyn rbbi.
walaynni skrġ-d f-a-ur-awn-sawalġ f-kra abla f-yasuɛ lmasiḥ d-lmut-ns f-uggjdi.
ġakud lliġ-n-darun-uškiġ, ḍɛfġ ar-trgigiyġ ṭiyyr-iyi bahra.
urd s-iwaliwn šwanin ula s-lɛaql n-bnadm a-s-a-yawn-sawalġ ar-awn-tbrraḥġ, walaynni s-tmitar n-rruḥ lqudus ula taḥkimt itjhhdn.
ġmkan ad-skarġ baš a-ur-tamnm s-lmasiḥ f-ssibt l-lɛaql n-bnadm walaynni f-ssibt n-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi.
s-ṣṣaḥt, s-lɛaql a-s-a-nsawal i-wid mqqurnin ġ-uġaras n-rbbi, walaynni ur-igi lɛaql n-ddunit-ad nġd win inmġurn n-ddunit-ad lli-rad-laḥ.
walaynni ar-nsawal s-tḥkimt n-rbbi lli-intln ġayd izrin issbayyn-t-id ġilad. ašku rbbi, ur-ta-ih̬lq ddunit, iqṣad ad-aġ-išškšm s-lmjd-ns.
ur-illi yan ġ-inmġurn n-ddunit issn mayad. mrad is-ssnn mayad, ikun ur-akkʷ-rad-nġn bab l-lmjd f-uggjdi.
walaynni ityara: «ur-jju-iẓri yan ula isfld yan ula iswangm lɛaql n-bnadm f-ma-ijjujad rbbi i-willi-ti-ttirinin.»
imma ġilad issbayyn-aġ-t-id rbbi s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ-ns. ašku rruḥ lqudus ar-isiggil kullu ma-illan, yissan ula tiġawsiwin n-rbbi lli-ntlnin.
ma-issnn iswingimn lli-rgsnin ġ-uwl n-bnadm? ur-tn-issin abla rruḥ n-bnadm lli-gis-illan. ġmkad a-iga ula dar rbbi. ur-illi ma-issnn iswingimn n-rbbi abla rruḥ n-rbbi.
imma nkkʷni ur-ginnġ-tlli rruḥ n-ddunit-ad, walaynni illa ginnġ rruḥ lli-aġ-d-yuzn rbbi baš a-nissan kullu mad-aġ-yakka rbbi.
ar-nsawal f-mayad s-mklli-aġ-imala rruḥ lqudus, urd s-iwaliwn l-lɛaql n-bnadm. ar-nsslmad ġwilli-ġ-illa rruḥ lqudus f-tġawsiwin n-rruḥ lqudus.
yan dar ur-illi rruḥ n-rbbi, ur-ra-iqbl tiwafkiw n-rruḥ-ns. ur-iẓḍar a-tnt-ifhm, ra-iġal izd anufl ad-gant, ašku s-rruḥ a-s-a-tnt-ntfham.
wanna-ġ-illa rruḥ n-rbbi ar-itfham kullu ma-illan, imma ntta ur-ra-t-fhmn mddn yaḍni.
ityara: «ma-issnn iswingimn n-siditnnġ baš ad-as-imala ma-t-id-iqqann?» imma nkkʷni, llan ginnġ iswingimn l-lmasiḥ.
imma kunni ay-aytma, ġ-uwssan-an ur-ẓḍarġ ad-didun-sawlġ ġmklli sawalġ d-willi dar rruḥ lqudus, ašku sul tmẓẓim ġ-lmasiḥ, ɛzzunt-darun-tġawsiwin n-ddunit-ad.
ġir akkʷfay ad-awn-fkiġ, ašku ur-ta-tẓḍarm i-umššu. sul s-ġilad ur-as-tẓḍarm,
ašku ar-sul-tskarm zund mddn n-ddunit-ad. ašku iġ-a-ittiri kra a-yagʷr kra ar-ttẓim i-ngratun, iban gigun izd win ddunit a-tgam ar-tskarm zund ġmklli kullu skarn mddn n-ddunit.
ašku kra gigun ar-ittini: «giġ win bulus.» kra gigun ar-ittini: «giġ win abullus.» iġ-a-tskarm ġmkan, zund mddn n-ddunit a-tgam.
ma-iga abullus ula bulus? ih̬ddamn ka-nga, tamnm f-imi-nnġ s-mklli ifka siditnnġ i-kud yan ginnġ.
nkki ẓẓiġ tasġart, abullus isswa-tt, walaynni rbbi a-stt-issmqqurn.
ġwalli iẓẓan ula ġwalli isswan ur-igi yat. walaynni rbbi, nttan a-issmqqurn.
ġwalli iẓẓan d-walli isswan, yan ad-gan. kud yan, rad-as-ifk rbbi tiġrad-ns f-twuri lli-iskr.
nkkʷni nga wid th̬damnin d-rbbi. imma kunni tgam igr n-rbbi, tgm tigmmi lli-as-nbnnu.
rbbi ibark gigi ifk-iyi a-n-darun-srsġ llsas zund iġ-giġ lmɛllm abnnay. ġilad ar-fllas-bnnun mddn yaḍni, walaynni illa f-kud yan a-stt-itawi ġ-mamnk a-ibnnu.
ašku ur-iẓḍar yan a-isrs kra llsas yaḍni abla llsas lli-ittrsn, a-t-igan d-yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
iġ-a-ibnnu yan f-llsas-an s-uwrġ nġd nnuqrt nġd iẓran ġʷlanin nġd akššuḍ nġd asaġur nġd alim,
ra-di-tban-twuri n-tbnnayt-ns. ašku tabnnayt n-kud yan ra-ttyaram s-lɛafit ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk lmasiḥ. ra-tban is-tdus nġd uhu.
wanna mi ur-ijdir maylli ibna f-llsas-an, rad-as-ifk rbbi tiġrad-ns.
imma wanna mi ijdr maylli ibna rad-as-laḥ. ur-rad-as-yili yat, walaynni ra-injm ntta zund iġ-nnit-injm i-lɛafit.
is-ur-tssinm izd tigmmi tamẓlayt n-rbbi a-tgam, izdġ gigun rruḥ n-rbbi?
walaynni tigmmi n-rbbi, iġ-tt-ihlk kra n-yan ra-t-ihlk rbbi. ašku ttyawẓlay-tgmmi n-rbbi a-tg tin rbbi, d-kunni tigmmi-ns a-tgam.
a-ur-akkʷ-ijllu yan ih̬f-ns. wanna iġaln is-iṭṭaf lɛaql n-ddunit-ad, ih̬ṣṣa-t a-iwrri zund iġ-ur-issin yat baš a-iṭṭaf lɛaql iṣḥan.
ašku taḥkimt n-ddunit-ad, tga zund anufl dar rbbi. ġmklli ityaran: «rbbi ar-iqqʷay ayt-lɛaql ġ-tillay-nsn.»
ityara-daġ: «issn siditnnġ is-h̬wan iswingimn n-ayt-lɛaql.»
ih̬ṣṣa-kʷn a-ur-tssfurrugm f-ma-iskr ġwad ula ġwan. ašku kullu ma-illan, kunni a-mi-illa,
ig-iyt bulus nġd abullus nġd bṭrus, ig-iyt ddunit nġd tudrt nġd lmut, ig-iyt ma-illan ġilad nġd ma-ra-yili. kunni a-mi-illa,
tilim i-lmasiḥ, yili lmasiḥ i-rbbi.
ġmkad a-s-ih̬ṣṣa ad-aġ-ttmnadm is-nga ġir ih̬ddamn l-lmasiḥ, ng wid dar ifl rbbi lamant n-ulmmud-ns intln.
imma ah̬ddam, illa fllas a-ikmml tawuri lli-as-ifl sidis.
nkki ur-iyi-ihmma iġ-flla-tḥkamm kunni nġd kra l-lmḥkama n-ddunit-ad. ur-nniġ yat f-ih̬f-inu, is-šwiġ ula is-ʷh̬šnġ.
swangmġ is-ur-gigi-illi kra l-lɛib, walaynni ur-rad-iniġ is-fulkiġ, ašku ur-illi ma-iẓḍarn a-flla-iḥkam abla siditnnġ waḥdut.

mayad a-f-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣa a-ur-ttinim f-yan is-yʷh̬šn, ašku ur-ta-d-ilkim-uzmz l-lḥukm. walaynni ġakud nna-d-yuška siditnnġ ra-ifaw kullu ma-irgsn ġ-tillas, issbayyn-d ula iswingimn lli-ntlnin ġ-uwlawn n-mddn. ġakudan a-ra-ifk rbbi rrḍa-ns i-kud yan d-ma-t-id-yuškan.

way-aytma, sawlġ ġmkad f-ih̬f-inu ula f-abullus baš a-tissanm mamnk a-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣa a-ttmnadm ġ-mddn. riġ a-zginnġ-tlmdm «a-ur-ttffuġm zġ-ma-ityaran,» ula illa gigun ma-issfurrugn ula ma-itḥgarn.
ašku ma-k-ibḍan d-wiyyaḍ? ma-dark-illan bla-yak-t-ifka rbbi? walaynni lliġd rbbi ad-ak-t-ifkan, mah̬ aylliġ a-tssfurrugt zund iġd ih̬f-nnk a-d-ikka?
ha-kunni ġilad tšbɛam, iggut darun lh̬ir. ha-kunni bla-nnġ twrrim tgam zund igldan. amar yufan a-tgm igldan n-ṣṣaḥt baš a-didun-ntḥkam ġ-tgldit-nnun.
ašku irwas-iyi is-aġ-n-issbidd rbbi nkkʷni-ad n-irqqasn ġ-tġurdin n-kullu mddn zund iġ-fllannġ-ittut lḥukm l-lmut, baš a-kullu-ginnġ-ssmuqquln lmalayka n-ignwan ula mddn n-ddunit.
nkkʷni nga ‹inafaln› f-ism l-lmasiḥ, imma kunni tgam ‹ayt-lɛaql› ġ-lmasiḥ. nkkʷni nḍɛf, imma kunni tdusm. nkkʷni ar-aġ-tḥgarn mddn, imma kunni ar-kʷn-tuqqarn.
sul s-ġilad ar-ntqama s-laẓ ula irifi. idrbaln a-nlssa, d-ibariqn a-nštta, ula darnnġ maniġ a-ntgawar.
ar-ntnhataf ar-nth̬dam s-ifassn-nnġ. ġakud nna-yaġ-rggmn mddn ar-ntḍalab rbbi a-tn-ibark. ġakud nna-yaġ-ssrfufunn ar-ntṣbar.
ġakud nna-fllannġ-sskirkisn ar-ntrara awal ifulkin. sul s-ġila nga darsn zund arras lli-n-luḥn mddn ġ-umdduz, ng darsn zund amazir n-ddunit-ad.
uriġ-awn-in mayad, urd a-kʷn-srs-ššḥššamġ, walaynni uṣṣaġ-kʷn zund tarwa ɛzzanin.
iggut darun mad-awn-isslmadn aġaras l-lmasiḥ, walaynni ur-ggutn id-babatun. ašku nkki a-iwrrin giġ babatun ġ-lmasiḥ yasuɛ zġ-ġakud lliġ-awn-in-iwiġ lh̬bar ifulkin.
ḍalbġ-kʷn ġilad a-yyi-tḍfurm ġ-mad-skarġ.

mayad a-f-rad-awn-in-aznġ timutaws. iga iwi iɛzzan ġ-siditnnġ, ar-bdda-iskar kullu ma-fllas-illan. rad-awn-d-issktay tinbaḍin-inu lli-s-a-ttiduġ ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, ar-srsnt-sslmadġ ġ-kullu imnaggarn n-aytmatn ġ-kraygatt mani.
walaynni ssnġ is-illa ġ-gratun ma-issfurrugn, ġaln is-ur-ra-n-darun-aškġ.
walaynni ra-n-aškġ ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn iġ-ira siditnnġ. ġakudan a-rad-ẓrġ id-bu-isfurrugn-an issanġ izd taḥkimt itjhhdn a-darsn-illan nġd ġir iwaliwn.
ašku tagldit n-rbbi ur-tlli s-iwaliwn, walaynni taḥkimt itjhhdn a-s-tlla.
mamnk a-tram ad-awn-in-srs-aškġ, izd s-ukuray nġd s-tayri n-uwl-inu ihnnan?
ašku sfldġ is-darun lfsad yʷh̬šnn bahra, uggʷar n-mad-skarn ġwilli ur-ssinnin aġaras n-rbbi. han illa ġ-gratun yan-urgaz ar-igan d-tmġart n-babas.
illa fllawn a-tallam, walaynni kunni ar-tssfurrugm. illa fllawn a-tssufġm ġwalli iskarn ġayan, a-ur-sul-didun-itmunu.
wah̬h̬a-d-fllawn-yaggug-uwdm-inu illa-n-didun-uwl-inu. ha-nkki zund iġ-didun-lliġ, utġ lḥukm s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ f-urgaz lli-iskarn ġaylli bahra yʷh̬šnn.
iġ-tmunm kullukn ġilad, illa-didun-uwl-inu tili didun ula taḥkimt itjhhdn n-siditnnġ yasuɛ,
iqqan-kʷn-d a-n-tdḥim argaz-an ġ-ufus n-šiṭan, baš a-tyawhlaknt ššhwat n-ddat-ns tnjm rruḥ-ns ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk siditnnġ yasuɛ.
han ur-šwin isfurrugn-nnun. is-ur-tssinm izd «tah̬mirt idrusn a-issktayn lɛjin iggutn.»?
ssittiyat zġ-gigun tah̬mirt-an taqdimt, baš a-bdda-tgm arh̬ṣiṣ l-ljdid ġ-ur-tlli-th̬mirt. ašku ilkm-d lɛid n-usurf-nnġ, ityawġras-ulqqaġ-nnġ lli-igan lmasiḥ.
yili fllannġ a-nmun f-lɛid s-urh̬ṣiṣ n-ufulki d-lḥqq, urd aġrum iktin s-th̬mirt taqdimt n-tnuwwašt d-lh̬ʷšant.
uriġ-awn-in-yad yat-tbrat, iniġ-awn gis a-ttanfm i-willi tfsadnin.

walaynni ur-riġ a-tanfm i-mddn n-ddunit-ad lli-tfsadnin nġd mddn n-ddunit-ad lli-dar-iɛzza ad-tamẓn ma-iggutn i-ih̬f-nsn, nġd ġwilli gisn takʷrnin nġd ġwilli gisn tɛbadnin ilahat yaḍni. ašku ur-iẓḍar yan a-yanf i-kullu mddn-an abla-akkʷ-iffuġ ddunit.

walaynni uriġ-awn tabrat-an ad-awn-iniġ a-ttanfm i-wanna igan ih̬f-ns d-gʷmatun amumn walaynni ar-itfsad nġd ar-itamẓ ma-iggutn i-ih̬f-ns nġd ar-itɛbad ilahat yaḍni nġd ar-irggm ġ-wiyyaḍ nġd ar-issnuful ih̬f-ns s-tissi iktin nġd ar-itakʷr. wan ġwad, anfat-as. ula tirmt, a-ur-tt-dids-tdrum.
ayt-brra, ur-ra-fllasn-ḥkamġ nkki, walaynni ayt-umnaggar l-lmasiḥ, is-ur-fllawn-illi a-fllasn-ttḥkamm?
rbbi a-ra-iḥkam f-willi llanin ġ-brra, imma kunni «ssufġat wanna yʷh̬šnn zġ-gratun.»
iġ-illa yan gigun dars kra-f-a-iṣraḍ i-gʷmas amumn, is-ra-izɛm a-t-yawi s-dar kra l-lqaḍi lli-ur-issinn rbbi, ur-t-yiwi s-dar imẓlayn l-lmasiḥ?
is-ur-tssinm izd imẓlayn l-lmasiḥ a-ra-iḥkam f-ddunit kullutt? lliġd kunni a-ra-iḥkam f-ddunit, is-ur-tẓḍarm a-ttḥkamm f-iṣraḍ-ad mẓẓinin?
is-ur-tssinm izd nkkʷni a-ra-iḥkam f-lmalayka? imma ġilad is-ur-nẓḍar a-ntḥkam f-tġawsiwin n-tudrt-ad?
iġ-darun-illa kra n-uṣraḍ, mah̬ a-ttirim a-ti-tsslkmm i-willi ur-ginin yat dar-umnaggar n-aytmatn?
is-kʷn-ur-iššḥššim ġayd tskarm? is-ur-gigun-illi yan iṭṭafn lɛaql yiẓḍar a-issnfaṣal aytmatn n-umnaggar?
imma kunni, han sul-nnit darun aytmatn ar-ṣraḍn i-ngratsn. han dar-willi ur-ssinnin rbbi a-s-a-yasn-ṣraḍn.
iġ-a-tṣraḍm ġmkan i-ngratun iban gigun is-tffuġm aġaras bahra. is-ur-ra-yaf a-tṣbarm d-wanna-fllawn-itɛddan? is-ur-ra-yaf a-tadjm wanna-yawn-yukʷrn?
imma kunni ar-ttakʷrm ar-ttɛddam f-ingratun, wah̬h̬a-nnit tgam aytmatn.

is-ur-tssinm mayad? ur-rad-kšmn mddn ʷh̬šnnin s-tgldit n-rbbi. ad-ur-tjlum ih̬f-nnun. ur-ra-srs-ikšm yan itfsadn nġd yan itɛbadn ilahat n-ddunit-ad nġd yan itznun nġd yan itfsadn d-yutman zund ntta
nġd yan išttan wiyyaḍ nġd yan dar iɛzza a-itamẓ ma-iggutn i-ih̬f-ns nġd yan itnufuln s-tissi nġd yan irggmn nġd yan itakʷrn.
ula kunni, kra gigun ikka-ttin ar-iskar ġmkan, walaynni isird-kʷn siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ s-rruḥ n-rbbi-nnġ, iẓli-kʷn iskr sslamt ġ-gratun d-rbbi.
kra n-mddn ar-ttinin: «iḥlla dari kraygatt kra.» walaynni ur-ra-k-infɛa kraygatt kra. «iḥlla dari kraygatt kra,» walaynni ur-rad-adjġ yat a-yyi-ikrs zund ismg-ns.
ar-ttinin mddn: «iga-umššu win-udis, ig-udis win-umššu,» walaynni rbbi ra-ihlk adis ula amššu. ġmkad a-s-iban is-ur-tgi ddat-nnġ tin lfsad, walaynni tga tin siditnnġ, ig ntta sidis n-ddat-nnġ.
rbbi issnkr-d ddat n-siditnnġ zġ-lmut, rad-aġ-d-issnkr ula nkkʷni s-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn.
is-ur-tssinm mayad? kud yan gigun, tga ddat-ns agzzum zġ-igzman l-lmasiḥ. is-tram a-tawim yan-ugzzum l-lmasiḥ tzdim-t d-ddat n-tmggant? ḥaša.
is-ur-tssinm, yan izdin d-tmggant iwrri iga dids yat-ddat? ġmklli ityaran: «rad-gn sin yan.»
walaynni yan izdin d-siditnnġ iwrri iga ntta dids yan-rruḥ.
rwlat zġ-kullu ma-igan lfsad. ddnub yaḍni ur-a-ssyʷh̬šann ddat n-bnadm, walaynni yan itfsadn, hati ar-issyʷh̬šan ula ddat-ns.
is-ur-tssinm ddat-nnun is-tga tigmmi tamẓlayt, izdġ gis rruḥ lqudus lli-awn-ifka rbbi. ur-tgim win ih̬f-nnun,
ašku nttan a-kʷn-isġan, ifk fllawn atig-nnun. illa fllawn ġilad a-tmjjdm rbbi s-ddat-nnun.
imma tiġawsiwin lli-f-di-turam, rad-awn-fllasnt-iniġ: išwa i-urgaz a-ur-yawi tamġart.
walaynni ra-yaf iġ-illa kraygatt argaz s-tmġart-ns, tili kraygatt tamġart s-urgaz-ns, f-ssibt n-a-ur-yili lfsad.
illa f-urgaz a-ifk i-tmġart-ns lḥqq n-tmġart, yili f-tmġart a-tfk i-urgaz-ns lḥqq n-urgaz.
ašku ur-sul-tgi ddat n-tmġart tin-tmġart, walaynni tga tin-urgaz-ns. ur-sul-tgi ddat n-urgaz tin-urgaz walaynni tga tin-tmġart-ns.

illa fllawn a-ur-tḥṣarm i-ngratun, abla iġ-di-tmšaškam a-tẓlim kra n-uwssan tlhum gisn s-tẓallit. walaynni iġ-zrin-uwssan-an illa fllawn a-twrrim s-ingratun, a-ur-kʷn-iġrru šiṭan iġ-ur-sul-tẓḍarm a-tṣbrm.
mayd-awn-nniġ ur-kʷn-srs-umirġ, walaynni udjiġ-kʷn a-tskarm s-ġmkad iġ-tram.
riġ kullu mddn ad-gn zund nkki, walaynni kraygatt yan d-mad-as-ifka rbbi. yan ityawfka-yas a-ig ġmkad, d-yan ityawfka-yas a-ig ġmkan.
imma ġwilli ur-tahlnin ula h̬tilli ganin tihjjalin, rad-asn-iniġ: ra-išwu iġ-qaman waḥdutn zund nkki.
walaynni iġ-ur-ẓḍarn ad-nbḍn ġ-ih̬f-nsn illa fllasn ad-tahln. ra-yaf iġ-tahln ula-da-tn-tjddr ššhawa.
imma ġwilli tahlnin, rad-asn-fkġ luṣit-ad. urd nkki a-tn-yuṣṣan walaynni siditnnġ. illa f-tmġart a-ur-tfl argaz-ns,
walaynni iġ-ti-tfl illa fllas a-tqama waḥdutt nġd a-di-twrri s-dar-urgaz-ns. yili f-urgaz a-ur-ifru i-tmġart-ns.
imma wiyyaḍ rad-asn-iniġ mayad. nkki a-t-innan urd siditnnġ. wanna gigun iṭṭafn tamġart ur-igin tamumnt, illa fllas ad-as-ur-ifru iġ-tra a-dids-tqama.
tanna gigunt iṭṭafn argaz ur-igin amumn, illa fllas ad-as-ur-tfru iġ-ira a-dids-iqama.

ašku f-ssibt n-tmġart tamumnt a-f-irḍa rbbi f-urgaz-ns. ula f-ssibt n-urgaz amumn a-f-irḍa rbbi f-tmġart-ns. mrad is-ur-igi ġmkad rad-gn tarwa-nsn zund tarwa n-willi ur-ssinnin rbbi, walaynni nssn izd s-ṣṣaḥt irḍa rbbi f-tarwa-nsn.

imma argaz lli-ur-yuminn, iġ-ira a-ifru i-tmumnt, iskr-iyt ġmklli ira. ula tamġart lli-ur-yuminn, iġ-tra a-tfru i-umumn tskr-iyt ġmklli tra. iġ-illa ġmkad ur-sul-tyawkrrafn imumnn, ašku rbbi iqṣad gigun ad-awn-tili sslamt.
walaynni swangm a-tamġart tamumnt, is-tssnt is-ur-ra-tjjnjmt argaz-nnm? swangm ay-argaz amumn, is-tssnt is-ur-ra-tjjnjmt tamġart-nnk?
walaynni illa f-kud yan a-iqama ġmklli-f-t-id-yufa siditnnġ ġakud lliġ-as-d-iġra, iqama ġ-taġamt lli-as-ifka rbbi. ġmkad a-s-a-tuṣṣaġ ġ-imnaggarn kullutn.

wanna iṭṭafn taẓallit n-ddat-ns ġakud lliġ-as-d-iġra siditnnġ, a-ur-yiri a-ig zund ġwilli ur-tti-ṭṭafnin. imma wanna ur-iṭṭafn taẓallit-an ġakud lliġ-as-d-iġra, a-ur-yiri a-iẓẓall i-ddat-ns.
ašku taẓallit n-ddat ur-tgi yat, zund iġ-as-iẓẓulla zund iġ-as-ur-iẓẓulli. imma taġawsa ihiyyan a-stt-igan a-nskar s-luṣiyat n-rbbi.
illa f-kraygatt yan a-iqama ġmklli-t-id-yufa siditnnġ ġakud lliġ-as-d-iġra.
iġ-tgit ismg ġakud lliġ-ak-d-iġra, ad-ak-ur-ṭiyyr f-mayan. walaynni iġ-tufit mamnk a-s-twrrit a-tgt win ih̬f-nnk, skr ma-mi-tufit.
ašku wanna igan ismg ġakud lliġ-as-d-iġra siditnnġ, hati iwrri iga win ih̬f-ns ġ-lgddam n-siditnnġ. imma wanna igan win ih̬f-ns ġakud lliġ-as-d-iġra, iwrri iga ntta ismg l-lmasiḥ.
isġa-kʷn lmasiḥ ifk fllawn atig-nnun. imma ġilad a-ur-tfkm ih̬fawn-nnun a-tgm ismgan i-bnadm.
way-aytma, illa f-kud yan a-iqama d-rbbi ġmklli-t-id-yufa ġakud lliġ-as-d-iġra.
imma ġwilli ur-ta-tahlnin, ur-dari fllasn kra l-luṣit zġ-siditnnġ. walaynni rad-awn-iniġ mad-swangmġ nkki lli-f-irḥm rbbi ig-iyi d-wad izgan ġ-uġaras-ns.
hati f-ssibt n-tnukmut lli-illan ġ-uwssan-ad, nniġ nkki ra-yaf ad-qaman mddn ġmklli gan.
iġ-teṭṭaft tamġart a-ur-tti-tflt. iġ-ur-teṭṭaft tamġart a-ur-tirit a-ttahlt.
iġ-ttahlt tamġart urd ddnub ayan. iġ-ttahl-tfruh̬t urd ddnub ayan. walaynni ġwilli tahlnin, išabukn n-ddunit a-ġ-rad-ilin. hati riġ a-kʷn-kkisġ i-ġayan.
way-aytma rad-awn-iniġ, ur-sul-tqama luqt iggutn. ġilad s-uflla illa f-willi ṭṭafnin tamġart ad-skarn zund iġ-tt-ur-ṭṭafn.
illa f-willi allanin ad-skarn zund iġ-ur-allan. illa f-willi ḍṣṣanin ad-skarn zund iġ-ur-a-ḍṣṣan. illa f-willi saġnin ad-skarn zund iġ-ur-igi yat winsn.
illa f-willi salanin tiġawsiwin n-ddunit a-ur-lhun ih̬f-nsn s-ddunit, ašku ddunit-ad takmur a-ttmmu.
riġ a-ur-darun-tili taġuft. argaz nna-ur-itahiln, ar-itlhu s-tġawsiwin n-siditnnġ, ašku ar-ittiri a-irḍu siditnnġ.
imma wanna itahln, ar-t-sslhawnt-tġawsiwin n-ddunit ašku ar-ittiri a-irḍu tamġart-ns.

ar-n-itafa ih̬f-ns ġ-gr snat-tnbaḍin. tafruh̬t nġd tamġart nna-ur-itahiln, ar-ttlhu s-tġawsiwin n-siditnnġ, ašku ar-ttiri a-tg tins ttyawẓlay kullu i-siditnnġ. imma tamġart nna-itahln ar-tt-sslhawnt-tġawsiwin n-ddunit ašku ar-ttiri a-ttrḍu argaz-ns.
nniġ-awn mayad baš ad-awn-tili sslamt. ur-riġ a-n-fllawn-ẓẓiẓayġ, walaynni riġ a-tskarm ma-ifulkin ar-bdda-ttlhum s-ma-irḍan siditnnġ.
imma wanna iġaln is-a-iskar ma-ur-ifulkin d-talli-n-iḍalb ar-fllas-tssayk ššhawa-ns yiri a-stt-yawi, adjat-tn ad-tahln. ur-ra-ig mayan ddnub.
imma wanna idusn izga ġ-uwl-ns inbḍ ġ-ma-ira iskr d-ih̬f-ns a-stt-ur-itahl, ifulki-nnit mayan.
ġwalli itahln, afulki ayd iskr. imma ġwalli ur-itahiln iskr afulki s-uggʷar.
ttyawkrraf-tmġart s-urgaz-ns maḥdd sul illa ġ-ddunit. iġ-immut-urgaz ra-ttyawfsay-tmġart. ġakudan ra-tiẓḍar a-ttahl wanna tra, iġ-iga win siditnnġ.
walaynni irwas-iyi is-ra-tfrḥ-tmġart iġ-tqama waḥdutt. mayad ad-nniġ nkki, walaynni irwas-iyi is-iyi-t-id-imla rruḥ n-rbbi.
imma tifiyi n-tġrsiw l-laṣnam, nssn ma-fllas-ttinin mddn: «nṭṭaf kullwaġ ‹tawassna›.» hati tawassna ar-tssuff bnadm, imma tayri ar-ti-tssdus.
yan iġaln is-issn kra, ur-ta-issin ġmklli-t-ih̬ṣṣa a-yissan.
walaynni yan ittirin rbbi, hatin ityawssan dar rbbi.
imma ġwilli šttanin tifiyi n-tġrsiw l-laṣnam, nssn fllasn izd «kullu laṣnam n-ddunit-ad ur-a-skarn yat.» nissan izd «yan-rbbi ka-illan.»
ur-nttu larwaḥ n-ignwan ula win-wakal lli-zġ-a-skarn mddn ‹id-rbbi›, ašku ntni ggutn darsn id-rbbi-nsn d-id-siditsn.

imma nkkʷni, yan-rbbi ad-darnnġ-illan lli-mi-nga wins, a-t-igan d-babatnnġ lli-ih̬lqn kullu ma-illan. d-yan-siditnnġ ad-darnnġ-illan lli-s-nlla, a-t-igan d-yasuɛ lmasiḥ lli-s-ityawh̬laq kullu ma-illan.

walaynni tawassna-yad ur-tt-ssinn kullu mddn. ašku kra gisn imyar laṣnam bahra. iġ-ddan ġilad ar-šttan tifiyi-an rad-swangmn izd tifiyi l-laṣnam a-tga. rad-asn-ṭiyyr ar-ssḥssun is-ra-tn-tssrku, ašku ur-ta-ssinn mamnk ad-ẓẓmẓlayn ma-ifulkin zġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn.
imma rbbi, urd amššu a-s-ra-t-nrḍu. ur-dars-nʷh̬šin iġ-t-nšša, ula nšwa dars iġ-ur-t-nšši.
walaynni illa fllawn a-trarm lɛaql iġ-tram a-tskarm s-lḥqq-nnun, a-ur-ttggam tabayḍḍrt i-willi mi iḍɛf liman-nsn.
ašku yan ur-bahra-issinn ma-ifulkin zġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn, iġ-k-iẓra kiyi lli-dar ‹tawassna› ar-tšttat ġ-tgmmi l-laṣnam, is-ur-ra-t-izzɛam mayan a-išš ula ntta tifiyi l-laṣnam?
hati s-twassna-nnk a-s-ra-thlkt ġwalli iḍɛfn, igan gʷmak lli-f-immut lmasiḥ.
wanna iskrn kra n-ddnb i-aytmas, issyaggas ġwilli ur-ta-ssinnin mamnk aṭṭun afulki zġ-lh̬ʷšant, hatin lmasiḥ a-mi-iskr ddnb.
mayad a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, iġ-ra-iḍr gʷma f-ssibt n-mad-šttaġ, ur-sar-rad-ššġ tifiyi, baš a-ur-ssḍrġ gʷma.
is-ur-ẓḍarġ ad-skarġ ġmknna riġ? is-ur-giġ arqqas? is-ur-ẓriġ siditnnġ yasuɛ? is-ur-tgim kunni ṣṣabt lli-f-h̬dmġ s-ism n-siditnnġ?
wah̬h̬a illa ma-yyi-ur-igin d-urqqas, tssnm kunni is-t-giġ, ašku iban gigun ma-iskr siditnnġ f-ufus-inu s-trqqast lli-yyi-ifka.
ġmkad a-s-a-traraġ awal i-willi sri taštkkanin.
is-ur-dari lḥqq ad-šttaġ ar-ssaġ ula nkki?
iġ-a-tmudduġ is-ur-dari lḥqq a-didi-tawiġ tamġart tamumnt zund irqqasn yaḍni d-aytmas n-siditnnġ d-bṭrus?
izd ġir nkki d-barnaba ka-ih̬ṣṣa a-nth̬dam ġ-twuri yaḍni baš a-ntamẓ ma-nštta?
man aɛskri ikšmn s-imiġ ar-sul-itṣiyyar f-ih̬f-ns? ma-iẓẓan aḍil ur-a-ištta zġ-lġllt-ns? ma-iksan tawrut ur-a-issa zġ-ukkʷfay-ns?
walaynni urd ġir lmɛni n-bnadm a-s-nssn tiġawsiwin-ad. ar-fllasnt-ittini ššrɛ ula ntta.
ašku ġ-ššrɛ n-musa a-ġ-ityara: «a-ur-tgt aġamu i-uzgr lli-isrwatn.» izd ġir izgarn a-iqṣad rbbi ġ-wawal-ad?
is-urd nkkʷni a-iɛna ġ-ma-inna? hati f-ssibt-nnġ a-f-ityara-wawal-ad, ašku ġwalli ikkrzn ula ġwalli imggrn iqqan-tn-d a-n-trjun ġ-taġamt n-ṣṣabt.
nkkʷni nluḥ-n darun amud n-rruḥ. is-ur-darnnġ lḥqq a-darun-nmgr kra l-lh̬ir lli-tḥtajja ddat?

llan wiyyaḍ ar-darun-tamẓn taġamt l-lh̬ir, imma nkkʷni is-ur-rad-aġ-tili taġamt yugʷrn tinsn? walaynni ur-jju-nḍalb lḥqq-nnġ. nṣamḥ ġ-mayan kullut, baš a-ur-ntḥṣar tabrraḥt l-lh̬bar ifulkin l-lmasiḥ.
is-ur-tssinm, ġwilli th̬damnin ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi izd ma-ityawfkan i-tgmmi n-rbbi a-zġ-a-šttan? is-ur-tssinm, ġwilli skarnin tawuri n-uẓru n-tġrsi izd tiġrsiw-an a-zġ-a-šttan?
ġmkan a-yuṣṣa siditnnġ ula f-willi tbrraḥnin ġilad s-lh̬bar ifulkin, baš ad-tamẓn mad-ḥtajjan f-ssibt n-twuri n-tbrraḥt lli-skarn.
imma nkki ur-jju-ḍalbġ lḥqq-inu. tabrat-ad, ur-awn-tt-in-uriġ baš ad-amẓġ kra i-ih̬f-inu. ašku yuf dari ad-mmtġ ula ikkis flla kra n-yan lfrḥ-ad dari illan s-mayd skarġ.
walaynni iġ-a-tbrraḥġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin, ur-ẓḍarġ ad-alġġ ih̬f-inu f-mayd skrġ, ašku iqqan-iyi-d ad-skarġ ġmkad. taguḍi a-rad-iyi-yili iġ-ur-a-tbrraḥġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin.
mrad izd nkki a-iqṣadn tawuri-ad, rad-iriġ a-fllas-tamẓġ tiġrad-inu. walaynni tqqan-iyi-d-twuri-ad, ašku rbbi a-zgigi-iran a-stt-skarġ.
imma ġilad ma-igan tiġrad-inu? a-tnt-igan d-mayad. ẓḍarġ ad-sslkamġ lh̬bar ifulkin i-mddn bla zgisn ḥtajjaġ yat, ula-da-zgisn-tḍalabġ mad-sthllaġ f-twuri-ad n-tbrraḥt.
nkki giġ win ih̬f-inu, ẓḍarġ ad-skarġ mknna riġ. walaynni giġ ih̬f-inu d-ismg i-kullu mddn, baš a-zgisn-rarġ wid ggutnin i-rbbi.
giġ ih̬f-inu d-gu-yudaya ġ-dar ayt-yudaya, baš ad-rarġ ayt-yudaya i-rbbi. gġ ih̬f-inu d-bu-ššrɛ ġ-dar ayt-ššrɛ, wah̬h̬a ur-iyi-d-iqqan ššrɛ, baš ad-rarġ ula ayt-ššrɛ i-rbbi.

gġ ih̬f-inu d-wad ur-issinn ššrɛ ġ-dar willi ur-ssinnin ššrɛ, baš ad-rarġ ula ġwilli ur-ssinnin ššrɛ i-rbbi. walaynni ur-jjud nkkin a-iffuġn zġ-ššrɛ n-rbbi ašku ar-bdda-skarġ s-ulmmud l-lmasiḥ.
gġ ih̬f-inu d-wad iḍɛfn ġ-dar willi ḍɛfnin, baš ad-rarġ ula ġwilli ḍɛfnin i-rbbi. ġ-dar kullu mddn ar-twrriġ gġ zġ-gisn baš ad-afġ mamnk ad-zgisn-jjnjamġ kra.
kullu mayad, ar-t-skarġ baš ad-sslkmġ lh̬bar ifulkin i-mddn, kšmġ didsn ġ-tamunt-ns.
tssnm is-iggut ma-iskarn šala n-tizzla walaynni ġir yan a-ra-gisn-yamẓ lkas. tazzalat ġilad baš a-tamẓm lkas.
kullu wanna itazzaln ar-issdus ih̬f-ns. ar-t-issdus baš a-yamẓ kra l-lkas lli-ur-ra-idum. imma nkkʷni ar-nssdus ih̬fawn-nnġ baš a-namẓ lkas lli-rad-bdda-idum.
ur-a-tazzalġ nkki bla lfaytt ula-da-skarġ tukkʷimt zund yan ikkatn ġir aḍu.
walaynni ar-ssdusġ ddat-inu ar-gis-tnbaḍġ, baš a-ur-iyi-issufġ rbbi ġ-isiggʷra nkki lli-yad-itbrraḥn i-wiyyaḍ.
way-aytma, riġ a-ur-tettum ma-ijran i-imzwura-nnġ ġayd izrin. ntni kullutn issntal-tn-umdlu, zrin kullu ġ-wammas n-umda,
ddmn kullu s-ism n-musa ġ-umdlu d-umda.
ar-kullu-šttan tirmt zġ-ignna,
ar-kullu-ssan tissi zġ-ignna, ašku ar-ssan zġ-uẓru n-ignna lli-bdda-didsn-itmunun. lmasiḥ a-igan aẓru-an.
walaynni ma-gisn-iggutn, ur-fllasn-irḍi rbbi, mmtn jlun imḍḍaln-nsn ġ-lh̬la.
ġaylli-s-asn-tggʷra ar-aġ-imala a-ur-nttiri ma-yʷh̬šnn ġmklli ttirin ntni,
ula-da-ntɛbad ilahat yaḍni zund kra gisn ġmklli ityaran: «skiwsn mddn ar-šttan ar-ssan, nkrn ar-tḥušn.»
a-ur-ntfsad zund kra gisn, ityawhlak gisn sin id-mraw d-kraḍ n-id-walf (23.000) ġ-yan-wass.
illa fllannġ a-ur-ntarm rbbi zund kra gisn, nġn-tn ilgmmaḍn.
a-ur-ntngmug zund kra gisn, ihlk-tn lmalak l-lmut.
ġaylli-s-asn-tggʷra, ijra ġmkan baš ad-aġ-iml a-ur-nskar zund ntni, ityara kullu f-ssibt-nnġ baš a-nrar lɛaql nkkʷni lli-izzrayn isiggʷra n-ddunit.
wanna ittinin is-izga, irar lɛaql a-ur-iḍr.

ur-fllawn-tzri kra n-tassast abla h̬talli kullu izrayn f-mddn. imma rbbi izga-bdda ġ-wawal-ns, ur-ra-kʷn-yadj a-ttyaramm uggʷar n-ma-mi-tẓḍarm. hati ġakud nna-tzraym ġ-tassast rad-awn-iml mamnk a-stti-tnrum tnjmm zġ-gis.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, mayad a-f-a-yawn-ttiniġ, tanfat i-ilahat n-ddunit-ad.
ar-srun-sawalġ zund ayt-lɛaql. swangmat d-ih̬f-nnun ġ-ma-rad-awn-iniġ.
hati lkas ambarki lli-f-a-ntškar rbbi, ġakud nna-zgis-nssa ar-nkššm ġ-tamunt n-idammn l-lmasiḥ. ula tangult n-uġrum lli-ntbbi, ġakud nna-zgis-nštta ar-nkššm ġ-tamunt n-ddat l-lmasiḥ.
yat-tngult a-illan ašku yan a-nga nkkʷni lli-iggutn, ar-kullu-nṭṭaf taġamt ġ-tngult-an.
swangmat ġ-mad-skarn ayt-yudaya. ġwilli šttanin tiġrsiw ar-kššmn ġ-tamunt n-uẓru n-tġrsi.
walaynni mad-qṣadġ ġ-wawal-ad? is-tga kra, tifiyi n-tġrsiw l-laṣnam? nġd is-gan kra, laṣnam?
uhu, walaynni tiġrsiw lli-mi-qqrsn ayt-laṣnam ar-tnt-akkan i-ljnun urd i-rbbi. ur-riġ a-tkššmm kunni ġ-ma-igan win ljnun.
ur-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tssam zġ-lkas n-siditnnġ d-lkas l-ljnun. ur-ra-tiẓḍarm a-tšttam zġ-lmida n-siditnnġ d-lmida l-ljnun.
is-tram a-stti-tssṭiyyarm i-siditnnġ? is-fllas-tjhhdm kunni?
ar-ttinin mddn: «iḥlla kraygatt kra.» walaynni ur-ra-infɛa kraygatt kra. «iḥlla kraygatt kra,» walaynni ur-rad-aġ-issdus kraygatt kra.
a-ur-isiggil yan ġir ma-ifulkin i-ih̬f-ns, walaynni a-t-isiggil i-wiyyaḍ.
iḥlla-yawn a-tšttam tifiyi nna-inzzan ġ-ssuq bla-da-fllas-tsqsam ula tškkam ġ-uwl-nnun,
ašku «akal win rbbi a-iga, ula kullu ma-gis-illan.»
iġ-awn-iɛrḍ kra n-yan ur-issinn rbbi, iġ-tram a-dids-tmunm, šttayat aynna-yawn-in-isrs bla tsqsam ula tškkam ġ-uwl-nnun.
walaynni iġ-awn-inna kra n-yan «tifiyi-ad tga tin laṣnam,» illa fllawn a-stt-ur-tššm. ašku iġ-tti-tššam, urd afulki ayn tskrm i-walli-awn-t-innan, ašku ra-yili šškk.
šškk-ad ra-yili ġ-uwl-ns ntta urd ul-nnun. walaynni mah̬ aylliġ rad-kkisġ i-ih̬f-inu mad-iyi-iḥllan f-ssibt n-yan iškkan?
iġ-a-tškarġ rbbi f-mad-šttaġ, mah̬ aylliġ ra-yyi-tẓin mddn f-maylli-f-a-tškarġ rbbi?
walaynni kullu ma-tšttam ula kullu ma-tssam ula kullu ma-tskarm, illa fllawn a-srs-tmalam lmjd n-rbbi.
a-ur-tti-tssṭiyyarm i-ayt-yudaya ula ayt-tmizar yaḍni ula ayt-umnaggar n-rbbi.
skarat zund nkki, ar-n-tggaġ tiqqi-nu a-bdda-trḍuġ kullu mddn. ur-a-siggilġ ġir ma-ifulkin i-ih̬f-inu walaynni ar-siggilġ ma-ifulkin i-wiyyaḍ, baš ad-wrrin njmn.
ḍfurat-iyi ġ-mad-skarġ ġmklli tḍfurġ lmasiḥ ġ-ma-iskar.
hati frḥġ srun ašku ar-tskarm s-kullu mad-awn-nniġ ar-tzzgam almmud lli-awn-in-sslkmġ.
walaynni riġ a-tissanm mayad: iga lmasiḥ ih̬f n-kraygatt argaz, ig-urgaz ih̬f n-tmġart-ns, ig rbbi ih̬f l-lmasiḥ.
argaz nna-idaln agayyu-ns iġ-a-itẓalla nġd iġ-a-ittini s-mad-as-imala rbbi, hati ar-iššḥššam ġwalli igan ih̬f-ns.
imma tamġart nna-ur-idaln agayyu-ns iġ-a-ttẓalla nġd iġ-a-ttini s-mad-as-imala rbbi, nttat ar-tššḥššam ġwalli igan ih̬f-ns. ra-ig ġayan zund iġ-tssmakkrd agayyu-ns.
tamġart nna-ur-idaln agayyu-ns, ra-yaf a-tlass azzar-ns. imma ġayan, lfḍḥt a-ra-ig i-yat ilassn azzar-ns nġd tssmakkrd agayyu-ns. ġmkan a-s-iban is-fllas-illa a-ti-tdl.
argaz, illa fllas a-ur-idal agayyu-ns ašku rbbi ih̬lq argaz f-ṣṣurt-ns, iban gis lmjd n-rbbi. imma tamġart, iban gis lmjd n-urgaz.
ġ-isizwar ur-ityawskar-urgaz zġ-tmġart, walaynni ttyawskar-tmġart zġ-urgaz.
ur-ityawskar-urgaz f-ssibt n-tmġart, walaynni tamġart a-ityawskarn f-ssibt n-urgaz.
mayad a-f-illa f-tmġart a-ttasi tamatart-ad f-ih̬f-ns, baš a-tmala is-tga tin-urgaz-ns. iqqan-tt-id mayad f-ssibt l-lmalayka.
walaynni nssn is-ur-ngarant-tmġarin d-irgazn ġ-tamunt n-siditnnġ, ula ngaran irgazn d-tmġarin.
ašku ttyawskar-tmġart zġ-urgaz, ar-itlul-urgaz zġ-tmġart. kullu mayan, rbbi a-t-iqṣadn.
ma-tnnam kunni? is-ra-ifulki iġ-tẓẓulla-tmġart i-rbbi d-ugayyu-ns ur-idil?
is-ur-tssinm, argaz nna-dar-iġzzif-wazzar, ur-ra-ti-tuqqarn mddn.
walaynni tfulki-tmġart nna-dar azzar iġzzifn, ašku ifka-yas rbbi azzar-ns zund yat-tmlsit.
iġ-illa ma-iran a-didnnġ-itẓi f-mayad, ur-rad-as-iniġ abla: ġmkad a-nskar nkkʷni ula kullu imnaggarn n-rbbi.
imma ġilad ra-kʷn-uṣṣaġ f-kra n-tġawsiwin yaḍni, ur-ẓḍarġ a-kʷn-fllasnt-alġġ. ašku ġakud nna-tmnaggarm ur-a-tskarm lh̬ir walaynni lh̬ʷšant a-tskarm.
taġawsa tamzwarut a-stt-igan: sfldġ is-a-taṭṭum ġakud nna-n-tmnaggarm. irwas-iyi is-urd tikrkas ayan,
ašku iqqan-d a-yaṭṭu kra f-kra baš a-gigun-iban manwi-f-irḍa rbbi.
walaynni lliġ a-n-tmnaggarm urd imnsi n-siditnnġ a-tšttam.
ašku kraygatt yan ar-itzayad ar-ištta bla-da-itql s-wiyyaḍ, ar-gigun-ittili kra yaġ laẓ, ar-ittili kra inufl s-tissi.

mah̬, ur-darun tigʷmma-nnun a-gisnti-tšttam ar-gisnti-tssam? is-tḥgrm amnaggar n-rbbi tirim a-tššḥššamm ġwilli ur-dar yat? ma-rad-awn-iniġ? is-tram a-kʷn-alġġ f-wan ġayan? uhu, ur-ra-kʷn-fllas-alġġ.
maylli-yyi-d-imla siditnnġ, ha-yyi mliġ-awn-t. siditnnġ yasuɛ, ġ-iḍ-an ġ-ra-inz, yasi tangult
iškr rbbi ibbi-tt yini: «h̬tad tga ddat-inu, ttyawfka f-ssibt-nnun. skarat mayad a-yyi-d-srs-tswingimm.»
yasi ula lkas ġmkad ġ-isiggʷra n-imnsi yini: «lkas-ad iga lɛhd l-ljdid ġ-gratun d-rbbi s-idammn-inu. skarat mayad ġakud nna-zgis-tssam, a-yyi-d-srs-tswingimm.»
imma ġilad ġakud nna-ġ-a-tšttam zġ-tngult-ad ar-tssam zġ-lkas-ad, ar-takkam tugga f-lmut n-siditnnġ ard-d-iwrri.
walaynni yan iššan zġ-tngult n-siditnnġ nġd iswa zġ-lkas-ns bla-da-t-ituqqar, lḥukm n-rbbi a-ra-fllas-yili ašku iskr zġ-ddat n-siditnnġ d-idammn-ns zund iġ-ur-gin yat.
illa f-kraygatt yan a-zwar-yarm ih̬f-ns, išš ilmma zġ-tngult isu zġ-lkas.
ašku wanna iššan isu bla iswangm lmɛna n-ddat n-siditnnġ, hati lḥukm n-rbbi a-ra-izzugz f-ih̬f-ns iġ-išša isu.
mayad a-f-gigun-iggut ma-iḍɛfn ihrš, yili ma-immutn.
iġ-a-nsiggil ġ-uwlawn-nnġ, ur-ra-fllannġ-ittut lḥukm.
walaynni iġ-a-fllannġ-itḥkam siditnnġ, ar-aġ-itrbba baš a-ur-ntyawhlak s-lhalak n-ddunit-ad.
imma kunni ay-aytma, ġakud nna-tmnaggarm a-tššm, illa f-kud yan a-iql s-wayyaḍ.
iġ-illa mad-bahra-yaġ laẓ ih̬ṣṣa-t a-išš ġ-tgmmi-ns, a-ur-fllawn-ittut lḥukm n-rbbi lliġ a-tmnaggarm. imma tiġawsiwin yaḍni, ra-kʷn-fllasnt-uṣṣaġ ġakud nna-n-darun-uškiġ.
imma tiġawsiwin n-rruḥ lqudus ay-aytma, riġ a-tissanm lḥqq fllasnt.
swangmad-d mamnk a-tjlam ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-ur-ta-tssinm rbbi, yili gigun ma-kʷn-itawin a-ttɛbadm laṣnam iẓnẓam.
ġayan a-f-riġ a-tissanm mayad: yan isawaln s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ n-rbbi ur-ra-yini «tlla nnɛlt f-yasuɛ,» ula iẓḍar kra n-yan a-ittini «yasuɛ iga sidi» abla s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus.
ggutnt-twafkiw, walaynni yan-rruḥ a-illan.
ggutnt-twuriw, walaynni yan siditnnġ a-illan.
ggutn iskkirn, walaynni yan-rbbi a-tn-iskarn ġ-kraygatt yan.
ar-yakka i-kud yan taḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus a-srs-itɛawan wiyyaḍ.
yan, ar-as-yakka awal l-lfhmt s-rruḥ lqudus. yan yaḍni, ar-as-yakka awal n-twassna s-rruḥ lqudus.
yan yaḍni, ar-as-yakka s-rruḥ-ad a-bahra-yamn. yan yaḍni, ar-as-yakka s-rruḥ-ad a-ijjujji imuḍan.

ar-yakka i-yan a-iskar lmɛjizat, ar-yakka i-yan a-ittini s-mad-as-imala rbbi, ar-yakka i-yan a-itakʷz ma-igan win rruḥ lqudus zġ-win larwaḥ yaḍni. ar-yakka i-yan a-isawal s-iwaliwn iġribn, ar-yakka i-yan a-yissan lmɛna n-iwaliwn iġribn.
walaynni kullu mayad, ar-t-iskar rruḥ lqudus lli-igan yan, ar-yakka i-kud yan ġmklli ittiri ntta.
kraygatt ddat teṭṭaf igzman ggutnin. ġmkad a-iga lmasiḥ ula ntta. wah̬h̬a yat-ddat ad-dars-illan, ggutn igzman-ns.
ašku nddm kullwaġ s-udum n-yan-rruḥ baš a-nwrri ng yat-ddat, ng-iyt ayt-yudaya nġd ayt-tmizar yaḍni, ng-iyt ismgan nġd win ih̬f-nnġ. kullwaġ zġ-yan-rruḥ a-zġ-aġ-isswa.
ašku ddat teṭṭaf igzman ggutnin. urd ġir yan-ugzzum a-tga.
iġ-inna-uḍar «ur-giġ zġ-ddat ašku ur-giġ afus,» izd s-ṣṣaḥt urd ddat a-zġ-iga?
iġ-inna-umẓẓuġ «ur-giġ zġ-ddat ašku ur-giġ tiṭ,» izd s-ṣṣaḥt urd ddat a-zġ-iga?
mrad is-tga ddat kullu tiṭ, ma-s-ra-tsflid? mrad is-tga ddat kullu amẓẓuġ, ma-s-ra-tkḍḍu?
walaynni iskr rbbi igzman n-ddat, kraygatt agzzum ġmklli-t-ira ntta.
mrad is-kullu-nga yan-ugzzum, ur-ra-tili ddat.
walaynni nssn is-ggutn igzman, munn kullutn ġ-yat-ddat.
ur-ra-tiẓḍar tiṭ a-tini i-ufus «ur-k-ḥtajjaġ,» ula-ra-yiẓḍar-ugayyu a-yini i-iḍarn «ur-kʷn-ḥtajjaġ.»
ur-a-ttinin ġmkan ašku igzman lli-f-nġal is-ḍɛfn, nḥtajja-tn bahra.
ula igzman lli-ntḥgar, ar-tt-gisn-ntawi s-uggʷar. ula igzman lli-aġ-ššḥššamnin, ar-asn-nsslsa ibrdan lli-ur-d-iqqann a-tn-nssls i-igzman yaḍni.
ġmkad a-f-issngadda rbbi ddat, ifk luqr s-uggʷar i-igzman lli-f-nġal ur-gin yat.
iskr ġmkad baš ad-kullu-tmɛawann igzman n-ddat, a-ur-sar-bḍun i-ngratsn.
iġ-illa yan-ugzzum yuḍn, rad-aḍnn igzman kullutn. iġ-ityawuqqar yan-ugzzum, rad-frḥn igzman kullutn.
kunni tgam ddat l-lmasiḥ, d-kraygatt yan gigun iga agzzum ġ-ddat-ns.

ġmkad a-iskr rbbi ġ-igzman n-umnaggar: imzwura gan irqqasn. wis sin gan ġwilli ittinin s-mad-asn-imala rbbi. wis kraḍ gan imslmdn. ilin-daġ ġwilli skarnin lmɛjizat, d-willi dar tawafka ad-jjujjin imuḍan, d-willi tɛawannin d-willi tguwwadnin d-willi sawalnin s-iwaliwn iġribn.
walaynni izd irqqasn ad-gan kullutn? is-gan kullutn wid ittinin kra-yasn-imala rbbi? is-gan kullutn imslmdn? is-gan kullutn wid skarnin lmɛjizat?
is-gan kullutn wid jjujjinin imuḍan? is-gan kullutn wid sawalnin s-iwaliwn iġribn? is-gan kullutn wid ssbayyannin lmɛni n-iwaliwn iġribn?
uhu, walaynni iriyat bahra ad-awn-ilint-twafkiw timzwura. imma ġilad rad-awn-mlġ yan-uġaras lli-yufn kullu mayan.
iġ-a-sawalġ s-iwaliwn n-bnadm ula win lmalayka d-nkki ur-a-tḥnnuġ, ur-giġ abla zund nnaqus d-tqrqawin s-tṣtnnanayt d-uqqryan.
iġ-ẓḍarġ a-ttiniġ s-mad-iyi-imala rbbi, iġ-ssnġ lmɛna n-kullu ma-intln ula kullu ma-illan, iġ-umnġ aylliġ ssittiġ iwrar bla-da-tḥnnuġ, ur-giġ yat.
iġ-fkiġ kullu ma-dari-illan fkġ ula ddat-inu ar ajddar bla-da-tḥnnuġ, ur-rad-iyi-yili yat.
imma yan ġ-tlla lḥnant, ar-itṣbar ar-itfulki d-wiyyaḍ. ur-a-itḥsad ula-da-issimġur agayyu-ns ula-da-itfššiš.
ur-ibassl ula-da-itrḍu ih̬f-ns ula-da-itqlaqal d-wiyyaḍ ula-da-d-iswingim lɛib lli-gis-skrn.
ur-a-itfraḥ s-ma-yʷh̬šnn, walaynni ar-itfraḥ s-lḥqq.
ar-kullu-itasi ar-kullu-itamn ar-kullu-itrju ar-kullu-itṣbar.
lḥnant ur-dars ttmi. ra-d-yašk yan-uzmz ġ-ur-ra-yili ma-ittinin s-mad-as-imala rbbi, ula illa ma-isawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn, ula illa ma-iṭṭafn tawassna.
ašku tḥudda-twassna lli-darnnġ-illan, iḥudda mad-aġ-imala rbbi.
walaynni iġ-d-yuška ma-ur-dar ttmi, ra-issitti ma-iḥuddan.
ġakud lliġ giġ aḥšmi ar-sawalġ zund aḥšmi ar-ssḥssuġ zund aḥšmi ar-swingimġ zund aḥšmi, walaynni lliġ wrriġ giġ argaz flġ-n tiġawsiwin n-iḥšmay.
ašku kullu mayd nẓrra ġilad, iga zund iġ-a-ntmnad ġ-lmri illasn, imma ġ-uzmz-an ra-nẓr udm s-uwdm. ssnġ ġilad imikk, imma ġ-uzmz-an rad-issanġ kullu ġmklli-yyi-issn rbbi.
imma ġilad, iqama-sul liman d-rrja d-lḥnant, ntni s-kraḍ, walaynni tamzwarut gisn a-stt-igan d-lḥnant.
skarat kullu s-lḥnant, tirim bahra ad-awn-ilint-twafkiw n-rruḥ lqudus, s-uggʷar a-ttinim s-mad-awn-imala rbbi.
yan isawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn, rbbi ayn-d-a-isawal urd mddn, ašku ur-ssinn mddn lmɛna n-iwaliwn-ns. ntta s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus a-s-a-isawal f-ma-intln.
imma yan ittinin s-mad-as-imala rbbi ar-isawal i-mddn baš a-tn-itɛawan ntni, ar-tn-izzɛam ar-issfjjij ulawn-nsn.
yan isawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn, ar-issdus ġir ih̬f-ns, imma yan ittinin s-mad-as-imala rbbi ar-issdus aytmatn n-umnaggar kullutn.

riġ a-kullu-tsawalm s-iwaliwn iġribn, walaynni riġ uggʷar a-ttinim s-mad-awn-imala rbbi. yan ittinin s-mad-as-imala rbbi yugʷr yan isawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn iġ-ur-illi ma-iẓḍarn a-issbayyn lmɛna n-iwaliwn-an baš a-issdus aytmatn n-umnaggar.

way-aytma, mal-lfaytt a-ra-yili iġ-n-darun-uškiġ ar-sawalġ ġir s-iwaliwn iġribn? lfaytt ur-ra-tili abla iġ-awn-in-sslkmġ kra n-wawal zġ-rbbi nġd kra n-twassna nġd kra-yyi-imla rbbi nġd kra n-ulmmud.
ẓrat taɛuwwatt ula rribab, urd bnadm ad-gan, walaynni iġ-ur-ngaddan ma-ra-yissan ma-iqṣad-uɛuwwad ula bu-rribab?
ula nnffar, iġ-ur-inm-wawal-ns ma-ra-inkr iskr f-imiġ?
ula kunni, ma-ra-ifhm ma-ttinim iġ-a-tsawalm s-iwaliwn iġribn? iġ-ur-a-ttban lmɛna n-ma-ttinim, ar-tsawalm ġir ġ-lhawa.
nssn is-ggutn iwaliwn lli-s-a-sawaln mddn ġ-tmizar n-ddunit kullutnt. kraygatt awal iṭṭaf kra l-lmɛna,
walaynni yan sri isawaln, rad-dars-gġ abrrani iġ-ur-ssinġ lmɛna n-ma-ittini, ig dari abrrani ula ntta.
imma kunni, ssnġ is-a-bahra-ttirim tiġawsiwin n-rruḥ lqudus, walaynni iriyat s-uggʷar a-tskarm f-ma-ra-issdus amnaggar n-aytmatn.
mayad a-f-illa f-kud yan isawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn a-iḍalb rbbi ad-as-issbayyn lmɛna-nsn.
iġ-a-tẓallaġ s-iwaliwn iġribn, hati ul-inu a-itẓallan imma lɛaql-inu ur-as-illi yat.
ma-rad-skarġ? rad-tẓallaġ zġ-uwl-inu, ẓẓallġ ula s-lɛaql-inu. rad-tasiġ amarg zġ-uwl-inu, asiġ amarg ula s-lɛaql-inu.
walaynni iġ-a-ttškart rbbi ġir zġ-uwl-nnk isfld-ak yan ur-issinn ma-illan, mamnk ra-yiẓḍar a-yini «amin» iġ-ur-issin ma-f-a-ttškart rbbi?
wah̬h̬a tfulki-tẓallit-nnk ur-srs-tɛawnt ġwalli yaḍni.
imma nkki škrġ-t i-rbbi, ar-sawalġ s-iwaliwn iġribn uggʷar-nnun kullukn.
walaynni yuf dari ad-iniġ smmus iwaliwn s-lɛaql-inu ġ-umnaggar baš ad-sslmadġ wiyyaḍ, uggʷar n-mraw id-walf n-iwaliwn iġribn.
way-aytma, a-ur-tswingimm zund tarwa mẓẓinin. illa fllawn a-tmẓẓim ġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn, walaynni imġurat ġ-lɛaql-nnun.
ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi: «f-imi n-ayt-iwaliwn iġribn ula f-infurn n-ibrraniyn a-f-rad-sawlġ s-mddn-inu, walaynni ur-ra-sri-sfldn. ġmkad a-s-inna sidi rbbi.»

mayad a-f-nssn iwaliwn iġribn ur-gin tamatart i-willi umnnin, walaynni gan tamatart i-willi dar idrus liman. imma aynna imla rbbi a-t-ittini yan i-wiyyaḍ, ra-ig tamatart i-willi umnnin, urd willi dar idrus liman.
walaynni iġ-munn ayt-umnaggar kullutn ar-kullu-sawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn, ma-ra-ijru? iġ-n-kšmn kra n-mddn ur-ssinn ma-illan nġd kra n-mddn dar idrus liman, rad-inin «kra n-rruḥ a-gigun-illan.»
walaynni iġ-a-kullu-ttinim s-mad-awn-in-imala rbbi, iġ-n-ikšm kra n-yan dar idrus liman nġd kra n-yan ur-issinn ma-illan, ra-issḥssu s-ddnub-ns yissan is-fllas-illa lḥukm,
iban kullu ma-intln ġ-uwl-ns. ra-iḍr s-wakal yalġ rbbi yini «s-ṣṣaḥt illa rbbi ġ-wammas-nnun.»

ma-ra-nskar ay-aytma? ġakud nna-tmunm i-ngratun kud yan ra-dars-tili kra n-talġat nġd kra n-ulmmud nġd kra-yas-issbayyn rbbi nġd kra n-iwaliwn iġribn nġd lmɛna n-iwaliwn iġribn. kullu ma-tskarm, illa fllawn a-srs-tssdusm ayt-umnaggar.
iġ-illa ma-iran a-isawl s-iwaliwn iġribn, ih̬ṣṣa a-ur-sawaln uggʷar n-sin mddn nġd kraḍ, kud yan s-twala-ns. ih̬ṣṣa yan a-issbayyan lmɛna n-iwaliwn-nsn.
walaynni iġ-ur-illi ma-iẓḍarn a-issbayyn lmɛna, illa fllasn ad-fssan ġ-wammas n-umnaggar isawl kud yan s-ih̬f-ns ula s-rbbi.
adjat sin mddn nġd kraḍ a-ttinin s-mad-asn-imala rbbi, ar-tuzzann wiyyaḍ awal-nsn.
walaynni iġ-issbayyn rbbi kra yaḍni i-yan igawrn ġin, illa f-walli isawaln a-ifssa.
ašku tẓḍarm a-kullu-ttinim mad-awn-imala rbbi yan s-yan baš ad-kullu-tlmdm tzɛmm.
imma wanna ittinin s-mad-as-imala rbbi, illa fllas a-itnbaḍ ġ-rruḥ-ns.
ašku rbbi ur-igi bu-iruwwayn. bu-sslamt a-iga.
illa f-tmġarin ad-tfssant ġ-darun ġmklli tfssant ġ-kullu imnaggarn n-imẓlayn. ur-asnt-ityawfka ad-sawalnt. ġmklli ittini ššrɛ n-musa, ur-izri a-ttḥkamnt f-wiyyaḍ.
iġ-rant ad-issannt kra, illa fllasnt ad-sqsant irgazn-nsnt ġ-tgmmi. iġ-tsawl-tmġart ġ-wammas n-umnaggar, han lɛib ayn tskr.
ma-tnnam? izd darun a-zġ-d-yuška-wawal n-rbbi? izd kunni waḥdukn ka-t-issnn?
wanna gigun ittinin is-a-yas-imala rbbi awal nġd tlla-dars-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus, iqqan-t-id a-yini izd luṣit n-siditnnġ ayd-awn-in-uriġ.
iġ-ur-iqbil mayad, ur-ityawqbal ntta.
imma ġilad ay-aytma, iriyat bahra a-ttinim s-mad-awn-imala rbbi. a-ur-tḥṣarm yan isawaln s-iwaliwn iġribn,
walaynni skarat kullu ġmklli-d-iqqann s-tnbaṭṭ izgan.
way-aytma, riġ ad-awn-d-ssktiġ lh̬bar ifulkin lli-s-awn-in-tbrraḥġ. tsfldm srs tzgam gis
tnjmm f-ssibt-ns iġ-sul-tġwim ġ-wawal n-tbrraḥt-inu. han iġ-ur-igi ġmkan, han liman-nnun bla lfaytt.
ašku awal ihiyyan lli-yyi-d-ilkmn, sslkmġ-awn-t-in ula kunni, iniġ-awn is-immut lmasiḥ a-yasi ddnub-nnġ ġmklli ityaran ġ-warratn n-rbbi.
ityawmḍal, ityalal ġ-wis kraḍ-uwssan ġmklli ityaran.
iban-d ġakudan i-bṭrus iban-d ilmma i-irqqasn s-sin d-mraw.
iban-d ilmma i-uggʷar n-smmus id-miyya zġ-aytmatn ġ-yat-twal. iggut gisn mad-sul-isuln walaynni kra immut.
iban-d ilmma i-yaɛqub, iban-d ilmma i-irqqasn kullutn.
ġ-isiggʷra iban-iyi-d ula nkki zund iġ-giġ yan iluln bla azmz-ns.
nkki mẓẓiġ ġ-irqqasn. ur-akkʷ-sthllaġ ad-iyi-ttinin arqqas, ašku kkiġ-ttin ar-ssrfufunġ amnaggar n-rbbi.

walaynni rbbi iskr-iyi afulki ifk-iyi ad-gġ mad-giġ ġilad. urd bla lfaytt ad-iyi-iskr afulki, ašku wrriġ ar-th̬damġ uggʷar n-kullu wiyyaḍ, wah̬h̬a urd nkki a-t-iskarn walaynni lbaraka n-rbbi lli-dari-illan.
zund nkki zund ntni, ġmkad a-s-a-ntbrraḥ, ġmkad a-s-tumnm.
«inkr-d lmasiḥ zġ-lmut.» ġmkad a-iga-wawal n-tbrraḥt-nnġ. imma kunni, mamnk a-ra-yiri kra gigun a-ittini «ġwilli mmutnin ur-ẓḍarn ad-d-nkrn»?
iġ-ur-iẓḍar bnadm ad-d-inkr zġ-lmut, ur-d-akkʷ-inkir lmasiḥ.
walaynni iġ-ur-d-inkir lmasiḥ, ur-illi ma-f-a-ntbrraḥ ula illa ma-s-a-ttamnm.
iġ-ur-a-nkkrn ġwilli mmutnin, ur-akkʷ-issnkir rbbi lmasiḥ. iġ-ur-a-nkkrn ġwilli mmutnin, ha-yaġ ar-nsskirkis f-rbbi, ašku ar-nttini issnkr-t-id.
iġ-ur-iẓḍar bnadm a-d-inkr zġ-lmut, ur-d-inkir lmasiḥ.
walaynni iġ-ur-d-inkir lmasiḥ, hatin tumnm bla lfaytt, tilim sul ġ-ddu lḥukm n-ddnub-nnun.
iġ-ur-d-inkir lmasiḥ, tthlkn kullu willi srs umnnin mmtn.
mrad is-iḥudda rrja-nnġ ġ-lmasiḥ ġir i-tudrt-ad, nkkʷni a-ra-d-qqann imṭṭawn uggʷar n-kullu mddn.
walaynni s-lḥqq inkr-d lmasiḥ zġ-lmut ig amnzu ġ-willi ṭṭasnin.
f-ssibt n-yan-urgaz a-s-tlla lmut. imma ġilad f-ssibt n-yan-urgaz yaḍni a-s-tlla-tnkra zġ-lmut.
rad-kullu-nmmt f-ssibt n-ma-iskr adam, rad-kullu-nnkr f-ssibt n-ma-iskr lmasiḥ.
ra-d-inkr kraygatt yan s-twala-ns. lmasiḥ a-izwarn ig amnzu. tigira-ns rad-nkrn ġwilli ganin wins ġakud nna-d-iwrri s-ddunit-ad,
iruḥ-d ilmma isiggʷra, ihlk lmasiḥ kullu larwaḥ ula ssulṭat ula lquwwat n-ignwan irar-d tagldit i-rbbi babas.
ra-iḥkam lmasiḥ ard ig rbbi kullu inuwwašn-ns ġ-ddu iḍarn-ns.
anuwwaš amggʷaru lli-ra-ihlk a-t-igan d-lmut.
ašku ityara: «irur-d kullu ma-illan ġ-ddu iḍarn-ns.» nssn is-ur-ra-yili rbbi ġ-ddu iḍarn-ns, walaynni rbbi a-ra-irar kullu ma-illan ġ-ddu iḍarn l-lmasiḥ.
ġakud lliġ ra-yili kullu ġ-ddu l-lḥukm n-yus n-rbbi, ra-ifk ih̬f-ns ġ-ddu lḥukm n-walli-d-irurn kullu ma-illan ġ-ddu lḥukm-ns. ġmkad a-s-ra-iḥkam rbbi f-kullu ma-illan.
walaynni iġ-ur-rad-d-nkrn ġwilli mmutnin, mah̬ aylliġ a-ttirin kra n-mddn ad-ddmn s-udum n-waman i-willi-asn-mmutnin? mal-lfaytt a-rad-asn-yili ġ-udum-an iġ-ur-rad-d-nkrn zġ-lmut?
ula nkkʷni, mah̬ aylliġ a-nttiri a-bdda-nskar f-lmut?
way-aytma, ar-n-tmnaggarġ d-lmut kraygatt ass. nniġ-awn-t ašku tɛzzam dari bahra ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ siditnnġ.

walaynni ma-rad-iyi-yili iġ-mmaġġ d-luḥuš ġ-tmdint n-afsus ġir baš ad-rḍuġ ih̬f-inu? iġ-ur-rad-nkrn ġwilli mmutnin ra-yaf a-nskar ġmklli ttinin mddn: «a-nšš nsu ġassad ašku azkka tlla lmut.»
ad-ur-tjlum ih̬f-nnun. «gar tamunt a-iẓẓriẓn ul izddign.»
wrryad-d s-uġaras inmn, tanfm i-kullu ma-igan ddnub. han illa gigun ma-ur-akkʷ-issinn rbbi. is-kʷn-ur-bahra-iššḥššim ġayan?
walaynni ra-yyi-isqsa kra n-yan: «mamnk a-rad-nkrn ġwilli mmutnin? mamnk a-ra-tg ddat lli-s-rad-nkrn?»
walaynni is-ur-teṭṭaft lɛaql? amud nna-tluḥt ur-ra-d-inkr iġ-ur-yad-immut.
urd agʷlas a-n-tluḥt ġ-wakal, walaynni ġir yan-waqqa imẓẓin n-irdn nġd win kra n-imndi yaḍni.
walaynni rad-as-ifk rbbi ddat lli-iqṣad ntta, ifk i-kraygatt amud ddat lli-as-igan.
ašku tifiyi urd-yat a-tga. tlla-tfiyi n-bnadm tili tin lbhaym tili tin igḍaḍ tili ula tin islman.
illa ma-izdġn ġ-ignwan, yili ma-izdġn f-wakal. illa-ufulki n-ma-izdġn ġ-ignwan, yili-ufulki n-ma-izdġn f-wakal.
yili-ufulki n-tafukt yili-ufulki n-wayyur yili-ufulki n-itran, iẓli-ula-ufulki n-itri f-itri.
ġmkad a-ra-tg-tnkra n-willi mmutnin. tmmut ddat lli-iḍrn ġ-wakal, walaynni ur-ra-sar-tmmt ddat lli-ra-d-inkr.
ttyawmḍal th̬sr, tnkr-d tfulki. ttyawmḍal tḍɛf, tnkr-d s-lquwwa.
ttyawmḍal ddat n-ddunit-ad, tnkr-d tg ddat n-ignna. nssn is-tlla ddat n-ddunit-ad tili ula tin-ignna.
ġmkad a-ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi: «argaz amzwaru adam iwrri iga yal-lh̬lq iddrn.» imma adam amggʷaru iga yan-rruḥ issddrn.
urd bab n-rruḥ a-d-izwarn walaynni bab n-ddat n-ddunit-ad, iggʷru-as-d ilmma bab n-rruḥ.
argaz amzwaru ityawskar zġ-idqqi, ig win-wakal. imma argaz wis sin iga zġ-ignna.
zund win-wakal ad-gan ayt-wakal, walaynni zund win-ignna ad-gan ayt-ignna.
ġilad nga zund win-wakal, tigira ra-ng zund win-ignna.
riġ ad-awn-iniġ ay-aytma, ur-tẓḍar ddat n-tfiyi d-idammn a-twrt tagldit n-rbbi, ula iẓḍar ma-igan win lmut a-iwrt ma-rad-bdda-iddr.

rad-awn-iniġ kra intln. ur-rad-kullu-nmmt, walaynni rad-aġ-kullu-ibddl rbbi, ḥayna ġ-nnffar iggʷran, ur-ta-tmmussi tiṭ. ašku ra-ittut nnffar nkrn-d ġwilli mmutnin f-ad-ddrn s-tudrt idumn. ġakudan rad-aġ-ibddl.
ašku iqqan-d ddat-ad itrkamn a-ttyawbddal s-ma-rad-bdda-idum, iqqan-d ddat-ad itmtatn a-ttyawbddal s-ma-rad-bdda-iddr.
ġakudan ġ-iwrri idum ma-itrkamn iddr ma-itmtatn, ra-yili ma-ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi: «nnra lmut, ur-sul-fllannġ-tlli.» «wa-lmut, ma-tnrit? wa-lmut, ma-sul-issiwid-usaqs-nnm?»
asaqs l-lmut a-t-igan d-ddnub. imma tawda n-ddnub a-stt-iskrn d-ššrɛ.
walaynni ar-bahra-ntalġ rbbi ašku ifka-yaġ a-nnru kullu mayan f-uwdm n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, mayad a-f-rad-awn-iniġ: dusat tzgam ar-bdda-ttlhum s-twuri n-siditnnġ, tissanm is-urd bla lfaytt a-s-a-ttnhatafm s-ism n-siditnnġ.
imma lmɛawnt lli-ra-taznm i-imẓlayn n-rbbi ġ-urušalim, illa fllawn a-tskarm ġmklli uṣṣaġ imnaggarn ġ-tmazirt n-galaṭiyya.
kraygatt ass l-lḥdd illa f-kud yan gigun a-issitti kra ġ-ma-yumẓ ġ-tġrad-ns, unšk nna-mi-iẓḍar, iḥḍu-t, baš a-ur-ih̬ṣṣa a-tssmunm iqaridn ġakud nna-n-darun-uškiġ.
lliġ-n-ruḥġ rad-fkġ tibratin n-twassna i-willi tstim, aznġ-tn a-n-awin tawafka-nnun s-urušalim.
iġ-iyi-d-iqqan ula nkki, ra-n-didsn-munġ.
ra-n-darun-aškġ lliġ kkiġ tamazirt n-makiduniyya, ašku makiduniyya a-rad-kġ zwar.
riġ a-n-darun-gawrġ, ḥaqqan ra-n-darun-zzriġ tagrst, tɛawnm-iyi ilmma ad-kmmlġ f-umuddu-nu s-innas rad-ftuġ tigira.
ur-riġ a-n-darun-zzriġ ġir kra n-uwssan drusnin ġilad, walaynni riġ a-n-darun-gawrġ kigan iġ-ira rbbi.
mayan a-f-rad-qamaġ ġ-afsus ard izri lɛid n-win smmus id-mraw,
ašku rbbi irẓm ġ-lgddam-inu yan-imi yusɛan ad-skarġ tawuri ihiyyan wah̬h̬a-nnit ggutn ġwilli-aġ-tḍaḍḍanin.
iġ-n-yuška timutaws, awiyat-stt gis f-a-ur-iḥšm ġ-darun, ašku tawuri n-siditnnġ a-iskar ula ntta zund nkki.
a-t-ur-iḥgr yan, walaynni ɛawnat-t a-ikmml f-umuddu-ns s-sslamt baš a-d-iwrri s-dari. ašku ha-yyi ar-srs-tqlġ ntta d-aytmatn yaḍni.
imma gʷmatnnġ abullus, sawlġ-as s-lmɛqul nniġ-as ra-ifulki a-n-imun d-aytmatn yaḍni s-darun, walaynni ur-akkʷ-iri a-n-yašk ġilad. ra-n-darun-yašk ġakud nna-yufa.
ḍufat tzgam ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ, tzɛmm tdusm.
kullu ma-tskarm, skarat-t s-lḥnant.
way-aytma, tssnm izd stifanas d-ayt-tgmmi-ns a-izwarn is-umẓn aġaras l-lmasiḥ ġ-tmazirt n-ah̬aya, fkn ih̬fawn-nsn ad-th̬damn i-imẓlayn l-lmasiḥ.
ḍalbġ-kʷn ġilad a-tsflidm s-mddn zund ġwid ula kullu wanna ith̬damn ar-itnhataf didnnġ f-twuri-ad.
frḥġ ġilad ġ-d-yuška stifanas d-furtunatus d-ah̬aykus ašku ɛmmrn adġar-nnun lli-dari-ih̬wan,
ssfjjijn ul-inu ula nkki ġmklli ssfjjijn winnun. tuqqarat mddn zund ġwid.
ar-n-fllawn-tsllamn imnaggarn n-aytmatn ġ-tmazirt n-asiyya. ar-n-bahra-fllawn-itsllam akila d-briskilla s-ism n-siditnnġ, ntni d-umnaggar lli-itmunun ġ-tgmmi-nsn.
ar-n-fllawn-tsllamn aytmatn kullutn. nsallamat i-ngratun s-unsallam n-tagʷmat.
nkki bulus, s-ufus-inu a-s-awn-in-uriġ sslam-ad.
a-ittut lḥukm n-rbbi f-wanna ur-ittirin siditnnġ. ‹maranata›. (ašk-id a-siditnnġ.)
ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ar-kʷn-bahra-ttiriġ kullukn ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
zġ-bulus arqqas l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġmklli ira rbbi, d-zġ-gʷmatnnġ timutaws. i-umnaggar n-rbbi ġ-tmdint n-kurintus ula kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi ġ-tmazirt n-ah̬aya.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ ula siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ar-bahra-ntalġ rbbi babas n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, iga babatnnġ iḥnnan lli-bdda-issfjjijn ul-nnġ.
ar-aġ-itɛawan ġ-kullu tanukmut lli-fllannġ-izrayn, baš a-niẓḍar a-ntɛawan wiyyaḍ ġ-tnukmut nna-ġ-llan, s-lmɛawnt lli-s-aġ-itɛawan rbbi.
unšk lli-bahra-nkkat tammara f-ism l-lmasiḥ, a-yaġ-bahra-issfjjij rbbi ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ.
f-ssibt-nnun a-f-a-nzray ġ-tnukmut-ad baš a-ttfjjijm tnjmm, d-ssibt-nnun a-f-a-ntfjjij baš ad-daġ-ttfjjijm tdusm a-tṣbrm i-tmmara zund tammara-yad ġ-nlla nkkʷni.
nssn is-ra-tdusm tṣbrm, ašku iġ-a-tkkatm tammara zund nkkʷni ra-kʷn-issfjjij rbbi zund nkkʷni.
way-aytma, nra a-tissanm f-tnukmut lli-fllannġ-izrin ġ-tmazirt n-asiyya. tšqa bahra, tẓẓay fllannġ aylliġ nġal is-ur-akkʷ-nẓḍar a-sul-nddr,
nini lmut ayd-aġ-d-iqqann. walaynni yudja-yaġ rbbi a-nzzri tanukmut-an baš a-ur-yili rrja-nnġ ġ-ih̬f-nnġ walaynni ġ-rbbi lli-issnkarn ġwilli mmutnin.
ikkis-aġ-d ġakudan i-lmut išqan. hati rad-aġ-d-sul-zgis-itkkis. nttan a-ġ-n-nga rrja-nnġ baš ad-aġ-d-sul-zgis-itkkis.
illa fllawn ula kunni a-ttḍalabm rbbi f-ssibt-nnġ. ġmkad a-s-rad-aġ-ttɛawanm, igatn ġwilli tškarnin rbbi f-lbarakat lli-aġ-d-yakka f-ssibt n-tẓulla ggutnin.
nfrḥ ġilad ašku imla-yaġ-uwl-nnġ izd s-ufulki n-rbbi a-s-a-nskar d-kullu mddn s-nniyt iṣfan. ula kunni, ġmkan a-didun-nskr, urd ġir s-lɛaql n-bnadm walaynni s-lbaraka n-rbbi.
kullu mad-awn-in-ntara, ra-tiẓḍarm a-ti-tġrm tfhmm-t.
illa gis ma-ur-ta-tfhimm, walaynni nra a-kullu-tfhmm baš a-srnnġ-tfrḥm nfrḥ srun ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk siditnnġ yasuɛ.
nniġ d-ih̬f-inu ra-tfhmm. f-mayan a-f-skrġ f-a-d-darun-kġ-zwar baš a-didi-tfrḥm snat-twal.
skrġ f-a-kʷn-sliġ zriġ s-tmazirt n-makiduniyya, wrriġ-d ilmma s-darun zġ-makiduniyya, taznm-iyi s-tmazirt n-yudaya.
izd s-wawal ih̬wan a-s-awn-nniġ mayan? is-a-sawalġ zund yan iran a-irḍu ih̬f-ns, ar-ittini s-yat tunfust «iyah iyah, uhu uhu»?
walaynni ġmklli izga rbbi ġ-kullu ma-ittini, ġmkan a-didun-nskr ula nkkʷni. ur-akkʷ-nrur «iyah» a-ig «uhu».
ašku yasuɛ lmasiḥ yus n-rbbi lli-f-a-darun-ntbrraḥ nkki d-silwanus d-timutaws, ur-gis-illi «iyah uhu» walaynni «iyah» a-bdda-iga.
ašku ġunšk lli-gan iwaliwn lli-s-inna rbbi f-ma-ra-iskr ifulki, lmasiḥ a-tn-kullu-issuwfan. mayan a-f-a-nttini «amin» s-ism l-lmasiḥ ġakud nna-ntalġ rbbi.
hati rbbi ad-aġ-izzgan nkkʷni didun ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ, iẓli-aġ kullu,
iml-aġ is-nga wins, ig rruḥ-ns ġ-uwl-nnġ baš a-ig tamatart n-is-ra-issafu kullu maylli-s-aġ-inna.
rbbi issn ul-inu. issn mah̬ aylliġ ur-n-darun-uškiġ s-kurintus ġ-uwssan-an, ašku ur-riġ ad-awn-tt-ssṭiyyrġ.
ur-nri nkkʷni a-nḥkam ġ-liman-nnun, walaynni nra a-didun-ntmɛawan baš a-ttfraḥm, ašku nssn is-tzgam ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ.
nniġ d-ih̬f-inu ġ-uwssan-an ur-ra-n-darun-aškġ ssṭiyyrġ-awn-tt-daġ.
ašku iġ-n-uškiġ ssṭiyyrġ-awn-tt, ma-ra-n-afġ ġ-darun a-yyi-issfrḥ abla kunni lli-mi-stt-ssṭiyyrġ?
mayan a-f-n-uriġ tabrat-an, ur-n-darun-uškiġ, ašku ur-riġ ad-iyi-darun-ṭiyyr kunni lli-f-illa a-yyi-tssfrḥm. ašku ssnġ iġ-frḥġ nkki ra-didi-kullu-tfrḥm.

walaynni s-imṭṭawn ggutnin a-s-awn-in-uriġ tabrat-an, ašku tqamam gigi, asiġ fllawn taġuft bahra. ur-awn-in-uriġ baš ad-awn-tt-ssṭiyyrġ s-uggʷar, walaynni uriġ-awn-in baš a-tissanm mnšk ad-dari-tɛzzam.

walaynni iġ-illa ma-stt-issṭiyyrn i-wayyaḍ, kunni a-mi-stt-issṭiyyr uggʷar n-mad-iyi-tt-issṭiyyr nkki. issṭiyyr-awn-tt kullukn s-imikk nġd s-kigan. ġmkan a-s-rad-iniġ ašku ur-riġ ad-iniġ f-urgaz-an uggʷar n-mad-as-igan.
walaynni twuda-t lɛqubit lli-fllas-yut ma-iggutn gigun.
yili fllawn ġilad ad-as-tṣamḥm tssfjjijm-t, a-ur-ti-tnru-tguḍi bahra.
ra-kʷn-ḍalbġ ad-as-tmlm is-a-t-sul-ttirim.
mayan a-f-awn-in-uriġ tabrat-an, baš a-kʷn-armġ, issanġ is-rad-bdda-tskarm s-wawal-inu.
wanna mi tṣamḥm f-kra iskr, hati ṣamḥġ-as ula nkki. d-aynna-f-ṣamḥġ nkki, iġ-nnit-ṣamḥġ f-kra, ssibt-nnun a-f-fllas-ṣamḥġ s-ism l-lmasiḥ,
baš a-ur-tt-fllannġ-izzri šiṭan, ašku nssn tillay-ns.
ġakud lliġ lkmġ tamdint n-truwwas, irẓm siditnnġ ġ-lgddam-inu yan-imi f-twuri l-lh̬bar ifulkin l-lmasiḥ.
walaynni ur-ihnna-uwl-inu, ašku ur-n-ufiġ gʷmatnnġ tiṭus. flġ ilmma mddn n-ġin, mudduġ s-makiduniyya.
ar-bahra-ntalġ rbbi lli-aġ-bdda-izggurun ġ-ukabar l-lmasiḥ lli-itnrun kullu ma-illan, ar-srnnġ-isslkam aḍu n-twassna-ns s-kraygatt mani.
ašku nga ġ-dar rbbi zund tujjut l-lmasiḥ ġ-gr kullu mddn, ġwilli njmnin ula ġwilli tyawhlaknin.
tg tujjut-an aḍu l-lmut i-willi tyawhlaknin, tg aḍu n-tudrt i-willi njmnin. walaynni is-illa ma-iẓḍarn i-twuri-ad ihiyyan?
ur-ngi nkkʷni zund ma-iggutn ar-tbrraḥn s-wawal n-rbbi ġir baš ad-srs-qqʷayn iqaridn. ašku nkkʷni s-nniyt n-uwl-nnġ a-s-a-nsawal s-ism l-lmasiḥ, nissan izd rbbi ad-aġ-yuznn ar-aġ-bdda-itmnad.

lliġ nenna mayan is-nra-daġ a-nalġ ih̬f-nnġ baš a-didnnġ-tbiddm? is-nḥtajja tibratin n-twassna zġ-wiyyaḍ baš ad-aġ-tqblm kunni, nġd tibratin zġ-gigun baš ad-aġ-qbln wiyyaḍ, ġmklli ḥtajjan kra n-mddn?
walaynni kunni a-igan tabrat-nnġ, ttyara ġ-uwlawn-nnun baš a-stt-aqran kullu mddn issann mamnk a-nga.
hati iban gigun izd tabrat l-lmasiḥ a-tgam, yura-tt ntta s-ufus-nnġ, urd s-ṣṣmḥ walaynni s-rruḥ n-rbbi lli-iddrn, urd f-tilwaḥ n-uẓru walaynni f-tilwaḥ n-uwlawn n-bnadm.
nenna mayan ašku nssn is-aġ-iqbl rbbi f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ.
ur-a-nttini izd nkkʷni a-iẓḍarn a-nskr kra, walaynni rbbi iẓḍar a-t-iskr f-ufus-nnġ.

nttan ad-aġ-ifkan taẓḍḍart ma-s-a-nsslkam i-mddn lɛhd l-ljdid lli-d-yuškan s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus urd s-luṣiyat tyaranin. ašku luṣiyat tyaranin ar-di-tawint lmut, imma rruḥ lqudus ar-d-itawi tudrt.

imma lɛhd-an n-ššrɛ lli-d-itawin lmut, ġakud lliġ ityawnqaš f-tilwaḥ n-uẓru iban-d lmjd n-rbbi s-tifawt itjhhdn, aylliġ ur-ẓḍarn ayt-rbbi a-n-tmnadn ġ-uwdm n-musa, wah̬h̬a ur-tqama tifawt-an ġir yan imikk idrusn.
imma lɛhd-ad n-rruḥ lqudus, is-ur-rad-as-yili lmjd uggʷar n-mayan?
iġ-iggut lmjd i-lɛhd lli-s-a-thlakn mddn, ra-t-bahra-yagʷr lmjd i-lɛhd lli-s-a-tnjamn.
ašku maylli-d-ibann ġ-uwssan-an s-lmjd iggutn, ur-sul-as-illi lmjd, ašku tigira-ns a-d-iban ma-t-yugʷrn ġ-lmjd.
s-lmjd a-s-d-yuška maylli ur-iqaman, walaynni uggʷar l-lmjd-an a-ra-yili lmjd i-mayd rad-bdda-idum.
hati ar-ntzɛam bahra ġilad, ašku illa-yaġ rrja-yad iṣḥan.
ur-ngi zund musa lli-idln udm-ns baš a-t-ur-ẓrn ayt-rbbi lliġ a-gis-tlaḥ tifawt l-lmjd.
ntni qqurn ih̬fawn-nsn. sul s-ġassa tdl fllasn lmɛna l-lɛhd aqdim ġakud nna-t-aqran, ašku ġir lmasiḥ a-iẓḍarn a-issitti asddul.
wah̬h̬a da-aqran ššrɛ n-musa, sul iqama-usddul-an f-lɛaql-nsn,
walaynni yan yumnn s-siditnnġ ityattay-fllas-usddul.
hati siditnnġ iga rruḥ. d-wanna dar rruḥ n-siditnnġ, ityawfsay zġ-iskraf.
nkkʷni kullwaġ ar-ntmnad lmjd n-siditnnġ ġilad, ašku ityattay-fllannġ-usddul. d-siditnnġ lli-igan rruḥ ar-aġ-itbddal baš a-ng zund ntta, ar-aġ-itzayad lmjd f-lmjd.
lliġ-aġ-ifka rbbi tawuri-ad ihiyyan s-rrḥmt-ns, ar-gis-ntzayad bla-da-ntrmay.

naggug zġ-kullu ma-igan lɛib intln iššḥššamn. ur-a-nzzray kra f-yan s-tkrkas ula-da-ntbddal awal n-rbbi s-lġʷšš, walaynni ar-bdda-nttini lḥqq i-kullu mddn ġ-lgddam n-rbbi, baš ad-issann ġ-uwl-nsn izd afulki a-nskar.
iġ-sul-idl lh̬bar-ad ifulkin, idl ġir f-willi sul tyawhlaknin.
ntni ur-uminn ašku iblis lli-iḥkamn ddunit-ad issbukḍ lɛaql-nsn a-ur-ẓrn tifawt l-lh̬bar l-lmjd l-lmasiḥ lli-igan ṣṣurt n-rbbi.
ašku urd f-ih̬f-nnġ a-f-a-ntbrraḥ, walaynni ar-ntbrraḥ f-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ar-nmala is-iga ntta siditnnġ, ng nkkʷni ih̬ddamn-nnun s-ism l-lmasiḥ.
ašku rbbi lli-innan «ra-di-tisfiw tifawt zġ-wammas n-tillas,» nttan a-ifawn ġ-uwlawn-nnġ ġilad s-tifawt n-twassna l-lmjd-ns lli-d-ibann ġ-uwdm l-lmasiḥ.
imma lknz-ad, nusi-t ġ-tmkilin n-wakal, baš a-itban izd rbbi a-mi-tlla-tḥkimt-ad itjhhdn urd nkkʷni.
ar-aġ-di-ttkka-tnukmut kraygatt tasga walaynni ur-a-yaġ-ttamẓ. ar-bahra-ntduhdu walaynni ur-a-yaġ-tlaḥ rrja.
iggut mad-aġ-itkrhun walaynni illa-bdda mad-aġ-ittirin. ar-bahra-ntrfufun walaynni ur-a-nlkkm lhalak.
nusi-bdda lmut n-yasuɛ f-ddat-nnġ baš a-ttban ula tudrt n-yasuɛ ġ-ddat-nnġ.
ašku kullu maḥdd nsul ar-aġ-n-dḥayn mddn i-lmut f-ssibt n-yasuɛ, baš a-ttbayyan tudrt n-yasuɛ ġ-ddat-nnġ lli-itmtatn.
ġmkad a-s-a-ntmmaġ d-lmut baš a-teṭṭafm kunni tudrt.
ġmklli ityaran: «ha-yyi umnġ. mayan a-f-sawlġ.» ula nkkʷni illa darnnġ liman-ad ġ-uwlawn-nnġ, ar-nsawal ašku numn.
nssn mayad bahra: rbbi lli-d-issnkrn siditnnġ yasuɛ rad-aġ-issnkr ula nkkʷni d-yasuɛ, yawi-aġ didun s-dars.
kullu mayd ijrrun ġilad, ar-ijrru f-ssibt-nnun baš a-tzayd lbaraka n-rbbi ar-ttruḥ kigan d-mddn, igatn bahra ġwilli-ti-tškarnin ibayyn lmjd n-rbbi s-uggʷar.
mayan a-f-ur-akkʷ-a-ntrmay. wah̬h̬a da-ttḍɛaf ddat-nnġ, ar-itdus-uwl-nnġ ass f-wass.
ašku tanukmut-ad ifssusn ġ-a-nzray ussan-ad drusnin, rad-aġ-tggʷru s-lmjd idumn lli-bahra-yugʷrn kullu ġayad.
hati ur-a-stt-ntawi ġ-maylli nẓrra, walaynni ar-tt-ntawi ġ-maylli ur-a-iẓrra yan. ašku maylli nẓrra ur-ra-iqama, imma maylli ur-a-nẓrra rad-bdda-yili.
nssn mayad, iġ-ttyawhlak-th̬iyyamt lli-igan ddat-nnġ n-ddunit-ad, rad-aġ-ifk rbbi yat-tzdġt ġ-ignna. rad-aġ-ifk yat-tgmmi lli-ur-ityawskarn s-ifassn n-bnadm, rad-bdda-tdum.
imma ġilad ġ-sul-nqama ġ-ddunit-ad ar-nnddr, nẓuẓḍ a-nls ddat-nnġ n-ignna.
ar-nttiri a-stt-nls a-ur-nqama bla tazdġt.
ašku maḥdd nqama ġ-th̬iyyamt-ad ar-nnddr s-taġuft. ur-nniġ is-nra a-nkkis tah̬iyyamt-ad, walaynni nra a-nls tazdġt yaḍni, baš a-nbddl ma-itmtatn s-ma-rad-bdda-iddr.
rbbi a-fllannġ-iqṣadn mayad, ifk-aġ rruḥ-ns baš a-nissan is-rad-aġ-issafu kullu maylli-s-aġ-inna.
ġmkad a-s-a-bdda-nzzɛam ulawn-nnġ, ašku nssn is-d-naggug zġ-siditnnġ ġilad ġ-sul-nzdġ ġ-ddat-ad.
imma nkkʷni ar-tt-ntawi ġ-maylli-s-numn, urd ġ-maylli nẓrra.
mayan ad-aġ-izzɛamn bahra. niri a-nfl ddat-ad, nruḥ dar siditnnġ.
walaynni iġ-nqama ġ-ddat-ad nġd iġ-tt-nfl, rad-bdda-nskar f-a-nrḍu siditnnġ.
ašku iqqan-aġ-d a-nbidd kullwaġ ġ-lgddam l-lmasiḥ a-fllannġ-iḥkam, irar i-kraygatt yan f-ma-iskr ġ-ddunit-ad, ig-iyt ma-ifulkin nġd ma-yʷh̬šnn.
nssn tiksaḍ n-sidi rbbi. mayan a-f-a-n-ntgga tiqqi-nnġ a-nssfham wiyyaḍ baš ad-amnn ula ntni. rbbi issn kullu ma-ginnġ-illan. swangmġ is-aġ-tssnm ula kunni ġ-uwlawn-nnun.
ur-a-ntalġ ih̬f-nnġ baš a-didnnġ-tbiddm, walaynni nmla-yawn kra ma-s-a-srnnġ-ttfraḥm ġ-dar mddn, trarm awal i-willi tfraḥnin s-uwdmawn urd s-ma-illan ġ-uwlawn.
iġ-tġalm is-nffuġ ih̬f-nnġ, f-rbbi a-f-t-nffuġ. walaynni iġ-nsawl s-lmɛqul, f-ssibt-nnun a-f-nsawl.
imma nkkʷni ar-aġ-tdḥay lḥnant l-lmasiḥ, ašku numn is-immut yan f-ssibt n-kullu mddn. mayan a-f-nssn is-kullu-dids-mmutn.
immut ntta f-ssibt n-kullu mddn baš ad-wrrin ġwilli ddrnin a-ur-sul-skarn f-ad-rḍun ih̬f-nsn walaynni ad-rḍun ġwalli immutn inkr-d zġ-lmut f-ssibt-nsn.
ur-sul-a-ntmnad ġ-yan ġmklli gis tmnadn mddn n-ddunit-ad. nkka-ttin ar-ntmnad ġ-lmasiḥ ġmklli gis tmnadn ntni, walaynni ur-sul-a-gis-ntmnad ġmkan.
ašku wanna igan win lmasiḥ, iskr-t rbbi zġ-ljdid. laḥ zġ-gis aqdim, iwrri ig win ljdid.
rbbi a-iqṣadn mayan lliġ iskr sslamt ġ-gratnnġ dids f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ. iẓli-aġ nkkʷni a-nmala i-mddn mamnk a-ira a-iskr sslamt ġ-gras didsn.
ašku rbbi iskr sslamt ġ-gras d-ddunit f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ, ur-sul-a-itḥasab f-mddn ddnub-nsn. yazn-aġ ad-asn-nsslkam lh̬bar f-sslamt-ad.
nkkʷni-ad nga imazann l-lmasiḥ. f-imi-nnġ a-f-a-srun-isawal rbbi. ar-kʷn-ntḍalab ġilad s-ism l-lmasiḥ a-twrrim s-rbbi baš ad-awn-tili sslamt ġ-gratun dids.
lmasiḥ lli-ur-jju-iskirn kra n-ddnb, irur-t rbbi zund iġ-iɛmmr s-ddnub f-ssibt-nnġ, baš a-nɛmmr nkkʷni s-ufulki n-rbbi f-ssibt-ns.
s-ism n-rbbi lli-d-nh̬dm, nḍalb-kʷn a-ur-tadjm rrḥmt-ns lli-s-tumnm a-tḍr bla lfaytt ġ-darun.
ašku rbbi inna: «lliġ-d-iruḥ-uzmz n-rrḍa sfldġ-awn. lliġ-d-ilkm-wass n-ujnjm ɛawnġ-kʷn.» hati ġilad a-d-iruḥ-uzmz a-fllawn-irḍu. ġassad a-d-ilkm-wass a-tnjmm.
ar-nskar kullu baš a-ur-yili kra l-lɛib ġ-twuri-nnġ ula kra n-tbayḍḍrt ma-issṭarn yan.
ar-nskar kullu baš a-nmala izd ih̬ddamn n-rbbi a-nga, ndus a-kullu-nṣbr. ar-bahra-ntrfufun ar-nkkat tammara ar-nzray ġ-tnukmut.
ar-aġ-ssġurušn ar-aġ-n-tluḥn ġ-lḥbs ar-fllannġ-sshiyyasn mddn. ar-ntnhataf bahra. kra n-twal ar-ntqama bla iṭs, kra n-twal ar-ntqama s-laẓ.
walaynni iban ginnġ is-iġus-uwl-nnġ nissan ma-yʷġẓann nṣbr bahra, ar-ntɛawan wiyyaḍ, nɛmmr s-rruḥ lqudus, ar-ntḥnnu ġ-mddn s-nniyt iṣfan,
ar-nsawal s-lḥqq, ar-nskar kullu s-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi, nasi imqlad n-ufulki n-rbbi ġ-ufasiy-nnġ ula ġ-uẓlmaḍ-nnġ.
ġmkan a-nskar iġ-a-yaġ-tḥgarn mddn ula iġ-a-yaġ-talġn, iġ-a-fllannġ-ttinin nʷh̬šn ula iġ-a-ttinin nšwa. hati ar-aġ-tggan d-ayt-tkrkas, walaynni ar-nsawal s-lḥqq.
ar-ttinin ur-aġ-issin yan, walaynni iggut mad-aġ-issnn. ar-ttinin ar-ntmtat, walaynni ha-yaġ sul nddr. ar-ttinin tlla-d fllannġ lɛqubit, walaynni ur-illi mad-aġ-inġan.
wah̬h̬a da-ginnġ-itqama lḥal, ar-bdda-ntfraḥ. wah̬h̬a nga imẓlaḍ, iggut ma-zginnġ-itamẓn lh̬ir. wah̬h̬a ur-darnnġ yat, nṭṭaf kraygatt kra.
way-aytma n-kurintus, s-nniyt n-uwl-nnġ ayd-s-awn-in-nsawl, ašku tɛzzam darnnġ bahra.
urd nkkʷni a-n-srun-irurn tiġurdin, walaynni kunni a-d-srnnġ-irurn tiġurdin.
rad-awn-iniġ ġmklli ittini yan i-tarwa-ns ɛzzanin, skrat zund nkkʷni, tmlm-aġ is-aġ-tḥubbam ġmklli-kʷn-nḥubba.
a-ur-twrrim tilim ġ-uzaglu d-willi ur-umnnin s-lmasiḥ. is-tlla tamunt ġ-gr ma-irḍan rbbi d-ma-t-ur-irḍin? is-tlla tamunt ġ-gr tifawt d-tillas?
is-ra-d-imšaška lmasiḥ d-iblis? is-ra-imrḍa yan yumnn d-yan ur-yuminn?

is-ra-ttmɛawan-tgmmi n-rbbi d-tin ilahat n-ddunit-ad? ašku nga nkkʷni ayt-tigmmi n-rbbi lli-iddrn. ġmklli inna rbbi: «rad-gawrġ d-mddn-inu, zdġġ ġ-wammas-nsn. rad-gġ rbbi-nsn, gn ntni mddn-inu.»
f-mayan a-f-inna sidi rbbi: «ffuġad-d zġ-darsn, tngaram didsn, tanfm i-kullu ma-irkan. iġ-tskrm ġmkan ra-fllawn-rḍuġ.
rad-gġ babatun, tgm tarwa-nu d-isti. mayad inna-t sidi rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan.»

way-aytma ɛzzanin, lliġ-aġ-inna rbbi rad-aġ-iskr kullu mayad ifulkin, yili fllannġ a-nġus naggug zġ-kullu ma-ra-issrku ul-nnġ ula ddat-nnġ. yili fllannġ a-ntyawẓlay i-rbbi s-ufulki ikmmln, ar-bahra-nttiri a-t-nrḍu.
mlat-aġ ġilad is-aġ-tḥubbam, ašku ur-jju-ntɛdda f-yan ula nssh̬sr yan ula nšša yan.
ur-nniġ is-tʷh̬šnm, ašku mliġ-awn yadlli is-darnnġ-tɛzzam bahra. yan a-nga nkkʷni didun, iġ-nddr ula iġ-nmmut,
ašku tiqġ gigun, frḥġ srun, zɛmġ bahra. wah̬h̬a da-nzray ġ-tnukmut išqan, frḥġ s-lfrḥ iggutn.
lliġ-d-nruḥ tamazirt-ad n-makiduniyya ur-nẓḍar a-nsunfu ġ-uwssan-an, ašku tkka-yaġ-d-tnukmut kraygatt tasga. sutln-aġ išabukn zġ-brra, tili-aġ taġuft ġ-ugʷns.
walaynni rbbi lli-issfjjijn ul n-willi ḍɛfnin, issfjjij-aġ ula nkkʷni, ašku yiwi-d tiṭus s-darnnġ.

hati nthnna ġilad, urd ġir f-ssibt n-ma-d-yuška walaynni nthnna ula f-mklli tssfjjijm ul-ns. iml-aġ f-mamnk a-yyi-ttirim bahra, tigʷraẓ-kʷn f-maylli ijran, tujadm a-didi-tbiddm. ha-yyi frḥġ bahra s-lh̬bar-ad.
ur-iyi-tʷgraẓ ġilad f-tbrat lli-awn-in-uznġ, wah̬h̬a-yyi-fllas-tʷgraẓ ġ-uwssan-an ašku iqama gigun lḥal yan kra.

hati ġilad frḥġ, urd f-ssibt n-mad-awn-ṭiyyr walaynni f-ssibt n-ma-gigun-iqama lḥal aylliġ tskrm ma-gigun-ira rbbi. ašku lliġ-awn-ṭiyyr, twrrim tswangmm bahra ġ-ma-ira rbbi. ur-awn-ijli yat f-ssibt-nnġ.
ašku yan mi ṭiyyr iswangm ġ-rbbi, hati ra-ifl iskkirn-ns ʷh̬šnnin injm. ur-ra-ti-tigʷraẓ f-mayan. imma yan mi ṭiyyr iswangm ġ-ddunit, ur-rad-as-d-yawi mayan abla lmut.

ẓrat maylli tskrm ġakud lliġ-awn-ṭiyyr tswangmm ġ-ma-ira rbbi. twrrim trurm lɛaql bahra, tirim a-tmlm is-ur-gigun-illi kra l-lɛib. ula kunni tbzgm f-walli iffuġn aġaras, taġ-kʷn-tguḍi fllas. tirim ad-aġ-trḍum, tujadm a-fllas-tḥkamm. hati iban fllawn is-tskrm kullu ma-fllawn-illan ġ-maylli darun ijran.
wah̬h̬a-yawn-in-uriġ tabrat-an, ur-awn-tt-in-uriġ f-ssibt n-walli iskrn ma-yʷh̬šnn nġd ġwalli-mi-t-iskr, walaynni uriġ-awn-tt-in baš ad-awn-iml rbbi mnšk a-ra-tirim ad-aġ-trḍum.
imma ġilad nthnna f-kullu mayan. nthnna nkkʷni walaynni nfrḥ s-uggʷar lliġ nẓra mnšk a-kullu-tssfrḥm tiṭus aylliġ ur-sul-fllawn-yusi taġuft.
ġayd izrin ulġġ-kʷn i-tiṭus, imma ġilad iban is-ur-iyi-tššḥššimm f-wawal-inu. nmla-yawn-in lḥqq ġ-kullu mad-awn-nenna ġayd izrin, imma ġilad iban izd lḥqq a-fllawn-nenna ula i-tiṭus.
imma ntta iḥubba-kʷn ġilad s-uggʷar, ašku ar-d-iswingim mamnk a-ti-tqblm, tadrm i-ih̬f-nnun tsfldm srs kullukn, tuqqrm-t bahra.
ula nkki frḥġ s-kigan ašku ufiġ a-bahra-gigun-gġ laman.
way-aytma, nra a-tissanm mnšk a-ibark rbbi ġ-imnaggarn ġ-tmazirt n-makiduniyya.
wah̬h̬a zrin ġ-tnukmut išqan, frḥn bahra. rḍun ad-fkn kigan, wah̬h̬a idrus mad-darsn-illan bahra.
nkki giġ inigi n-is-fkan unšk lli-mi-ẓḍarn, fkn-nnit uggʷar n-ma-mi-ẓḍarn, rḍun s-ġmkan.
ḍalbn-aġ bahra a-tn-nadj ad-fkn kra ġ-lmɛawnt lli-ra-nawi i-imẓlayn n-rbbi ġ-urušalim, irin ntni ad-asn-tili lbaraka n-tamunt-ad.
ur-nġal ġ-uwssan-an is-rad-skrn ġunškan, imma ntni fkan ih̬f-nsn zwar i-siditnnġ, fkn-aġ ilmma ih̬f-nsn ula nkkʷni ġmklli ira rbbi.
ula kunni, ibda tiṭus ar-awn-imala a-tskarm ġmkan. nḍalb-t ġilad a-kʷn-iɛawn a-tkmmlm lbaraka n-twafka-yad.
ẓrat mnšk a-tjhhdm kunni. idus liman-nnun, tissanm a-tsawalm, tfhmm ma-yʷġẓann, ar-tskarm s-nniyt, ar-aġ-ttḥubbum. imma ġilad nra gigun a-tjhhdm ula ġ-lbaraka n-twafka-yad.
urd luṣit ayd-awn-nniġ, walaynni mliġ-awn mad-skrn wiyyaḍ s-nniyt-nsn, baš ad-aġ-tmlm izd s-ṣṣaḥt tḥubbam mddn ula kunni.
tssnm lḥnant n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ. wah̬h̬a iṭṭaf ma-iggutn, iwrri bla yat f-ssibt-nnun. ifl kullu ma-dars-illan, baš a-twrrim teṭṭafm ma-iggutn.
swangmġ nkki is-rad-awn-yaf a-tkmmlm maylli tbdam asggʷas lli-izrin, ašku kunni a-izwarn wiyyaḍ ġ-maylli tnawlm, tbdum ar-ti-tskarm s-nniyt-nnun.
kmmlat-t ġilad unšk nna-mi-tẓḍarm, tirim a-ti-tkmmlm ġmklli-ti-tnawlm ġ-isizwar.
iġ-tram a-tfkm s-nniyt-nnun, ra-irḍu rbbi s-unšk lli-mi-tẓḍarm a-tfkm. ur-ra-yiri uggʷar n-ma-mi-tẓḍarm.
ur-nniġ mayan baš a-fllawn-ẓẓuẓẓayġ ssrh̬uġ i-wiyyaḍ,
walaynni riġ a-kullu-nngadda i-ngratnnġ. hati ġilad ġ-darun-iggut lh̬ir, illa fllawn a-tɛawnm ġwilli ur-dar yat. ašku iġ-idda ard twrrim bla yat wrrin ntni s-lh̬ir, ra-kʷn-ɛawnn ntni ġakudan.
ġmklli ityaran: «ġwalli issmunn kigan, ur-as-išaḍ yat. imma ġwalli issmunn imikk, ur-t-ih̬ṣṣa yat.»
ar-ntalġ rbbi lli-iskrn ġ-uwl n-tiṭus a-bahra-gigun-iswingim ġmklli gigun nswingim nkkʷni.
lliġ-t-nḍalb a-n-darun-yašk, ifrḥ ntta bahra, iskr f-a-n-darun-yašk s-lh̬aṭr-ns.
nazn-n dids gʷmatnnġ lli-talġn aytmatn ġ-imnaggarn kullutn f-ssibt n-tbrraḥt-ns l-lh̬bar ifulkin.
ẓlin-t aytmatn n-imnaggarn ad-didnnġ-imuddu ar-aġ-itɛawan ġ-lbaraka n-twafka-yad lli-s-ra-iban lmjd n-siditnnġ ula tayri-nnġ iṣfan.
nra a-nsslkm lamant-ad iggutn bla ginnġ iškka yan f-mamnk a-ra-tlkm.
nrar-bdda lɛaql baš a-nskar afulki ġ-iẓri n-siditnnġ ula win mddn.
nazn-n didsn yan gʷmatnnġ yaḍni, nẓra mnnawt-twal mnšk a-bahra-ittiri a-iɛawn wiyyaḍ. d-nttan, lliġ isfld f-ma-tnawlm ifulki, yiri s-uggʷar ad-awn-gis-iɛawn.
imma tiṭus, iga asmun-inu ar-didi-ith̬dam f-ssibt-nnun. imma aytmatnnġ yaḍni, ntni gan imazann n-imnaggarn ar-itban lmjd l-lmasiḥ ġ-twuri lli-skarn.
mlat-asn mnšk a-tn-ttirim, baš ad-issann kullu imnaggarn n-aytmatn is-tsthllam ġmklli-kʷn-ntalġ ġ-darsn.
ur-iyi-ih̬ṣṣa ad-zaydġ araġ-awn-in f-lmɛawnt lli-ra-nawi i-imẓlayn ġ-urušalim,

ašku ssnġ is-tram bahra a-tfkm kra. hati ulġġ-kʷn ġ-dar ayt-makiduniyya iniġ-asn: «asggʷas ayad s-ujadn ayt-ah̬aya ad-ɛawnn» aylliġ iggut ġ-ayt-makiduniyya ma-iwrrin ira a-ifk kra lliġ sfldn f-ma-tnawlm kunni s-nniyt-nnun.
imma ġilad uznġ-awn-in aytmatn-ad baš a-tujadm ġmklli-asn-nniġ, iban gigun is-tsthllam maylli fllawn nniġ.
walaynni iġ-n-darun-uškiġ nkki, munn-in didi kra n-ayt-makiduniyya afn-kʷn-in ur-tujadm, rad-bahra-ḥšmġ f-wawal-inu, ra-tḥšmm ula kunni iġ-tggʷra-tġawsa-yad s-ġmkan.
mayan a-f-swangmġ is-ra-yaf iġ-ḍalbġ aytmatn-ad a-yyi-n-zwurn s-darun, baš ad-jjujadn tawafka lli-s-tnnam ra-stti-taznm. ġmkan a-s-ra-stt-in-afġ nkki tujad s-lh̬aṭr-nnun urd s-bzzez.
ašku wanna-n-iluḥn amud idrusn, idrus ma-ra-imgr. imma wanna-n-iluḥn amud iggutn, iggut ma-ra-imgr.
illa f-kud yan a-iskr maylli iqṣad ġ-ih̬f-ns. a-ur-ifk s-bzzez nġd f-uwdm n-wiyyaḍ. ašku iɛzza dar rbbi wanna yakkan s-lfrḥ.
rbbi iẓḍar a-kʷn-ibark s-tmih̬ar-ns ggutnin baš ad-awn-yili kullu ma-tḥtajjam, yili-awn-daġ ma-s-a-ttɛawanm ġ-kullu ma-igan afulki.
ġmklli ityaran: «ar-issukut lbarakat-ns f-imẓlaḍ. ur-ra-sar-ttmmu lḥnant-ns.»
rbbi lli-yakkan amud i-walli ikkrzn ar-as-itzayad aġrum ma-ištta, nttan a-rad-awn-ifk amud izayd-awn ma-iggutn, iskr-awn tamgra ifulkin zġ-lḥnant-nnun.
rad-awn-issigat lh̬ir baš a-bdda-darun-yili ma-takkam i-wiyyaḍ. ġmkan a-f-ra-ti-tškarn mddn ggutnin f-mad-asn-ttaznm f-ufus-nnġ.
ašku lmɛawnt-ad ra-tɛmmr imẓlayn n-rbbi s-lh̬ir ma-s-a-bahra-tfraḥn ar-kullu-tškarn rbbi.
iggut ma-ra-t-iškr f-lmɛawnt-nnun, ašku ra-srs-tmlm is-a-tskarm s-lh̬bar ifulkin l-lmasiḥ ar-ttirim a-ttɛawanm imẓlayn-an ula kullu mddn.
ra-kʷn-bahra-tḥubbun ntni ar-fllawn-tḍalabn rbbi, ašku ibark gigun rbbi s-lbaraka iggutn.
imma ġilad, a-bahra-nškr rbbi lli-aġ-d-ifkan ma-yugʷrn kullu iswingimn n-bnadm.
imma ġilad ra-kʷn-ḍalbġ nkki bulus s-ism l-lmasiḥ lli-bdda-iḥnnan iṣbr d-kud yan, ašku ar-flla-ttinin kra n-mddn is-ḍɛfġ ġakud nna-darun-lliġ, šquġ didun ġakud nna-fllawn-aggugġ.
walaynni ra-kʷn-ḍalbġ a-tskrm ma-kʷn-d-iqqann, baš a-ur-iyi-ih̬ṣṣa ad-didun-šquġ ġakud nna-n-uškiġ, ġmklli-yyi-ih̬ṣṣa ad-šquġ d-kra n-mddn lli-ġalnin is-a-nskar s-ma-ittiri ih̬f-nnġ.
wah̬h̬a nzdġ ġ-ddunit-ad, ur-a-ntmmaġ s-ġaylli-s-a-tmmaġn mddn n-ddunit-ad.
imqlad lli-s-a-ntmmaġ nkkʷni ur-gin win ddunit-ad, walaynni tlla-gisn-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi a-srsn-nssḍar lbruj dusnin.
