ar-nssgriwil iswingimn n-bnadm, ar-nh̬llu iwaliwn n-kullu ma-italln ih̬f-ns a-iḍaḍḍ tawassna n-rbbi, ar-nkkrs kullu tinbaḍin n-mddn baš ad-wrrin s-tnbaḍin l-lmasiḥ.
imma kunni, iġ-tram a-tskarm kullu s-tnbaḍin l-lmasiḥ, nujad nkkʷni a-nḥkam f-wanna ur-srsnt-iskarn.
walaynni kunni ar-tẓrram ġir ma-illan ġ-brra. is-darun-illa ma-ittinin iga ah̬ddam l-lmasiḥ? illa fllas a-ur-ittu mayad: ula nkkʷni nga ih̬ddamn l-lmasiḥ.
ur-akkʷ-rad-ḥšmġ, wah̬h̬a da-sawalġ bahra f-mamnk ad-aġ-iẓli siditnnġ ad-awn-nmala ma-kʷn-d-iqqann a-ti-tskarm. ašku iẓli-aġ urd f-a-kʷn-nhlk walaynni f-a-kʷn-nɛawn.
a-ur-tġalm is-riġ a-kʷn-in-ssiwidġ s-tbratin-inu.
illa ma-ittinin «ġakud nna-yaġ-d-yura bulus itjhhd išqu didnnġ, walaynni ġakud nna-d-darnnġ-yuška iḍɛf ur-issin mamnk a-isawal.»
imma wan mddn-an, illa fllasn ad-issann mayad: ġakud nna-n-darun-nuška ar-bdda-nskar kullu s-mklli-awn-in-nenna lliġ-d-naggug.
ur-nzɛm a-nssngadda ih̬fawn-nnġ d-kra n-mddn lli-talġnin ih̬f-nsn, ula ra-nini is-tn-nuf. ašku lliġ a-ttinin i-ngratsn «kra yuf kra» nġd «kra yugʷr kra» iban fllasn is-ur-fhimn yat.
imma nkkʷni ur-ra-n-ntyaggal s-ma-n-fllannġ-yaggugn, walaynni ra-ng ġmklli nga ġ-twuri-ad-aġ-ifka rbbi lli-s-aġ-n-yiwi ula s-darun.
ur-nri a-nssurf iwtta s-illi ur-aġ-ifki rbbi. walaynni ifka-yaġ kra ġ-darun, ašku nkkʷni a-izwarn is-n-nmudda nsslkm-awn-in lh̬bar ifulkin l-lmasiḥ.
ur-akkʷ-a-ntalġ ih̬f-nnġ f-kra-ur-nskir ula f-mad-skrn wiyyaḍ, walaynni ar-n-ntrju ġ-igr n-darun a-gis-tigat-tmgra lliġ a-ttzayadm ġ-liman.
ġmkan a-s-ra-nddu tigira, ar-ntbrraḥ s-lh̬bar ifulkin ġ-tmizar yaḍni aggugn-in fllawn, bla-da-ntalġ ih̬f-nnġ f-ma-ityawskarn ġ-igran n-mddn yaḍni.
ġmklli ityaran: «wanna iran a-yalġ, yalġ siditnnġ.»
ašku urd yan irḍan ih̬f-ns a-ra-ityawqbal, walaynni yan f-irḍa sidis.
ṣbrat didi iġ-iyi-tẓram ar-sawalġ imikk zund yan iffuġn ih̬f-ns.
tṣbrm didi ašku ar-kʷn-ttiriġ s-tayri n-rbbi, fkġ-kʷn i-lmasiḥ zund yat-tslit lli-ġ-ur-illi kra l-lɛib, baš a-ur-tilim i-kra n-yan yaḍni.
ksuḍġ a-kʷn-ijllu kra n-yan f-iswingimn-nnun ġmklli-stt-izzri-ulgmmaḍ s-tkrkas-ns f-immatnnġ ḥuwwa. iksaḍġ a-twrrim zġ-tayri iṣfan lli-s-ttin tkkam ar-ttirim lmasiḥ s-nniyt-nnun.

ašku ar-tsflidm s-wanna-n-darun-yuškan ar-itbrraḥ s-kra n-yasuɛ ur-igi yasuɛ lli-s-awn-nbrrḥ nkkʷni. hati ar-ttqbalm wanna-yawn-yakkan kra n-rruḥ ur-igi rruḥ lli-tqblm yadlli. ar-ttamnm wanna-yawn-in-itawin kra l-lh̬bar ifulkin ur-igi lh̬bar ifulkin lli-s-tumnm f-imi-nnġ.
walaynni irwas-iyi is-ur-iyi-akkʷ-ufn mddn-an lli-tgam d-irqqasn hiyyanin.
wah̬h̬a da-ttinin kra n-mddn ur-ssinġ ad-sawlġ, ha-yyi ssnġ bahra ma-yʷġẓann. ula kunni kullukn tẓram mayan ġ-kullu ma-nskr ġ-gratun.
ġakud lliġ-awn-in-iwiġ lh̬bar ifulkin n-rbbi ur-jju-zgigun-ḍalbġ iqaridn. udrġ i-ih̬f-inu baš-a-tallm kunni ih̬fawn-nnun. is-iɛib mayn skrġ?
ġ-uwssan-an ar-tamẓġ mad-ḥtajjaġ zġ-imnaggarn yaḍni, ar-šttaġ zġ-lh̬ir-nsn baš ad-awn-h̬dmġ.

imma ġakud lliġ lkmġ f-kra ġ-darun ur-ḍalbġ yan f-yat, ašku aytmatn lli-n-uškanin zġ-makiduniyya iwin-iyi-n kullu mad-ḥtajjaġ. ġmklli skrġ ġ-uwssan-an a-rad-bdda-skarġ. ur-sar-ra-zgigun-ḍalbġ yat i-ih̬f-inu.
s-lḥqq l-lmasiḥ lli-gigi-illan, ur-ra-yiẓḍar yan ġ-tmazirt n-ah̬aya kullutt a-yyi-issfssa f-wawal-ad.
mah̬ aylliġ-awn-sawlġ ġmkad? is-ur-dari-tɛzzam? rbbi a-issnn mamnk a-dari-tɛzzam bahra.
ġmkan a-rad-bdda-skarġ, baš a-ur-iẓḍarn kra n-mddn ad-talġn ih̬f-nsn ar-ttinin izd zund nkkʷni ad-skarn.
ašku wan mddn-an urd irqqasn n-ṣṣaḥt ad-gan, walaynni gan ih̬ddamn imġḍarn ar-tbddaln ssift-nsn baš ad-rwasn irqqasn l-lmasiḥ.
ur-igi ġayad lɛjb, ašku šiṭan ula nttan ar-itbddal ssift-ns baš a-irwas yal-lmalak ifawn.
a-ur-ntɛjjab iġ-nẓra ih̬ddamn-ns ar-tbddaln ssift-nsn baš ad-rwasn ih̬ddamn n-ufulki. imma ntni rad-asn-yili mad-asn-igan.
rad-awn-daġ-iniġ a-ur-tġalm is-ffuġġ ih̬f-inu. walaynni iġ-sul-gigun-illa ma-iġaln ġmkan, rad-as-iniġ a-yyi-iqbl zund yan inufln, baš ad-alġġ ih̬f-inu ula nkki yan imikk.
urd awal n-siditnnġ ayd-awn-ttiniġ ġilad, hati rad-alġġ ih̬f-inu zund yan inufln.
ggutn mddn ar-talġn ih̬fawn-nsn f-mad-asn-illan ġ-ddunit-ad. hati rad-sawlġ ula nkki ġmkan,
ašku ar-kʷn-itɛjab a-ttṣbarm d-inafaln kunni lli-igan ih̬f-nnun d-ayt-lɛaql.
hati ar-ttṣbarm d-kullu wanna iran a-kʷn-ig d-ismgan yiri a-kʷn-iẓig išš-kʷn iḥgr-kʷn yut-kʷn f-uwdm.

imma nkkʷni, ur-jju-nzɛm ad-awn-nskr ġmkan, ha-yyi ḥšmġ ad-awn-t-iniġ. walaynni iġ-illa ma-izɛmn a-yalġ ih̬f-ns f-kra, ula nkki rad-zɛmġ ad-alġġ ih̬f-inu f-mayan. ha-yyi sawlġ ġilad zund yan inufln.

izd s-iwaliwn n-ayt-yudaya a-s-a-sawaln mddn-an? ula nkki ar-sawalġ s-iwaliwn n-ayt-yudaya. izd zġ-ayt-rbbi a-zġ-gan? ula nkki giġ zġ-ayt-rbbi. izd zġ-tasut n-ibrahim a-zġ-gan? ula nkki giġ zġ-tasut n-ibrahim.

is-gan ih̬ddamn l-lmasiḥ? giġ ula nkki ah̬ddam l-lmasiḥ uggʷar-nsn. ha-yyi ġilad ar-sawalġ zund yan inufln. ar-th̬damġ uggʷar n-mddn-an, ar-ttiliġ ġ-lḥbs uggʷar-nsn. ššiġ akuray uggʷar-nsn. mnnawt-twal a-n-tmnaggarġ d-lmut.
smmust-twal a-yyi-ssġuršn ayt-yudaya ar-iyi-ššušan kraṭṭ id-mrawt d-tẓa (39) n-ḍḍrbt.
kraṭṭ-twal a-yyi-tnt-ššušan ayt-rruman s-ukuray. yat-twal rjmn-iyi mddn s-iẓran. kraṭṭ-twal ad-iyi-trẓa tanawt ġ-umda, kġ iḍ d-wass ġ-waman.

ar-bahra-tmudduġ. zriġ ġ-lh̬aṭar n-isaffn d-iqṭṭaɛn. zriġ ġ-lh̬aṭar ġ-gr mddn-inu n-ayt-yudaya ula ġ-gr ayt-tmizar yaḍni. zriġ zġ-gis ġ-tmdinin ula lh̬la ula amda. zriġ zġ-gis ġ-gr ayt-tkrkas lli-ittinin is-gan ayt-lmasiḥ.
ar-kkatġ takrrayt ar-kkatġ tammara. mnnawt-twal ad-ssikkiġ iṭs, ur-ššiġ ula swiġ. ur-dari mad-šttaġ ula mad-lssaġ ula maniġ a-tntalġ i-usmmiḍ.
ggutnt tassasin yaḍni, walaynni zuydġ-asnt kullutnt taẓayt n-taġuft lli-bdda-tasiġ kraygatt ass f-kullu imnaggarn n-aytmatn.
ġakud nna-illa ma-iḍɛfn, ha-yyi ssḥssaġ s-ḍḍɛf-ns. ġakud nna-illa ma-iḍrn, ar-itbbi ġ-tasa-nu.
iġ-iyi-d-iqqan ad-sawlaġ f-mad-skrġ, rad-sawlġ f-ḍḍɛf-inu.
rbbi babas n-siditnnġ yasuɛ a-issnn is-ur-a-sskirkisġ. nttan a-isthllan a-t-ntalġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan.
lliġ ttin kkiġ ġ-tmdint n-dimašq, inkr lḥakm lli-illan ġ-ddu-ugllid ḥarit, yuṣṣa iɛskrin ad-ḍufn imawn n-tmdint baš a-yyi-amẓn.
walaynni gan-iyi kra n-mddn ġ-yan-uryal, zzugzn-iyi zġ-yan-warryaḥ illa ġ-uġʷrab n-tmdint, njmġ zġ-ufus-ns.
iqqan-iyi-d ad-sawlġ f-mad-skrġ, wah̬h̬a ur-gis-tlli kra l-lfaytt. rad-awn-iniġ f-twargiwin lli-yyi-imla siditnnġ ula tiġawsiwin yaḍni lli-yyi-issbayyn.
ssnġ yan-urgaz iga win lmasiḥ, ityalal s-wis kraḍ ignwan kkuẓ d-mraw n-usggʷas ayad. ur-ssinġ izd s-ddat a-s-ityalal nġd bla ddat. rbbi a-issnn.
ssnġ is-ityalal-urgaz-an s-talɛrṣt l-lmjd, ur-ssinġ izd s-ddat nġd bla ddat. rbbi a-issnn.
imma ntta isfld i-kra n-tġawsiwin, ur-yufi iwaliwn ma-s-a-tnt-yaddr ula zrint i-bnadm a-srsnt-isawl.
wan argaz-an a-f-rad-sawlġ, walaynni ur-rad-sawlġ f-ih̬f-inu abla f-ḍḍɛf lli-gigi-illan.
mrad is-riġ ad-sawlġ f-ih̬f-inu urd anafal a-rad-gġ, ašku lḥqq a-ra-ttiniġ. walaynni ur-rad-sawalġ f-ih̬f-inu a-ur-flla-iġal kra n-yan uggʷar n-ma-gigi-iẓrra ula ma-mi-dari-isflid.

walaynni ityawfka-yyi yan-usnnan ġ-ddat-nu, baš a-ur-allġ ih̬f-inu f-ssibt n-tġawsiwin ggutnin lli-yyi-issbayyn rbbi. asnnan-an iga amazan n-šiṭan, ar-iyi-issrfufun baš a-ur-wrriġ ar-tallġ ih̬f-inu.
kraṭṭ-twal ad-ḍalbġ siditnnġ a-t-flla-issitti

walaynni inna-yyi: «ur-k-ih̬ṣṣa abla lḥnant-inu. ašku yan iḍɛfn a-ġ-ra-tili-tḥkimt-inu itjhhdn s-uggʷar.» frḥġ ġilad ad-sawalġ f-kullu ma-gigi-iḍɛfn, baš ad-ɛmmrġ s-tḥkimt itjhhdn l-lmasiḥ.
ar-tqnaɛġ nkki ġakud nna-ḍɛfġ, ula ġakud nna-yyi-rgmn mddn ula ġakud nna-kkatġ tammara ar-trfufunġ ar-zrayġ ġ-tnukmut f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ. ašku ġakud nna-ḍɛfġ, hati tjhhdġ.

nniġ mayan zund yan iffuġn ih̬f-ns, walaynni kunni a-yyi-irurn ad-sawlġ ġmkan, ašku ur-trim a-yyi-talġm ġmklli fllawn illan. wah̬h̬a ur-giġ yat nkki, ur-akkʷ-iyi-ufn mddn-an lli-tgam d-irqqasn hiyyanin.
kunni tẓram gigi timitar n-yan igan arqqas n-ṣṣaḥt, ašku skrġ darun lmɛjizat d-lɛjayb d-lquwwat s-ṣṣbr iggutn.
is-illa kra skrġ-t i-imnaggarn yaḍni ur-awn-t-skirġ kunni? ġir taġawsa-yad a-illan: ur-zgigun-umẓġ iqaridn. is-yʷh̬šn mayd gigun skrġ baš a-kʷn-ḍalbġ ad-iyi-tṣamḥm?

ha-yyi ujadġ ġilad a-n-darun-aškġ tis kraṭṭ-twal. ur-ra-zgigun-ḍalbġ yat, ašku kunni ad-riġ urd ma-igan winnun. ur-illi f-tarwa ad-ssmunun ma-s-a-tɛawann ayt-darsn, walaynni illa f-ayt-darsn ad-tɛawann tarwa-nsn.
rad-frḥġ nkki ad-fkġ kullu mad-dari-illan, fkġ ula ih̬f-inu f-ssibt-nnun. is-ur-ra-darun-ɛzzaġ imikk lliġ dari tɛzzam kunni ġunškan?
tssnm is-ur-fllawn-ẓẓayġ ġ-uwssan-an. walaynni is-sul-gigun-illa ma-ittinin «bulus iga bu-lḥilt, izzri-tt fllawn s-tkrkas»?
mamnk? is-jju-kʷn-ššiġ f-ufus n-willi-awn-in-uznġ?
nkki a-iḍalbn tiṭus a-n-yašk s-darun, aznġ-n dids gʷmatnnġ yaḍni. walaynni iniyat-iyi, is-jju-kʷn-išša tiṭus? imma nkki d-tiṭus, ar-bdda-nskar zund zund, ar-ntnbaḍ zund zund.

is-tġalm is-nenna kullu mayad baš a-fllannġ-tḥkamm kunni, tinim ur-ginnġ kra l-lɛib? walaynni ġ-lgddam n-rbbi a-ġ-a-nsawal s-ism l-lmasiḥ. d-kullu ma-nskar, ay-aytma ɛzzanin, ar-t-nskar baš a-kʷn-nssdus.

walaynni ksuḍġ a-kʷn-in-afġ ur-tgim ġmklli riġ ġakud nna-n-darun-uškiġ, tafm-iyi-n ula nkki ur-giġ ġmklli tram. ur-riġ a-kʷn-in-afġ ar-tẓim i-ngratun ula-da-ttirim ma-igan win wiyyaḍ ula-da-ttqlaqalm ula-da-ikkat kud yan ġir f-ih̬f-ns ula-da-trggmm ula-da-tsawalm ġ-wiyyaḍ ula-da-tssimġurm ih̬fawn-nnun ula-da-tssrwaym mad-darun-illan.
ksuḍġ a-yyi-yadj rbbi ard-iyi-tigʷraẓ ġ-gratun ġakud nna-n-darun-uškiġ, ar-allaġ f-ma-gigun-iggutn ur-rin ad-fln lh̬ʷšant lli-myarn ġayd izrin, ar-sul-tfsadn ar-tznun ar-tšthun i-ngratsn.
h̬tad a-ra-ig tis kraṭṭ-twal is-n-darun-uškiġ. walaynni ġmklli ityaran: «taġawsa nna-ijran, f-imi n-sin inagan nġd kraḍ a-s-ra-tzga.»

imma ġilad ġ-d-fllawn-aggugġ, rad-awn-iniġ maylli-s-awn-nniġ s-lḥqq ġakud lliġ-n-darun-uškiġ tis snat-twal. nniġ-t ġakudan i-willi skarnin ma-yʷh̬šnn iniġ-awn-t kullukn. rad-awn-t-daġ-iniġ: iġ-n-darun-wrriġ tawala yaḍni, ur-akkʷ-rad-rh̬uġ d-yan iskarn ma-yʷh̬šnn.
ġmkad a-s-rad-awn-mlġ tamatart lli-zgigi-tḍalbm, baš a-tissanm izd lmasiḥ a-isawaln f-imi-nu. ašku itjhhd ntta ġ-gratun. ur-iḍɛf lliġ a-didun-iskar.
s-ḍḍɛf a-s-immut f-uggjdi, imma ġilad iddr s-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi. nḍɛf ula nkkʷni zund nttan, walaynni s-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi a-s-a-didun-nskar, ašku nmun dids ġ-tudrt-ns.
sigglat ġ-ih̬f-nnun a-tẓrm is-tzgam ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ. ẓrat mamnk a-tgam. is-ur-tssinm mayad? illa yasuɛ lmasiḥ ġ-ugʷns-nnun, iġ-nnit-ur-tjlim zġ-uġaras.
rjuġ-n gigun a-ur-tswingimm izd nkkʷni a-ijlan.

imma ġilad ar-ntḍalab rbbi fllawn a-ur-tskarm kra yʷh̬šnn. ur-a-t-ntḍalab f-ih̬f-nnġ a-ginnġ-iban is-nskr kra, wah̬h̬a iġ-ġaln kra n-mddn ur-nskir yat. walaynni ar-t-ntḍalab fllawn baš a-iban is-tskrm afulki.
ašku ur-nssugir yat i-lḥqq. ur-nẓḍar abla a-srs-nskar.
imma nkkʷni ar-ntfraḥ ġakud nna-nḍɛf tjhhdm kunni, walaynni ar-ntḍalab rbbi a-twrrim tfulkim s-ufulki ikmmln.

mayan a-f-awn-in-uriġ tabrat-ad, ġilad ġ-d-fllawn-aggugġ. iẓli-yyi siditnnġ ad-awn-malaġ ma-kʷn-d-iqqann a-ti-tskarm, urd f-a-kʷn-hlkġ walaynni f-a-kʷn-ɛawnġ. walaynni ġakud lliġ ra-n-darun-aškġ ur-riġ a-n-afġ is-iyi-ih̬ṣṣa ad-didun-šquġ.
way-aytma, awal-inu iggʷran iga-t: frḥat, ar-tskarm f-ufulki, ar-tzzɛamm i-ngratun, tgm yan ġ-iswingimn-nnun, ar-tzraym ġ-sslamt. ġmkad a-s-rad-bdda-didun-yili rbbi l-lḥnant d-sslamt.
tnsallamat i-ngratun s-unsallam n-tagʷmat.
ar-n-fllawn-tsllamn kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ula lḥnant n-rbbi ula tamunt n-rruḥ lqudus kullukn.
zġ-bulus igan arqqas s-trqqast lli-ur-igin tin bnadm ula ẓlin-iyi srs mddn, walaynni iẓli-yyi srs yasuɛ lmasiḥ d-rbbi babatnnġ lli-t-id-issnkrn zġ-lmut.
zġ-gigi nkki d-aytmatn lli-didi-illan, i-imnaggarn ġ-tmazirt n-galaṭiyya.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
nttan a-ifkan ih̬f-ns, immt baš ad-aġ-ijjnjm zġ-ddnub-nnġ. ifukku-aġ zġ-ddunit-ad yʷh̬šnn ġmklli ira rbbi babatnnġ.
ar-t-bahra-ntalġ, ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.
imma kunni, iḍr-iyi lɛjb gigun. ašku ġir yat luqt idrusn ayd tzzrim s-tflm rbbi lli-awn-iġran s-lbaraka l-lmasiḥ. twrrim s-yan-uġaras yaḍni, ar-as-ttinin kra n-mddn ‹lh̬bar ifulkin›
walaynni urd lh̬bar ifulkin ayan. ssnġ is-llan kra n-mddn ġ-darun ar-awn-tt-ssṭiyyarn, irin a-tbddaln lh̬bar ifulkin l-lmasiḥ s-tkrkas.
walaynni iġ-n-yuška kra n-yan ar-awn-imala kra mi ittini ‹lh̬bar ifulkin› ur-igin lh̬bar lli-awn-in-niwi ġ-isizwar, ra-fllas-iniġ «a-t-ihlk rbbi» wah̬h̬a nkki nġd kra l-lmalak zġ-ignwan.
nenna-yawn ġayd izrin, iniġ-awn-daġ ġilad: iġ-n-yuška kra n-yan ar-awn-imala kra mi ittini ‹lh̬bar ifulkin› ur-igin lh̬bar ifulkin lli-tumẓm zġ-isizwar, hati nniġ fllas «a-t-ihlk rbbi.»
ma-tġalm kunni? izd mddn ad-riġ ad-flla-rḍun, nġd rbbi? izd mddn ad-riġ a-yyi-talġn? uhu, mrad is-riġ a-yyi-talġn mddn ur-rad-gġ ah̬ddam l-lmasiḥ.
way-aytma, riġ a-tissanm mayad. urd zġ-bnadm a-zġ-d-yuška lh̬bar ifulkin lli-s-a-tbrraḥġ.
ašku ur-t-umẓġ dar mddn ula sslmdn-iyi-t mddn, walaynni issbayyn-iyi-t-id yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
tsfldm kunni f-mamnk a-sttin-kkiġ ar-bahra-skarġ s-tnbaḍin n-ayt-yudaya, ar-ssrfufunġ aytmatn n-umnaggar n-rbbi s-trfufnt išqan, ar-n-tggaġ tiqqi-nu ad-hlkġ amnaggar a-ur-sul-iqama.
ġ-uwssan-an zwarġ ma-iggutn ġ-inggan-inu n-ayt-yudaya, ašku ɛzzant dari bahra lɛadat n-imzwura-nnġ lli-zrinin.
walaynni rbbi lli-yyi-iẓlin lliġ ur-ta-lulġ, iḥnna gigi irḍu ad-iyi-iġr
issbayyn-iyi yus, baš ad-dduġ ar-fllas-tbrraḥġ ġ-dar ayt-tmizar aggugnin. ur-sqsaġ kra n-bnadm
ula ddiġ s-urušalim ad-sawlġ d-irqqasn lli-yyi-zwarnin, walaynni ffuġġ mudduġ s-tmazirt n-waɛrabn. yan kra wrriġ s-tmdint n-dimašq.
zrin kraḍ isggʷasn s-ddiġ s-urušalim a-ġin-sawlġ d-bṭrus. gawrġ dids smmus d-mraw n-wass.
walaynni ur-ẓriġ irqqasn yaḍni abla yaɛqub gʷmas n-siditnnġ.
mayd-awn-in-uriġ, rbbi issn is-ur-gis-sskarksġ.
ffuġġ ilmma ar-tmudduġ ġ-tmizar n-suriyya d-kilikiyya.
ġ-uwssan-an ur-ta-yyi-ssinn ayt-imnaggarn ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya.
ġir sfldn flla, ar-ttinin «ġwalli-sttin ikkan ar-aġ-issrfufun, hati ar-itbrraḥ ġilad f-uġaras lli-f-iqṣad a-t-ihlk.»
ar-bahra-talġn rbbi f-ssibt-inu.
zrin kkuẓ d-mraw n-usggʷas s-wrriġ s-urušalim nkki d-barnaba, awiġ didi tiṭus.

imla-yyi rbbi is-iyi-d-iqqan ad-dduġ s-ġin. mnaggarġ ġakudan d-willi mi ttinin inmġurn. nniġ-asn ġ-griyi didsn f-mamnk a-iga-wawal l-lh̬bar ifulkin lli-s-a-tbrraḥġ ġ-dar ayt-tmizar aggugnin, ašku ksuḍġ a-ur-ra-tili lfaytt ġ-mad-skrġ ula ġ-mayd sul skarġ.
imma ntni ur-aġ-uṣṣan a-nẓẓall i-ddat n-usmun-inu tiṭus wah̬h̬a iga gu-yunan.
walaynni llan ġin kra n-mddn skrn zund iġ-gan aytmatnnġ, kšmn darnnġ s-tntla, irin ad-ẓrn mamnk a-nskar ġilad ġ-aġ-irẓm lmasiḥ zġ-iskraf n-ššrɛ. ar-ttirin ad-aġ-krsn-daġ zund ismgan.
imma nkkʷni ur-akkʷ-nqbil yat ġ-maylli-aġ-ttinin, baš a-ur-fllawn-kkisn lḥqq l-lh̬bar ifulkin.
imma ġwilli-f-a-ttinin mddn zund iġ-gan kra (wah̬h̬a ur-iyi-ihmma mad-gan ašku rbbi ur-a-iskar s-uwdmawn), ntni ur-iyi-nnin kra n-uswingim yaḍni.
walaynni ẓran is-iyi-ifka rbbi ad-sslkmġ lh̬bar ifulkin i-ayt-tmizar yaḍni, ġmklli ifka i-bṭrus a-t-isslkm i-ayt-yudaya.
ašku rbbi lli-ith̬damn ġ-bṭrus baš a-ig arqqas i-ayt-yudaya, ar-gigi-ith̬dam ula nkki baš ad-gġ arqqas i-ayt-tmizar yaḍni.

imma yaɛqub d-bṭrus d-yuḥanna lli-mi-ttinin mddn inmġurn, lliġ ẓran mayad, mdin-aġ-d afus-nsn afasi nkki d-barnaba. mšaškan-d didnnġ a-ntmɛawan i-ngratnnġ, ar-nth̬dam nkkʷni ġ-tmizar yaḍni ar-th̬damn ntni ġ-dar ayt-yudaya.
ur-ginnġ-rin abla yat-tġawsa. ran ginnġ a-stt-ntawi ġ-imẓlaḍ lli-darsn-illan. imma nkki swangmġ yadlli f-mayan, iriġ bahra a-t-skrġ.
walaynni ġakud lliġ-d-yuška bṭrus s-tmdint n-anṭakiyya, nkrġ srs ġ-lgddam n-aytmatn, ašku ur-a-iskar s-lḥqq.

ntta ġ-isizwar ar-ištta d-aytmatn n-tmizar yaḍni, walaynni ġakud lliġ-d-uškan kra n-imddukkʷal n-yaɛqub, iwrri bṭrus ur-a-sul-ištta d-mddn-an ula-da-didsn-itmunu, ašku iksuḍ zġ-willi ur-itqbaln winna ur-ẓẓullinin i-ddat-nsn.
ġakudan nkrn wiyyaḍ n-ayt-yudaya skrn sin-uwdmawn ġmklli iskr bṭrus, aylliġ-tn-itabɛa ula barnaba.

imma nkki, lliġ ẓriġ ur-a-tamẓn ġ-lḥqq l-lh̬bar ifulkin, sawlġ s-bṭrus ġ-lgddam-nsn kullutn nniġ-as: «kiyi gu-yudaya a-tgit, walaynni tmyart a-tskart zund ayt-tmizar yaḍni urd ayt-yudaya. mamnk ġilad a-trit a-ttinit iqqan-d ayt-tmizar yaḍni ad-skarn s-ššrɛ n-ayt-yudaya?»
ha-nkkʷni laṣl-nnġ iga zġ-ayt-yudaya, urd zġ-ayt-tmizar yaḍni lli-mi-ttinin ‹ayt-ddnub›.

walaynni nssn taġawsa-yad bahra. ra-irḍu rbbi f-winna umnnin s-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, urd f-willi skarnin s-ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ n-musa. mayad a-s-aġ-d-iqqan ula nkkʷni n-ayt-yudaya a-namn s-yasuɛ lmasiḥ. f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ a-f-fllannġ-irḍa rbbi, urd f-ssibt n-kra nskar igan win ššrɛ. ašku ur-iẓḍar yan a-irḍu rbbi s-iskkirn n-ššrɛ.

walaynni ġilad ġ-a-ntrju a-fllannġ-irḍu rbbi f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ, ma-ra-nini iġ-a-sul-ntafa ddnub ġ-ih̬f-nnġ zund ayt-tmizar-an yaḍni? is-a-yaġ-ifal lmasiḥ a-ntzayad ġ-ddnub? uhu, urd ġmkan a-nga.
ašku mrad is-a-bnnuġ f-ġaylli h̬ʷliġ, ra-gigi-iban izd ddnub ad-skarġ.
walaynni giġ ġilad zund iġ-iyi-inġa ššrɛ mmtġ-as, baš ad-d-nkrġ ddrġ i-rbbi.
ha-yyi mmutġ d-lmasiḥ f-uggjdi-ns. urd sul nkki a-iddrn walaynni lmasiḥ a-gigi-iddrn. kullu mad-skarġ ġilad, ar-t-skarġ f-ssibt n-mad-umnġ s-yus n-rbbi lli-gigi-iḥnnan ifk tudrt-ns flla.
ur-rurġ lḥnant-ad n-rbbi zund iġ-ur-tgi yat. ašku mrad is-nẓḍar a-nrḍu rbbi s-iskkirn n-ššrɛ, bla lfaytt a-ra-tg lmut l-lmasiḥ.
wa-kunni n-ayt-galaṭiyya, izd tffuġm ih̬f-nnun? is-kʷn-issnufl kra n-yan? nmla-yawn yadlli mamnk a-immut yasuɛ lmasiḥ f-uggjdi, tissanm-t bahra.
imma ġilad ra-kʷn-sqsaġ, izd f-ssibt n-ma-tskarm s-ššrɛ n-musa a-f-awn-in-yuška rruḥ lqudus, nġd f-ssibt n-ma-tsfldm i-lh̬bar-nnġ ifulkin tamnm srs?
is-nnit-tffuġm ih̬f-nnun? tgram ġ-tudrt-ad l-ljdid s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus, imma ġilad is-tram a-gis-tzaydm s-iskkirn n-bnadm?
is-ur-igi yat, kullu maylli darun ijran ġayd zrinin?
izd f-ssibt n-ma-tskarm s-ššrɛ a-f-awn-yakka rbbi rruḥ lqudus ar-darun-iskar lmɛjizat, nġd f-ssibt n-ma-tsfldm i-lh̬bar ifulkin tamnm srs?
ula ibrahim, ityara fllas: «yumn rbbi, mayan a-f-t-iga rbbi d-wad f-irḍa.»
riġ a-tissanm mayad. ayt-ibrahim, a-tn-igan d-willi umnnin.

ašku ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi f-mamnk a-ra-irḍu rbbi ula f-ayt-tmizar aggugnin f-ssibt mad-umnn. isawl rbbi s-ibrahim iml-as lh̬bar ifulkin lli-ra-yili yini-as: «s-ism-nnk a-s-rad-barkġ kullu timizar n-ddunit.»
ġmkad a-s-nssn is-ra-ibark rbbi kullu wanna yumnn ġmklli ibark ibrahim lli-yumnn.
kullu willi ittirin ad-rḍun rbbi s-iskkirn n-ššrɛ, hati ġ-ddu lḥukm a-ġ-sul-qaman. ašku ityara: «rbbi ra-yut lḥukm s-jhnnama f-kraygatt yan ur-iskarn s-kullu ma-ityaran ġ-warratn n-ššrɛ.»
imla-yaġ-wawal-ad is-ur-iẓḍar yan a-irḍu rbbi s-iskkirn n-ššrɛ, walaynni ityara-daġ inna rbbi: «wanna yumnn, nttan a-f-rad-rḍuġ fkġ-as tudrt.»
wanna ibnnun f-ššrɛ, ur-a-itawi rrja s-ma-yumn, ašku ġmklli ityaran: «yan iskarn kullu s-iskkirn-ad, rad-as-ifk rbbi tudrt f-ssibt-nsn.»

imma lmasiḥ ifukka-yaġ zġ-lɛqubit lli-ra-iḍr f-willi ibnnun f-ššrɛ. iwrri iga ntta wad-f-tḍr lɛqubit, baš a-ur-fllannġ-tḍr nkkʷni. ašku ityara: «kullu wanna ityaggaln f-uggjdi, lɛqubit n-rbbi a-fllas-illan.»
immut lmasiḥ yasuɛ baš ad-kšmn ula ayt-tmizar aggugnin s-lbaraka lli-f-inna rbbi i-ibrahim, namẓ kullwaġ rruḥ lqudus lli-f-inna rbbi rad-aġ-t-ifk. kullu mayad rad-aġ-yili f-ssibt n-ma-numn.
way-aytma, nssn mad-skarn mddn iġ-d-mšaškan f-kra n-tġawsa. ar-akkan lɛhd i-ngratsn. iġ-skrn lɛhd, ur-iẓḍar yan a-yanf i-lɛhd-an ula-yas-izayd kra.

ġayd izrin ar-isawal rbbi s-ibrahim ar-as-ittini f-ma-rad-as-ifk i-ibrahim, ntta d-wamud-ns. ur-as-inni «ra-t-fkġ i-imadn-nnk» zund iġ-gan mddn ggutnin, walaynni inna-yas «ra-t-fkġ i-wamud-nnk» igan yan ig lmasiḥ.

lmɛna-yad, riġ ad-awn-srs-mlġ mayad. rbbi ifka yal-lɛhd i-ibrahim, yini-as rad-as-t-izzga. zrin kkuẓ id-miyya d-kraḍ id-mraw (430) n-usggʷas, ifk ilmma rbbi ššrɛ i-mddn-ns. walaynni ur-iẓḍar ššrɛ n-musa a-issanf i-lɛhd lli-t-id-izwarn, ula iẓḍar a-ikkis awal lli-s-yad-inna rbbi i-ibrahim.
ašku rbbi, mrad is-ifka lwrt-ns ġir i-willi skarnin s-ššrɛ, ikun ur-akkʷ-iqama ġ-wawal lli-s-yad-inna i-ibrahim. walaynni urd ġmkan a-iskr rbbi, ašku s-wawal-ns izgan a-s-ifka lwrt i-ibrahim.

imma ġilad ma-ra-nini f-ššrɛ? mah̬ aylliġ-t-id-izuyd rbbi i-mddn-ns? izuyd-asn-t baš ad-asn-imala ddnub lli-skarn. iqama ššrɛ ġir ar akud lliġ-d-yuška-wamud n-ibrahim lli-f-yad-inna rbbi. f-ufus l-lmalayka a-f-asn-ifka ššrɛ, d-ntni ssbayynn-t-id i-musa, d-ntta issbayyn-t-id i-wiyyaḍ.
walaynni awal lli-ifka rbbi i-ibrahim, ifka-yas-t ġ-gras dids, ur-t-ih̬ṣṣa yan yaḍni.

imma ġilad ma-ra-nini? is-issunf ššrɛ iwaliwn n-rbbi lli-s-yad-inna i-ibrahim? uhu, ur-t-issunf. ašku bnadm, mrad is-as-ityawfka kra n-ššrɛ ma-s-a-iteṭṭaf tudrt, ra-irḍu rbbi f-kraygatt yan iskarn s-ššrɛ.

walaynni arratn n-rbbi ar-malan mamnk a-ttyamaẓ ddunit kullutt ġ-ddu lḥukm n-ddnub. imma lwrt lli-f-inna rbbi i-ibrahim, ar-t-yakka i-willi umnnin s-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ar-asn-t-yakka ġilad f-ssibt l-liman-nsn.
ġ-uzmz lli-ġ-ur-ta-d-yuški lmasiḥ ur-ta-srs-numin, ntyawkrraf sul s-iskraf n-ššrɛ. ar-aġ-tḥṣarn-warratn n-ššrɛ ar kiġ-d-ilkm-uzmz-ad ġ-numn s-lmasiḥ.
ikka-ttin iga ššrɛ angabal fllannġ, ar-aġ-itrbba aylliġ-d-yuška lmasiḥ iskr sslamt ġ-gr rbbi d-willi srs umnnin.
imma ġilad ġ-d-ilkm-uzmz l-liman, ur-sul-igi ššrɛ angabal-nnġ.
ha-kunni kullukn, tarwa n-rbbi a-tgam f-ssibt n-ma-tumnm s-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ašku kullu wanna gigun iddmn s-udum n-waman baš a-iml is-iga win lmasiḥ, hati iwrri iddr s-tudrt l-lmasiḥ.
mayad a-f-ur-a-sul-nẓẓmẓlay gu-yudaya zġ-gu-yunan, ula-da-nẓẓmẓlay awtm zġ-tawtmt ula ismg zġ-wad-igan win ih̬f-ns, ašku tgam kullu yan ġ-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
walaynni lliġ tgam win lmasiḥ, hati ayt-ibrahim a-tgam. ra-tamẓm lwrt lli-f-as-inna rbbi ra-t-ifk i-tarwa-ns.
walaynni ġmkad a-iga kullu wanna iwrtn. lliġ sul imẓẓi, ig zund ismg ġ-tgmmi n-babas, wah̬h̬a ra-iṭṭaf kullu ayda n-babas tigira.
ašku illa sul ġ-ddu-ufus n-willi-t-igabln d-willi dar ifl babas lamant l-lwrt-ns, ard iruḥ-uzmz lli-f-iqṣad babas a-t-gis-yamẓ.
ula nkkʷni nkka-ttin nga ġmkan. ġakud lliġ sul nmẓẓi, nga zund ismgan ġ-ddu-ssulṭa l-larwaḥ n-ddunit-ad.
walaynni ġakud lliġ-d-iruḥ-uzmz, rbbi yuzn-d yus s-ddunit. ilul-d zġ-waḥlig n-yat-tmġart, iwrri yili ula ntta ġ-ddu ššrɛ,
baš a-ifukku winna llanin ġ-ddu ššrɛ irar-aġ a-ng tarwa n-rbbi.
ġmkad ad-aġ-imlan is-nga tarwa n-rbbi, ašku yuzn-d rruḥ n-yus izdġ ġ-uwlawn-nnġ, irar-aġ a-srs-naqra: «abba, wa-baba.»
hati ur-sul-tgim ismgan, walaynni twrrim tgam tarwa n-rbbi. d-wanna igan zġ-tarwa n-rbbi, ra-iwrt lbarakat n-rbbi.
ġayd izrin ur-tssinm rbbi. tkkam-ttin tgam ismgan i-kra l-lquwwat lli-ur-ginin rbbi.
imma ġilad ġ-tssnm rbbi (nġd yuf ad-iniġ, ġilad ġ-kʷn-issn rbbi), mah̬ aylliġ tram a-twrrim-daġ tgm ismgan i-larwaḥ-an lli-ur-ginin yat ula ẓḍarn ad-skrn yat?
han twrrim ġilad ar-tskarm f-uwssan l-lɛid-nsn d-iyrn-nsn d-izmaz-nsn d-isggʷasn-nsn.
ha-yyi usiġ fllawn taġuft. izd bla lfaytt ad-h̬dmġ nhatafġ ġ-gratun?
way-aytma, ḍalbġ zġ-gigun a-didi-tbiddm ġmklli-bdda-didun-tbddadġ. ġayd izrin ur-jju-gigi-tskirm kra yʷh̬šnn.
tssnm izd f-ssibt n-mad-uḍnġ a-f-n-darun-uškiġ ġ-isizwar, awiġ-awn-in lh̬bar ifulkin.
wah̬h̬a fllawn tšqa-tmaḍunt-inu, ur-iyi-tḥgirm ula trurm-iyi, walaynni tšškšmm-iyi-n s-darun tfrḥm sri zund iġ-giġ yal-lmalak zġ-dar rbbi, zund-nnit iġ-giġ lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ma-s-iggʷra lfrḥ-nnun lli-s-sri-tfrḥm? ssnġ ġ-uwssan-an mrad is-tẓḍarm a-tssukfm alln-nnun ikun tfkam-iyi-tnt.
imma ġilad is-iyi-tgam d-unuwwaš-nnun f-ssibt n-mad-awn-nniġ lḥqq?
mddn-an ar-tt-gigun-tawin bahra, walaynni urd f-kra ifulkin. ur-rin abla a-kʷn-didi-ssngaran, baš a-stt-gisn-ttawim ġir ntni.
išwa a-stti-tawim ġ-kra, iġ-iga kra ifulkin. išwa-bdda, zund iġ-n-didun-lliġ zund iġ-fllawn-aggugġ.
wa-tarwa-nu ɛzzanin, ha-yyi ġilad giġ zund tamġart lli-ra-yaru, izri-flla-ungaẓ n-tlalit-nnun ard gigun timġur-tḥkimt l-lmasiḥ.
amar yufan a-n-didun-iliġ ġilad, sawlġ-awn f-wawal yaḍni. hati usiġ fllawn taġuft bahra.
wa-kunni lli-iran a-tskarm kullu s-ššrɛ, ra-kʷn-sqsaġ f-ššrɛ: is-ur-tssinm ma-gis-ityaran?
imla-yaġ f-ibrahim is-dars sin tarwa, yan turu-t-tsmgt-ns d-yan turu-t-tmġart-ns.
yus n-tsmgt, turu-t ġmklli tarunt-tutmin, imma yus n-tmġart-ns, turu-t f-ssibt n-yan-wawal lli-inna rbbi i-ibrahim.
mayd ijran, tlla-yas yat lmɛna intln. ašku snat-tmġarin-an rwasnt i-sin id-lɛhd. h̬talli yurun ismgan, tga lmɛna-ns zund lɛhd n-ššrɛ lli-ityawskarn ġ-udrar n-sina. nttat tga tismgt hajar.
tga lmɛna n-hajar zund adrar n-sina lli-illan ġ-tmazirt n-waɛrabn, tg zund tamdint n-urušalim d-imzdġn-ns lli-ganin ismgan.
imma tayyaḍ tga zund urušalim yaḍni lli-igan tin ignna. nttat tga innatnnġ sara, ur-akkʷ-tgi tismgt.
ašku ityara: «wa-tamġart lli-ur-jju-yurun, wa-kmmi lli-f-ur-jju-izri-ungaẓ, nkr ġilad tfrḥt ar-tssġrutt. ašku kmmi lli-n-ifl-urgaz ra-tarut uggʷar n-talli iṭṭafn argaz.»
kunni ay-aytma, tgam zund isḥaq, tlulm f-ssibt n-wawal n-rbbi.
walaynni ġmklli inkr ġwalli iluln zund kullu mddn ar-issrfufun ġwalli iluln s-rruḥ n-rbbi, ġmkan ad-skarn mddn ula ġilad.
ma-ittini-warra n-rbbi? ar-ittini: «ssmsr tismgt nttat d-yus, ašku yus n-tsmgt ur-ra-iṭṭaf taġamt ġ-lwrt n-babas. ra-ig lwrt kullut win yus n-talli igan tamġart bla iskraf.»
imma ġilad ay-aytma, ma-ra-nini? urd tarwa n-tsmgt a-nga, walaynni nga tarwa n-tmġart lli-ur-jju-dar iskraf.
irẓm-aġ lmasiḥ baš a-ur-sul-ng ismgan i-yat. biddat ġilad tzgam a-ur-twrrim-daġ s-iskraf n-tsmugit.
sfldat-iyi nkki bulus, rad-awn-iniġ: iġ-tram a-ttġusm s-tẓallit n-ddat ur-rad-awn-yili yat ġ-lmasiḥ.
ra-t-iniġ-daġ s-lmɛqul i-kullu wanna iran a-iẓẓall i-ddat-ns, iġ-tskrt ġmkan iqqan-k-id a-bdda-tskart s-kullu ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ.
wa-kunni lli-ittirin a-trḍum rbbi s-ššrɛ, hati tssngaram ih̬f-nnun d-lmasiḥ, twrrim tḍrm zġ-lbaraka-ns.
imma nkkʷni nssn is-ra-fllannġ-irḍu rbbi f-ssibt n-ma-numn s-lmasiḥ. ġmkad a-iga rrja iṣḥan lli-aġ-ifka rruḥ lqudus.
ašku yan igan win lmasiḥ, han taẓallit n-ddat ur-dars-tgi yat, zund iġ-as-iẓẓulla zund iġ-as-ur-iẓẓulli. ašku illa dars mad-bahra-yufn mayan. hati yumn s-lmasiḥ, iɛmmr s-lḥnant-ns.
tkkam-ttin ar-ttzayadm ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ. imma ġilad ma-kʷn-iḥṣarn a-ur-sul-tskarm s-lḥqq?
iswingimn-an ur-d-kkin rbbi lli-awn-iġran,
walaynni tah̬mirt idrusn a-issktayn lɛjin iggutn.
imma nkki umnġ gigun is-ur-ra-tsflidm s-kra n-uswingim yaḍni, ašku win siditnnġ a-tgam. ra-iḥkam ntta f-walli-awn-tt-issṭiyyrn, wanna ra-ig-iyt.

way-aytma, urd nkkin a-ittinin i-mddn «iqqan-kʷn-d a-tẓẓallm i-ddat-nnun». mayad a-f-a-yyi-sul-ssrfufunn. ašku mrad is-a-yasn-ttiniġ ġmkan, ur-ra-yyi-itẓi yan ġakud nna-tbrraḥġ f-uggjdi l-lmasiḥ.
imma mddn-an lli-kʷn-issndudiyn, amar yufan ad-bbin igiwal-nsn kullut.
way-aytma, iġra-yawn rbbi a-trẓmm zġ-iskraf. walaynni a-ur-ttinim «ntyawrẓam ġilad, nẓḍar a-nskar aynna ira ih̬f-nnġ.» ašku illa fllawn a-ttḥnnum ar-ttqasam i-ngratun.
hati tmun-d lmɛna n-ššrɛ kullutt ġ-yan-wawal ar-ittini: «a-ttirit adjar-nnk zund ih̬f-nnk.»
walaynni iġ-a-ttlbaym i-ngratun ar-tšttam tifiyi n-ingratun, han ra-thlkm i-ngratun.
walaynni rad-awn-iniġ, skarat-bdda s-mad-awn-imala rruḥ lqudus bla-da-tswingimm ġ-ma-ittiri ih̬f-nnun.
ašku ul n-bnadm ar-ittiri ma-ur-ittiri rruḥ lqudus, ula rruḥ lqudus ar-ittiri ma-ur-ittiri-uwl n-bnadm. hatni ar-gigun-tmmaġn aylliġ ur-a-tskarm ma-ttirim.
walaynni iġ-a-tskarm mad-awn-imala rruḥ lqudus, ur-ra-sul-tqamam ġ-iskraf n-ššrɛ.
han iskkirn n-bnadm, nssn mamnk ad-gan. ar-tznun ar-tfsadn ar-tšthun i-ngratsn,
ar-tɛbadn ilahat n-ddunit-ad ar-skarn ssiḥr, ar-tkrhun ar-tẓin ar-tnuwwašn ar-tbzagn f-ingratsn, ar-ttirin ad-agʷrn wiyyaḍ, ar-tmmaġn d-wanna ur-zgisn-igin, ar-rggmn wanna ur-didsn-ibiddn,

ar-ttirin ad-amẓn ma-ur-igin winsn, ar-tnufuln s-tissi ar-tmunun f-tillay-nsn ʷh̬šnnin, kullu iskkirn-ad d-ma-tn-irwasn. rad-awn-iniġ s-lmɛqul ġmklli-awn-nniġ ġayd izrin, ġwilli skarnin ġmkan ur-rad-kšmn s-tgldit n-rbbi.
imma lġllt n-rruḥ tga lḥnant d-lfrḥ d-lhna d-ṣṣbr, ar-ntɛawan wiyyaḍ ar-didsn-ntfulki ar-didsn-ntbddad
ar-didsn-ntrh̬u ar-bdda-nqqʷay ġ-ih̬f-nnġ. hati wan tiġawsiwin-ad, ur-illi kra n-ššrɛ tnt-yagʷin.
ašku kullu wanna igan win lmasiḥ yasuɛ, iga ih̬f-ns d-wad immutn f-uggjdi baš a-gis-immt kullu ma-ittiri bnadm i-ih̬f-ns ula kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn.
imma ġilad ġ-nddr s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus, illa fllannġ a-nskar s-mad-aġ-imala rruḥ lqudus.
a-ur-nssimġur ih̬f-nnġ ula-da-ntẓi d-yan ula-da-nttiri ma-igan win wiyyaḍ.

way-aytma, iġ-n-tufam kra n-yan iḍr ġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn, illa fllawn kunni lli-ġ-tlla lġllt n-rruḥ lqudus a-dids-tsawlm s-lḥnant trarm-t s-uġaras. walaynni awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun, a-ur-tḍrm ula kunni.
tmɛawanat i-ngratun ġ-aynna fllawn iẓẓayn. ġmkad a-s-ra-tssafawm luṣit l-lmasiḥ.
walaynni iġ-illa ma-iġaln is-iga kra, hati isskarks f-ih̬f-ns, ašku ur-igi yat.
illa f-kud yan a-iswingim ġ-ma-iskar baš a-iẓr is-ifulki nġd uhu. iġ-ifulki rad-as-yili ma-s-a-itfraḥ d-ih̬f-ns bla-da-itmnad ġ-mad-skarn wiyyaḍ.
ašku kud yan ra-yasi ma-t-id-yuškan.
kullu wanna itlmadn awal n-rbbi, illa fllas a-yaṭṭu lh̬ir nna-dars-illan d-umslmd-ns.
ad-ur-tjlum ih̬f-nnun. ur-iẓḍar yan a-stt-izzri f-rbbi.
amud nna-n-tluḥm, nttan a-ra-tmgrm. yan iskarn s-ma-ittiri-uwl n-bnadm, zġ-uwl-ns a-zġ-ra-imgr lmut. imma yan iskarn s-ma-ittiri rruḥ lqudus, zġ-rruḥ a-zġ-ra-imgr tudrt idumn.
a-ur-ntrmay ġ-ufulki-ad nskar, ašku ra-nmgr ṣṣabt ġ-uzmz-ns iġ-ur-nhruṣṣi.
illa fllannġ a-nskar afulki ġ-kullu mddn ġakud nna-nufa, s-uggʷar ġ-aytmatnnġ lli-umnnin s-lmasiḥ.
ẓrat mnšk ayd-s-mqqurnt tirra-yad-awn-in-uriġ nkki s-ufus-inu.
imma ġwilli-awn-ittinin a-tẓẓallm i-ddat, ran ntni ad-rḍun mddn s-ma-igan win ddat, baš a-ur-rfufnn f-ssibt n-uggjdi l-lmasiḥ.
imma ayt-tẓallit-an, ula ntni ur-a-skarn kullu ma-ityaran ġ-ššrɛ, walaynni ar-gigun-ttirin a-tẓẓallm i-ddat baš ad-alġn ih̬f-nsn f-ma-ityawskarn i-ddat-nnun.
imma nkki ur-rad-alġġ abla aggjdi n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ. ašku s-uggjdi l-lmasiḥ a-s-mmutġ i-ddunit, immt-iyi ma-igan win ddunit.
imma taẓallit n-ddat ur-tgi yat, zund iġ-as-tẓẓullam zund iġ-as-ur-tẓẓullim. walaynni taġawsa ihiyyan a-stt-igan tudrt l-ljdid lli-darun-illan.
ad-awn-tili sslamt n-rbbi d-rrḥmt-ns i-kullu winna skarnin s-tnbaṭṭ-ad, a-tn-igan d-ayt-rbbi n-ṣṣaḥt.
imma ġilad, ḍalbġ-awn a-ur-sul-izayd yan i-tkrrayin-inu. ašku ibrrayn-ad usiġ ġ-ddat-inu, ntni timitar n-yasuɛ ad-gan.
a-gigun-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ay-aytma. amin.
zġ-bulus arqqas l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġmklli ira rbbi. i-imẓlayn n-rbbi ġ-tmdint n-afsus lli-zganin ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ar-bahra-ntalġ rbbi babas n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ašku ibark-aġ f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ s-kullu lbarakat n-rruḥ lli-llanin ġ-tgldit n-ignna.
lliġ ur-ta-ih̬lq ddunit, iẓli-aġ d-lmasiḥ baš a-ng wins, nġus ġ-iẓri-ns zġ-kullu ma-igan lɛib. iḥnnu ginnġ
iqṣad ad-aġ-ig d-tarwa-ns f-uwdm n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ. ġmkan a-ira, irḍu srs.
ar-t-bahra-ntalġ f-lḥnant-ad iggutn lli-s-aġ-ibark f-uwdm n-yus iɛzzan
lli-aġ-ifran zġ-lhalak s-idammn-ns, issitti fllannġ ddnub-nnġ. matta ġunškad s-tggut lḥnant n-rbbi lli-s-aġ-ibark,
ula tawassna-yad d-tḥkimt-ad lli-aġ-d-issbayyn.
ašku issbayyn-aġ-d taġawsa-yad intln, iml-aġ-d ma-ira a-iskr irḍu srs iqṣad-t f-ufus l-lmasiḥ,
yiri a-t-issafu ġ-isiggʷra n-ddunit. hati ra-issmun kullu ma-illan ġ-ignna ula ġ-ddunit, ig-t kullu ġ-ddu-ufus l-lmasiḥ.
rbbi iẓli-aġ d-lmasiḥ ula nkkʷni baš a-ng mddn-ns, ġmklli iqṣad nttan lli-bdda-iskarn ma-ira ġ-kullu ma-ijrrun.
iẓli-aġ baš a-d-ginnġ-iban lmjd-ns, nkkʷni lli-izwarn is-n-nga rrja-nnġ ġ-lmasiḥ.

ula kunni, twrrim tgam wins lliġ-kʷn-in-ilkm-wawal l-lḥqq, a-t-igan d-lh̬bar ifulkin lli-s-tnjmm. lliġ tumnm s-lmasiḥ ityawfka-yawn rruḥ lqudus lli-f-inna rbbi ra-t-ifk i-mddn-ns, baš a-tissanm izd wins a-tgam.
iga tamatart n-is-ra-issafu rbbi kullu timih̬ar lli-f-inna ra-tnt-ifk i-mddn-ns. matta ġunškad s-iggut lmjd n-rbbi, ar-t-ntalġ bahra.
f-mayad a-f-a-bdda-fllawn-tškarġ rbbi, ašku sfldġ f-mamnk a-tumnm s-siditnnġ yasuɛ, ɛzzan darun imẓlayn n-rbbi kullutn. ġakud nna-tẓallaġ ar-kʷn-d-swingimġ,
ar-tḍalabġ babatnnġ imqqurn lli-igan rbbi n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ad-awn-yakka rruḥ n-tḥkimt d-twassna baš a-ti-tissanm ġmklli iga.
ar-ti-tḍalabġ a-irẓm alln l-lɛaql-nnun, baš a-tissanm ma-iga rrja-yad iṣḥan lli-mi-kʷn-iẓli, ula lbarakat ggutnin lli-ra-ifk i-imẓlayn-ns,
ula taḥkimt-ns lli-bahra-ginnġ-itjhhdn nkkʷni lli-srs-yumnn. ašku taḥkimt lli-ginnġ-illan, tga-t-tḥkimt itjhhdn
lli-s-d-issnkr lmasiḥ zġ-lmut, issgawr-t f-ufasiy-ns ġ-tattuyt n-tgldit n-ignna
f-uflla n-kullu lmalayka ula larwaḥ ula ssulṭat ula lquwwat, ig ism-ns f-uflla n-kraygatt ism ġ-ddunit ula lih̬rt.
ig-t d-ugayyu f-kullu ma-illan, isrs kullu ma-illan ġ-ddu iḍarn-ns s-lh̬ir n-umnaggar n-willi ganin wins.
amnaggar iga ddat l-lmasiḥ, d-nttan a-ġ-a-itkmmal lmasiḥ lli-itkmmaln kullu ma-illan ġ-kraygatt mani.
imma kunni ġayd izrin tgam zund iġ-tmmutm i-ma-igan win rbbi, f-ssibt n-ddnub-nnun ula kullu ma-tskarm yʷh̬šn.
tkkam-ttin ar-ttidum ġ-uġaras n-ddunit-ad, ar-ttḍfarm lquwwa yʷh̬šnn lli-itjhhdn ġ-ignwan. tga rruḥ lli-itḥkamn ġilad ġ-ġwilli ur-sflidnin s-rbbi.

nkka-ttin kullwaġ ar-didsn-nttidu ġ-uġaras-an ar-nskar s-kullu ma-ira bnadm i-ih̬f-ns ar-tt-ntawi ġir ġ-iswingimn-nnġ ula ššhwat-nnġ. ula nkkʷni ġ-uwssan-an, illa fllannġ lġaḍab n-rbbi zund kullu mddn.
imma rbbi, tggut dars rrḥmt, iḥnnu ginnġ s-lḥnant-ns iggutn,
issddr-aġ d-lmasiḥ ġakud lliġ sul nmmut ġ-ddnub-nnġ. hati s-lḥnant n-rbbi a-s-tnjmm.
issnkr-aġ-d yall-aġ d-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, issgawr-aġ dids ġ-tgldit n-ignna,
baš a-iml, ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, mnšk a-s-bahra-tggut lḥnant-ns lli-s-aġ-ibark f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
hati f-lḥnant-ns a-f-tnjmm lliġ srs tumnm. urd f-ssibt n-kra tskarm kunni, walaynni tga tawafka ifka-yawn-tt rbbi.
urd f-ssibt n-ifulkitn-nnun, baš a-ur-yalġ yan ih̬f-ns.
ašku rbbi ad-aġ-iskrn ġmkan, ig-aġ d-win lmasiḥ yasuɛ baš a-ntnawal ifulkitn lli-aġ-zwar-ijjujad a-tn-nskar.
swingimad-d ma-tgam ġayd izrin, kunni lli-ur-igin zġ-ayt-rbbi. ar-awn-ttinin ‹ġwilli ur-ẓẓullinin› ašku ur-a-ttẓallam i-ddat-nnun zund ntni.
ur-ta-tssinm lmasiḥ ġ-uwssan-an, tilim ġ-brra n-ayt-rbbi lli-iẓli ad-gn mddn-ns. ur-darun taġamt ġ-id-lɛhd lli-s-a-yasn-imala ma-rad-asn-iskr. ur-darun rrja, ula tssnm rbbi ġ-ddunit.
imma ġilad issakmur-kʷn-d s-dars f-ssibt l-lmut l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, kunni lli-sttin ikkan taggugm-n.
ašku iskr lmasiḥ sslamt ġ-gr ayt-rbbi d-ayt-tmizar yaḍni, irar sin ad-gn yan, issḍr aġʷrab n-taẓit lli-tn-issngaran.
issitti ššrɛ s-luṣiyat-ns ula lfrayḍ-ns, baš a-issmun sin-ad s-sslamt, iskr zġ-gisn yat tasut l-ljdid lli-ra-ig tins.
ġmkan a-s-iskr sslamt ġ-gratnnġ kullwaġ d-rbbi s-lmut-ns f-uggjdi, a-ur-sul-tili taẓit i-ngratnnġ.
lliġ-d-yuška lmasiḥ yawi-d lh̬bar n-sslamt i-kunni lli-n-aggugnin, wala i-nkkʷni lli-srs-akmurnin.
f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ a-f-nẓḍar ġilad a-kullu-nkšm s-dar rbbi babatnnġ s-yan-rruḥ lli-ginnġ-illan kullwaġ.
ur-sul-tgim ibrraniyn ula iġribn, ašku teṭṭafm ula kunni ġilad taġamt ġ-gr imẓlayn n-rbbi, tgm zġ-ayt-tgmmi n-rbbi
lli-ibnnu f-llsas n-irqqasn d-lanbiya, ig lmasiḥ yasuɛ aẓru imqqurn n-uġẓu.
nttan a-d-issmunn iẓran, ar-srsn-ibnnu yat-tgmmi n-tẓallit ttyawẓlay i-siditnnġ.
ula kunni ar-srun-ibnnu baš a-kullu-ng yat-tgmmi, izdġ gis rruḥ n-rbbi.
mayan a-f-a-fllawn-tḍalabġ rbbi, nkki bulus lli-igan aḥbbas f-ism l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ f-ssibt n-twuri lli-skarġ ġ-gratun kunni n-tmizar yaḍni.
is-ur-tsfldm f-mamnk ad-iyi-ifk rbbi lbaraka-yad baš ad-awn-tt-in-sslkmġ s-darun kunni?
imla-yyi-d taġawsa-yad lli-intln kullu ġayd izrin, uriġ-awn-in fllas kra ġ-tbrat-ad.
iġ-tġram maylli uriġ ra-tissanm taġawsa-yad l-lmasiḥ ġmklli-stt-fhmġ nkki.
trgs f-kullu tasutin lli-zrinin, imma ġilad issbayyn-aġ-tt-id rbbi s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus i-ġwid iẓli ad-gn irqqasn-ns ula lanbiya-ns.
iml-aġ-d lh̬bar ifulkin n-is-rad-kšmn ayt-tmizar yaḍni ġ-lbarakat n-ayt-rbbi ula ġ-umnaggar n-willi ganin wins, amẓn ula ntni kullu ma-inna rbbi rad-aġ-t-ifk f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ibark-iyi rbbi ifk-iyi ad-skarġ tawuri-ad l-lh̬bar ifulkin s-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn lli-gigi-illan.
wah̬h̬a mẓẓiġ bahra ġ-gr kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi, ifka-yyi lbaraka-yad ad-tbrraḥġ i-ayt-tmizar n-ddunit f-tmih̬ar l-lmasiḥ lli-ugʷrnin kullu iswingimn n-bnadm.
ifk-iyi ad-malaġ i-kullu mddn taġawsa-yad ihiyyan lli-fllasn-intln kullu ġayd izrin, iqṣad-stt rbbi lli-ih̬lqn kullu ma-illan.
ašku ġilad f-ufus n-umnaggar n-imẓlayn-ns a-f-ira rbbi a-issbayyn i-ssulṭat ula lquwwat n-ignwan mnšk a-bahra-tggut-tḥkimt-ns
lli-s-ikmml f-ufus l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ siditnnġ maylli iqṣad zġ-isizwar.
f-ssibt n-ma-iskr lmasiḥ ula f-ssibt n-ma-srs-numn a-f-nẓḍar a-n-nakmur s-rbbi ġilad bla-da-ntḥšam ula-da-ntiksaḍ.
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, a-kʷn-ur-tigʷraẓ f-urfufn-ad ġ-a-zrayġ f-ssibt-nnun, ašku ar-t-zzrayġ baš ad-awn-ig lh̬ir kunni.
mayan a-f-ḍrġ f-ifaddn-inu ġ-lgddam n-rbbi babatnnġ.
nttan a-ifkan ism-ad-ns ‹babatnnġ› i-kullu-winna dar tarwa ġ-ignna ula ġ-ddunit.
ḍalbġ-t ad-awn-yakka zġ-tmih̬ar l-lmjd-ns, issdus-kʷn ġ-ugʷns-nnun s-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rruḥ-ns,
baš a-izdġ lmasiḥ ġ-uwl-nnun ġmklli srs tumnm. ḍalbġ-t a-kʷn-iẓẓu ġ-lḥnant izzga-kʷn gis,
baš a-tiẓḍarm a-tfhmm, kunni ula kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi, mnšk a-s-tusɛa tiġzzif tattuy tdru lḥnant l-lmasiḥ,
tssḥssum ġ-uwl-nnun s-lḥnant-ns lli-bahra-yugʷrn tawassna n-bnadm, ard twrrim tɛmmrm kullu s-ufulki n-rbbi.
imma ġilad a-nalġ rbbi lli-iẓḍarn a-iskr uggʷar n-kullu ma-nḍalb ula kullu ma-nswingim s-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn lli-ginnġ-illan.
ad-as-yili lmjd ġ-umnaggar ula ġ-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġ-kud tasut n-tasutin, ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.
imma ġilad ra-kʷn-ḍalbġ bahra, nkki-ad igan aḥbbas f-ism n-siditnnġ. ḍalbġ-kʷn a-tskarm ġmklli illa f-willi iẓli rbbi ad-gn wins.
ẓẓimẓayat ih̬f-nnun ar-ttrh̬um ar-ttṣbarm ar-ttḥnnum i-ngratun.
skarat kullu baš a-bdda-tgm yan ġ-tamunt n-sslamt lli-s-kʷn-d-issmun rruḥ lqudus.
yat-ddat a-tgam, yili gigun yan rruḥ, ġmklli darun yan rrja lli-mi-kʷn-iẓli rbbi.
yili yan siditun ula yan-uġaras lli-s-tumnm ula yan-udum lli-s-tddmm ġ-waman.
yili yan rbbi babas n-kraygatt yan, ar-kʷn-itgabal, ar-srun-iskar afulki, ar-gigun-itbarak kullukn.
kraygatt yan ginnġ, ttyawfka-yas kra l-lbaraka s-unšk lli-tlla-twafka l-lmasiḥ.
ġmklli ityaran: «ġakud lliġ yattuy s-tattuyt, yawi dids ġwilli inra, ifk lbarakat i-mddn.»
walaynni mad-aġ-imla-wawal-ad ‹yattuy›? imla-yaġ f-lmasiḥ is-igguz zwar s-tdrut n-wakal.
ašku ġwalli-d-igguzn a-igan ġwalli yattuyn tigira s-iggi n-ignwan baš a-ikmml kullu ma-illan ġ-kraygatt mani.
nttan a-ifkan i-kra ginnġ ad-gn irqqasn-ns, ifk i-wiyyaḍ ad-sawaln s-mad-asn-imala rbbi, ifk i-wiyyaḍ ad-tbrraḥn s-lh̬bar ifulkin, ifk i-wiyyaḍ ad-tgabaln ar-sslmadn mddn-ns
baš ad-iẓḍarn kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi ad-qasan tawuri n-rbbi ar-ssdusn ddat l-lmasiḥ.
ġmkad a-s-rad-kullu-ntzayad ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ ard nwrri ng yan, nissan yus n-rbbi ġmklli iga, nwrri nimġur zund lmasiḥ s-tmuġra-ns ikmmln.
ur-sul-ra-ng zund tarwa mẓẓinin, ar-tn-itawi-waḍu n-kraygatt almmud l-ljdid, ar-jllun s-lḥilat n-imġḍarn lli-stt-zzraynin f-mddn s-tkrkas.
illa fllannġ a-nttini lḥqq s-lḥnant, ar-ntimġur ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ lli-igan ih̬f-nnġ.
nttan a-iḥkamn ġ-ddat ar-izddi igzman-ns ar-tn-issmyalla, kraygatt agzzum ġ-illiġ ira. ġmkad a-s-ra-ttimġur ddat ar-ttdus s-lḥnant iġ-a-iskar kraygatt agzzum ġmklli-t-id-iqqann.
imma ġilad ra-kʷn-uṣṣaġ s-ism n-siditnnġ, iniġ-awn a-ur-sul-tskarm zund ġwilli ur-ssinnin rbbi. ntni jlan-tn iswingimn-nsn bahra,
illas lɛaql-nsn. aggugn-in f-tudrt n-rbbi, ašku iqqur ih̬f-nsn iqar-uwl-nsn.
wrrin ur-sul-a-tḥšamn ġ-yat. ar-skarn kullu mad-rant ššhwat-nsn, ar-zzrayn ussan-nsn ġ-ma-iɛibn, ar-ttirin a-tzayadn ġir ġ-iskkirn-nsn ʷh̬šnnin.
imma kunni, urd ġmkan a-tlmdm f-lmasiḥ.
ašku ssnġ is-tsfldm bahra f-yasuɛ, tlmdm lḥqq ġmklli-t-id-issbayyn ntta.
tlmdm is-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣa a-tbddlm zġ-ugʷns-nnun, a-ur-sul-tgm ġmklli tgam ġayd izrin lliġ ttin-tkkam ar-tskarm ma-ira ih̬f-nnun, tġalm is-išwa, ur-tssinm is-a-kʷn-itawi s-lhalak.
tlmdm is-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣa a-tadjm rbbi a-kʷn-iskr zġ-ljdid ġ-kullu ma-ttirim ula ma-tswingimm,
baš a-twrrim tgm mddn l-ljdid. ašku iskr-kʷn rbbi zġ-ljdid baš a-tfulkim ġmklli ifulki ntta, ar-tskarm kullu ma-t-itrḍun.
mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, kkisat fllawn kullu tikrkas. illa f-kud yan a-isawal d-gʷmas s-lḥqq, ašku nga kullwaġ yan ġ-ddat l-lmasiḥ.
iġ-tqlaqlm a-ur-tadjm ġayan a-kʷn-idḥi ard tskrm kra yʷh̬šnn. ssittiyat aqlaqal-an ur-ta-n-tḍr tafukt,
baš a-ur-tadjm i-iblis manizġ a-n-srun-ikšm.
imma wanna igan amh̬h̬ar, ih̬ṣṣa-t a-ur-sul-itakʷr. yili fllas a-igr ġ-kra n-twuri, ih̬dm s-ifassn-ns ġ-kra išwan, baš a-dars-yili ma-yakka i-willi ur-dar yat.
a-ur-tadjm kra n-iwaliwn ʷh̬šnnin a-tkkan infurn-nnun. sawalat s-iwaliwn šwanin lli-ra-iɛawn ġwilli sflidnin ġ-maylli ḥtajjan, awin-asn-d lbaraka.
a-ur-tti-tssṭiyyarm i-rruḥ lqudus n-rbbi lli-awn-ifka baš a-ig tamatart n-is-tgam wins ar-d-iruḥ-wass lli-ġ-ra-kʷn-ifukku zġ-ddunit-ad.
a-ur-ttẓim ula-da-ttmmaġm ula-da-ttkrhum yan. a-ur-trggmm ula-da-ttġuwwatm ula-da-ttnuwwašm ġ-yan.
illa fllawn a-ttḥnnum ar-ttfulkim ar-ttṣamaḥm i-ngratun ġmklli-awn-iṣamḥ rbbi f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ.
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, ḍfurat rbbi ġ-ma-iskar, ġmklli illan f-tarwa-ns ɛzzanin.
tḥnnwat ġ-kullu mddn ġmklli ginnġ iḥnna lmasiḥ, isrs ih̬f-ns ġ-lgddam n-rbbi f-ssibt-nnġ zund yat-tġrsi ijddrn s-tujjut imimn.
walaynni a-ur-darun-yili ma-yaddrn lfsad ula ššhwat ʷh̬šnnin ula illa ma-isawaln f-ma-ira a-issmun i-ih̬f-ns. ur-yukʷi i-imẓlayn n-rbbi ad-sawaln s-ġmkan.
anfat i-ijrman ula tajmmaɛt ih̬wan ula taḍṣa f-ma-iɛibn. ur-tšwi-tjmmaɛt f-wan ġayan, walaynni ra-išwu iġ-a-bdda-ttškarm rbbi.

ašku iqqan-kʷn-d a-tissanm is-ur-ra-tili taġamt ġ-tgldit l-lmasiḥ d-rbbi i-yan itfsadn nġd yan iskarn s-ššhwat lli-ʷh̬šnnin nġd yan ittirin a-issmun ma-iggutn i-ih̬f-ns. ašku yan ittirin ayda iggutn, iga zund iġ-a-itɛbad ilahat n-ddunit-ad.
a-ur-tadjm yan a-kʷn-ijlu s-iwaliwn h̬wanin, ašku f-ssibt l-lh̬ʷšanat-an a-f-ra-iḍr lġaḍab n-rbbi f-willi srs rurnin tiġurdin-nsn.
anfat-bdda i-mddn zund ġwin.
ula kunni tkkam-ttin tllam ġ-tillas, imma ġilad twrrim tkšmm s-tifawt n-siditnnġ. skarat ġmklli-d-iqqann ayt-tifawt,
ašku ġ-tifawt a-ġ-tlla-tmgra n-ufulki d-lḥqq d-kullu ma-irḍan rbbi.
siggilat a-tissanm ma-itrḍun siditnnġ.
a-ur-tkšmm ġ-iskkirn h̬wanin n-ayt-tillas-an walaynni ššḥššamat-tn,
ašku ġaylli skarn ġ-tntla, ur-akkʷ-nri a-t-nbdr.
imma kullu ma-d-iffuġn zġ-tillas s-tifawt ra-d-iban ġmklli iga,
ula kraygatt kra-ġ-tsfaw tifawt ra-ifaw ula ntta. mayad a-f-a-nttini: «faq, a-ġwan iṭṭasn, tnkrd-d zġ-lmut ad-ak-yisfiw lmasiḥ.»
tawiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun a-bdda-tskarm ġmklli-d-iqqann ġwilli ssnnin ma-illan, urd zund ġwilli ur-ssinnin yat.
skarat afulki nna-mi-tufam kraygatt tasaɛt, ašku iggut ma-yʷh̬šnn ġ-uwssan-ad.
a-ur-tjlum d-ih̬f-nnun walaynni ẓrat ma-gigun-ittiri rbbi.
a-ur-tssnufulm ih̬f-nnun s-tissi lli-ithlakn mddn, walaynni tɛmmarat s-rruḥ lqudus
ar-tsawalm i-ngratun s-iwaliwn n-imurign n-rbbi ula tahlilat ula talġatin nna-yawn-imala rruḥ lqudus, ar-ttirirm ar-ttasim amarg i-siditnnġ zġ-uwlawn-nnun,
ar-bdda-ttškarm rbbi babatnnġ f-kraygatt kra s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
illa f-kud yan a-isflid s-wayyaḍ. ġmkad a-s-ra-ttuqqarm lmasiḥ.
wa-timġarin, sflidamt s-irgazn-nnunt ġmklli tsflidmt s-siditnnġ.
ašku argaz iga ih̬f n-tmġart, ġmklli iga lmasiḥ ih̬f n-umnaggar n-willi ganin wins. ig-umnaggar ddat l-lmasiḥ, ig ntta anjjam-ns.
hati illa f-tmġart a-bdda-tsflid s-urgaz-ns ġmklli isflid-umnaggar s-lmasiḥ.
imma kunni a-irgazn, tḥnnwat ġ-tmġarin-nnun, ġmklli iḥnna lmasiḥ ġ-umnaggar ifk tudrt-ns fllas
baš a-t-iẓli s-wawal-ns, issġus-t s-usird n-waman.
ġmkan a-iskr baš a-t-yawi zund yat-tslit ifulkin ġ-ur-tlli kra n-trkkut ula kra n-iniḍi ula kra igan zund ġayan, baš a-zgis-iskr amnaggar amẓlay s-lmjd iggutn bla gis illa kra yʷh̬šnn.
ġmkad a-s-illa f-urgaz a-itḥnnu ġ-tmġart-ns zund ddat-ns. ašku yan itḥnnun ġ-tmġart-ns, hati ih̬f-ns a-ġ-a-itḥnnu.
ur-illi ma-itkrhun ddat-ns, walaynni ar-tt-iššuša ar-tt-gis-itawi. ġmkad a-s-a-stt-itawi lmasiḥ ġ-umnaggar n-willi ganin wins.
imma nkkʷni nga igzman n-ddat-ns,
ġmklli ityaran: «mayan a-f-ra-ifl-urgaz babas d-innas imun d-tmġart-ns. hatnin sin rad-wrrin gn yan.»
awal-ad tlla gis yat lmɛna intln, ašku imla-yaġ f-tamunt l-lmasiḥ d-umnaggar-ns.
walaynni imla-yaġ-daġ is-illa f-kraygatt yan gigun a-bdda-itḥnnu ġ-tmġart-ns zund ih̬f-ns, yili f-tmġart a-bdda-tsflid s-urgaz-ns.
imma kunni a-tarwa mẓẓinin rad-awn-iniġ, skarat s-wawal n-ayt-darun ġmklli ira siditnnġ, ašku mayad iga lḥqq gigun.
ityara: «awi-tt ġ-babak d-innak.» luṣit-ad tga tamzwarut lli-f-inna rbbi ra-ibark ġwilli srs skarnin,
ašku izuyd inna: «baš ad-ak-yili lh̬ir, tġzzif tudrt-nnk f-wakal.»
imma kunni a-id-babatsn rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-tssqlaqalm tarwa-nnun, walaynni rbbat-tn s-ulmmud n-siditnnġ ar-asn-tmalam mamnk a-s-srs-skarn.
imma kunni a-ih̬ddamn rad-awn-iniġ, skarat s-wawal n-id-siditun n-ddunit-ad, ar-tn-ttuqqarm ar-ttadrm i-ih̬f-nnun ġ-lgddam-nsn. skarat s-iwaliwn-nsn s-nniyt n-uwl-nnun zund s-iwaliwn l-lmasiḥ.
a-ur-tskarm ġir baš a-kʷn-ẓrn mddn škrn-kʷn, walaynni h̬dmat ġmklli-d-iqqann ih̬ddamn l-lmasiḥ, ar-bdda-tskarm ma-ira rbbi s-nniyt-nnun.
h̬dmat s-lfrḥ zund iġd siditnnġ a-mi-tth̬damm urd bnadm,
tissanm is-ra-irar siditnnġ i-kraygatt yan f-ma-iskar ifulki, ig-iyt ismg nġd win ih̬f-ns.
imma kunni a-id-siditsn rad-awn-iniġ, skarat afulki i-ih̬ddamn-nnun bla-da-tn-tssiwidm. ašku tssnm is-illa yan ġ-ignna, iga siditsn ig siditun ula kunni, ur-a-iskar s-uwdmawn.
awal-inu iggʷran iga-t: dusat ġ-siditnnġ s-tdwast-ns itjhhdn.
asiyat kullu imqlad n-rbbi baš a-tiẓḍarm a-ttḍaḍḍam lḥilat n-iblis.
ašku urd bnadm a-d-ntmmaġ, walaynni larwaḥ ʷh̬šnnin ula ljnun tjhhdnin ula ssulṭat n-ignwan ula lquwwat n-tillas n-ddunit-ad.
mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, asiyat kullu imqlad n-rbbi, baš a-tiẓḍarm a-tbiddm tzgam ġ-wass yʷh̬šnn, tmmaġm ar isiggʷra sul tbiddm.
biddat ġilad tzgam. bkisat s-tagʷst l-‹lḥqq›, tgm i-idmarn-nnun abannk n-‹rrḍa n-rbbi›,
tqqnm i-iḍarn-nnun turẓiyin n-‹zzɛamt s-tbrraḥt l-lh̬bar n-sslamt›,
tasim tamsntlt n-‹ttiqa ġ-rbbi› lli-iẓḍarn a-n-fllawn-tḥṣar kullu iẓḍkan jddrnin lli-s-a-kʷn-ikkat iblis.
gat f-ih̬f-nnun asddul n-‹ujnjm›, tamẓm ġ-ufus-nnun taẓẓit n-‹wawal n-rbbi› lli-awn-ifka rruḥ lqudus,
ar-ttẓallam ġ-kraygatt luqt ġmklli-awn-imala rruḥ lqudus, ar-ttḍalabm rbbi f-kraygatt kra, trarm lɛaql bla-da-ttrmaym, ar-bdda-ti-ttḍalbm a-itɛawan kullu willi iẓli ad-gn wins.
ḍalbat rbbi flla ula nkki, ad-iyi-iml ma-rad-iniġ ġakud nna-sawalġ s-mddn, baš a-tbrraḥġ s-zzɛamt f-lh̬bar ifulkin i-willi ur-jju-fllas-sfldnin.
hati ġilad ‹amazan ġ-iskraf› ad-giġ f-ssibt l-lh̬bar-ad. ḍalbat rbbi a-yyi-iɛawn ad-sawlġ s-zzɛamt ġmklli-yyi-d-iqqann.
imma ġilad, uznġ-awn-in tih̬ikus. iga gʷmatnnġ iɛzzan, ig ah̬ddam ifulkin n-siditnnġ. rad-awn-yini kullu f-mamnk ad-giġ ula mad-skarġ.
mayad a-f-awn-t-in-uznġ, baš a-tissanm mamnk a-nga, izzɛam ulawn-nnun.
ad-awn-tili sslamt ay-aytma kullukn. ḍalbġ rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ad-awn-ifk a-ttḥnnum i-ngratun ar-ttamnm bahra.
a-tili lbaraka i-kullu willi ittirin siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ s-tayri idumn.
zġ-bulus d-timutaws, ih̬ddamn l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, i-kullu imẓlayn l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġ-tmdint n-filibbi ula ingabaln d-imɛawann-nnun.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ar-tškarġ rbbi-nu ġakud nna-fllawn-swingimġ.
ar-tfraḥġ ġakud nna-ti-tḍalabġ f-ssibt-nnun kullukn,
ašku ar-didi-ttmɛawanm ġ-twuri l-lh̬bar ifulkin zġ-wass amzwaru sul s-ġassad.
hati ssnġ mayad bahra: rbbi lli-gigun-igran afulki ra-t-issafaw ard ikmml ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-iwrri lmasiḥ yasuɛ.

iqqan-iyi-d a-gigun-swingimġ kullukn ġmkan, ašku usiġ-kʷn-bdda ġ-uwl-inu. lliġ a-tḥamaġ f-lh̬bar ifulkin ar-t-zzgaġ ġ-uwlawn n-mddn, ula ġilad ġ-tyamaẓġ iliġ ġ-iskraf, tkšmm didi kullukn ġ-lbaraka n-twuri-ad.
rbbi a-flla-igan inigi, yissan mamnk a-yyi-inqqa-umarg-nnun, ar-kʷn-ttiriġ s-tayri l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
imma ġilad ar-tḍalabġ rbbi ad-awn-issigat bahra lḥnant n-ingratun, ifk-awn a-tissanm kullu ma-igan win lḥqq ar-taṭṭum ma-išwan zġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn.
ġmkad a-s-ra-tiẓḍarm a-bdda-ttnawalm afulki, tġusm zġ-kullu ma-igan lɛib ula kullu ma-iššḥššamn mddn ar ass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk lmasiḥ.
rad-awn-tigat ṣṣabt n-ufulki lli-gigun-iskar yasuɛ lmasiḥ, iban gigun lmjd n-rbbi, alġn-t mddn f-ssibt-nnun.
way-aytma, riġ a-tissanm ġayad-iyi-ijran izuyd ġ-twassna l-lh̬bar ifulkin,
aylliġ ssnn kullu imh̬zniyn l-lqṣr d-wiyyaḍ ggutnin izd f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ a-f-tyamaẓġ.
ula aytmatnnġ, iggut gisn ma-iwrrin idus ġ-siditnnġ f-ssibt n-iskraf-inu. zɛmn bahra ar-tbrraḥn s-uggʷar s-wawal n-rbbi, ur-a-tiksaḍn yat.
ssnġ kra gisn ar-ttirin ad-zzwurn ssimġurn ih̬f-nsn, ġayan ka-f-a-tbrraḥn f-lmasiḥ. walaynni illa sul mad-dar-tlla nniyt iṣfan,
ar-tbrraḥn f-ssibt l-lḥnant lli-gisn-illan, ašku ssnn is-iyi-d-yiwi rbbi s-ġid baš ad-tḥamaġ f-lh̬bar ifulkin.
imma wiyyaḍ yaḍni urd s-uwl iṣfan a-s-a-tbrraḥn f-lmasiḥ, ašku ran ad-amẓn ġir kra i-ih̬f-nsn, irin ad-iyi-ssigatn tanukmut ġ-lḥbs.
imma nkki, ma-rad-iniġ? abla-ad-frḥġ iġ-a-sflidn mddn i-tbrraḥt f-lmasiḥ, ig-iyt f-imi n-ayt-sin-uwdmawn nġd wid dar ul iṣfan. hati rad-sul-frḥġ,
ašku mayd-iyi-ijran, ssnġ is-ra-zgis-njmġ tigira f-ssibt n-ma-flla-ttḍalabm rbbi ar-iyi-itɛawan rruḥ n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
iggut gigi rrja, iriġ bahra ad-skarġ kullu ma-yyi-d-iqqann s-zzɛamt iggutn, baš a-gigi-tban-tmuġra l-lmasiḥ ġilad zund kraygatt luqt, iġ-sulġ ula iġ-mmutġ.
ašku dari nkki: iġ-ddrġ, lmasiḥ a-igan tudrt-inu. iġ-mmutġ, rad-iyi-yili ma-yufn tudrt-ad.
ur-ssinġ manwa ra-gisn-iriġ, ašku iġ-sulġ ġ-ddat rad-iẓḍarġ ad-zaydġ ġ-twuri-ad ifulkin.
riġ mayad ula mayan s-sin. riġ bahra ad-ffuġġ ddunit-ad iliġ d-lmasiḥ, ašku ifulki mayan s-uggʷar.
walaynni f-ssibt-nnun ra-yaf ad-qamaġ ġ-ddat.
ssnġ bahra is-yuf ġmkad. rad-sulġ qamaġ didun kullukn baš a-ttzayadm ar-ttfraḥm ġ-uġaras n-siditnnġ.
ġmkad a-s-rad-bahra-ttfraḥm s-lmasiḥ yasuɛ f-ssibt-inu ġakud lliġ ra-n-daġ-darun-aškġ.

walaynni illa fllawn a-tskarm s-ma-d-imšaškan d-lh̬bar ifulkin l-lmasiḥ. ašku riġ a-bdda-fllawn-sflidġ is-kullu-tzgam ġ-yan-uġaras, iġ-d-fllawn-aggugġ nġd iġ-n-darun-uškiġ, ar-kullu-tth̬damm s-yat-tnbaṭṭ baš a-tsslmadm lḥqq l-lh̬bar ifulkin ġmklli iga
bla-da-ttiksaḍm zġ-willi-kʷn-ssrfufunnin. ġmkad a-s-rad-ẓrn is-llan ntni ġ-uġaras l-lhalak tilim kunni ġ-uġaras n-ujnjm, ašku rbbi a-ra-kʷn-ijjnjm.
ašku lliġ-awn-ifka a-tamnm s-lmasiḥ, ifka-yawn ula tarfufnt f-ssibt-ns.
tkšmm ula kunni s-imiġ lli-tẓram mmaġġ srs nkki, tsfldm ula ġilad is-a-sul-srs-tmmaġġ.
is-ur-tdusm tzɛmm f-ssibt n-ma-tgam win lmasiḥ? is-ur-a-kʷn-tssfjjij tayri-ns? is-ur-a-tssḥssam s-tamunt n-rruḥ-ns? is-ur-darun lḥnant ula lmḥbbt iggutn n-ingratun?
lliġ darun illa kullu mayan, ra-kʷn-ḍalbġ ad-iyi-tkmmlm lfrḥ-inu, tgm kullu yan ġ-iswingimn-nnun ula tayri-nnun, tmunm ġ-yan-uġaras, tmšaškam-d ġ-yat-tnbaṭṭ.
a-ur-tskarm kra f-a-tzzwurm ih̬f-nnun ula-da-ttirim a-tmlm is-tgam kra, walaynni ẓẓimẓayat ih̬f-nnun ar-bdda-ttggam wiyyaḍ d-ma-kʷn-yufn.
illa f-kud yan gigun a-ur-iswingim ġir ġ-ma-ira i-ih̬f-ns, walaynni a-iswingim ula ġ-ma-rad-irin wiyyaḍ.
illa fllawn a-tswingimm ġmklli iswingim lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
iga ntta ġmklli iga rbbi, walaynni ur-iġwi ġ-mayan a-n-sul-iqama ġmklli iga rbbi.
hati ifl-n kullu mad-dars-illan, iwrri ig zund ismg, ilul ġ-ṣṣurt n-bnadm.
lliġ iga s-ssift n-bnadm, yadr-d i-ih̬f-ns, iskr kullu ma-gis-ira rbbi aylliġ immut s-lmut išqan f-uggjdi.
f-mayan a-f-t-yull rbbi s-tattuyt n-ignna, ifk-as ism lli-yugʷrn kraygatt ism,
baš a-d-iknu kraygatt afud s-ism n-yasuɛ, ġ-ignna ula ġ-wakal ula ġ-ddu-wakal,
yini kraygatt ils: «yasuɛ lmasiḥ a-igan sidis n-kullu ma-illan.» ġmkad a-s-rad-kullu-uqqrn lmjd n-rbbi babatnnġ.

f-mayan a-f-ra-kʷn-uṣṣaġ ay-aytma ɛzzanin, ašku ssnġ is-tram a-tskarm ma-fllawn-illan, ġilad ġ-d-fllawn-aggugġ ġmklli-ti-tskarm ġakud lliġ-n-didun-lliġ. f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ: skarat kullu baš a-tssafum ajnjm lli-s-tnjmm, ar-bahra-ttuqqarm rbbi ar-bdda-stti-ttawim ġ-ma-ira ntta.
ašku rbbi a-bdda-gigun-iḥkamn baš a-ttirim ma-t-irḍan ar-srs-tskarm.
zaydat ġ-kullu mayad bla-da-ttngmugm ula-da-ttẓim,
baš a-tġusm bla gigun illa kra l-lɛib, tgm tarwa šwanin n-rbbi ġ-wammas n-tasut-ad yʷh̬šnn ijlan. ha-kunni zund itran ġ-ignwan a-s-a-tfawm ġ-wammas-nsn,
ar-asn-tmalam awal n-tudrt. mayan a-s-rad-srun-frḥġ bahra ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk lmasiḥ, ẓrġ is-urd bla lfaytt a-s-a-tazzalġ ar-tnhatafġ ġ-darun.
wah̬h̬a iġ-rad-ffin idammn-inu f-iggi n-twafka l-liman-nnun zund aman n-waḍil lli-tffin mddn f-twafkiw-nsn ġ-lgddam n-rbbi, ha-yyi rḍiġ s-mayan, frḥġ srun kullukn.
ula kunni illa fllawn a-srs-trḍum, tfrḥm didi.
ar-trjuġ ġ-siditnnġ yasuɛ ad-awn-in-aznġ timutaws ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn baš a-yyi-d-issfrḥ ula nkki s-kra l-lh̬bar zġ-darun.
ur-dari yan iswingimn zund nttan, ar-tt-itawi bahra ġ-mamnk a-tgam.
ašku kud yan ar-iswingim ġ-ma-igan wins, urd ma-igan win yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
imma kunni tssnm f-timutaws is-ifulki bahra, tissanm mamnk a-didi-ith̬dam zund arraw d-babas ġ-twuri l-lh̬bar ifulkin.
ar-trjuġ a-t-in-aznġ ġilad, walaynni ar-tqlġ ard ẓrġ ma-s-rad-iyi-tggʷru ġid.
ha-yyi tiqqnġ ġ-siditnnġ ra-n-aškġ ula nkki s-darun ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn.
swangmġ is-ra-yaf ad-awn-in-rarġ ula gʷmatnnġ abafruditus lli-didi-ith̬damn ar-itbddad ġ-tama-nu. iga amazan-nnun, tuznm-t-id a-yyi-iɛawn ġ-ma-yyi-ih̬ṣṣan.
ašku ar-t-inqqa-umarg-nnun kullukn, ṭiyyr-as lliġ issn is-tsfldm f-tmaḍunt-ns.
s-ṣṣaḥt yuḍn bahra aylliġ illa f-lmut, imma rbbi iḥnna gis. iḥnnu flla ula nkki lliġ-t-ijjujji, ikkis flla taġuft-an zġ-tġufiwin yaḍni.
mayad a-f-riġ ad-awn-t-in-aznġ ġilad baš a-ti-tẓrm tfrḥm dids, wala a-sul-asiġ taġuft-ns nkki.
šškšmat-t s-darun, tfrḥm srs bahra s-ism n-siditnnġ. talġat mddn zund ġwad,
ašku h̬da ur-immut f-ssibt n-twuri l-lmasiḥ. ur-iġwi ġ-tudrt-ns ašku ira a-yyi-itɛawan ġ-maylli mi ur-tẓḍarm kunni.
way-aytma, awal-inu iggʷran iga-t: «frḥat ġ-siditnnġ.» ur-flla-iẓẓay ad-awn-daġ-araġ mayad, walaynni ra-kʷn-iɛawn a-ur-tjlum.
rarat lɛaql zġ-ayt-iskkirn-an ʷh̬šnnin, ašku zund iḍan ad-gan, ar-tbbin ddat n-mddn.
imma ayt-tẓallit iṣḥan, a-tn-igan d-nkkʷni urd ntni. ar-ntɛbad rbbi s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ-ns, ar-ntzɛam f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ. ur-a-nbnnu f-ma-igan win ddat n-bnadm.
mrad is-riġ nkki, illa dari ġ-ddat-inu ma-f-a-bnnuġ. ašku iġ-illa kra n-yan iġaln is-dars kra-f-a-ibnnu f-iskkirn n-ddat, illa dari mayan s-uggʷar.
ẓẓullan-iyi ġ-wis tam-uwssan, gġ zġ-ayt-rbbi, zġ-tqbilt n-bnyamin, ar-sawalġ s-iwaliwn n-ayt-yudaya zġ-mẓẓiy-inu. kkiġ-ttin giġ afarisi, ar-skarġ s-ššrɛ kullut.
iɛzzu-dari-uġaras-an bahra, aylliġ a-ssrfufunġ ayt-umnaggar l-lmasiḥ. ar-skarġ kullu ma-flla-illan baš ad-trḍuġ rbbi s-ufulki lli-igan win ššrɛ.
walaynni kullu kra ḥasbġ iga-yyi afulki ġ-uwssan-an, ḥasbġ-t ġilad ur-igi yat f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ.

ḥasbġ kullu tiġawsiwin-an zund ur-gint yat, ašku tlla dari ġilad ma-tnt-yufn bahra, a-stt-igan d-twassna l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ lli-iwrrin iga sidi. f-ssibt-ns a-f-giġ tiġawsiwin-an d-irkan, flġ kullu ma-dari-illan baš ad-iyi-yili lmasiḥ,
gġ ula nkki wins. ur-sul-a-skarġ f-ad-trḍuġ rbbi s-iskkirn n-ššrɛ, walaynni irḍa flla f-ssibt n-mad-umnġ s-lmasiḥ. ašku ġmkad a-s-a-itrḍu rbbi f-kullu-willi srs umnnin.
imma ġilad riġ ad-issanġ lmasiḥ ula taḥkimt itjhhdn lli-t-id-issnkrn zġ-lmut, issanġ ula tamunt n-tmmariw-ns, iriġ ad-gġ zund nttan ġ-lmut-ns
ard nkrġ ula nkki zġ-gr willi mmutnin.
ur-nniġ izd nkkin a-iruḥn kullu mayad ula kmmlġ gis, walaynni ar-tzayadġ s-lgddam baš ad-amẓġ maylli-f-iyi-yumẓ lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
way-aytma, ur-nniġ is-t-umẓġ ġilad, walaynni yat-tġawsa kad-skarġ: ar-n-falġ ma-illan ġ-tġurdin, ar-ttiduġ s-ma-illan ġ-lgddam.
ar-tazzalġ ad-ruḥġ ttmi, baš ad-amẓġ lkas lli-igan tudrt n-uflla lli-s-iyi-d-iġra rbbi f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ih̬ṣṣa-yaġ a-nswingim ġmkan, kullu wanna ginnġ imqqurn ġ-uġaras n-rbbi. walaynni iġ-darun kra n-iswingimn yaḍni, rad-awn-iml rbbi tiġawsiwin-an ġmklli gant.
imma ġilad illa fllannġ a-bdda-nskar s-tnbaḍin lli-nlmd.
way-aytma, skarat kullukn zund nkki, tḍfurm ġwilli munnin d-uġaras lli-awn-nmla.
ašku nniġ-awn-t kigan d-twaliw, iniġ-awn-t-daġ ġilad s-imṭṭawn: iggut ma-iskarn zund iġ-ur-igi-uggjdi l-lmasiḥ yat.
rad-ggʷrun ntni s-lhalak, ašku ar-tɛbadn adis-nsn. ġaylli-s-a-tfraḥn a-ra-tn-iššḥššm, ašku ar-tsalan ġir ma-igan win ddunit-ad.
imma nkkʷni nga ayt-ignna. nga-n rrja-nnġ ġ-unjjam lli-ra-d-yašk zġ-ignna ar-srs-ntql, a-t-igan d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
nttan a-ra-irar ddat-nnġ n-wakal a-tg zund ddat-ns l-lmjd s-tḥkimt lli-s-iẓḍar a-ig kullu ma-illan ġ-ddu-ufus-ns.
way-aytma, tɛzzam dari bahra, ar-iyi-inqqa-umarg-nnun. kunni a-s-a-tfraḥġ, tgm ttaj n-ih̬f-inu. way-aytma ɛzzanin, illa fllawn a-tzgam ġmkan ġ-siditnnġ.
rad-ḍalbġ zġ-afudiyya, ḍalbġ ula zġ-sintih̬a, a-d-mšaškant i-ngratsnt ġ-tamunt n-siditnnġ.

ḍalbġ-k ula kiyi ay-amɛawn-inu ifulkin, a-tɛawnt timġarin-an. h̬dmnt ntnti ġ-twuri l-lh̬bar ifulkin ġ-tama-nu nkki d-klimantus d-imɛawann-inu yaḍni lli-mi-tyaran ismawn-nsn ġ-warra n-willi ṭṭafnin tudrt idumn.
frḥat-bdda ġ-siditnnġ. ra-t-daġ-iniġ, frḥat.
mlat i-kullu mddn mnšk a-illa ṣṣbr-nnun. hati yakmur-d siditnnġ.
a-ur-tasim taġuft f-kra, walaynni tẓẓallat ar-ttḍalabm rbbi f-kraygatt kra, ar-ti-ttškarm ar-as-ttinim f-aynna-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣan.
ġmkad a-s-rad-awn-tili sslamt n-rbbi lli-yugʷrn iswingimn n-bnadm, ra-tgabl ul-nnun ula lɛaql-nnun ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.

way-aytma, awal-inu iggʷran a-t-igan: a-tswingimm ġ-ma-igan lḥqq ula ma-ġ-illa ma-ttuqqarm ula ma-yʷġẓann ula ma-iġusn ula ma-imimn ula ma-išwan. iġ-illa kra ifulkin ula kra-ġ-illa ma-ttalġm, swingimat ġ-tġawsiwin-ad.
kullu ma-zgigi-tlmdm tamẓm-t tsfldm-as tẓrm-t gigi, skarat srs. ġmkad a-s-rad-bdda-didun-yili rbbi n-sslamt.
imma ġilad frḥġ bahra ġ-siditnnġ ašku twrrim ar-gigi-tswingimm. ssnġ is-a-bdda-gigi-tswingimm, walaynni ur-tẓḍarm a-tskrm kra ar ġilad.
urd f-ssibt n-ḥtajjaġ kra a-f-nniġ mayan, ašku lmdġ ad-qnɛuġ s-aynna-dari-illan.

iġ-dari-idrus ula iġ-dari-iggut, ssnġ ma-rad-skrġ. ašku lmdġ kra iɛzzan, issanġ mamnk ad-tqnaɛġ s-kullu kra-yyi-ijran. zund iġ-šbɛaġ tirmt zund iġ-qamaġ s-laẓ, zund iġ-dari ma-iggutn zund iġ-dari ma-idrusn.
ẓḍarġ i-kraygatt kra s-tdwast l-lmasiḥ lli-yyi-issdusn.
imma kunni, afulki ayd-gigi-tskrm ġilad ġ-didi-tbiddm ġ-tnukmut-inu.
tssnm kunni n-filibbi, ġakud lliġ ffuġġ tamazirt n-makiduniyya ġ-uwssan zwarnin l-lh̬bar ifulkin, ur-didi-ibidd kra n-umnaggar ġ-‹fk-amẓ› abla kunni waḥdukn.
imma kunni, lliġ-n-qamaġ ġ-tmdint n-tasaluniki taznm-iyi-n lmɛawnt urd ġir yat-twal ula snat ġakud lliġ ḥtajjaġ.
urd nkkin a-iran kra i-ih̬f-inu, walaynni riġ ad-darun-tigat ṣṣabt ġ-lḥsab-nnun.
imma ġilad ha-yyi šbɛaġ, yili dari ma-yufan zġ-lh̬ir, ašku issruḥ-iyi-d abafruditus maylli-yyi-di-tuznm. iga zund tujjut imimn ula zund yat-twafka ittrsn ġ-lgddam n-rbbi lli-s-ifrḥ irḍu srs.
rbbi lli-mi-giġ wins rad-awn-yakka kullu ma-tḥtajjam zġ-tmih̬ar l-lmjd-ns f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
rbbi babatnnġ a-bdda-ntalġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-kullu imẓlayn l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ. ar-n-fllawn-tsllamn aytmatn lli-didi-llanin.
ar-n-kullu-fllawn-tsllamn imẓlayn n-ġid, bahra ġwid ganin zġ-tgmmi n-qayṣr.
a-gigun-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
zġ-bulus arqqas l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġmklli ira rbbi, d-zġ-gʷmatnnġ timutaws.
i-aytmatnnġ ġ-tmdint n-kulussi, a-tn-igan d-imẓlayn n-rbbi lli-zganin ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ. ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ.
ar-bdda-ntškar rbbi babas n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ġakud nna-yas-ntẓalla f-ssibt-nnun.
ašku nsfld f-mamnk a-tumnm s-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, ɛzzan darun kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi,
ašku illa darun rrja iṣḥan f-maylli-awn-in-iḥḍa rbbi ġ-ignna. mayd-ġ-a-ttrjum, tsfldm fllas ġakud lliġ-kʷn-in-ilkm-wawal l-lḥqq lli-igan lh̬bar ifulkin.
lh̬bar-ad ar-itkka ddunit kullutt, ar-yakka ṣṣabt ġ-kraygatt mani, ġmklli iskar ṣṣabt ġ-darun zġ-wass amzwaru lli-ġ-tsfldm f-lbaraka n-rbbi tissanm lḥqq ġmklli iga, sul s-ġilad.
ilkm-kʷn-in f-imi n-abafras lli-didnnġ-itmɛawann, ig ah̬ddam iɛzzan ifulkin l-lmasiḥ f-ssibt-nnun.
inna-yaġ-d is-kʷn-iɛmmr rruḥ lqudus s-tayri n-aytmatn.

f-mayan a-f-a-bdda-ntẓalla ar-ntḍalab rbbi f-ssibt-nnun, zġ-wass lli-ġ-fllawn-nsfld sul s-ġassad. ar-t-ntḍalab ad-awn-issbayyn kullu ma-gigun-ittiri s-twassna ula taḥkimt lli-rad-awn-imala rruḥ lqudus.
ġmkan a-s-rad-kullu-tgm ġmklli-d-iqqann ġwilli ganin win siditnnġ, ar-tskarm s-ma-t-irḍan, tili gigun ṣṣabt n-kullu ma-igan afulki, tzaydm tissanm rbbi ġmklli iga.
ar-ntḍalab rbbi a-kʷn-issdus s-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn baš a-ttṣbarm bla-da-ttrmaym,
ar-ttfraḥm ar-ttškarm rbbi babatnnġ lli-awn-ifkan taġamt ġ-lwrt lli-ra-yili i-imẓlayn-ns ġ-tgldit n-tifawt.
ijjnjm-aġ-d kullu zġ-tgldit n-tillas, išškšm-aġ-d s-tgldit n-yus iɛzzan
lli-aġ-ifukkan issitti fllannġ ddnub-nnġ.
iga lmasiḥ ṣṣurt n-rbbi, iml-aġ mamnk a-iga ġwalli ur-jju-iẓri yan. ig ih̬fddi izwur kullu ma-ih̬lq rbbi.

ašku srs a-s-ityawh̬laq kraygatt kra ġ-ignwan ula ġ-wakal, maylli ibann i-walln n-bnadm ula maylli ur-asnt-ibann, lmalayka ula larwaḥ ula ssulṭat ula lquwwat n-ignwan. s-lmasiḥ a-s-ityawh̬laq kullu ma-illan, ig kullu wins.
illa ntta ur-ta-illi kra yaḍni, d-nttan a-izzgan kraygatt kra ġ-illiġ-t-id-iqqan a-yili.
iga lmasiḥ ih̬f n-ddat lli-igan amnaggar n-mddn-ns. nttan a-igan amzwaru, ig ih̬fddi n-willi-d-nkrnin zġ-lmut, baš a-ig nttan anmġur n-kullu ma-illan.
ašku iqṣad rbbi a-gis-yili-ufulki-ns ikmmln.
f-uwdm-ns a-f-iqṣad rbbi a-irar i-ih̬f-ns kullu ma-illan ġ-wakal ula ġ-ignwan, iskr sslamt ġ-gras d-mddn f-ssibt n-idammn l-lmasiḥ lli-ffinin lliġ immut f-uggjdi.
imma kunni tkkam-ttin taggugm-n zġ-rbbi, tgm inuwwašn-ns f-ssibt n-iswingimn-nnun d-iskkirn-nnun lli-ʷh̬šnnin.
imma ġilad iskr sslamt ġ-gratun dids f-ssibt l-lmut l-lmasiḥ ġakud lliġ iṭṭaf ddat n-bnadm. ra-kʷn-išškšm s-lgddam-ns tġusm tfulkim bla-gigun-illa kra l-lɛib.

ġmkad a-ra-iskr iġ-tzuydm tzgam ġ-lmasiḥ tamẓm-bdda gis bla tflm rrja iṣḥan lli-f-tsfldm ġ-wawal l-lh̬bar ifulkin. lh̬bar-ad a-mi-ttkka-tbrraḥt-ns kullu ddunit, wrriġ gġ ah̬ddam-ns ula nkki bulus.
frḥġ ġilad s-trfufnt-ad ġ-a-zrayġ f-ssibt-nnun. ašku ar-tkmmalġ s-ddat-inu ma-iqaman ġ-trfufnt l-lmasiḥ f-ssibt n-ddat-ns lli-igan amnaggar n-mddn-ns.
wrriġ giġ ah̬ddam i-umnaggar-ad lliġ-iyi-iẓli rbbi ad-skarġ tawuri-ad, sslkmġ-awn-in kullu iwaliwn-ns.
ašku maylli intln kullu ġayd izrin, ur-t-ssinn mddn n-tasutin lli-zrinin, hati issbayyn-t-id rbbi ġilad i-imẓlayn-ns.
iqṣad ad-aġ-d-iml taġawsa-yad bahra ifulkin ihiyyan lli-s-ra-ibark kullu timizar n-ddunit. ġmkad a-tga: illa lmasiḥ ġ-uwl-nnun ad-awn-ifk rrja iṣḥan n-is-ra-n-tkšmm s-lmjd-ns.
hati lmasiḥ a-f-a-ntbrraḥ i-kullu mddn, ar-ntnṣaḥ kud yan, ar-nsslmad kud yan s-kullu ma-igan taḥkimt, baš a-n-nšškšm kud yan s-lgddam n-rbbi imqqur ġ-lmasiḥ.
f-ġmkan a-f-a-tnhatafġ ar-kkatġ takrrayt s-kullu jjhd l-lmasiḥ lli-yyi-issdusn s-tḥkimt-ns iggutn.
riġ a-tissanm mnška n-tkrrayt ad-kkatġ f-ssibt-nnun ula f-ssibt n-aytmatn n-lawdikiyya ula f-kullu wiyyaḍ ur-jju-ẓrinin udm-inu.
walaynni ar-skarġ kullu mayad baš ad-zɛmn-uwlawn-nsn, gn kullu yan s-tayri n-ingratsn, tili-asn lbaraka n-twassna ikmmln f-maylli intln ġayd izrin. ašku rbbi issbayyn-aġ-d lmasiḥ,
d-nttan a-ġ-tlla-kullu-tḥkimt n-rbbi ula tawassna-ns ihiyyan.
nniġ-awn mayad baš a-kʷn-ur-ijlu yan s-tkrkas.
wah̬h̬a-d-fllawn-yaggug-uwdm-inu, illa-n-didun-uwl-inu. hati frḥġ ġilad ġ-fllawn-sfldġ is-tzgam ġ-tamunt n-ingratun tamẓm kullu ġ-lmasiḥ.
ssnġ is-tgam lmasiḥ yasuɛ d-siditun. d-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, skarat-bdda ma-ira.
zzugzat tadrut n-llsas-nnun ġ-lmasiḥ ar-fllas-tbnnum, tamẓm gis ar-ttdusm ġmklli tlmdm, ar-bdda-ttškarm rbbi.
awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬f-nnun a-kʷn-ur-iġwi yan s-iswingimn n-bnadm ula s-tkrkas h̬wanin lli-mi-tsfldm zġ-tasutin lli-zrinin. han tinbaḍin n-ddunit ad-gant, urd tin lmasiḥ.
imma lmasiḥ, nttan a-ġ-illa-kullu-ufulki n-rbbi ikmmln ġ-ddat-ns.
ula kunni, tlla-yawn tudrt ikmmln f-ssibt n-ma-tgam win lmasiḥ lli-iḥkamn ġ-kullu ssulṭat ula lquwwat n-ignwan.
nttan a-kʷn-issġusn, urd s-tẓallit lli-tbbin mddn ġ-ddat-nsn, walaynni issġus-kʷn zġ-ma-issrkan ul n-bnadm.
ašku ġakud lliġ tddmm s-udum n-waman, ttyawmḍalm d-lmasiḥ tnkrm-d dids, ašku tumnm s-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi lli-t-id-issnkrn zġ-lmut.
ġayd izrin tgam zund iġ-tmmutm i-ma-igan win rbbi f-ssibt n-ddnub-nnun ula f-ssibt ma-ur-jju-tskirm s-ššrɛ. imma ġilad issddr-kʷn rbbi d-lmasiḥ. iṣamḥ-aġ f-kullu ddnub lli-nskr,
isfiḍ talluḥt l-lḥsab lli-fllannġ-iḥkamn s-luṣiyat lli-s-ur-nskir. ikkis-t-in fllannġ, yut-as tigusin f-uggjdi.
f-uggjdi a-f-inra lmasiḥ ssulṭat d-lquwwat n-ignwan, ikkis-asnt imqlad-nsnt, iml i-kullu mddn is-tnt-inra.
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, a-ur-tadjm yan ad-awn-in-išškšm luṣiyat f-ma-ra-tšttam ula ma-ra-tssam, ula f-kra l-lɛid ula talalit n-wayyur ula kra n-uwssan n-usunfu.
ašku tiġawsiwin-an gant ġir amalu n-ma-ra-yili. imma lmasiḥ, nttan a-iṣḥan.
a-ur-tadjm mddn-an a-fllawn-tḥkamn. rad-awn-ttinin a-bahra-ttadrm i-ih̬f-nnun ar-ttɛbadm lmalayka. ar-bnnun ntni f-mad-ẓrran ġ-twargiwin-nsn, ar-ssfurrugn s-iswingimn l-lɛaql-nsn,
walaynni ur-umẓn ġ-lmasiḥ lli-igan ih̬f n-umnaggar, ar-issdus ddat kullutt, ar-issmyalla igzman-ns d-ih̬san-ns baš a-ttimġur ddat ġmklli ira rbbi.
s-lmut l-lmasiḥ a-s-tmmutm kunni i-tnbaḍin n-ddunit-ad. mayan a-f-ra-kʷn-sqsaġ, mah̬ aylliġ a-sul-tskarm zund iġ-tgam win ddunit? mah̬ aylliġ a-tskarm s-luṣiyat n-mddn? ar-ttinin:
«a-ur-ttasim ġwan, a-ur-tmḍaym ġwad, a-n-ur-ttggrm i-ġwan.»
walaynni kullu tiġawsiwin-an ar-zraynt. iġ-tnt-nšša ur-sul-qamant. han luṣiyat-an, ġir iwaliwn n-bnadm d-ulmmud n-bnadm ad-gant.
kra n-mddn ġaln is-gant lmɛqul ašku ar-trarant mddn ad-bahra-tɛbadn ar-tadrn i-ih̬f-nsn ar-ssrfufunn ddat-nsn, walaynni ur-ẓḍarnt luṣiyat-an ad-kkisnt ššhwat ʷh̬šnnin zġ-bnadm.
s-tnkra l-lmasiḥ a-s-kʷn-d-issnkr rbbi zġ-lmut. mayan a-f-kʷn-d-iqqan a-bdda-trarm lɛaql s-ma-igan win ignna, ašku ġin a-ġ-illa lmasiḥ, iskiws f-ufasi n-rbbi.
swingimat-bdda ġ-tġawsiwin n-ignna urd tiġawsiwin n-ddunit-ad.
ašku tmmutm f-tudrt lli-izrin, trgs tudrt-nnun l-ljdid ġ-dar rbbi ġ-illiġ irgs lmasiḥ.
lmasiḥ a-igan tudrt-nnun. ġakud lliġ ra-d-iwrri ra-kʷn-yawi a-dids-tilim ula kunni ġ-lmjd-ns.

f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, skarat baš a-gigun-immt aynna igan win ddunit-ad: lfsad ula ššhawa ula asmaqql s-tiṭ yʷh̬šnn. a-ur-sul-tswingimm ġ-ma-iɛibn ula-da-ttirim ma-ur-igin winnun, ašku yan ittirin win wiyyaḍ iga zund yan itɛbadn ilahat n-ddunit-ad.
f-ssibt n-kullu ġayan a-f-ra-iḍr lġaḍab n-rbbi f-willi srs rurnin tiġurdin-nsn.
ula kunni ġayd izrin tkkam-ttin ar-tskarm ġmkan, ar-ttsalam tiġawsiwin-an.
imma ġilad, illa fllawn a-tkkism kullu ġayan. a-ur-ttẓim ula-da-ttuffm f-yan. a-ur-ttnuwwašm ula-da-trggmm ġ-yan. a-ur-tadjm kra n-iwaliwn ʷh̬šnnin a-tkkan infurn-nnun,
ula-da-tsskirkism f-ingratun. ašku ur-sul-tgim ġmklli tgam ġayd izrin, s-iskkirn lli-tmyarm ar-tn-tskarm.
hati twrrim tgam mddn l-ljdid. rbbi lli-kʷn-ih̬lqn ar-kʷn-itbddal baš a-twrrim tgm zund nttan, tissanm-t ġmklli iga.

mayan a-f-ur-a-nẓẓmẓlay gu-yunan zġ-gu-yudaya, ula ġwalli dar taẓallit n-ddat zġ-walli ur-dar-tlli, ula gu-tmazirt-ad zġ-gu-tmazirt-an, ula ismg zġ-wad-igan win ih̬f-ns. ašku nga kullu win lmasiḥ, yili lmasiḥ ginnġ kullwaġ.
kunni, imẓlayn n-rbbi a-tgam. ira-kʷn iẓli-kʷn a-tgm wins. f-mayan a-f-kʷn-d-iqqan a-tɛmmrm s-lḥnant, ar-ttmɛawanm ar-tẓẓimẓaym ih̬f-nnun, ar-ttrh̬um ar-ttṣbarm i-ngratun
bla-da-yawn-tṭiyyar f-ingratun. iġ-illa yan dar ma-s-a-itaštkka s-wayyaḍ, illa fllas ad-as-iṣamḥ. ṣamḥat i-ngratun ġmklli-awn-iṣamḥ siditun.
zaydat i-kullu mayad a-bahra-ttirim i-ngratun, ašku tayri a-iẓḍarn a-tssmun kullu ma-illan s-tamunt ikmmln.
adjat sslamt l-lmasiḥ a-tmala i-uwlawn-nnun kullu ma-gigun-ira. ašku iġra-yawn-d rbbi a-kullu-tgm yan ġ-tamunt n-sslamt-ad. yili fllawn a-bdda-ttškarm rbbi.

adjat awal l-lmasiḥ a-iɛmmr ulawn-nnun, ar-tsslmadm ar-ttnṣaḥm i-ngratun s-kullu ma-igan taḥkimt, ar-ttirirm i-rbbi ar-ttasim imurign d-tahlilat d-talġatin nna-yawn-imala rruḥ lqudus, ar-ti-ttškarm zġ-uwlawn-nnun.
kullu ma-ttinim ula kullu ma-tskarm, skarat-t s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ, ar-ttškarm rbbi fllas.
wa-timġarin, illa f-kraygatt yat a-tsflid s-urgaz-ns ġmklli ira siditnnġ.
imma kunni a-irgazn, illa f-kraygatt yan a-itḥnnu ġ-tmġart-ns bla-da-dids-itšqu.
wa-tarwa mẓẓinin, skarat-bdda s-wawal n-ayt-darun, ašku irḍa rbbi s-mayad.
imma kunni a-id-babatsn, a-ur-bdda-ttẓim tarwa-nnun, baš a-ur-ġuwḍn ġaln is-ur-gin yat.
wa-ih̬ddamn, skarat-bdda s-wawal n-id-siditun n-ddunit-ad. a-ur-ttirim ġir a-tn-trḍum ġakud nna-gigun-tmnadn, walaynni h̬dmat s-nniyt n-uwl-nnun s-mklli ttirim a-trḍum siditnnġ.
aynna-ġ-a-tth̬damm, h̬dmat gis s-tiqqi-nnun zund iġd siditnnġ a-mi-tth̬damm urd bnadm.
ašku tssnm izd siditnnġ a-rad-awn-ifk tiġrad-nnun, išškšm-kʷn s-lwrt-nnun ġ-ignna. ašku siditnnġ lmasiḥ, nttan a-mi-tth̬damm.
imma wanna iskarn ma-yʷh̬šnn, rad-as-irar rbbi f-lh̬ʷšant lli-iskr. han rbbi ur-a-iskar s-uwdmawn.
imma kunni a-id-siditsn, skarat d-ih̬ddamn-nnun s-lḥqq, ar-asn-takkam ma-tn-d-yuškan. a-ur-tettum izd ula kunni illa-yawn yan igan siditun ġ-ignna.
zaydat ar-bdda-ttẓallam ar-tḍalabm rbbi, trarm lɛaql s-mad-as-ttinim ar-ti-ttškarm bahra.
ḍalbat-t ula f-ssibt-nnġ nkkʷni, baš a-irẓm ġ-lgddam-nnġ yan-imi a-ntbrraḥ i-mddn s-wawal-ns, nml-asn maylli mi ur-jju-sfldn f-lmasiḥ. f-ssibt n-wawal-ad a-f-lliġ nkki ġ-lḥbs,
walaynni ḍalbat rbbi a-yyi-iɛawn ad-tafaġ iwaliwn ma-s-a-ssfhamġ mddn ġmklli-yyi-d-iqqan.
skarat s-tḥkimt d-kullu willi ur-ginin win rbbi, ar-tskarm afulki nna-mi-tufam kraygatt tasaɛt.
sawalat s-iwaliwn šwanin mimnin, tissanm mamnk a-ttraram i-kraygatt yan awal nna-t-ih̬ṣṣan.
rad-awn-yini tih̬ikus f-kullu ma-igan lh̬bar-inu. iga gʷmatnnġ iɛzzan, ig ah̬ddam ifulkin, ar-didnnġ-itmɛawan ġ-twuri n-siditnnġ.
mayad a-f-awn-t-in-uznġ, baš a-tissanm mamnk a-nga izzɛam ulawn-nnun.
aznġ-n dids gʷmatnnġ ifulkin iɛzzan unisimus lli-igan yan zġ-gigun. ntni a-rad-awn-yini f-kullu ma-darnnġ-ijran ġid.
ar-n-fllawn-itsllam aristarh̬us, illa didi ġ-lḥbs. ar-n-fllawn-itsllam marqus yus n-uwlltmas n-barnaba. nniġ-awn-yad fllas a-t-in-tšškšmm s-darun, tgm-t d-unbgi-nnun iġ-n-darun-yuška.
ar-n-fllawn-itsllam ula yašuɛ lli-mi-ttinin yusṭus. ġir kraḍ-ad a-igan ayt-yudaya ġ-ġwilli didi itmɛawann ġ-twuri n-tgldit n-rbbi, ar-iyi-ssfjjijn ul-inu bahra.
ar-n-fllawn-itsllam abafras. iga zġ-gigun ula ntta, ig ah̬ddam l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ. s-nniyt-ns a-s-a-itẓalla bahra f-ssibt-nnun, baš a-tdusm tzgam ġ-uġaras n-rbbi ar-tskarm kullu ma-gigun-ira rbbi.
hati giġ fllas inigi n-mnšk a-ith̬dam bahra f-ssibt-nnun ula f-ssibt n-ayt-lawdikiyya ula ayt-hirabulis.
ar-n-fllawn-itsllam-uṭbib iɛzzan luqa, nttan ula ḍimaṣ.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-aytmatn n-lawdikiyya ula f-nimfa d-umnaggar lli-itmunun ġ-tgmmi-ns.
tiġurdin n-ma-tġram tabrat-ad ġ-darun, riġ a-stti-taznm i-umnaggar ġ-lawdikiyya baš a-stt-ġrn ula ntni. iriġ a-tġrm ula kunni tabrat lli-darsn-illan ġ-lawdikiyya.
iniyat i-arh̬ibbus a-itlhu s-twuri lli-f-t-yuṣṣa siditnnġ, baš a-stt-ikmml.
s-ufus-inu a-s-awn-in-uriġ awal-ad: nkki bulus ar-n-fllawn-tsllamġ. a-ur-tettum iskraf-ad ġ-lliġ. ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-rbbi.
zġ-bulus d-sila d-timutaws, i-umnaggar n-willi ganin win rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ġ-tmdint n-tasaluniki. ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt.
ar-bdda-ntškar rbbi fllawn kullukn. ġakud nna-ntẓalla ar-kʷn-d-naddr,
ar-d-nswingim ġ-lgddam n-rbbi babatnnġ mamnk a-kullu-tskarm s-liman-nnun, ar-tth̬damm s-lḥnant, tzgam ġ-rrja n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
way-aytmatnnġ lli-f-iḥnna rbbi, nssn is-kʷn-iẓli a-tgm wins,

ašku ilkm-awn-in lh̬bar-nnġ ifulkin, urd ġir s-iwaliwn walaynni s-lquwwa ula s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus aylliġ-awn-iban is-iga lḥqq. tssnm kunni mamnk a-nga ġ-uwssan lli-nzzri ġ-gratun, nskr kullu f-a-kʷn-ntɛawan.
twrrim tskrm ula kunni ġmklli nskar nkkʷni ula siditnnġ. wah̬h̬a trfufnm bahra, tumẓm ġ-wawal-ns s-lfrḥ n-rruḥ lqudus.
ġmkan a-s-tmlam i-kullu imumnn ġ-tmizar n-makiduniyya d-ah̬aya mamnk a-tn-d-iqqan ad-skarn ula ntni.
walaynni urd ġir makiduniyya d-ah̬aya a-n-ilkm-wawal n-siditnnġ f-ssibt-nnun, ašku sfldn mddn ġ-kraygatt mani f-mamnk a-tumẓm aġaras n-rbbi, aylliġ ur-aġ-ih̬ṣṣa a-nini yat f-mayd ijran.
ašku ar-kullu-ttinin mddn f-mamnk ad-aġ-tqblm lliġ-n-darun-nuška, tflm ilahat n-ddunit-ad, twrrim s-rbbi baš a-tth̬damm i-rbbi l-lḥqq lli-iddrn.
ar-ttinin f-mamnk a-ttqlm ġilad s-yus lli-d-issnkr zġ-lmut ar-d-iwrri zġ-ignna, a-t-igan d-yasuɛ lli-aġ-ijjnjmn zġ-lġaḍab lli-ra-ittut f-ddunit.
way-aytmatnnġ, tssnm kunni is-urd bla lfaytt a-nzzri ussan-an ġ-gratun.

tsfldm f-mad-aġ-ijran lliġ ur-ta-n-nruḥ s-darun, ssrfufnn-aġ mddn ġ-tmdint n-filibbi rgmn-aġ bahra, walaynni izzɛam-aġ rbbi-nnġ baš ad-awn-nsawl f-lh̬bar ifulkin lli-aġ-imla wah̬h̬a illa ma-yaġ-itẓin bahra.
ašku ur-a-nsskirkis f-mddn lliġ a-tn-ntḍalab ad-aġ-sflidn, ula-da-nttiri ma-igan winsn ula-da-nttiri a-stt-fllasn-nzzri.
walaynni ar-nsawal s-mklli ginnġ ira rbbi lli-aġ-yurmn ifk-aġ ad-asn-nsslkam lh̬bar-ad ifulkin. ur-a-nskar f-a-ntrḍu bnadm walaynni ar-nskar f-a-nrḍu rbbi lli-itarmn ul-nnġ.
tssnm is-ur-a-kʷn-ntalġ ġ-uwssan-an s-iwaliwn h̬wanin ula-da-nskar sin-uwdmawn baš a-ntamẓ kra f-wawal-nnġ. rbbi a-fllannġ-igan inigi.
ur-jju-nskir f-ad-aġ-talġm kunni ula wiyyaḍ.
wah̬h̬a nẓḍar a-zgigun-nḍalb ma-iggutn f-ssibt n-ma-nga irqqasn l-lmasiḥ, nrh̬a-bdda didun zund tamġart lli-stt-itawin ġ-tarwa-ns mẓẓinin.
tɛzzam darnnġ s-kigan aylliġ nujad ad-awn-in-nfk urd ġir lh̬bar ifulkin walaynni nfrḥ a-fllawn-nfk ula ih̬f-nnġ. ġunškad a-darnnġ-tɛzzam.
way-aytmatnnġ, is-ur-di-tswangmm mnšk a-nth̬dam ar-ntnhataf ġ-gratun? nkka-ttin ar-nth̬dam ġ-iyḍ ula azal baš a-fllawn-ur-nẓẓay lliġ a-yawn-ntbrraḥ s-lh̬bar ifulkin n-rbbi.
kunni tgam inagan fllannġ, ula rbbi iga fllannġ inigi n-is-išwa ifulki kullu ma-nskr ġ-gratun kunni lli-yumnn, ur-jju-ginnġ-illi kra l-lɛib ġ-darun.
tissanm is-a-nskar d-kraygatt yan gigun ġmklli iskar-urgaz d-tarwa-ns ɛzzanin. ar-kʷn-nzzɛam ar-fllawn-nssfjjij,
ar-kʷn-ntnṣaḥ nini-awn a-tskarm ġmklli-d-iqqann ġwilli ganin win rbbi lli-awn-d-iġran a-tkšmm s-tgldit-ns ula lmjd-ns.

mayad-daġ a-f-a-bdda-ntškar rbbi, ašku ġakud lliġ tsfldm i-wawal n-rbbi lli-awn-in-niwi, tamẓm gis tamnm izd awal n-rbbi a-iga, urd awal n-bnadm. s-ṣṣaḥt awal n-rbbi a-iga, ih̬dm ġilad ġ-uwlawn-nnun kunni lli-srs-yumnn.
ašku ijra ġ-darun ay-aytma, ġmklli ijran ġ-dar imnaggarn n-rbbi lli-umnnin s-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġ-tmazirt n-yudaya. trfufnm f-ufus n-ayt-tmazirt-nnun ġmklli rfufnn ntni f-ufus n-ayt-yudaya.
ašku ayt-yudaya a-inġan siditnnġ yasuɛ ula lanbiya, ssmsrn-aġ ula nkkʷni. ar-tt-ssṭiyyarn i-rbbi ar-skarn gar ġ-kullu mddn,
ašku ar-n-tggan tiqqi-nsn f-ad-aġ-ssfssan a-ur-ntbrraḥ i-ayt-tmizar yaḍni s-wawal lli-s-rad-njmn. ġmkad a-s-a-tɛmmarn lɛbrt n-ddnub-nsn. imma ġilad ġ-tgira igguz-d fllasn lġaḍab n-rbbi.
išqa fllannġ a-didun-nngara ay-aytmatnnġ. wah̬h̬a-d-fllawn-yaggug-uwdm-nnġ, iqama-n-bdda-didun-uwl-nnġ. mnšk a-bahra-nttiri a-kʷn-nẓr.
nskr kullu f-a-kʷn-nẓr. mnnawt-twal ẓuẓḍġ nkki bulus a-n-darun-wrriġ, walaynni ar-aġ-itḥṣar šiṭan.
ašku ġakud lliġ ra-d-yašk siditnnġ yasuɛ, ma-ra-ig ttaj n-rrja-nnġ d-lfrḥ-nnġ lli-s-ra-nzɛm ġ-lgddam-ns, abla kunni?
iyah, kunni a-igan lmjd-nnġ d-lfrḥ-nnġ.
lliġ ur-nẓḍar a-sul-nṣbr, nini i-ih̬f-nnġ ra-yaf a-nqama waḥduyaġ ġ-tmdint n-atina.
ġakudan nuzn-n s-darun gʷmatnnġ timutaws lli-igan ah̬ddam n-rbbi didnnġ ġ-twuri l-lh̬bar ifulkin l-lmasiḥ. nazn-t-in a-kʷn-izzɛam issdus-kʷn ġ-uġaras n-rbbi,
baš a-ur-iḍr yan gigun f-ssibt n-trfufnt lli-ġ-a-tzraym. tssnm kunni is-iqṣad rbbi a-nzri ġ-mayad,
ašku ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-didun-nlla nenna-yawn bahra is-ra-ntrfufun. tẓrm ġilad is-ijra ġmklli nenna.

mayad a-f-t-in-uznġ s-darun, ašku ur-ẓḍarġ ad-sul-ṣbrġ. ih̬ṣṣa-yyi ad-issanġ is-sul-tzgam ġ-uġaras n-rbbi nġd uhu, ašku ksuḍġ a-kʷn-ur-issḍr iblis, tḍr ula tawuri-nnġ ġ-gratun bla lfaytt.

imma ġilad ġ-d-iwrri timutaws zġ-darun, yawi-aġ-d lh̬bar n-is-tzgam ġ-liman-nnun ula lḥnant n-ingratun. yini-aġ is-a-ttfraḥm f-ssibt-nnġ ġakud nna-ginnġ-tswingimm, tirim bahra ad-aġ-tẓrm zund ma-nra bahra a-kʷn-nẓr.
way-aytmatnnġ, wah̬h̬a nzri ula nkkʷni ġ-tnukmut d-trfufnt iggutn, ha-yaġ nthnna ġilad f-ssibt-nnun, ašku nsfld is-tzgam ġ-uġaras n-rbbi.
nwrri s-tudrt-nnġ ašku tbiddm tdusm ġ-siditnnġ.
mnšk a-bahra-ntškar rbbi fllawn. mnšk a-bahra-ntfraḥ f-ssibt-nnun ġ-lgddam n-rbbi-nnġ.
ha-yaġ ġ-iyḍ ula azal ar-ntḍalab rbbi ad-aġ-ifk a-kʷn-nẓr a-nkmml ma-kʷn-sul-ih̬ṣṣan baš a-tzaydm ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ.
ar-ntḍalab rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ ad-aġ-ijjujad aġaras baš a-n-nwrri s-darun.
ar-ntḍalab siditnnġ ad-awn-bahra-issigat tayri n-ingratun ula tayri n-kullu mddn, ġmklli-kʷn-bahra-nttiri nkkʷni.
ar-t-ntḍalab a-kʷn-issdus baš a-tbiddm ġ-lgddam n-rbbi babatnnġ s-uwlawn-nnun ġusnin bla gigun illa kra l-lɛib ġakud lliġ ra-d-yašk siditnnġ yasuɛ d-imẓlayn-ns kullutn.
imma ġilad ay-aytmatnnġ ra-kʷn-nḍalb, nnṣḥ-kʷn s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ, a-ttidum ġ-uġaras lli-zginnġ-tlmdm, ar-bdda-ttnawalm ma-irḍan rbbi. zaydat f-mayd tskarm, ar-ti-tskarm s-uggʷar.
tssnm maylli-f-kʷn-nuṣṣa s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ ġayd izrin,
ašku ira rbbi a-issġus ulawn-nnun, yiri gigun a-tanfm i-lfsad.
illa f-kud yan a-yissan mamnk a-ra-yuqqr tamġart-ns yili-tt s-uwl iġusn.
a-ur-tgm zund ayt-tmizar lli-ur-ssinnin rbbi, ar-tn-tnrunt ššhwat-nsn.
illa f-kud yan a-ur-iffuġ zġ-mayan ula itɛdda f-gʷmas. ašku nenna-yawn yadlli s-lmɛqul, ra-yut siditnnġ lɛqubit f-kullu winna skarnin wan tiġawsiwin-an.
ašku iġra-yaġ-d rbbi a-nġus, ur-akkʷ-iri a-nrku.
wanna yagʷin a-isfld s-wawal-ad, urd bnadm a-yagʷi walaynni yagʷi rbbi lli-awn-ifkan ula kunni rruḥ-ns lqudus.
walaynni ur-tḥtajjam mad-awn-in-itaran mamnk a-ttḥubbum aytmatun, ašku rbbi ad-awn-isslmdn mamnk a-ttḥnnum i-ngratun.
s-ṣṣaḥt ar-ttḥubbum kullu aytmatn ġ-tmazirt n-makiduniyya kullutt, walaynni ra-kʷn-sul-nḍalb ay-aytmatnnġ, a-tzaydm ar-tn-ttḥubbum s-uggʷar.
iriyat a-bdda-ṭṭrrḥm ar-ttlhum s-twuri n-ih̬f-nnun ar-tth̬damm s-ifassn-nnun, ġmklli-awn-nenna ġayd izrin.
ġmkad a-f-ra-kʷn-tuqqarn mddn lli-ur-ginin win lmasiḥ, ur-ra-tḥtajjam yan.
