way-aytmatnnġ, nra a-tissanm ma-ra-ijru i-willi mmutnin, baš a-kʷn-ur-taġ-tguḍi zund mddn yaḍni lli-ur-dar rrja.
ašku numn is-immut yasuɛ, inkr-d zġ-lmut. namn is-ra-dids-yawi rbbi kullu willi mmutnin umnnin s-yasuɛ.
maylli-s-aġ-imla siditnnġ a-rad-awn-nini: nkkʷni lli-ra-iqama nsul ar ass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk siditnnġ, ur-ra-nzwur ġwilli mmutnin.
ašku s-lamr itjhhdn, s-wawal l-lmalak imqqurn, s-tijjijt n-nnffar n-rbbi a-s-ra-d-igguz siditnnġ zġ-ignna, nkrn-d mddn l-lmasiḥ lli-mmutnin, ntni a-ra-izwur.
ġakudan ra-ntyalal ula nkkʷni lli-isuln, rad-kullu-didsn-nmun ġ-imdla, nmnaggar d-siditnnġ ġ-ignwan. ġmkad a-s-rad-bdda-nili d-siditnnġ.
zzɛamat i-ngratun s-iwaliwn-ad.
way-aytmatnnġ, ur-aġ-ih̬ṣṣa ad-awn-in-nara kra f-uwssan ula izmaz lli-ġ-rad-jrunt-tġawsiwin-ad,
ašku tssnm izd zund amh̬h̬ar n-iyḍ a-s-ra-d-ilkm-wass n-siditnnġ.
ra-ttinin mddn «labas thnna luqt,» imil igguz-d fllasn lhalak. ḥayna ra-tn-iġwi ġmklli iqqʷay-ungaẓ tamġart lli-ra-yaru, ur-akkʷ-rad-njmn.
imma kunni ay-aytmatnnġ, ur-tllim ġ-tillas. ur-ra-kʷn-yamẓ-wass-an zund amh̬h̬ar.
ašku kunni kullukn tgam ayt-tifawt, tgm ayt-uzal. hati urd win-iyḍ a-nga nġd win tillas.
mayad a-f-aġ-d-iqqan a-ur-nṭṭas zund mddn yaḍni. illa fllannġ a-bdda-nrar lɛaql ar-ntnbaḍ ġ-ih̬f-nnġ.
hati ġ-iyḍ a-ġ-a-ṭṭasn mddn ar-ssnufuln ih̬f-nsn s-tissi.
imma nkkʷni nga win-uzal, yili fllannġ a-ntnbaḍ ġ-ih̬f-nnġ, ng i-idmarn-nnġ abannk n-‹ttiqa ġ-rbbi› ula ‹lḥnant›, ng i-ih̬f-nnġ asddul n-‹rrja n-ujnjm›.
ašku ur-iqṣad rbbi a-fllannġ-yut lɛqubit, walaynni iqṣad ad-aġ-ijjnjm f-uwdm n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
immut nttan f-ssibt-nnġ baš a-dids-nddr, iġ-nmmut nġd iġ-nnit-nsul ard-d-yašk.
zaydat ar-tzzɛamm ar-ttmɛawanm i-ngratun ġmklli tmyarm a-tskarm.
imma ġilad ay-aytmatnnġ, ra-kʷn-nḍalb a-ttuqqarm ġwilli skarnin tawuri n-rbbi ġ-gratun, ar-kʷn-tgabaln s-ism n-siditnnġ ar-kʷn-tnṣaḥn.
mlat-asn mnšk a-s-darun-ɛzzan f-ssibt n-twuri-nsn. gat s-sslamt i-ngratun.
ra-kʷn-nḍalb ay-aytmatnnġ, a-ttnṣaḥm wanna ur-ittirin a-ih̬dm, ar-tzzɛamm wanna itiksaḍn, ar-ttɛawanm wanna iḍɛfn, ar-ttṣbarm d-kraygatt yan.
rarat lɛaql iġ-illa mad-awn-iskrn kra yʷh̬šnn, ad-as-t-ur-trarm s-lh̬ʷšant. gat-n tiqqi-nnun a-bdda-ttirim a-tskarm afulki ġ-gratun ula d-kullu mddn.
frḥat-bdda,
ar-ttẓallam ġ-kraygatt luqt,
ar-ttškarm rbbi ġmknna iga lḥal, ašku ġmkad a-gigun-ira ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
a-ur-tssh̬sim rruḥ lqudus,
ula-da-ttḥgarm iwaliwn n-yan ittinin s-mad-as-imala rbbi.
ssmaqqlat kraygatt kra, tamẓm ġ-ma-ifulkin,
tanfm i-kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn.
imma ġilad ḍalbġ zġ-rbbi lli-bdda-yakkan sslamt a-kʷn-issġus zġ-kullu ma-gigun-yʷh̬šnn, ijjnjm ul-nnun ula rruḥ-nnun ula ddat-nnun zġ-kullu kra igan lɛib ard-d-yašk siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ġmkan a-ra-iskr rbbi lli-awn-d-iġran, ašku iqama-bdda ġ-wawal-ns.
way-aytmatnnġ, ẓẓallat tḍalbm rbbi f-ssibt-nnġ ula nkkʷni.
nsallamat d-aytmatn kullutn s-unsallam n-tagʷmat.
ra-kʷn-uṣṣaġ s-ism n-siditnnġ a-tġrm tabrat-ad f-aytmatn kullutn.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
zġ-bulus d-sila d-timutaws, i-umnaggar n-willi ganin win rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ġ-tmdint n-tasaluniki.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
way-aytmatnnġ, iqqan-aġ-d a-bdda-ntškar rbbi fllawn, ig lḥqq ginnġ a-t-ntškar, ašku ar-ttzayadm ar-ttimġurm bahra ġ-liman-nnun, iwrri kud yan gigun ar-bahra-itḥnnu ġ-wiyyaḍ.
hati ar-kʷn-ntalġ ġ-dar imnaggarn n-rbbi, ašku tumẓm ġ-rbbi sul tzgam, wah̬h̬a da-tzraym ġ-trfufnt d-tnukmut iggutn.
mayd-awn-ijrrun ar-imala is-a-itḥkam rbbi s-lḥqq, ašku iga-kʷn d-wid sthllanin ad-kšmn s-tgldit-ns lli-f-a-ttrfufunm.
ašku s-lḥqq a-s-ra-irar rbbi tarfufnt i-willi-kʷn-ssrfufnnin,
ifk-awn asunfu didnnġ i-kunni lli-irfufnn. ġmkad a-ra-iskr ġakud nna-d-iwrri siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ zġ-ignna ibayyn d-lmalayka-ns tjhhdnin s-lɛafit ifnnun.
ġakudan a-ra-yut rbbi lɛqubit f-willi srs rurnin tiġurdin-nsn, agʷin ad-sflidn s-lh̬bar ifulkin n-siditnnġ yasuɛ.
ra-fllasn-yut lḥukm s-lhalak l-lih̬rt, issngara-tn d-siditnnġ. ra-tn-in-issaggug f-lmjd-ns itjhhdn
ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk siditnnġ a-t-alġn imẓlayn-ns, tɛjjbn gis kullu ġwilli srs umnnin. ula kunni ra-zgisn-tgm, ašku tumnm tugga lli-awn-in-niwi.

mayad a-f-a-bdda-ntẓalla f-ssibt-nnun, ar-ntḍalab rbbi-nnġ a-kʷn-ig d-wid sthllanin tudrt lli-s-awn-d-iġra. ar-t-ntḍalab a-issafu s-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn kullu ma-ttnawalm ifulki ula kullu ma-tskarm f-ssibt l-liman-nnun.
ġmkad a-s-ra-gigun-iban lmjd n-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ, yili-awn lmjd ula kunni dids s-lbaraka n-rbbi-nnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
way-aytmatnnġ, nra ġilad ad-awn-nini f-mamnk a-ra-d-yašk siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, nmun kullwaġ baš a-dids-nmnaggar.

walaynni ad-ur-tasim taġuft ula tġuwḍm iġ-tsfldm i-kra n-yan ar-ittini «izri-wass lli-ġ-d-yuška siditnnġ.» a-ur-ti-tamnm wah̬h̬a iġ-awn-inna imla-yas-t rruḥ lqudus nġd isfld i-lh̬bar-ns nġd iġra-t ġ-kra n-tbrat zġ-darnnġ.
ad-ur-tadjm yan a-kʷn-ijlu, ašku ur-ra-d-ilkm-wass-an ard munn mddn ggutnin ad-mmaġn d-rbbi, iban-d-unuwwaš n-rbbi lli-ra-iggʷru s-lhalak.
ra-issimġur ih̬f-ns ar-itẓi f-kullu mad-tɛbadn mddn ula kullu ma-mi-tẓallan. ra-ikšm ula s-tgmmi n-rbbi igawr gis yini izd nttan a-igan rbbi.
is-ur-di-tswangmm? nniġ-awn bahra f-tġawsiwin-ad ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-didun-lliġ.
tissanm ma-t-iḥṣarn ġilad baš a-ur-d-iban ard-d-ilkm-uzmz-ns.
ašku tanuwwašt intln tbda ġilad ar-ttzayad, walaynni ġaylli ra-ijru ur-ra-ijru ard ityattay ma-t-iḥṣarn.
ġakudan a-ra-d-iban-unuwwaš n-rbbi, yašk-id ilmma siditnnġ yasuɛ s-lmjd iggutn, inġ-t s-yat tunfust zġ-imi-ns ihlk-t.
imma anuwwaš-an, ra-dars-tigat-tḥkimt n-šiṭan, ra-izzga tikrkas-ns s-lmɛjizat d-lquwwat d-tmitar tjhhdnin.
s-kullu kra igan lh̬ʷšant a-s-ra-ijllu ġwilli llanin ġ-uġaras l-lhalak agʷin ad-irin lḥqq njmn.
f-mayan a-f-a-yasn-itzayad rbbi aylliġ jlan s-uggʷar amnn tikrkas-an.
ġmkad a-s-ra-tḍr lɛqubit f-kullu willi ur-umnnin s-lḥqq frḥn s-ma-yʷh̬šnn.
walaynni iqqan-aġ-d a-bdda-ntškar rbbi fllawn ay-aytmatnnġ lli-f-iḥnna siditnnġ, ašku iẓli-kʷn zġ-isizwar a-tnjmm, issġus-kʷn s-rruḥ lqudus baš a-tgm wins f-ssibt n-ma-tumnm lḥqq.
kullu mayad, iġra-yawn-d srs rbbi s-lh̬bar ifulkin lli-awn-in-niwi, baš ad-awn-tili taġamt ġ-lmjd n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
imma ġilad ay-aytmatnnġ, zgayat tamẓm-bdda ġ-ulmmud lli-s-kʷn-nsslmd, zund mad-awn-nenna s-imi, zund mad-awn-in-nura s-ufus.
ar-ntalġ siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ d-rbbi babatnnġ lli-fllannġ-iḥnnan ibark-aġ ifk-aġ zzɛamt idumn ula rrja iṣḥan.
ar-t-ntḍalab a-bahra-izzɛam issdus ulawn-nnun baš a-tskarm ar-tsawalm s-kullu ma-ifulkin.
imma ġilad ay-aytmatnnġ, ẓẓallat fllannġ tḍalbm rbbi ad-aġ-iɛawn a-nsslkm lh̬bar n-siditnnġ ġ-uwssan-ad s-kullu-tmazirt-ad baš a-srs-sflidn mddn ggutnin ġmklli sfldn ġ-darun.
ḍalbat-t ad-aġ-issanf i-mddn šqanin ʷh̬šnnin, ašku ur-a-kullu-ttirin ad-amnn.
imma siditnnġ iqama-bdda ġ-wawal-ns, ra-kʷn-issdus issntal-kʷn zġ-walli yʷh̬šnn.
hati isshnna-yaġ siditnnġ f-ssibt-nnun, nissan is-a-tskarm kullu mad-awn-nenna rad-bdda-ti-tskarm.
imma ġilad, nḍalb siditnnġ a-kʷn-ihdu baš a-ttḥnnum ġmklli itḥnnu rbbi, ar-ttṣbarm ġmklli itṣbar lmasiḥ.
way-aytmatnnġ, s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ a-s-ra-kʷn-nuṣṣa ġilad, nini-awn a-ttanfm i-aytmatn nna-yagʷin ad-th̬damn ula-da-skarn s-ulmmud lli-awn-nsslmd.
ašku tssnm is-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣa a-tskarm ġmklli nskar nkkʷni, ur-ngawr ġ-darun bla-da-nth̬dam.
ur-jju-nšši aġrum n-yan bla-yas-nfka atig-ns. nkka-ttin ar-nth̬dam ġ-iyḍ ula azal, ar-nkkat takrrayt baš a-ur-nẓẓay f-yan gigun.
wah̬h̬a darnnġ lḥqq a-zgigun-nḍalb ma-nḥtajja, ur-jju-t-nḍalb. nskr ġmkan baš ad-awn-nml mamnk a-kʷn-d-iqqan a-tskarm ula kunni.
ġakud lliġ didun nlla nenna-yawn «wanna ur-irin a-ih̬dm, ih̬ṣṣa-t a-ur-išš.»
imma ġilad nsfld is-llan kra n-mddn ġ-gratun ur-a-skarn yat, agʷin tawuri, ar-kššmn ġir ssuq n-wiyyaḍ.
zund ġwin, ra-tn-nuṣṣa ġilad s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, nnṣḥ-tn ad-th̬damn ass f-wass baš ad-amẓn mad-šttan f-twuri lli-skarn.
way-aytmatnnġ, skarat afulki bla-da-ttrmaym.
ẓrat wanna yagʷin a-isflid s-mayd-awn-nura ġ-tbrat-ad, tanfm-as baš a-ti-tigʷraẓ.
a-ur-ti-tgm d-unuwwaš-nnun, walaynni nṣḥat-t zund yan igan zġ-aytmatun.
ar-ntḍalab siditnnġ lli-igan bab n-sslamt ad-awn-yakka sslamt ġ-kraygatt tasga d-kraygatt tasaɛt. a-didun-yili siditnnġ kullukn.
nkki bulus, s-ufus-inu a-s-uriġ awal-ad n-sslam, ig tamatart-inu ġ-kraygatt tabrat-inu. ġmkad a-s-a-taraġ.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ kullukn.
zġ-bulus arqqas l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, ġmklli yumr rbbi anjjam-nnġ d-lmasiḥ yasuɛ lli-ġ-n-nrja.
i-timutaws iwi iɛzzan ġ-tagʷmat l-lmasiḥ. ad-ak-tili lbaraka d-rrḥmt d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-lmasiḥ yasuɛ siditnnġ.
ḍalbġ zġ-gik ġilad a-n-tqamat ġ-tmdint n-afsus ġmklli-ak-nniġ ġakud lliġ-n-zriġ s-tmazirt n-makiduniyya. ašku llan ġin kra n-mddn ar-sslmadn ma-ur-igin lḥqq. riġ a-tn-tamrt ad-fssan,

tinit-asn a-ur-tlhun ih̬f-nsn s-tḥajiyin h̬wanin ula s-ismawn ggutnin n-kullu tasutin lli-zrinin. han tiġawsiwin-an, ar-trarant mddn ad-tmjaḥadn i-ngratsn. ur-a-tn-tɛawannt ad-amnn ar-skarn ma-gisn-ittiri rbbi.
ġmkan a-s-k-uṣṣaġ ašku riġ a-nzayd ar-ntɛmmar s-lḥnant n-willi dar ul iġusn issann is-ur-gisn lɛib amnn s-lmasiḥ s-nniyt ikmmln.
walaynni kra n-mddn ffuġn aġaras-ad, ar-jllun ih̬fawn-nsn s-imjaḥadn h̬wanin.
ar-ttirin ad-gn imslmdn n-ššrɛ, walaynni ur-fhimn ma-ttinin ula ssnn tiġawsiwin lli-s-a-sslmadn s-zzɛamt.
nssn nkkʷni is-ifulki ššrɛ ġ-dar wanna srs iskarn ma-ira rbbi.

walaynni iqqan-d a-nissan izd f-ssibt n-willi ʷh̬šnnin a-f-d-ifka rbbi ššrɛ, urd f-ssibt n-willi fulkinin. ifk-t-id f-willi ur-rinin ššrɛ ffuġn zġ-gis. ifk-t-id f-willi rurnin tiġurdin-nsn s-rbbi ar-tsalan ddnub, ur-a-tuqqarn rbbi ula-da-ttirin aġaras-ns. ifk-t-id f-willi nqqanin babatsn nġd innatsn ula ġwilli nqqanin wiyyaḍ.

ifk-t-id f-willi tfsadnin ula ġwilli tšthunin iwtman zund ntni. ifk-t-id f-willi takʷrnin iḥšmay ula ġwilli sskirkisnin ula ġwilli akkanin tugga n-tkrkas. ifk-t-id f-kullu willi skarnin aynna iffuġn zġ-ulmmud yʷġẓann.
almmud-ad iga lh̬bar ifulkin l-lmjd iggutn lli-yyi-d-imla rbbi ambarki ad-srs-tbrraḥġ.
ar-tškarġ lmasiḥ yasuɛ siditnnġ ašku iga-yyi d-wad izgan ġ-ufulki. iẓli-yyi issdus-iyi baš ad-qasaġ tawuri-ns.
kkiġ-ttin ar-rggmġ lmasiḥ ar-t-ssrfufunġ ar-dids-tmmaġġ, walaynni irḥm-iyi-d ašku ur-ssinġ mad-skarġ ġ-uwssan-an, ur-ta-srs-uminġ.
ġakudan ibark gigi siditnnġ s-lḥnant-ns iggutn, iɛmmr-iyi s-liman d-tayri n-willi ganin win lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
awal izgan ayad, iqqan-d kud yan a-t-yamn: yuška-d lmasiḥ yasuɛ s-ddunit baš a-ijjnjm mddn ʷh̬šnnin, d-nkki a-kullu-gisn-yʷh̬šnn.
walaynni f-mayan a-f-iyi-d-irḥm nkki lli-gisn-yʷh̬šnn, baš a-iml is-iẓḍar lmasiḥ yasuɛ a-iṣbr d-wanna ka-illan, baš a-srs-amnn wiyyaḍ kšmn ula ntni s-tudrt idumn.
imma ġilad rad-bahra-ntalġ agllid lli-idumn. ur-ra-immt ula iẓra-t yan. nttan waḥdut a-igan rbbi, yili-as lmjd d-luqr, ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.
wa-iwi timutaws, fkiġ-ak luṣit-ad ġmklli fllak nnan aytmatn ġayd izrin s-iwaliwn lli-asn-imla rbbi. amẓ ġ-iwaliwn-nsn baš a-tbkist ar-tkkatt takrrayt f-ufulki.
zzga ih̬f-nnk ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ, d-a-ur-tadjt kra yʷh̬šnn a-ikšm s-uwl-nnk. han kra n-mddn ur-a-stti-tawin ġ-mad-asn-imala-uwl-nsn. d-ġayan a-f-a-trẓẓa tanawt l-liman-nsn,
zgisn himinayus d-iskandr. dḥiġ-tn-in ntni i-šiṭan baš ad-lmdn a-ur-rggmn rbbi.
f-mayan a-f-rad-ḍalbġ zġ-aytmatn ad-tẓallan f-kullu mddn, ar-tḍalabn rbbi a-tn-irḥm ibark-tn, ar-ti-tškarn f-ma-iskar i-kraygatt yan.
illa fllasn ad-tẓallan f-igldan ula kullu willi tḥkamnin, baš a-nddr s-lhna d-sslamt nskr afulki ula kullu ma-ira rbbi.
išwa mayad, irḍu srs rbbi anjjam-nnġ
lli-iran kullu mddn ad-njmn wrrin issann lḥqq.
ašku illa yan rbbi, yili yan lli-ibiddn ġ-gr rbbi d-bnadm, a-t-igan d-lmasiḥ yasuɛ lli-igan bnadm.
ifka ih̬f-ns a-ifru kullu mddn ġ-uzmz lli-iqṣad rbbi a-gis-issbayyn tugga-ns.
d-ġmkad a-s-iyi-iga d-ubrraḥ d-urqqas ġ-gr ayt-tmizar aggugnin, baš ad-asn-sslmadġ aġaras l-liman ula lḥqq. lḥqq ayad nniġ, ur-akkʷ-sskarksġ.
riġ irgazn ġ-kraygatt amnaggar ad-tẓallan ar-tḍalabn rbbi, ar-n-tggan ifassn-nsn lli-s-a-skarn afulki bla-da-tqlaqaln ula-da-tẓin.
riġ ad-ḥšmnt-tmġarin lsnt malssa ingaddan lli-tnt-id-iqqann, urd s-tallamin n-wazzar nġd urġ nġd ljuhr nġd timlsa ġʷlanin,
walaynni s-ifulkitn lli-skarnt ġmklli-d-iqqan timġarin lli-tuqqarnin rbbi.
illa f-tmġarin ad-lmdnt ar-tḥšamnt bla-da-sawalnt.
ur-udjiġ kra n-tmġart a-tsslmad ula-da-ttḥkam ġ-irgazn. iqqan-tnd-d ad-fssant.
ašku rbbi iskr adam ġ-isizwar, iskr ilmma ḥuwwa.
urd adam a-f-tt-izzri iblis ġ-isizwar walaynni tamġart a-f-tt-izzri, tffuġ zġ-wawal n-rbbi.
walaynni ra-tnjm-tmġart s-tlalit n-tarwa iġ-a-ttqama ġ-liman ar-ttḥnnu ġ-wiyyaḍ ar-ttzga ġ-ih̬f-ns s-uwl iġusn.
izga-wawal-ad: wanna iran a-ig angabal n-umnaggar, hati tawuri ihiyyan ayd ira.

iqqan-d angabal a-ig wad ġ-ur-illi lɛib, iṭṭaf ġir yat-tmġart, izga-bdda ġ-lɛaql-ns ar-itnbaḍ ġ-kullu ma-iskar, ar-itfulki d-mddn ar-issmrḥba s-willi tmuddunin, yissan mamnk a-isslmad wiyyaḍ.
a-ur-ig wad bahra issann tissi iktin, nġd wad itmmaġn d-mddn. iqqan-d a-ig wad itṣbarn, urd wad itẓin nġd wad dar ɛzzan iqaridn.
iqqan-t-id a-ig wad itnbaḍn ġ-ayt-tgmmi-ns s-sslamt, ar-srs-sflidn tarwa-ns ar-ti-tuqqarn s-nniyt-nsn.
ašku iġ-ur-issin mamnk a-itnbaḍ ġ-ayt-tgmmi-ns, mamnk a-ra-yissan a-igabl amnaggar n-rbbi?
a-ur-ig wad bḥra yumẓn aġaras l-lmasiḥ, ad-as-ur-iml ih̬f-ns is-iga kra, iḍr ġ-lhalak n-iblis.
iqqan-d a-ig wad-f-akkan ayt-brra tugga šwanin, baš a-ur-iḍr tigira ġ-trggam n-mddn, tamẓt-t-ilmma-tẓqqurt n-iblis.
ula imɛawann n-umnaggar, iqqan-tn-d ad-gn wid zganin ġ-ufulki. a-ur-gn wid sskirkisnin nġd wid ttblanin s-tissi iktin nġd wid ttirinin ad-ssmunn ma-iggutn i-ih̬f-nsn.
iqqan-tn-d ad-ġwin s-uwl iġusn ġ-ulmmud lli-aġ-d-imla rbbi.
ula ntni ih̬ṣṣa-tn ad-zwar-tyaramn. iġ-ur-gisn-ityafa kra l-lɛib, rad-iẓḍarn ad-qasan tawuri-ad n-imɛawann.
ula timġarin, iqqan-tnd-d ad-gnt tid zganin ġ-ufulki, ar-tnbaḍnt ġ-ih̬f-nsnt, ar-skarnt s-lḥqq. a-ur-gnt tid sawalnin ġ-mddn.
iqqan-d amɛawn a-iṭṭaf ġir yat-tmġart, ar-itnbaḍ ġ-tarwa-ns d-ayt-tgmmi-ns s-sslamt.
winna skarnin tawuri-ad n-imɛawann s-nniyt-nsn, rad-ɛzzan dar mddn, zɛmn bahra ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ar-trjuġ a-n-dark-aškġ ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn, walaynni uriġ-ak-n tiġawsiwin-ad baš a-tnti-tissant iġ-d-maṭlġ,
tẓrt ma-d-iqqann a-ti-tskar tagʷmat n-rbbi, a-stt-igan d-umnaggar n-willi ganin win rbbi lli-iddrn, tg llsas ula tannalt l-lḥqq.
maylli-aġ-d-imla rbbi, ar-kullu-gis-ntɛjjab: iban-d ġ-ssift n-bnadm, inru s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ, ẓrn-t lmalayka. ilkm lh̬bar-ns timizar aggugnin, amnn srs ġ-kullu ddunit, ityalal s-lmjd.
isawl rruḥ lqudus ġilad s-wawal izgan yini: ġ-uwssan ggʷranin rad-fln kra n-mddn aġaras l-lmasiḥ, ar-sflidn s-tkrkas l-larwaḥ ʷh̬šnnin ula s-ulmmud l-ljnun
dar imslmdn sskirkisnin ayt-sin-uwdmawn lli-mi-qqurn-uwlawn-nsn bahra.
imslmdn-an ar-ssḥramn littihal ula kra ih̬lq rbbi i-umššu, ifk-t i-willi srs umnnin issann lḥqq, baš a-t-šttan ar-t-fllas-tškarn.
ašku ifulki kullu ma-ih̬lq rbbi. ih̬ṣṣa-yaġ a-ur-nssḥram yat, walaynni a-t-nškr f-kullu ma-nštta.
ašku ar-t-issḥlla rbbi s-wawal-ns ula s-tẓallit lli-s-a-t-fllas-ntškar.
iġ-a-tmalat tiġawsiwin-ad i-aytmatn ra-tgt ah̬ddam išwan l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, tdust s-tnbaḍin l-liman ula s-ulmmud ifulkin lli-tumẓt.
walaynni anf i-tḥajiyin h̬wanin ula lh̬rayf n-ddunit-ad, ar-tssdust ih̬f-nnk a-ttazzalt ġ-uġaras n-rbbi.
ašku yan issdusn ddat-ns, afulki ayn iskr, walaynni yan issdusn rruḥ-ns s-ma-irḍan rbbi, rad-as-ifulki s-uggʷar i-tudrt-ns n-ddunit-ad ula tin lih̬rt.
izga mayd-ak-nniġ, iqqan-d kud yan a-t-yamn.
f-mayan a-f-a-nth̬dam ar-fllas-nkkat takrrayt, ašku nga rrja-nnġ ġ-rbbi lli-iddrn. nttan a-ijjnjamn kullu mddn, s-uggʷar ġwilli umnnin.
sslmad-asn tiġawsiwin-ad ar-tn-ttuṣṣat a-srsnt-skarn.

ad-ur-tadjt yan a-k-iḥgr f-ssibt n-ma-sul-tmẓẓit, walaynni skar-bdda f-ufulki s-iwaliwn-nnk d-iskkirn-nnk, ar-ttḥnnut ġ-wiyyaḍ ar-ttamnt awal n-rbbi s-uwl iġusn, baš ad-ẓrn imumnn mamnk a-tskart irin ad-skarn ula ntni ġmkan.
lhu ih̬f-nnk ar-taqrat arratn n-rbbi f-aytmatn ar-tn-tzzɛamt ar-tn-tsslmadt ard-n-aškġ.
a-ur-tettut tawafka n-rruḥ lli-gik-illan, ifka-yak-t rbbi s-wawal lli-d-imla ġakud lliġ-n-munn imġarn, srsn fllak ifassn-nsn.
fk ih̬f-nnk i-twuri-ad ar-srs-ttlhut, baš ad-ẓrn kullu mddn mamnk a-gis-ttzayadt.
awi-tt-bdda ġ-ih̬f-nnk d-ulmmud-nnk, tzgat ġ-kullu tiġawsiwin-ad, ašku ġmkad a-s-ra-tjjnjmt ih̬f-nnk tjjnjmt ula imsflidn-nnk.
a-ur-tššḥššmt kra n-ufqqir iġ-iskr kra yʷh̬šnn, walaynni ssfhm-as ma-t-ih̬ṣṣan zund iġ-iga babak.
skar d-iɛyyaln zund aytmak, ar-tskart d-tfqqirin zund innak, ar-tskart d-tfrh̬in zund istmak s-uwl iġusn.
bidd d-thjjalin lli-ur dar yan.
walaynni tahjjalt nna-dar tarwa-ns nġd tarwa n-tarwa-ns, iqqan-tn-d ad-issann is-gisn-ira rbbi ad-thallan ġ-tilli ganin tinsn. illa fllasn ad-traran lh̬ir i-ayt-darsn, ašku rbbi irḍa s-mayad.
imma tahjjalt nna-iqaman waḥdutt bla yan, tga rrja-ns ġ-rbbi ar-as-ttẓalla ar-zgis-ttḍalab ġ-iyḍ ula azal.
imma tahjjalt nna-isalan ma-ira ih̬f-ns, han tmmut ġ-rruḥ wah̬h̬a tsul ġ-ddat.
uṣṣa-tn kullu f-mayad baš a-ur-yili kra ġ-illa lɛib.
ašku wanna ur-itɛawann tagʷmat-ns, han iffuġ aġaras l-lmasiḥ, yʷh̬šn uggʷar n-willi ur-akkʷ-ssinnin aġaras, d-bahra iġ-ur-a-itɛawan ayt-dars.
šškšm ġ-warra n-thjjalin tanna irgln sḍiṣ id-mraw n-usggʷas, iġ-ttin dars ikka ġir yan-urgaz,

ar-tti-talġn mddn f-lh̬ir lli-tskar, trbbu tarwa-ns f-ma-ifulkin, ar-tssmrḥba s-willi tmuddunin ar-ttqasa imẓlayn n-rbbi, ar-ttɛawan winna llanin ġ-tnukmut, ar-n-bdda-ttgga tiqqi-ns a-tskar afulki d-kullu mddn.
walaynni a-ur-tšškšmt timẓẓiyin ġ-warra n-thjjalin, ašku ra-ttirint ad-tahlnt tis snat-twal. ra-ttidunt ard ttunt lmasiḥ
ffuġnt zġ-wawal lli-s-as-nnant awind-d f-ih̬f-nsnt lḥukm n-rbbi.
wan ntnti ar-tmyarnt inifsisn ar-tlullint zġ-tgmmi s-tayyaḍ. urd ġayan kad-skarnt walaynni ar-sawalnt f-mddn ar-kššmnt ma-ur-igin winsnt, ar-ttinint ma-ur-tnd-d-iqqann a-ti-ttinint.
mayan a-f-riġ tihjjalin lli-mẓẓinin ad-tahlnt, arunt tarwa awint-stt ġ-tgmmi-nsnt, baš a-ur-yili dar inuwwašn-nnġ ma-s-a-yaġ-rggmn.
ašku kra gisnt ijla, amẓnt aġaras n-šiṭan.
walaynni tamġart tamumnt nna-dar tihjjalin ist-dars, illa fllas a-tnti-ttɛawan baš a-ur-iẓẓaynt f-umnaggar n-imumnn. ġmkad a-s-ra-yiẓḍar-umnaggar a-itɛawan tihjjalin nna-ur-dar yan.
imma imġarn lli-tnbaḍnin ġ-umnaggar s-nniyt d-ufulki, iqqan-d aytmatn a-tn-tuqqarn bahra, s-kigan ġwilli th̬damnin f-tbrraḥt d-ulmmud.
ašku ityara ġ-warra n-rbbi: «a-ur-tgt aġamu i-uzgr lli-isrwatn.» ityara-daġ: «ah̬ddam isthlla tiġrad-ns.»
a-ur-tsfldt s-yan itaštkkan s-umġar iġ-ur-d-yiwi sin nġd kraḍ inagan.
imma yan iskarn ddnub, ini-as f-ma-iskr ġ-lgddam-nsn kullutn baš ad-iksaḍn wiyyaḍ.
ha-yyi ġ-lgddam n-rbbi d-lmasiḥ yasuɛ d-lmalayka n-ignna a-k-uṣṣaġ a-tzzgat tiġawsiwin-ad bla-da-tskart s-uwdmawn ula-da-ttirit a-ttrḍut ih̬f-nnk.
a-ur-tzrbt a-tsrst ifassn-nnk f-yan a-ti-tẓlit i-twuri n-rbbi, a-ur-imil-tkšmt ġ-ddnub n-wiyyaḍ. gabl ul-nnk a-bdda-iġus.
a-ur-sul-tssat ġir aman, walaynni zayd-asn imikk n-win-waḍil iktin baš a-ijji-udis-nnk, ašku mnnawt-twal ayd ttaḍnt.
kra n-mddn, ar-gisn-tbann ddnub-nsn, ar-malan is-ra-fllasn-ittut lḥukm. imma wiyyaḍ rad-bann ddnub-nsn tigira.
ġmkan a-di-tbann ula ifulkitn lli-skarn mddn. ula afulki lli-irgsn ra-d-iban tigira.
imma ġwilli llanin ġ-uzaglu n-twuri išqan, illa fllasn ad-tuqqarn id-siditsn, baš a-ur-d-irar yan tirggam i-ism n-rbbi ula almmud-nnġ.

wanna mi iga sidis amumn, ih̬ṣṣa-t a-ur-iḥgr sidis f-ssibt n-ma-iga gʷmas. illa fllas a-ith̬dam s-uggʷar d-nniyt, ašku ġwalli itamẓn lh̬ir ġ-twuri-ns iga amumn ig zġ-aytmas ɛzzanin. sslmad tiġawsiwin-ad i-aytmatn ar-asn-ttinit ad-skarn ġmkad.
han kra n-mddn ar-sslmadn tinbaḍin yaḍni ur-d-mšaškant d-iwaliwn ṣḥanin n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ula almmud lli-s-irḍa rbbi.
ntni ar-bahra-ssimġurn ih̬f-nsn walaynni ur-ssinn yat. iɛjb-tn ad-tmḥakkan ar-tmjaḥadn f-iwaliwn, aylliġ a-twrrin ar-tḥsadn ar-tẓin ar-rggmn ar-ttuhamn.
ur-a-tiẓḍarn mddn-an ad-d-mšaškan, ijlu-asn lɛaql ffuġn zġ-lḥqq. ġaln is-rad-amẓn iqaridn i-ih̬f-nsn ġ-uġaras n-rbbi.
illa-nnit lh̬ir i-yan imunn d-uġaras n-rbbi iqnɛu s-mad-dars-illan.
lliġ-d-nkšm ddunit-ad ur-d-niwi yat. iġ-ra-stt-nffuġ ur-ra-nawi yat.
walaynni iġ-darnnġ ma-nštta d-ma-nlssa nqnɛu s-mayan.
imma ġwilli ranin ad-ssmunun ayda iggutn, hati ar-šškšamn ih̬f-nsn s-tẓqqurt ula tassast. ar-tn-itnru kullu ma-igan ṭṭmaɛ, ar-tn-issnuful ar-tn-issyaggas ar-tn-itawi s-lhalak.
ašku tayri n-iqaridn ar-di-ttawi kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn. llan kra n-mddn ar-bahra-ttirin iqaridn aylliġ ffuġn aġaras l-lmasiḥ, ssyaggasn ulawn-nsn s-tguḍi iggutn.
imma kiyi ay-ah̬ddam n-rbbi, aggug zġ-kullu ġayan. tgt-n tiqqi-nnk a-bdda-tskart afulki ula kullu ma-irḍan rbbi. amn awal-ns ar-ttḥnnut ġ-wiyyaḍ ar-ttṣbart ar-ttrh̬ut d-kullu mddn.
bkis ar-tkkatt takrrayt l-liman, tamẓt ġ-tudrt idumn lli-s-ak-iġra rbbi lliġ tnnit i-inagan ggutnin f-mamnk a-tumnt s-lmasiḥ.
imma ġilad uṣṣaġ-k ġ-lgddam n-rbbi lli-yakkan tudrt i-kraygatt kra, ula lmasiḥ yasuɛ lli-ifkan tugga l-lḥqq ġ-dar bilaṭus gu-bunṭus,
iniġ-ak a-bdda-tskart s-tnbaḍin-ad baš a-ur-gik-yili kra l-lɛib ula kra f-a-irggm yan, ar ass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ ibayyn.
ra-d-yašk ġ-uzmz lli-ira rbbi ambarki lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan, ig agllid n-igldan ig anmġur n-inmġurn.
nttan waḥdut a-bdda-iddrn, izdġ ġ-tifawt lli-s-ur-iẓḍar yan a-n-srs-yakmur. ur-jju-t-iẓri yan ula iẓḍar yan a-t-iẓr. nttan a-mi-illa lmjd d-lquwwa, ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.

ini i-willi dar iggut-wayda n-ddunit-ad, a-ur-ssimġurn ih̬f-nsn ula-da-tawin rrja s-maylli ur-ssinn is-rad-darsn-iqama. tinit-asn ad-gn rrja ġ-rbbi lli-irḍan ad-aġ-yakka kullu ma-igan lh̬ir a-srs-ntfraḥ.
ini-asn ad-skarn afulki, igatn darsn iskkirn šwanin, ar-tɛawann ar-akkan i-wiyyaḍ.
ġmkan a-s-rad-ssmunn i-ih̬f-nsn lh̬ir l-lih̬rt, baš a-ig llsas izgan ma-f-a-bnnun tudrt lli-igan tudrt iṣḥan.
wa-timutaws, gabl lamant lli-ak-ifka rbbi. anf i-tjmmaɛt ih̬wan d-imjaḥadn n-willi ur-ssinnin rbbi. ar-ttinin is-darsn lfhmt walaynni ur-fhimn yat.
ašku lfhmt-an a-ijlan kra gisn zġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ. ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-rbbi.
zġ-bulus arqqas l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ġmklli ira rbbi, s-trqqast n-tudrt l-ljdid lli-f-inna ra-stt-ifk i-willi ganin win lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
i-iwi iɛzzan timutaws. ad-ak-tili lbaraka d-rrḥmt d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-lmasiḥ yasuɛ siditnnġ.
ar-tškarġ rbbi lli-mi-th̬damġ s-uwl iġusn zund imzwura-nu lli-zrinin. ar-k-id-swingimġ ġakud nna-tẓallaġ ġ-iyḍ ula azal.
swangmġ-d imṭṭawn-nnk, iriġ bahra a-k-ẓrġ ad-iyi-yili lfrḥ iggutn.
ur-ttuġ mamnk a-tumnt s-lmasiḥ s-nniyt-nnk, ġmklli tumn jddak luwwis ġ-isizwar, nttat d-innak afniki. ssnġ is-tumnt ula kiyi ġilad zund ntnti.
mayan a-f-ra-k-ḍalbġ a-tṣuṭṭ i-trgit l-lbaraka lli-gik-iga rbbi lliġ fllak srsġ ifassn-inu.
ašku rruḥ lli-aġ-ifka rbbi ur-a-yaġ-itrara a-ntiksaḍ, walaynni ar-aġ-itɛmmar s-tḥkimt itjhhdn d-lḥnant d-tnbaṭṭ n-ih̬f-nnġ.
f-mayan a-f-rad-ak-iniġ, a-ur-ttḥšamt a-tsawalt d-mddn f-siditnnġ, ula-da-flla-ttḥšamt nkki lli-illan ġ-lḥbs f-ism-ns. walaynni bkis s-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-rbbi a-didi-ttrfufunt f-lh̬bar ifulkin.
ijjnjm-aġ rbbi zġ-ddnub-nnġ iġr-aġ a-ng imẓlayn-ns, urd f-ssibt n-kra nskar nkkʷni walaynni f-ssibt n-ma-iqṣad nttan ad-aġ-ibark f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ ur-ta-ih̬lq ddunit.
ġmkan a-s-aġ-ibark ġilad ġ-d-yuška-unjjam-nnġ lmasiḥ yasuɛ, inru lquwwa l-lmut issbayyn-aġ-d lh̬bar ifulkin n-tudrt idumn.
f-lh̬bar-ad a-f-iyi-iẓli rbbi ad-gġ abrraḥ-ns d-urqqas-ns d-umslmd fllas.
mayan a-f-a-trfufunġ ġmkad. walaynni ur-akkʷ-ḥšimġ, ašku ssnġ ġwalli-s-umnġ. wrriġ issanġ is-iẓḍar a-igabl lamant-inu ar ass iggʷran.
amẓ-bdda ġ-ulmmud yʷġẓann lli-mi-dari-tsfldt, tɛmmrt s-liman d-lḥnant lli-aġ-illan ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
gabl lamant ifulkin lli-ak-ifka rbbi, tgablt-stt s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus lli-ginnġ-illan.
tsfldt f-aytmatn ġ-tmazirt n-asiyya mamnk ad-ddan kullu fln-iyi. zġ-gisn fijalis d-harmujanis,
walaynni ḍalbġ siditnnġ a-irḥm f-ayt-tgmmi n-unisifurus, ašku mnnawt-twal a-issfjjij f-uwl-inu, ur-t-ššḥššimnt ssnasl-ad-inu.
nttan ġir ilkm-d tamdint n-ruma s-a-sri-isiggil s-lmɛqul aylliġ-iyi-yufa.
ḍalbġ siditnnġ ad-as-issigt rrḥmt ġ-wass l-lḥsab. tssnt mamnk a-yyi-iɛawn bahra ula ġ-tmdint n-afsus.
zayd a-iwi, ar-ttdust s-lbaraka l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
maylli mi zgigi tsflidt ġ-gr inagan ggutnin, akka-t ġ-gr ifassn n-mddn zganin ẓḍarn ad-sslmadn wiyyaḍ.
bkis ar-didnnġ-ttrfufunt zund aɛskri ifulkin l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
yan igan aɛskri ġ-imiġ ur-ra-ilhu ih̬f-ns s-tġawsiwin yaḍni n-ddunit-ad, ašku ra-yiri a-itrḍu anmġur-ns.
ula yan iskrn šala n-tizzla, ur-rad-as-yili ttaj n-umzwaru abla iġ-iskr s-limur n-tizzla.
afllaḥ lli-ith̬damn s-nniyt, nttan a-isthllan a-yasi taġamt tamzwarut ġ-tmgra.
swangm ġ-mayd-ak-nniġ, ra-k-issfhm siditnnġ kullu mayad.
swangm-d yasuɛ lmasiḥ. iga zġ-tasut n-ugllid dawd, inkr-d zġ-lmut, ġmklli ittini lh̬bar ifulkin lli-s-a-tbrraḥġ.
hati f-ssibt l-lh̬bar-ad a-f-a-trfufunġ, qqnġ s-ssnasl zund yan iffuġn lqanun. walaynni ur-akkʷ-iqqin-wawal n-rbbi s-ssnasl.
mayad a-f-a-kullu-tṣbarġ, baš ad-tnjamn imẓlayn n-rbbi f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, kšmn s-lmjd idumn.
izga-wawal-ad: «iġ-dids-nmmut ra-dids-nddr.
iġ-a-ntṣbar ra-dids-ntḥkam. iġ-nenna ur-t-nssin ra-yini ur-aġ-issin.
iġ-ndda ar iġ-ur-sul-a-gis-ntamẓ, rad-bdda-ginnġ-yamẓ, ašku ur-iẓḍar a-isskarks f-ih̬f-ns.»
ssktay-asn-d kullu mayad, tamrt-tn ġ-lgddam n-rbbi ad-ur-tmjaḥadn f-iwaliwn, ašku imjaḥadn ur-a-tnfaɛn i-yat. ar-ġir-thlakn ġwilli-asn-sflidnin.
g-n tiqqi-nnk ad-awn-ifk rbbi rrḍa-ns, zund ah̬ddam išwan ur-ti-tššḥššim-twuri lli-iskr, ar-tsslmadt awal l-lḥqq ġmklli iga.
anf i-tjmmaɛt ih̬wan n-willi ur-ssinnin rbbi, ašku ar-ġir-tssaggug mddn zġ-rbbi s-uggʷar.
han almmud-nsn iga zund aṭṭan lli-išttan ddat n-bnadm. zġ-gisn himinayus d-filitus,
jlan ntni zġ-uġaras l-lḥqq, ar-traran ula wiyyaḍ a-ur-sul-amnn. ar-ttinin ur-rad-nkrn mddn ġ-lih̬rt walaynni ġir ġ-ddunit-ad a-ġ-d-nkrn.
walaynni idus llsas lli-izzugz rbbi ur-a-itmussu, ityara gis: «sidi rbbi issn manwi ganin wins.» ityara-daġ: «wanna innan win sidi rbbi a-iga, iqqan-t-id a-yaggug f-kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn.»
ggutn irukutn ġ-tgmmi imqqurn. illa gisn ma-igan win-uwrġ ula nnuqrt, yili gisn ma-igan win-ukššuḍ ula akal. yili gisn ma-igan i-umššu ula ma-igan i-warras.
iġ-isird yan ul-ns zġ-irkan, ra-ig aruku iṣlḥn iġus ġ-ufus n-sidis, yujad i-twuri nna-ifulkin.
aggug zġ-ššhwat n-iɛyyaln, tirit a-tɛmmrt s-ufulki lli-s-irḍa rbbi ar-ttamnt awal-ns ar-ttḥnnut ġ-wiyyaḍ ar-tzrayt s-sslamt, kiyi ula kullu winna aqranin i-siditnnġ s-uwl iġusn.
a-ur-tkšmt ġ-imjaḥadn h̬wanin n-willi ur-fhimnin ma-f-a-sawaln, ašku tssnt is-ur-a-di-tawin ġir taẓit.
iqqan-d ah̬ddam n-siditnnġ a-ur-itẓi. illa fllas a-itfulki d-kullu mddn, yissan mamnk a-tn-isslmad ar-itṣbar i-kullu ma-išqan.
s-lḥnant a-s-ra-imala lḥqq i-winna-t-ḍaḍḍnin, irju-n ġ-rbbi ad-asn-irar ad-fln kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn wrrin issann lḥqq,
njmn s-lmɛqul zġ-tẓqqurt n-iblis lli-tn-iġwin baš ad-skarn ma-ira.
swangm-d mayad: ġ-uwssan ggʷranin rad-ilin izmaz šqanin.
ašku rad-tsalan mddn ġir ih̬fawn-nsn ar-tsalan iqaridn, ar-talġn ar-ssimġurn agayyu-nsn ar-rggmn wiyyaḍ. ur-rad-sflidn s-ayt-darsn ula-da-tškarn yan ula-da-ttirin rbbi.
ur-rad-tḥubbun ula-da-tṣamaḥn i-yan, walaynni rad-bahra-rggmn ġ-wiyyaḍ ar-tẓin ar-tmmaġn ar-tkrhun kullu ma-ifulkin.
ur-rad-zgan ġ-wawal-nsn ula-da-tnbaḍn ġ-ih̬f-nsn, walaynni rad-tḥgarn wiyyaḍ. rad-tlhun s-kullu ma-tn-iɛjbn, ur-ra-tlhun s-ma-ira rbbi.
rad-inin izd imumnn ad-gan, walaynni ur-gisn-tlli-tḥkimt itjhhdn n-willi umnnin s-rbbi. tanf i-mddn-an.
wan ġwid a-ikššmn s-tgʷmma zund ingʷmarn, ar-tt-zzrayn f-tmġarin lli-ur dar lɛaql, ẓẓayn fllasnt ddnub-nsnt, ar-tnt-itawi kullu kra ttirint.
wan ntnti ar-bdda-tlmadnt walaynni ur-jju-ẓḍarnt ad-issannt lḥqq.
han mddn-an ihrš lɛaql-nsn, ffuġn aġaras n-rbbi, ar-tḍaḍḍan lḥqq ġmklli sttin ikka yannis d-yambris ar-tḍaḍḍan musa.
walaynni ur-rad-bahra-tzayadn ġ-ġayan, ašku ra-iban i-kullu mddn is-ffuġn ih̬f-nsn ġmklli iban ġ-sin irgazn-an.
imma kiyi, tssnt mad-sslmadġ ula mamnk ad-skarġ ula mad-qṣadġ. tissant mamnk ad-tamnġ awal n-rbbi ar-tṣbarġ ar-tḥnnuġ ar-tzayadġ bla-da-trmayġ.

tissant mnšk ad-trfufunġ ar-bahra-kkatġ tammara. tsfldt f-mad-iyi-ijran ġ-tmdinin n-anṭakiyya d-iquniyya d-listra. tsfldt f-trfufnt iggutn lli-flla-izrin. walaynni kullu ġayan, ifukka-yyi siditnnġ zġ-gis.
ašku kullu wanna iran a-iskar ma-irḍan rbbi s-ism l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, tarfufnt a-ġ-ra-izri.
imma mddn ʷh̬šnnin d-ayt-tkrkas rad-ġir-tzayadn ġ-lh̬ʷšant-nsn s-uggʷar, jlan ntni ar-jllun wiyyaḍ.
imma kiyi, iqqan-k-id a-ttzayadt ġ-maylli tlmdt tamnt srs, ašku tssnt manwi-t dar tlmdt.
kiyi zġ-mẓẓiy-nnk a-zġ-tssnt arratn n-rbbi lli-ẓḍarnin a-k-ssfhmn mamnk a-tamnt s-lmasiḥ yasuɛ tnjmt.
hati kullu ma-illan ġ-warratn-ad, rbbi a-t-id-issbayynn. išwa kullu a-srs-nsslmad lḥqq, nššḥššm wanna iskrn ma-yʷh̬šnn, nrar-d wanna ijlan, nml mamnk a-nskar afulki lli-s-irḍa rbbi.
ġmkad a-s-ra-yujad-uh̬ddam n-rbbi i-twuri-ns, yiẓḍar a-iskar kullu ma-ifulkin.
ra-k-uṣṣaġ ġilad ġ-lgddam n-rbbi d-lmasiḥ yasuɛ lli-ra-d-yašk a-ikšm s-tgldit-ns yut lḥukm f-willi ddrnin ula ġwilli mmutnin.
iniġ-ak: tbrraḥ s-wawal n-rbbi, tbrrḥt srs ġ-uzmz išqan ula wad irh̬an. rar-d winna ffuġnin aġaras, tššḥššmt-tn f-ddnub nna-skarn, tzzɛamt-tn f-ufulki, ar-tsslmadt bla-da-ttrmayt.
han rad-d-aškin kra n-uwssan ġ-ur-rad-sflidn mddn s-ulmmud yʷġẓann. rad-trḍun iguyya-nsn ar-ssigatn i-ih̬f-nsn imslmdn lli-rad-asn-ittini ma-tn-iɛjbn.
ur-rad-irin ad-sfldn s-lḥqq, walaynni ra-stti-tawin ġir ġ-tḥajiyin h̬wanin.
imma kiyi ih̬ṣṣa-k a-bdda-tġwit ġ-ih̬f-nnk, tṣbrt i-trfufnt, ar-tth̬damt s-tbrraḥt l-lh̬bar ifulkin. skar kullu ma-d-iqqann wad igan ah̬ddam n-rbbi.
imma nkki, tlkm-d tasaɛt lli-ġ-ra-n-srsġ tudrt-inu ġ-lgddam n-rbbi, ffuġġ ddunit-ad.
ha-yyi nriġ tikrrayin lli-kkatġ, kmmlġ aġaras lli-ġ-a-tazzalġ, sul zgaġ ġ-liman.

rad-iyi-yili ttaj ġilad n-yan irḍan rbbi. iḥḍa-yyi-t siditnnġ lli-bdda-iḥkamn s-lḥqq, baš ad-iyi-t-ifk ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk. urd ġir nkki a-mi-ra-yili, walaynni ra-t-ifk i-kullu willi-n-gis-rjanin ar-srs-tqln.
g-n tiqqi-nnk a-d-dari-taškt ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn.
ašku ifl-iyi ḍimaṣ iddu s-tmdint n-tasaluniki, iwrri ar-ittiri tiġawsiwin n-ddunit-ad. iddu ula kriskins s-tmazirt n-galaṭiyya, iddu tiṭus s-tmazirt n-dalmaṭiyya.
ġir luqa a-didi-iqaman. riġ a-tzrit dar marqus tawit-t-id didk, ašku iẓḍar a-yyi-iɛawn ġ-twuri.
imma tih̬ikus uznġ-t s-afsus.
iġ-di-tuškit tawit-iyi-d aslham lli-n-flġ ġ-dar karbus ġ-tmdint n-truwwas. tawid-d ula arratn, riġ bahra ġwilli ganin win ilm.
kigan d-lh̬ʷšant ad-iyi-iskr iskandr lmɛllm n-wanas. rad-as-irar siditnnġ f-ġayan.
ih̬ṣṣa-k a-zgis-trart lɛaql ula kiyi, ašku iḍaḍḍ almmud-nnġ bahra.
tawala tamzwarut ġ-rurġ awal f-uṣraḍ-nsn, ur-didi-ibidd yan. fln-iyi kullutn. a-ur-tn-iḥasb rbbi f-mayan.
walaynni ibidd didi siditnnġ, issdus-iyi ad-asn-tbrraḥġ s-lh̬bar ifulkin ġmklli iga. sfldn-as ibrraniyn kullutn, njmġ nkki zġ-imi n-yizm.
ra-yyi-ijjnjm siditnnġ zġ-kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn, issruḥ-iyi-n ġ-laman s-tgldit-ns n-ignna. nttan a-bahra-ntalġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan. amin.
ar-n-tsllamġ f-briskilla d-akila, ntni d-ayt-tgmmi n-unisifurus.
iqama arastus ġ-tmdint n-kurintus, imma trufimus, flġ-t-in yuḍn ġ-militus.
g-n tiqqi-nnk a-di-taškt ur-ta-di-tlkim-tgrst. ar-n-fllak-itsllam yubulus d-budins d-linus d-kludya d-aytmatn yaḍni kullutn.
a-n-didk-yili siditnnġ, tili-awn lbaraka-ns.
zġ-bulus ah̬ddam n-rbbi d-urqqas n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ lli-yyi-iẓlin ad-malaġ i-imẓlayn n-rbbi mamnk ad-tamnn s-wawal-ns, issann kullu ma-igan lḥqq n-uġaras-ns
lli-itawin s-rrja iṣḥan n-tudrt idumn. rbbi ur-a-isskirkis. ġakud lliġ ur-ta-ih̬lq yat a-inna rad-aġ-tili tudrt-ad.
issbayyn-tt-id ġ-uzmz-ad lli-iqṣad s-lh̬bar lli-s-iyi-yuṣṣa rbbi anjjam-nnġ a-srs-tbrraḥġ.
i-tiṭus iwi iɛzzan ġ-tagʷmat l-liman-nnġ. ad-ak-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-lmasiḥ yasuɛ anjjam-nnġ.
mayad a-f-k-in-flġ ġ-igzir n-krit, baš a-tkmmlt ma-iqaman ġ-twuri, tẓlit kra n-mddn ġ-kraygatt tamdint ad-gn imġarn n-umnaggar ġmklli-f-k-uṣṣaġ.
iqqan-d amġar a-ig wad ġ-ur-illi lɛib, iṭṭaf ġir yat-tmġart. iqqan-d tarwa-ns ad-gn imumnn bla-da-srsn-taštkkan mddn is-a-skarn ma-yʷh̬šnn ula-da-tffuġn zġ-wawal n-ayt-darsn.

iqqan-d angabal a-ig wad ġ-ur-akkʷ-illi kra l-lɛib ašku tawuri n-rbbi a-ra-igabl. a-ur-ig wad itḥgarn wiyyaḍ nġd wad itqlaqaln nġd wad bahra issan tissi iktin nġd wad itmmaġn nġd wad ittirin a-issmun ma-iggutn i-ih̬f-ns.
iqqan-d a-ig wad issmrḥban s-willi tmuddunin, ig wad dar iɛzza kullu ma-ifulkin, ar-itnbaḍ ġ-ugayyu-ns ar-bdda-iskar s-lḥqq, iġus-uwl-ns iġwi ġ-ih̬f-ns.
iqqan-t-id a-yamẓ ġ-iwaliwn zganin lli-s-a-nsslmad. ġmkad a-s-ra-yiẓḍar a-izzɛam wiyyaḍ s-ulmmud yʷġẓann, irar awal i-wanna-t-iḍaḍḍn.
ašku ggutn mddn ur-rin ad-sflidn s-wawal-nnġ, bahra ġwilli ttirinin ad-ẓẓalln i-ddat, ar-jllun wiyyaḍ s-tjmmaɛt ih̬wan.
iqqan-k-id a-tn-tssfssat, ašku ar-ssgrawaln kra n-ayt-tgʷmma kullutn. ar-sslmadn ma-ur-igin lḥqq baš ad-tamẓn kra i-ih̬f-nsn.
illa yan gu-krit lli-mi-ttinin ‹nnabi›, ula ntta isawl fllasn inna: «ayt-krit ar-bdda-sskirkisn. zund luḥuš ʷh̬šnnin ad-gan. ġir iṭs d-umššu a-f-a-skarn.»
ʷġẓannt tugga-yad. ġayan a-f-k-ih̬ṣṣa a-tn-tššḥššmt s-lmɛqul, baš ad-zgan ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ,
a-ur-sul-tti-tawin ġ-tḥajiyin n-ayt-yudaya ula luṣiyat n-mddn lli-ffuġnin zġ-lḥqq.
hati kullu ma-illan iġus i-willi dar ul iġusn, walaynni ur-iġus yat dar willi mi rkan-uwlawn-nsn ur-rin ad-amnn. ntni irka lɛaql-nsn ula ul-nsn.
ar-ttinin is-ssnn rbbi, walaynni iskkirn-nsn a-imalan is-ur-t-ssinn. han iḥaša-tn rbbi, ur-a-skarn s-wawal-ns ula ẓḍarn i-ma-ifulkin.
imma kiyi, illa fllak a-tsslmadt mddn ad-skarn kullu s-ma-d-imšaškan d-ulmmud yʷġẓann.
ini i-irgazn mqqurnin ad-zgan ġ-ih̬f-nsn, ar-bdda-tfulkin d-mddn, ar-tnbaḍn ġ-kullu mad-skarn. tinit-asn ad-dusn ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ ar-tḥnnun ġ-wiyyaḍ ar-tzayadn ġmkad bla-da-trmayn.
ini ula i-tmġarin mqqurnin ad-skarnt ġmklli-d-iqqann h̬tilli tuqqarnin rbbi. tinit-asnt a-ur-sawalnt ġ-mddn ula-da-ttblunt s-tissi iktin. illa fllasnt ad-sslmadnt timġarin mẓẓinin f-ma-ifulkin
ar-asnt-malant mamnk a-tga tayri lli-s-rad-tɛawannt irgazn-nsnt ula tarwa-nsnt.
ar-asnt-malant mamnk a-rad-iẓḍarnt ad-tnbaḍnt ġ-kullu mad-skarnt s-uwl iġusn, ar-th̬damnt ġ-tgmmi ar-tfulkint d-mddn ar-sflidnt s-irgazn-nsnt baš a-ur-d-irar yan tirggam i-wawal n-rbbi.
ini i-iɛyyaln ad-tnbaḍn ġ-ih̬f-nsn.
ula kiyi illa fllak a-bdda-tskart afulki d-mddn baš ad-asn-tmalat mamnk a-tn-d-iqqan ad-skarn ula ntni. sslmad-tn s-lḥqq d-lmɛqul
s-iwaliwn ʷġẓannin lli-f-ur-iẓḍar yan a-fllasn-iẓi. iġ-a-tskart ġmkan ra-itḥšam wanna iran a-k-iḍaḍḍ, ašku ur-ra-yaf ma-fllannġ-ittini yʷh̬šn.
ini i-ih̬ddamn ad-sflidn s-id-siditsn ar-tn-trḍun ġ-kullu mad-skarn. a-ur-fllasn-ssiqarn ih̬fawn-nsn
ula-da-tn-takʷrn. illa fllasn a-bdda-skarn s-nniyt-nsn, baš ad-ẓrn mddn mnšk a-s-ifulki-ulmmud-nnġ f-rbbi lli-aġ-ijjnjmn.
issbayyn-d rbbi lḥnant-ns ġilad a-srs-ijjnjm kullu mddn.
ar-aġ-isslmad a-ntanf i-kullu ma-t-ur-irḍin ula ššhwat n-ddunit-ad. ar-aġ-isslmad a-ntnbaḍ ġ-ih̬f-nnġ ar-nskar s-lḥqq ula kullu ma-t-irḍan ġilad ġ-sul-nqama ġ-ddunit.
ar-ntql ar-ntrju ass-an ambarki lli-ġ-ra-d-iban lmjd n-rbbi-nnġ imqqurn yasuɛ lmasiḥ lli-aġ-ijjnjmn.
ifka ih̬f-ns ad-aġ-ifru zġ-kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn, issġus-aġ baš a-ng mddn-ns lli-bahra-ittirin ad-skarn ma-ifulkin.
sslmad tiġawsiwin-ad i-aytmatn, ar-asn-ttinit ad-skarn ġmkad, ar-tššḥššamt wanna iskarn ma-yʷh̬šn s-lamr lli-ak-ityawfkan. a-ur-tadjt yan a-k-iḥgr.
sskti-asn-d is-fllasn-illa ad-sflidn s-lḥukkam ula kullu wiyyaḍ tḥkamnin tamazirt, ar-skarn s-wawal-nsn, ujadn i-kra igan tawuri iṣlḥn.
tinit-asn a-ur-rgmn ġ-yan ula ẓin d-yan. illa fllasn ad-tṣbarn ar-trh̬un d-kullu mddn.

ula nkkʷni nkka-ttin nga inafaln imɛṣan imjlan, ntyawkrraf ġ-ššhwat ula kullu ma-s-a-ttblun mddn. nkka-ttin ar-nzzray ussan-nnġ s-tnuwwašt d-iskkirn ʷh̬šnnin, ar-aġ-tkrhun mddn ar-tn-ntkrhu ula nkkʷni.
walaynni rbbi anjjam-nnġ issbayyn-d mnšk a-ifulki iḥubbu bnadm.
s-rrḥmt-ns iggutn a-s-aġ-ijjnjm, urd f-ssibt n-ifulkitn lli-nskar. ijjnjm-aġ isird-aġ ifk-aġ talalit n-tudrt l-ljdid s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus
lli-s-aġ-iɛmmr f-ufus n-unjjam-nnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ġmkad a-s-ginnġ-iḥnna rbbi iskr sslamt ġ-gratnnġ dids ifk-aġ lwrt n-tudrt idumn lli-n-nrja ġilad.
awal izgan ayad. riġ zġ-gik a-tzzgat tiġawsiwin-ad ġ-dar willi umnnin awal n-rbbi, baš ad-tlhun ih̬f-nsn s-iskkirn šwanin. ifulki mayad, ra-infɛa kullu mddn.
walaynni anf i-tjmmaɛt ih̬wan n-willi tmjaḥadnin f-ismawn n-tasutin lli-zrinin, ar-tẓin ar-tmmaġn f-ššrɛ n-musa. ġayan ur-akkʷ-a-itnfaɛ s-yat.
imma wanna yaṭṭun aytmatn, ini-as a-ifssa, tinit-as-t tis snat-twal. iġ-ur-ifssa, anf-as a-ur-sul-didun-imun.
ašku issbayyn wan ġwad is-iffuġ aġaras n-rbbi s-ddnub-ns, izzugz lḥukm f-ih̬f-ns.
ġakud nna-yak-n-uznġ artimas nġd tih̬ikus, ašk-in s-dari s-nikubulis, a-ur-tmaṭlt. ašku riġ a-n-zzriġ tagrst ġin.
g-n tiqqi-nnk a-tɛawnt lmuḥami zinas nttan d-abullus, baš ad-kmmln f-uġaras-nsn, tfkt-asn aynna-tn-ih̬ṣṣan.
illa f-mddn-nnġ ad-myurn ad-tlhun s-twuri iṣlḥn baš ad-biddn d-wanna ilkmn f-kra, a-ur-zzrin tudrt-nsn bla lfaytt.
ar-n-fllak-tsllamn kullu willi didi llanin. ar-n-ntsllam f-aytmatnnġ ɛzzanin lli-umnnin s-lmasiḥ. ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-rbbi kullukn.
zġ-bulus aḥbbas f-ism l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ, d-zġ-gʷmatnnġ timutaws. i-umddakkʷl-nnġ iɛzzan filimun lli-didnnġ-itmɛawan ġ-twuri-ad,
d-ulltmatnnġ abfiyya d-arh̬ibbus lli-yaggsn s-twuri n-rbbi zund nkkʷni, d-umnaggar n-aytmatn ġ-tgmmi-nnk.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ar-bdda-tškarġ rbbi-nu fllak, ar-k-id-swingimġ ġakud nna-tẓallaġ.
ašku ar-sflidġ f-mamnk a-bahra-tumnt s-siditnnġ yasuɛ, ula f-mamnk ad-dark-ɛzzan kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi.
ar-tḍalabġ rbbi ad-ak-imala kullu lbarakat lli-aġ-llanin f-uwdm l-lmasiḥ ġilad ġ-didnnġ-tmunt ġ-uġaras l-liman.
wa-gʷma ha-yyi thnnaġ, frḥġ bahra ašku ɛzzan dark aytmatn, tssfjjijt f-uwlawn n-imẓlayn kullutn.
rad-iẓḍarġ zɛmġ a-k-amrġ s-ism l-lmasiḥ f-ma-k-id-iqqann a-ti-tskrt,
walaynni ssnġ is-dark-nɛzza. mayan a-f-riġ a-t-zgik-ḍalbġ, nkki-ad igan afqqir gġ ġilad aḥbbas f-ism l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
riġ a-k-ḍalbġ f-iwi unisimus, ašku wrriġ giġ babas ġ-tagʷmat l-lmasiḥ ġ-uwssan-ad ġ-tyawkrrafġ s-ssnasl.
ġayd izrin ur-a-k-itnfaɛ s-yat, imma ġilad infɛa-yyi nkki ula kiyi.
wah̬h̬a iga nttan zund tasa-nu, uznġ-t-in ġilad a-n-iwrri s-dark.
riġ nkki a-d-didi-iqama, ašku iẓḍar a-yyi-iɛawn ġilad ġ-tyawkrrafġ s-ssnasl f-ssibt l-lh̬bar ifulkin, ġmklli ttirit kiyi a-yyi-tɛawnt mrad is-didi-tllit.
walaynni ur-riġ mayad abla s-wawal-nnk, baš a-tskrt afulki s-lh̬aṭr urd s-bzzez.
is-urd mayad a-f-didk-ingara ar ġilad? baš a-n-iwrri iqama didk bdda,
a-ur-ig ġir ismg-nnk walaynni uggʷar n-ismg, ašku iwrri ġilad iga gʷmak iɛzzan. iɛzza dari nkki, walaynni ra-dark-iɛzza s-uggʷar, ašku kiyi a-mi-iga winnk ġ-ddat ula ġ-siditnnġ.
imma ġilad, iġ-iyi-tgit d-umddakkʷl-nnk ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ, ḍalbġ-k a-srs-tssmrḥbat ġmklli trit a-sri-tssmrḥbat nkki.
aynna-yak-iskr yʷh̬šn nġd aynna-yas-tḍfart, ḥasb-t flla.
nkki bulus, s-ufus-inu a-s-rad-ak-n-araġ: «rad-ak-t-fkġ.» imma kiyi tssnt izd zġ-nkki a-s-ak-tlla tudrt-nnk.
ḍalbġ-k a-gʷma, a-gigi-tskrt afulki-ad f-uwdm n-siditnnġ, tssfrḥt ul-inu s-ism l-lmasiḥ.
ssnġ is-ra-tskrt mayad-ak-n-uriġ, ra-tskrt uggʷar n-mad-ḍalbġ.
imma ġilad riġ ad-iyi-tjjujadt aḥanu n-unbgi ġ-dark, ašku rjiġ-n ġ-rbbi ad-awn-ifk maylli zgis ttḍalabm, yadj-iyi a-n-wrriġ s-darun.
ar-n-fllak-itsllam abafras, iga aḥbbas didi f-ism l-lmasiḥ yasuɛ.
ar-n-fllak-tsllamn aytmatn marqus d-aristarh̬us d-ḍimaṣ d-luqa lli-didi-tmɛawannin ġ-twuri n-rbbi.
a-gigun-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
f-imi l-lanbiya ggutnin a-f-isawl rbbi s-imzwura-nnġ ġayd izrin, kraygatt azmz d-mad-asn-imla.
imma ġ-uwssan-ad ggʷranin isawl-d srnnġ f-imi n-yan igan yus. nttan a-s-ih̬lq kullu ma-illan, iẓli-t a-iwrt kraygatt kra.
iban gis lmjd n-rbbi, ig ṣṣurt n-rruḥ-ns, iḥkam ġ-kullu ma-illan s-tḥkimt n-wawal-ns. ġakud lliġ issitti ddnub f-bnadm iskiws f-ufasi n-rbbi l-lmjd ġ-tattuyt n-ignwan.
iga-t rbbi d-wad yugʷrn lmalayka, ifk-as ism lli-yugʷrn ismawn-nsn.
ašku urd kra n-yan ġ-lmalayka a-mi-inna rbbi ġ-warra-ns: «kiyi tgit iwi. babak ad-giġ ġassad.» urd kra l-lmalak a-f-inna: «rad-gġ babas, ig ntta iwi.»
walaynni rbbi, ġakud lliġ ra-d-yazn yus ih̬fddi s-ddunit inna: «kullu lmalayka n-rbbi, iqqan-tn-d a-ti-tɛbadn.»
hati lmalayka a-f-inna: «rbbi iskr lmalayka-ns zund aḍu, iskr ih̬ddamn-ns zund timzliwin l-lɛafit.»
walaynni lliġ isawl f-yus inna: «lɛrš-nnk a-rbbi a-rad-bdda-idum, ur-ra-sar-itmmu. iga-uɛmud n-tgldit-nnk aɛmud l-lḥqq.
ar-ttrḍut s-ufulki, ar-ttkrhut lh̬ʷšant. mayan a-f-k-iẓli rbbi lli-igan rbbi-nnk s-uẓġur l-lfrḥ issayk-k nnig inggan-nnk.»
yini-daġ fllas: «kiyi a-sidi rbbi a-izzugzn llsas n-ddunit ġ-isizwar. f-ufus-nnk a-f-tyawskarn ignwan.
ntni ra-tn-kullu-laḥ, imma kiyi rad-bdda-tilit. ntni rad-kullu-mdun zund timlsit, imma kiyi rad-bdda-tqamat.
ra-tn-tssmuttlt zund aslham tkkist-tn, imma kiyi ġmklli tgit a-rad-bdda-tgt. isggʷasn-nnk ur-ra-sar-tmmun.»
ur-jju-inni rbbi i-kra l-lmalak: «skiws f-ufasiy-inu ard gġ inuwwašn-nnk ġ-ddu iḍarn-nnk.»
ašku lmalayka ur-gin ġir larwaḥ lli-th̬damnin i-rbbi, ar-tn-d-itazn ad-qasan ġwilli ra-injm.
mayan a-s-fllannġ-illa a-stt-ntawi s-uggʷar ġ-ma-mi-nsfld, a-ur-njlu zġ-uġaras.
ašku ššrɛ lli-d-yuškan i-imzwura-nnġ f-imi l-lmalayka, ur-iẓḍar yan gisn ad-as-yanf, walaynni tḍr lɛqubit s-lḥqq f-kullu wanna zgis iffuġn ula kullu wanna ur-srs-iskarn.
imma ġilad, mamnk a-ra-nnjm iġ-ur-tt-niwi ġ-ujnjm-ad ihiyyan? siditnnġ yasuɛ a-izwarn inna-yaġ fllas, sawln fllas ula ġwilli sfldnin i-siditnnġ mln-aġ is-iga lḥqq.
izzga-t rbbi s-lmɛjizat d-lɛjayb d-lquwwat ggutnin ula s-twafkiw n-rruḥ lqudus lli-ifka i-mddn ġmklli ira.
urd lmalayka a-mi-ifka rbbi ad-tḥkamn ġ-ddunit lli-ra-yili, a-stt-igan d-ddunit l-ljdid lli-f-a-nsawal ġilad.
walaynni ġmklli inna yan ġ-warra n-rbbi: «ma-iga bnadm aylliġ a-gis-tswingimt, ula yus n-bnadm aylliġ-tt-gis-tiwit? imma kiyi tgit-t-id ġ-ddu l-lmalayka yan imikk, tfkt-as ttaj l-lmjd d-lhibt,
trart kullu ma-illan ġ-ddu iḍarn-ns.» ġmkad a-s-imla rbbi is-irur kullu ma-illan ġ-ddu iḍarn n-bnadm baš a-t-iḥkam. imma ġilad iban is-ur-ta-illi kullu ġ-ddu iḍarn n-bnadm.
walaynni nẓra yasuɛ lli-iwrrin illa-d ġ-ddu l-lmalayka yan imikk, nẓr-t yattuy s-lmjd d-lhibt f-ssibt l-lmut lli-s-immut a-srs-issruḥ rrḥmt n-rbbi i-kullu mddn.
rbbi a-ih̬lqn kullu ma-illan, ig kullu wins. iskr ma-ifulkin lliġ iqṣad a-imjjd anjjam-nnġ s-urfufn, irar mddn ggutnin ad-gn tarwa-ns kšmn dids s-lmjd-ns.
ur-iḥšim yasuɛ ad-aġ-ig d-aytmas, ašku ġwalli issġusn ula ġwilli issġus, babatsn iga yan.
inna nttan i-babas: «rad-iniġ i-aytma f-kullu ma-tskrt, alġġ-k ġ-wammas n-umnaggar.»
yini-daġ: «ra-n-rjuġ ula nkki ġ-rbbi.» yini-daġ: «ha-nkki d-tarwa-yad n-rbbi lli-yyi-ifka.»
nkkʷni-ad igan tarwa, nṭṭaf ddat n-tfiyi d-idammn. mayan a-f-iwrri ula ntta iṭṭaf ddat zund nkkʷni, baš a-immt ihlk iblis lli-dar lquwwa l-lmut.
ifsi i-kullu willi zzraynin ussan-nsn ġ-iskraf n-tksaḍ l-lmut.
iban is-urd lmalayka a-f-iskr mayan walaynni «iskr-t f-mddn n-tasut n-ibrahim.»

mayad a-f-d-iqqan yasuɛ a-irwas i-aytmas zġ-kraygatt tasga, baš ad-asn-ig anmġur ihiyyan iḥnnu gisn iskr kullu maylli ḥtajjan, ibidd ġ-gratsn d-rbbi a-n-isrs tiġrsi lli-ra-issitti ddnub f-bnadm.
imma ġilad iẓḍar a-iɛawn kullu wanna tarmnt lh̬ʷšanat, ašku irfufn ula ntta ityaram f-a-iskr ma-yʷh̬šnn.
way-aytma imẓlayn lli-mi-d-iġra rbbi ad-kšmn s-tamunt-ad, swingimad-d yasuɛ lli-d-ityazann a-ig anmġur ihiyyan l-liman lli-ġ-numẓ.
iskr kullu ma-gis-ira rbbi lli-t-iẓlin i-twuri-ad, ġmklli iskr musa kullu ma-gis-ira ġ-wammas n-ayt-tgmmi n-rbbi.
walaynni nssn is-isthlla yasuɛ luqr uggʷar n-musa. ašku abnnay, ar-ti-tuqqarn mddn uggʷar n-tgmmi lli-ibna.
kraygatt tigmmi ttyawbna f-ufus n-kra n-yan, imma rbbi iga abnnay n-kullu ma-illan.
musa issuwfa kullu ma-gis-ira rbbi, ig ah̬ddam ġ-wammas n-ayt-tgmmi n-rbbi, iml-asn ma-ra-yini rbbi ġ-maylli-d-iftan.
ula lmasiḥ issuwfa kullu ma-gis-ira rbbi, imma ntta iga yus n-tgmmi, tili-tgmmi kullutt ġ-ddu-ufus-ns. imma ayt-tgmmi-ns, nkkʷni a-tn-igan iġ-nzga nzɛm, namẓ-bdda ġ-rrja-yad darnnġ illan.
ġmklli-s-inna rruḥ lqudus: «ġassad iġ-tsfldm i-wawal-ns,
ad-ur-tssiqarm ih̬f-nnun zund imzwura-nnun lli-gigi-rggmnin ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-a-yyi-tarmn ġ-lh̬la.
kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas a-yyi-tarmn, ar-tmnadn kullu mad-skarġ.
mayan a-f-ḥašaġ mddn-an iniġ fllasn ‹ar-bdda-jllun ih̬fawn-nsn. ur-jju-ssinn aġaras-inu.›
s-lġaḍab a-s-nniġ awal-ad izgan, ‹ntni ur-sar-rad-kšmn s-usunfu-nu.›»
way-aytma, rarat lɛaql a-ur-gigun-yili ma-mi-yʷh̬šn-uwl-ns yagʷi a-yamn irar tiġurdin-ns s-rbbi lli-iddrn.
walaynni zzɛamat i-ngratun kraygatt ass, maḥdd llan-uwssan, a-ur-gigun-yili ma-n-lddin ddnub ard iqar ih̬f-ns ijlu.
ašku rad-bdda-nqama ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ iġ-nzga ġmklli numn zġ-isizwar ar isiggʷra.
ġmklli inna: «ġassad iġ-tsfldm i-wawal-ns, ad-ur-tssiqarm ih̬f-nnun zund imzwura-nnun lli-gigi-rggmnin.»
walaynni manwi sfldnin i-wawal n-rbbi rgmn gis? a-tn-igan d-willi-d-issufġ musa zġ-tmazirt n-miṣr.
manwi iḥaša rbbi kkuẓ id-mraw n-usggʷas? a-tn-igan d-willi skrnin ddnub mmtn ilmma ġ-lh̬la.
manwi mi inna rbbi s-wawal izgan ur-sar-rad-kšmn s-usunfu-ns? a-tn-igan d-willi ffuġnin zġ-wawal-ns.
ġayan ad-aġ-imlan izd f-ssibt n-mad-agʷin ad-amnn a-f-ur-ẓḍarn ad-d-kšmn s-usunfu n-rbbi.
isawl rbbi s-wawal izgan, yini is-ra-ifk asunfu i-mddn-ns. imma ġilad, illa fllannġ a-nrar lɛaql a-ur-ginnġ-yili ma-ur-ra-yiẓḍar a-srs-ikšm.
ašku lh̬bar n-usunfu-ad lli-mi-nsfld, sfldn-as-yad imzwura-nnġ walaynni ur-uminn awal lli-mi-sfldn. mayan a-f-ur-zgis-umẓn kra l-lfaytt.
imma nkkʷni lli-t-yumnn, nkšm ġilad s-usunfu lli-f-asn-inna: «s-lġaḍab a-s-nniġ awal-ad izgan ‹ntni ur-sar-rad-kšmn s-usunfu-nu.›» iqṣad rbbi asunfu-ad zġ-lliġ ih̬lq ddunit.
ityara ġ-yan-ugzzum ġ-warra-ns: «wis ssa-uwssan a-isunfa rbbi zġ-kullu ma-iskr.»
walaynni ityara-daġ: «ntni ur-sar-rad-kšmn s-usunfu-nu.»
hati ur-kšimn ġwilli iruḥ lh̬bar ġ-uwssan-an ašku ur-srs-skirn. walaynni sul llan wiyyaḍ rad-kšmn.
mayad a-f-iskr rbbi ass yaḍni lli-mi-inna ‹ġassad›, ašku tiġurdin n-isggʷasn ggutnin isawl-daġ f-imi n-dawd yini iwaliwn-lli: «ġassad iġ-tsfldm i-wawal-ns, ad-ur-tssiqarm ih̬f-nnun.»
mrad is-tn-išškšm yašuɛ s-usunfu, ur-ra-isawl rbbi tigira f-yan-wass yaḍni.
imma ġilad ra-sul-ifk rbbi asunfu ikmmln i-mddn-ns, ġmklli isunfa ntta ġ-wis ssa-uwssan.
ašku wanna ikšmn s-usunfu n-rbbi, nttan a-isunfan zġ-kullu ma-iskr ġmklli isunfa rbbi.
imma ġilad illa fllannġ a-bahra-nttiri a-nkšm s-usunfu-ad, a-ur-iḍr yan ginnġ ġmklli ḍrn ntni, ffuġn zġ-wawal n-rbbi.

hay-awal n-rbbi iddr itjhhd, imsad uggʷar n-taẓẓit lli-imsadn zġ-snat-tsgiw, ar-itbbi ġ-ugʷns n-bnadm ard ibḍu nnfst zġ-rruḥ, ibḍu adif zġ-ttmi n-ih̬san, ar-issbayyan nniyt n-uwl ula ma-iqṣad.
ur-irgs yat f-rbbi ġ-kullu ma-ih̬lq. hati ibayyn kullu ġ-iẓri n-walli mi-d-iqqan a-nrar lḥsab.
illa fllannġ a-nzga ġ-liman-ad ġ-numẓ, ašku illa-yaġ yan-unmġur ihiyyan lli-ikšmn s-ignna, a-t-igan d-yasuɛ yus n-rbbi.
illa-yaġ yan-unmġur ihiyyan lli-iẓḍarn a-iḥnnu f-ḍḍɛf-nnġ, ašku ityaram ula ntta zġ-kraygatt tasga zund nkkʷni, walaynni ur-jju-iskir kra n-ddnb.
f-mayad a-f-rad-iniġ: a-nzɛm ġilad a-n-nakmur s-lɛrš n-rbbi iḥnnan, ad-aġ-irḥm iḥnnu fllannġ iɛawn-aġ ġ-tasaɛt lli-ġ-nḥtajja.
kullu wanna igan anmġur ihiyyan, ityawstay zġ-gr mddn yaḍni, ityawẓlay a-ibidd ġ-gratsn d-rbbi ar-n-issakmur tiġrsiw d-twafkiw i-rbbi ma-s-a-n-fllasn-issitti ddnub-nsn.
iẓḍar-unmġur a-itrh̬u d-willi ur-ssinnin aġaras d-willi zgis jlanin, ašku iga bnadm ula nttan iḍɛf.
mayan a-f-t-id-iqqan a-n-issakmur i-rbbi tiġrsiw f-ddnub-ns ntta, ġmklli-tnt-in-issakmur f-ddnub n-wiyyaḍ.
ur-illi ma-iẓlin ih̬f-ns i-twuri-an ihiyyan, walaynni rbbi a-iẓlayn wanna ira, ġmklli iẓli anmġur harun.
ula lmasiḥ ur-issmqqur ih̬f-ns a-inawl tawuri n-unmġur ihiyyan, walaynni rbbi a-t-srs-iẓlin yini-as: «kiyi tgit iwi. babak ad-giġ ġassad.»
yini-as-daġ ġ-ugzzum yaḍni: «ra-tgt anmġur idumn zund malkiṣadq.»
ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-iṭṭaf yasuɛ ddat n-bnadm, ar-itẓalla ar-itḍalab s-tġuyya d-imṭṭawn i-walli iẓḍarn a-t-issanf i-lmut. isfld-as rbbi ašku ifka ih̬f-ns a-iskr ma-t-irḍan.
imma ntta, wah̬h̬a iga yus n-rbbi, s-tmmara a-s-a-itlmad a-iskar s-wawal n-rbbi.
walaynni lliġ ikmml kullu ma-fllas-illan, ijjnjm ġwilli skarnin s-wawal-ns s-ujnjm idumn,
ig-t rbbi d-unmġur ihiyyan zund malkiṣadq.
iggut dari mad-awn-ttiniġ f-mayad, walaynni ra-išqu a-ti-tfhmm, ašku wrrin ẓẓayn imzgan-nnun.

han illa f-kullu winna zzrinin unšk-ad l-luqt lli-tzzrim kunni, ad-iẓḍarn ad-sslmadn wiyyaḍ. imma kunni, hati sul tḥtajjam mad-awn-isslmadn tinbaḍin timzwura n-uġaras n-rbbi. ha-kunni sul-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣa-ukkʷfay, ur-ta-tẓḍarm i-umššu.
ašku wanna ur-issan ġir akkʷfay ur-ta-issin mamnk a-s-ra-irḍu rbbi, ašku sul imẓẓi.
imma amššu iga win imqqurn lli-myarnin ad-swingimn ar-aṭṭun ma-išwan zġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn.

imma ġilad, a-nzri zġ-tġawsiwin-an timzwura n-ulmmud f-lmasiḥ, nzayd s-ma-igan win imqqurn. a-ur-daġ-nttiri a-nzzugz llsas lli-yad-nzzugz ġayd izrin f-mamnk a-s-ra-d-nwrri zġ-iskkirn h̬wanin n-bnadm namn s-ma-iskr rbbi.
a-ur-daġ-nsawal ġir f-isiridn nġd asrus n-ifassn nġd tankra n-willi mmutnin nġd lḥukm l-lih̬rt.
ra-nzri zġ-tġawsiwin-an, nzayd s-kra yaḍni iġ-ira rbbi.
imma ġwilli ẓranin tifawt, mḍin lbaraka n-ignna, kšmn s-tamunt n-rruḥ lqudus,
frḥn s-wawal n-rbbi ula lquwwat n-uzmz lli-ra-d-yašk,
iġ-rurn ntni tiġurdin-nsn s-rbbi tigira n-kullu mayan, ur-sar-rad-iẓḍarn a-d-daġ-wrrin s-uġaras. ašku mlan i-kullu mddn is-ḥgrn yus n-rbbi, agʷln-t f-uggjdi tis snat-twal.
ašku akal nna-issan anẓar lli-d-fllas-iṭṭarn, ar-yakka ṣṣabt išwan i-willi-t-krznin, ra-gis-tili lbaraka n-rbbi.
imma akal nna-ur-issmġayn abla azggʷar d-tskra, ur-infɛa s-yat. takmur-d srs nnɛlt, d-ujddar a-s-rad-as-tggʷru.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, wah̬h̬a srun nsawl ġmkad, nssn is-gigun-illa ma-yufn ġayan, ašku tgam wid ijjnjm rbbi.
nttan, s-lḥqq a-s-a-itḥkam. ur-ra-ittu tawuri lli-tskrm ula ittu mamnk a-tusim ism-ns s-lfrḥ tɛawanm imẓlayn-ns, ar-tn-sul-ttɛawanm.
imma ġilad nra kud yan gigun a-itzayad ġmkan s-zzɛamt ar isiggʷra, baš a-tkšmm kullukn s-lbaraka lli-n-ntrju.
a-ur-ttrmaym tflm ma-kʷn-d-iqqann, walaynni skarat zund kullu willi umnnin ṣbrn aylliġ kšmn s-tmih̬ar lli-f-asn-inna rbbi.
lliġ isawl rbbi s-ibrahim f-ma-rad-as-ifk, yini-as-t s-ism-ns, ašku ur-illi kra n-ism yugʷrn ism n-rbbi.
yini-as: «ra-k-barkġ fkġ-ak tarwa ggutnin.»
iql ibrahim iṣbr aylliġ-as-ityawfka maylli-s-as-inna rbbi.
hati s-ism n-ma-tn-yugʷrn a-s-aqran mddn, baš ad-zzgan iwaliwn-nsn, a-ur-sul-gisn-tškkun wiyyaḍ.
ġmkan a-iskr rbbi, yiri a-issml i-willi ra-iwrt timih̬ar-ns is-ur-ra-iwrri ġ-wawal lli-s-asn-inna. mayan a-f-izuyd ism-ns i-wawal-ns.
ašku sin-ad, ur-illi ma-iẓḍarn a-tn-igllb ula iẓḍar rbbi a-fllasn-isskarks. ġmkan a-iskr f-ssibt-nnġ nkkʷni lli-gis-izawgn, baš a-bahra-nzɛm namẓ s-uggʷar ġ-rrja lli-aġ-ifka.
rrja iṣḥan izgan ayad, ssrṣan gis-uwlawn-nnġ ard-aġ-išškšm zġ-lh̬amiya s-tḥanut ityawqdasn,
s-illis ikšm yasuɛ lli-aġ-izwarn a-bdda-ig anmġur ihiyyan f-ssibt-nnġ ġ-lgddam n-rbbi ġmklli iga malkiṣadq.
malkiṣadq ikka-ttin iga agllid n-tmdint n-salim, ig anmġur ibiddn ġ-gr mddn d-rbbi amattuy. nttan a-n-imnaggarn ibrahim ibark-t lliġ-d-iwrri ibrahim zġ-imiġ lli-ġ-inra igldan yaḍni.
ifk-as ibrahim tis mrawt zġ-kullu ma-d-ikkis i-igldan-lli. malkiṣadq, tga lmɛna n-ism-ns ‹agllid lli-irḍan rbbi›. ig ntta agllid n-salim, tga lmɛna-ns ‹agllid n-sslamt›.
ur-ityara yat f-babas nġd innas nġd imzwura-ns, ula ityara yat f-tlalit-ns nġd lmut-ns, walaynni irwas i-yus n-rbbi ašku iga-bdda anmġur ibiddn ġ-gr mddn d-rbbi.
ẓrat mnšk a-s-imqqur malkiṣadq, ašku nttan a-mi-ifka babatnnġ ibrahim tis mrawt zġ-kullu ma-d-ikkis i-igldan.
nssn izd ayt-lawi a-ityawẓlayn ġ-ššrɛ n-musa f-ad-skarn tawuri n-tgmmi n-rbbi, ar-asn-akkan mddn tis mrawt zġ-kullu ma-darsn-illan, wah̬h̬a gan ntni aytmatsn zġ-tasut n-ibrahim.
imma malkiṣadq, wah̬h̬a ur-igi zġ-ayt-lawi, yumẓ zġ-ibrahim tis mrawt, ifk ilmma lbaraka-ns i-ibrahim lli-isti rbbi a-iwrt kullu ma-f-as-inna.
iban is-yugʷr malkiṣadq ibrahim, ašku ġwalli imqqurn a-yakkan lbaraka i-walli ikkan ddawas.
imma ayt-lawi lli-tamẓnin tis mrawt ġilad, ntni bnadm kad-gan ar-tmtatn. walaynni ġwalli mi ifka ibrahim tis mrawt, ityara fllas is-iddr.
ayt-lawi lli-tamẓnin tis mrawt, nẓḍar a-fllasn-nini izd ntni a-ifkan tis mrawt i-malkiṣadq f-ufus n-babatsn ibrahim.
ašku sul-n-illa lawi ġ-ugʷns n-ddat n-ibrahim, ur-ta-jju-d-ilul, a-imnaggar d-malkiṣadq.

rbbi iskr inmġurn zġ-ayt-lawi baš ad-zzgan ššrɛ. gan ntni zġ-tasut n-unmġur harun. walaynni mrad is-ẓḍarn ad-šškšmn mddn s-kullu-ma-iqṣad rbbi, ur-rad-ḥtajjan mddn ad-asn-d-yašk yan-unmġur yaḍni igan zund malkiṣadq.
walaynni lliġ ibddl rbbi inmġurn-an s-unmġur-ad yaḍni, iqqan-d a-ityawbddal ššrɛ ula ntta.
ur-igi-unmġur-ad zġ-tqbilt n-lawi, walaynni iga zġ-yat-tqbilt yaḍni lli-zġ-ur-jju-ih̬dim kra n-yan ġ-twuri n-uẓru n-tġrsi.
imma siditnnġ, nssn is-iga zġ-tqbilt n-yahuda. ur-jju-iskir musa kra n-inmġurn zġ-tqbilt-an.
imla-yaġ mayan is-iga siditnnġ yan-unmġur zund malkiṣadq, urd zund ayt-lawi.
iwrri iga anmġur s-tḥkimt n-tudrt idumn, urd s-lwrt n-tasutin n-bnadm.
ġmklli ityaran: «ra-tgt anmġur idumn zund malkiṣadq.»
ur-sul-a-itgga rbbi ayt-lawi d-inmġurn-ns, ašku ur-ẓḍarn ad-biddn ġ-gras d-mddn ġmklli ira.
han ššrɛ n-musa ur-ikmmil yat, walaynni rbbi ifka-yaġ ġilad yan-rrja iṣḥan lli-yufn mayan, ar-n-srs-ntakmur i-rbbi.
lliġ isawl rbbi f-rrja-yad, izzga awal-ns s-ism-ns. inmġurn yaḍni, ur-izzga rbbi aẓlay-nsn s-ism-ns,
walaynni s-ism-ns a-s-izzga aẓlay n-yasuɛ. ġmklli ityaran: «s-ism-ns a-s-d-isawl sidi rbbi, ur-ra-iwrri ġ-wawal-ns, yini-as ‹ra-tgt anmġur idumn.›»
ġmkan a-s-iwrri yasuɛ iga ḍḍamn n-yal-lɛhd lli-bahra-yufn lɛhd-an yaḍni.
wrrin ggutn inmġurn n-ššrɛ bahra, ašku ar-tmtatn ar-d-faln tawuri-nsn i-mad-asn-iggʷran.
imma yasuɛ iga wad ur-sar-itmmin, ig anmġur idumn.
mayad a-f-iẓḍar a-ijjnjm kullu winna-n-issruḥ i-rbbi ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, ašku iddr-bdda a-itḍalab rbbi fllasn.
wan anmġur-ad a-nḥtajja, iɛmmr s-ufulki n-rbbi, iġus-uwl-ns, ur-gis-illi kra l-lɛib, ityawẓlay zġ-kullu ma-iskarn ddnub, ityalal s-iggi n-ignwan.

ur-igi zund inmġurn n-ššrɛ, ašku ur-t-ih̬ṣṣa a-n-issakmur tiġrsiw i-rbbi ass f-wass f-ddnub-ns ntta ula f-ddnub n-mddn yaḍni. ašku yasuɛ, yat-tġrsi a-n-issakmur yat-twal f-ddnub-nnġ kullwaġ lliġ ifka ih̬f-ns immt.
ḍɛfn inmġurn n-ššrɛ ašku bnadm kad-gan. imma yus n-rbbi, ityawẓlay s-ism-ns tigira n-ššrɛ, ikmml srs rbbi kullu ma-srs-iqṣad.
kullu mayad imla-yaġ is-darnnġ anmġur ihiyyan lli-nḥtajja, iskiws f-ufasi l-lɛrš n-rbbi l-lmjd ġ-ignna.
ar-iskar tawuri n-tḥanut tamẓlayt ġ-uh̬iyyam iṣḥan lli-ibna sidi rbbi, urd ġ-ġwalli ittbnan s-ifassn n-bnadm.
anmġur nna-illan, hati ityawẓlay f-a-n-issakmur tiwafkiw d-tġrsiw i-rbbi. mayan a-f-d-iqqan yasuɛ ula ntta a-n-issakmur kra.
mrad is-ra-iqama yasuɛ ġ-ddunit-ad ur-ra-iskar tawuri n-tgmmi n-rbbi ġ-ddunit-ad, ašku llan gis ġwilli-n-ssakmurnin tiwafkiw s-mklli-f-yuṣṣa ššrɛ.

taḥanut tamẓlayt lli-ġ-a-skarn tawuri-nsn ur-tgi abla zund yat-tmatart ula yan-umalu n-ma-illan ġ-ignna. mayan a-f-yuṣṣa rbbi musa lliġ iskr f-a-ibnu ah̬iyyam, yini-as: «rar lɛaql a-tskrt kullu zund maylli-ak-mliġ f-iggi n-udrar.»
imma tawuri n-yasuɛ tugʷr tin inmġurn-an yaḍni, ġmklli yugʷr lɛhd lli-d-yiwi yasuɛ lɛhd-nsn, ašku lbarakat lli-d-srs-ifka rbbi ugʷrnt tin lɛhd-an aqdim.
lɛhd aqdim, mrad is-ikmml kullu ma-iqṣad rbbi, ikun ur-ra-iskr yal-lɛhd l-ljdid.
walaynni sidi rbbi iẓra mddn-ns ur-ssuwfin kullu ma-gisn-ira. yini ilmma: «rad-d-aškin-uwssan lli-ġ-rad-skrġ yal-lɛhd l-ljdid d-mddn-inu n-ayt-yaɛqub d-ayt-yudaya.
ur-ra-ig zund lɛhd lli-skrġ d-imzwura-nsn lliġ-asn-umẓġ afus ssufġġ-tn-d zġ-miṣr. ašku ntni ur-sul-qaman f-lɛhd-an. f-mayan a-f-wrriġ flġ-tn.
walaynni ġmkad a-ra-ig lɛhd lli-rad-skrġ d-mddn-inu ġ-uwssan-an. ra-n-gġ tinbaḍin-inu ġ-ih̬fawn-nsn, araġ-tnt f-uwlawn-nsn. rad-gġ rbbi-nsn, gn ntni mddn-inu.
ur-ra-yini yan i-gu-tmazirt-ns ula i-gu-tgmmi-ns ‹ih̬ṣṣa-k a-tissant sidi rbbi,› ašku ra-yyi-issann kullutn, zġ-imẓẓiyn ar imqqurn.
ra-fllasn-ssittiġ ddnub-nsn, ur-sar-rad-d-swangmġ lh̬ʷšanat lli-skrn.»
imma lɛhd-ad, lliġ-t-iga rbbi d-ljdid, iban-umzwaru is-iga aqdim. aynna igan aqdim, hati imda. ġir imikk ra-t-laḥ.
lɛhd amzwaru, llant gis luṣiyat f-mamnk a-s-ra-tɛbadn mddn, ula mamnk a-s-rad-skrn yan-udġar ityawẓlayn i-rbbi ġ-ddunit-ad.
ssġlin ġmkan yan-uh̬iyyam, tili gis yat-tḥanut, ar-as-ttinin ‹taḥanut tamẓlayt›, lli-ġ-tlla lḥska ula ṭṭbla lli-f-a-srasn aġrum ġ-lgddam n-rbbi.
ġ-ugʷns n-tḥanut-an, ġ-tġurdin n-tis snat lh̬wami, aġ-n-tlla yat-tḥanut yaḍni, ar-as-ttinin ‹taḥanut ityawqdasn›.

tlla gis ṭṭbla n-uwrġ lli-f-a-tbh̬h̬arn, ula ṣṣnduq l-lɛhd lli-idln s-uwrġ zġ-kraygatt tasga. ġ-ṣṣnduq-an a-ġ-tlla yat taṭṭast n-uwrġ tusi aġrum n-‹manna›, ula aɛmud n-harun lli-imġin, ula tilwaḥ n-uẓru lli-f-tyarant luṣiyat l-lɛhd.
llan sin ‹karubim› f-uflla n-ṣṣnduq, ar-ssbayyann lmjd n-rbbi. dln ntni s-ifrawn-nsn illi-zġ-a-tittin ddnub n-mddn. imma tiġawsiwin-an, ur-rad-bahra-nsawl ġilad f-mamnk ad-gant.
walaynni lliġ kullu ngaddant-tġawsiwin-an, ar-kššmn inmġurn s-tḥanut tamzwarut ad-skarn tawuri-nsn.

imma taḥanut tis snat, ur-a-srs-ikššm yan. ġir anmġur ihiyyan a-srs-ikššmn yat-twal ġ-kraygatt asggʷas, ar-dids-itawi idammn, ar-tn-in-issakmur i-rbbi f-ssibt n-ddnub-ns ula ddnub lli-skrn mddn-ns bla ssnn is-tn-skrn.
ġmkad a-s-aġ-imla rruḥ lqudus is-ur-ta-yujad-uġaras lli-itawin s-tḥanut ityawqdasn, maḥdd sul tqama-tḥanut tamzwarut n-uh̬iyyam.
lmɛna-yad tmla-yaġ mamnk ad-gan ayt-yudaya sul s-ġassad. ar-n-ssakmurn tiwafkiw d-tġrsiw lli-ur-ẓḍarnin ad-ssġusnt ulawn n-willi-srsnti-tɛbadnin.
ašku ur-gint ġir tin-umššu d-tissi d-isiridn. tiġawsiwin-an, ġir tin ddat ad-gant. ur-rad-qamant ġir ar akud nna-ibddl rbbi kullu mayan s-kra igan ljdid.

imma lmasiḥ yuška-d a-ig anmġur ihiyyan l-lbarakat lli-aġ-illan ġilad. ah̬iyyam lli-ġ-iskr tawuri-ns yuf ġwalli-sttin-ikkan, yagʷr-t bahra. urd ġ-ddunit-ad a-ġ-illa, ula ityawskar s-ifassn n-bnadm.
ġir yat-twal a-srs-ikšm ntta, urd s-idammn n-waġaḍn ula win imugayn walaynni s-idammn n-ddat-ns. ġmkad a-s-aġ-ifra zġ-ddnub-nnġ s-ujnjm idumn.
nssn wanna iskrn kra iḥrmn, ar-ti-truššn inmġurn n-ayt-yudaya s-idammn n-waġaḍn nġd win imugayn nġd s-iġd n-tgizt ityawjdarn, baš a-tġus ddat-nsn zġ-lḥram.

walaynni uggʷar n-ġmkan a-rad-aġ-issġus lmasiḥ s-idammn-ns. ašku isrs-n ih̬f-ns lli-kullu-iṣfan ġ-lgddam n-rbbi s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lli-idumn. issġus ulawn-nnġ zġ-iskkirn mmutnin baš a-nwrri ng ih̬ddamn n-rbbi lli-iddrn.

ġmkan a-iskr lmasiḥ yal-lɛhd l-ljdid ġ-gr rbbi d-bnadm, išškšm srs ġwilli mi-d-iġra rbbi s-lwrt idumn lli-f-asn-inna rad-asn-yili. immut lmasiḥ baš a-ifru mddn zġ-ddnub lli-skrn lliġ sul llan ġ-lɛhd amzwaru.
nssn luṣit nna-illan f-lwrt is-ur-ẓḍarn ad-srs-skrn mddn ard issann is-immut ġwalli yuṣṣan f-lwrt.
ašku luṣit ur-tgi yat maḥdd sul iddr bab l-luṣit. ur-ra-srs-skrn mddn ard immt.
mayan a-f-d-iqqan ula lɛhd n-rbbi amzwaru a-izga s-idammn l-lmut.

lliġ ikmml musa iwaliwn-ns lli-s-yuṣṣa kullu mddn-ns f-luṣiyat n-ššrɛ, yawi idammn n-imugayn ula win-waġaḍn izayd-asn aman, yasi tiṣṭṭwin n-uzukkʷni yass-tnt s-taḍut iẓggʷaġn, irušš srsn arra n-ššrɛ ula mddn kullutn
yini-asn: «idammn-ad a-izzgan lɛhd lli-f-kʷn-yuṣṣa rbbi a-srs-tskarm.»
izayd ar-itrušš ah̬iyyam s-idammn ula kullu irukutn lli-s-a-gis-tɛbadn mddn.
ġmkan a-iga ššrɛ, iqqan-d kraygatt kra-illan a-itġus s-urušš n-idammn. idrus ma-ur-itġusn ġmkan. iġ-ur-ffin idammn, ur-ra-tittin ddnub.
ġmkan a-s-d-iqqan a-tġusnt-tġawsiwin-an, wah̬h̬a ur-gint ġir amalu irwasn ma-illan ġ-ignna. walaynni iqqan-d tiġawsiwin n-ignna ad-ġusnt s-kra n-tġrsi yufn h̬tin.
ašku lmasiḥ ur-ikšim s-tḥanut tamẓlayt lli-ityawskarn s-ifassn n-bnadm, tg ġir amalu n-talli illan ġ-ignna. walaynni s-ignna a-s-ikšm ntta, yili gis ġilad, ibidd f-ssibt-nnġ ġ-lgddam n-rbbi.
nssn is-a-ikššm-unmġur ihiyyan n-ayt-yudaya kraygatt asggʷas s-tḥanut ityawqdasn, ar-dids-itawi idammn lli-ur-ginin wins. imma lmasiḥ, urd kigan d-twaliw a-ikšm s-ignna a-n-isrs ih̬f-ns.
ašku ur-t-id-iqqan a-immt kigan d-twaliw zġ-lliġ ttyawh̬laq ddunit. walaynni yat-twal a-d-yuška ġ-isiggʷra n-ddunit, baš a-immt issitti ddnub f-bnadm.
iqqan-d kullu mddn ad-mmtn yat-twal, lkmn ilmma lḥukm.
ġmkan a-s-ifka lmasiḥ ula ntta ih̬f-ns yat-twal baš a-yasi ddnub n-mddn ggutnin. ra-d-iwrri tis snat-twal, urd baš a-yasi ddnub walaynni baš a-ijjnjm kullu winna srs tqlnin rjun-in gis.

imma ššrɛ n-ayt-yudaya iga ġir zund amalu l-lbarakat lli-ra-yili. ur-iẓḍar a-d-issbayyn lbarakat-an ġmklli gant. ašku ššrɛ ur-iẓḍar a-issġus s-usġus ikmmln ġwilli-n-bdda-ssakmurnin tiġrsiw i-rbbi asggʷas ar asggʷas.
mrad is-wrrin ġusn ġwilli tɛbadnin ġmkan, ikun ur-sul-a-ssḥssan is-a-gisn-tqaman ddnub ula-da-ttirin a-tzayadn ar-n-ssakmurn tiġrsiw yaḍni.
walaynni tiġrsiw-an, ntnti a-tn-d-itraran ad-swingimn ġ-ddnub-nsn asggʷas ar asggʷas,
ašku ur-ẓḍarn idammn n-imugayn d-waġaḍn ad-ssittin ddnub.
mayan a-f-inna lmasiḥ ġakud lliġ ra-d-yašk s-ddunit: «tiġrsiw d-twafkiw, ur-a-tnti-ttirit walaynni tqṣadt gigi yat-ddat.
lbhaym tyawjdarnin ula atig n-ddnub, ur-a-srsn-ttrḍut,
walaynni nniġ-ak ‹ha-yyi uškiġ-d ad-skrġ ma-trit a-rbbi, ġmklli flla ityaran ġ-warra-nnk.›»
ġmkan a-s-imla rbbi is-ur-a-ittiri tiġrsiw ula tiwafkiw ula lbhaym tyawjdarnin ula atig lli-akkan mddn f-ddnub-nsn. ur-a-srsn-itrḍu, wah̬h̬a da-yas-tn-in-ssakmurn mddn ġmklli ittini ššrɛ.
izayd ilmma lmasiḥ yini «ha-yyi uškiġ-d ad-skrġ ma-trit.» ġmkan a-s-issunf kullu tiġrsiw timzwura baš a-izzga tiġrsi yaḍni.
lliġ iskr yasuɛ lmasiḥ maylli gis ira rbbi, isrs-n yat-twal ġ-lgddam-ns tiġrsi lli-igan ddat-ns. ġmkad a-s-aġ-issġus nkkʷni zġ-ddnub-nnġ.
ass f-wass ar-tbddadn inmġurn n-ayt-yudaya ar-skarn tawuri-nsn, ar-n-ssakmurn kigan d-tġrsiw lli-ur-ẓḍarnin ad-ssittint ddnub.
imma lmasiḥ, yat-twal a-n-isrs yat-tġrsi f-ddnub n-kullu tasutin, iskiws ilmma f-ufasi n-rbbi
ar-itql ard ig rbbi kullu inuwwašn-ns ġ-ddu iḍarn-ns.
ašku s-yat-tġrsi a-s-issġus imẓlayn n-rbbi s-usġus ikmmln lli-ur-sar-itmmin.
ula rruḥ lqudus ifka-yaġ tugga f-mayad inna:
«sidi rbbi a-innan ‹ġmkad a-iga lɛhd lli-rad-didsn-skrġ ġ-uwssan-an. ra-n-araġ tinbaḍin-inu f-uwlawn-nsn, gġ-tnt ġ-ih̬fawn-nsn.›»
izayd ilmma yini: «ur-sul-rad-d-ktiġ ddnub-nsn ula lh̬ʷšanat lli-skrn.»
ġmkad a-s-imla is-fllannġ-issitti lmasiḥ kullu ddnub lli-nskr. ur-aġ-sul-ih̬ṣṣa a-n-nssakmur kra n-tġrsiw yaḍni.
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ ay-aytma, nẓḍar a-nkšm ġilad s-zzɛamt s-‹tḥanut ityawqdasn› f-ssibt n-idammn n-yasuɛ.
ašku s-lmut-ns a-s-aġ-ijjujad yan-uġaras l-ljdid lli-itawin s-tudrt, a-srs-nzri zġ-lh̬amiya s-ugʷns.
lliġ-aġ-illa yan-unmġur ihiyyan lli-itgabaln mddn n-rbbi,
illa fllannġ a-n-nakmur s-rbbi s-nniyt ikmmln, namn rad-aġ-iqbl, nġus zġ-kullu ddnub lli-s-a-issḥssa-uwl n-bnadm, tarud ula ddat-nnġ s-waman ġusnin.
illa fllannġ a-namẓ ġ-rrja lli-s-numn bla-yas-nrẓm, ašku rbbi lli-ifkan awal-ns rad-bdda-gis-izga.
illa fllannġ a-stt-ntawi ġ-ingratnnġ baš a-ntmɛawan a-nissan mamnk a-ntḥnnu ar-nskar kullu ma-ifulkin.
a-ur-nssikki f-umnaggar n-ingratnnġ ġmklli skarn kra n-mddn, walaynni a-nzzɛam i-ngratnnġ, ġilad s-uggʷar ašku ar-ttmnadm is-a-d-itakmur-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk siditnnġ.
walaynni iġ-nnkr ar-nskar ddnub tigira n-ma-nssn lḥqq, ur-ra-sul-darnnġ-tili kra n-tġrsi ma-fllannġ-issittin ddnub.
han s-tksaḍ ggutnin a-s-rad-aġ-d-iqqan a-ntql s-lḥukm n-rbbi ula lɛafit itjhhdn lli-s-ra-ihlk kullu willi ffuġnin zġ-wawal-ns.
nssn is-ur-irḥim rbbi yan irurn tiġurdin-ns s-ššrɛ n-musa, ašku iqqan-t-id a-immt f-tugga n-sin nġd kraḍ inagan.
walaynni uggʷar l-lɛqubit-an a-ra-yili i-wanna yuḍḍrn yus n-rbbi s-iḍarn-ns, iḥgr idammn l-lɛhd lli-t-issġusn, irgm rruḥ n-rrḥmt.
ašku nssn izd rbbi a-innan: «nkki a-rad-asn-irar f-mad-skrn, fkġ-asn mad-asn-igan.» yini-daġ: «rbbi siditun ra-yut lḥukm f-mddn-ns.»
han tiksaḍ iggutn a-ra-yili i-wanna iḍrn ġ-ufus n-rbbi lli-iddrn.
swangmad-d ussan imzwura lli-ġ-twrrim tsfawm s-tifawt l-lmasiḥ, tṣbrm tzgam ġakud lliġ a-tkkatm tammara išqan.
kra n-izmaz ar-fllawn-zraynt-trggam d-trfufnt ġ-lgddam n-mddn. izmaz yaḍni ar-ttbddadm d-willi-f-a-zraynt.
ar-ttɛawanm aytmatun lli-n-llanin ġ-lḥbs, tṣbrm d-willi-awn-kkisnin ayda-nnun, tfrḥm ašku tssnm is-teṭṭafm kra yufn mayan, a-t-igan d-wayda idumn.
imma ġilad, a-ur-di-twrrim f-zzɛamt-an gigun illan, ašku rad-awn-gis-tili lbaraka iggutn.
ih̬ṣṣa-kʷn a-tṣbrm ard tkmmlm kullu ma-gigun-ira rbbi, tkšmm tigira s-maylli-s-awn-inna rad-awn-yili.
ašku inna: «yan imikk ra-d-iruḥ ġwalli ra-d-yašk, ur-ra-n-imaṭl.
wanna yumnn, nttan a-f-rad-rḍuġ fkġ-as tudrt. walaynni iġ-iwrri tiġurdin ur-rad-as-yili rrḍa-nu.»
imma nkkʷni ur-ngi zġ-willi wrrinin tiġurdin tyawhlakn, hati nga zġ-willi umnnin njmn.
yan yumnn awal n-rbbi, hati issn rad-as-yili maylli-n-itrju. ur-a-itškku ġ-maylli ur-iẓri.
mayan a-s-irḍa rbbi f-imzwura-nnġ lli-zrinin.
ula nkkʷni, f-ssibt n-ma-numn awal n-rbbi a-f-nssn izd nttan a-ih̬lqn kullu ma-illan s-wawal-ns, iskr kullu ma-ntmnad zġ-ma-ur-ityawẓrran.

ula habil, f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-n-isrs ġ-lgddam n-rbbi yat-twafka lli-yufn tin gʷmas qayn. iml-as rbbi is-fllas-irḍa f-ssibt l-liman-ns, iqbl maylli-as-ifka. ar-isawal habil sul s-ġilad wah̬h̬a immut, ašku yumn rbbi.
ula ah̬nuh̬, f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-ityalal s-ignna ur-immut. ur-ẓḍarn mddn a-t-afn ašku rbbi issitti-t zġ-ddunit. lliġ ur-ta-ityalal, imla-yas rbbi is-fllas-irḍa.
walaynni yan ur-yuminn rbbi, ur-ra-yiẓḍar a-yamẓ rrḍa-ns. ašku wanna iran a-n-yakmur s-rbbi, iqqan-t-id a-yamn is-illa rbbi, yujad a-ibark wanna-t-isiggiln.

ula nuḥ, f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-tt-yiwi bahra ġ-maylli-as-inna rbbi f-kra n-tġawsiwin lli-ur-ta-iẓri. inkr ibnu yan-wanaw, injm gis ntta d-ayt-tgmmi-ns. ifl ddunit a-ttyawhlak, imma ntta iga-t rbbi d-wad f-irḍa f-ssibt n-ma-t-yumn.
ula ibrahim, f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-iskr s-maylli-as-inna lliġ-as-iġra a-iffuġ s-tmazirt lli-ra-ig tins. inkr iffuġ wah̬h̬a ur-issin manis a-ittidu.

f-ssibt n-ma-yumn rbbi a-f-iskr takat ġ-tmazirt lli-rad-as-ifk rbbi, ig aġrib ġ-wammas n-ayt-tmazirt-an. izdġ ġ-ih̬iyyamn, nttan ula isḥaq ula yaɛqub lli-rad-kullu-dids-iṭṭaf maylli-s-as-inna rbbi rad-as-t-ifk.
ašku ar-n-itrju ġ-tmdint yaḍni, a-stt-igan d-talli iskr rbbi ibnu-tt f-llsas idumn.
f-ssibt n-ma-yumn rbbi a-f-yuru ġ-tizi lli-ġ-ur-a-itaru yan, ula tẓḍar-tmġart-ns sara a-trbbu. iwrri iga babas n-yan-warraw, ašku yumn is-izga rbbi ġ-wawal-ns.
ġmkad a-s-twrri tasut n-yan-urgaz lli-issurfn tizi n-tudrt, tggut zund itran n-ignwan nġd amlal n-tama n-umda.
kullu mddn-an umnn awal n-rbbi aylliġ mmutn, ur-ta-umẓn maylli-s-asn-inna rad-asn-t-ifk. walaynni ẓran-t-in ġ-tuggugt frḥn srs, ur-a-tḥšamn a-ttinin izd ibrraniyn d-iġribn ad-gan ġ-ddunit.
kullu winna ittinin ġmkan, iban gisn is-a-ttirin yat-tmazirt yaḍni a-tg tinsn.
ašku mrad is-a-swingimn ġ-tmazirt n-ddunit-ad lli-zġ-d-uškan, ikun ẓḍarn a-srs-wrrin.
walaynni ar-ttirin yat-tmazirt lli-yufn h̬tad, a-stt-igan d-tin-ignna. ur-tʷgraẓ rbbi lliġ a-ttinin is-iga rbbi-nsn, ašku ijjujad-asn yat-tmdint.
ibrahim, f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-n-isrs isḥaq f-iggi n-ukrkur lliġ-t-yurm rbbi. yujad a-iġrs i-yus lli-dars-igan yan
wah̬h̬a-yas-inna rbbi s-wawal-ns izgan: «zġ-tarwa n-yuk isḥaq a-zġ-ra-tili tasut-nnk.»
walaynni yumn ibrahim is-iẓḍar rbbi a-d-issnkr ula yan immutn. iskr-nnit rbbi zund mayan, irar-as-d isḥaq zġ-lmut.
ula isḥaq f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-inna i-yaɛqub d-ɛisu f-lbarakat lli-rad-asn-yili.
ula yaɛqub lliġ ɛlayn a-immt, f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-inna i-sin tarwa n-yusf f-lbarakat lli-rad-asn-yili, iknu f-ih̬f n-uɛkkaz-ns yalġ rbbi.
ula yusf lliġ a-d-itakmur a-immt, f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-isawl f-uffuġ lli-s-rad-ffuġn ayt-rbbi zġ-miṣr, yuṣṣa-tn ilmma f-ih̬san-ns.
ula babas n-musa d-innas, f-ssibt n-mad-umnn awal n-rbbi a-f-t-ḥḍan kraḍ-iyrn tiġurdin n-tlalit-ns, ašku ẓran is-iga arraw ifulkin, d-ntni ur-ksuḍn lamr n-ugllid.
ula musa lliġ-d-imqqur, f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-ur-iri ad-as-ttinin mddn «yus n-illis n-firɛawn.»
yuf dars a-itmunu d-ayt-rbbi ġ-trfufnt, ula-da-itfjjij ġ-ddnub yat tasaɛt idrusn.
iḥasb ntta tadallit lli-ġ-illa f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ is-tɛzza uggʷar n-tmih̬ar n-miṣr, ašku ar-n-itrju ġ-lbaraka lli-ra-yili tigira.
f-ssibt n-ma-yumn awal n-rbbi a-f-iffuġ zġ-miṣr, ur-iksuḍ lġaḍab n-ugllid. izga ntta ġ-maylli iqṣad zund iġ-a-iẓrra rbbi lli-ur-jju-iẓri yan.
f-ssibt n-ma-yumn rbbi a-f-yuṣṣa ayt-rbbi f-wass n-usurf, yini-asn ad-truššn tigʷmma-nsn s-idammn, baš a-ur-inġ lmalak l-lmut iwitsn ih̬fddi zund ih̬fdditn n-ayt-miṣr.
ula mddn-an, f-ssibt n-mad-umnn awal n-rbbi a-f-zrin zġ-wammas n-umda iẓggʷaġn zund iġ-zrin f-wakal. lliġ ran ayt-miṣr ad-skrn zund ntni, ssh̬sin-tn-kullu-waman.
f-ssibt n-mad-umnn mddn awal n-rbbi a-f-asn-d-ḍrn iġurban n-tmdint n-ariḥa tigira n-mad-as-tlullin ssa-uwssan.
ula tamggant raḥab, f-ssibt n-ma-tumn a-f-tɛawn imazann, ur-tmmut tigira d-willi ur-rinin rbbi.
ma-rad-awn-sul-iniġ? ur-tumi luqt ma-ġ-a-yawn-in-sul-addrġ ma-iskr jidɛun ula baraq ula šamšun ula iftaḥ ula dawd ula ṣamwil ula lanbiya.
ntni, f-ssibt n-mad-umnn awal n-rbbi a-f-nran tiglday, zzgan lḥqq, amẓn ma-f-asn-inna rbbi, qqnn imawn n-izmawn,
ssh̬sin lɛafit issdiddin, njmn zġ-taẓẓit inqqan, wrrin dusn ġ-ḍḍɛf-nsn, tjhhdn ġ-imiġ, nrun iɛskrin n-ibrraniyn.
ula kra n-tmġarin, nkrn-asnd-d ġwilli-asnt-mmutnin. imma wiyyaḍ agʷin anurẓm, ṣbrn d-willi-tn-kkatnin ar lmut, baš ad-d-nkrn s-tudrt lli-yufn tudrt n-ddunit-ad.
kra gisn, rgmn-t. kra gisn, ssġuršn-t. kra gisn, krfn-t s-ssnasl luḥn-t-in ġ-lḥbs.
utn-tn s-iẓran, bbin-tn s-lmnašr, ġrsn-asn s-taẓẓit. ar-tlullin ar-lssan ilmawn n-uwlli d-waġaḍn. ẓlḍn, zaydn-d tarfufnt i-tmmara.
wan ġwid, ur-tn-tsthlla ddunit. ar-tkkan lh̬la d-idrarn, ar-nssan ġ-ifran d-igʷḍyan ġ-ddu-wakal.
kullu mddn-an, irḍa fllasn rbbi f-ssibt n-mad-umnn awal-ns, walaynni ur-umẓn maylli-s-asn-inna rad-asn-t-ifk.
ašku iqṣad rbbi kra yufn mayan. yiri ad-didnnġ-kšmn s-lbaraka lli-rad-aġ-yili, issafu-asn ġmkan kullu maylli-s-asn-inna.

imma ġilad ġ-aġ-tlulli-tmdlut-ad n-inagan, illa fllannġ a-nluḥ kullu mad-aġ-iẓẓuẓẓayn, nfl ddnub lli-bdda-ttirinin ad-aġ-ssmukrusn, baš a-ntazzal bla-da-ntrmay ġ-uġaras lli-irẓmn ġ-lgddam-nnġ.

illa fllannġ a-n-ntmnad ġ-yasuɛ lli-aġ-iskrn aġaras-ad s-numn, rad-aġ-gis-yawi ar ttmi. iṣbr nttan i-lmut f-uggjdi, ur-tt-yiwi ġ-tdallit, ašku iẓra-n lfrḥ lli-rad-as-yili tigira. iskiws ilmma f-ufasi l-lɛrš n-rbbi.
swangmad-d yasuɛ lli-iṣbrn i-tnuwwašt iggutn f-ifassn n-mddn ʷh̬šnnin, baš a-ur-irmi-uwl-nnun ihruṣṣi.
ašku ġ-imiġ-ad ġ-a-ttmmaġm d-lh̬ʷšant, ur-ta-gis-tlkimm tizi l-lmut.
is-tettum awal lli-s-kʷn-izzɛam rbbi lliġ-kʷn-iga d-tarwa-ns? yini: «wa-iwi, iġ-k-iṣlḥ sidi rbbi, ad-ur-tinit d-ih̬f-nnk ‹ġayad ur-igi yat.› nġd iġ-k-iẓi, ad-ur-tinit ‹nkki ur-giġ yat.›
ašku sidi rbbi ar-itrbba wanna dars iɛzzan, ar-issrwat wanna iga d-yus.»
illa fllawn a-tṣbrm iġ-a-kʷn-itrbba, ašku ar-didun-iskar ġmklli iskar-urgaz d-tarwa-ns. is-illa ma-ur-ittrbban f-ufus n-babas?
mrad is-a-kʷn-ur-itrbba rbbi ġmklli ttrbban kullu mddn, ur-ra-tgm tarwa-ns, walaynni zund tarwa n-tsukt a-ra-tgm.
nkkʷni kullwaġ darnnġ id-babatnnġ n-ddunit-ad, ar-aġ-trbban ar-tn-ntuqqar, walaynni is-ur-yuf a-nsflid ula s-babatnnġ n-ignna baš a-nddr?
yat luqt idrusn ad-aġ-trbban ntni s-mklli-asn-iban išwa, imma rbbi ar-aġ-itrbba s-mklli rad-aġ-iṣlḥ baš a-nfulki ġmklli ifulki ntta.
ur-illi ma-itfraḥn ġakud lliġ a-t-itrbba babas. ar-as-tṭiyyar ġ-tasaɛt-an, walaynni rad-as-tili lġllt n-ufulki d-lhna tigira i-wanna ittrbban ġmkad.
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, allat ifassn-nnun alwanin, tzzgam ifaddn-nnun tġašanin.
ssngaddat tiġarasin i-iḍarn-nnun, a-ur-iḍr yan issbiḍirn walaynni a-ijji.
gat-n tiqqi-nnun a-tgm sslamt i-kullu mddn, tɛmmrm s-ufulki ašku yan ġ-ur-illi ur-sar-ra-iẓr siditnnġ.
awiyat-stt ġ-ih̬fawn-nnun a-ur-ijlu yan gigun zġ-lbaraka n-rbbi, ula imġi-d-wamud n-wasmmum ġ-gratun, ard issduy mddn isshrš ma-iggutn.
a-ur-yili yan gigun itfsadn, ula yan itraran tiġurdin-ns s-rbbi zund ɛisu lli-igan ih̬fddi izznz lḥqq-ns f-yat tirmt.
tssnm is-iwrri tigira ira bahra a-iwrt lbaraka n-babas, walaynni babas ur-as-tt-ifki. wah̬h̬a-yas-tt-iḍalb bahra s-imṭṭawn, ur-as-isugir yat.
ur-n-takmurm kunni s-kra n-udrar n-ddunit-ad ġmklli-n-akmurn imzwura-nnun, ar-n-gis-ssmuqquln timzliwin l-lɛafit d-tillas d-umalu d-iggig.
ula tsfldm kunni i-tijjijt n-nnffar ula awal lli-itbrraḥn. ntni, lliġ sfldn i-wawal-an, ḍalbn-t bahra ad-asn-ur-sul-isawl,
ašku ggʷdn f-luṣit n-rbbi lli-s-asn-inna: «wanna-d-iruḥn adrar-ad, ig-iyt lbhimt nġd bnadm, iqqan-d a-ti-tkkatm s-iẓran ard immt.»
ula musa iksuḍ bahra zġ-kullu maylli-n-iẓra yini: «ar-sri-tkkat tawda.»
walaynni takmurm-d kunni s-udrar yaḍni, a-t-igan d-urušalim n-ignna, ig tamdint n-rbbi lli-iddrn. takmurm-d s-kigan d-wafḍan l-lmalayka munn-d kullu s-lfrḥ iggutn,
ula s-umnaggar n-willi iga rbbi d-tarwa-ns ih̬fdditn lli-mi-tyaran ismawn-nsn ġ-ignna. takmurm-d s-rbbi lli-itḥkamn f-kullu mddn, ula s-larwaḥ n-mddn lli-f-irḍa issafu-asn kullu mad-asn-inna.
takmurm-d s-yasuɛ lli-iskrn lɛhd l-ljdid ġ-gr rbbi d-bnadm, ula s-urušš n-idammn-ns lli-ifkan rrja uggʷar n-idammn n-habil.

awiyat-stt bahra ġ-ġwalli srun isawaln. ašku lhalak a-iḍrn f-willi agʷinin ad-sflidn s-musa lli-tn-yumrn ġ-ddunit-ad, walaynni uggʷar n-ġayan a-rad-aġ-yili nkkʷni iġ-nrur tiġurdin-nnġ s-walli-aġ-d-yumrn zġ-ignna.
lliġ isawl rbbi ġ-uwssan-an, immussa-wakal s-wawal-ns. imma ġilad inna-yaġ f-ma-ra-iskr: «rad-daġ-ssmassġ akal, ssmassġ ula ignwan.»
s-wawal-an a-s-aġ-imla is-ra-immass kullu ma-ityawh̬laqn, ityattay baš a-ur-iqama ġir ma-iṭṭafn llsas izgan.
imma ġilad ġ-aġ-ifka rbbi yat-tgldit lli-ur-sar-ra-immass, illa fllannġ a-t-ntškar ar-t-ntɛbad ġmklli-zginnġ-ira, ar-t-ntuqqar ar-tt-ntawi bahra ġ-ma-s-a-t-ntrḍu.
ašku rbbi-nnġ irwas i-lɛafit ifnnun.
zaydat ar-bdda-ttḥubbum i-ngratun ġmklli tmḥubbun aytmatn.
a-ur-tettum a-tssmrḥbam s-iġribn, ašku ġayd izrin ssmrḥban kra n-mddn s-lmalayka, ur-ssinn izd lmalayka ad-gan.
swingimat ġ-aytmatun lli-n-llanin ġ-lḥbs zund iġ-n-didsn-tllam, ar-tswingimm ġ-ġwilli trfufunnin zund iġ-a-didsn-ttrfufunm.
illa f-kud yan a-ig littihal d-tġawsa ifulkin ihiyyan, ula-da-išškšam yan ma-ihršn s-tisi-nsn. ašku rbbi ra-yut lḥukm f-wanna ifsadn ula wanna iznan.
zriyat tudrt-nnun bla-da-ttḥubbum iqaridn, tqnɛum s-unšk nna-darun-illan. ašku inna rbbi: «ur-sar-k-in-flġ ula wrriġ-d fllak.»
mayan ad-aġ-izzɛamn a-nttini: «sidi rbbi a-igan aɛwin-inu. ur-ksuḍġ yat. ma-rad-iyi-iskr bnadm?»
swingimad-d imġarn lli-awn-in-sslkmnin awal n-rbbi, ar-di-tswingimm lfaytt n-tudrt-nsn, tamnm awal n-rbbi ġmklli umnn ntni.
imma yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ġmklli iga a-rad-bdda-ig, zund iḍgam zund ġass zund kullu ma-d-iftan.
a-ur-tadjm kra n-ilmmudn iġribn a-kʷn-jllun zġ-uġaras l-lḥqq. ra-išwu a-tssdusm ulawn-nnun s-lbaraka n-rbbi, urd s-tnbaḍin n-umššu lli-ġ-ur-tlli kra l-lfaytt i-willi srsnt skarnin.
ur-ẓḍarn ġwilli skarnin tawuri n-uh̬iyyam n-rbbi ad-ššn zġ-tġrsi lli-darnnġ-illan.
anmġur-nsn ihiyyan ar-itawi idammn l-lbhaym s-tḥanut tamẓlayt baš a-ġin-issitti ddnub f-mddn-ns. imma tifiyi d-ih̬san n-tġrsiw-an ar-tn-jddrn mddn ġ-brra n-udġar lli-ġ-bnan ih̬iyyamn-nsn.
mayan a-f-immut ula yasuɛ ġ-brra n-tmdint baš a-issġus mddn s-idammn-ns.
imma ġilad illa fllannġ a-dars-nffuġ s-brra n-ih̬iyyamn a-n-dids-nili ġ-trggam lli-s-t-rgmn.
ašku ur-darnnġ kra n-tmdint idumn ġ-ddunit-ad, walaynni ar-n-ntrju tamdint lli-rad-aġ-yili ġ-mayd-d-iftan.
imma ġilad illa fllannġ a-n-bdda-nssakmur i-rbbi tawafka n-ššukr f-uwdm n-yasuɛ, a-stt-igan d-lġllt n-infurn-nnġ lli-s-a-ntuqqar ism-ns.
a-ur-tettum a-tskarm afulki ar-tmɛawanm i-ngratun, ašku wan tiwafkiw-an a-s-a-itrḍu rbbi.

sflidat s-imġarn-nnun ar-tskarm s-wawal-nsn, ašku ar-bdda-srun-traran lɛaql. iqqan-tn-d ad-fllawn-fkn lḥsab i-rbbi. skarat s-wawal-nsn baš ad-frḥn s-twuri-nsn, urd a-tn-fllas-tigʷraẓ. ašku iġ-tn-tẓẓigʷraẓm ur-rad-awn-tili lfaytt.
ẓẓallat ar-ttḍalabm rbbi f-ssibt-nnġ nkkʷni. nssn is-iġus-uwl-nnġ, niri a-nskar afulki ġ-kullu ma-ntnawal.
ġmkad a-s-kʷn-uṣṣaġ s-lmɛqul a-tḍalbm rbbi flla baš a-yyi-n-isswrri s-darun ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn.
imma ġilad, ḍalbġ i-rbbi n-sslamt lli-d-issnkrn zġ-lmut amksa imqqurn siditnnġ yasuɛ lli-itgabaln ulli-ns, iskr lɛhd-ad idumn ġ-gratnnġ d-rbbi s-idammn-ns.
ḍalbġ-as ad-awn-yakka kullu ma-igan afulki, baš a-tskarm ma-ittiri. ḍalbġ-as a-ginnġ-iskr kullu ma-t-itrḍun s-ism n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ. nttan a-bahra-ntalġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan. amin.
way-aytma, riġ ad-awn-ḍalbġ a-tqblm iwaliwn-ad lli-s-kʷn-uṣṣaġ, ašku ur-bahra-tġzzif-tbrat-ad.
imma ġilad riġ a-tissanm is-d-iffuġ gʷmatnnġ timutaws zġ-lḥbs. iġ-d-dari-yuška ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn, ra-n-didi-imun s-darun a-kʷn-nẓr.
sllmat-n f-imġarn-nnun kullutn ula f-kullu imẓlayn n-rbbi. ar-n-fllawn-tsllamn aytmatn n-iṭalya.
ad-awn-tili lbaraka n-rbbi kullukn.
zġ-yaɛqub ah̬ddam n-rbbi d-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, i-ayt-rbbi lli-akutnin ġ-ddunit kullutt. ad-awn-tili sslamt.
frḥat bahra ay-aytma ġakud nna-ttyaramm s-tnukmut nna-illan,
ašku tssnm iġ-tzrim ġ-tnukmut sul-tzgam ġ-uġaras l-lmasiḥ, ra-kʷn-issdus mayan baš a-tiẓḍarm a-ttṣbarm s-uggʷar.
imma ġilad, zaydat tṣbrm ard tlkmm ttmi baš a-timġurm tkmmlm bla-kʷn-ih̬ṣṣa yat.
walaynni iġ-illa kra gigun ur-iṭṭaf taḥkimt, illa fllas a-iḍalb rbbi lli-yakkan ma-iggutn i-kullu mddn bla-da-ti-tigʷraẓ, rad-as-tt-ifk.
walaynni iġ-iḍalb, iqqan-t-id a-yamn bla iškka. ašku yan iškkan iga zund taḍangt n-umda, ar-tt-issmussu-waḍu ar-tt-itawi s-tsga-ya d-h̬ta.
wanna igan ġmkan, a-ur-iġal is-ra-yamẓ kra zġ-siditnnġ,
ašku ar-n-itafa ih̬f-ns ġ-gr snat-tnbaḍin, ur-a-itzga ġ-kullu ma-ra-iskr.
way-aytma, wanna gigun dar idrus lh̬ir, illa fllas a-ifrḥ iġ-t-yull rbbi.
imma wanna gigun dar iggut, illa fllas a-ifrḥ iġ-t-izzugz rbbi. ašku ra-izri bu-wayda zund ajddig n-tuga,
ar-di-taqlay tafukt s-trġi-ns iḥrran, tjdr tuga iḍr-ujddig-ns laḥ afulki-ns. ġmkan a-s-rad-laḥ bu-wayda lliġ a-sul-itsala tawuri-ns.
ambarki a-iga wanna iṣbrn izgan ġ-tasaɛt n-tnukmut. ašku lliġ ityaram sul-izga, rad-as-yili ttaj n-tudrt idumn lli-f-inna rbbi ra-t-ifk i-willi ranin rbbi.
