walaynni iġ-ityaram kra n-yan, ad-ur-yini «rbbi ayd-iyi-itarmn,» ašku rbbi ur-a-iskar ma-yʷh̬šnn ula-da-ilddi yan a-iskr lh̬ʷšant.
walaynni iġ-ityaram kra n-yan, han ššhwat-ns a-t-in-ildin ard-ti-tġwi-tẓqqurt.
ġakudan iġ-gis-qamant ššhwat rad-arunt ddnub. ula ddnub, iġ-gis-zuydn rad-d-awin lmut.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, a-ur-tjlum ih̬f-nnun.
kullu ma-igan tawafka išwan ula kullu ma-igan lbaraka ifulkin, zġ-uflla a-zġ-d-yuška, zġ-rbbi lli-iskrn tifawin n-ignwan. imma nttan ur-a-itmutti ula-da-itbddal ula-da-itllas.
iskr ma-iqṣad, ifk-aġ tudrt l-ljdid s-wawal l-lḥqq, baš a-nwrri ng lġllt tamnzut n-kullu ma-ih̬lq.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, swangmat ġ-mayad: illa f-kud yan a-yifsus a-isfld, yiẓẓay a-isawl, yiẓẓay a-ur-iqlaql.
ašku yan itqlaqaln ur-ra-yiẓḍar a-iskar afulki lli-itrḍun rbbi.
kkisat zġ-gigun iskkirn rkanin ula lh̬ʷšant lli-iggutn ġ-mddn. tadrat i-ih̬f-nnun ar-ttqbalm awal lli-gigun-itẓẓu rbbi, ašku iẓḍar-wawal-an a-kʷn-ijjnjm.
illa fllawn a-tgm wid skarnin s-wawal n-rbbi, urd wid sflidnin ukan. a-ur-tjllum ih̬f-nnun,
ašku yan isflidn i-wawal n-rbbi bla-da-srs-iskar, iga zund yan-n-yuggʷan s-lmri a-iẓr udm-ns.
ġir yuggʷa-n iẓr ih̬f-ns yitti, s-ittu man udm a-iskr.
imma wanna itmnadn ġ-ulmmud ifulkin lli-irẓmn i-mddn zġ-iskraf, ar-tt-gis-itawi ar-srs-iskar bla-da-itettu maylli mi isfld, nttan a-ra-ibark rbbi ġ-kullu ma-iskar.
iġ-illa kra n-yan iġaln izd amumn a-iga walaynni ur-a-itnbaḍ ġ-ils-ns, hatin ijla d-ih̬f-ns. liman-ns ur-igi yat.
imma yan dar liman ifulkin iṣḥan ġ-iẓri n-rbbi babatnnġ, ġmkad a-ra-ig: ar-itɛawan igigiln d-thjjalin ġ-tnukmut-nsn, ar-itanf i-irkan n-ddunit.
way-aytma, a-ur-tskarm s-uwdmawn ġilad ġ-tumẓm aġaras n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ bab l-lmjd.
ra-kʷn-sqsaġ, ma-ra-tskrm ġ-umnaggar-nnun iġ-n-ikšm yan dar talh̬atmt n-uwrġ d-tmlsit iʷġlan, ikšm-n ula yan-umẓluḍ s-ibrdan-ns bbinin?
is-ra-tnsallamm d-bu-tmlsit išwan tinim-as «zayd a-sidi a-tskiwst ġ-lgddam,» tinim i-umẓluḍ «bidd ġ-tġurdin» nġd «gawr-n ġin»?
walaynni iġ-a-tskarm ġmkan is-urd udmawn-nnit ayn tskarm, ar-ttḥkamm f-ingratun s-tnbaḍin ʷh̬šnnin?
sfldat ay-aytma ɛzzanin. is-ur-tssinm mayad? rbbi isti ġwilli dar ma-idrusn ġ-ddunit ad-darsn-yigat liman, kšmn s-lwrt n-tgldit lli-f-inna ra-t-ifk i-willi ranin rbbi.
imma kunni ar-ttḥgarm imẓlaḍ. ra-kʷn-sqsaġ, manwi-kʷn-ssrfufunnin ar-kʷn-zukurn s-lmḥkamat? is-urd ġwilli dar iggut-wayda?
is-urd ntni a-irggmn ism ifulkin n-walli mi tgam wins?
hati afulki ayd tskarm iġ-a-tskarm s-luṣit ihiyyan n-tgldit n-rbbi ġmklli ityaran «a-ttirit adjar-nnk zund ih̬f-nnk.»
walaynni iġ-a-tskarm s-uwdmawn han ddnub ayan, iḥkam fllawn ššrɛ n-rbbi ašku tffuġm zġ-gis.
ašku yan iskarn kullu s-ššrɛ n-rbbi, iġ-zgis-iffuġ ġir s-yat-tġawsa, hati iwrri iga zund yan-zgis-iffuġn kullut.
ašku rbbi lli-innan «a-ur-tznut» inna-daġ «a-ur-tnġt.» iġ-tunft i-zzna walaynni tnġit, hati twrrit tgit wad iffuġn zġ-ššrɛ.
sawalat ar-tskarm s-mklli-d-iqqann mddn lli-f-ra-iḥkam rbbi s-luṣit lli-aġ-irẓmn zġ-iskraf-an.
ašku wanna ur-itṣamaḥn, ra-fllas-iḥkam rbbi bla-yas-iṣamḥ. imma wanna itṣamaḥn, ur-ra-t-ilkm lḥukm.
way-aytma, mal-lfaytt a-ra-yili iġ-inna kra n-yan «ha-yyi umnġ» walaynni ur-a-iskar ifulkitn? is-ra-t-ijjnjm wan liman-an?
mal-lfaytt gigun illan iġ darun gʷmatun nġd ulltmatun ilkm f-ma-ilssa nġd ma-ištta
tinim-as: «zayd s-sslamt, ad-ak-d-yawi rbbi ma-tlssat ula ma-tšttat,» bla-yas-tfkam kunni maylli-f-tlkm ddat-ns?
walaynni ġmkan a-iga wanna yumnn ur-a-iskar afulki. hati immut liman-ns.
walaynni ma-rad-iniġ iġ-illa kra n-yan inna-yyi «liman a-dark-illan, imma nkki llan dari ifulkitn»? rad-as-rarġ «ml-iyi liman-nnk bla ifulkitn, mlġ-ak liman-inu s-ifulkitn lli-skarġ.
kiyi tumnt izd rbbi yan a-iga. tʷġẓant. ula ljnun ʷh̬šnnin umnn s-mayan, ar-trgigiyn s-tksaḍ.»
way-argaz ifssusn, is-trit ad-zaydġ mlġ-ak izd liman bla ifulkitn ur-igi yat?
ma-s-irḍa rbbi s-babatnnġ ibrahim? irḍa srs f-ssibt n-ma-iskr. yiwi yus isḥaq ad-as-iġrs f-ukrkur ifk-t i-rbbi.
is-ur-tfhimt mayan? yumn ibrahim iskr, ikmml liman-ns s-iskkirn-ns.
ijra ġmklli ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi lli-innan: «ibrahim yumn rbbi. mayan a-f-t-iga rbbi d-wad-f-irḍa.» yini-daġ f-ibrahim is-iga amddakkʷl n-rbbi.
is-ur-tẓrim ġilad? rbbi ar-srnnġ-itrḍu f-ssibt n-ma-nskar urd f-ssibt n-ma-numn ukan.
ġmkan a-tga ula tamggant raḥab, irḍa srs rbbi f-ssibt n-kra tskr. ašku tssrgs imazann, tɛawn-tn ad-ddun f-yan-uġaras yaḍni.
han immut liman ġ-ur-llin ifulkitn, ġmklli ttmtat ddat nna-ġ-ur-tlli rruḥ n-tudrt.
way-aytma, a-ur-tirim a-kullu-tgm imslmdn, ašku tssnmm nkkʷni-ad isslmadn, itabɛa-yaġ lḥsab uggʷar n-wiyyaḍ.
s-kigan a-s-a-ntmzagal kullwaġ. iġ-illa ma-ur-itmzagaln ġ-ma-ittini, ra-ig nttan wad ikmmln yiẓḍar a-itnbaḍ ġ-ddat-ns kullutt.
ula agmar, ar-as-ntgga aġamu ġ-imi ma-s-a-ntḥkam ġ-ddat-ns kullutt baš a-fllas-nttidu s-inna nra.
ula anaw ġ-umda, wah̬h̬a imqqur bahra itjhhd-waḍu lli-t-idḥayn, ar-t-isslulli bab-ns s-yat-tflut imẓẓin baš a-ittidu s-inna ira.
ġmkan a-iga ils n-bnadm. wah̬h̬a imẓẓi, ar-issfurrug f-tġawsiwin mqqurnin. mnšk a-tlla tagant ar-tti-tjddr-tsafut imẓẓin.
zund ġmkan a-ijddr ils, ašku iɛmmr s-lh̬ʷšant ġ-ugʷns n-ddat-nnġ, ar-issyʷh̬šan bnadm kullut. ar-itznad i-ddunit s-lɛafit lli-d-iffuġn zġ-jhnnama.
ẓrat luḥuš, iẓḍar bnadm a-tn-yamẓ. luḥuš n-tagant d-igḍaḍ d-ifaġrn d-islman, ar-tn-ntamẓ kullutn.
walaynni ur-illi yan iẓḍarn a-yamẓ ils-ns. ar-bdda-ilddi s-ma-yʷh̬šnn, yagʷi a-izga, iɛmmr s-ssmm lli-inqqan.
s-ils a-s-a-ntalġ sidi rbbi babatnnġ. s-ils-daġ a-s-a-nrggm bnadm lli-ityawskarn f-ṣṣurt n-rbbi.
han yan-imi a-d-itkka la ššukr ula targgimt. way-aytma, ur-akkʷ-išwi a-gigun-yili zund ġayan.
is-tlla talɛint di-tkkan-waman mimnin ula wid smmumnin?
izd ay-aytma, tlla tazart iskarn zzit, nġd ddalit iskarn ikuzarn? ur-sar-rad-ftun-waman mimnin zġ-talɛint ismmumn.
manwa gigun ad-dar taḥkimt yissan ma-illan? illa fllas a-iml taḥkimt-ns s-ma-iskar, ar-itfulki d-mddn ar-iẓẓimẓay ih̬f-ns s-tḥkimt lli-iṣḥan.
walaynni iġ-tlla-tnuwwašt ġ-uwl-nnun nġd ar-ttirim a-tagʷrm tzwurm wiyyaḍ, a-ur-talġm ih̬f-nnun ula tsskarksm f-lḥqq.
ašku wan taḥkimt-an, urd ignna a-di-tkka, walaynni tuška-d zġ-ddunit. urd tin rruḥ lqudus a-tga, walaynni tga tin iblis.
iġ-a-ttirin mddn ad-agʷrn zwurn wiyyaḍ, ra-tigat taẓit ula kullu ma-yʷh̬šnn.

walaynni yan dar taḥkimt lli-d-ikkan ignna, ġmkad a-ra-ig. amzwaru iġus-uwl-ns, yiri sslamt, ar-itrh̬u d-mddn, ar-srsn-isflid, ar-gisn-itḥnnu, ar-d-itawi ṣṣabt n-ufulki. ur-a-iskar s-uwdmawn ula-da-iskar zund iġ-iga kra ur-igi.
hati tamgra n-ufulki, ar-tt-mggrn ġwilli-d-iwinin amud n-sslamt ar-t-in-tluḥn s-sslamt.
mah̬ aylliġ a-ttmmaġm ar-ttẓim i-ngratun? is-urd f-ssibt n-ma-gigun-tmmaġn iswingimn n-ma-ittiri ih̬f-nnun?
ar-ttirim kra ur-tlkimm, ġakudan ar-tnkkrm a-tnqqam. ar-ttẓuẓḍm ma-mi-ur-tẓḍarm, ġakudan ar-tmmaġm ar-fllas-tkkatm. han ur-a-teṭṭafm ma-ttirim ašku ur-a-ti-ttḍalabm zġ-rbbi.
walaynni iġ-a-ttḍalabm kra zġ-rbbi ur-a-yawn-t-yakka, ašku urd f-ufulki a-f-a-ti-ttḍalabm walaynni ġir ma-s-a-tssfraḥm ih̬f-nnun.
han tffuġm aġaras bahra. is-ur-tssinm mayad? wanna dar tɛzza ddunit, irur tiġurdin-ns s-rbbi. yan dar iɛzza ma-igan win ddunit, iga ih̬f-ns d-wad iẓin d-rbbi.
is-tġalm is-ur-yʷġẓan maylli ityaran ġ-warra n-rbbi inna: «ul lli-ginnġ-iga rbbi ar-ittiri kigan»?
walaynni uggʷar a-tga lbaraka lli-aġ-yakka, ġmklli ityaran: «rbbi ar-itḍaḍḍa wanna issimġurn ih̬f-ns, walaynni ar-itbarak wanna iẓẓimẓayn ih̬f-ns.»
mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, fkat ih̬f-nnun ġ-ddu-ufus n-rbbi. ḍaḍḍat iblis s-irwl zġ-gigun.
akmurat-n s-rbbi, yakmur-d srun. wa-kunni lli-iskarn ddnub, sirdat ifassn-nnun. wa-kunni lli-ikkatn f-sin iġarasn, ssġusat ulawn-nnun
tigʷraẓ-kʷn ṭiyyr-awn ar-tallam. kkisat taḍṣa, tskrm f-imṭṭawn. ssittiyat lfrḥ, tskrm f-tguḍi.
knwat ġ-lgddam n-siditun yall-kʷn.

way-aytma, a-ur-trggmm i-ngratun. ašku wanna irgmn ġ-gʷmas, nġd inna fllas is-yʷh̬šn, hati iga ih̬f-ns d-wad yugʷrn luṣiyat n-rbbi, irar-tnt zund iġ-ur-gint yat. iġ-tgit ih̬f-nnk f-iggi n-ššrɛ n-rbbi, ur-sul-tgit wad srs iskarn walaynni wad fllas itḥkamn.
han rbbi waḥdut a-iẓḍarn a-yakka luṣiyat, d-nttan waḥdut a-iẓḍarn a-ikkat lḥukm ar-ijjnjam ar-ithlak. walaynni ma-tgit kiyi aylliġ trit a-tinit f-wayyaḍ is-yʷh̬šn?
sfldat, a-kunni lli-ittinin «ra-nddu ġassad nġd azkka s-tmdint yaḍni, ngawr-n gis yan-usggʷas ar-nsaġ ar-nzznza ar-ntamẓ iqaridn.»
walaynni ur-tssinm ma-ra-yili azkka. mad-akkʷ-tga tudrt-nnun? hati tudrt-nnun tga zund tamdlut imẓẓin lli-d-ibann yan kra s-tt-laḥ.
walaynni illa fllawn a-ttinim «iġ-ira siditnnġ, ra-nddr nskr ġmka ula ġmka.»
imma kunni ar-ttalġm ih̬f-nnun ar-tssfurrugm f-ma-ra-tskrm. han ʷh̬šnn isfurrugn-an.
imma yan issnn a-iskr afulki ur-t-iskir, ddnub ad-as-iga ġayan.
sfldat ay-id-bu-wayda. allat ġilad ar-tssġuyyum f-tguḍi lli-rad-awn-yili.
han ayda-nnun imda, d-ibrdan-nnun tšša-tn-twukka.
han urġ-nnun ula nnuqrt-nnun tġwit-tn tanigt. ġmkan a-ra-tšš tanigt-an tifiyi-nnun zund lɛafit, tfk fllawn tugga ġ-wass l-lḥsab. ašku kunni tssmunm kigan i-ih̬f-nnun ġ-uwssan ggʷranin.
han tiġrad lli-ur-tfkim i-willi mggrnin ġ-igran-nnun. ar-ssmummʷin išuwwaln, lkmnt tġuyya-nsn imzgan n-sidi rbbi itjhhdn.
tzzrim ussan-nnun ġ-ddunit s-kullu ma-ttirim, ar-tšttam ar-ttfraḥm ar-ttɛalafm ddat-nnun i-wass n-tġrsi.
tssḍrm lbaḍl f-ayt-ufulki tnġm-tn, ur-n-rurn f-ih̬f-nsn s-yat.
imma kunni ay-aytma, ṣbrat ard-d-yašk siditnnġ, zund afllaḥ lli-itqln ard-as-di-tġli ṣṣabt iɛzzan ġ-igr-ns, ar-itṣbar ard iḍr-unẓar amnzu ula amaẓẓuẓ.
ula kunni, illa fllawn a-ttṣbarm ar-tzzɛamm ulawn-nnun, ašku yakmur-d-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk siditnnġ.
way-aytma, a-ur-ttngmugm i-ngratun a-ur-fllawn-ittut lḥukm. ha-lqaḍi imqqurn ibidd-d ġ-imi.
swangmat ay-aytma ġ-lanbiya lli-sawalnin s-ism n-siditnnġ ġayd izrin, ašku ṣbrn ntni ġ-kullu-tmmariw-nsn.
nga-tn d-imbarkin ašku ṣbrn sul zgan. tsfldm kunni f-ayyub ġmklli iṣbr izga, tissanm mamnk a-t-ibark sidi rbbi tigira. ašku siditnnġ ar-bahra-itḥnna ar-bdda-iskar afulki.

imma taġawsa ihiyyan ay-aytma, tga ġmka: a-ur-ttgallam, la s-ignna ula s-wakal ula s-kra n-tgallit yaḍni. walaynni iġ-iga-wawal-nnun «iyah» tinim «iyah.» iġ-iga «uhu» tinim «uhu» baš a-fllawn-ur-ittut lḥukm.
iġ-illa kra n-yan gigun yutn tammara, illa fllas a-iḍalb i-rbbi f-ġayan. iġ-illa kra n-yan gigun ifrḥn, illa fllas a-yalġ rbbi s-umarg l-lfrḥ.
iġ-illa kra n-yan gigun yuḍnn, illa fllas a-yazn s-imġarn n-umnaggar baš a-n-dars-aškin ḍalbn rbbi fllas ẓġurn-t s-zzit s-ism n-siditnnġ.
ra-iskr siditnnġ ma-zgis-ḍalbn ġwilli umnnin, ijjujji amaḍun issdus-t. iġ-iskr kra n-ddnub ra-tn-fllas-issitti.
f-mayad a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, qrrat s-ddnub-nnun i-ngratun, ar-ttḍalabm rbbi f-ingratun baš a-tjjim. hati taẓallit n-yan irḍan rbbi ar-di-ttawi kigan.
ula nnabi iliyya iga bnadm zund nkkʷni, imma ntta iḍalb bahra i-rbbi a-ur-yili-unẓar, s-ur-d-iḍr-unẓar f-wakal kraḍ isggʷasn d-mnaṣṣ.
iḍalb-t-daġ s-d-fkan ignwan anẓar, awin-d ikalln ṣṣabt-nsn.
way-aytma, iġ-gigun-illa kra n-yan iffuġn zġ-lḥqq irar-t-id wayyaḍ s-uġaras,
swangmat mayad: wanna-d-irurn yan ijlan zġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn, ra-t-issanf i-lmut l-lih̬rt, issaggug-t zġ-kigan d-ddnub.
zġ-bṭrus arqqas n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, i-imẓlayn n-rbbi lli-akutnin, gn iġribn ġ-tmizar n-buntus ula galaṭiyya ula kabadukiyya ula asiyya ula bitiniyya.
iẓli-kʷn rbbi babatnnġ s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus ġmklli iqṣad zġ-isizwar, baš a-tskarm s-iwaliwn n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ tġusm s-idammn-ns. ad-awn-tigat lbaraka d-sslamt.
ar-bahra-ntalġ rbbi babas n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ašku s-rrḥmt-ns iggutn a-s-aġ-ifka a-nlal talalit n-tudrt l-ljdid. iɛmmr-aġ s-rrja iddrn lliġ-d-issnkr yasuɛ lmasiḥ zġ-lmut.
ifk-aġ yal-lwrt lli-ur-ra-ifnu ula ra-ih̬sr ula ra-imdu, iḥḍa-yawn-t ġ-ignna.
s-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn a-s-a-kʷn-issntal kunni lli-srs-umnnin, ard tnjmm s-ujnjm ikmmln lli-rad-awn-yili ġ-isiggʷra n-ddunit.
frḥat s-kullu mayad, wah̬h̬a iġ-d-iqqan ad-awn-ṭiyyr yat-tasaɛt f-ssibt n-tnukmut ula tassast lli-kʷn-itarmn.

izri fllawn mayan baš a-tissanm is-iṣḥa liman-nnun. ašku iɛzza liman-nnun bahra, uggʷar n-uwrġ lli-ifnnun wah̬h̬a-da-itṣfu s-lɛafit. ašku ġmkan a-s-ra-kʷn-yalġ rbbi issattuy-kʷn issimġur-kʷn ġakud lliġ ra-d-yašk yasuɛ lmasiḥ ibayyn.
nttan, wah̬h̬a ur-jju-ti-tẓrim, iɛzza darun bahra. wah̬h̬a ur-a-ti-ttmnadm ġilad, tumnm srs. ar-srs-ttfraḥm s-lfrḥ iggutn aylliġ ur-akkʷ-tufim iwaliwn mad-as-ttinim.
ašku rbbi ifka-yawn ġilad maylli tram ġ-liman-nnun, ifk-awn ajnjm n-ih̬f-nnun.
hati lanbiya lli-sawlnin ġayd izrin f-lbaraka lli-rad-awn-yili, ar-swingimn ar-sqsan f-ujnjm-ad.
ar-sqsan man azmz a-ġ-ra-yili ula mamnk a-ra-ig-uzmz lli-f-a-ittini rruḥ l-lmasiḥ lli-gisn-illan lliġ a-yasn-imala arfufn lli-ġ-ra-izri lmasiḥ ula lmjd lli-rad-as-yili tigira.

walaynni issbayyn-asn-d rbbi is-urd f-ssibt n-ih̬f-nsn a-f-a-sawaln f-tġawsiwin-ad walaynni f-ssibt-nnun. imma ġilad tsfldm f-kullu mayad f-imi n-willi-awn-in-iwinin lh̬bar ifulkin, ar-darun-tbrraḥn s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ lqudus lli-d-ityazann zġ-ignna. imma tiġawsiwin-ad, ula lmalayka ar-bahra-ttirin ad-issann mamnk ad-gant.
f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, bkisat ih̬f-nnun trarm lɛaql, tzgam bahra ġ-rrja lli-s-a-ttrjum f-lbaraka lli-rad-awn-yili ġakud lliġ ra-d-yašk yasuɛ lmasiḥ ibayyn.
skarat s-wawal n-rbbi, ġmklli skarn tarwa s-wawal n-ayt-darsn. a-ur-sul-ttlhum s-ġaylli sttin tkkam ar-ttirim i-ih̬f-nnun lliġ ur-ta-tssinm lḥqq.
walaynni skarat kullu s-uwl iġusn, ġmklli iġus rbbi lli-awn-d-iġran.
ašku ityara inna rbbi: «illa fllawn a-tġusm, ašku giġ nkki wad iġusn.»
tmyarm kunni a-ttinim: «wa-rbbi babatnnġ,» walaynni a-ur-tettum izd nttan a-itraran i-kraygatt yan f-ma-iskar, ur-a-itmnad udmawn. awiyat-stt gis bahra kullu ussan-ad tzzraym zund iġribn ġ-ddunit.
ašku tssnm is-kʷn-d-ifra zġ-tnbaḍin h̬wanin lli-awn-d-fln imzwura-nnun. ašku urd s-ma-ifnnun zund nnuqrt nġd urġ a-s-kʷn-d-ifra,
walaynni s-idammn ɛzzanin l-lmasiḥ zund idammn n-yan-ulqqaġ iġusn bla lɛib.
mayad, iqṣad-t srs rbbi lliġ ur-ta-ih̬lq yat, yazn-t-id ilmma ibayyn-d f-ssibt-nnun ġ-uwssan-ad ggʷranin.
hati f-ssibt l-lmasiḥ a-s-tumnm s-rbbi lli-t-id-issnkrn zġ-lmut issattuy-t s-lmjd. d-ġmkad a-s-izga liman-nnun d-rrja-nnun ġ-rbbi.
hati tssġusm ulawn-nnun lliġ tumẓm aġaras l-lḥqq, ar-ttḥubbum aytmatun s-nniyt iṣfan. imma ġilad, tḥnnwat i-ngratun zġ-ttmi n-uwl-nnun.
ašku tlulm talalit n-tudrt l-ljdid, urd s-wamud lli-ifnnun walaynni s-wamud lli-ur-ra-ifnu, a-t-igan d-wawal n-rbbi, ig awal iddrn iqama-bdda.
ašku ityara: «bnadm iga zund tuga, tg lhibt-ns zund ajddig n-tuga. tsllaw tuga yasus-ujddig,
imma awal n-siditnnġ izga-bdda.» awal-ad iga lh̬bar ifulkin lli-mi-tsfldm.
f-mayad a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, luḥat-n s-kullu ma-igan tanuwwašt ula tikrkas. a-ur-tskarm ġ-lgddam n-mddn ma-ur-tgim. ad-awn-ur-ṭiyyr f-wiyyaḍ ṭṭafnin kra tram i-ih̬f-nnun, ula-da-trggmm ġ-yan.
walaynni gat zund tarwa bḥra lulnin, tirim a-tsum akkʷfay n-wawal iġusn, baš a-srs-timġurm tnjmm ajnjm ikmmln.
ašku «tmḍim afulki n-siditnnġ.»
akmurad-d ġilad s-walli igan aẓru iddrn. luḥn-t-in mddn, walaynni iẓli-t rbbi, iɛzzu dars.
fkat ih̬f-nnun i-lmasiḥ zund iẓran ddrnin, baš a-srun-ibnnu yat-tgmmi n-rruḥ, a-n-gis-tsrasm ġ-lgddam n-rbbi tiwafkiw n-rruḥ lli-s-ra-itrḍu ašku ar-as-tnti-takkam s-ism n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ġmklli ityaran, inna rbbi: «hati ra-n-zzugzġ ġ-gr mddn-inu yan-uẓru imqqurn igan win-uġẓu. ẓliġ-t iɛzzu dari. wanna srs yumnn ur-sar-ti-tʷgraẓ.»
mayan a-f-darun-iɛzza kunni lli-srs-yumnn. walaynni ityara-daġ f-willi ur-rinin ad-amnn, inna rbbi fllasn: «aẓru lli-n-luḥn ibnnayn, nttan a-iwrrin iga ih̬f n-uġẓu.»
ityara-daġ: «aẓru-ad ra-ig tabayḍḍrt i-mddn, ig ifir lli-ra-tn-issknuki.» ntni ar-ṭṭarn ġilad ašku agʷin ad-skarn s-wawal n-rbbi. ġmkan a-tn-d-iqqann.

imma kunni, tgam mddn tyawẓlaynin, tgm ayt-tgldit n-rbbi, ar-n-tsrasm ġ-lgddam-ns tiwafkiw lli-s-a-itrḍu. tgm ayt-rbbi, iẓli-kʷn a-tgm wins, baš a-ttawim lh̬bar i-mddn f-kullu ma-iskr ġwalli-awn-d-iġran zġ-tillas s-tifawt l-lmjd-ns.
ġayd izrin ur-tgim yat, imma ġilad ayt-rbbi a-tgam. ġayd izrin ur-tssinm rrḥmt n-rbbi, imma ġilad rrḥmt-ns a-fllawn-illan.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, ḍalbġ-kʷn ġilad a-tgm ih̬f-nnun d-iġribn d-ibrraniyn ġ-ddunit-ad, tluḥm s-ma-ttiri ddat n-bnadm, ašku tiġawsiwin n-ddat ar-tmmaġnt d-uwl iṣfan.
skarat afulki ġ-gr-willi ur-ssinnin rbbi. wah̬h̬a iġ-a-gigun-rggmn rad-ẓrn is-ifulki kullu ma-tskarm, inin ilmma izd rbbi ad-dar lḥqq ġ-wass lli-ġ-ra-d-yašk a-yut lḥukm.
sflidat f-ssibt n-siditnnġ s-kraygatt ssulṭa itḥkamn ġ-dar mddn. sflidat s-umzwaru lli-igan agllid,
ula s-willi-d-itazn ad-utn lɛqubit f-willi skarnin ma-yʷh̬šnn, alġn ġwilli skarnin afulki.
ašku rbbi ira gigun a-bdda-tskarm ma-ifulkin, baš a-ur-afn mddn fssusnin ssibt ma-s-a-gigun-sawaln s-tnuwwašt-nsn ih̬wan.
zzriyat ussan-nnun mknna tram, walaynni a-ur-ttinim d-ih̬f-nnun: «ha-yaġ nẓḍar a-nskr mknna nra. nkrat a-nskr ma-yʷh̬šnn.» zzriyat ussan-nnun ġmklli-d-iqqann ih̬ddamn n-rbbi.
uqqrat kullu mddn, ar-ttirim aytmatun ġ-lmasiḥ. tawiyat-stt bahra ġ-rbbi, ar-ttuqqarm agllid.
wa-ih̬ddamn, sflidat s-id-siditun ar-tn-bdda-ttuqqarm. urd ġir ġwilli rh̬anin šwanin walaynni sflidat ula s-willi šqanin.
ašku rbbi ra-ibark yan irfufnn iṣbr i-lbaḍl f-ssibt n-ma-s-ira a-irḍu rbbi.
walaynni mal-lfaytt darun illan iġ-tskrm ma-yʷh̬šnn tṣbrm i-ukuray lli-tššam f-ssibt l-lh̬ʷšant-nnun? walaynni iġ-tskrm afulki trfufnm tṣbrm, ra-kʷn-ibark rbbi.
rbbi iġra-yawn-d a-tzzraym mayad, ašku lmasiḥ irfufn ula ntta f-ssibt-nnun, iml-awn ma-ifulkin baš a-tḍfurm latrt-ns.
ityara fllas: «ur-akkʷ-iskir kra n-ddnb. ur-jju-kkint-tkrkas imi-ns.»
lliġ-t-rgmn, ur-asn-d-irur s-trggam. lliġ-t-ssrfufnn ur-tn-ihddid, walaynni itɛnna s-rbbi lli-itḥkamn s-lḥqq.
nttan a-yusin ddnub-nnġ ġ-ddat-ns f-uggjdi, baš a-nmmt i-ddnub nddr i-ma-irḍan rbbi. s-tiggas-ns a-s-tjjim.
ġayd izrin tjlam zund ulli, imma ġilad twrrim-d s-dar-umksa lli-itgabaln ulawn-nnun.
ġmkan ula kunninti a-timġarin, illa fllawnt a-tsflidmt s-irgazn-nnunt. ašku iġ-ur-iri-urgaz awal n-rbbi, ra-srs-iwrri bla-yas-tnnit yat lliġ a-itmnad mamnk a-tskart,
ašku ra-iẓr mamnk a-iġus-uwl-nnm s-luqr iggutn.
walaynni a-ur-ig-ufulki-nnunt afulki n-iẓri ġ-dar mddn, zund tallamin n-wazzar nġd ikʷlan n-uwrġ nġd timlsa ġʷlanin.
walaynni ih̬ṣṣa a-ig-ufulki-nnunt afulki intln n-uwl ihnnan iɛmmrn s-lḥnant. ur-sar-iḍr-ufulki-ad, iɛzzu bahra dar rbbi.
ašku ġmkan a-sttin kkant-tmġarin timumnin lli-trjunin ġ-rbbi ġayd izrin. ġmkan a-s-a-ssfulkint ih̬fawn-nsnt ar-sflidnt s-irgazn-nsnt.
ġmkan-nnit a-tga sara, ar-tsflid s-ibrahim ar-as-ttini «sidi.» ula kunninti ġilad, istis n-sara a-tgamt, iġ-a-tskarmt afulki bla-da-ttiksaḍmt yat.

ġmkan ula kunni a-irgazn, illa fllawn a-tswingimm ġ-tmġarin-nnun, tzdġm didsnt bla-da-tettum is-ur-bahra-dusnt zund kunni, ar-tnti-ttuqqarm ašku wrtnt ula ntnti didun lbaraka n-tudrt idumn. skarat ġmkan baš a-ur-darun-yili ma-itḥṣarn tiẓulla-nnun i-rbbi.
imma ġilad rad-awn-iniġ, a-kullu-tgm yan ġ-ma-tswingimm ula ma-s-a-tssḥssum, ar-ttḥubbum i-ngratun s-tayri n-aytmatn, ar-di-ttadrm i-ih̬f-nnun ar-ttḥnnum i-ngratun.
iġ-illa mad-awn-iskrn kra yʷh̬šnn, ad-as-ur-trarm s-lh̬ʷšant. iġ-illa ma-kʷn-irgmn, ad-as-ur-trarm s-trggam, walaynni iniyat-as: «a-k-ibark rbbi.» ašku iġra-yawn-d rbbi ad-awn-tili lbaraka.
ityara: «wanna iran a-izzri tudrt-ns s-lfrḥ iẓr ussan l-lh̬ir, illa fllas a-ikkis ma-yʷh̬šnn zġ-ils-ns, ikkis tikrkas zġ-imi-ns.
illa fllas a-ifl kullu kra igan lh̬ʷšant ar-iskar afulki, ar-isiggil s-sslamt ar-gis-itazzal.
ašku siditnnġ ar-itgabal ġwilli-f-irḍa, ar-isflid i-mad-as-ttinin. imma ġwilli skarnin ma-yʷh̬šnn, ar-tn-itḍaḍḍa.»
manwa ra-kʷn-issrfufn iġ-tram a-tskarm afulki?
walaynni iġ-idda ard trfufnm f-ssibt l-lḥqq, hati imbarkin a-tgam. a-ur-ttiksaḍm yan ula-da-ttasim taġuft,
walaynni gat lmasiḥ d-sidis n-uwl-nnun, tujadm ġ-kraygatt tasaɛt a-di-trarm awal i-kullu wanna-kʷn-isqsan f-rrja lli-gigun-illan.
walaynni sawlat dids s-ṣṣbr d-luqr ula s-uwl iġusn zġ-kullu kra igan lɛib, baš ad-tḥšamn inuwwašn-nnun iġ-a-gigun-rggmn f-ufulki lli-tskarm s-ism l-lmasiḥ.
ašku yuf-awn a-trfufnm iġ-ira rbbi f-ssibt n-ufulki lli-tskarm, ula trfufnm f-ssibt n-kra tskrm yʷh̬šn.
ašku lmasiḥ, yat-twal a-immut f-ssibt n-ddnub, immt ġwalli ifulkin f-ssibt n-willi ʷh̬šnnin, baš ad-aġ-d-irar i-rbbi. nġan-t mddn ġ-ddat-ns, issddr-t rbbi ġ-rruḥ-ns.
iddu ilmma yawi lh̬bar i-larwaḥ tyawkrrafnin,
a-tn-igan d-willi rurnin tiġurdin-nsn s-rbbi ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-didsn-iṣbr bahra. ġ-uwssan-an a-ġ-iskr nuḥ anaw, njmn gis kra n-mddn drusnin zġ-waman, tam mddn ad-gan.

maylli ijran ġ-uwssan-an irwas i-udum ġ-waman lli-s-tnjmm kunni, urd s-irid n-irkan n-ddat-nnun walaynni iga tamatart n-is-iwrri iġus-uwl-nnun, tfkm ih̬f-nnun i-rbbi, tnjmm f-ssibt n-ma-d-inkr yasuɛ lmasiḥ zġ-lmut.
nttan a-ikšmn ilmma s-ignna, iskiws ġilad f-ufasi n-rbbi, ilin kullu lmalayka d-ssulṭat d-lquwwat n-ignwan ġ-ddu-ufus-ns.
mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, lliġ irfufn lmasiḥ ġ-ddat-ns, illa fllawn a-tbkism a-trfufnm ula kunni. ašku wanna irfufnn ġ-ddat-ns ur-sul-a-itlhu s-ddnub.
ur-sul-a-izzray ussan-ns ġ-ma-ittiri bnadm i-ih̬f-ns, walaynni ar-izzray mad-as-iqaman ġ-ddunit-ad ġ-ma-irḍan rbbi.

ġayd izrin tkkam-ttin ar-tskarm ma-iɛzzan dar ġwilli ur-ssinnin rbbi, imma ġilad yuwda-kʷn ġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn. han ntni ar-tfsadn ar-tšthun, ar-ssnufuln ih̬f-nsn s-tissi, ar-tmunun f-lh̬ʷšant, ar-skarn lɛib i-ngratsn, ar-tɛbadn ilahat n-ddunit-ad s-tjlh̬it-nsn.
ar-gigun-tɛjjabn ar-kʷn-rggmn, ašku ur-a-ttirim a-didsn-ttmunum f-tillay-nsn.
walaynni iqqan-tn-d lḥsab ġ-dar ġwalli yujadn a-yut lḥukm f-willi ddrnin ula ġwilli mmutnin.
mayan a-f-idda lmasiḥ a-yawi lh̬bar ifulkin i-willi mmutnin ula ntni lli-f-iḍr lḥukm l-lmut n-ddat ġmklli iṭṭar f-kullu mddn, baš ad-wrrin ddrn s-tudrt n-rruḥ ġmklli iddr rbbi.
hati yakmur-d isiggʷra n-kullu ma-illan. rarat lɛaql tġwim ġ-ih̬f-nnun baš a-ttẓallam ar-tḍalabm rbbi.
walaynni taġawsa ihiyyan a-stt-igan, a-ttḥnnum i-ngratun, ašku lḥnant ar-tssntal kigan d-ddnub.
ssmrḥbat s-ingratun ġ-tgʷmma-nnun bla-da-ttngmugm.
illa f-kraygatt yan a-iskar s-twafka n-rruḥ nna-yas-ifka rbbi, ar-srs-itɛawan wiyyaḍ s-nniyt n-uwl-ns, baš a-kullu-ttmɛawanm i-ngratun s-lbarakat n-rbbi lli-ggutnin.

wanna isawaln, illa fllas a-isawal s-mad-as-imala rbbi. wanna itɛawann, illa fllas a-itɛawan wiyyaḍ s-tẓḍḍart lli-as-yakka rbbi. ġmkad a-s-rad-kullu-alġn mddn rbbi f-ma-tskarm s-ism n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ. nttan a-mi-illa lmjd d-lquwwa ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, a-ur-ttɛjjabm ġ-lɛafit n-trfufnt lli-kʷn-itarmn, zund iġ-awn-ijra kra igan ljdid.
walaynni frḥat lliġ tkšmm d-lmasiḥ ġ-trfufnt, baš a-tfrḥm s-uggʷar ġakud lliġ ra-d-iban lmjd-ns i-kullu mddn.
imbarkin a-tgam iġ-a-kʷn-rggmn f-ssibt n-ma-tgam win lmasiḥ, ašku igguz-d fllawn rruḥ l-lmjd lli-igan rruḥ n-rbbi.
walaynni ih̬ṣṣa a-ur-irfufn yan gigun f-ssibt n-ma-inġa nġd yukʷr nġd iffuġ zġ-lqanun nġd ikšm ma-igan win wiyyaḍ.
walaynni iġ-irfufn f-ssibt n-ma-iga amasiḥi, illa fllas a-ur-iḥšm, walaynni a-yalġ rbbi ašku mddn ar-as-tggan ism lli-igan win lmasiḥ.
hati ġilad ilkm-d-uzmz lli-ġ-ra-yut rbbi lḥukm, ra-t-yut zwar f-ayt-tgmmi-ns. walaynni iġ-srnnġ-ibda nkkʷni, ma-s-ra-tggʷru i-willi agʷinin lh̬bar ifulkin n-rbbi?
ġmklli ityaran: «iġ-išqa a-injm yan ifulkin ma-ra-ijru i-yan irurn tiġurdin-ns s-rbbi ula yan isalan ddnub?»
mayad a-f-rad-iniġ i-kullu winna rfufnnin f-ma-ira rbbi: fkat ih̬fawn-nnun ġ-ufus n-walli-kʷn-ih̬lqn lli-bdda-izgan ġ-wawal-ns, tzaydm ar-tskarm afulki.
rad-ḍalbġ imġarn ġ-gratun, nkki-ad igan amġar zund kunni, gġ inigi f-urfufn l-lmasiḥ, ṭṭafġ taġamt ġ-lmjd lli-ra-d-iban.
ḍalbġ-kʷn a-tksm tawrut n-rbbi lli-ifl ġ-gr ifassn-nnun. tgablm-tt urd s-bzzez walaynni s-lfrḥ ġmklli ira rbbi, urd baš a-tamẓm kra i-ih̬f-nnun walaynni s-nniyt iṣfan.
a-ur-tssimġurm ih̬f-nnun f-willi-awn-ifka rbbi, walaynni malat i-tuwrut afulki lli-s-a-tskarm baš ad-skarn ula ntni ġmkan.
ġakud lliġ ra-d-yašk-umksa imqqurn rad-awn-ifk ttaj l-lmjd lli-ur-ra-sar-imdu.

ġmkan ula kunni a-iɛyyaln, illa fllawn a-tsflidm s-imġarn-nnun. bkisat kullukn s-tbannka n-ṣṣbr baš a-tth̬damm i-ngratun. ašku ityara: «rbbi ar-itḍaḍḍa wanna issimġurn ih̬f-ns, ar-itbarak wanna iẓẓimẓayn ih̬f-ns.»
knwat ġ-ddu-ufus itjhhdn n-rbbi baš a-kʷn-yall ġ-uzmz nna-ira.
luḥat-n kullu tiġufiwin-nnun f-rbbi ašku ar-gigun-ithlla.
amẓat ġ-ih̬f-nnun trarm lɛaql, ašku ar-itlli-unuwwaš-nnun iblis zund izm, ar-inddr ar-isiggil s-ma-iqqʷay.
ḍaḍḍat iblis tzgam ġ-liman-nnun, tissanm izd aytmatun ġ-ddunit kullutt ar-zrayn ġ-trfufnt zund kunni.

walaynni rbbi lli-bdda-iran ad-aġ-ibark, iġra-yawn-d a-tkšmm s-lmjd-ns idumn ġ-tamunt l-lmasiḥ. tigira n-ma-trfufnm yan imikk, ra-kʷn-yawi s-sslamt ikmmln issdus-kʷn izzga-kʷn issbidd-kʷn f-llsas iṣḥan.
nttan a-mi-tlla lquwwa ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.
tabrat-ad igzzuln uriġ-awn-tt-in f-ufus n-silwanus lli-dari-igan gʷma ifulkin izgan. araġ-tt-in baš a-kʷn-zzɛamġ, mlġ-awn izd ġmkad a-tga lbaraka n-rbbi s-lḥqq. zgayat ġ-lbaraka-yad.
ar-n-fllawn-tsllamn aytmatun ġ-tmdint n-babil, iẓli-tn rbbi ġmklli-kʷn-iẓli kunni. ar-n-fllawn-itsllam iwi marqus ula ntta.
nsallamat i-ngratun s-unsallam n-tagʷmat. ad-awn-tili sslamt kullukn kunni lli-igan win lmasiḥ.
zġ-simɛan bṭrus ah̬ddam d-urqqas n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ. i-willi mi ityawfka liman iɛzzan lli-aġ-d-ityawfkan ula nkkʷni s-ufulki n-rbbi-nnġ d-unjjam-nnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
a-fllawn-tigat lbaraka d-sslamt ġilad ġ-tssnm rbbi ula siditnnġ yasuɛ.
s-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn a-s-aġ-d-ifka rbbi kullu ma-nḥtajja baš a-nddr ġ-ddunit ar-t-ntrḍu. ašku nwrri nssn ġwalli-aġ-d-iġran a-nkšm s-lmjd-ns d-ufulki-ns.
d-ġmkad a-s-aġ-llant lbarakat hiyyanin ɛzzanin lli-f-inna rad-aġ-tnt-ifk, baš a-twrrim tgm ġmklli iga rbbi, tnjmm zġ-kullu ma-itawin ġ-ddunit s-lhalak f-ssibt n-maylli ittiri bnadm i-ih̬f-ns.
f-mayan a-f-kʷn-d-iqqan a-n-tgm tiqqi a-tzaydm f-liman-nnun a-bahra-tfulkim, tzaydm f-ufulki a-bahra-tissanm rbbi,
tzaydm f-twassna n-rbbi a-bdda-tġwim ġ-ih̬f-nnun, tzaydm f-mayan a-bahra-tzgam ġ-lḥqq, tzaydm f-mayan a-bdda-trḍum rbbi,
tzaydm f-mayan a-bahra-ttḥubbum mddn, tzaydm f-mayan a-bdda-tḥnnum ġ-wiyyaḍ.
iġ-a-gigun-ttigatnt kullu-tġawsiwin-ad, ra-tiẓḍarm i-kigan ar-di-ttawim lġllt iggutn ġilad ġ-tssnm siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
imma wanna ur-dar tiġawsiwin-ad, hati ibukḍ ur-a-ittisfiw yat, ittu is-t-issġus lmasiḥ zġ-ddnub lli-iskr ġayd izrin.
way-aytma, f-mayan a-f-rad-awn-iniġ, gat-n tiqqi-nnun s-uggʷar a-bahra-tzgam ġ-uġaras lli-s-awn-d-iġra rbbi iẓli-kʷn-d srs. ašku iġ-a-tskarm s-ġmkan ur-ra-sar-tjlum,
hati ra-tkšmm s-lfrḥ iggutn s-tgldit idumn n-unjjam siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
riġ-bdda a-yawn-d-ssktayġ tiġawsiwin-ad, wah̬h̬a-tnti-tssnm tzgam ġ-lḥqq lli-mi-tsfldm.
ašku swangmġ is-išwa a-bdda-ssrġaġ ma-illan ġ-ih̬f-nnun kullu mad-sulġ ġ-uh̬iyyam-ad lli-igan ddat-inu.
ašku ssnġ yan imikk rad-h̬wuġ ah̬iyyam-ad. mayad, imla-yyi-t-id siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ,
walaynni ra-n-tggaġ tiqqi-nu baš a-tiẓḍarm a-bdda-tswingimm ġ-tġawsiwin-ad ġakud lliġ ur-ra-sul-didun-iliġ.
ur-a-nbnnu f-kra n-tḥajiyin tyawskarnin s-lɛaql n-bnadm ġakud lliġ-awn-nsawl f-mamnk a-d-yuška siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ s-tḥkimt itjhhdn. ašku nkkʷni nẓra timuġra-ns,
nili dids f-uwrir amẓlay, nsfld i-wawal zġ-ignwan lliġ-d-issbayyn rbbi babatnnġ lmjd l-lmasiḥ d-lhibt-ns. isawl-d-wawal zġ-lmjd n-tattuyt inna: «ġwad iga iwi iɛzzan. frḥġ srs bahra.»

mayan a-darnnġ-izzgan iwaliwn l-lanbiya s-uggʷar. afulki a-ra-tskarm iġ-a-stti-ttawim ġ-mad-nnan ntni, ašku iga-wawal-nsn zund tifawt l-lqndil, ar-ittisfiw ġ-tillas ard ifaw-wass iġli-d itri n-ṣṣbaḥ ġ-uwlawn-nnun.
walaynni taġawsa ihiyyan a-stt-igan, a-tissanm is-ur-iẓḍar yan s-ih̬f-ns a-ifhm lmɛna n-mad-nnan lanbiya ġ-warratn n-rbbi.
ašku ur-d-yuški kra n-wawal n-rbbi zġ-lɛaql n-bnadm, walaynni ar-sawaln mddn-an s-iwaliwn lli-asn-d-imala rbbi ġmklli-tn-itguwwad rruḥ lqudus.

ġayd izrin kkan-ttin kra n-mddn ġ-gr ayt-rbbi ar-ttinin izd lanbiya ad-gan walaynni ar-sskirkisn. ġmkan a-s-rad-daġ-ilin imslmdn ayt-tkrkas ġ-darun. s-tntla a-s-ra-n-šškšamn iswingimn ur-ʷġẓannin ar-ttawin s-lhalak. rad-traran tiġurdin-nsn s-siditsn itjhhdn lli-tn-ifran ad-gn wins. rad-zzugzn lhalak f-ih̬f-nsn ġ-yat-tasaɛt.
iggut ma-ra-itamẓ aġaras-nsn l-lfsad. f-ssibt-nsn a-f-rad-rggmn mddn ġ-uġaras l-lḥqq.
ra-kʷn-šttan s-iwaliwn h̬wanin, ašku ar-bdda-ttirin ma-igan win wiyyaḍ. walaynni zġ-isizwar a-gisn-itmnad ġwalli ra-fllasn-yut lḥukm. ur-a-igan ġwalli ra-tn-ihlk.
ašku ur-iṣamḥ rbbi i-lmalayka lli-ffuġnin zġ-wawal-ns, walaynni iluḥ-tn-in ġ-tdrut, idḥi-tn-in s-tuggugt n-tillas a-ġin-tyamaẓn ar ass l-lḥsab.

ur-iṣamḥ rbbi i-isizwar n-ddunit, walaynni yull-d aman aylliġ dln kullu ddunit n-willi srs rurnin tiġurdin-nsn. ur-zgisn-ijjnjm abla nuḥ lli-itbrraḥn s-maylli irḍan rbbi, ntta d-ssa n-mddn yaḍni.
yut ilmma rbbi lḥukm f-tmdinin n-sadum d-ɛamura, ihlk-tnt s-lɛafit, baš ad-ẓrn kullu willi srs rurnin tiġurdin ma-ijran i-tmdinin-an, issann ma-rad-asn-ijru ula ntni.
walaynni ijjnjm luṭ lli-igan argaz ifulkin, ašku ṭiyyr-as i-luṭ bahra f-mamnk ad-fsadn mddn-an ʷh̬šnnin.
izdġ-urgaz-an ifulkin ġ-gratsn. ass f-wass ar-ti-ttaġ-tguḍi ġ-uwl-ns ifulkin ġakud lliġ a-itmnad ar-isflid i-iskkirn-nsn ʷh̬šnnin.

kullu mayan imla-yaġ is-issn siditnnġ mamnk a-ijjnjam ġwilli tuqqarnin rbbi zġ-tnukmut nna-tn-itarmn, yissan mamnk a-itḥḍu ġwilli ʷh̬šnnin ar ass l-lḥsab lli-ġ-ra-fllasn-yut lɛqubit lli-asn-igan.
ra-stt-yut s-uggʷar f-willi skarnin s-ššhwat lli-bahra-rkanin ḥgrn ġwalli fllasn iḥkamn. imma imslmdn-an šqan bahra. ar-zzɛamn ih̬fawn-nsn, ar-rggmn ula ġ-inmġurn n-ignwan bla-da-tiksaḍn.
wah̬h̬a-tn-ugʷrn lmalayka tjhhdn fllasn bahra, ur-a-rggmn ntni ġ-mddn-an ġ-dar rbbi.
walaynni imslmdn-an ar-rggmn ġ-ma-ur-fhimn, gn zund luḥuš šqanin lli-skarnin walaynni ur-ssinn mah̬ aylliġ a-skarn, ar-tlaln ġir baš a-tyamaẓn tyawhlakn. ula mddn-an ra-tyawhlakn zund luḥuš.

rad-asn-d-irar rbbi arfufn f-urfufn lli-skarn i-wiyyaḍ. ntni iɛjb-tn ad-skarn ma-ittiri ih̬f-nsn ula ġ-uzal ġ-lgddam n-mddn. irkan d-lɛar ad-gan ġ-darun, ar-tfraḥn s-tillay-nsn lliġ a-didun-tmunun f-imnsiwn-nnun.
ar-bdda-ttirin ad-ẓrn lfsad, ur-a-tšbaɛn zġ-ddnub, ar-n-lddin ġwilli ur-zganin, myurn ad-ssmunun mad-ran i-ih̬f-nsn. tarwa n-h̬zit ad-gan.
ffuġn aġaras lli-inmn, munn d-uġaras n-balɛam yus n-baɛur lli-dar iɛzza a-yamẓ iqaridn s-ma-yʷh̬šnn.
ntta, iẓi dids ula uġiyyul-ns f-ddnub lli-iskr. wah̬h̬a ur-a-sawalnt lbhaym, tsawl srs lbhimt-an s-wawal n-bnadm, baš a-tḥṣar nnabi-an ġ-unufl-ns.
imma mddn-an, zund lɛyun qqurnin ad-gan, ula zund imdla idḥi-tn-waḍu itjhhdn. iskr-asn rbbi adġar ġ-tillas aggugnin.
ašku ar-ssfurrugn s-iwaliwn h̬wanin. s-ššhwat ʷh̬šnnin a-s-a-n-lddin mddn lli-bḥra-d-wrrinin zġ-gr willi jlanin.
ar-ttinin rad-asn-fssin zġ-iskraf, imma ntni sul gan ismgan i-lfsad. ašku kullu wanna inra kra, iga ismg i-ġaylli-t-inran.

iġ-d-njmn mddn zġ-irkan n-ddunit s-twassna n-unjjam siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ walaynni wrrin tigira tyassasn-daġ s-irkan-an aylliġ-tn-nran, hati iwrri isiggʷra n-mddn-an yʷh̬šn uggʷar n-isizwar-nsn.
yuf-asn mrad is-ur-akkʷ-ssinn aġaras n-ufulki, ula ard-t-issann rarn ilmma tiġurdin s-wawal lli-f-tn-yuṣṣa rbbi.
skrn ntni zund lmɛna-yad illan: yuḍa-widi s-iraran-ns, twrri tilft lli-yarudn a-trurḍ ġ-tallaġt.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, tabrat-ad tga tis snat-tbratin lli-awn-in-uriġ. ssktiġ-awn-d srsnt tiġawsiwin-ad baš a-tswingimm ġ-ma-yʷġẓann.
riġ a-di-tktim iwaliwn lli-s-nnan lanbiya n-rbbi ġayd izrin, tktim-d almmud lli-f-kʷn-yuṣṣa-unjjam siditnnġ f-imi n-irqqasn-nnun.
walaynni taġawsa ihiyyan a-stt-igan, a-tissanm is-rad-d-aškin kra n-iṭnnaẓn ġ-uwssan-ad ggʷranin ar-bahra-tṭnaẓn ar-skarn f-kullu ma-ttirin i-ih̬f-nsn
ar-ttinin: «manza siditun? is-ur-inni ra-d-yašk? ẓrat, mnšk ayad s-zrin imzwura-nnġ, walaynni sul iqama kullu ġmklli iga zġ-isizwar, ġayklli ttyawh̬laq ddunit sul s-ġilad.»
imma ntni ar-ttirin ad-ttun izd s-wawal-ns a-s-ih̬lq rbbi ignwan ġ-isizwar, iskr ikalln ġ-gr-waman iskr-tn s-waman.
tdl ilmma ddunit n-uwssan-an s-waman, ttyawhlak kullutt.
imma ġilad s-wawal-ns a-s-iḥḍa rbbi ignwan d-wakal, baš a-tyawhlakn s-lɛafit ġ-wass l-lḥsab lli-ġ-ra-ihlk ġwilli srs rurnin tiġurdin.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, a-ur-tettum taġawsa-yad: iga yan-wass dar siditnnġ zund alf n-usggʷas, ig alf n-usggʷas zund yan-wass.
ur-imaṭl siditnnġ a-iskr maylli-s-inna, wah̬h̬a da-ttinin kra n-mddn imaṭl. ašku ar-didun-itṣbar. ur-iri ntta a-ityawhlak yan, walaynni ira kullu mddn ad-wrrin fln iskkirn-nsn ʷh̬šnnin.
walaynni ass n-siditnnġ ra-d-yašk zund amh̬h̬ar. rad-ittin ignwan s-ijjij itjhhdn, ifnu kullu ma-gisn-illan s-lɛafit, tjdr akal ula kullu ma-gis-skrn mddn.
ra-ityawhlak kullu ma-illan. f-mayan a-f-ra-kʷn-sqsaġ: man mddn zġ-ra-tgm? is-ur-ra-ttirim a-tskarm afulki ar-ttrḍum rbbi
ġilad ġ-a-ttqlm s-wass n-rbbi, ar-t-id-tssakmurm? ġassan a-ra-tyawhlakn ignwan s-lɛafit, ifsi kullu ma-illan s-trġi iggutn.
imma nkkʷni ar-ntql s-maylli-s-aġ-inna rbbi, ar-n-ntrju ignna l-ljdid d-wakal l-ljdid, ɛmmrn s-kullu ma-irḍan rbbi.
imma ġilad ġ-a-ttqlm s-mayad, ay-aytma ɛzzanin, gat-n tiqqi-nnun a-bdda-tili sslamt ġ-gratun d-rbbi, bla gigun illa kra l-lɛib ula kra yʷh̬šnn ġ-uwlawn-nnun.
swingimat f-mamnk a-didun-iṣbr siditnnġ baš a-twrrim tnjmm, ġmklli-awn-in-yura ula gʷmatnnġ iɛzzan bulus s-tḥkimt lli-as-ifka rbbi.

ġmkad a-ittini f-tġawsiwin-ad ġ-kullu tibratin-ns. kra ġ-ma-itara, ur-irh̬i a-t-nfhm, imma kra n-ibujadiyn d-mddn fssusnin ar-sslullin iwaliwn-ns zund mad-sslullin igzman yaḍni ġ-warratn n-rbbi. ar-di-traran lhalak f-ih̬fawn-nsn.
imma kunni ay-aytma ɛzzanin, lliġ tssnm kullu mayad ur-ta-ijri, rarat lɛaql a-kʷn-ur-ildi kra ijlan iffuġn zġ-wawal n-rbbi ula tḍrm zġ-laman-ad ġ-tllam.
zaydat ar-ttimġurm ġ-lbaraka d-twassna n-unjjam siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ. nttan a-bdda-ntalġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan. amin.
ġwalli illan zġ-isizwar, nsfld-as nẓr-t nssmaqql gis nggr-as. iga nttan awal n-tudrt.
tban-d tudrt-an i-mddn, nẓr-tt nkkʷni, ng fllas inagan. nawi-awn-in lh̬bar f-walli igan tudrt idumn, ikka-ttin illa ġ-dar rbbi babatnnġ iban-aġ-d ilmma.
nawi-awn-in lh̬bar f-ma-nẓra ula ma-mi-nsfld, baš a-tkšmm ula kunni ġ-tamunt-ad darnnġ illan. ašku tlla-yaġ ġilad tamunt d-rbbi babatnnġ d-yus yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
kullu mayad, nura-yawn-t-in baš a-kullu-nfrḥ s-lfrḥ iggutn.
ġmkad a-iga lh̬bar lli-mi-dars-nsfld nawi-awn-t-in: rbbi iga tifawt, ur-akk-gis-llint tillas.
iġ-nenna «tlla darnnġ tamunt d-rbbi» walaynni ar-sul-nttidu ġ-tillas, hati nsskarks ur-a-nskar s-lḥqq.
walaynni iġ-a-nttidu ġ-tifawt ġmklli illa ntta ġ-tifawt, tlla darnnġ tamunt i-ngratnnġ, ar-aġ-ssġusn idammn n-yasuɛ yus n-rbbi zġ-kullu ddnub nna-ginnġ-illan.
iġ-nenna «ur-a-nskar ddnub,» hati nsskarks f-ih̬f-nnġ, ur-ginnġ lḥqq.
walaynni iġ-a-ntqrra s-ddnub-nnġ, ra-issafu awal-ns izzga lḥqq issitti fllannġ ddnub-nnġ issġus-aġ zġ-kullu ma-ginnġ-yʷh̬šnn.
walaynni iġ-nenna «ur-nskir ddnub,» hati nga rbbi d-bu-tkrkas, ur-ginnġ-izga-wawal-ns.

wa-tarwa-nu ɛzzanin, uriġ-awn-in mayad baš a-ur-tskrm ddnub. walaynni iġ-idda kra n-yan gigun ard iskr ddnub, illa-yaġ sul yan-didnnġ-ibiddn ġ-dar rbbi babatnnġ, a-t-igan d-yasuɛ lmasiḥ lli-ġ-illa-ufulki ikmmln ġ-iẓri n-rbbi.
immut nttan baš ad-aġ-ifru zġ-ddnub-nnġ, urd ġir ddnub-nnġ nkkʷni walaynni ddnub n-ddunit kullutt.
ġmkad a-s-ra-nissan is-darnnġ tawassna n-rbbi: ašku iban ginnġ is-a-nskar s-maylli-f-aġ-yuṣṣa.
yan innan «ssnġ rbbi» bla-da-iskar s-luṣiyat-ns, hati ar-isskirkis ur-gis lḥqq.
imma kullu wanna iskarn s-wawal n-rbbi, hati twufa gis lḥnant n-rbbi. ġmkad a-s-ra-nissan is-nga wins:
ašku wanna ittinin is-iga win lmasiḥ, iqqan-t-id a-iskar ġmklli iskar lmasiḥ.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, urd kra l-luṣit l-ljdid ayad-awn-in-uriġ walaynni luṣit taqdimt. tg h̬talli-f-kʷn-yuṣṣa rbbi ġayd izrin, tili darun zġ-isizwar.
walaynni luṣit-ad-awn-in-uriġ tga tin ljdid, iban is-tga lḥqq ġ-lmasiḥ ula gigun kunni. ašku ar-zraynt tillas ar-di-ttisfiw tifawt l-lḥqq.
wanna innan illa ġ-tifawt walaynni sul a-itkrhu gʷmas, hatin sul illa ġ-tillas.
imma wanna itḥnnun ġ-gʷmas, illa ġ-tifawt, ur-gis kra l-lɛib.
walaynni yan ikurhan gʷmas, sul illa ġ-tillas ar-ittidu ġ-tillas. ur-issin manis a-ittidu ašku ssbukḍnt-t tillas.
uriġ-awn-in a-tarwa ɛzzanin, ašku rbbi issitti fllawn ddnub-nnun f-ism l-lmasiḥ.
araġ-awn-in a-id-babatsn, ašku tssnm ġwalli illan zġ-isizwar.

araġ-awn-in a-iɛyyaln, ašku tnram iblis. araġ-awn-in a-tarwa, ašku tssnm babatnnġ. araġ-awn-in a-id-babatsn, ašku tssnm ġwalli illan zġ-isizwar. araġ-awn-in a-iɛyyaln, ašku tdusm izga-gigun-wawal n-rbbi tnrum iblis.
a-ur-ttirim ddunit ula kra illan ġ-ddunit. iġ-a-ittiri yan ddunit, ur-gis-tlli tayri n-rbbi babatnnġ.
ašku kullu ma-illan ġ-ddunit (iga ġaylli ttiri ddat, ula ġaylli ttiri tiṭ, ula ġaylli-s-a-issimġur bnadm ih̬f-ns), urd babatnnġ a-d-ikka walaynni ikka-d ddunit.
ar-tzray ddunit ula kullu ma-gis-ttirin mddn, imma yan iskarn s-ma-ira rbbi, ra-iddr tudrt idumn.
wa-tarwa ɛzzanin, tasaɛt iggʷran ayad. tsfldm kunni f-unuwwaš l-lmasiḥ lli-ra-d-yašk. hati ġilad uškan-d kigan d-inuwwašn l-lmasiḥ. ġayan a-f-nssn izd tasaɛt iggʷran ayd ilkmn.
ffuġn ntni zġ-darnnġ walaynni urd zġ-ginnġ a-zġ-gan. mrad is-zginnġ-gan ikun didnnġ qaman, walaynni nssn kullutn ur-gin zġ-ginnġ, ašku ffuġn zġ-darnnġ.
kunni tssnm lḥqq kullukn, ašku illa gigun rruḥ lli-awn-ifka ġwalli igan amẓlay n-rbbi.
mayad a-f-awn-in-uriġ, ašku tssnm lḥqq, urd zund iġ-ur-ti-tssinm, ašku ur-jju-d-uškint kra n-tkrkas zġ-lḥqq.
manwa igan bu-tkrkas? iga-t wanna innan «yasuɛ ur-igi lmasiḥ n-rbbi.» yan innan ġmkan, iga anuwwaš l-lmasiḥ, irar tiġurdin-ns s-rbbi babatnnġ ula s-yus.
ašku yan irurn tiġurdin-ns s-yus n-rbbi, irur-tt ula s-rbbi babatnnġ. imma yan ittirin yus n-rbbi, ar-ittiri ula rbbi babatnnġ.
zgayat-bdda ġ-maylli mi tsfldm ġ-isizwar. ġmkan a-s-rad-bdda-tzgam ġ-rbbi babatnnġ ula ġ-yus.
ašku s-wawal izgan a-s-aġ-imla mayad, yini-aġ is-rad-aġ-ifk tudrt idumn.
uriġ-awn-in tiġawsiwin-ad f-willi ranin a-kʷn-jllun.

imma kunni, illa-bdda gigun rruḥ lli-awn-ifka lmasiḥ. ur-tḥtajjam ma-kʷn-isslmadn, ašku rruḥ-ns ar-kʷn-isslmad f-kraygatt kra, ar-awn-imala lḥqq bla tikrkas. walaynni illa fllawn a-gis-tzgam ġmklli-awn-isslmad.
imma ġilad a-tarwa ɛzzanin, zaydat tzgam ġ-lmasiḥ, baš a-izɛm-uwl-nnġ ġakud nna-d-iwrri ibayyn-d, ur-ra-niri a-zgis-nrgs.
tssnm is-iskr lmasiḥ kullu ma-irḍan rbbi, tissanm is-iwrri ilul kraygatt yan iskarn ma-t-irḍan s-tlalit l-ljdid zġ-dar rbbi.
ẓrat matta ġunška-s-aġ-ira rbbi babatnnġ aylliġ-aġ-iga d-tarwa-ns. ašku ġmkan a-nga nkkʷni. mayad a-f-ur-tssin ddunit ma-nga, ašku ur-tssin rbbi.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, nga tarwa n-rbbi ġilad. ur-ta-yaġ-issbayyn ma-ra-ng ġ-mayd-d-iftan, walaynni nssn mayad: ġakud lliġ ra-d-yašk lmasiḥ ra-ng zund nttan, ašku ra-t-nẓr ġmklli iga.
kullu wanna dar rrja-yad ġ-lmasiḥ ar-issġus ul-ns ġmklli iġus ntta.
kraygatt yan iskarn ddnub, hati iffuġ zġ-ššrɛ n-rbbi, ašku ddnub a-igan uffuġ n-ššrɛ.
tssnm kunni is-d-yuška lmasiḥ baš a-fllannġ-issitti ddnub-nnġ, tissanm is-ur-jju-iskir kra n-ddnub ntta.
wanna izgan ġ-lmasiḥ ur-a-iskar ddnub. imma wanna itzayadn ġ-ddnub ur-ta-ifhim ula issn mamnk a-iga lmasiḥ.
wa-tarwa ɛzzanin, a-ur-tadjm yan a-kʷn-ijllu. wanna iskarn s-lḥqq, ra-srs-ifrḥ rbbi ġmklli ifrḥ s-lmasiḥ.
imma wanna iskarn ddnub, win iblis a-iga, ašku iblis ar-iskar ddnub zġ-isizwar. mayad a-f-d-yuška yus n-rbbi: yuška-d a-ihlk iskkirn n-iblis.
imma wanna-d-iluln talalit l-ljdid zġ-dar rbbi, ur-a-iskar ddnub, ašku rbbi iẓẓa gis amud-ns. ur-iẓḍar a-izayd ġ-ddnub, ašku iwrri iga zġ-tarwa n-rbbi.
ġmkad a-s-a-ntissan tarwa n-rbbi zġ-tarwa n-iblis: wanna ur-iskarn s-lḥqq ur-igi win rbbi, d-wanna ur-itḥnnun ġ-gʷmas ur-igi win rbbi.
ġmkad a-iga-wawal lli-mi-tsfldm zġ-isizwar: illa fllannġ a-nttiri i-ngratnnġ.
a-ur-ng zund qayn lli-igan win iblis inġ gʷmas. mah̬ aylliġ-t-inġa? ašku qayn ar-iskar ma-yʷh̬šnn, imma gʷmas ar-iskar ma-ifulkin.
way-aytma, a-ur-ttɛjjabm iġ-kʷn-kurhan ayt-ddunit.
walaynni nssn is-nzri nkkʷni zġ-lmut s-tudrt, ašku tlla ginnġ tayri n-aytmatnnġ. walaynni yan ur-ittirin aytmas, hati sul iqama ġ-lmut.
yan ikurhan gʷmas, iga zund iġ-t-inġa. d-wanna inġan, ur-akkʷ-rad-as-tili tudrt idumn.
ġmkad a-s-nssn mamnk a-tga lḥnant: lmasiḥ ifka ih̬f-ns f-ssibt-nnġ. imma nkkʷni, illa fllannġ a-nakka ih̬f-nnġ f-ssibt n-aytmatnnġ.
iġ-illa yan iṭṭafn lh̬ir iẓr gʷmas iḥtajja walaynni issiqar fllas ul-ns, mamnk a-ra-yini tlla gis lḥnant n-rbbi?
wa-tarwa ɛzzanin, a-ur-nmala lḥnant ġir s-iwaliwn ula s-ils walaynni s-iskkirn d-lḥqq.
ġmkad a-s-ra-nissan is-nga win lḥqq nsshnnu ul-nnġ ġ-lgddam n-rbbi iġ-a-itġuwḍ-uwl-nnġ f-ssibt n-ma-ur-nfulki.
ašku rbbi imqqur f-uwl-nnġ, yissan kullu ma-ginnġ-illan.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, iġ-ur-iġuwḍ-uwl-nnġ, nẓḍar a-nzɛm ġakud nna-ntakmur s-rbbi
namẓ dars aynna zgis nḍalb, ašku ar-nskar s-ma-f-aġ-yuṣṣa ula s-ma-t-irḍan.
ġmkad a-tga luṣit-ns, yini-aġ a-namn s-ism n-yus yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ar-ntḥnnu i-ngratnnġ ġmklli-s-aġ-yuṣṣa lmasiḥ.
wanna iskarn s-luṣiyat-ns, nttan a-izgan ġ-rbbi izga rbbi gis. ġmkad a-s-nssn is-ginnġ-izga, ašku ifka-yaġ rruḥ-ns.

way-aytma ɛzzanin, a-ur-tamnm kullu wanna innan «illa-gigi rruḥ lqudus,» walaynni armat rruḥ-an a-tẓrm is-iga win rbbi nġd uhu. ašku ggutn mddn lli-tkkanin ddunit, ar-ttinin is-a-sawaln s-mad-asn-imala rbbi walaynni ar-sskirkisn.
ġmkad a-s-ra-tissanm izd rruḥ n-rbbi a-gisn-isawaln nġd uhu: iġ-a-ittini rruḥ-an «yasuɛ lmasiḥ yuška-d zġ-rbbi, iwrri s-ddat n-bnadm» ra-tissanm rruḥ-an, izd win rbbi a-iga.
imma rruḥ nna-ur-ittinin lḥqq f-yasuɛ, urd win rbbi a-iga walaynni iga rruḥ n-unuwwaš l-lmasiḥ lli-f-tsfldm ra-d-yašk, illa-nnit ġilad ġ-ddunit.
imma kunni a-tarwa ɛzzanin, win rbbi a-tgam, tnrum-tn ašku rruḥ lli-gigun-illan yugʷr rruḥ lli-illan ġ-ddunit.
ntni gan win ddunit, ar-sawaln s-ma-igan win ddunit, ar-srsn-sflidn ayt-ddunit.
imma nkkʷni nga win rbbi, ar-srnnġ-sflidn ġwilli ssnnin rbbi. imma winna ur-ssinnin rbbi ur-rin ad-srnnġ-sflidn. ġmkan a-s-ra-ntissan rruḥ l-lḥqq zġ-rruḥ n-tkrkas.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, illa fllannġ a-ntḥnnu i-ngratnnġ, ašku lḥnant tga tin rbbi. yan itḥnnun, hati ilul-d zġ-dar rbbi yissan rbbi.
imma yan ur-itḥnnun, ur-issin rbbi. ašku rbbi iga lḥnant.
ġmkad a-s-aġ-d-issbayyn rbbi lḥnant-ns: yuzn-d ġwalli igan yus s-ddunit, baš ad-aġ-tili tudrt f-ssibt-ns.
ġmkad a-tga tayri: urd tayri lli-s-nra rbbi walaynni tayri lli-s-aġ-ira nttan, aylliġ-d-yuzn yus a-immt baš ad-aġ-ifru zġ-ddnub-nnġ.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, lliġ-aġ-ira rbbi ġunškan, illa fllannġ a-nttiri i-ngratnnġ.
ur-jju-illi ma-iẓran rbbi, walaynni iġ-a-nttiri i-ngratnnġ, izga ginnġ rbbi, twufa ginnġ lḥnant-ns.
ġmkad a-nssn is-nzga ġ-rbbi izga ginnġ: ašku ifka-yaġ rruḥ-ns.
rbbi babatnnġ yuzn-d yus baš a-ig anjjam n-ddunit. nẓra-t nkkʷni, ng fllas inagan.
wanna ittinin s-nniyt n-uwl-ns «yasuɛ iga yus n-rbbi,» hati izga gis rbbi, izga ula ntta ġ-rbbi.
nkkʷni nssn lḥnant lli-s-ginnġ-iḥnna rbbi, namn srs. rbbi iga lḥnant. yan izgan ġ-lḥnant, izga ġ-rbbi, izga rbbi gis.
hati issuwfa rbbi ginnġ lḥnant-ns, baš a-nsshnnu ul-nnġ ġ-wass l-lḥsab, ašku nwrri nga zund ma-iga nttan ġ-ddunit-ad.
lḥnant ur-gis tiksaḍ, walaynni lḥnant ikmmln ar-n-ttluḥ tiksaḍ s-brra. imma yan iksuḍn, ur-ta-gis-twufi lḥnant ikmmln, ašku wanna iksuḍn ar-sul-iswingim ġ-lɛqubit.
ar-ntḥnnu nkkʷni ašku rbbi a-izwarn is-fllannġ-iḥnna.
iġ-a-ittini kra n-yan «ar-ttiriġ rbbi» walaynni sul a-itkrhu gʷmas, hati ar-isskirkis. ašku iġ-ur-a-ittiri gʷmas lli-itmnad, mamnk a-ra-yiri rbbi lli-ur-a-itmnad?
ġmkad a-tga luṣit-ns: wanna ittirin rbbi, iqqan-t-id a-ittiri ula gʷmas.
kullu wanna yumnn izd yasuɛ a-igan lmasiḥ n-rbbi, hati ilul-d talalit l-ljdid zġ-dar rbbi. kullu wanna ittirin rbbi babatnnġ, ar-ittiri yus.
ġmkad a-s-ra-nissan is-a-nttiri tarwa n-rbbi: ašku iban ginnġ is-a-nttiri rbbi, ar-nskar s-ma-f-aġ-yuṣṣa.
ġmkad a-s-a-nmala is-a-nttiri rbbi: ar-nskar s-luṣiyat-ns. ur-fllannġ-iẓẓay maylli-f-aġ-yuṣṣa,
ašku kullu wanna-d-iluln zġ-dar rbbi ar-itnru ddunit. mayad a-s-a-ntnru ddunit, ašku numn awal n-rbbi.
manwa ra-inru ddunit? wanna yumnn s-yasuɛ n-is-iga yus n-rbbi.
yasuɛ lmasiḥ, nttan a-d-yuškan s-waman d-idammn. urd ġir s-waman a-s-d-yuška walaynni s-waman d-idammn. rruḥ lqudus a-yakkan tugga f-mayad, ašku rruḥ lqudus iga lḥqq.
llan kraḍ inagan:
rruḥ d-waman d-idammn. mšaškand-d tugga-nsn.
nmyar a-nsflid s-tugga n-bnadm, walaynni tugga n-rbbi ugʷrnt tin bnadm. rbbi a-igan inigi, ifk tugga f-yus.
imma wanna yumnn s-yus n-rbbi, llant tugga n-rbbi ġ-uwl-ns. walaynni yan ur-isflidn s-ma-ittini rbbi, iga rbbi d-bu-tkrkas ašku ur-yumin tugga lli-ifka f-yus.
ġmkad ad-gant tugga: ifka-yaġ rbbi tudrt idumn, tili-aġ tudrt-ad f-ssibt n-yus.
wanna imunn d-yus n-rbbi, tlla-yas tudrt. imma wanna ur-imunn d-yus n-rbbi, ur-rad-as-tili tudrt.
uriġ-awn-in tiġawsiwin-ad i-kunni lli-umnnin s-ism n-yus n-rbbi, baš a-tissanm is-teṭṭafm tudrt idumn.
mayad a-yaġ-izzɛamn ġakud nna-n-ntakmur s-rbbi, ašku nssn is-a-yaġ-isflid iġ-zgis-nḍalb ma-t-irḍan.
lliġ nssn is-a-yaġ-isflid ġakud nna-zgis-nḍalb, nissan is-rad-aġ-yili maylli zgis nḍalb.

iġ-illa ma-iẓran gʷmas iskr kra yʷh̬šnn lli-ur-igin zġ-ddnub lli-itawin s-lhalak, illa fllas a-iḍalb rbbi f-gʷmas. rad-as-d-irar rbbi s-tudrt. nniġ-awn mayad ġir f-willi skrnin ddnub lli-ur-itawin s-lhalak. ašku llan kra n-ddnub lli-ra-yawi s-lhalak, ur-awn-nniġ a-ttḍalabm f-ddnub-an.
kullu iskkirn ʷh̬šnnin gan ddnub, walaynni ur-a-kullu-tawin ddnub-an s-lhalak.
nssn ġwilli mi ifka rbbi talalit l-ljdid is-ur-a-skarn ddnub. ar-tn-issntal yus n-rbbi, ur-iẓḍar iblis a-tn-ilkm.
nssn is-nga tarwa n-rbbi, tili ddunit kullutt ġ-ddu-ufus n-iblis.
nssn is-d-yuška yus n-rbbi ad-aġ-ifk lfhmt baš a-nissan ġwalli igan lḥqq. imma ġilad nga win ġwalli igan lḥqq d-win yus yasuɛ lmasiḥ. nttan a-igan rbbi l-lḥqq, ig tudrt idumn.
wa-tarwa ɛzzanin, tanfat i-ilahat n-ddunit-ad.
zġ-umġar i-tmġart tamẓlayt d-tarwa-ns. tɛzzam dari s-lḥqq, nkki ula kullu willi ssnnin lḥqq.
ašku lḥqq a-ginnġ-izgan kullwaġ, rad-bdda-didnnġ-yili.
rad-aġ-tili lbaraka d-rrḥmt d-sslamt zġ-rbbi babatnnġ d-yasuɛ lmasiḥ yus n-babatnnġ s-lḥqq d-lḥnant.
frḥġ bahra lliġ-n-ufiġ kra n-tarwa-nnm ar-ttidun ġ-uġaras l-lḥqq ġmklli-aġ-yuṣṣa rbbi babatnnġ.
imma ġilad a-tamġart iɛzzan, ur-rad-am-n-araġ f-kra l-luṣit l-ljdid walaynni f-luṣit lli-darnnġ-illan zġ-isizwar. ašku ra-zgim-ḍalbġ a-kullu-ntḥnnu i-ngratnnġ.
ġmkad a-s-ra-nmala lḥnant lli-ginnġ-illan: ra-nskar s-luṣiyat n-rbbi. d-ġmkad a-tga luṣit-ns lli-mi-tsfldm zġ-isizwar: a-bdda-ttḥnnum i-ngratun.
han kigan d-ayt-tkrkas ar-tkkan ddunit, agʷin ad-inin: «yuška-d yasuɛ lmasiḥ zġ-rbbi, iwrri s-ddat n-bnadm.» wan mddn-an, ayt-tkrkas ad-gan, gn inuwwašn l-lmasiḥ.
han da-tjlum lbaraka lli-f-a-tth̬damm. rarat lɛaql a-tkšmm ġ-kullu ma-kʷn-d-yuškan.
ašku wanna issurfn almmud l-lmasiḥ iffuġ zġ-gis, hati issngara ih̬f-ns d-rbbi. imma wanna izgan ġ-ulmmud l-lmasiḥ, ra-iqama ntta ġ-tamunt n-rbbi babatnnġ d-win yus.
iġ-n-darun-yuška kra n-yan ur-n-yiwi almmud-ad, a-t-ur-tšškšmm s-tgmmi ula tssmrḥbam srs.
ašku wanna srs issmrḥban, hati iɛawn-t ġ-iskkirn-ns ʷh̬šnnin.
iggut ma-dari ad-awn-t-in-araġ, walaynni yuf iġ-urd ġ-tiwuriqin s-ṣṣmḥ. walaynni ar-trjuġ a-n-darun-aškġ sawlġ didun udm s-uwdm, baš a-kullu-nfrḥ s-lfrḥ iggutn.
ar-n-fllam-tsllamn tarwa n-uwlltmam-ad tamẓlayt.
zġ-umġar i-gʷma iɛzzan gayus. tɛzzat dari s-lḥqq.
wa-gʷma iɛzzan, ḍalbġ rbbi fllak a-tilit s-lh̬ir, tdust ġ-ddat-nnk ġmklli tdust ġ-rruḥ-nnk.
frḥġ bahra lliġ-d-uškan kra n-aytmatn sawln-iyi f-mamnk a-tzgat ġ-lḥqq, ar-ttidut ġ-uġaras l-lḥqq.
ur-illi ma-yyi-issfraḥn zund iġ-sfldġ f-tarwa-nu is-sul-a-ttidun ġ-uġaras l-lḥqq.
wa-gʷma iɛzzan, afulki ayan tskart lliġ a-ttɛawant aytmatnnġ, bahra ġwilli dark ganin iġribn.
sawln-aġ-d ġ-lgddam n-ayt-umnaggar kullutn f-mamnk a-gisn-ttḥnnut. afulki a-ra-tskrt-daġ iġ-tzuydt tɛawnt-tn ad-kmmln f-umuddu-nsn ġilad ġmklli ira rbbi.
ašku ffuġn ntni ar-tmuddun f-ism l-lmasiḥ bla-da-tamẓn yat zġ-willi ur-ssinnin rbbi.
hati illa fllannġ a-ntbddad d-mddn zund ntni, baš a-didsn-ntmɛawan ġ-twuri l-lḥqq.
uriġ-n kra i-ayt-umnaggar n-darun, walaynni dyiyyutrifis lli-dar-iɛzza a-gigun-ig anmġur, ur-a-isflid s-ma-nttini nkkʷni.

iġ-n-uškiġ s-darun rad-ak-mlġ ma-iskar. ar-ginnġ-isawal s-tkrkas, walaynni ur-t-yuwdi ġir ġayan. han izuyd-as ur-a-n-itqbal aytmatn lli-n-uškanin s-darun, ar-itẓi d-winna ranin a-tn-qbln ar-tn-issufuġ ula ntni zġ-umnaggar.
wa-gʷma iɛzzan, a-ur-tskart zund mddn ʷh̬šnnin walaynni zund ġwilli šwanin. wanna iskarn afulki, win rbbi a-iga. imma wanna iskarn ma-yʷh̬šnn, ur-issin rbbi.
walaynni dimitryus, ar-fllas-ttinin kullu mddn is-ifulki. tugga-yad, izzga-tnt lḥqq. ula nkkʷni ar-fllas-nakka tugga n-is-ifulki. tssnt izd lḥqq ad-gant tugga-nnġ.
iggut ma-dari ad-ak-t-in-araġ, walaynni ur-riġ ad-ak-t-araġ s-lqlm ula ṣṣmḥ.
walaynni ar-trjuġ a-k-ẓrġ ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn, nsawl nkki dik udm s-uwdm.
ad-ak-tili sslamt. ar-n-fllak-tsllamn imddukkʷal-nnk kullutn. sllm f-imddukkʷal-nnġ kraygatt yan s-ism-ns.
zġ-uh̬ddam n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, yahuda gʷmas n-yaɛqub. i-willi-f-iḥnna rbbi babatnnġ iġr-asn-d, ar-tn-issntal yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ad-awn-tigat rrḥmt d-sslamt d-lḥnant.

way-aytma ɛzzanin, skrġ f-ad-awn-in-araġ s-lfrḥ f-ujnjm lli-s-kullu-nnjm nkkʷni didun, walaynni ufiġ-n is-iyi-ih̬ṣṣa ad-awn-in-araġ f-a-kʷn-zzɛamġ a-ttjaḥadm f-ulmmud l-liman izgan lli-d-issbayyn rbbi i-imẓlayn-ns.

ašku kšmn-in kra n-mddn s-gratun s-tntla. ityara fllasn zġ-isizwar f-lḥukm lli-ra-fllasn-iḍr. ntni ur-a-tuqqarn rbbi. ar-tfsadn ar-ttinin izd ġmkan a-tga lbaraka n-rbbi. rarn tiġurdin-nsn s-yasuɛ lmasiḥ, d-nttan waḥdut a-igan bab-nnġ ig siditnnġ.
riġ ad-awn-d-ssktiġ maylli mi tsfldm ġayd izrin. tssnm is-ijjnjm rbbi mddn-ns issufġ-tn-d zġ-tmazirt n-miṣr, walaynni tigira n-mayan ihlk ġwilli ur-umnnin awal-ns.
tsfldm f-lmalayka lli-ffuġnin zġ-tzdġt-nsn, ur qaman ġ-illiġ-tn-iga rbbi. tissanm is-tn-in-iḥḍa rbbi ġ-tillas aggugnin a-n-ġin-tyawkrrafn ar ass imqqurn l-lḥsab lli-ġ-ra-fllasn-yut lḥukm.

tissanm is-ihlk rbbi timdinin n-sadum d-ɛamura d-tiyyaḍ lli-n-tama-nsnt f-ssibt n-ššhwat ʷh̬šnnin lli-skarn, ar-tfsadn iwtman i-ngratsn. iqqan-d mddn ad-swingimn mad-asn-ijran baš a-ur-tyawhlakn ula ntni s-lɛafit lli-ur-ih̬sin.
imma ġilad ar-skarn ayt-twargiwin-an ġmkan ġ-darun. ar-ssyʷh̬šann ddat-nsn, ur-a-tuqqarn ġwalli itḥkamn, ar-rggmn ayt-ignwan.
urd ġmkan a-iskr lmalak imqqurn mih̬ayl lliġ immaġ d-iblis f-manwa gisn a-ra-yamẓ ddat n-musa. ur-izɛm ntta a-irgm iblis. ur-as-inni abla: «a-k-issfssa rbbi.»
mddn-an ar-rggmn ġ-ma-ur-ssinn. imma ġaylli ssnn zġ-ih̬f-nsn zund luḥuš bla lɛaql, ġayan a-tn-itawin s-lhalak.
taguḍi a-rad-asn-yili, ašku umẓn aġaras n-qayn, zznzn ih̬f-nsn ad-sskirkisn zund balɛam, ar-tẓin d-inmġurn n-rbbi zund quraḥ. han ġmklli ityawhlak quraḥ a-rad-tyawhlakn ula ntni.

irkan ad-gan ġ-darun lliġ a-didun-tmunun f-imnsiwn-nnun, ar-šttan ar-ḍṣṣan i-ngratsn bla-da-tḥšamn, ar-tsalan ġir ih̬fawn-nsn. gan zund timdla lli-ġ-ur-llin-waman, ar-tnt-idḥay-waḍu. gn zund isġarn bla lġllt ġ-uzmz-ns, mmutn f-snat-twal, akufn zġ-iẓuran.
gn zund taḍangiwin n-umda iduyn s-ukškuš n-tillay-nsn ʷh̬šnnin. gn zund itran jlanin ġ-ignwan, iskr rbbi fllasn tillas aggugnin a-n-gisnt-bdda-qaman.
mddn-an a-f-isawl ah̬nuh̬ lli-igan zġ-tis sḍiṣṭ tasutin ġ-tġurdin n-adam. imla-yas rbbi awal inna: «ẓrat siditnnġ ra-d-yašk, munn-d dids kigan d-wafḍan n-imẓlayn-ns,
baš a-iḥkam f-kullu mddn. ra-ihlk kullu willi srs rurnin tiġurdin f-ssibt n-iskkirn-nsn ʷh̬šnnin lli-skarn s-lh̬ʷšant lli-gisn-illan, ula f-kullu tirggam lli-s-t-rgmn.»
han ntni ar-tngmugn ar-tẓin ar-skarn kullu ma-ittiri ih̬f-nsn, ar-ssfurrugn ar-talġn mddn baš a-tn-šttan.
way-aytma ɛzzanin, swangmad-d iwaliwn n-irqqasn n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ lli-s-awn-nnan f-ma-ra-ijru.
nnan-awn: «ġ-uwssan ggʷranin a-rad-d-aškin kra n-iṭnnaẓn. rad-skarn s-lh̬ʷšant lli-ittiri ih̬f-nsn.»
imma ġilad tẓram izd ntni a-yaṭṭun aytmatn, ar-skarn s-ma-ittiri-uwl n-bnadm, ur-darsn rruḥ lqudus.
imma kunni ay-aytma ɛzzanin, ssdusat ih̬fawn-nnun ġ-liman iɛzzan lli-awn-ifka rbbi, ar-ttẓallam ġmklli-awn-imala rruḥ lqudus.
tḥḍum ih̬fawn-nnun ġ-lḥnant n-rbbi ġilad ġ-a-ttqlm s-tudrt l-lih̬rt lli-s-ra-kʷn-in-išškšm siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ s-rrḥmt-ns.
ḥnnwat ġ-wanna iškkan,
tkkism-d kra i-lɛafit ar-tn-ttfukkum. tḥnnum ġ-wiyyaḍ tiksaḍm zġ-mad-skarn, ar-ttkrhum ula timlsit nna-imsln s-irkan n-ddat.

imma ġwalli iẓḍarn a-kʷn-injja baš a-ur-tḍrm, isslkm-kʷn-in s-lgddam l-lmjd-ns s-lfrḥ iggutn bla gigun illa kra l-lɛib, nttan a-mi-illa lmjd d-tmuġra d-tẓḍḍart d-lquwwa ġilad ula kullu ġayd izrin ula kullu mayd-d-iftan. d-ġmkad a-f-rad-bdda-ntalġ ġwalli igan rbbi anjjam-nnġ s-ism n-siditnnġ yasuɛ lmasiḥ, amin.
arra-yad, ityara gis maylli-d-issbayyn yasuɛ lmasiḥ, ifk-as-t rbbi baš a-d-iml i-ih̬ddamn-ns ma-d-iqqann a-ijru ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn. yazn-d yal-lmalak a-t-id-issbayyn i-uh̬ddam-ns yuḥanna.
ar-yaddr yuḥanna kullu ma-iẓra, ifk tugga-ns f-wawal-ad n-rbbi ula lh̬bar-ad n-yasuɛ lmasiḥ.
ambarki a-iga wanna yaqran iwaliwn-ad n-rbbi. imbarkin ad-gan winna-yasn-sflidnin ar-skarn s-mayd ityaran, ašku yakmur-d-uzmz lli-ġ-rad-kullu-jrunt-tġawsiwin-ad.
f-ufus n-yuḥanna i-ssa n-imnaggarn n-aytmatn ġ-tmazirt n-asiyya. ad-awn-tili lbaraka d-sslamt zġ-walli illan ikka-ttin illa rad-bdda-yili, ula zġ-ssa l-larwaḥ lli-iwalan lɛrš-ns,
ula zġ-yasuɛ lmasiḥ lli-igan inigi iṣḥan, ig amzwaru lli-d-inkrn zġ-lmut, ig wad iḥkamn ġ-igldan n-ddunit. nttan a-ginnġ-iḥnnan ifsi-aġ s-idammn-ns zġ-iskraf n-ddnub-nnġ,
irar-aġ a-ng ayt-tgldit n-rbbi babas f-a-n-nsras ġ-lgddam-ns tiwafkiw ma-s-a-itrḍu. nttan a-mi-illa lmjd d-lquwwa, ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.
hati ra-d-iftu ġilad ġ-gr imdla, ẓrn-t kullu mddn, ẓrn-t ula ġwilli-t-ssyaggasnin. rad-allant-kullu-tmizar n-ddunit f-ssibt-ns. ġmkad a-ra-yili, amin.
«nkki giġ wad izwarn, gġ wad iggʷran.» ġmkad a-s-inna sidi rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan. ikka-ttin illa, yili, rad-bdda-yili.
imma nkki yuḥanna gʷmatun d-usmun-nnun ġ-tnukmut ula tagldit ula ṣṣbr lli-aġ-illan s-ism n-yasuɛ, lliġ ġ-igzir n-baṭmus tyamaẓġ f-ssibt n-tbrraḥt n-wawal n-rbbi ula f-tugga n-yasuɛ.
hati ġ-wass n-siditnnġ yiwi-iyi rruḥ lqudus, s-sfldġ i-wawal itjhhdn zund nnffar isawl-d ġ-tġurdin-inu
yini-yyi: «ara mayd ra-tẓrt ġ-yan-warra, taznt-t s-ssa n-imnaggarn, i-afsus ula smirna ula bargamus ula tyatira ula sardis ula filadalfya ula lawdikiyya.»
grawlġ ad-ẓrġ ma-d-sri-isawln, s-ẓriġ ssa l-lḥsaki n-uwrġ,
ẓrġ ġ-gr lḥsaki yan irwas i-bnadm. ilsa tšamir iġzzifn, ibkis zġ-wammas-ns s-yan-ubkkas n-uwrġ.
imllul-bahra-wazzar-ns zund taḍut iṣfan nġd adfl, ar-d-ssufunt-walln-ns zund isufa l-lɛafit.
ar-ssmrqiqiyn iḍarn-ns zund anas iṣfan ityawmzayn s-ssql. itjhhd-wawal-ns zund ijjij n-isaffn n-waman ggutnin.
yasi ssa n-itran ġ-ufus-ns afasi, iffuġ-d zġ-imi-ns zund yat taẓẓit imsadn zġ-snat-tsgiw. ifaw-uwdm-ns zund tafukt n-ṭuẓẓunt n-wass.
ġir ẓriġ-t ḍrġ-n ġ-dar iḍarn-ns zund iġ-mmutġ. isrs-d flla afus-ns afasi yini-yyi: «ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ. nkki a-igan amzwaru ula amggʷaru,
gġ bab n-tudrt. kkiġ-ttin mmutġ, walaynni ha-yyi ddrġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan. ṭṭafġ tisura l-lmut ula adġar n-willi mmutnin.
imma kiyi, ara mayd tẓrit, ma-illan ġilad ula ma-ra-yili tigira.
ġmkad a-tga lmɛna n-ssa n-itran lli-tẓrit ġ-ufus-inu afasi ula ssa l-lḥsaki n-uwrġ. ssa n-itran-an, gan lmalayka n-ssa n-imnaggarn, imma ssa l-lḥsaki gant imnaggarn s-ssa.
«ara awal-ad i-lmalak n-umnaggar ġ-tmdint n-afsus: ha-ma-inna wad yusin ssa n-itran ġ-ufus-ns afasi ar-ittidu ġ-gr ssa l-lḥsaki n-uwrġ.
ssnġ kullu ma-tskart ula mamnk a-ttnhataft tṣbrt. ssnġ mamnk a-tngarat d-mddn ʷh̬šnnin, tarmt ula ġwilli ittinin izd irqqasn ad-gan, taft-tn-in is-a-sskirkisn ur-gin irqqasn.
ssnġ is-tzgat tṣbrt i-tnukmut f-ssibt n-ism-inu bla-da-ttrmayt.
«walaynni illa sul dari kra fllak: ur-sul-a-yyi-ttirit ġunšk lli-s-a-yyi-ttirit ġ-isizwar.
swangm-d manizġ-n-tḍrt. wrri-d zġ-ddnub-nnk ar-tskart ġmklli tskart ġ-isizwar. iġ-ur-di-twrrit zġ-ddnub-nnk, ra-n-srk-aškġ ssittiġ-ak lḥska-nnk zġ-udġar-ns.
walaynni sul gik iqama ma-ifulkin, ašku ar-ttkrhut iskkirn n-mddn-an n-nikulawin ġmklli-tn-tkrhuġ nkki.
wanna dar imzgan, iqqan-t-id a-isfld i-mayd ittini rruḥ lqudus i-imnaggarn. kullu wanna inran, rad-as-fkġ a-išš zġ-lġllt n-usġar n-tudrt lli-illan ġ-talɛrṣt l-lmjd n-rbbi.
«ara awal-ad i-lmalak n-umnaggar ġ-tmdint n-smirna: ha-ma-inna ġwalli igan amzwaru ig amggʷaru, immt iwrri iddr.

ssnġ mamnk a-tzrit ġ-tassast ar-ttẓlaṭṭ, walaynni s-ṣṣaḥt lh̬ir iggutn ad-ak-illan. ssnġ is-a-gik-rggmn ġwilli ittinin is-gan ayt-yudaya walaynni ur-gin ayt-yudaya. hati ayt-tgmmi n-tẓallit n-šiṭan ad-gan.
imma ġilad, ad-ur-tiksaṭṭ tanukmut lli-ra-fllak-izri. hati ra-k-yarm iblis iluḥ-n kra gigun ġ-lḥbs. ra-trfufnt mraw-uwssan. zga ġ-uġaras-inu ar lmut, fkġ-ak ttaj n-tudrt.
wanna dar imzgan, iqqan-t-id a-isfld i-mayd ittini rruḥ lqudus i-imnaggarn. kullu wanna inran, ur-akkʷ-ra-ti-tlkm lmut tis snat.
«ara awal-ad i-lmalak n-umnaggar ġ-tmdint n-bargamus: ha-ma-inna ġwalli dar taẓẓit imsadn zġ-snat-tsgiw.
ssnġ maniġ tzdġt izd illiġ illa lɛrš n-šiṭan. tġwit-bdda ġ-ism-inu, ur-akkʷ-twrrit zġ-uġaras-inu. tamẓt gigi ula ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-nġan inigi-nu izgan antibas ġin ġ-izdġ šiṭan.
«walaynni llant sul dari kra n-tġawsiwin fllak. llan ġ-gratun kra n-mddn umẓn almmud n-balɛam lli-imlan i-ugllid balaq mamnk a-ijllu ayt-rbbi, aylliġ a-šttan ma-ityawġrasn i-laṣnam ar-tfsadn.
ilin-daġ ġ-gratun kra n-mddn umẓn almmud n-nikulawin.
f-mayan a-f-rad-ak-iniġ: wrri-d zġ-ddnub-nnk. iġ-ur-di-twrrit ra-n-srk-aškġ ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn, mmaġġ d-mddn-an s-taẓẓit n-imi-nu.

wanna dar imzgan, iqqan-t-id a-isfld i-mayd ittini rruḥ lqudus i-imnaggarn. kullu wanna inran, rad-as-fkġ zġ-uġrum intln lli-mi-ttinin ‹manna›. fkġ-as ula yan-uẓru umlil, ityara gis yan-ism l-ljdid ur-t-issin yan abla ġwalli mi ityawfka.
«ara awal-ad i-lmalak n-umnaggar ġ-tmdint n-tyatira: ha-ma-inna yus n-rbbi lli-mi-ssufunt-walln zund isufa l-lɛafit, ar-ssmrqiqiyn iḍarn-ns zund anas ityawmzayn s-ssql.
ssnġ kullu ma-tskart ula mamnk a-yyi-ttirit, tzgat ġ-uġaras-inu ar-tskart tawuri-nu bahra, ar-ttṣbart ġ-tnukmut nna-fllak-izrin. ssnġ is-a-tskart ġilad uggʷar n-maylli tskart ġ-isizwar.

«walaynni illa sul dari kra fllak. ur-a-tssfssat tamġart-an ‹izabil› lli-ittinin is-a-tsawal s-iwaliwn n-rbbi. nttat ar-bahra-tjllu ih̬ddamn-inu s-ulmmud-ns ar-tn-ttrara ad-fsadn ar-šttan ma-ityawġrasn i-laṣnam.
fkiġ-as amhal a-tfl ddnub-ns, walaynni ur-tri a-di-twrri zġ-lfsad lli-tskar.
han ra-stt-in-luḥġ f-tisi n-waṭṭan a-gis-taḍn nttat d-willi dids tfsadnin. ġmkad a-rad-asn-skrġ iġ-ur-d-wrrin zġ-iskkirn-ns.
rad-utġ tarwa-ns s-lmut. ġakudan a-rad-ẓrn ayt-imnaggarn kullutn is-giġ wad issnn kullu mad-swingimn mddn ula ma-ttirin ġ-uwl-nsn. rad-rarġ i-kraygatt yan gigun f-ma-iskr.
«imma wiyyaḍ ġ-tyatira lli-ur-umẓnin almmud-an ula lmdn ma-mi-ttinin ‹tiġawsiwin ntlnin n-šiṭan›, ur-ra-n-fllawn-zaydġ kra n-taẓayt yaḍni.
ġir amẓat ġ-ma-darun-illan ard-n-aškġ.
kullu wanna inran ar-iskar mad-riġ ar isiggʷra, rad-as-fkġ taẓḍḍart f-tmizar n-ddunit ġmklli-yyi-ifka baba rbbi. ra-tnt-iḥkam s-uɛmud n-uwzzal, irẓ-tnt zund irukutn n-idqqi.
rad-as-fkġ itri lli-ifawn zikk ṣbaḥ.
wanna dar imzgan, iqqan-t-id a-isfld i-mayd ittini rruḥ lqudus i-imnaggarn.
«ara awal-ad i-lmalak n-umnaggar ġ-tmdint n-sardis: ha-ma-inna ġwalli dar ssa l-larwaḥ n-rbbi ula ssa n-itran. ssnġ kullu ma-tskart. ar-ttinin mddn is-tddrt walaynni tmmutt.
rar lɛaql tssdust ma-gik-iqaman ur-ta-immut. ufiġ-n maylli tskart ur-ta-ikmmil ġ-iẓri n-rbbi-nu.
swangm-d ma-tlmdt ula maylli mi-tsfldt ġayd izrin. skar srs, twrrid-d zġ-ddnub-nnk. iġ-ur-trurt lɛaql, hati ra-n-srk-aškġ zund amh̬h̬ar, ur-ra-tissant man tasaɛt ġ-ra-k-in-lkmġ.
walaynni llan sul dark ġ-sardis kra n-mddn drusnin lli-ur-ssrkinin timlsa-nsn. ntni a-ra-didi-imun s-tmlsa tumlilin, ašku ntni a-isthllan.
kullu wanna inran, ra-ils ula ntta timlsit tumlilt. rad-addrġ ism-ns ġ-dar baba rbbi ula lmalayka-ns, iniġ fllas izd winu a-iga. ur-sar-kkisġ ism-ns zġ-warra n-tudrt.
wanna dar imzgan, iqqan-t-id a-isfld i-mayd ittini rruḥ lqudus i-imnaggarn.

«ara awal-ad i-lmalak n-umnaggar ġ-tmdint n-filadalfya: ha-ma-inna ġwalli igan amẓlay ig lḥqq, iṭṭaf tasarut n-ugllid dawd. aynna rẓmġ nkki, ur-iẓḍar yan a-t-iqqn. d-aynna qqnġ, ur-iẓḍar yan a-t-irẓm.
ssnġ kullu ma-tskart. hati rẓmġ yan-imi ġ-lgddam-nnk, ur-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-t-iqqn. ssnġ is-ur-tẓḍart i-ma-iggutn walaynni tumẓt ġ-wawal-inu, ur-tnnit ur-iyi-tssint.

imma mddn-an n-ayt-tgmmi n-tẓallit n-šiṭan, ar-sskirkisn ar-ttinin izd ayt-yudaya ad-gan walaynni ur-akkʷ-gin ayt-yudaya. ra-tn-d-awiġ ad-knun s-wakal ġ-dar iḍarn-nnk, baš ad-issann izd kiyi a-dari-iɛzzan.
hati tṣbrt tzgat ġmklli-k-uṣṣaġ. f-mayan a-f-ra-k-ssntalġ ġ-tasaɛt n-tnukmut lli-ra-izri f-ddunit a-tarm kullu willi gis zdġnin.
ġir imikk ra-n-aškġ. amẓ ġ-ma-dark-illan, a-ur-tadjt yan ad-ak-yakʷr ttaj-nnk.

kullu wanna inran, ra-t-gġ d-tannalt ġ-tgmmi n-rbbi-nu, ur-sar-tt-iffuġ. ra-fllas-araġ ism n-rbbi-nu d-ism n-tmdint n-rbbi-nu, a-stt-igan d-urušalim l-ljdid lli-ra-d-igguz zġ-ignna zġ-dar rbbi-nu, araġ fllas ula ism-inu l-ljdid.
wanna dar imzgan, iqqan-t-id a-isfld i-mayd ittini rruḥ lqudus i-imnaggarn.
«ara awal-ad i-lmalak n-umnaggar ġ-tmdint n-lawdikiyya: ha-ma-inna ġwalli igan ‹amin› ig inigi iṣḥan izgan, izwur kullu ma-ih̬lq rbbi.
ssnġ kullu ma-tskart. ssnġ is-ur-tsmmiṭṭ ula trġit. amar yufan ġir a-tsmmiṭṭ nġd a-trġt.
walaynni tulbit, ur-tsmmiṭṭ ula trġit. ġayan a-f-ra-k-ssufsġ zġ-imi-nu.
ha-kiyi ar-ttinit «labas gigi. iggut dari lh̬ir. ur-ḥtajjaġ yat.» walaynni ur-akkʷ-tssint mamnk a-tḍɛft thršt tẓlḍt tbukḍt tqamat bla timlsit.

rad-ak-iniġ yuf-ak a-zġ-dari-tsġt urġ lli-iṣfan s-lɛafit f-a-dark-nnit-yili lh̬ir. tsġt zġ-dari ula timlsa tumlilin f-a-tlst tdlt lɛib n-ddat-nnk. tsġt zġ-dari ula asafar i-walln-nnk f-a-tisfiwt.
winna dari ɛzzanin ar-tn-tẓiġ ar-tn-trbbaġ. awi-tt ġ-ih̬f-nnk ġilad, twrrid-d zġ-ddnub-nnk.
ha-yyi biddġ ġ-imi ar-ssḍuqqurġ. iġ-illa ma-isfldn i-wawal-inu irẓm-iyi, ra-dars-kšmġ ššġ dids išš didi.
kullu wanna inran, rad-as-fkġ a-didi-iskiws f-lɛrš-inu ġmklli nriġ nkki skiwsġ d-baba rbbi f-lɛrš-ns.
wanna dar imzgan, iqqan-t-id a-isfld i-mayd ittini rruḥ lqudus i-imnaggarn.»
ẓrġ ilmma kra yaḍni, yan-imi irẓm ġ-ignna. sfldġ i-wawal lli-sttin-ikkan isawl-d sri, iga zund nnffar, yini-yyi: «ġli-d s-ġid ad-ak-mlġ ma-d-iqqann a-ijru tigira.»
yawi-yyi rruḥ lqudus ġakudan, s-ẓriġ yal-lɛrš ġ-ignna, ẓrġ ula ġwalli fllas iskiwsn.
ġwalli iskiwsn f-lɛrš, ar-zgis-kkatn lalwan n-uẓggʷaġ d-uqrfi tili-tslit n-unẓar tsutl i-lɛrš, ar-ttisfiw s-tifawt tazgzawt.
ẓrġ sin id-mraw d-kkuẓ (24) l-lɛrš lullin i-lɛrš-an, skiwsn fllasn sin id-mraw d-kkuẓ (24) n-umġar, lsn timlsa tumlilin. kud yan, illa f-ih̬f-ns yan-ttaj n-uwrġ.
ar-d-kkatn-uwsmann zġ-dar lɛrš, yigat-uqqryan n-iggig. ar-ssufun ssa n-isufa ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš, a-tn-igan d-ssa l-larwaḥ n-rbbi.
yili ula ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš kra irwas yat-tmda n-jjaj iṣfan zund adfl. ẓrġ kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat ddrnin, lullint i-lɛrš, kraygatt yat ġ-tsga. ggutnt-gisnt-walln, lan-tnt zġ-lgddam ula tiġurdin.
tamzwarut trwas izm. tis snat trwas azgr. tis kraṭṭ, irwas-uwdm-ns udm n-urgaz. tis kkuẓṭ trwas igidr yuyln.

kraygatt yat ġ-lmh̬luqat-an teṭṭaf sḍiṣ ifrawn, igatnt-gisnt-walln zġ-kraygatt mani. ar-ttirirnt ġ-iyḍ ula azal bla-da-tfssant ar-ttinint: «amẓlay, amẓlay, amẓlay a-iga sidi rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan. ikka-ttin illa, yili, rad-bdda-yili.»
kullu mad-kkant ar-talġnt ar-tmjjadnt ar-tḥmadnt ġwalli iskiwsn f-lɛrš, ig ġwalli bdda illan rad-bdda-yili.
ar-n-ṭṭarn sin id-mraw d-kkuẓ n-umġar ġ-lgddam n-walli iskiwsn f-lɛrš, sjdn i-walli bdda illan rad-bdda-yili, ar-n-tluḥn ttaj-nsn ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš ar-ttinin:
«wa-rbbi siditnnġ, kiyi a-isthllan lmjd d-ttuqir d-lḥukm, ašku kiyi a-ih̬lqn kullu ma-illan. hati ityawh̬laq yili, ašku kiyi a-t-iran.»
ẓrġ ilmma yan-warra imuttln ġ-ufus afasi n-walli iskiwsn f-lɛrš, ityara zġ-snat-tsgiw, iqqn s-ssa n-ṭṭwabɛ.
ẓrġ-n yal-lmalak itjhhdn yull awal-ns yini: «ma-isthllan a-irẓm arra-yad, ifsi ṭṭwabɛ lli-fllas-illan?»
walaynni ur-illi yan ġ-ignna ula ġ-wakal ula ġ-ddu-wakal iẓḍarn a-irẓm arra-yan ula issmaqql gis.
ar-allaġ bahra ašku ur-ityafa yan isthllan a-irẓm arra-yan ula a-gis-issmaqql.
ġakudan isawl-d sri yan zġ-imġarn yini-yyi-d: «ad-ur-tallat. hay-izm n-tqbilt n-yahuda, hay-aẓur n-ugllid dawd, nttan a-inran, yiẓḍar a-ifsi ssa n-ṭṭwabɛ-ad, irẓm arra.»

ẓrġ ilmma yan-ulqqaġ, ibidd ġ-dar lɛrš ġ-gr kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat, lullin-as imġarn. irwas is-ityawġras, iṭṭaf ssa n-taskiwin d-ssa n-walln, a-tn-igan d-ssa l-larwaḥ n-rbbi lli-yuzn ad-kn kullu ddunit.
yasi-d-ulqqaġ arra-yan zġ-ufus afasi n-walli iskiwsn f-lɛrš.

lliġ-d-yusi arra, ḍrnt-n kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat ula sin id-mraw d-kkuẓ (24) n-umġar ġ-lgddam n-ulqqaġ. kraygatt yan yusi lutar, asin ula taṭṭasin n-uwrġ ɛmmrnin s-lbh̬ur lli-igan tiẓulla n-imẓlayn n-rbbi.

ar-ttirirn yan-umarg l-ljdid ar-ttinin: «kiyi a-isthllan a-tasit arra-yad tfsit ṭṭwabɛ-ns, ašku ttyawġrast tfrut mddn s-idammn-nnk zġ-kraygatt taqbilt ula kraygatt l-luġa ula kraygatt tasut ula kraygatt tamazirt, trart-tn ad-gn kullu win rbbi.
tskrt zġ-gisn ayt-tgldit n-rbbi-nnġ f-a-n-srasn ġ-lgddam-ns tiwafkiw ma-s-a-itrḍu. d-ntni a-ra-iḥkam ġ-ddunit.»
ssmaqqlġ-n-daġ s-sfldġ i-waqqur n-wafḍan n-wafḍan d-id-walf n-id-walf l-lmalayka, sutln i-lɛrš d-lmh̬luqat d-imġarn.
ar-ttinin s-wawal itjhhdn: «isthlla-ulqqaġ lli-ityawġrasn a-yamẓ lḥukm d-lh̬ir d-tḥkimt d-tẓḍḍart d-ttuqir d-lmjd d-lḥmd.»

sfldġ ġakudan i-kullu ma-ih̬lq rbbi ġ-ignna ula ġ-wakal ula ġ-ddu-wakal ula ġ-umda, sfldġ i-kullu ma-iddrn ġ-kraygatt mani ar-ttinin: «a-yili lḥmd d-ttuqir d-lmjd d-lquwwa i-walli iskiwsn f-lɛrš ula i-ulqqaġ, ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan.»
inint kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat: «amin.» ḍrn-in imġarn sjdn-as.
ẓrġ-n alqqaġ ifsi yan zġ-ssa n-ṭṭwabɛ, s-sfldġ i-yat zġ-kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat tsawl s-wawal itjhhdn zund iggig tini: «ffuġ-d.»
ssmaqqlġ-n s-n-ẓriġ yan-wayyis umlil, yusi-umnnay-ns yal-lqus n-imiġ. ittfk-as yan-ttaj, iffuġ-d a-inru, ig wad bdda itnrun.
ifsi-ulqqaġ wis sin ṭṭwabɛ, s-sfldġ i-tis snat lmh̬luqat tnna: «ffuġ-d.»
iffuġ-d-wayyis yaḍni iga aẓggʷaġ. ittfk i-umnnay-ns a-ikkis sslamt f-ddunit f-ad-nqqan mddn i-ngratsn, ttfk-as yat taẓẓit imqqurn.
ifsi-ulqqaġ wis kraḍ ṭṭwabɛ, s-sfldġ i-tis kraṭṭ lmh̬luqat tnna: «ffuġ-d.» ssmaqqlġ s-ẓriġ ayyis iḍili, yusi-umnnay-ns yal-lmizan ġ-ufus-ns.
sfldġ i-kra irwas awal zġ-gr kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat yini: «ġir kilu n-irdn s-uqarid n-nnuqrt. ġir kraḍ id-kilu n-ṭmẓẓin s-uqarid n-nnuqrt. walaynni a-ur-tssukfm zzit ula aḍil.»
ifsi-ulqqaġ wis kkuẓ ṭṭwabɛ, s-sfldġ i-tis kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat tnna: «ffuġ-d.»

ssmaqqlġ s-ẓriġ ayyis awraġ, ig ism n-umnnay-ns ‹lmut›, iḍfur-t-‹umḍḍal›. ittfk-asn ad-ḥkamn f-yan-ugzzum zġ-kkuẓ igzman n-ddunit, ad-nġn ġwilli gis zdġnin s-taẓẓit d-uġni d-waṭṭan d-luḥuš n-ddunit.
ifsi-ulqqaġ wis smmus ṭṭwabɛ, s-ẓriġ larwaḥ n-willi mmutnin f-ssibt n-tbrraḥt-nsn s-wawal n-rbbi ula tugga-nsn lli-fllas-fkan. ġ-ddu-uẓru n-tġrsi a-ġ-llan,
alln awal-nsn inin: «wa-sidi rbbi itjhhdn, tgit amẓlay tgt lḥqq. ar managu a-ra-n-tssmaṭlt lɛqubit lli-illan f-mddn n-ddunit, trart-asn f-idammn-nnġ?»
ġakudan a-ityawfka i-kraygatt yan gisn timlsit tumlilt, yini-asn rbbi ad-qln sul imikk ard ikmml ġunšk lli-d-iqqann zġ-aytmatsn d-imɛawann-nsn lli-rad-nġn mddn ġmklli-tn-nġan ntni.
ifsi-ulqqaġ wis sḍiṣ ṭṭwabɛ. ssmaqqlġ-n ẓrġ akal immussa s-jjhd, twrri tllas tafukt zund ah̬nif iḍlan, iwrri iẓggʷaġ-wayyur kullut zund idammn.
ḍrn-d itran zġ-ignwan s-wakal ġmklli-d-itluḥ-waḍu iqurayn zġ-wazar.
ittin ignwan, muttln zund kra n-warra imuttln f-iɛmad-ns, ityattay kullu ma-igan adrar d-igzir zġ-illiġ illa.
rwln igldan n-ddunit d-inmġurn n-tmizar d-inmġurn l-lɛskr, rwln ayt-wayda d-ayt-ssulṭa, ntni ula kullu mddn ismgan ula ġwilli ganin win ih̬f-nsn, rgsn ġ-ifran ula ġ-gr ijarifn n-idrarn.
ar-aqran i-idrarn d-ijarifn ar-asn-ttinin: «ḍrad-d fllannġ tssntalm-aġ zġ-uwdm n-walli iskiwsn f-lɛrš ula zġ-lġaḍab n-ulqqaġ.
ašku ilkm-d-wass lli-bahra-išqan ig ass l-lġaḍab-nsn. ma-ra-yiẓḍar a-gis-ibidd?»
lliġ izri mayan, ẓrġ kkuẓ lmalayka biddn ġ-kkuẓṭ-tsgiw n-ddunit, ḥṣarn-in aḍu a-ur-yut akal ula amda ula kra n-usġar.
ẓrġ-n ilmma yal-lmalak yaḍni iġli-d zġ-illiġ a-di-taqlay tafukt, yasi-d ṭṭabɛ n-rbbi bab n-tudrt. iġr lmalak-an s-wawal itjhhdn i-kkuẓ lmalayka lli-yuṣṣa rbbi ad-hlkn akal d-umda,
yini-asn: «ad-ur-thlkm akal ula amda ula isġarn ard ng ṭṭabɛ f-ignzi n-kullu ih̬ddamn n-rbbi-nnġ.»
sfldġ ilmma i-kra imla-yyi mnnaw ad-gan ġwilli-mi-gan ṭṭabɛ. gan miyya d-kkuẓ id-mraw d-kkuẓ n-walf (144.000). gan ntni zġ-kullu tiqbilin n-ayt-rbbi,
yili sin d-mraw-walf (12.000) zġ-kraygatt taqbilt: zġ-yahuda d-rawbin d-gad
d-ašir d-naftali d-manassi
d-šimɛun d-lawi d-yassakar
d-zabulun d-yusf d-bnyamin.

lliġ izri mayan ssmaqqlġ-n ẓrġ mddn ggutnin bahra, ur-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-tn-iḥasb. gan ntni zġ-kullu timizar d-tqbilin d-tasutin d-lluġat n-ddunit. biddn ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš ula alqqaġ s-tmlsa tumlilin, asin talḍayin ġ-ufus-nsn.
alln awal-nsn ar-ttinin: «rbbi-nnġ lli-iskiwsn f-lɛrš, nttan d-ulqqaġ ad-aġ-ijjnjmn.»
biddn ġin kullu lmalayka, lullin i-lɛrš ula imġarn ula kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat, ḍrn-in f-uwdm-nsn ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš sjdn i-rbbi
inin: «amin. a-yili lḥmd d-lmjd d-tḥkimt d-ššukr d-ttuqir d-lḥukm d-lquwwa i-rbbi-nnġ ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan, amin.»
isqsa-yyi yan zġ-imġarn: «is-tssnt mad-gan ġwid lsanin timlsa tumlilin? manizġ-d-uškan?»
iniġ-as: «kiyi a-issnn a-sidi.» yini-yyi: «ntni gan ġwilli-d-ffuġnin zġ-unukmu lli-bahra-išqan, sirdn timlsa-nsn s-idammn n-ulqqaġ aylliġ mllulnt bahra.
f-mayan a-f-biddn ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš n-rbbi ar-ti-tɛbadn ġ-untal-ns ġ-iyḍ ula azal. ġwalli iskiwsn f-lɛrš rad-bdda-tn-issntal ġ-dars.
ur-sar-tn-inġi laẓ ula irifi. ur-sar-tn-tut tafukt ula ijawan.
ašku alqqaġ lli-illan ġ-lɛrš, nttan a-ra-tn-iks izwur-asn s-talɛinin n-waman n-tudrt. rad-asn-isfiḍ rbbi kullu imṭṭawn-nsn.»
ifsi-ulqqaġ ilmma wis ssa n-ṭṭwabɛ, s-ifssa kullu ma-illan ġ-ignna aylliġ izri ma-itggan mnaṣṣ n-tasaɛt.
ẓrġ ilmma ssa l-lmalayka lli-biddnin ġ-lgddam n-rbbi, ttfkn-asn ssa n-nnffarat.

iddu yal-lmalak yaḍni ibidd ġ-tama n-uẓru n-tġrsi, yasi taṭṭast n-uwrġ. ittfk-as lbh̬ur iggutn a-dids-issmun tiẓulla n-kullu-imẓlayn n-rbbi, baš a-tnt-in-issakmur i-rbbi f-ṭṭbla n-uwrġ lli-illan ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš.
ar-yaqlay-waggu l-lbh̬ur d-tẓulla n-imẓlayn zġ-ufus l-lmalak s-lgddam n-rbbi.
iddu lmalak ilmma, iɛmmr taṭṭast s-tirgin l-lɛafit zġ-dar ṭṭbla, iluḥ-tt-in f-ddunit. immass iggig s-uqqryan itjhhdn, utn-uwsmann immass-wakal.
nkrn ilmma ssa l-lmalayka lli-dar ssa n-nnffarat, skrn f-a-tn-utn.
yut lmalak amzwaru nnffar-ns, s-iḍr ibruri d-lɛafit f-ddunit h̬lḍn d-idammn. ijdr tulut ġ-ddunit ula tulut ġ-isġarn, tjdr ula tuga izgzawn kullutt.
yut wis sin lmalayka nnffar-ns, s-ityattay kra irwasn yan-udrar imqqurn ijddrn s-lɛafit, ittluḥ-n ġ-umda.
iwrri iẓggʷaġ tulut ġ-umda zund idammn, immt tulut ġ-lmh̬luqat lli-llanin ġ-umda, itthlk ula tulut ġ-wanawn lli-tkkanin amda.
yut wis kraḍ l-lmalayka nnffar-ns, s-iḍr yan-itri imqqurn zġ-ignwan ar-ijddr zund asafu, iḍr f-tulut n-isaffn d-talɛinin n-waman.
iga ism n-itri ‹asmmum›, iwrri ismmum tulut ġ-waman, immt ma-iggutn ġ-mddn lli-swanin aman-an, ašku wrrin smmumn bahra.
yut wis kkuẓ l-lmalayka nnffar-ns, s-tettut tafukt illas tulut-ns, ittut-wayyur ula ntta illas tulut-ns, ttutn itran ula ntni illas tulut-nsn. ar-tlaḥ tifawt ġ-tulut n-uzal ula tulut n-iyḍ.

ssmaqqlġ-n-daġ s-ẓriġ yan-igidr yuyl ġ-wammas n-ignwan, sfldġ-as inna s-wawal itjhhdn: «taguḍi taguḍi taguḍi a-ra-yili i-imzdġn n-ddunit f-ssibt n-nnffarat lli-rad-utn kraḍ lmalayka yaḍni.»
yut wis smmus lmalayka nnffar-ns, s-ẓriġ yan-itri iḍr zġ-ignwan s-wakal. ttfk-as yat-tsarut i-itri-an, igan tin-tdrut n-wakal.
iddu irẓm imi n-tdrut, iġli-d zġ-gis kra n-waggu iggutn zund aggu n-ufarnu imqqurn, aylliġ tllas tafukt illas lḥal kullu s-waggu lli-d-iġlin zġ-tdrut n-wakal.
tffuġ-d-ilmma-tmurġi zġ-waggu, tettrs f-wakal, ttfk-as-tẓḍḍart a-tqqs zund iġrdm.
ityawnna-yas a-ur-thlk tuga n-wakal wala isġarn wala tifrawin n-isafarn, walaynni a-thlk ġir mddn lli-ur-dar ṭṭabɛ n-rbbi f-ignzi-nsn.
ur-tẓḍar a-tn-tnġ, walaynni ityawfka-yas a-tn-tssmḥakka smmus-iyrn, ar-tn-tẓẓaḍ zund ġmklli iẓẓaḍ ssmm n-iġrdm iġ-iqqs bnadm.
ġ-uwssan-an rad-bahra-irin mddn ad-mmtn, walaynni ur-rad-iẓḍarn ad-mmtn. rad-bahra-ẓuẓḍn lmut, walaynni ur-ra-stt-afn.
trwas-tmurġi-an i-yissan ujadnin i-imiġ. kud yat, illa f-ih̬f-ns kra irwasn ttaj n-uwrġ. gn-uwdmawn-nsnt zund udm n-bnadm,
ig-wazzar-nsnt zund azzar n-tmġart, gn-uwh̬san-nsnt zund uh̬san n-izm.
lsnt f-idmarn-nsnt kra irwasn abannk n-uwzzal. ig ijjij n-ifrawn-nsnt zund ijjij l-lkrarṣ d-yissan ggutnin ar-kullu-tazzaln s-imiġ.
kud yat teṭṭaf timġilt d-usaqs zund iġrdm. ġ-tmġilt-nsnt a-ġ-tlla-tẓḍḍart lli-s-rad-ssmḥakkant mddn smmus-iyrn.
tamurġi-an, agllid lli-gis-iḥkamn iga lmalak n-tdrut n-wakal. ig ism-ns ‹abaddun› s-wawal n-ayt-yudaya, ig ‹abullyun› (ġwalli ifnnun) s-wawal n-ayt-yunan.
ġmkad a-tzri-tguḍi tamzwarut. rad-sul-ilint snat-tguḍiwin yaḍni.
yut wis sḍiṣ lmalayka nnffar-ns, s-sfldġ i-yan-wawal isawl-d zġ-dar kkuẓ-waskawn n-tġmrin n-ṭṭbla n-uwrġ lli-illan ġ-lgddam n-rbbi.
iġr i-lmalak-an wis sḍiṣ lli-yusin nnffar yini-as: «rẓm-d i-kkuẓ lmalayka lli-tyamaẓnin ġ-dar-wasif n-furat imqqurn.»
irẓm ilmma i-kkuẓ lmalayka lli-ujadnin i-tasaɛt-an n-wass-an n-wayyur-an n-usggʷas-an baš ad-nġn tulut n-bnadm.
sfldġ i-kra imla-yyi mnnaw ad-gan imnnayn n-yissan n-imiġ. gan sin id-miyya n-id-milyun (200.000.000).

ġmkad a-s-iyi-d-bann-yissan ġ-twargit lli-ẓriġ. kraygatt amnnay ilsa abannk illa-gis-uẓggʷaġ d-uẓrqi d-uwraġ, gn iguyya n-yissan zund agayyu n-izm, ar-di-ttffuġ lɛafit d-waggu d-lkbrit zġ-imi-nsn.
ġakudan a-immut tulut n-bnadm s-kraṭṭ-tguḍiwin-an, s-lɛafit d-waggu d-lkbrit lli-d-itffuġn zġ-imawn-nsn.
ašku ġ-imi-nsn d-tmġilt-nsn a-ġ-tlla-tẓḍḍart n-yissan-an. kud yan, timġilt-ns teṭṭaf ih̬f zund algmmaḍ ma-s-a-issyaggas mddn.

imma kullu willi ur-mmutnin s-tguḍiwin-an, sul ur-ta-rin ad-fln ġaylli skarn s-ifassn-nsn. zuydn ntni ar-tɛbadn ljnun ula laṣnam n-uwrġ d-nnuqrt d-wanas d-uẓru d-ukššuḍ lli-ur-tmnadnin ula-da-sflidn ula-da-fttun.
ntni ur-tn-akkʷ-tʷgraẓ f-iskkirn-nsn, ar-nqqan ar-skarn ssiḥr ar-tfsadn ar-takʷrn.
ẓrġ ilmma yal-lmalak yaḍni, itjhhd bahra igguz-d zġ-ignna. isutl-as-umdlu zund timlsit, tlulli-tslit n-unẓar i-ih̬f-ns, yisfiw-uwdm-ns zund tafukt, gn iḍarn-ns zund tannalin l-lɛafit.
yasi ġ-ufus-ns yan-warra imẓẓin irẓmn. isrs-n aḍar-ns afasi f-umda, isrs-d aḍar-ns aẓlmaḍ f-wakal.
isawl s-yan-wawal itjhhdn zund tandra n-izm. lliġ isawl utn ssa n-iggign.
lliġ utn ssa n-iggign gġ-n ad-araġ, walaynni sfldġ i-yan-wawal zġ-ignna inna-yyi: «ḥḍu mayd nnan ssa n-iggign, a-t-ur-tarat.»
imma lmalak lli-ẓriġ ibidd f-umda d-wakal, yull afus-ns afasi s-ignna,
iggall s-rbbi lli-bdda-illan rad-bdda-yili, ig ġwalli iskrn ignna d-wakal d-umda ula kullu ma-gisn-illan. yini: «hati ur-ra-sul-imaṭl.
ašku ġakud lliġ ra-yut wis ssa l-lmalayka nnffar-ns, ra-issafu rbbi maylli iqṣad, a-t-igan d-lbaraka intln lli-f-isawl i-ih̬ddamn-ns lanbiya.»
ġakudan isawl-d-daġ-sri-wawal lli-mi-sfldġ zġ-ignna yini-yyi-d: «ddu, tamẓt arra lli-irẓmn ġ-ufus l-lmalak lli-ibiddn f-umda ula akal.»
ftuġ s-dar lmalak ḍalbġ-t ad-iyi-ifk arra-lli imẓẓin, yini-yyi: «amẓ-t tššt-t. ra-ismmum ġ-udis-nnk walaynni ra-imim zund tammnt ġ-imi-nnk.»
amẓġ arra-lli imẓẓin zġ-ufus l-lmalak ššġ-t. imim zund tammnt ġ-imi-nu, walaynni lliġ-t-ššiġ iwrri ismmum ġ-udis-inu.
yini-yyi ġakudan: «iqqan-k-id a-tzaydt ar-ttbrraḥt s-ma-rad-ak-iml rbbi f-mddn n-kigan d-tmizar d-tasutin d-lluġat d-igldan.»
ttfk-iyi ilmma yat-tġanimt ma-s-a-ssġalġ, yini-yyi rbbi: «nkr tssġlt tigmmi n-rbbi-nnk d-uẓru n-tġrsi, tḥasbt kullu willi gis tɛbadnin.
walaynni ad-ur-tssġlt targgit-an illan ġ-brra n-tgmmi, ašku flġ-tt i-willi ur-ginin mddn-inu. rad-akʷln ntni f-tmdint tamẓlayt kkuẓ id-mraw d-sin (42) n-wayyur.
walaynni rad-aznġ sin inagan-inu ad-tbrraḥn alf d-sin-id-miyya d-sḍiṣ id-mraw (1260) n-wass s-iwaliwn lli-rad-asn-malaġ. lh̬iš n-tguḍi a-rad-lsn.»
rad-gn ntni zund snat-tizutna ula sin lqnadl, biddn ġ-lgddam n-rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ddunit.
iġ-inawl kra n-yan a-tn-ihlk, ra-di-tffuġ lɛafit zġ-imi-nsn tsu-n ġwilli-tn-kurhanin. iqqan-d a-immt wanna iran a-tn-ihlk.

rad-asn-tili-tẓḍḍart ad-qqnn ignwan a-ur-iḍr-unẓar ġ-uwssan lli-ġ-a-tbrraḥn s-iwaliwn lli-asn-imala rbbi. rad-asn-tili-tẓḍḍart ad-rarn aman n-talɛinin ad-ẓggʷaġn zund idammn. rad-asn-tili-tẓḍḍart f-ddunit a-stt-utn s-kullu kra igan taguḍi ġakud nna-ran.
ġakud lliġ rad-kmmln tabrraḥt s-tugga-nsn, rad-srsn-inkr-waġʷẓn lli-d-iġlin zġ-tdrut n-wakal, inru-tn inġ-tn.
tqama ddat-nsn ġ-usuk n-tmdint imqqurn lli-ġ-ugʷln siditsn f-uggjdi, ar-srs-kkatn mddn lmɛna n-‹sadum› ula ‹miṣr›.
kraḍ-uwssan d-mnaṣṣ a-ra-n-tmunun mddn zġ-kullu tasutin d-tqbilin d-lluġat d-tmizar ad-ssmuqquln ġ-ddat-nsn, agʷin a-tn-mḍln.
rad-frḥn imzdġn n-ddunit s-lmut-nsn. rad-bahra-ḍṣṣan i-ngratsn ar-akkan tarragin i-ngratsn, ašku ur-sul-ddrn sin inagan lli-zzuguznin tammara iggutn f-bnadm.
walaynni tiġurdin n-kraḍ-uwssan d-mnaṣṣ, irar-d gisn rbbi rruḥ n-tudrt, biddn f-iḍarn-nsn. ḍrnt-tksaḍ ggutnin ġ-kullu willi-tn-ẓranin.
ġakudan sfldn inagan-lli i-yan-wawal itjhhdn zġ-ignna yini-asn: «ġlyad-d s-ġid.» tyalaln ilmma s-ignna ġ-yat-tmdlut ġ-lgddam n-willi-tn-kurhanin.

immass-wakal bahra ġ-tasaɛt-an, iḍr yan-ugzzum zġ-mraw igzman n-tmdint, mmtn ssa n-id-walf (7000) n-mddn lliġ immussa-wakal. ksuḍn bahra ġwilli sulnin ar-ttinin: «mnšk a-bahra-itjhhd rbbi n-ignna.»
ġmkad a-tzri tis snat-tguḍiwin. imma tis kraṭṭ-tguḍiwin, hati takmur-d.

yut ilmma wis ssa l-lmalayka nnffar-ns, s-sfldġ i-waqqur s-iwaliwn tjhhdnin ġ-ignna ar-ttinin: «hati tagldit n-ddunit twrri tga tagldit n-siditnnġ ula tin lmasiḥ-ns. nttan a-stt-iḥkamn ġilad ula kullu mayd-d-iftan.»
imma sin id-mraw d-kkuẓ (24) n-umġar lli-skiwsnin f-lɛruš-nsn ġ-lgddam n-rbbi, ḍrn-in f-uwdmawn-nsn sjdn-as
inin: «nškr-k a-sidi rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan, ig ġwalli illan yili bdda, ašku tnkrt s-tḥkimt-nnk itjhhdn tgrt ġ-lḥukm.
