hajnt-tmizar n-ddunit walaynni ilkm-d-uzmz l-lġaḍab-nnk. ig azmz lli-ġ-ra-tut lḥukm f-willi mmutnin, trart lh̬ir i-ih̬ddamn-nnk lanbiya ula imẓlayn-nnk ula kullu willi uqqrnin ism-nnk, ma-imẓẓin ula ma-imqqurn. ig azmz lli-ġ-ra-thlkt ġwilli thlaknin ddunit.»
ġakudan a-ttyawrẓam-tgmmi n-rbbi ġ-ignna, ẓrġ-n ṣṣnduq l-lɛhd n-rbbi ġ-ugʷns n-tgmmi. utn-uwsmann, immass iggig s-uqqryan itjhhdn. immass-wakal ula ntta, iḍr ibruri išqan.
tban ilmma yat-tmatart imqqurn ġ-ignwan. tga zund yat-tmġart ilsan tafukt, yili-wayyur ġ-ddu iḍarn-ns, yili f-ih̬f-ns yan-ttaj n-sin d-mraw n-itri.
ar-trbbu takmur a-taru, ar-tssġuyyu s-ungaẓ n-tlalit.
tban-ilmma-tmatart yaḍni ġ-ignwan. tga zund yan-ulgmmaḍ aẓggʷaġ, imqqur bahra. iṭṭaf ssa n-ih̬fawn d-mraw-waskawn, ilin ssa n-ttijan mẓẓinin f-ih̬fawn-ns.
issmass imġil-ns ijurr srs tulut n-itran zġ-ignwan, iluḥ-tn s-wakal. ibidd ġ-lgddam n-tmġart lli-ra-yaru, yiri a-išš arraw-ns ġakud nna-ti-turu.
taru yan-warraw, ig yus lli-ra-iḥkam kullu timizar n-ddunit s-uɛmud n-uwzzal. ityattay-warraw-ns ġakudan s-lɛrš n-rbbi.
trwl-tmġart s-lh̬la, s-illi-as-ijjujad rbbi. ġin a-ġ-ra-d-as-ifk kullu ma-tḥtajja alf d-sin id-miyya d-sḍiṣ id-mraw (1260) n-wass.
ġakudan inkr imiġ ġ-ignna. inkr lmalak imqqurn mih̬ayl d-lmalayka lli-llanin ġ-ddu-ufus-ns mmaġn d-ulgmmaḍ. irar-fllasn-ulgmmaḍ d-lmalayka-ns, mmaġn didsn
walaynni ur-tn-nrin, ur-ẓḍarn ad-qaman ġ-ignna.
ityawgar-n-ulgmmaḍ-an imqqurn s-iyzdar. nttan a-mi-ttinin ‹iblis› ula ‹šiṭan›, ig abnkal aqdim lli-ijllun kullu imzdġn n-ddunit. ityawgar-n s-wakal ntta d-lmalayka-ns.

sfldġ ilmma i-yan-wawal itjhhdn isawl ġ-ignna yini: «ġilad ad-aġ-ijjnjm rbbi-nnġ, tban-d-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn, tašk-id-tgldit-ns, yamẓ lmasiḥ-ns lḥukm. ašku ġwalli itaštkkan s-aytmatnnġ ġ-lgddam n-rbbi-nnġ ġ-iyḍ ula azal, hati ityawlwaḥ s-iyzdar.
nran-t ntni s-idammn n-ulqqaġ ula s-wawal n-tugga-nsn, ašku ujadn ad-fkn ih̬f-nsn ar lmut.
frḥat ay-ignwan ula kullu ma-gisn-illan. imma kunni ay-akal d-umda, taguḍi a-rad-awn-yili ašku igguz srun iblis, nkrn-d gis iriyn bahra ašku issn is-ur-as-tqama ġir luqt idrusn.»
imma algmmaḍ, lliġ iẓra ih̬f-ns is-n-ityawlwaḥ s-wakal, iddu ar-iṭṭay tamġart lli-yurun arraw.
imma nttat tyawfkan-as sin ifrawn zund ifrawn n-igidr imqqurn baš a-tayyl zġ-dar-ubnkal s-lh̬la s-illiġ rad-as-ityawfka kullu ma-tḥtajja kraḍ isggʷasn d-mnaṣṣ.
walaynni ingi-d imi n-ubnkal s-waman zund asif itjhhdn baš a-yawi-unggay-ns tamġart.
akal a-iskrn afulki i-tmġart ġilan, ašku irẓm imi-ns isu anggay lli-d-iffuġn zġ-imi n-ulgmmaḍ.
imma algmmaḍ, nkrn-d gis iriyn ggutnin, ṭiyyr-as bahra f-tmġart. iddu a-itmmaġ d-tarwa yaḍni n-tmġart, a-tn-igan d-kullu willi skarnin s-luṣiyat n-rbbi ar-tamẓn ġ-tugga n-yasuɛ.
ibidd f-umlal ġ-tama n-umda.
ẓrġ ilmma yan-waġʷẓn iġli-d zġ-umda. iṭṭaf mraw-waskawn d-ssa n-ih̬fawn, yili f-kraygatt isk yan-ttaj imẓẓin, ityara f-kraygatt ih̬f yan-ism igan targgimt i-ism n-rbbi.
ig-waġʷẓn-an zund agrzam, ṣḥun iḍarn-ns ilin-gisn-wah̬bbašn mqqurnin, ig imi-ns zund imi n-izm. ifk-as-ulgmmaḍ lḥukm-ns ula taẓḍḍart itjhhdn n-tgldit-ns.
irwas is-ityaggas yan zġ-ih̬fawn-ns ra-immt, walaynni ijji-waggas-lli išqan ur-immut. ar-tɛjjabn kullu imzdġn n-ddunit ġ-waġʷẓn-an, wrrin ḍfurn-t.
ar-tɛbadn algmmaḍ ašku ifka taẓḍḍart-ns i-waġʷẓn, ar-tɛbadn aġʷẓn ula ntta ar-ttinin: «ma-itjhhdn zund aġʷẓn? ma-iẓḍarn a-t-inru?»
ityawfka i-waġʷẓn a-isawal ar-issfurrug ar-irggm rbbi, ittfk-as a-iḥkam kkuẓ id-mraw d-sin (42) n-wayyur.
irẓm imi-ns s-trggam, ar-irggm ġ-ism n-rbbi ula tazdġt-ns ula kullu ayt-ignna.
ittfk-as a-itmmaġ d-imẓlayn n-rbbi inru-tn, ittfk-as a-iḥkam ġ-mddn n-kraygatt taqbilt d-tasut d-lluġa d-tmazirt.
ra-ti-tɛbadn kullu imzdġn n-ddunit, abla ġwilli mi ityara ism-nsn zġ-isizwar n-ddunit ġ-warra n-tudrt n-ulqqaġ lli-ityawġrasn.
wanna dar imzgan, iqqan-t-id a-isfld.
«wanna-d-iqqann a-ityamaẓ ra-ityamaẓ. wanna-d-iqqann a-immt s-taẓẓit ra-immt s-taẓẓit. mayan a-f-illa f-imẓlayn n-rbbi a-gis-amẓn, zgan ġ-uġaras-ns.»
ẓrġ ilmma aġʷẓn yaḍni iffuġ-d zġ-wakal. iṭṭaf sin-waskawn zund askawn n-ulqqaġ, ar-isawal zund algmmaḍ.
ar-itḥkam s-ism n-waġʷẓn amzwaru, iṭṭaf kullu taẓḍḍart-ns. ar-itamr ddunit d-imzdġn-ns ad-tɛbadn aġʷẓn amzwaru lli-mi-ijji-waggas-ns išqan.
izayd ar-iskar timitar mqqurnin, ar-d-izzuguz lɛafit zġ-ignna ar akal a-stt-ẓrn kullu mddn.
ityawfka-yas a-iskar lmɛjizat ġ-tama n-waġʷẓn amzwaru, ar-srsnt-ijllu kullu imzdġn n-ddunit. yuṣṣa-tn ad-skrn yat-ṣṣurt imqqurn n-waġʷẓn amzwaru lli-ityaggasn s-taẓẓit iwrri-daġ iddr.
ittfk-as a-izrɛ kra n-rruḥ ġ-ṣṣurt-lli n-waġʷẓn amzwaru, aylliġ twrri ar-tsawal ṣṣurt ar-ttamr mddn ad-nġn wanna yagʷin a-stt-itɛbad.
izayd-waġʷẓn-lli ar-itamr kullu mddn, ma-imẓẓin ula ma-imqqurn, ayt-wayda ula imẓlaḍ, ismgan ula ġwilli ganin win ih̬f-ns, yini-asn ad-qbln ṭṭabɛ f-ufus-nsn afasi nġd f-ignzi-nsn.
ġmkan a-s-a-itamr baš a-ur-yiẓḍar yan a-isġ ula izznza bla dars illa ṭṭabɛ n-ism n-waġʷẓn amzwaru nġd nnmra lli-imalan ism-ns.
ma-ra-ifhm lmɛna-yad? wanna dar lɛaql, illa fllas a-iḥasb nnmra n-waġʷẓn, ašku tga nttat nnmra n-ism n-bnadm, tg sḍiṣ id-miyya d-sḍiṣ id-mraw d-sḍiṣ (666).
ssmaqqlġ-n ġakudan s-ẓriġ alqqaġ ibidd f-iggi n-uwrir n-tgmmi n-rbbi. biddn dids miyya d-kkuẓ id-mraw d-kkuẓ-walf (144.000) n-mddn lli-mi-ityara f-ignzi-nsn ism n-ulqqaġ ula ism n-babas.
sfldġ ilmma i-yan-wawal isawl ġ-ignna zund ijjij n-isaffn n-waman ggutnin ula zund aqqryan n-iggig itjhhdn. irwas lḥss l-lutarat ar-tn-kkatn id-bab-nsn.

ar-kullu-tasin yan-umarg l-ljdid ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš ġ-dar kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat d-imġarn. ur-iẓḍar yan a-yissan amarg-an, abla miyya d-kkuẓ id-mraw d-kkuẓ-walf (144.000) n-mddn lli-ifra rbbi zġ-ddunit.
ntni gan ġwilli ġusnin, ur-ssrkin ih̬f-nsn d-tmġarin. gn ġwilli-bdda-itmunun d-ulqqaġ s-innas a-ittidu. gn imnza n-bnadm lli-ifra ad-gn win rbbi d-ulqqaġ.
kra n-tkrkist ur-tkki imi-nsn. kra yʷh̬šnn ur-gisn-illi.
ẓrġ ilmma yal-lmalak yaḍni yuyl ġ-wammas n-ignwan, yawi-d lh̬bar ifulkin lli-rad-bdda-yili, a-srs-itbrraḥ i-kullu imzdġn n-ddunit n-kraygatt tasut d-tqbilt d-lluġa d-tmazirt.
yall awal-ns yini: «ḍrat a-ttɛbadm rbbi ar-ti-ttalġm, ašku tlkm-d tasaɛt a-yut lḥukm f-bnadm. sjdat i-walli iskrn ignwan d-wakal, iskr amda ula talɛinin n-waman.»
iggʷru-as-d lmalak wis sin yini: «tthlk, tthlk-tmdint n-babil itjhhdn. tthlk h̬talli isswan kullu timizar n-ddunit s-tissi iktin l-lfsad-ns issnufuln.»
iggʷru-asn-d lmalak wis kraḍ, yall awal-ns yini: «winna tɛbadnin aġʷẓn ula ṣṣurt-ns, d-winna qblnin ṭṭabɛ-ns f-ignzi-nsn ula f-ufus-nsn,
ntni rad-sun zġ-tissi iḥrran n-ssh̬ṭ n-rbbi lli-s-iɛmmr lkas l-lġaḍab-ns. rad-rfufnn s-lɛafit d-lkbrit ġ-lgddam l-lmalayka n-rbbi ula ġ-lgddam n-ulqqaġ.
rad-bdda-yaqlay-waggu n-urfufn-nsn, ur-sar-itmmi. ur-sar-rad-asn-tili rraḥt, la ġ-iyḍ ula azal, i-willi tɛbadnin aġʷẓn ula ṣṣurt-ns, ula ġwilli qblnin ṭṭabɛ n-ism-ns.»
mayan a-f-illa f-imẓlayn n-rbbi ad-ṣbrn zgan, a-tn-igan d-willi skarnin s-luṣiyat n-rbbi ġwin-bdda ġ-yasuɛ.

sfldġ ilmma i-yan-wawal isawl ġ-ignna yini-yyi: «ara maya, ‹imbarkin ad-gan winna mmutnin f-ism n-siditnnġ zġ-ġilad s-uflla.›» isawl-d rruḥ n-rbbi yini: «s-ṣṣaḥt, rad-sunfun ntni zġ-unhataf-nsn, awin didsn lḥsab n-kullu mad-skarn ifulki.»
ssmaqqlġ-n ilmma s-ẓriġ yat-tmdlut tumlilt, iskiws fllas yan irwas bnadm. yili ttaj n-uwrġ f-ih̬f-ns, yili-usmmawd imsadn ġ-ufus-ns.
iffuġ-d yal-lmalak zġ-tgmmi n-rbbi, yall awal-ns yini i-walli iskiwsn f-tmdlut: «luḥ-n asmmawd-nnk a-imgr, ašku ilkm-uzmz n-tmgra, tnu ṣṣabt n-ddunit.»
inkr ġwalli iskiwsn f-tmdlut iluḥ-n asmmawd-ns f-ddunit imgr ṣṣabt-ns.
ġakudan iffuġ-d yal-lmalak yaḍni zġ-tgmmi n-rbbi ġ-ignna, ula ntta yusi asmmawd imsadn.

iffuġ-d ilmma yal-lmalak yaḍni zġ-dar ṭṭbla l-lbh̬ur, ig ġwalli igabln lɛafit. isawl s-walli yusin asmmawd imsadn yini-as s-wawal itjhhdn: «luḥ-n asmmawd-nnk, tssmunt tizrmin zġ-ddalit n-ddunit, ašku inwa-waḍil.»
iddu lmalak iluḥ-n asmmawd-ns f-ddunit issmun aḍil. iluḥ-n aḍil n-ddunit ġ-lmɛṣṣrt imqqurn n-ssh̬ṭ n-rbbi.
tlla lmɛṣṣrt ġ-brra n-tmdint, ar-gis-taḍḍrn aḍil. ffuġn zġ-gis idammn, ngin zund asif, aylliġ idra s-ma-itggan tiddi n-wagmar. ilkm-unggay-ns ma-itggan kraḍ id-miyya n-kilimitr.
ẓrġ ilmma tamatart yaḍni ġ-ignna, tmqqur bahra, tɛjjbġ gis s-kigan. tga ssa l-lmalayka asin ssa n-tguḍiwin. timggura ġ-tguḍiwin ad-gant, ašku rbbi iḥudda srsnt ssh̬ṭ-ns.
ẓrġ kra irwas-iyi tamda n-jjaj ih̬lḍn s-lɛafit. ẓrġ ġwilli nranin aġʷẓn ula ṣṣurt-ns ula nnmra n-ism-ns, biddn ġ-tama n-tmda n-jjaj asin lutarat n-rbbi.

ar-ttirirn asin amarg n-musa ah̬ddam n-rbbi d-umarg n-ulqqaġ ar-ttinin: «wa-sidi rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan, imqqur kullu ma-tskart, lɛjb a-iga. way-agllid n-tasutin, yʷġẓan kullu ma-ttnbaṭṭ. lḥqq a-iga.
wa-sidi rbbi, ma-ur-ra-iḍr ġ-lgddam-nnk? ma-ur-ra-yuqqr lmjd n-ism-nnk? ašku kiyi waḥduk a-iṣfan. rad-d-aškin mddn ad-ak-sjdn zġ-kullu timizar n-ddunit. ašku ibayyn-asn-d lḥqq n-tnbaḍin-nnk.»
lliġ izri mayan ssmaqqlġ-n s-ẓriġ taḥanut tamẓlayt trẓm ġ-uh̬iyyam n-tmitar n-rbbi ġ-ignna.
ẓrġ ssa l-lmalayka lli-ra-yasi ssa n-tguḍiwin, ffuġn-d zġ-tḥanut tamẓlayt. lsn timlsa l-lkttan iṣfan ar-ssmrqiqiynt. bkisn zġ-wammas-nsn s-ibkkasn n-uwrġ.
tddu yat zġ-kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat tfk i-ssa l-lmalayka ssa n-taṭṭasin n-uwrġ, ɛmmrnt s-ssh̬ṭ n-rbbi lli-bdda-illan rad-bdda-yili.
twrri tɛmmr-tḥanut tamẓlayt s-waggu l-lmjd n-rbbi d-tḥkimt-ns itjhhdn. ur-ra-yiẓḍar yan a-ikšm s-tḥanut-an tamẓlayt ard kmmlnt ssa n-tguḍiwin lli-usin ssa l-lmalayka.
sfldġ i-yan-wawal itjhhdn isawl-d zġ-tḥanut tamẓlayt, yini i-ssa l-lmalayka: «ddwat tffim-n f-ddunit ssa n-taṭṭasin n-ssh̬ṭ n-rbbi.»
iddu lmalak amzwaru iffi-n taṭṭast-ns f-ddunit, s-wrrin iḥbba šqanin ʷh̬šnnin ġ-mddn lli-dar ṭṭabɛ n-waġʷẓn ar-tɛbadn ṣṣurt-ns.
iddu lmalak wis sin iffi-n taṭṭast-ns f-umda, s-iwrri ig-umda zund idammn n-iniġi, immt kullu ma-iddrn ġ-umda.
iddu lmalak wis kraḍ iffi-n taṭṭast-ns f-isaffn d-talɛinin n-waman, s-wrrin kullu ẓggʷaġn zund idammn.
sfldġ i-lmalak lli-igabln aman inna: «wa-rbbi amẓlay lli-illan ikka-ttin bdda illa, s-lḥqq a-s-tutt lḥukm-ad f-bnadm,
ašku ffin ntni idammn n-imẓlayn-nnk d-lanbiya. hatni ġila idammn ad-asn-tsswat. ġmkan ad-asn-igan.»
sfldġ i-kra isawl-d zġ-ṭṭbla l-lbh̬ur inna: «s-ṣṣaḥt a-sidi rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan, yʷġẓan lḥukm-nnk. s-lḥqq a-s-a-ttḥkamt.»
iddu lmalak wis kkuẓ iffi-n taṭṭast-ns f-tafukt, s-as-ityawfka a-tqd bnadm s-lɛafit-ns.
tjdr mddn s-trġi-ns iḥrran, aylliġ rgmn ism n-rbbi lli-dar taẓḍḍart a-tn-yut s-tguḍiwin-an, walaynni ur-rin ad-fln ddnub-nsn uqqrn lmjd-ns.
iddu lmalak wis smmus iffi-n taṭṭast-ns f-lɛrš n-waġʷẓn, tllas-tgldit-ns s-wrrin mddn ar-gllin ils-nsn s-waṭṭan lli-tn-ibrrin.
ar-rggmn rbbi n-ignna f-ssibt n-waṭṭan d-iḥbba lli-gisn-illan, walaynni ur-ta-jju-rin ad-fln iskkirn-nsn ʷh̬šnnin.
iddu lmalak wis sḍiṣ iffi-n taṭṭast-ns f-wasif n-furat imqqurn, s-iwrri iqqur zġ-waman, baš a-ig aġaras yujad i-igldan lli-ra-d-yašk zġ-usġlay n-tafukt.
ẓrġ ilmma kraḍ ljnun ʷh̬šnnin zund kraḍ igʷra, ffuġn-d zġ-imi n-ulgmmaḍ d-win-waġʷẓn d-win nnabi bu-tkrkas.
ntni larwaḥ l-ljnun ad-gan, ar-skarn lmɛjizat ar-tkkan dar kullu igldan n-ddunit a-tn-ssmununn i-imiġ lli-s-rad-mmaġn ġ-wass l-lḥsab n-rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan.
inna siditnnġ: «hati ra-n-aškġ zund amh̬h̬ar. ambarki a-ra-ig wanna iḍufn yawi dids timlsa-ns a-ur-iffuġ bla yat iḥšm ġ-lgddam n-mddn.»
rad-ssmunn igldan-lli ġ-udġar lli-mi-ttinin ‹harmagaddun› s-wawal n-ayt-yudaya.
iddu lmalak wis ssa iffi-n taṭṭast-ns f-ignwan, s-d-isawl yan-wawal itjhhdn zġ-dar lɛrš ġ-tḥanut tamẓlayt yini: «hati ikmml.»
ar-kkatn-uwsmann, immass iggig s-uqqryan itjhhdn, immass-wakal ula ntta bahra. ur-jju-immussi-wakal ġmkan zġ-lliġ ityawh̬laq bnadm ġ-ddunit.
tbḍu-tmdint imqqurn f-kraṭṭ-twal, tthlknt kullu timdinin n-tmizar n-ddunit. ur-ittu rbbi tamdint n-babil imqqurn, isswa-yas kullu lkas n-ssh̬ṭ l-lġaḍab-ns.
ġakudan laḥ igzirn, astwan kullu idrarn.
ar-n-iṭṭar ibruri zġ-ignwan zund iẓran, iḍni bahra yakmur-n s-kkuẓ id-mraw n-kilu. ar-n-iṭṭar f-mddn aylliġ rgmn rbbi f-tguḍi-an n-ibruri, ašku išqa bahra.
yašk-id dari yan zġ-ssa l-lmalayka lli-usinin ssa n-taṭṭasin yini-yyi: «ašk-id ad-ak-mlġ lɛqubit lli-ra-iḍr f-tmggant imqqurn lli-iskiwsn ġ-gr isaffn n-waman.
fsadn dids igldan n-ddunit, tssnufl imzdġn n-ddunit s-tissi iktin l-lfsad-ns.»

yasi-yyi ġakudan s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ, yawi-yyi s-yan mani ih̬wan. ẓrġ ġin yat-tmġart tni f-yan-waġʷẓn aẓggʷaġ. iṭṭaf ssa n-ih̬fawn d-mraw-waskawn, tyaran fllas kigan d-ismawn, gan kullu tirggam i-rbbi.
tls-tmġart-an ma-iḍlan d-ma-iẓggʷaġn, tg-n ikʷlan n-uwrġ d-ljuhr d-tẓratin ġʷlanin. tasi ġ-ufus-ns yal-lkas n-uwrġ iɛmmrn s-tjlh̬it d-irkan l-lfsad-ns.
ityara f-ignzi-ns yan ism s-lmɛna intln, iga «babil imqqurn, innas n-tmgganin ula kullu ma-igan tajlh̬it n-ddunit.»
ẓrġ tamġart-an tnufl s-tissi n-idammn n-imẓlayn n-rbbi d-win inagan n-yasuɛ. lliġ-tt-ẓriġ, tɛjjbġ gis bahra.
yini-yyi lmalak: «mah̬ aylliġ gis ttɛjjbt? rad-ak-mlġ lmɛna-yad fllak intln n-tmġart ula aġʷẓn lli-f-tni lli-iṭṭafn ssa n-ih̬fawn d-mraw-waskawn.

aġʷẓn-an ikka-ttin illa, ur-sul-a-itban, ra-d-iġli zġ-tdrut n-wakal iftu s-lhalak. ra-gis-tɛjjabn imzdġn n-ddunit lli-mi-ur-ityara ism-nsn ġ-warra n-tudrt zġ-isizwar n-ddunit. ašku rad-ẓrn aġʷẓn lli-sttin-ikkan illa, ur-sul-a-itban, ra-d-daġ-iban.
«ma-iṭṭafn lɛaql baš a-ifhm lmɛna-yad? ašku ssa n-ih̬fawn-lli, gan ssa n-iwrar lli-f-tskiws-tmġart.
gn ula ssa n-igldan, ḍrn zġ-gisn smmus, isul yan, ra-d-sul-yašk wayyaḍ. ġakud nna-d-yuška rad-as-ityawfka a-iḥkam yat luqt idrusn.
imma aġʷẓn lli-sttin ikkan illa ur-a-sul-itban, nttan a-ra-ig wis tam igldan. ikka-ttin iga yan zġ-ssa n-igldan lli-zrinin. ra-d-iwrri, iftu ilmma s-lhalak.
«imma mraw-waskawn lli-tẓrit, ntni gan mraw igldan lli-ur-ta-ḥkamnin. rad-asn-ttyawfka-tẓḍḍart ad-ḥkamn ntni d-waġʷẓn yat tasaɛt idrusn.
yat-tnbaṭṭ ka-darsn-illan, rad-fln taẓḍḍart ula tiglday-nsn ġ-ufus n-waġʷẓn.
rad-mmaġn d-ulqqaġ, walaynni ra-tn-inru-ulqqaġ ntta d-mddn-ns lli-mi-iġra, iẓli-tn ad-gn wins, ġwin-bdda gis. ašku iga ntta anmġur n-inmġurn, ig agllid n-igldan.»
izayd lmalak yini-yyi: «isaffn n-waman lli-tẓrit tskiws-tmggant ġ-gratsn, ntni gan mddn n-tasutin d-tqbilin d-tmizar d-lluġat n-ddunit.
walaynni mraw-waskawn d-waġʷẓn lli-tẓrit, ntni rad-krhun tamggant, kkisn-as kullu ma-dars-illan, fln-tt bla yat. rad-ššn tifiyi-ns jdrn-tt kullu s-lɛafit.
ašku iskr rbbi ġ-uwlawn-nsn ad-skarn ma-gisn-iqṣad ntta, mšaškan-d ad-fln taẓḍḍart ula tiglday-nsn ġ-ufus n-waġʷẓn ard kullu ijru maylli-yad-inna rbbi ra-ijru.
imma tamġart lli-tẓrit, nttat a-igan tamdint imqqurn lli-iḥkamn ġ-kullu igldan ddunit.»
lliġ izri mayan ẓrġ yal-lmalak yaḍni itjhhd bahra, igguz-d zġ-ignna, isfaw kullu ddunit s-nnur lli-gis-illan.
yall awal-ns yini: «tthlk, tthlk babil imqqurn. ur-tgi ġilad abla tazdġt l-ljnun, tɛmmr s-kullu kra igan rruḥ yʷh̬šnn ula kullu kra igan agḍiḍ ur-iḥllan lli-issmsar bnadm.
ašku tsswa kullu timizar n-ddunit s-tissi iktin l-lfsad-ns, fsadn dids igldan n-ddunit. tssrbḥ isbbabn n-ddunit zġ-tuggt n-ššhwat-ns.»
sfldġ ilmma i-wawal yaḍni zġ-ignna inna: «wa-mddn-inu, ffuġad-d zġ-dars, a-ur-dids-tmunm ġ-ddnub-ns baš a-ur-dids-tkšmm ġ-tguḍiwin-ns.
han ddnub-ns gudin ar ignna. ur-ittu rbbi-nnun kullu ma-tskr yʷh̬šn.
imma ġilad skrat-as ġmklli-awn-tskr, trarm-as f-snat-twal f-iskkirn-ns, tɛmmrm-as lkas s-tissi iḥrran f-snat-twal f-tissi lli-awn-tsswa nttat,
tɛbbrm-as tarfufnt d-tguḍi s-lɛbrt lli-s-tɛbbr i-ih̬f-ns lmjd d-lh̬ir. ašku ar-ttini nttat ġ-uwl-ns: ‹ha-yyi tagllitt ad-giġ f-lɛrš-inu. ur-giġ tahjjalt, ur-sar-kkin imṭṭawn alln-inu.›
f-ġayan a-f-ra-stt-utnt-kullu-tguḍiwin-ns ġ-yan-wass. ra-fllas-iḍr-waṭṭan d-taġuft d-uġni, ar-tti-tjddr lɛafit. ašku rbbi siditun lli-ra-fllas-izzugz lɛqubit, hati itjhhd bahra.
«imma igldan n-ddunit lli-dids-fsadnin ššn dids lh̬ir, rad-ssġuyyun ar-fllas-allan ġakud nna-ẓran aggu l-lɛafit ar-tti-tjddr.
ra-n-biddn ġ-tuggugt, iksaḍn a-ur-dids-rfufnn ula ntni, ar-ttinin: ‹taguḍi, taguḍi ayd-fllam-iḍrn a-tamdint imqqurn. wa-tamdint n-babil itjhhdn, tasaɛt idrusn a-ġ-fllam-tgguz lɛqubit-nnm.›
«rad-ssġuyyun isbbabn n-ddunit ar-fllas-allan, ašku ur-sul-illi ma-isaġn sslaɛt-nsn
n-uwrġ d-nnuqrt d-tẓratin ġʷlanin d-ljuhr d-lkttan išwan d-lḥrir d-ttub iḍili d-ttub aẓggʷaġ d-ikššuḍn lqmari d-sslaɛt l-lɛaj d-ukššuḍ iʷġlan d-sslaɛt n-wanas d-uwzzal d-rrh̬am
d-lqrfa d-lḥnuḍ d-tujjut imimn d-usafar lmurr d-lbh̬ur d-waman n-waḍil iktin d-zzit d-uggurn d-irdn d-imugayn d-uwlli d-yissan d-lkrarṣ d-ismgan d-mddn tyamaẓnin ġ-imiġ.
«rad-as-inin: ‹laḥ-am kullu timih̬ar lli-ttirit. ityattay fllam kullu ma-s-trḍit, tssfulkit srs ih̬f-nnm. ur-sar-ti-tẓrit-daġ.›
ula isbbabn lli-rbḥnin s-sslaɛt lli-gis-zznzan, rad-biddn ġ-tuggugt, iksaḍn a-ur-fllasn-tḍr lɛqubit ula ntni dids. ar-ssġuyyun ar-allan ar-ttinin:
‹taguḍi, taguḍi ayd iḍrn f-tmdint imqqurn lli-ilsan lkttan išwan d-ttub iḍili d-ttub aẓggʷaġ d-ikʷlan n-uwrġ d-ljuhr d-tẓratin ġʷlanin.
hati ġir tasaɛt idrusn a-ġ-kullu-laḥ timih̬ar-an.› «biddn-in ġ-tuggugt kullu willi tkkanin amda, rrways n-wanawn d-willi gisn ssudunin d-willi gisn th̬damnin.
lliġ a-tmnadn aggu l-lɛafit lli-s-a-tjddr ar-ssġuyyun ar-ttinin: ‹is-jju-tlla kra n-tmdint zund tamdint-ad imqqurn?›

ar-allan ar-tluḥn agdrur f-iggi n-iguyya-nsn ar-ssġuyyun ar-ttinin: ‹taguḍi, taguḍi ayd iḍrn f-tmdint imqqurn lli-issrbaḥn s-tmih̬ar-ns kullu willi dar anawn f-umda. hati ġir tasaɛt idrusn a-ġ-laḥ kullu ma-gis-illan.›
frḥat ay-ayt-ignna s-lhalak-ns, tfrḥm ay-imẓlayn n-rbbi d-irqqasn-ns d-lanbiya, ašku izzugz-d fllas rbbi-nnun lɛqubit f-ġaylli-awn-tskr.»
ġakudan a-inkr yal-lmalak itjhhdn, yasi yan-uẓru imqqurn zund aẓru n-uzrg, iluḥ-t-in ġ-umda yini: «ġmkad a-s-ra-n-ttyawlwaḥ-tmdint n-babil imqqurn s-jjhd. ur-sar-km-iẓri yan.
ur-sul-ra-gim-sfldn i-lḥss n-ayt-lutar nġd ayt-umarg nġd ayt-tɛuwwatt nġd ayt-nnffar. ur-sul-ra-gim-ilin ayt-twuri, wala ra-gim-sllan i-taqqurt n-uzrg,
wala ra-gim-tfaw tifawt l-lqnadl, wala ra-gim-sfldn i-wawal n-usli d-tslit. ašku isbbabn-nnm, inmġurn n-ddunit ad-gan. s-ssiḥr-nnm a-s-a-tjllut kullu timizar.
lɛqubit a-iḍrn f-babil ašku yufa-n gis rbbi-nnun idammn l-lanbiya d-imẓlayn-ns d-win kullu mddn lli-tyawnġanin ġ-ddunit.»
lliġ izri mayan sfldġ i-kra itjhhdn irwas-iyi taqqurt n-mddn ggutnin ġ-ignna, ulln awal-nsn ar-ttinin: «halliluya, rbbi-nnġ a-ijjnjamn, ig bab l-lmjd d-lquwwa.
yʷġẓan lḥukm-ns, s-lḥqq a-s-a-itḥkam. yut lɛqubit f-tmggant imqqurn lli-issrkan kullu ddunit s-lfsad-ns. irar-as rbbi f-idammn n-ih̬ddamn-ns.»
alln-daġ awal-nsn ar-ttinin: «halliluya, ar-bdda-yaqlay-waggu-ns, ur-sar-itmmi.»
ḍrn-in ilmma sin id-mraw d-kkuẓ (24) n-umġar d-kkuẓṭ lmh̬luqat ġ-lgddam n-rbbi lli-iskiwsn f-lɛrš, sjdn-as ar-ttinin: «amin, halliluya.»
isawl-d ilmma yan-wawal zġ-dar lɛrš yini: «alġat rbbi-nnġ a-ih̬ddamn-ns kullukn lli-t-uqqrnin, ġwilli mqqurnin ula ġwilli mẓẓinin.»

sfldġ ilmma i-kra irwas-iyi iwaliwn n-mddn ggutnin bahra, zund ijjijn n-isaffn n-waman ggutnin ula zund aqqryan n-iggig itjhhdn, ar-ttinin: «halliluya. rbbi siditnnġ itjhhdn, nttan a-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan.
a-nfrḥ ġilad, nall awal-nnġ s-lfrḥ, nini mnšk a-bahra-iggut lmjd-ns. ašku truḥ-d-tmġra n-ulqqaġ. ha-taslit-ns tjjujad ih̬f-ns,
ifk-as rbbi timlsit l-lkttan išwan iġusn issmrqiqiyn.» lmɛna l-lkttan tga «ifulkitn lli-skrn imẓlayn n-rbbi.»
yini-yyi ilmma lmalak: «ara awal-ad, ‹imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli mi iġra rbbi ad-d-aškin s-imnsi n-tmġra n-ulqqaġ.›» izayd yini-yyi: «ġwid gan iwaliwn n-rbbi. lḥqq ad-gan.»

imma nkki ḍrġ-n ġ-dar iḍarn-ns iriġ ad-as-sjdġ, s-iyi-inna: «a-ur-tskrt ġmkan. ašku ah̬ddam kad-giġ, zund kiyi d-aytmak lli-umẓnin ġ-tugga n-yasuɛ. rbbi waḥdut a-ttɛbadt.» ašku tugga n-yasuɛ a-idḥayn ġwilli sawalnin s-mad-asn-imala rbbi.
ẓrġ ilmma ignna rẓmn, s-iyi-d-iban yan-wayyis umlil. amnnay-ns, ar-as-ttinin ‹lḥqq› ula ‹ġwalli izgan ġ-wawal-ns›. s-lḥqq a-s-a-ikkat lḥukm ar-srs-itmmaġ.
ar-d-ssufunt-walln-ns zund isufa l-lɛafit, ilin f-ih̬f-ns ttijan ggutnin. ityara fllas yan-ism lli-ur-issin yan abla nttan.
immġ-uqššab-ns s-idammn, ig ism-ns ‹awal n-rbbi›.
ḍfurn-t ljyuš n-ignna, lsn lkttan išwan iġusn imlluln, nin f-yissan umliln.
iffuġ-d zġ-imi-ns zund yat taẓẓit imsadn. ra-srs-yut timizar n-ddunit. ra-tnt-iḥkam s-uɛmud n-uwzzal, yaḍḍr aḍil ġ-lmɛṣṣrt n-ssh̬ṭ l-lġaḍab n-rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan.
ityara yan ism ġ-uqššab-ns f-uflla n-umṣaḍ-ns, iga ‹agllid n-igldan d-unmġur n-inmġurn›.
ẓrġ ilmma yal-lmalak ibidd f-tafukt, yall awal-ns iġr s-igḍaḍ kullutn lli-tayylalnin ġ-ignwan yini-asn: «aškad-d tmunm f-imnsi imqqurn lli-awn-ijjujad rbbi,
a-tšttam tifiyi n-igldan d-iɛskrin d-inmġurn l-lɛskr, d-yissan ula imnnayn-nsn, ar-tšttam tifiyi n-kullu mddn, ismgan ula ġwilli ganin win ih̬f-nsn, ma-imẓẓin ula ma-imqqurn.»
ẓrġ ilmma aġʷẓn, nttan d-igldan n-ddunit d-ljyuš-nsn. munn-d kullutn ad-mmaġn d-walli inin f-wayyis d-ljiš-ns.

imma ntta yumẓ aġʷẓn, yamẓ ula nnabi bu-tkrkas lli-iskrn lmɛjizat s-ism n-waġʷẓn ijlu srsnt ġwilli dar ṭṭabɛ n-waġʷẓn d-willi tɛbadnin ṣṣurt-ns. ġakudan sul ddrn a-tn-in-iluḥ s-sin ġ-tmda l-lɛafit lli-ijddrn s-lkbrit.
izayd ilmma ġwalli inin f-wayyis inġ ma-iqaman zġ-ljyuš-nsn s-taẓẓit lli-d-iffuġn zġ-imi-ns. munn-d fllasn igḍaḍ kullutn ar-šttan tifiyi-nsn aylliġ šbɛan.
ẓrġ ilmma yal-lmalak igguz-d zġ-ignna, yusi tasarut n-tdrut n-wakal, tili ġ-ufus-ns yat-ssnslt imqqurn.
yamẓ algmmaḍ lli-mi-ttinin ‹abnkal aqdim› ula ‹iblis› ula ‹šiṭan›, ikrs-t baš a-iqama ġ-iskraf alf n-usggʷas.
iluḥ-t-in ġ-tdrut n-wakal, iqqn-n fllas imi n-tdrut, iskr-as ṭṭabɛ baš a-ur-sul-ijllu timizar n-ddunit ard izri-walf n-usggʷas. tigira n-mayan ra-d-iqqan a-inurẓm zġ-iskraf yat luqt idrusn.

ẓrġ ilmma kra l-lɛruš ġ-ignna. ityawfka i-willi fllasn skiwsnin lḥqq ad-tḥkamn. ẓrġ larwaḥ n-willi mi ityawbbay ih̬f-nsn f-ssibt n-tugga-nsn f-yasuɛ ula f-wawal n-rbbi. ur-a-tɛbadn aġʷẓn ula ṣṣurt-ns, ula qbln ṭṭabɛ-ns f-ignzi-nsn ula f-ufus-nsn. nkrn ntni zġ-lmut ar-tḥkamn d-lmasiḥ alf n-usggʷas.
ġmkad a-tga-tnkra tamzwarut. imma wiyyaḍ sul qaman ġ-lmut, ur-rad-nkrn ard izri-walf n-usggʷas.
imbarkin d-imẓlayn ad-gan ġwilli-d-nkrnin ġ-tnkra tamzwarut. ur-ra-tiẓḍar lmut tis snat a-tn-tlkm. rad-gn inmġurn n-rbbi d-lmasiḥ, ra-dids-ḥkamn alf n-usggʷas.
ġakud nna-ikmml-walf n-usggʷas ra-ityawfsay šiṭan zġ-iskraf-ns,
iffuġ-d a-ijlu kullu timizar n-ddunit, issmun imzdġn-nsnt i-imiġ. ntni ‹gug› ula ‹magug› ad-gan, igatn zund amlal n-tama n-umda,
ar-zziggizn ard kn ddunit kullutt, sutln i-untal n-imẓlayn n-rbbi a-t-igan d-tmdint lli-dars-iɛzzan. imil tḍr-d fllasn lɛafit zġ-ignna thlk-tn.
ittluḥ-n iblis lli-tn-ijlan ġ-tmda l-lɛafit d-lkbrit lli-ġ-illa-waġʷẓn d-nnabi bu-tkrkas. rad-kullu-ġin-trfufunn ġ-iyḍ ula azal s-urfufn ur-sar-itmmin.
ẓrġ ilmma yal-lɛrš imqqurn imlluln, ẓrġ ula ġwalli fllas iskiwsn. lliġ-d-iban ntta, rwln zġ-gis ignwan d-wakal, laḥ-tn kullu.

s-ẓriġ ġwilli mmutnin, ma-imqqurn ula ma-imẓẓin, biddn kullu ġ-lgddam l-lɛrš. tyawrẓamn kra n-warratn ġakudan, s-ityawrẓam yan-warra yaḍni igan arra n-tudrt. yut rbbi lḥukm ġakudan f-willi mmutnin, irar-asn f-ġaylli skrn ġmklli ityaran ġ-warratn.
idḥi-d-umda kullu willi gis mmutnin, tdḥi-d lmut d-udġar l-lmut kullu willi gis llanin, iḥkam rbbi fllasn kullutn f-ġaylli skrn.
tettluḥ-n ilmma lmut d-udġar l-lmut ġ-tmda l-lɛafit. lmut tis snat a-tga-tmda l-lɛafit.
wanna mi ur-ityara ism-ns ġ-warra n-tudrt, ittluḥ-n ġ-tmda l-lɛafit.
ẓrġ ilmma ignna l-ljdid d-wakal l-ljdid. ur-sul-qaman ignwan iqdimn ula ikalln iqdimn, laḥ ula amda.
ẓrġ tamdint tamẓlayt, a-stt-igan d-urušalim l-ljdid, tgguz-d zġ-ignna zġ-dar rbbi. tfulki bahra zund yat-tslit ilsan timlsit n-tmġra, tujad a-tmnaggar asli-ns.
sfldġ i-yan-wawal itjhhdn isawl-d zġ-dar lɛrš yini: «hati ġ-gr bnadm a-ġ-ra-tili-tzdġt n-rbbi, izdġ ġilad ġ-wammas-nsn, gn ayt-dars. rbbi rad-didsn-yili, ig rbbi-nsn.
ra-isfiḍ kullu imṭṭawn-nsn. ur-sul-ra-tili lmut ula taguḍi ula tiġwiyya ula aṭṭan, ašku ddunit taqdimt ur-sul-tqama.»
isawl-d ġwalli iskiwsn f-lɛrš yini: «skrġ kullu ġilad zġ-ljdid.» yini-yyi-daġ: «ara mayad. ašku ʷġẓann iwaliwn-ad, lḥqq ad-gan.»
izayd yini-yyi: «hati ikmml. nkki giġ amzwaru gġ amggʷaru. gġ isizwar gġ isiggʷra. wanna yaġ irifi, ra-t-ssuġ zġ-talɛint n-waman n-tudrt bla gis ifka yat.
imma wanna inran, rad-as-fkġ lwrt-ad: rad-gġ rbbi-ns, ig ntta iwi.

imma ġwilli rwlnin zġ-lḥqq wrrin zġ-uġaras-inu ssrkan ih̬fawn-nsn ar-nqqan ar-tfsadn ar-skarn ssiḥr ar-tɛbadn ilahat n-ddunit, rad-ftun ntni d-kullu ayt-tkrkas s-udġar-nsn ġ-tmda lli-ijddrn s-lɛafit d-lkbrit. ġmkad a-ra-tg lmut tis snat.»
yašk-id ilmma yan zġ-ssa l-lmalayka lli-usinin ssa n-taṭṭasin lli-ɛmmrnin s-ssa n-tguḍiwin ggʷranin. isawl-d sri yini-yyi: «ašk-id mlġ-ak taslit lli-igan tamġart n-ulqqaġ.»
yawi-yyi s-tḥkimt n-rruḥ ar iggi n-yan-udrar imqqurn yattuyn, iml-iyi-d tamdint tamẓlayt n-‹urušalim› tgguz-d zġ-ignna zġ-dar rbbi.
ar-tssmrqiqiy s-lmjd n-rbbi zund yat-tẓrut taqrfit iʷġlan bahra, ula zund adfl iṣfan.
ilulli-as yan-uġʷrab imqqurn yattuyn, ila sin d-mraw n-imi. biddn ġin sin d-mraw l-lmalak ġ-lgddam n-imawn. kraygatt imi ityara gis ism n-tqbilt zġ-snat d-mrawt n-tqbilt n-ayt-rbbi.
llan kraḍ imawn ġ-tsga lli-zġ-a-taqlay tafukt, ilin kraḍ imawn ġ-tsga taẓlmaṭṭ, ilin kraḍ imawn ġ-tsga tafasit, ilin kraḍ imawn ġ-tsga lli-ġ-a-n-teṭṭar tafukt.
llan sin d-mraw n-uẓru ġ-llsas n-uġʷrab n-tmdint, tyaran gisn ismawn n-sin d-mraw n-urqqas n-ulqqaġ.
lmalak lli-d-sri-isawln, illa dars yan-uɛmud n-uwrġ ma-s-a-issġal, yiri a-srs-issġl tamdint d-imawn-ns d-uġʷrab-ns.
tngadda-tġzi n-tmdint zġ-kkuẓṭ-tsgiw. iddu lmalak issġl tamdint s-uɛmud-ns. sin id-walf d-sin id-miyya (2200) n-kilimitr a-illan ġ-kraygatt tasga ula ġ-tiddi-ns.
issġl ula aġʷrab lli-as-isutln. ssa n-id-mraw d-sin (72) mitru a-ġ-n-tlla tiddi-ns s-mklli-s-a-ssġaln mddn.
ityawbna-uġʷrab-ns s-iẓran iqrfin ġʷlanin. ttyawskar-tmdint zġ-uwrġ bahra iṣfan, tfaw zund jjaj.
ityawskar llsas n-uġʷrab n-tmdint zġ-kigan d-iẓran ġʷlanin. amzwaru iga aqrfi, wis sin iga aẓrqi, wis kraḍ iga aqhawi, wis kkuẓ iga azgzaw,
wis smmus iga abrar, wis sḍiṣ iga aẓggʷaġ, wis ssa iga ašibi, wis tam iga umlil, wis tẓa iga awraġ, wis mraw iga ah̬ršufi, wis yan d-mraw iga amšmaši, wis sin d-mraw iga iḍili.
imma imawn-an s-sin d-mraw gan sin d-mraw l-ljuhr, kraygatt imi iga taljuhrt. imma asuk n-tmdint iga win-uwrġ iṣfan, ifaw zund jjaj.
ur-ẓriġ kra n-tgmmi ġ-a-tɛbadn mddn ġ-tmdint, ašku ar-gis-tɛbadn sidi rbbi lli-iḥkamn kullu ma-illan, nttan d-ulqqaġ, ġ-illiġ llan ntni.
ur-tḥtajja-tmdint ad-as-ttisfiw tafukt ula ayyur, ašku lmjd n-rbbi iga tifawt-ns, ig-ulqqaġ lqndil-ns.
s-tifawt n-tmdint a-s-ra-ttidun ayt-tmizar kullutn, rad-as-d-awin igldan n-ddunit tirzzifin l-lmjd-nsn.
ur-sar-qqinn imawn n-tmdint ġ-uzal, ula sar illa iḍ.
tirzzifin ula timih̬ar a-rad-as-d-awin zġ-kullu timizar n-ddunit.
walaynni ur-ra-srs-ikšm ma-ijlh̬n ula ma-issrkawn ula ma-isskirkisn. ur-ra-srs-ikšm abla ġwilli mi tyaran ismawn-nsn ġ-warra n-tudrt n-ulqqaġ.
iml-iyi ilmma lmalak asif n-waman n-tudrt. ar-issmrqiqiy zund adfl iṣfan, iffi-d zġ-dar lɛrš n-rbbi d-ulqqaġ,

iftu ġ-wammas n-usuk n-tmdint. yili-usġar n-tudrt ġ-snat-tsgiw n-wasif. ar-yakka lġllt-ns kraygatt ayyur, snat d-mrawt-twal ġ-usggʷas. gn ifrawn-ns asafar ma-s-a-tjjin mddn zġ-kullu timizar n-ddunit,
ur-sar-ra-tili tagat. ġin a-ġ-ra-yili lɛrš n-rbbi d-ulqqaġ. ra-ti-tɛbadn ih̬ddamn-ns,
ar-tmnadn udm-ns, ityara ism-ns f-ignzi-nsn.
ur-sul-ra-yili iḍ, wala ra-sul-ḥtajjan tifawt l-lqnadl ula tin tafukt. ašku sidi rbbi a-igan tifawt-nsn, d-ntni a-ra-iḥkam. ur-ra-sar-itmmu lḥukm-nsn.

yini-yyi ilmma lmalak: «ʷġẓann iwaliwn-ad, lḥqq ad-gan. sidi rbbi lli-idḥayn s-rruḥ-ns ġwilli sawalnin s-mad-asn-imala, yuzn-d lmalak-ns ġilad a-d-iml i-ih̬ddamn-ns ma-d-iqqann a-ijru ġ-mayd-d-yakmurn.»
inna yasuɛ: «hati ġir yan imikk ra-n-aškġ.» ambarki a-iga wanna iskarn s-iwaliwn lli-d-issbayyn rbbi ġ-warra-yad.
nkki yuḥanna sfldġ i-tġawsiwin-ad ẓrġ-tnt. lliġ izri kullu mayd mi sfldġ ẓrġ-t, ḍrġ-n ad-sjdġ ġ-dar iḍarn l-lmalak lli-yyi-tnt-imlan,
s-iyi-inna: «a-ur-tskrt ġmkan, ašku ah̬ddam kad-giġ, zund kiyi d-aytmak lanbiya ula kullu willi skarnin s-iwaliwn n-warra-yad. rbbi waḥdut a-ttɛbadt.»
izayd yini-yyi: «iwaliwn n-warra-yad lli-ak-issbayyn rbbi, a-tn-ur-tqqnt s-ṭṭabɛ tḥḍut-tn. ašku yakmur-d-uzmz lli-ġ-rad-kullu-ijru mayd ityaran.
wanna iskarn ma-yʷh̬šnn, ra-iqama ġ-ma-yʷh̬šnn. wanna iskarn ma-issrkawn, ra-iqama ġ-ma-issrkawn. wanna iskarn afulki, ra-iqama ġ-ufulki. wanna irḍan rbbi, ra-iqama ġ-ma-irḍan rbbi.»
inna yasuɛ: «hati ġir yan imikk ra-n-aškġ, fkġ i-kullu mddn mad-sthllan, rarġ i-kraygatt yan f-ma-iskr.
giġ amzwaru gġ amggʷaru. gġ ġwalli izwarn gġ ġwalli iggʷran. gġ isizwar gġ isiggʷra.»
imbarkin ad-gan ġwilli sirdnin timlsa-nsn ad-asn-yili lḥqq ad-kšmn zġ-imawn n-tmdint ššn zġ-usġar n-tudrt.
imma ġwilli rkanin ra-n-qaman ġ-brra. gan-tn ġwilli skarnin ssiḥr d-willi tfsadnin d-willi nqqanin d-willi tɛbadnin ilahat n-ddunit, ntni ula kullu willi sskirkisnin ar-tfraḥn s-tkrkas.
«nkki yasuɛ uznġ-awn-in lmalak-inu a-iml tiġawsiwin-ad i-imnaggarn n-aytmatn. giġ aẓur n-dawd gġ agʷlas-ns. gġ itri lli-isfawn zikk ṣṣbaḥ.»
isawl-d rruḥ n-rbbi ula taslit inin-as: «ašk-id.» wanna isfldn, illa fllas a-yini: «ašk-id.» d-wanna yaġ irifi, iẓḍar a-d-yašk, isu zġ-waman n-tudrt, kullu wanna iran bla ifka yat.
awiyat-stt ġ-ma-rad-iniġ i-kullu wanna isfldn i-iwaliwn lli-d-issbayyn rbbi ġ-warra-yad: iġ-idda yan ard-asn-izayd kra, rad-as-izayd rbbi kullu tiguḍiwin lli-ibdr ġ-warra-yad.
iġ-idda yan ard ikkis kra zġ-iwaliwn lli-d-issbayyn rbbi ġ-warra-yad, rad-as-ikkis taġamt n-usġar n-tudrt ula ġ-tmdint tamẓlayt lli-ibdr ġ-warra-yad.
isawl ġwalli-d-issbayynn tiġawsiwin-ad yini: «lḥqq ayad. ġir imikk ra-n-aškġ.» amin. ašk-id a-siditnnġ yasuɛ.
a-tili lbaraka n-siditnnġ yasuɛ i-imẓlayn n-rbbi kullutn. amin.
